atk-s0503a:30_0: Tattha udānanti kenaṭṭhena udānaṃ? Udānanaṭṭhena. Kimidaṃ udānaṃ nāma? Pītivegasamuṭṭhāpito
atk-s0503a:30_1: udāhāro. Yathā hi yaṃ telādi minitabbavatthu mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, vissanditvā
atk-s0503a:30_2: gacchati, taṃ “avaseko”ti vuccati. Yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, ajjhottharitvā
atk-s0503a:30_3: gacchati, taṃ “ogho”ti vuccati. Evameva yaṃ pītivegasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ vitakkavipphāraṃ
atk-s0503a:30_4: antohadayaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti, so adhiko hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi vacīdvārena

atk-s0503a:32_0: Evaṃ tayidaṃ sabbaññubuddhabhāsitaṃ, paccekabuddhabhāsitaṃ, sāvakabhāsitanti tividhaṃ

atk-s0503a:34: Sabbo me vihato moho, sītibhūtosmi nibbuto”ti. –
atk-s0503a:38_0: Ādinā therīgāthāsu ca āgatāni. Tāni pana tesaṃ therānaṃ therīnañca na kevalaṃ udānāni

atk-s0503a:38_3: tassa bhagavato”tiādīni tisso saṅgītiyo ārūḷhāni udānāni santi eva, na tāni idha

atk-s0503a:39_0: Yā pana “anekajātisaṃsāra”ntiādigāthāya dīpitā bhagavatā bodhimūle udānavasena pavattitā
atk-s0503a:39_1: anekasatasahassānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ avijahitaudānagāthā ca, etā aparabhāge pana
atk-s0503a:39_2: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa bhagavatā desitattā dhammasaṅgāhakehi udānapāḷiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ
atk-s0503a:39_3: anāropetvā dhammapade saṅgītā. Yañca “aññāsi vata, bho koṇḍañño, aññāsi vata, bho

atk-s0503a:39_7: saphalabhāvapaccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ paṭhamabodhiyaṃ sabbesaṃ eva bhikkhūnaṃ sammāpaṭipattipaccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ
atk-s0503a:39_8: “ārādhayiṃsu vata maṃ bhikkhū ekaṃ samaya”ntiādivacanaṃ viya pītisomanassajanitaṃ
atk-s0503a:39_9: udāhāramattaṃ, “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”tiādivacanaṃ viya pavattiyā nivattiyā
atk-s0503a:39_10: vā na pakāsananti, na dhammasaṅgāhakehi udānapāḷiyaṃ saṅgītanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:40_0: Taṃ panetaṃ udānaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ, suttantapiṭakaṃ, abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu

atk-s0503a:40_3: gāthā, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallanti navasu sāsanaṅgesu udānasaṅgahaṃ.
atk-s0503a:42: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
atk-s0503a:43_0: Evaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena paṭiññātesu caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassesu katipayadhammakkhandhasaṅgahaṃ.
atk-s0503a:43_1: Bodhivaggo, mucalindavaggo, nandavaggo, meghiyavaggo, soṇavaggo, jaccandhavaggo,
atk-s0503a:43_2: cūḷavaggo, pāṭaligāmiyavaggoti vaggato aṭṭhavaggaṃ; suttato asītisuttasaṅgahaṃ, gāthāto
atk-s0503a:43_5: dve anusandhī, sesesu yathānusandhivasena ekekova anusandhi, ajjhāsayānusandhi panettha
atk-s0503a:43_6: natthi. Evaṃ sabbathāpi ekāsītianusandhisaṅgahaṃ. Padato satādhikāni ekavīsa padasahassāni,
atk-s0503a:43_7: gāthāpādato tevīsati catussatādhikāni aṭṭha sahassāni, akkharato sattasahassādhikāni

atk-s0503a:54: Tīṇi dvāsīti ca tathā, udānassa paveditā”ti.
atk-s0503a:55_0: Tassa aṭṭhasu vaggesu bodhivaggo ādi, suttesu paṭhamaṃ bodhisuttaṃ, tassāpi evaṃ

atk-s0503a:55_2: paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti vinayapiṭake tantimārūḷhā eva. Yo panettha nidānakosallatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:55_3: vattabbo kathāmaggo sopi sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṃ dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto evāti
atk-s0503a:58_0: 1. Yaṃ panettha “evaṃ me suta”ntiādikaṃ nidānaṃ, tattha evanti nipātapadaṃ. Metiādīni
atk-s0503a:58_1: nāmapadāni. Uruvelāyaṃ viharatīti ettha vīti upasaggapadaṃ, haratīti ākhyātapadanti
atk-s0503a:59_2: maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti evamādīsu upamāyaṃ āgato. “Evaṃ te abhikkamitabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:59_3: evaṃ te paṭikkamitabba”ntiādīsu upadese. “Evametaṃ bhagavā, evametaṃ sugatā”tiādīsu
atk-s0503a:59_4: sampahaṃsane. “Evamevaṃ panāyaṃ vasalī yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa
atk-s0503a:59_5: vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”tiādīsu garahaṇe. “Evaṃ, bhanteti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosu”ntiādīsu
atk-s0503a:59_6: vacanasampaṭiggahe. “Evaṃ byā kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”tiādīsu
atk-s0503a:59_7: ākāre. “Ehi tvaṃ, māṇavaka, yena samaṇo ānando tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā mama
atk-s0503a:59_8: vacanena samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha
atk-s0503a:59_9: ‘subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhavantaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ
atk-s0503a:59_10: phāsuvihāraṃ pucchatī’ti, evañca vadehi ‘sādhu kira bhavaṃ ānando yena subhassa māṇavassa
atk-s0503a:59_11: todeyyaputtassa nivesanaṃ, tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’ti”ādīsu nidassane.
atk-s0503a:59_12: “‘Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, kālāmā, ime dhammā kusalā vā akusalā vā’ti? ‘Akusalā, bhante’.
atk-s0503a:59_13: ‘Sāvajjā vā anavajjā vā’ti? ‘Sāvajjā, bhante’. ‘Viññūgarahitā vā viññuppasatthā vā’ti?
atk-s0503a:59_14: ‘Viññūgarahitā, bhante’. ‘Samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti, no’vā?
atk-s0503a:59_15: ‘Kathaṃ vo ettha hotī’ti? ‘Samattā, bhante, samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti,
atk-s0503a:59_16: evaṃ no ettha hotīti”’ādīsu avadhāraṇe. “Evamete sunhātā suvilittā kappitakesamassū
atk-s0503a:59_18: idaṃsaddassa atthe. Gatasaddo hi pakārapariyāyo, tathā vidhākārasaddā. Tathā hi vidhayuttagatasadde
atk-s0503a:59_19: lokiyā pakāratthe vadanti. “Evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ evamāyupariyanto”tiādīsu parimāṇe.
atk-s0503a:60_0: Nanu ca “evaṃ vitakkitaṃ no tumhehi, evamāyupariyanto”ti cettha evaṃsaddena pucchanākāraparimāṇākārānaṃ
atk-s0503a:60_1: vuttattā ākārattho eva evaṃsaddoti. Na, visesasabbhāvato. Ākāramattavācako hettha
atk-s0503a:60_2: evaṃsaddo ākāratthoti adhippeto. “Evaṃ byā kho”tiādīsu pana ākāravisesavacano. Ākāravisesavācino
atk-s0503a:60_3: cete evaṃsaddā pucchanākāraparimāṇākārānaṃ vācakattā. Evañca katvā “evaṃ jātena maccenā”tiādīni
atk-s0503a:62: Evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti. –
atk-s0503a:63_2: bahukā puññakiriyā maritabbasabhāvatāya maccena kattabbāti abhedatāya puppharāsi
atk-s0503a:63_3: mālāguṇā ca upamā, tesaṃ upamānākāro yathāsaddena aniyamato vutto. Puna evaṃsaddena
atk-s0503a:63_4: niyamanavasena vutto. So pana upamākāro niyamiyamāno atthato upamā eva hotīti vuttaṃ “upamāyaṃ āgato”ti.
atk-s0503a:64_0: Tathā “evaṃ iminā ākārena abhikkamitabba”ntiādinā upadisiyamānāya samaṇasāruppāya

atk-s0503a:65_1: jānantehi kataṃ yaṃ tattha vijjamānaguṇānaṃ pakārehi haṃsanaṃ udaggatākaraṇaṃ sampahaṃsanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:66_0: “Evamevaṃ panāya”nti ettha garahaṇākāroti vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ. So ca garahaṇākāro

atk-s0503a:67_0: “Evaṃ no”ti etthāpi tesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ ahitadukkhāvahabhāvena sanniṭṭhānajananatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:67_1: anumatiggahaṇavasena “no vā kathaṃ vo ettha hotī”ti pucchāya katāya “evaṃ no ettha

atk-s0503a:68: “Evañca vadehī”ti yathāhaṃ vadāmi evaṃ samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ vadehīti vadanākāro idāni vattabbo evaṃsaddena nidassīyatīti “nidassanattho”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:69_1: vuttā. “Evaṃ, bhante”ti pana dhammassa sādhukaṃ savanamanasikāre niyojitehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0503a:69_2: tattha patiṭṭhitabhāvassa paṭijānanavasena vuttattā tattha evaṃsaddo vacanasampaṭiggahattho.
atk-s0503a:69_3: Tena evaṃ, bhanteti sādhu, bhante, suṭṭhu, bhanteti vuttaṃ hoti. Svāyamidha ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇesu daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0503a:70_0: Tattha ākāratthena evaṃsaddena etamatthaṃ dīpeti – nānānayanipuṇamanekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:70_2: sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchantaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ sabbappakārena
atk-s0503a:70_3: ko samattho viññātuṃ, sabbathāmena pana sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi evaṃ me sutaṃ, mayāpi
atk-s0503a:71_1: ca assādādivisayādibhedena nānāvidhā nayā nānānayā. Nayā vā pāḷigatiyo, tā ca paññattianupaññattādivasena
atk-s0503a:71_4: ca nānappakārāti nānānayā, tehi nipuṇaṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumanti nānānayanipuṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:72_0: Āsayova ajjhāsayo, so ca sassatādibhedena apparajakkhatādibhedena ca anekavidho.
atk-s0503a:72_1: Attajjhāsayādiko eva vā aneko ajjhāsayo anekajjhāsayo. So samuṭṭhānaṃ uppattihetu
atk-s0503a:74_0: Iddhiādesanānusāsanībhedena tesu ca ekekassa visayādibhedena vividhaṃ bahuvidhaṃ
atk-s0503a:74_1: vā pāṭihāriyaṃ etassāti vividhapāṭihāriyaṃ. Tattha paṭipakkhaharaṇato rāgādikilesāpanayanato
atk-s0503a:74_2: pāṭihāriyanti atthe sati bhagavato na paṭipakkhā rāgādayo santi ye haritabbā, puthujjanānampi
atk-s0503a:74_3: vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0503a:74_4: tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha pāṭihāriyanti vattuṃ. Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa
atk-s0503a:74_5: bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā, tesaṃ haraṇato pāṭihāriyanti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:74_6: evaṃ sati yuttametaṃ. Atha vā bhagavato ceva sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā, tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:74_7: haraṇato pāṭihāriyaṃ. Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca
atk-s0503a:74_8: iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā honti. Paṭīti vā ayaṃ saddo pacchāti etassa
atk-s0503a:74_9: atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo”tiādīsu viya. Tasmā
atk-s0503a:74_10: samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:74_11: Attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:74_12: Iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā,
atk-s0503a:74_13: haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni
atk-s0503a:74_14: bhavanti. Paṭihāriyameva pāṭihāriyaṃ, paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanīsamudāye
atk-s0503a:74_15: bhavaṃ ekekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati. Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato.
atk-s0503a:74_16: Tattha jātaṃ nimittabhūtato tato vā āgatanti pāṭihāriyanti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:75_1: vā dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhā gambhīrā, sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo anupacitakusalasambhārehi
atk-s0503a:75_2: alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭhā duppariyogāhā ca, tasmā tehi catūhi gambhīrabhāvehi yuttanti
atk-s0503a:76_0: Eko eva bhagavato dhammadesanāghoso, ekasmiṃ khaṇe pavattamāno nānābhāsānaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0503a:76_1: attano attano bhāsāvasena apubbaṃ acarimaṃ gahaṇūpago hoti. Acinteyyo hi buddhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:76_2: buddhānubhāvoti sabbasattānaṃ sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathaṃ āgacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:77: Nidassanatthena “nāhaṃ sayambhū, na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento “evaṃ me sutaṃ, mayāpi evaṃ suta”nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0503a:78_0: Avadhāraṇatthena “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ
atk-s0503a:78_1: ānando, gatimantānaṃ, satimantānaṃ, dhitimantānaṃ, upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti
atk-s0503a:78_2: evaṃ bhagavatā, “āyasmā ānando atthakusalo, dhammakusalo, byañjanakusalo, niruttikusalo,
atk-s0503a:78_3: pubbāparakusalo”ti evaṃ dhammasenāpatinā ca pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ
atk-s0503a:78_4: dassento sattānaṃ sotukāmataṃ janeti. “Evaṃ me sutaṃ, tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato
atk-s0503a:78_5: vā anūnamanadhikaṃ, evameva na aññathā daṭṭhabba”nti. Aññathāti bhagavato sammukhā
atk-s0503a:78_6: sutākārato aññathā na pana bhagavatā desitākārato. Acinteyyānubhāvā hi bhagavato
atk-s0503a:78_7: desanā, sā neva sabbākārena sakkā viññātunti vuttovāyamattho. Sutākārāvirujjhanameva hi dhāraṇabalaṃ.
atk-s0503a:79_0: Mesaddo tīsu atthesu dissati. Tathā hissa “gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyya”ntiādīsu
atk-s0503a:79_1: mayāti attho. “Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu mayhanti
atk-s0503a:79_2: attho. “Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavathā”tiādīsu mamāti attho. Idha pana “mayā
atk-s0503a:79_3: sutaṃ, mama suta”nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
atk-s0503a:80_0: Ettha ca yo paro na hoti, so attāti evaṃ vattabbe niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte sasantāne
atk-s0503a:80_1: vattanato tividhopi mesaddo kiñcāpi ekasmiṃyeva atthe dissati, karaṇasampadānādivisesasaṅkhāto
atk-s0503a:80_2: pana viññāyatevāyaṃ atthabhedoti “me-saddo tīsu atthesu dissatī”ti vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:81_0: Sutanti ayaṃ sutasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca gamanavissutakilinnūpacitānuyogasotaviññeyya
atk-s0503a:81_1: sotadvārānusāra viññātādianekatthappabhedo. Kiñcāpi hi upasaggo kiriyaṃ viseseti,
atk-s0503a:81_2: jotakabhāvato pana satipi tasmiṃ sutasaddo eva taṃ tamatthaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa
atk-s0503a:81_3: sutasaddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggassa gahaṇaṃ na virujjhati.
atk-s0503a:82_0: Tattha “senāya pasuto”tiādīsu gacchantoti attho. “Sutadhammassa passato”tiādīsu vissutadhammassāti
atk-s0503a:82_1: attho. “Avassutā avassutassā”tiādīsu kilesena kilinnā kilinnassāti attho. “Tumhehi
atk-s0503a:82_2: puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappaka”ntiādīsu upacitanti attho. “Ye jhānappasutā dhīrā”tiādīsu
atk-s0503a:82_3: jhānānuyuttāti attho. “Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ muta”ntiādīsu sotaviññeyyanti attho. “Sutadharo
atk-s0503a:82_5: upadhārita”nti vā “upadhāraṇa”nti vā attho. Me-saddassa hi mayāti atthe sati “evaṃ
atk-s0503a:82_6: mayā sutaṃ sotadvārānusārena upadhārita”nti yujjati. Mamāti atthe sati “evaṃ mama
atk-s0503a:83_0: Evametesu tīsu padesu yasmā sutasaddasannidhāne payuttena evaṃsaddena savanakiriyājotakena
atk-s0503a:83_2: Meti vuttaviññāṇasamaṅgīpuggalanidassanaṃ. Sabbāni hi vākyāni evakāratthasahitāniyeva
atk-s0503a:83_4: Yathā hi sutaṃ sutamevāti vattabbataṃ arahati tathā taṃ sammā sutaṃ anūnaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:83_5: anadhikaggahaṇaṃ aviparītaggahaṇañca hotīti. Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo
atk-s0503a:83_6: atthaṃ vadatīti etasmiṃ pakkhe yasmā sutanti etassa asutaṃ na hotīti ayamattho vutto,
atk-s0503a:83_8: vuttaṃ hoti – evaṃ me sutaṃ, na mayā idaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, na sayambhūñāṇena sacchikataṃ,
atk-s0503a:83_9: na aññathā vā upaladdhaṃ. Api ca sutaṃva, tañca kho sammadevāti. Avadhāraṇatthe vā
atk-s0503a:83_10: evaṃsadde ayamatthayojanā, tadapekkhassa sutasaddassa niyamattho sambhavatīti tadapekkhassa
atk-s0503a:83_12: Iti savanahetusavanavisesavasenapi sutasaddassa atthayojanā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:84_0: Tathā evanti tassā sotadvārānusārena pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇato
atk-s0503a:84_1: nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattibhāvappakāsanaṃ ākārattho evaṃsaddoti karitvā. Meti
atk-s0503a:84_2: attappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti dhammappakāsanaṃ yathāvuttāya viññāṇavīthiyā pariyattidhammārammaṇattā.
atk-s0503a:84_3: Ayañhettha saṅkhepo – nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā karaṇabhūtāya
atk-s0503a:84_4: mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ, idaṃ pana kataṃ, ayaṃ dhammo sutoti.
atk-s0503a:85_0: Tathā evanti nidassitabbappakāsanaṃ nidassanattho evaṃsaddoti katvā nidassetabbassa
atk-s0503a:85_1: niddisitabbabhāvato. Tasmā evaṃsaddena sakalampi suttaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:85_2: Meti puggalappakāsanaṃ. Sutanti puggalakiccappakāsanaṃ. Sutasaddena hi labbhamānā
atk-s0503a:85_3: savanakiriyā savanaviññāṇappabandhappaṭibaddhā, tattha ca puggalavohāro, na ca puggalavohārarahite
atk-s0503a:85_4: dhammappabandhe savanakiriyā labbhati. Tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yaṃ suttaṃ niddisissāmi,
atk-s0503a:86_0: Tathā evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānārammaṇappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:86_1: hoti, tassa nānākāraniddeso ākārattho eva evaṃsaddoti katvā. Evanti hi ayamākārapaññatti
atk-s0503a:86_2: dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ pavattiākāraṃ upādāya paññapetabbasabhāvattā. Meti kattuniddeso.
atk-s0503a:86_3: Sutanti visayaniddeso, sotabbo hi dhammo savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena
atk-s0503a:86_4: pavattiṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Ettāvatā nānappakārena pavattena cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino
atk-s0503a:87_0: Atha vā evanti puggalakiccaniddeso, sutānañhi dhammānaṃ gahitākārassa nidassanassa
atk-s0503a:87_1: avadhāraṇassa vā pakāsanasabhāvena evaṃsaddena tadākārādidhāraṇassa puggalavohārupādānadhammabyāpārabhāvato
atk-s0503a:87_2: puggalakiccaṃnāma niddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti. Sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso, puggalavādinopi
atk-s0503a:87_3: hi savanakiriyā viññāṇanirapekkhā na hotīti. Meti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso.
atk-s0503a:87_4: Meti hi saddappavatti ekanteneva sattavisesavisayā viññāṇakiccañca tattheva samodahitabbanti.
atk-s0503a:87_5: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – mayā savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅginā puggalena viññāṇavasena
atk-s0503a:88_0: Tathā evanti ca meti ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti. Sabbassa
atk-s0503a:88_1: hi saddādhigamanīyassa atthassa paññattimukheneva paṭipajjitabbattā sabbapaññattīnañca
atk-s0503a:88_2: vijjamānādīsu chasu paññattīsu avarodho, tasmā yo māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtattho
atk-s0503a:88_3: anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya anuttamatthopi na hoti. So rūpasaddādiko ruppanānubhavanādiko
atk-s0503a:88_4: ca paramatthasabhāvo saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena vijjati. Yo pana evanti ca meti
atk-s0503a:88_5: ca vuccamāno ākārattho, so aparamatthasabhāvo saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena anupalabbhamāno
atk-s0503a:88_6: avijjamānapaññatti nāma. Tasmā kiñhettha taṃ paramatthato atthi, yaṃ evanti vā meti
atk-s0503a:88_7: vā niddesaṃ labhetha? Sutanti vijjamānapaññatti, yañhi taṃ ettha sotena upaladdhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:89_0: Tathā evanti sotapathamāgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādīnaṃ paccāmasanavasena.
atk-s0503a:89_1: Meti sasantatipariyāpanne khandhe karaṇādivisesavisiṭṭhe upādāya vattabbato upādāpaññatti.
atk-s0503a:89_2: Sutanti diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbato upanidhāpaññatti. Diṭṭhādisabhāvarahite
atk-s0503a:89_3: saddāyatane pavattamānopi sutavohāro dutiyaṃ tatiyantiādiko viya paṭhamādīni, diṭṭhamutaviññāte
atk-s0503a:89_4: apekkhitvā sutanti viññeyyattā diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbo hoti. Asutaṃ na hotīti
atk-s0503a:90_0: Ettha ca evantivacanena asammohaṃ dīpeti. Paṭividdhā hi attanā sutassa pakāravisesā
atk-s0503a:90_1: evanti idha āyasmatā ānandena paccāmaṭṭhā, tenassa asammoho dīpito hoti. Na hi sammūḷho
atk-s0503a:90_2: nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho hoti, paccayākāravasena nānappakārā duppaṭividdhā ca
atk-s0503a:90_3: suttantāti dīpitanti. Sutantivacanena sutassa asammosaṃ dīpeti, sutākārassa yāthāvato
atk-s0503a:90_4: dassiyamānattā. Yassa hi sutaṃ sammuṭṭhaṃ hoti, na so kālantare mayā sutanti paṭijānāti.
atk-s0503a:90_5: Iccassa asammohena paññāsiddhi, sammohābhāvena paññāya eva vā savanakālasambhūtāya
atk-s0503a:90_6: taduttarikālapaññāsiddhi, tathā asammosena satisiddhi. Tattha paññāpubbaṅgamāya satiyā
atk-s0503a:90_7: byañjanāvadhāraṇasamatthatā. Byañjanānañhi paṭivijjhitabbo ākāro nātigambhīro, yathāsutaṃ
atk-s0503a:90_8: dhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko, paññā tattha guṇībhūtā hoti
atk-s0503a:90_9: paññāya pubbaṅgamāti katvā. Satipubbaṅgamāya paññāya atthappaṭivedhasamatthatā. Atthassa
atk-s0503a:90_10: hi paṭivijjhitabbo ākāro gambhīroti paññāya byāpāro adhiko, sati tattha guṇībhūtāyevāti
atk-s0503a:90_11: satiyā pubbaṅgamāyāti katvā. Tadubhayasamatthatāyogena atthabyañjanasampannassa dhammakosassa
atk-s0503a:91_0: Aparo nayo – evantivacanena yonisomanasikāraṃ dīpeti, tena ca vuccamānānaṃ ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇatthānaṃ
atk-s0503a:91_2: Na hi ayoniso manasikaroto nānappakārappaṭivedho sambhavati. Sutantivacanena avikkhepaṃ
atk-s0503a:91_4: suttassa savanaṃ samādhānamantarena na sambhavati vikkhittacittassa savanābhāvato.
atk-s0503a:91_5: Tathā hi vikkhittacitto puggalo sabbasampattiyā vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ, puna
atk-s0503a:91_6: bhaṇathā”ti bhaṇati. Yonisomanasikārena cettha attasammāpaṇidhiṃ pubbe ca katapuññataṃ
atk-s0503a:91_7: sādheti sammā appaṇihitattassa pubbe akatapuññassa vā tadabhāvato. Avikkhepena saddhammassavanaṃ
atk-s0503a:91_8: sappurisūpanissayañca sādheti assutavato sappurisūpanissayavirahitassa ca tadabhāvato.
atk-s0503a:91_9: Na hi vikkhitto sotuṃ sakkoti, na ca sappurise anupanissayamānassa savanaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0503a:92_1: hoti, tassa nānākāraniddeso”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā ca so bhagavato vacanassa atthabyañjanappabhedaparicchedavasena
atk-s0503a:92_3: ākāro na sammā appaṇihitattassa pubbe akatapuññassa vā hoti. Tasmā evanti iminā bhaddakena
atk-s0503a:92_4: ākārena pacchimacakkadvayasampattimattano dīpeti, sutanti savanayogena purimacakkadvayasampattiṃ.
atk-s0503a:92_5: Na hi appatirūpe dese vasato sappurisūpanissayavirahitassa ca savanaṃ atthi. Iccassa
atk-s0503a:92_6: pacchimacakkadvayasiddhiyā āsayasuddhi siddhā hoti. Sammā paṇihitacitto pubbe ca
atk-s0503a:92_7: katapuñño visuddhāsayo hoti tadasuddhihetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ dūrībhāvato. Tathā hi vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:92_8: “sammā paṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, seyyaso naṃ tato kare”ti “katapuññosi tvaṃ, ānanda, padhānamanuyuñja,
atk-s0503a:92_9: khippaṃ hohisi anāsavo”ti ca. Purimacakkadvayasiddhiyā payogasuddhi. Patirūpadesavāsena
atk-s0503a:92_10: hi sappurisūpanissayena ca sādhūnaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanena parisuddhappayogo hoti.
atk-s0503a:92_11: Tāya ca āsayasuddhiyā adhigamabyattisiddhi, pubbeyeva taṇhādiṭṭhisaṃkilesānaṃ visodhitattā
atk-s0503a:92_13: avikkhittacitto pariyattiyaṃ visārado hoti. Iti payogāsayasuddhassa āgamādhigamasampannassa
atk-s0503a:92_14: vacanaṃ aruṇuggamanaṃ viya sūriyassa udayato yonisomanasikāro viya ca kusalakammassa
atk-s0503a:92_15: arahati bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitunti ṭhāne nidānaṃ ṭhapento evaṃ me sutantiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:93_0: Aparo nayo – evanti iminā pubbe vuttanayeneva nānappakārappaṭivedhadīpakena vacanena
atk-s0503a:93_3: dīpeti. Evanti ca idaṃ vuttanayeneva yonisomanasikāradīpakavacanaṃ bhāsamāno “ete
atk-s0503a:93_4: dhammā mayā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā”ti dīpeti. Pariyattidhammo hi
atk-s0503a:93_5: “idha sīlaṃ kathitaṃ, idha samādhi, idha paññā, ettakā ettha anusandhiyo”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:93_7: ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya vā diṭṭhiyā tattha tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ
atk-s0503a:93_8: rūpa”ntiādinā nayena suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā paṭividdho attano ca paresañca hitasukhāvaho
atk-s0503a:93_9: hotīti. Sutanti idaṃ savanayogadīpakavacanaṃ bhāsamāno “bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā
atk-s0503a:93_10: vacasā paricitā”ti dīpeti. Sotāvadhānappaṭibaddhā hi pariyattidhammassa savanadhāraṇaparicayā.
atk-s0503a:93_11: Tadubhayenapi dhammassa svākkhātabhāvena, atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ dīpento savane ādaraṃ
atk-s0503a:93_12: janeti. Atthabyañjanaparipuṇṇañhi dhammaṃ ādarena assuṇanto mahatā hitā paribāhiro
atk-s0503a:93_13: hotīti ādaraṃ janetvā sakkaccaṃ dhammo sotabbo.
atk-s0503a:94_0: “Evaṃ me suta”nti iminā pana sakalena vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ
atk-s0503a:94_1: dhammaṃ attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ atikkamati, sāvakattaṃ paṭijānanto sappurisabhūmiṃ
atk-s0503a:94_2: okkamati. Tathā asaddhammā cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, saddhamme cittaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. “Kevalaṃ
atk-s0503a:94_3: sutamevetaṃ mayā, tasseva pana bhagavato vacana”nti dīpento attānaṃ parimoceti, satthāraṃ
atk-s0503a:95_0: Apica “evaṃ me suta”nti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimassavanaṃ vivaranto
atk-s0503a:95_1: “sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa
atk-s0503a:95_4: na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kattabbā”ti sabbadevamanussānaṃ
atk-s0503a:95_5: imasmiṃ dhamme assaddhiyaṃ vināseti, saddhāsampadaṃ uppādeti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0503a:98_0: Ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso. Ayañhi ekasaddo aññaseṭṭhāsahāyasaṅkhyādīsu dissati.
atk-s0503a:98_1: Tathā hi ayaṃ “sassato attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu
atk-s0503a:98_2: aññe dissati. “Cetaso ekodibhāva”ntiādīsu seṭṭhe. “Eko vūpakaṭṭho”tiādīsu asahāye.
atk-s0503a:98_3: “Ekova kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu saṅkhyāyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:98_4: idhāpi saṅkhyāyameva daṭṭhabbo. Tena vuttaṃ – “ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso”ti.
atk-s0503a:99: Samayanti paricchinnaniddeso. Ekaṃ samayanti aniyamitaparidīpanaṃ. Tattha samayasaddo –
atk-s0503a:101: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati”.
atk-s0503a:102_0: Tathā hissa “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0503a:102_1: samavāyo attho, yuttakālañca paccayasāmaggiñca labhitvāti hi adhippāyo, tasmā paccayasamavāyoti
atk-s0503a:102_2: veditabbo. “Ekova kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu khaṇo,
atk-s0503a:102_3: okāsoti attho. Tathāgatuppādādiko hi maggabrahmacariyassa okāso tappaccayappaṭilābhahetuttā,
atk-s0503a:102_4: khaṇo eva ca samayo, yo khaṇoti ca samayoti ca vuccati, so eko yevāti hi attho. “Uṇhasamayo
atk-s0503a:102_6: hi bhikkhūnaṃ devatānañca mahāsannipātoti attho. “Samayopi kho te, bhaddāli, appaṭividdho
atk-s0503a:102_7: ahosi, bhagavā kho sāvatthiyaṃ viharati, bhagavāpi maṃ jānissati ‘bhaddāli nāma bhikkhu
atk-s0503a:102_8: satthusāsane sikkhāya na paripūrakārī’ti, ayampi kho te, bhaddāli, samayo appaṭividdho
atk-s0503a:102_9: ahosī”tiādīsu hetu. Sikkhāpadassa kāraṇañhi idha samayoti adhippetaṃ. “Tena kho pana
atk-s0503a:102_10: samayena uggāhamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake
atk-s0503a:102_11: mallikāya ārāme paṭivasatī”tiādīsu diṭṭhi. Tattha hi nisinnā titthiyā attano attano
atk-s0503a:102_12: diṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ samayaṃ pavadantīti so paribbājakārāmo “samayappavādako”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:103: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-s0503a:105_0: Ādīsu paṭilābho. Atthābhisamayāti hi atthassa adhigamāti attho. “Sammā mānābhisamayā
atk-s0503a:105_1: antamakāsi dukkhassā”tiādīsu pahānaṃ. Adhikaraṇaṃ samayaṃ vūpasamanaṃ apagamoti abhisamayo
atk-s0503a:105_2: pahānaṃ. “Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”tiādīsu
atk-s0503a:105_3: paṭivedho. Paṭivedhoti hi abhisametabbato abhisamayo, abhisamayova attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti
atk-s0503a:105_4: pīḷanādīni abhisametabbabhāvena ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttāni, abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa
atk-s0503a:105_5: visayabhūto attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti tāneva tathā ekantena vuttāni. Tattha pīḷanaṃ
atk-s0503a:105_6: dukkhasaccassa taṃsamaṅgino hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ. Santāpo dukkhadukkhatādivasena
atk-s0503a:106_0: Ettha ca sahakārīkāraṇasannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samavāyo samayo. Sameti samāgacchati
atk-s0503a:106_1: ettha maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadādhārapuggalehīti khaṇo samayo. Sameti ettha etena vā
atk-s0503a:106_2: saṃgacchati satto sabhāvadhammo vā uppādādīhi sahajātādīhi vāti kālo samayo. Dhammappavattimattatāya
atk-s0503a:106_3: atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ viya ca kappanāmattasiddhenānurūpena
atk-s0503a:106_4: voharīyatīti. Samaṃ, saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samūho samayo
atk-s0503a:106_5: yathā samudāyoti. Avayavasahāvaṭṭhānameva hi samūho. Avasesapaccayānaṃ samāgame sati
atk-s0503a:106_6: eti phalametasmā uppajjati pavattatīti samayo hetu yathā samudayoti. Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato
atk-s0503a:106_7: sambandho eti attano visaye pavattati, daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā saṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti
atk-s0503a:106_8: sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo diṭṭhi. Diṭṭhisaṃyojanena hi sattā ativiya bajjhantīti.
atk-s0503a:106_9: Samiti saṅgati samodhānanti samayo paṭilābho. Samayanaṃ upasamayanaṃ apagamoti samayo
atk-s0503a:106_10: pahānaṃ. Samucchedappahānabhāvato pana adhiko samayoti abhisamayo yathā abhidhammoti.
atk-s0503a:106_11: Abhimukhaṃ ñāṇena sammā etabbo abhisametabboti abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvo.
atk-s0503a:106_12: Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo, dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodho.
atk-s0503a:106_13: Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:107_0: Samayasaddassa atthuddhāre abhisamayasaddassa gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:107_1: Idha panassa kālo attho samavāyādīnaṃ asambhavato. Desadesakaparisā viya hi desanāya
atk-s0503a:107_2: nidānabhāve kālo eva icchitabboti. Yasmā panettha samayoti kālo adhippeto, tasmā
atk-s0503a:108_0: Kasmā panettha aniyamitavaseneva kālo niddiṭṭho, na utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyametvā
atk-s0503a:108_1: niddiṭṭhoti ce? Kiñcāpi etesu saṃvaccharādīsu samayesu yaṃ yaṃ suttaṃ yasmiṃ yasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:108_2: saṃvacchare utumhi māse pakkhe rattibhāge divasabhāge vā vuttaṃ, sabbampi taṃ therassa
atk-s0503a:108_3: suviditaṃ suvavatthāpitaṃ paññāya. Yasmā pana “evaṃ me sutaṃ asukasaṃvacchare asukautumhi
atk-s0503a:108_4: asukamāse asukapakkhe asukarattibhāge asukadivasabhāge vā”ti evaṃ vutte na sakkā
atk-s0503a:108_5: sukhena dhāretuṃ vā uddisituṃ vā uddisāpetuṃ vā, bahu ca vattabbaṃ hoti, tasmā ekeneva
atk-s0503a:109_0: Ye vā ime gabbhokkantisamayo jātisamayo saṃvegasamayo abhinikkhamanasamayo dukkarakārikasamayo
atk-s0503a:109_2: evamādayo bhagavato devamanussesu ativiya pakāsā anekakālappabhedā eva samayā, tesu
atk-s0503a:109_3: samayesu desanāsamayasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti. Yo vāyaṃ ñāṇakaruṇākiccasamayesu
atk-s0503a:110_0: Kasmā panettha yathā abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ
atk-s0503a:110_1: hotī”ti ca ito aññesu suttapadesu “yasmiṃ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi
atk-s0503a:110_2: vivicca akusalehi dhammehī”ti ca bhummavacanena niddeso kato, vinaye ca “tena samayena
atk-s0503a:110_3: buddho bhagavā”ti karaṇavacanena niddeso kato, tathā akatvā “ekaṃ samaya”nti accantasaṃyogatthe
atk-s0503a:110_4: upayogavacanena niddeso katoti? Tattha tathā, idha ca aññathā atthasambhavato. Tattha
atk-s0503a:110_5: hi abhidhamme ito aññesu ca suttantesu ādhāravisayasaṅkhāto adhikaraṇattho kiriyāya
atk-s0503a:110_7: kālattho samūhattho ca samayo tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ, tathā kālo sabhāvadhammappavattimattatāya
atk-s0503a:110_8: paramatthato avijjamānopi ādhārabhāvena paññāto taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ tato pubbe parato
atk-s0503a:110_9: ca abhāvato yathā “pubbaṇhe jāto sāyanhe jāto”tiādīsu. Samūhotipi avayavavinimutto
atk-s0503a:110_10: paramatthato avijjamānopi kappanāmattasiddhena rūpena avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññāpīyati,
atk-s0503a:110_11: yathā “rukkhe sākhā, yavo yavarāsimhi samuṭṭhito”tiādīsu. Yasmiṃ kāle dhammapuñje
atk-s0503a:110_12: ca kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva kāle dhammapuñje ca phassādayopi
atk-s0503a:110_13: hontīti ayañhi tattha attho. Tathā khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa samayassa bhāvena
atk-s0503a:110_14: tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyati. Yathā hi “gāvīsu duyhamānāsu
atk-s0503a:110_15: gato, duddhāsu āgato”ti ettha gāvīnaṃ dohanakiriyāya gamanakiriyā lakkhīyati, evaṃ
atk-s0503a:110_16: idhāpi yasmiṃ samayeti vutte ca padatthassa sattāvirahābhāvato satīti ayamattho viññāyamāno
atk-s0503a:110_17: eva hotīti samayassa sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā phassādīnaṃ bhavanakiriyā
atk-s0503a:110_18: ca lakkhīyati. Tathā yasmiṃ samaye yasmiṃ navame khaṇe yasmiṃ yonisomanasikārādihetumhi
atk-s0503a:110_19: paccayasamavāye vā sati kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye khaṇe
atk-s0503a:110_20: hetumhi paccayasamavāye ca phassādayopi hontīti. Tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ bhummavacanena niddeso kato.
atk-s0503a:111_0: Vinaye ca “annena vasati, ajjhenena vasatī”tiādīsu viya hetuattho, “pharasunā chindati,
atk-s0503a:111_1: kudālena khaṇatī”tiādīsu viya karaṇattho ca sambhavati. Yo hi sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo
atk-s0503a:111_2: dhammasenāpatiādīhipi dubbiññeyyo, tena samayena karaṇabhūtena hetubhūtena ca vītikkamaṃ
atk-s0503a:111_3: sutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇavatthukaṃ puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā vigarahitvā
atk-s0503a:111_4: ca taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ otiṇṇasamayasaṅkhātaṃ kālaṃ anatikkamitvā sikkhāpadāni paññāpento
atk-s0503a:111_5: tatiyapārājikādīnaṃ viya sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hetuṃ apekkhamāno tattha tattha vihāsi,
atk-s0503a:111_6: tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ vinaye karaṇavacanena niddeso kato.
atk-s0503a:112_0: Idha pana aññasmiñca evaṃjātike accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati. Yasmiñhi samaye saha
atk-s0503a:112_1: samuṭṭhānahetunā idaṃ udānaṃ uppannaṃ, accantameva taṃ samayaṃ ariyavihārapubbaṅgamāya
atk-s0503a:112_2: dhammapaccavekkhaṇāya bhagavā vihāsi, tasmā “māsaṃ ajjhetī”tiādīsu viya upayogatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:112_3: idha upayogavacanena niddeso kato. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0503a:114: Aññatra samayo vutto, upayogena so idhā”ti.
atk-s0503a:115_0: Porāṇā pana vaṇṇayanti – “yasmiṃ samaye”ti vā “tena samayenā”ti vā “ekaṃ samaya”nti
atk-s0503a:115_1: vā abhilāpamattabhedo esa niddeso, sabbattha bhummameva atthoti. Tasmā “ekaṃ samaya”nti
atk-s0503a:116: Bhagavāti garu. Garuñhi loke “bhagavā”ti vadanti. Ayañca sabbaguṇavisiṭṭhatāya sabbasattānaṃ garu, tasmā bhagavāti veditabbo. Porāṇehipi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:118: Garu gāravayutto so, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:119_0: Tattha seṭṭhavācakavacanaṃ seṭṭhanti vuttaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato. Atha vā vuccatīti
atk-s0503a:119_1: vacanaṃ, attho. Bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭhanti bhagavāti iminā vacanena vacanīyo yo
atk-s0503a:119_2: attho, so seṭṭhoti attho. Bhagavāti vacanamuttamanti etthāpi vuttanayeneva attho
atk-s0503a:119_3: veditabbo. Gāravayuttoti garubhāvayutto garuguṇayogato visesagarukaraṇārahatāya vā
atk-s0503a:119_4: gāravayutto. Evaṃ guṇavisiṭṭhasattuttamagarugāravādhivacanaṃ bhagavāti idaṃ vacananti veditabbaṃ. Apica –
atk-s0503a:127: Imāya gāthāya ca vasena bhagavāti padassa attho veditabbo. So panāyaṃ attho sabbākārena visuddhimagge vutto, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva vivaritabbo.
atk-s0503a:128_0: Apica bhāge vani, bhage vā vamīti bhagavā. Tathāgato hi dānasīlādipāramidhamme jhānavimokkhādiuttarimanussadhamme
atk-s0503a:128_1: vani bhaji sevi bahulamakāsi, tasmā bhagavā. Atha vā teyeva “veneyyasattasantānesu
atk-s0503a:128_2: kathaṃ nu kho uppajjeyyu”nti vani abhipatthayīti bhagavā. Atha vā bhagasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:128_3: issariyaṃ yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayīti bhagavā. Tathā
atk-s0503a:128_4: hi tathāgato hatthagataṃ cakkavattisiriṃ devalokādhipaccasadisaṃ cātuddīpissariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:128_5: cakkavattisampattisannissayañca sattaratanasamujjalaṃ yasaṃ tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho
atk-s0503a:128_6: pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti
atk-s0503a:128_7: bhagavā. Atha vā bhāni nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṃ gacchanti pavattantīti bhagā.
atk-s0503a:128_10: pajahīti. Evampi bhage vamīti bhagavāti evamādinā nayena bhagavāti padassa attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:129_0: Ettāvatā cettha evaṃ me sutanti vacanena yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ savanavasena bhāsanto
atk-s0503a:129_1: bhagavato dhammasarīraṃ paccakkhaṃ karoti, tena “nayidaṃ atikkantasatthukaṃ pāvacanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:129_2: ayaṃ vo satthā”ti satthu adassanena ukkaṇṭhitaṃ janaṃ samassāseti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā
atk-s0503a:129_3: “yo kho, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti.
atk-s0503a:129_4: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavāti vacanena tasmiṃ samaye bhagavato avijjamānabhāvaṃ dassento
atk-s0503a:129_5: rūpakāyaparinibbānaṃ sādheti, tena “evaṃvidhassa nāma dhammassa desetā dasabaladharo
atk-s0503a:129_6: vajirasaṅghātasamānakāyo sopi bhagavā parinibbuto, kenaññena jīvite āsā janetabbā”ti
atk-s0503a:129_7: jīvitamadamattaṃ janaṃ saṃvejeti, saddhamme cassa ussāhaṃ janeti.
atk-s0503a:130_0: Evanti ca bhaṇanto desanāsampattiṃ niddisati, vakkhamānassa sakalasuttassa evanti
atk-s0503a:130_1: nidassanato. Me sutanti sāvakasampattiṃ savanasampattiñca niddisati, paṭisambhidāpattena
atk-s0503a:130_2: pañcasu ṭhānesu bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapitena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena sutabhāvadīpanato
atk-s0503a:130_3: “tañca kho mayāva sutaṃ, na anussutikaṃ, na paramparābhata”nti imassa catthassa dīpanato.
atk-s0503a:130_4: Ekaṃ samayanti kālasampattiṃ niddisati bhagavato uruvelāyaṃ viharaṇasamayabhāvena
atk-s0503a:131: Uruvelāyanti mahāvelāyaṃ, mahante vālukārāsimhīti attho. Atha vā urūti vālukā vuccati, velāti mariyādā. Velātikkamanahetu ābhatā uru uruvelāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0503a:132_0: Atīte kira anuppanne buddhe dasasahassatāpasā tasmiṃ padese viharantā “kāyakammavacīkammāni
atk-s0503a:132_1: paresampi pākaṭāni honti, manokammaṃ pana apākaṭaṃ. Tasmā yo micchāvitakkaṃ vitakketi,
atk-s0503a:132_2: so attanāva attānaṃ codetvā pattapuṭena vālukaṃ āharitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ākiratu, idamassa
atk-s0503a:132_3: daṇḍakamma”nti katikavattaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya yo tādisaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketi, so
atk-s0503a:132_4: tattha pattapuṭena vālukaṃ āharitvā ākirati. Evaṃ tattha anukkamena mahāvālukārāsi
atk-s0503a:132_5: jāto, tato naṃ pacchimā janatā parikkhipitvā cetiyaṭṭhānamakāsi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:133_2: ariyavihārasamaṅgitāparidīpanañcāti veditabbaṃ. Tattha yasmā ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ
atk-s0503a:133_3: aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati pavatteti, tasmā
atk-s0503a:133_4: viharatīti padassa iriyāpathavihāravasenettha attho veditabbo. Yasmā pana bhagavā
atk-s0503a:133_5: dibbavihārādīhi sattānaṃ vividhaṃ hitaṃ harati upaharati upaneti uppādeti, tasmā
atk-s0503a:133_6: tesampi vasena vividhaṃ haratīti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:134_0: Najjāti nadati sandatīti nadī, tassā najjā, nadiyā ninnagāyāti attho. Nerañjarāyāti
atk-s0503a:134_1: nelaṃ jalamassāti “nelañjalāyā”ti vattabbe lakārassa rakāraṃ katvā “nerañjarāyā”ti
atk-s0503a:134_3: nerañjarāyāti vutta”nti vadanti. Nāmameva vā etaṃ etissā nadiyāti veditabbaṃ. Tassā
atk-s0503a:134_4: nadiyā tīre yattha bhagavā vihāsi, taṃ dassetuṃ “bodhirukkhamūle”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0503a:134_5: “bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti ettha maggañāṇaṃ bodhīti vuttaṃ. “Pappoti
atk-s0503a:134_6: bodhiṃ varabhūrimedhaso”ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Tadubhayampi bodhiṃ bhagavā ettha
atk-s0503a:134_7: pattoti rukkhopi bodhirukkhotveva nāmaṃ labhi. Atha vā satta bojjhaṅge bujjhīti bhagavā
atk-s0503a:134_8: bodhi, tena bujjhantena sannissitattā so rukkhopi bodhirukkhoti nāmaṃ labhi, tassa
atk-s0503a:134_9: bodhirukkhassa. Mūleti samīpe. Ayañhi mūlasaddo “mūlāni uddhareyya antamaso usīranāḷamattānipī”tiādīsu
atk-s0503a:134_11: kāle chāyā pharati, nivāte paṇṇāni patanti, ettāvatā rukkhamūla”ntiādīsu samīpe.
atk-s0503a:134_12: Idhāpi samīpe adhippeto, tasmā bodhirukkhassa mūle samīpeti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0503a:135_0: Paṭhamābhisambuddhoti paṭhamaṃ abhisambuddho hutvā, sabbapaṭhamaṃyevāti attho. Ettāvatā
atk-s0503a:135_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena udānadesanāya nidānaṃ ṭhapentena kāladesadesakāpadesā saha visesena pakāsitā honti.
atk-s0503a:136_0: Etthāha “kasmā dhammavinayasaṅgahe kayiramāne nidānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, nanu bhagavatā
atk-s0503a:136_2: Kāladesadesakavatthuādīhi upanibandhitvā ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā hoti asammosā
atk-s0503a:136_3: saddheyyā ca desakālakattuhetunimittehi upanibaddho viya vohāravinicchayo. Teneva
atk-s0503a:136_4: ca āyasmatā mahākassapena “paṭhamaṃ, āvuso ānanda, udānaṃ kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā
atk-s0503a:136_5: desādīsu pucchāya katāya vissajjanaṃ karontena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena “evaṃ me suta”ntiādinā
atk-s0503a:137_0: Apica satthu sampattipakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ. Tathāgatassa hi bhagavato pubbaracanānumānāgamatakkābhāvato
atk-s0503a:137_1: sambuddhattasiddhi. Na hi sammāsambuddhassa pubbaracanādīhi attho atthi sabbattha
atk-s0503a:137_3: khīṇāsavattasiddhi. Na hi sabbaso parikkhīṇāsavassa katthacipi ācariyamuṭṭhiādīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:137_4: sambhavoti suvisuddhassa parānuggahappavatti. Iti desakadosabhūtānaṃ diṭṭhisīlasampattidūsakānaṃ
atk-s0503a:137_8: attahitaparahitappaṭipatti ca nidānavacanena pakāsitā honti, tattha tattha sampattaparisāya
atk-s0503a:138_1: hi bhagavato natthi niratthakā paṭipatti attahitā vā. Tasmā paresaṃyeva atthāya pavattasabbakiriyassa
atk-s0503a:138_2: sammāsambuddhassa sakalampi kāyavacīmanokammaṃ yathāpavattaṃ vuccamānaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi
atk-s0503a:138_3: yathārahaṃ sattānaṃ anusāsanaṭṭhena sāsanaṃ, na kabbaracanā. Tayidaṃ satthu caritaṃ
atk-s0503a:138_4: kāladesadesakaparisāpadesādīhi saddhiṃ tattha tattha nidānavacanena yathārahaṃ pakāsīyati,
atk-s0503a:139_0: Apica satthuno pamāṇabhāvappakāsanena sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:139_1: Sā cassa pamāṇabhāvadassanatā heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbā. Bhagavāti hi iminā
atk-s0503a:140_0: Taṃ panetaṃ “evaṃ me suta”nti ārabhitvā yāva “imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti padaṃ, tāva
atk-s0503a:140_1: imassa udānassa nidānanti veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ yathā paṭipanno bhagavā imaṃ udānaṃ
atk-s0503a:140_2: udānesi, ādito paṭṭhāya tassa kāyikacetasikappaṭipattiyā pakāsanatthaṃ saṅgītikārehi
atk-s0503a:141_0: Nanu ca “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī”tiādi bhagavato eva vacanaṃ bhavituṃ arahati, na
atk-s0503a:141_1: hi satthāraṃ muñcitvā añño paṭiccasamuppādaṃ desetuṃ samattho hotīti? Saccametaṃ,
atk-s0503a:141_2: yathā pana bhagavā bodhirukkhamūle dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇavasena paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-s0503a:141_3: manasākāsi, tatheva naṃ bodhaneyyabandhavānaṃ bodhanatthaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasīhanādasuttādīsu
atk-s0503a:141_4: desitassa ca vacanānaṃ desitākārassa anukaraṇavasena paṭiccasamuppādassa manasikāraṃ
atk-s0503a:141_5: aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā bhagavatā bhāsitassa imassa udānassa dhammasaṅgāhakā mahātherā
atk-s0503a:141_6: nidānaṃ saṅgāyiṃsūti yathāvuttavacanaṃ saṅgītikārānameva vacananti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:142_0: Ettha ca attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo pucchāvasiko aṭṭhuppattikoti cattāro suttanikkhepā
atk-s0503a:142_1: veditabbā. Yathā hi anekasataanekasahassabhedānipi suttāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādipaṭṭhānanayena
atk-s0503a:142_2: soḷasavidhataṃ nātivattanti, evaṃ tāni sabbānipi attajjhāsayādisuttanikkhepavasena
atk-s0503a:142_3: catubbidhabhāvaṃ nātivattanti. Kāmañcettha attajjhāsayassa aṭṭhuppattiyā ca parajjhāsayapucchāvasikehi
atk-s0503a:142_5: aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggo natthīti niravaseso paṭṭhānanayo na sambhavati. Tadantogadhattā
atk-s0503a:142_6: vā sambhavantānaṃ sesanikkhepānaṃ mūlanikkhepavasena cattāro suttanikkhepāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:143_0: Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – nikkhipanaṃ nikkhepo, suttassa nikkhepo suttanikkhepo, suttadesanāti
atk-s0503a:143_1: attho. Nikkhipīyatīti vā nikkhepo, suttaṃ eva nikkhepo suttanikkhepo. Attano ajjhāsayo
atk-s0503a:143_2: attajjhāsayo, so assa atthi kāraṇabhūtoti attajjhāsayo, attano ajjhāsayo etassāti
atk-s0503a:143_3: vā attajjhāsayo. Parajjhāsayepi eseva nayo. Pucchāya vaso pucchāvaso, so etassa atthīti
atk-s0503a:143_4: pucchāvasiko. Suttadesanāya vatthubhūtassa atthassa uppatti atthuppatti, atthuppatti
atk-s0503a:143_5: eva aṭṭhuppatti, sā etassa atthīti aṭṭhuppattiko. Atha vā nikkhipīyati suttaṃ etenāti
atk-s0503a:143_6: nikkhepo, attajjhāsayādi eva. Etasmiṃ pana atthavikappe attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo.
atk-s0503a:143_7: Paresaṃ ajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo. Pucchīyatīti pucchā, pucchitabbo attho. Pucchanavasena
atk-s0503a:143_8: pavattaṃ dhammappaṭiggāhakānaṃ vacanaṃ pucchāvasaṃ, tadeva nikkhepasaddāpekkhāya
atk-s0503a:143_9: pucchāvasikoti pulliṅgavasena vuttaṃ. Tathā atthuppattiyeva aṭṭhuppattikoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:144_0: Ettha ca paresaṃ indriyaparipākādikāraṇanirapekkhattā attajjhāsayassa visuṃ suttanikkhepabhāvo
atk-s0503a:144_1: yutto kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva dhammatantiṭhapanatthaṃ pavattitadesanattā, parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ
atk-s0503a:144_2: pana paresaṃ ajjhāsayapucchānaṃ desanāpavattihetubhūtānaṃ uppattiyaṃ pavattitānaṃ
atk-s0503a:144_4: pavattitānaṃ kathaṃ parajjhāsaye anavarodhoti? Na codetabbametaṃ. Paresañhi abhinīhāraparipucchādivinicchayādivinimuttasseva
atk-s0503a:144_6: visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tathā hi brahmajāladhammadāyādasuttādīnaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇaāmisuppādādidesanānimittaṃ
atk-s0503a:144_7: aṭṭhuppatti vuccati, paresaṃ pucchāya vinā ajjhāsayameva nimittaṃ katvā desito parajjhāsayo,
atk-s0503a:145_0: Tattha paṭhamādīni tīṇi bodhisuttāni mucalindasuttaṃ, āyusaṅkhārossajjanasuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:145_1: paccavekkhaṇasuttaṃ, papañcasaññāsuttanti imesaṃ udānānaṃ attajjhāsayo nikkhepo.
atk-s0503a:145_2: Huhuṅkasuttaṃ, brāhmaṇajātikasuttaṃ, bāhiyasuttanti imesaṃ udānānaṃ pucchāvasiko
atk-s0503a:145_3: nikkhepo. Rājasuttaṃ, sakkārasuttaṃ, ucchādanasuttaṃ, piṇḍapātikasuttaṃ, sippasuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:145_4: gopālasuttaṃ, sundarikasuttaṃ, mātusuttaṃ, saṅghabhedakasuttaṃ, udapānasuttaṃ, tathāgatuppādasuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:145_5: moneyyasuttaṃ, pāṭaligāmiyasuttaṃ, dvepi dabbasuttānīti etesaṃ udānānaṃ aṭṭhuppattiko
atk-s0503a:145_6: nikkhepo. Pālileyyasuttaṃ, piyasuttaṃ, nāgasamālasuttaṃ, visākhāsuttañcāti imesaṃ
atk-s0503a:145_7: udānānaṃ attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo ca nikkhepo. Sesānaṃ ekapaññāsāya suttānaṃ parajjhāsayo
atk-s0503a:145_8: nikkhepo. Evametesaṃ udānānaṃ attajjhāsayādivasena nikkhepaviseso veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:146_0: Ettha ca yāni udānāni bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sammukhā bhāsitāni, tāni tehi yathābhāsitasuttāni
atk-s0503a:146_1: vacasā paricitāni manasānupekkhitāni dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa kathitāni. Yāni pana bhagavatā
atk-s0503a:146_2: bhikkhūnaṃ asammukhā bhāsitāni, tānipi aparabhāge bhagavatā dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa
atk-s0503a:146_3: puna bhāsitāni. Evaṃ sabbānipi tāni āyasmā ānando ekajjhaṃ katvā dhārento bhikkhūnañca
atk-s0503a:146_4: vācento aparabhāge paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle udānantveva saṅgahaṃ āropesīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:147_0: Tena kho pana samayenātiādīsu tena samayenāti ca bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, kho panāti
atk-s0503a:147_1: nipāto, tasmiṃ samayeti attho. Kasmiṃ pana samaye? Yaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:147_2: viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho. Tasmiṃ samaye.
atk-s0503a:147_3: Sattāhanti satta ahāni sattāhaṃ, accantasaṃyogatthe etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Yasmā bhagavā
atk-s0503a:147_4: taṃ sattāhaṃ nirantaratāya accantameva phalasamāpattisukhena vihāsi, tasmā sattāhanti
atk-s0503a:147_5: accantasaṃyogavasena upayogavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Ekapallaṅkenāti visākhāpuṇṇamāya anatthaṅgateyeva
atk-s0503a:147_6: sūriye aparājitapallaṅkavare vajirāsane nisinnakālato paṭṭhāya sakimpi anuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0503a:148_1: hotīti attho. Tattha vimuttīti tadaṅgavimutti, vikkhambhanavimutti, samucchedavimutti,
atk-s0503a:148_2: paṭippassaddhivimutti, nissaraṇavimuttīti pañca vimuttiyo. Tāsu yaṃ deyyadhammapariccāgādīhi
atk-s0503a:148_3: tehi tehi guṇaṅgehi nāmarūpaparicchedādīhi vipassanaṅgehi ca yāva tassa tassa aṅgassa
atk-s0503a:148_4: aparihānivasena pavatti, tāva taṃtaṃpaṭipakkhato vimuccanato vimuccanaṃ pahānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:148_5: Seyyathidaṃ? Dānena macchariyalobhādito, sīlena pāṇātipātādito, nāmarūpavavatthānena
atk-s0503a:148_7: kaṅkhāvitaraṇena kathaṃkathībhāvato, kalāpasammasanena “ahaṃ mamā”ti gāhato, maggāmaggavavatthānena
atk-s0503a:148_8: amagge maggasaññāya, udayadassanena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā, vayadassanena sassatadiṭṭhiyā,
atk-s0503a:148_9: bhayadassanena sabhaye abhayasaññāya, ādīnavadassanena assādasaññāya, nibbidānupassanena
atk-s0503a:148_11: anulomena dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ nibbāne ca paṭilomabhāvato, gotrabhunā saṅkhāranimittabhāvato
atk-s0503a:148_12: vimuccanaṃ, ayaṃ tadaṅgavimutti nāma. Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā yāvassa
atk-s0503a:148_13: aparihānivasena pavatti, tāva kāmacchandādīnaṃ nīvaraṇānañceva, vitakkādīnañca paccanīkadhammānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:148_14: anuppattisaññitaṃ vimuccanaṃ, ayaṃ vikkhambhanavimutti nāma. Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ
atk-s0503a:148_15: bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato ariyassa santāne yathārahaṃ “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:148_16: nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa puna accantaṃ appavattibhāvena
atk-s0503a:148_17: samucchedappahānavasena vimuccanaṃ, ayaṃ samucchedavimutti nāma. Yaṃ pana phalakkhaṇe
atk-s0503a:148_18: paṭippassaddhattaṃ kilesānaṃ, ayaṃ paṭippassaddhivimutti nāma. Sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭattā
atk-s0503a:148_19: pana sabbasaṅkhāravimuttaṃ nibbānaṃ, ayaṃ nissaraṇavimutti nāma. Idha pana bhagavato
atk-s0503a:148_20: nibbānārammaṇā phalavimutti adhippetā. Tena vuttaṃ – “vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedīti vimuttisukhaṃ
atk-s0503a:149_0: Vimuttīti ca upakkilesehi paṭippassaddhivasena cittassa vimuttabhāvo, cittameva vā
atk-s0503a:149_1: tathā vimuttaṃ veditabbaṃ, tāya vimuttiyā jātaṃ sampayuttaṃ vā sukhaṃ vimuttisukhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:149_2: “Yāyaṃ, bhante, upekkhā sante sukhe vuttā bhagavatā”ti vacanato upekkhāpi cettha
atk-s0503a:149_3: sukhamicceva veditabbā. Tathā ca vuttaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ “upekkhā pana santattā,
atk-s0503a:149_4: sukhamicceva bhāsitā”ti. Bhagavā hi catutthajjhānikaṃ arahattasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0503a:149_5: na itaraṃ. Atha vā “tesaṃ vūpasamo sukho”tiādīsu yathā saṅkhāradukkhūpasamo sukhoti
atk-s0503a:149_6: vuccati, evaṃ sakalakilesadukkhūpasamabhāvato aggaphale labbhamānā paṭippassaddhivimutti
atk-s0503a:149_7: eva idha sukhanti veditabbā. Tayidaṃ vimuttisukhaṃ maggavīthiyaṃ kālantareti phalacittassa
atk-s0503a:149_8: pavattivibhāgena duvidhaṃ hoti. Ekekassa hi ariyamaggassa anantarā tassa tasseva
atk-s0503a:149_9: vipākabhūtāni nibbānārammaṇāni tīṇi dve vā phalacittāni uppajjanti anantaravipākattā
atk-s0503a:149_10: lokuttarakusalānaṃ. Yasmiñhi javanavāre ariyamaggo uppajjati, tattha yadā dve anulomāni,
atk-s0503a:149_11: tadā tatiyaṃ gotrabhu, catutthaṃ maggacittaṃ, tato paraṃ tīṇi phalacittāni honti.
atk-s0503a:149_12: Yadā pana tīṇi anulomāni, tadā catutthaṃ gotrabhu, pañcamaṃ maggacittaṃ, tato paraṃ
atk-s0503a:149_13: dve phalacittāni honti. Evaṃ catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ appanāvasena pavattati, na tato paraṃ
atk-s0503a:149_14: bhavaṅgassa āsannattā. Keci pana “chaṭṭhampi cittaṃ appetī”ti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu
atk-s0503a:149_15: paṭikkhittaṃ. Evaṃ maggavīthiyaṃ phalaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kālantare phalaṃ pana phalasamāpattivasena
atk-s0503a:149_16: pavattaṃ, nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa uppajjamānañca eteneva saṅgahitaṃ. Sā panāyaṃ phalasamāpatti
atk-s0503a:149_17: atthato lokuttarakusalānaṃ vipākabhūtā nibbānārammaṇā appanāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0503a:150_0: Ke taṃ samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjantīti? Sabbepi puthujjanā na samāpajjanti anadhigatattā.
atk-s0503a:150_1: Tathā heṭṭhimā ariyā uparimaṃ, uparimāpi ariyā heṭṭhimaṃ na samāpajjantiyeva puggalantarabhāvūpagamanena
atk-s0503a:150_2: paṭippassaddhabhāvato. Attano eva phalaṃ te te ariyā samāpajjanti. Keci pana “sotāpannasakadāgāmino
atk-s0503a:150_3: phalasamāpattiṃ na samāpajjanti, uparimā dveyeva samāpajjanti samādhismiṃ paripūrakāribhāvato”ti
atk-s0503a:150_4: vadanti. Taṃ akāraṇaṃ puthujjanassāpi attanā paṭiladdhalokiyasamādhisamāpajjanato.
atk-s0503a:150_5: Kiṃ vā ettha kāraṇacintāya? Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “katamā dasa saṅkhārupekkhā
atk-s0503a:150_6: vipassanāvasena uppajjanti, katame dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”ti
atk-s0503a:150_8: tesampi ariyānaṃ phalasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā sabbepi ariyā yathāsakaṃ
atk-s0503a:151_0: Kasmā pana te samāpajjantīti? Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ. Yathā hi rājāno rajjasukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:151_1: devatā dibbasukhaṃ anubhavanti, evaṃ ariyā “lokuttarasukhaṃ anubhavissāmā”ti addhānaparicchedaṃ
atk-s0503a:152_0: Kathañcassā samāpajjanaṃ, kathaṃ ṭhānaṃ, kathaṃ vuṭṭhānanti? Dvīhi tāva ākārehi assā
atk-s0503a:152_1: samāpajjanaṃ hoti nibbānato aññassa ārammaṇassa amanasikārā, nibbānassa ca manasikārā. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:153: “Dve kho, āvuso, paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā, sabbanimittānañca amanasikāro, animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāro”ti.
atk-s0503a:154_0: Ayaṃ panettha samāpajjanakkamo – phalasamāpattitthikena ariyasāvakena rahogatena
atk-s0503a:154_1: paṭisallīnena udayabbayādivasena saṅkhārā vipassitabbā. Tassevaṃ pavattānupubbavipassanasseva
atk-s0503a:154_3: ca sekkhassāpi phalameva uppajjati, na maggo. Ye pana vadanti “sotāpanno attano phalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0503a:154_4: samāpajjissāmīti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sakadāgāmī hoti, sakadāgāmī ca anāgāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:154_5: Te vattabbā – evaṃ sante anāgāmī arahā bhavissati, arahā ca paccekabuddho, paccekabuddho
atk-s0503a:154_6: ca sambuddhoti āpajjeyya, tasmā yathābhinivesaṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ vipassanā atthaṃ sādhetīti
atk-s0503a:154_7: sekkhassāpi phalameva uppajjati, na maggo. Phalampi tassa sace anena paṭhamajjhāniko
atk-s0503a:154_8: maggo adhigato, paṭhamajjhānikameva uppajjati. Sace dutiyādīsu aññatarajjhāniko,
atk-s0503a:155_0: Kasmā panettha gotrabhuñāṇaṃ maggañāṇapurecārikaṃ viya nibbānārammaṇaṃ na hotīti?
atk-s0503a:155_1: Phalañāṇānaṃ aniyyānikabhāvato. Ariyamaggadhammāyeva hi niyyānikā. Vuttañhetaṃ “katame
atk-s0503a:155_2: dhammā niyyānikā? Cattāro ariyamaggā apariyāpannā”ti. Tasmā ekanteneva niyyānikabhāvassa
atk-s0503a:155_3: ubhato vuṭṭhānabhāvena pavattamānassa anantarapaccayabhūtena ñāṇena nimittato vuṭṭhiteneva
atk-s0503a:155_4: bhavitabbanti tassa nibbānārammaṇatā yuttā, na pana ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā tassa
atk-s0503a:155_5: vipākabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ kilesānaṃ asamucchindanato aniyyānikattā avuṭṭhānasabhāvānaṃ
atk-s0503a:155_6: phalañāṇānaṃ purecārikañāṇassa kadācipi nibbānārammaṇatā ubhayattha anulomañāṇānaṃ
atk-s0503a:155_8: lobhakkhandhādīnaṃ sātisayaṃ padālanena lokiyañāṇena ukkaṃsapāramippattāni maggañāṇānukūlāni
atk-s0503a:155_9: uppajjanti, phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pana tāni tāni tena tena maggena tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ
atk-s0503a:155_10: samucchinnattā tattha nirussukkāni kevalaṃ ariyānaṃ phalasamāpattisukhasamaṅgibhāvassa
atk-s0503a:155_11: parikammamattāni hutvā uppajjantīti na tesaṃ kutoci vuṭṭhānasambhavo, yato tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:155_12: pariyosāne ñāṇaṃ saṅkhāranimittaṃ vuṭṭhānato nibbānārammaṇaṃ siyā. Evañca katvā sekkhassa
atk-s0503a:155_13: attano phalasamāpattivaḷañjanatthāya udayabbayādivasena saṅkhāre sammasantassa vipassanāñāṇānupubbāya
atk-s0503a:155_14: phalameva uppajjati, na maggoti ayañca attho samatthito hoti. Evaṃ tāva phalasamāpattiyā
atk-s0503a:156: “Tayo kho, āvuso, paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā ṭhitiyā, sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikāro, animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāro, pubbe ca abhisaṅkhāro”ti –
atk-s0503a:157_0: Vacanato panassā tīhākārehi ṭhānaṃ hoti. Tattha pubbe ca abhisaṅkhāroti samāpattito
atk-s0503a:157_1: pubbe kālaparicchedo. “Asukasmiṃ nāma kāle vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti paricchinnattā hissā
atk-s0503a:157_2: yāva so kālo nāgacchati, tāva vuṭṭhānaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0503a:158: “Dve kho, āvuso, paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā vuṭṭhānassa, sabbanimittānañca manasikāro, animittāya ca dhātuyā amanasikāro”ti –
atk-s0503a:159_0: Vacanato panassā dvīhākārehi vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tattha sabbanimittānanti rūpanimittavedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇanimittānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:159_1: Kāmañca na sabbānevetāni ekato manasi karoti, sabbasaṅgāhikavasena panevaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:159_2: Tasmā yaṃ bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇaṃ, tassa manasikaraṇena phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:159_3: hotīti evaṃ assā vuṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tayidaṃ evamidha samāpajjanavuṭṭhānaṃ arahattaphalabhūtaṃ –
atk-s0503a:162: Iti vuttaṃ sātātisātaṃ vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedīti vimuttisukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvediyamāno nisinno hotīti attho”ti.
atk-s0503a:163_0: Athāti adhikāratthe nipāto. Khoti padapūraṇe. Tesu adhikāratthena athāti iminā vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedanato
atk-s0503a:163_1: aññaṃ adhikāraṃ dasseti. Ko panesoti? Paṭiccasamuppādamanasikāro. Athāti vā pacchāti
atk-s0503a:163_2: etasmiṃ atthe nipāto, tena “tassa sattāhassa accayenā”ti vakkhamānameva atthaṃ joteti.
atk-s0503a:163_3: Tassa sattāhassāti pallaṅkasattāhassa. Accayenāti apagamena. Tamhā samādhimhāti arahattaphalasamādhito.
atk-s0503a:163_4: Idha pana ṭhatvā paṭipāṭiyā satta sattāhāni dassetabbānīti keci tāni vitthārayiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:163_5: Mayaṃ pana tāni khandhakapāṭhena imissā udānapāḷiyā avirodhadassanamukhena parato
atk-s0503a:163_6: vaṇṇayissāma. Rattiyāti avayavasambandhe sāmivacanaṃ. Paṭhamanti accantasaṃyogatthe
atk-s0503a:163_7: upayogavacanaṃ. Bhagavā hi tassā rattiyā sakalampi paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ teneva manasikārena yutto ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:164_0: Paṭiccasamuppādanti paccayadhammaṃ. Avijjādayo hi paccayadhammā paṭiccasamuppādo.
atk-s0503a:164_1: Kathamidaṃ jānitabbanti ce? Bhagavato vacanena. Bhagavatā hi “tasmātihānanda, eseva
atk-s0503a:164_2: hetu, etaṃ nidānaṃ, esa samudayo, esa paccayo jarāmaraṇassa, yadidaṃ jāti…pe… saṅkhārānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:164_3: yadidaṃ avijjā”ti evaṃ avijjādayo hetūti vuttā. Yathā dvādasa paccayā dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādāti.
atk-s0503a:165_0: Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – aññamaññaṃ paṭicca paṭimukhaṃ katvā kāraṇasamavāyaṃ appaṭikkhipitvā
atk-s0503a:165_1: sahite uppādetīti paṭiccasamuppādo. Atha vā paṭicca paccetabbaṃ paccayārahataṃ paccayaṃ
atk-s0503a:165_2: paṭigantvā na vinā tena sambandhassa uppādo paṭiccasamuppādo. Paṭiccasamuppādoti
atk-s0503a:165_3: cettha samuppādapadaṭṭhānavacanaviññeyyo phalassa uppādanasamatthatāyutto hetu, na
atk-s0503a:165_4: paṭiccasamuppattimattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Atha vā paccetuṃ arahanti naṃ paṇḍitāti paṭicco,
atk-s0503a:165_5: sammā sayameva vā uppādetīti samuppādo, paṭicco ca so samuppādo cāti paṭiccasamuppādoti
atk-s0503a:166_0: Anulomanti “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena vutto avijjādiko paccayākāro attanā
atk-s0503a:166_1: kattabbakiccakaraṇato anulomoti vuccati. Atha vā ādito paṭṭhāya antaṃ pāpetvā vuttattā
atk-s0503a:166_2: pavattiyā vā anulomato anulomo, taṃ anulomaṃ. Sādhukaṃ manasākāsīti sakkaccaṃ manasi
atk-s0503a:166_3: akāsi. Yo yo paccayadhammo yassa yassa paccayuppannadhammassa yathā yathā hetupaccayādinā
atk-s0503a:166_4: paccayabhāvena paccayo hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ aviparītaṃ aparihāpetvā anavasesato paccavekkhaṇavasena
atk-s0503a:166_5: citte akāsīti attho. Yathā pana bhagavā paṭiccasamuppādānulomaṃ manasākāsi, taṃ saṅkhepena
atk-s0503a:166_6: tāva dassetuṃ “iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:167_0: Tattha itīti evaṃ, anena pakārenāti attho. Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti imasmiṃ avijjādike
atk-s0503a:167_1: paccaye sati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ hoti. Imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti imassa
atk-s0503a:167_2: avijjādikassa paccayassa uppādā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ uppajjatīti attho. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:167_3: asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatīti avijjādīnaṃ abhāve saṅkhārādīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:167_4: abhāvassa avijjādīnaṃ nirodhe saṅkhārādīnaṃ nirodhassa ca dutiyatatiyasuttavacanena
atk-s0503a:167_5: etasmiṃ paccayalakkhaṇe niyamo dassito hoti – imasmiṃ sati eva, nāsati. Imassuppādā
atk-s0503a:167_6: eva, nānuppādā. Anirodhā eva, na nirodhāti. Tenetaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ antogadhaniyamaṃ idha
atk-s0503a:167_7: paṭiccasamuppādassa vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nirodhoti ca avijjādīnaṃ virāgādhigamena
atk-s0503a:167_8: āyatiṃ anuppādo appavatti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:167_9: Nirodhanirodhī ca uppādanirodhībhāvena vutto “imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:168_0: Tenetaṃ dasseti – anirodho uppādo nāma, so cettha atthibhāvotipi vuccatīti. “Imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:168_1: sati idaṃ hotī”ti idameva hi lakkhaṇaṃ pariyāyantarena “imassa uppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti
atk-s0503a:168_2: vadantena parena purimaṃ visesitaṃ hoti. Tasmā na dharamānataṃyeva sandhāya “imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:168_3: satī”ti vuttaṃ, atha kho maggena aniruddhabhāvañcāti viññāyati. Yasmā ca “imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:168_4: asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti dvidhāpi uddiṭṭhassa lakkhaṇassa
atk-s0503a:168_5: niddesaṃ vadantena “avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”tiādinā nirodho
atk-s0503a:168_6: eva vutto, tasmā natthibhāvopi nirodho evāti natthibhāvaviruddho atthibhāvo anirodhoti
atk-s0503a:168_7: dassitaṃ hoti. Tena anirodhasaṅkhātena atthibhāvena uppādaṃ viseseti. Tato na idha
atk-s0503a:168_8: atthibhāvamattaṃ uppādoti attho adhippeto, atha kho anirodhasaṅkhāto atthibhāvo cāti
atk-s0503a:169_0: Ko panāyaṃ anirodho nāma, yo “atthibhāvo, uppādo”ti ca vuccatīti? Appahīnabhāvo ca,
atk-s0503a:169_1: anibbattitaphalārahatāpahānehi phalānuppādanārahatā ca. Ye hi pahātabbā akusalā dhammā,
atk-s0503a:169_2: tesaṃ ariyamaggena asamugghāṭitabhāvo ca. Ye pana na pahātabbā kusalābyākatā dhammā,
atk-s0503a:169_3: yāni tesu saṃyojanāni akhīṇāsavānaṃ tesaṃ aparikkhīṇatā ca. Asamugghāṭitānusayatāya
atk-s0503a:169_4: hi sasaṃyojanā khandhappavatti paṭiccasamuppādo. Tathā ca vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:170_0: “Yāya ca, bhikkhave, avijjāya nivutassa bālassa yāya ca taṇhāya sampayuttassa ayaṃ
atk-s0503a:170_1: kāyo samudāgato, sā ceva avijjā bālassa appahīnā, sā ca taṇhā aparikkhīṇā. Taṃ kissa
atk-s0503a:170_2: hetu? Na, bhikkhave, bālo acari brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhakkhayāya, tasmā bālo kāyassa
atk-s0503a:170_3: bhedā kāyūpago hoti, so kāyūpago samāno na parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇenā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:171: Khīṇasaṃyojanānaṃ pana avijjāya abhāvato saṅkhārānaṃ, taṇhupādānānaṃ abhāvato upādānabhavānaṃ asambhavoti vaṭṭassa upacchedo paññāyissatīti. Tenevāha –
atk-s0503a:172: “Channaṃ tveva, phagguṇa, phassāyatanānaṃ asesavirāganirodhā phassanirodho, phassanirodhā vedanānirodho”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:173_0: Na hi aggamaggādhigamato uddhaṃ yāva parinibbānā saḷāyatanādīnaṃ appavatti. Atha
atk-s0503a:173_1: kho natthitā nirodhasaddavacanīyatā khīṇasaṃyojanatāti nirodho vutto. Apica cirakatampi
atk-s0503a:173_2: kammaṃ anibbattitaphalatāya appahīnāhāratāya ca phalārahaṃ santaṃ eva nāma hoti,
atk-s0503a:173_3: na nibbattitaphalaṃ, nāpi pahīnāhāranti. Phaluppattipaccayānaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:173_4: vuttanayeneva phalārahabhāvo anirodhoti veditabbo. Evaṃ aniruddhabhāveneva hi yena
atk-s0503a:173_5: vinā phalaṃ na sambhavati, taṃ kāraṇaṃ atītantipi imasmiṃ satīti iminā vacanena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:173_6: Tatoyeva ca avusitabrahmacariyassa appavattidhammataṃ anāpanno paccayuppādo kālabhedaṃ
atk-s0503a:173_7: anāmasitvā anivattanāya eva imassa uppādāti vutto. Atha vā avasesapaccayasamavāye
atk-s0503a:173_8: avijjamānassapi vijjamānassa viya pageva vijjamānassa yā phaluppattiabhimukhatā,
atk-s0503a:173_9: sā imassa uppādāti vuttā. Tathā hi tato phalaṃ uppajjatīti tadavatthaṃ kāraṇaṃ phalassa
atk-s0503a:173_10: uppādanabhāvena uṭṭhitaṃ uppatitaṃ nāma hoti, na vijjamānampi atadavatthanti tadavatthatā uppādoti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:174_0: Tattha satīti iminā vijjamānatāmattena paccayabhāvaṃ vadanto abyāpārataṃ paṭiccasamuppādassa
atk-s0503a:174_1: dasseti. Uppādāti uppattidhammataṃ asabbakālabhāvitaṃ phaluppattiabhimukhatañca dīpento
atk-s0503a:174_2: aniccataṃ paṭiccasamuppādassa dasseti. “Sati, nāsati, uppādā, na nirodhā”ti pana
atk-s0503a:174_4: dasseti. Hetuatthatā cettha bhummavacane yassa bhāve tadavinābhāviphalassa bhāvo
atk-s0503a:174_5: lakkhīyati, tattha pavattiyā veditabbā yathā “adhanānaṃ dhane ananuppadīyamāne dāliddiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:174_6: vepullaṃ agamāsī”ti ca “nipphannesu sassesu subhikkhaṃ jāyatī”ti ca. Nissakkavacanassāpi
atk-s0503a:174_7: hetuatthatā phalassa pabhave pakatiyañca pavattito yathā “kalalā hoti abbudaṃ, abbudā
atk-s0503a:174_8: jāyatī pesī”ti ca “himavatā gaṅgā pabhavanti, siṅgato saro jāyatī”ti ca. Avijjādibhāve
atk-s0503a:174_9: ca tadavinābhāvena saṅkhārādibhāvo lakkhīyati, avijjādīhi ca saṅkhārādayo pabhavanti
atk-s0503a:174_10: pakariyanti cāti te tesaṃ pabhavo pakati ca, tasmā tadatthadīpanatthaṃ “imasmiṃ sati
atk-s0503a:175_0: Yasmā cettha “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti saṅkhepena uddiṭṭhassa
atk-s0503a:175_1: paṭiccasamuppādassa “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādiko niddeso, tasmā yathāvutto atthibhāvo
atk-s0503a:175_2: uppādo ca tesaṃ tesaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvoti viññāyati. Na hi aniruddhatāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:175_4: eva, nāsati, uppādā eva, na nirodhā”ti antogadhaniyamehi vacanehi abhihitaṃ muñcitvā
atk-s0503a:175_5: añño paccayabhāvo nāma atthi, tasmā yathāvutto atthibhāvo uppādo ca paccayabhāvoti
atk-s0503a:175_6: veditabbaṃ. Yepi paṭṭhāne āgatā hetuādayo catuvīsati paccayā, tepi etasseva paccayabhāvassa
atk-s0503a:175_7: visesāti veditabbā. Iti yathā vitthārena anulomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ manasi akāsi,
atk-s0503a:176_0: Tattha yadidanti nipāto, tassa yo ayanti attho. Avijjāpaccayātiādīsu avindiyaṃ kāyaduccaritādiṃ
atk-s0503a:176_1: vindatīti avijjā, vindiyaṃ kāyasucaritādiṃ na vindatīti avijjā, dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:176_2: aviditaṃ karotīti avijjā, antavirahite saṃsāre bhavādīsu satte javāpetīti avijjā,
atk-s0503a:176_3: avijjamānesu javati vijjamānesu na javatīti avijjā, vijjāya paṭipakkhāti avijjā,
atk-s0503a:176_4: sā “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā catubbidhā veditabbā. Paṭicca na vinā phalaṃ eti uppajjati
atk-s0503a:176_5: ceva pavattati cāti paccayo, upakārakattho vā paccayo. Avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti
atk-s0503a:176_6: avijjāpaccayo, tasmā avijjāpaccayā. Saṅkharontīti saṅkhārā, lokiyakusalākusalacetanā,
atk-s0503a:176_7: sā puññāpuññāneñjābhisaṅkhāravasena tividhā veditabbā. Vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ, taṃ lokiyavipākaviññāṇavasena
atk-s0503a:176_8: dvattiṃsavidhaṃ. Namatīti nāmaṃ, vedanādikkhandhattayaṃ. Ruppatīti rūpaṃ, bhūtarūpaṃ
atk-s0503a:176_9: cakkhādiupādārūpañca. Āyatati āyatañca saṃsāradukkhaṃ nayatīti āyatanaṃ. Phusatīti
atk-s0503a:176_10: phasso. Vedayatīti vedanā. Idampi dvayaṃ dvāravasena chabbidhaṃ, vipākavasena gahaṇe
atk-s0503a:176_11: chattiṃsavidhaṃ. Paritassatīti taṇhā, sā kāmataṇhādivasena saṅkhepato tividhā, vitthārato
atk-s0503a:176_12: aṭṭhuttarasatavidhā ca. Upādīyatīti upādānaṃ, taṃ kāmupādānādivasena catubbidhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:176_13: Bhavati bhāvayati cāti bhavo, so kammūpapattibhedato duvidho. Jananaṃ jāti. Jīraṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:176_14: jarā. Maranti tenāti maraṇaṃ. Socanaṃ soko. Paridevanaṃ paridevo. Dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:176_15: uppādaṭṭhitivasena dvedhā khaṇatīti dukkhaṃ. Dumanassa bhāvo domanassaṃ. Bhuso āyāso
atk-s0503a:176_16: upāyāso. Sambhavantīti nibbattanti. Na kevalañca sokādīhiyeva, atha kho sabbapadehi
atk-s0503a:176_17: “sambhavantī”ti padassa yojanā kātabbā. Evañhi “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantī”ti
atk-s0503a:176_18: paccayapaccayuppannavavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0503a:177_0: Tattha aññāṇalakkhaṇā avijjā, sammohanarasā, chādanapaccupaṭṭhānā, āsavapadaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0503a:177_3: vatthārammaṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Namanalakkhaṇaṃ nāmaṃ, sampayogarasaṃ, avinibbhogapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:177_11: upādānapadaṭṭhāno. Tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā jāti, niyyātanarasā,
atk-s0503a:177_13: jarā, maraṇūpanayanarasā, yobbanavināsapaccupaṭṭhānā. Cutilakkhaṇaṃ maraṇaṃ, visaṃyogarasaṃ,
atk-s0503a:177_14: gativippavāsapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Antonijjhānalakkhaṇo soko, cetaso nijjhānaraso, anusocanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-s0503a:177_18: upāyāso, nitthunanaraso, visādapaccupaṭṭhāno. Evamete avijjādayo lakkhaṇāditopi veditabbāti.
atk-s0503a:177_19: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana sabbākārasampannaṃ vinicchayaṃ icchantena sammohavinodaniyā
atk-s0503a:178_0: Evanti niddiṭṭhassa nidassanaṃ, tena avijjādīheva kāraṇehi, na issaranimmānādīhīti
atk-s0503a:178_1: dasseti. Etassāti yathāvuttassa. Kevalassāti asammissassa sakalassa vā. Dukkhakkhandhassāti
atk-s0503a:178_2: dukkhasamūhassa, na sattassa, nāpi jīvassa, nāpi subhasukhādīnaṃ. Samudayo hotīti
atk-s0503a:179_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yvāyaṃ avijjādivasena saṅkhārādikassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo
atk-s0503a:179_1: hotīti vutto, sabbākārena etamatthaṃ viditvā. Tāyaṃ velāyanti tāyaṃ tassa atthassa
atk-s0503a:179_2: viditavelāyaṃ. Imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti imaṃ tasmiṃ atthe vidite hetuno ca hetusamuppannadhammassa
atk-s0503a:179_3: ca pajānanāya ānubhāvadīpakaṃ “yadā have pātubhavantī”tiādikaṃ somanassasampayuttañāṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:179_4: udānaṃ udānesi, attamanavācaṃ nicchāresīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:180_0: Tassattho – yadāti yasmiṃ kāle. Haveti byattanti imasmiṃ atthe nipāto. Keci pana
atk-s0503a:180_1: “haveti āhave yuddhe”ti atthaṃ vadanti, “yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhenā”ti vacanato
atk-s0503a:180_2: kilesamārena yujjhanasamayeti tesaṃ adhippāyo. Pātubhavantīti uppajjanti. Dhammāti
atk-s0503a:180_3: anulomapaccayākārapaṭivedhasādhakā bodhipakkhiyadhammā. Atha vā pātubhavantīti pakāsenti,
atk-s0503a:180_4: abhisamayavasena byattā pākaṭā honti. Dhammāti catuariyasaccadhammā, ātāpo vuccati
atk-s0503a:180_5: kilesasantāpanaṭṭhena vīriyaṃ. Ātāpinoti sammappadhānavīriyavato. Jhāyatoti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena
atk-s0503a:180_6: lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāyantassa. Brāhmaṇassāti bāhitapāpassa khīṇāsavassa. Athassa
atk-s0503a:180_7: kaṅkhā vapayanti sabbāti athassa evaṃ pātubhūtadhammassa yā etā “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0503a:180_8: phusatīti. No kallo pañhoti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā nayena, “katamaṃ nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0503a:180_9: jarāmaraṇaṃ, kassa ca panidaṃ jarāmaraṇanti. No kallo pañhoti bhagavā avocā”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:180_10: nayena paccayākāre kaṅkhā vuttā, yā ca paccayākārasseva appaṭividdhattā “ahosiṃ nu
atk-s0503a:180_11: kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādinā soḷasa kaṅkhā āgatā. Tā sabbā vapayanti apagacchanti
atk-s0503a:180_12: nirujjhanti. Kasmā? Yato pajānāti sahetudhammaṃ, yasmā avijjādikena hetunā sahetukaṃ
atk-s0503a:180_13: imaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ kevalaṃ dukkhakkhandhadhammaṃ pajānāti aññāsi paṭivijjhīti.
atk-s0503a:181_0: Kadā panassa bodhipakkhiyadhammā catusaccadhammā vā pātubhavanti uppajjanti pakāsenti
atk-s0503a:181_1: vā? Vipassanāmaggañāṇesu. Tattha vipassanāñāṇasampayuttā satiādayo vipassanāñāṇañca
atk-s0503a:181_2: yathārahaṃ attano visayesu tadaṅgappahānavasena subhasaññādike pajahantā kāyānupassanādivasena
atk-s0503a:181_3: visuṃ visuṃ uppajjanti, maggakkhaṇe pana te nibbānamālambitvā samucchedavasena paṭipakkhe
atk-s0503a:181_4: pajahantā catūsupi ariyasaccesu asammohappaṭivedhasādhanavasena sakideva uppajjanti.
atk-s0503a:181_5: Evaṃ tāvettha bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ uppajjanaṭṭhena pātubhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:182_0: Ariyasaccadhammānaṃ pana lokiyānaṃ vipassanākkhaṇe vipassanāya ārammaṇakaraṇavasena,
atk-s0503a:182_2: sabbesampi kiccābhisamayavasena pākaṭabhāvato pakāsanaṭṭhena pātubhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:183_0: Iti bhagavā satipi sabbākārena sabbadhammānaṃ attano ñāṇassa pākaṭabhāve paṭiccasamuppādamukhena
atk-s0503a:183_1: vipassanābhinivesassa katattā nipuṇagambhīrasududdasatāya paccayākārassa taṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0503a:183_2: uppannabalavasomanasso paṭipakkhasamucchedavibhāvanena saddhiṃ attano tadabhisamayānubhāvadīpakamevettha udānaṃ udānesīti.
atk-s0503a:184_0: Ayampi udāno vutto bhagavatā iti me sutanti ayaṃ pāḷi kesuciyeva potthakesu dissati.
atk-s0503a:184_1: Tattha ayampīti pisaddo “idampi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, ayampi pārājiko hotī”tiādīsu
atk-s0503a:184_2: viya sampiṇḍanattho, tena uparimaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Vuttoti ayaṃ vuttasaddo kesohāraṇavappanavāpasamīkaraṇajīvitavuttipamuttabhāvapāvacanabhāvena
atk-s0503a:184_3: pavattana ajjhenakathanādīsu dissati. Tathā hesa “kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro”tiādīsu kesohāraṇe āgato.
atk-s0503a:186: Vuttānaṃ phalamasnāti, yo mittānaṃ na dubbhatī”ti. –
atk-s0503a:187_0: Ādīsu vappane. “No ca kho paṭivutta”ntiādīsu aṭṭhadaṇḍakādīhi vāpasamīkaraṇe. “Pannalomo
atk-s0503a:187_1: paradattavutto migabhūtena cetasā viharāmī”tiādīsu jīvitavuttiyaṃ. “Paṇḍupalāso bandhanā
atk-s0503a:187_2: pavutto abhabbo haritattāyā”tiādīsu bandhanato pamuttabhāve. “Gītaṃ vuttaṃ samīhita”ntiādīsu
atk-s0503a:187_3: pāvacanabhāvena pavattite. “Vutto pārāyaṇo”tiādīsu ajjhene. “Vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatā
atk-s0503a:187_4: ‘dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā”’tiādīsu kathane. Idhāpi kathane
atk-s0503a:187_5: eva daṭṭhabbo, tena ayampi udāno bhāsitoti attho. Itīti evaṃ. Me sutanti padadvayassa
atk-s0503a:187_6: attho nidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ sabbākārato vuttoyeva. Pubbe “evaṃ me suta”nti nidānavasena
atk-s0503a:187_7: vuttoyeva hi attho idha nigamanavasena “iti me suta”nti puna vutto. Vuttasseva hi
atk-s0503a:187_8: atthassa puna vacanaṃ nigamananti. Itisaddassa atthuddhāro evaṃ-saddena samānatthatāya
atk-s0503a:187_9: “evaṃ me suta”nti ettha viya, atthayojanā ca itivuttakavaṇṇanāya amhehi pakāsitāyevāti
atk-s0503a:191_0: 2. Dutiye paṭilomanti “avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”tiādinā nayena vutto avijjādikoyeva
atk-s0503a:191_1: paccayākāro anuppādanirodhena nirujjhamāno attano kattabbakiccassa akaraṇato paṭilomoti
atk-s0503a:191_2: vuccati. Pavattiyā vā vilomanato paṭilomo, antato pana majjhato vā paṭṭhāya ādiṃ
atk-s0503a:191_3: pāpetvā avuttattā ito aññenatthenettha paṭilomatā na yujjati. Paṭilomanti ca “visamaṃ
atk-s0503a:191_4: candasūriyā parivattantī”tiādīsu viya bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso. Imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na
atk-s0503a:191_5: hotīti imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye asati maggena pahīne idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ
atk-s0503a:191_6: na hoti nappavattati. Imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa
atk-s0503a:191_7: nirodhā maggena anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditattā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ nirujjhati,
atk-s0503a:191_8: nappavattatīti attho. Idhāpi yathā “imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti
atk-s0503a:191_9: ettha “imasmiṃ satiyeva, nāsati, imassa uppādā eva, na nirodhā”ti antogadhaniyamatā
atk-s0503a:191_10: dassitā. Evaṃ imasmiṃ asatiyeva, na sati, imassa nirodhā eva, na uppādāti antogadhaniyamatālakkhaṇā
atk-s0503a:191_11: dassitāti veditabbaṃ. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paṭhamabodhisuttavaṇṇanāya vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:192_0: Evaṃ yathā bhagavā paṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādaṃ manasi akāsi, taṃ saṅkhepena dassetvā
atk-s0503a:192_1: idāni vitthārena dassetuṃ “avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha avijjānirodhāti
atk-s0503a:192_2: ariyamaggena avijjāya anavasesanirodhā, anusayappahānavasena aggamaggena avijjāya
atk-s0503a:192_3: accantasamugghāṭatoti attho. Yadipi heṭṭhimamaggehi pahīyamānā avijjā accantasamugghāṭavaseneva
atk-s0503a:192_4: pahīyati, tathāpi na anavasesato pahīyati. Apāyagāminiyā hi avijjā paṭhamamaggena
atk-s0503a:192_5: pahīyati. Tathā sakideva imasmiṃ loke sabbattha ca anariyabhūmiyaṃ upapattipaccayabhūtā
atk-s0503a:192_6: avijjā yathākkamaṃ dutiyatatiyamaggehi pahīyati, na itarāti. Arahattamaggeneva hi
atk-s0503a:192_7: sā anavasesaṃ pahīyatīti. Saṅkhāranirodhoti saṅkhārānaṃ anuppādanirodho hoti. Evaṃ
atk-s0503a:192_8: niruddhānaṃ pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇādīnañca nirodhā nāmarūpādīni
atk-s0503a:192_9: niruddhāni eva hontīti dassetuṃ “saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho”tiādiṃ vatvā “evametassa
atk-s0503a:192_10: kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0503a:193_1: ettāvatāpi sakalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anavasesato nirodho vutto hoti, tathāpi yathā
atk-s0503a:193_2: anulome yassa yassa paccayadhammassa atthitāya yo yo paccayuppannadhammo na nirujjhati
atk-s0503a:193_3: pavattati evāti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṃ “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā…pe… samudayo
atk-s0503a:193_4: hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ tappaṭipakkhato tassa tassa paccayadhammassa abhāve so so paccayuppannadhammo
atk-s0503a:193_5: nirujjhati nappavattatīti dassanatthaṃ idha “avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho, saṅkhāranirodhā
atk-s0503a:193_6: viññāṇanirodho…pe… dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī”ti vuttaṃ, na pana anulome viya
atk-s0503a:193_7: kālattayapariyāpannassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodhadassanatthaṃ. Anāgatasseva hi ariyamaggabhāvanāya
atk-s0503a:193_8: asati uppajjanārahassa dukkhakkhandhassa ariyamaggabhāvanāya nirodho icchitoti ayampi viseso veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:194_1: nirodho hotī”ti vutto, sabbākārena etamatthaṃ viditvā. Imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:194_2: atthe vidite “avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”ti evaṃ pakāsitassa avijjādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ
atk-s0503a:195_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yasmā avijjādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ anuppādanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ khayaṃ
atk-s0503a:195_1: avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi, tasmā etassa vuttanayena ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa vuttappakārā
atk-s0503a:195_2: bodhipakkhiyadhammā catusaccadhammā vā pātubhavanti uppajjanti pakāsenti vā. Atha
atk-s0503a:195_3: yā paccayanirodhassa sammā aviditattā uppajjeyyuṃ pubbe vuttappabhedā kaṅkhā, tā
atk-s0503a:195_4: sabbāpi vapayanti nirujjhantīti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0503a:198_0: 3. Tatiye anulomapaṭilomanti anulomañca paṭilomañca, yathāvuttaanulomavasena ceva
atk-s0503a:198_1: paṭilomavasena cāti attho. Nanu ca pubbepi anulomavasena paṭilomavasena ca paṭiccasamuppāde
atk-s0503a:198_2: manasikārappavatti suttadvaye vuttā, idha kasmā punapi tadubhayavasena manasikārappavatti
atk-s0503a:198_3: vuccatīti? Tadubhayavasena tatiyavāraṃ tattha manasikārassa pavattitattā. Kathaṃ
atk-s0503a:198_4: pana tadubhayavasena manasikāro pavattito? Na hi sakkā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ
atk-s0503a:198_5: paṭiccasamuppādassa manasikāraṃ pavattetunti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “tadubhayaṃ
atk-s0503a:198_6: ekajjhaṃ manasākāsī”ti, atha kho vārena. Bhagavā hi paṭhamaṃ anulomavasena paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-s0503a:198_7: manasi karitvā tadanurūpaṃ paṭhamaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. Dutiyampi paṭilomavasena taṃ
atk-s0503a:198_8: manasi karitvā tadanurūpameva udānaṃ udānesi. Tatiyavāre pana kālena anulomaṃ kālena
atk-s0503a:198_9: paṭilomaṃ manasikaraṇavasena anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasi akāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “anulomapaṭilomanti
atk-s0503a:198_10: anulomañca paṭilomañca, yathāvuttaanulomavasena ceva paṭilomavasena cā”ti. Iminā
atk-s0503a:198_11: manasikārassa paguṇabalavabhāvo ca vasībhāvo ca pakāsito hoti. Ettha ca “anulomaṃ
atk-s0503a:198_12: manasi karissāmi, paṭilomaṃ manasi karissāmi, anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasi karissāmī”ti
atk-s0503a:198_13: evaṃ pavattānaṃ pubbābhogānaṃ vasena nesaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:199_0: Tattha avijjāya tvevāti avijjāya tu eva. Asesavirāganirodhāti virāgasaṅkhātena maggena
atk-s0503a:199_1: asesanirodhā, aggamaggena anavasesaanuppādappahānāti attho. Saṅkhāranirodhoti sabbesaṃ
atk-s0503a:199_2: saṅkhārānaṃ anavasesaṃ anuppādanirodho. Heṭṭhimena hi maggattayena keci saṅkhārā
atk-s0503a:199_3: nirujjhanti, keci na nirujjhanti avijjāya sāvasesanirodhā. Aggamaggena panassā anavasesanirodhā
atk-s0503a:200_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yvāyaṃ avijjādivasena saṅkhārādikassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo
atk-s0503a:200_1: nirodho ca avijjādīnaṃ samudayā nirodhā ca hotīti vutto, sabbākārena etamatthaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:200_2: Imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti idaṃ yena maggena yo dukkhakkhandhassa samudayanirodhasaṅkhāto
atk-s0503a:200_3: attho kiccavasena ārammaṇakiriyāya ca vidito, tassa ariyamaggassa ānubhāvadīpakaṃ
atk-s0503a:201_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa,
atk-s0503a:201_1: tadā so brāhmaṇo tehi uppannehi bodhipakkhiyadhammehi yassa vā ariyamaggassa catusaccadhammā
atk-s0503a:201_2: pātubhūtā, tena ariyamaggena vidhūpayaṃ tiṭṭhati mārasenaṃ, “kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:201_3: nayena vuttappakāraṃ mārasenaṃ vidhūpayanto vidhamento viddhaṃsento tiṭṭhati. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0503a:201_4: Sūriyova obhāsayamantalikkhaṃ, yathā sūriyo abbhuggato attano pabhāya antalikkhaṃ
atk-s0503a:201_5: obhāsentova andhakāraṃ vidhamento tiṭṭhati, evaṃ sopi khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo tehi dhammehi
atk-s0503a:201_6: tena vā ariyamaggena saccāni paṭivijjhantova mārasenaṃ vidhūpayanto tiṭṭhatīti.
atk-s0503a:202_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ paccayākārapajānanassa, dutiyaṃ paccayakkhayādhigamassa,
atk-s0503a:202_1: tatiyaṃ ariyamaggassa ānubhāvappakāsanāni imāni tīṇi udānāni tīsu yāmesu bhāsitāni.
atk-s0503a:202_2: Katarāya rattiyā? Abhisambodhito sattamāya rattiyā. Bhagavā hi visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyā
atk-s0503a:202_3: paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme
atk-s0503a:202_4: paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā nānānayehi tebhūmakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā “idāni aruṇo
atk-s0503a:202_5: uggamissatī”ti sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇi, sabbaññutappattisamanantarameva ca aruṇo uggacchīti.
atk-s0503a:202_6: Tato teneva pallaṅkena bodhirukkhamūle sattāhaṃ vītināmento sampattāya pāṭipadarattiyā
atk-s0503a:202_7: tīsu yāmesu vuttanayena paṭiccasamuppādaṃ manasi karitvā yathākkamaṃ imāni udānāni udānesi.
atk-s0503a:203_0: Khandhake pana tīsupi vāresu “paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasākāsī”ti āgatattā
atk-s0503a:203_1: khandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tīsupi yāmesu evaṃ manasi katvā paṭhamaṃ udānaṃ paccayākārapaccavekkhaṇavasena,
atk-s0503a:203_2: dutiyaṃ nibbānapaccavekkhaṇavasena, tatiyaṃ maggapaccavekkhaṇavasenāti evaṃ imāni
atk-s0503a:203_3: bhagavā udānāni udānesī”ti vuttaṃ, tampi na virujjhati. Bhagavā hi ṭhapetvā ratanagharasattāhaṃ
atk-s0503a:203_4: sesesu chasu sattāhesu antarantarā dhammaṃ paccavekkhitvā yebhuyyena vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī
atk-s0503a:206_0: 4. Catutthe ajapālanigrodheti tassa kira chāyāyaṃ ajapālā gantvā nisīdanti, tenassa
atk-s0503a:206_1: “ajapālanigrodho”tveva nāmaṃ udapādi. Keci pana “yasmā tattha vede sajjhāyituṃ asamatthā
atk-s0503a:206_2: mahallakabrāhmaṇā pākāraparikkhepayuttāni nivesanāni katvā sabbe vasiṃsu, tasmā ajapālanigrodhoti
atk-s0503a:206_3: nāmaṃ jāta”nti vadanti. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – na japantīti ajapā, mantānaṃ anajjhāyakāti
atk-s0503a:206_4: attho, ajapā lanti ādiyanti nivāsaṃ etthāti ajapāloti. Yasmā vā majjhanhike samaye
atk-s0503a:206_5: anto paviṭṭhe aje attano chāyāya pāleti rakkhati, tasmā ‘ajapālo’tissa nāmaṃ rūḷhanti
atk-s0503a:206_6: apare. Sabbathāpi nāmametaṃ tassa rukkhassa, tassa samīpe. Samīpatthe hi etaṃ bhummaṃ
atk-s0503a:207_0: Vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedīti tatrapi dhammaṃ vicinanto vimuttisukhañca paṭisaṃvedento
atk-s0503a:207_1: nisīdi. Bodhirukkhato puratthimadisābhāge esa rukkho hoti. Sattāhanti ca idaṃ na
atk-s0503a:207_2: pallaṅkasattāhato anantarasattāhaṃ. Bhagavā hi pallaṅkasattāhato aparānipi tīṇi sattāhāni
atk-s0503a:208_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – bhagavati kira sammāsambodhiṃ patvā sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena
atk-s0503a:208_1: nisinne “na bhagavā vuṭṭhāti, kinnu kho aññepi buddhattakarā dhammā atthī”ti ekaccānaṃ
atk-s0503a:208_2: devatānaṃ kaṅkhā udapādi. Atha bhagavā aṭṭhame divase samāpattito vuṭṭhāya devatānaṃ
atk-s0503a:208_3: kaṅkhaṃ ñatvā kaṅkhāvidhamanatthaṃ ākāse uppatitvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā tāsaṃ
atk-s0503a:208_4: kaṅkhaṃ vidhametvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite uttaradisābhāge ṭhatvā cattāri
