atk-s0503a:208_5: asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca upacitānaṃ pāramīnaṃ balādhigamaṭṭhānaṃ pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0503a:208_6: bodhirukkhañca animisehi cakkhūhi olokayamāno sattāhaṃ vītināmesi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ animisacetiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:208_7: nāma jātaṃ. Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antarā puratthimato ca pacchimato
atk-s0503a:208_8: ca āyate ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi, taṃ ratanacaṅkamacetiyaṃ nāma
atk-s0503a:208_9: jātaṃ. Tato pacchimadisābhāge devatā ratanagharaṃ māpayiṃsu, tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā
atk-s0503a:208_10: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ visesato anantanayaṃ samantapaṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0503a:208_11: taṃ ṭhānaṃ ratanagharacetiyaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Evaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni
atk-s0503a:208_12: vītināmetvā pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhato ajapālanigrodhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa mūle pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:209_0: Tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhāsīti tato phalasamāpattisamādhito yathākālaparicchedaṃ vuṭṭhahi,
atk-s0503a:209_1: vuṭṭhahitvā ca pana tattha evaṃ nisinne bhagavati eko brāhmaṇo taṃ gantvā pañhaṃ
atk-s0503a:209_2: pucchi. Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho aññataro”tiādi. Tattha aññataroti nāmagottavasena anabhiññāto
atk-s0503a:209_3: apākaṭo eko. Huṃhuṅkajātikoti so kira diṭṭhamaṅgaliko mānathaddho mānavasena kodhavasena
atk-s0503a:209_4: ca sabbaṃ avokkhajātikaṃ passitvā jigucchanto “huṃhu”nti karonto vicarati, tasmā
atk-s0503a:210_0: Yena bhagavāti yassaṃ disāyaṃ bhagavā nisinno. Bhummatthe hi etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:210_1: Yena vā disābhāgena bhagavā upasaṅkamitabbo, tena disābhāgena upasaṅkami. Atha vā
atk-s0503a:210_2: yenāti hetuatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, yena kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo,
atk-s0503a:210_3: tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti attho. Kena ca kāraṇena bhagavā upasaṅkamitabbo? Nānappakārarogadukkhābhipīḷitattā
atk-s0503a:210_4: āturakāyehi mahājanehi mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya rogatikicchanatthaṃ, nānāvidhakilesabyādhipīḷitattā
atk-s0503a:210_6: bhagavā upasaṅkamitabbo. Tena ayampi brāhmaṇo attano kaṅkhaṃ chinditukāmo upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:211_0: Upasaṅkamitvāti upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpanaṃ. Atha vā yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upasaṅkami, tatopi
atk-s0503a:211_1: bhagavato samīpabhūtaṃ āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ upagantvāti attho. Sammodīti samaṃ sammā
atk-s0503a:211_2: vā modi, bhagavā cānena, sopi bhagavatā “kacci bhoto khamanīyaṃ kacci yāpanīya”ntiādinā
atk-s0503a:211_3: paṭisanthārakaraṇavasena samappavattamodo ahosi. Sammodanīyanti sammodanārahaṃ sammodajananayoggaṃ.
atk-s0503a:211_4: Kathanti kathāsallāpaṃ. Sāraṇīyanti saritabbayuttaṃ sādhujanehi pavattetabbaṃ, kālantare
atk-s0503a:211_5: vā cintetabbaṃ. Vītisāretvāti niṭṭhāpetvā. Ekamantanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso. Ekasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:211_6: ṭhāne, atisammukhādike cha nisajjadose vajjetvā ekasmiṃ padeseti attho. Etadavocāti
atk-s0503a:211_7: etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ “kittāvatā nu kho”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0503a:212_0: Tattha kittāvatāti kittakena pamāṇena. Nūti saṃsayatthe nipāto. Khoti padapūraṇe.
atk-s0503a:212_1: Bhoti brāhmaṇānaṃ jātisamudāgataṃ ālapanaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “bhovādi nāma so hoti,
atk-s0503a:212_2: sace hoti sakiñcano”ti. Gotamāti bhagavantaṃ gottena ālapati. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ brāhmaṇo
atk-s0503a:212_3: sampatisamāgato bhagavato gottaṃ jānātīti? Nāyaṃ sampatisamāgato, chabbassāni padhānakaraṇakāle
atk-s0503a:212_4: upaṭṭhahantehi pañcavaggiyehi saddhiṃ caramānopi, aparabhāge taṃ vataṃ chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0503a:212_5: uruvelāyaṃ senanigame eko adutiyo hutvā piṇḍāya caramānopi tena brāhmaṇena diṭṭhapubbo
atk-s0503a:212_6: ceva sallapitapubbo ca. Tena so pubbe pañcavaggiyehi gayhamānaṃ bhagavato gottaṃ
atk-s0503a:212_7: anussaranto, “bho gotamā”ti bhagavantaṃ gottena ālapati. Yato paṭṭhāya vā bhagavā
atk-s0503a:212_8: mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamanto anomanadītīre pabbajito, tato pabhuti “samaṇo gotamo”ti
atk-s0503a:212_9: cando viya sūriyo viya ca pākaṭo paññāto, na tassa gottajānane kāraṇaṃ gavesitabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:213_0: Brāhmaṇakaraṇāti brāhmaṇaṃ karontīti brāhmaṇakaraṇā, brāhmaṇabhāvakarāti attho. Ettha
atk-s0503a:213_1: ca kittāvatāti etena yehi dhammehi brāhmaṇo hoti, tesaṃ dhammānaṃ parimāṇaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0503a:213_2: Katame ca panāti iminā tesaṃ sarūpaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0503a:214_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tena puṭṭhassa pañhassa sikhāpattaṃ atthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:214_1: velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi, na pana tassa brāhmaṇassa dhammaṃ desesi. Kasmā? Dhammadesanāya
atk-s0503a:214_2: abhājanabhāvato. Tathā hi tassa brāhmaṇassa imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā na saccābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0503a:214_3: Yathā ca imassa, evaṃ upakassa ājīvakassa buddhaguṇappakāsanaṃ. Dhammacakkappavattanato
atk-s0503a:214_4: hi pubbabhāge bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ paresaṃ suṇantānampi tapussabhallikānaṃ saraṇadānaṃ
atk-s0503a:214_5: viya vāsanābhāgiyameva jātaṃ, na sekkhabhāgiyaṃ, na nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ. Esā hi dhammatāti.
atk-s0503a:215_0: Tattha yo brāhmaṇoti yo bāhitapāpadhammatāya brāhmaṇo, na diṭṭhamaṅgalikatāya huṃhuṅkārakasāvādipāpadhammayutto
atk-s0503a:215_1: hutvā kevalaṃ jātimattakena brahmaññaṃ paṭijānāti. So brāhmaṇo bāhitapāpadhammattā
atk-s0503a:215_3: yatatto, sīlasaṃyamena vā saṃyatacittatāya yatatto, catumaggañāṇasaṅkhātehi vedehi
atk-s0503a:215_4: antaṃ saṅkhārapariyosānaṃ nibbānaṃ, vedānaṃ vā antaṃ gatattā vedantagū. Maggabrahmacariyassa
atk-s0503a:215_5: vusitattā vusitabrahmacariyo, dhammena so brahmavādaṃ vadeyya “brāhmaṇo aha”nti etaṃ
atk-s0503a:215_6: vādaṃ dhammena ñāyena vadeyya. Yassa sakalalokasannivāsepi kuhiñci ekārammaṇepi rāgussado,
atk-s0503a:215_7: dosussado, mohussado, mānussado, diṭṭhussadoti ime ussadā natthi, anavasesaṃ pahīnāti attho.
atk-s0503a:218_0: 5. Pañcame sāvatthiyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Tañhi savatthassa nāma isino nivāsaṭṭhāne
atk-s0503a:218_1: māpitattā sāvatthīti vuccati, yathā kākandī, mākandīti. Evaṃ tāva akkharacintakā.
atk-s0503a:218_2: Aṭṭhakathācariyā pana bhaṇanti – yaṃkiñci manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ sabbamettha
atk-s0503a:218_3: atthīti sāvatthi. Satthasamāyoge ca kimettha bhaṇḍamatthīti pucchite sabbamatthītipi
atk-s0503a:221_0: Tassaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ, samīpatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Jetavaneti attano paccatthike
atk-s0503a:221_1: jinātīti jeto, raññā vā paccatthikajane jite jātoti jeto, maṅgalakamyatāya vā tassa
atk-s0503a:221_2: evaṃ nāmameva katanti jeto. Vanayatīti vanaṃ, attano sampattiyā sattānaṃ attani bhattiṃ
atk-s0503a:221_3: karoti uppādetīti attho. Vanuke iti vā vanaṃ, nānāvidhakusumagandhasammodamattakokilādivihaṅgavirutālāpehi
atk-s0503a:221_5: yācati viyāti attho. Jetassa vanaṃ jetavanaṃ. Tañhi jetena kumārena ropitaṃ saṃvaddhitaṃ
atk-s0503a:221_6: paripālitaṃ. Sova tassa sāmī ahosi, tasmā jetavananti vuccati, tasmiṃ jetavane.
atk-s0503a:222_0: Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmeti mātāpitūhi gahitanāmavasena sudatto nāma so mahāseṭṭhi,
atk-s0503a:222_1: sabbakāmasamiddhitāya pana vigatamalamaccheratāya karuṇādiguṇasamaṅgitāya ca niccakālaṃ
atk-s0503a:222_2: anāthānaṃ piṇḍaṃ deti, tasmā anāthapiṇḍikoti vuccati. Āramanti ettha pāṇino visesena
atk-s0503a:222_4: ca tato tato āgamma ramanti abhiramanti anukkaṇṭhitā hutvā vasantīti attho. Vuttappakārāya
atk-s0503a:222_5: vā sampattiyā tattha tattha gatepi attano abbhantaraṃyeva ānetvā rametīti ārāmo.
atk-s0503a:222_6: So hi anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā jetassa rājakumārassa hatthato aṭṭhārasahi hiraññakoṭīhi
atk-s0503a:222_7: koṭisanthārena kiṇitvā aṭṭhārasahi hiraññakoṭīhi senāsanāni kārāpetvā aṭṭhārasahi
atk-s0503a:222_8: hiraññakoṭīhi vihāramahaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā evaṃ catupaññāsahiraññakoṭipariccāgena buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0503a:222_9: saṅghassa niyyātito, tasmā “anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo”ti vuccati. Tasmiṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
atk-s0503a:223_2: āyatiṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanatthaṃ. Tattha hi dvārakoṭṭhakapāsādakaraṇavasena bhūmivikkayaladdhā
atk-s0503a:223_3: aṭṭhārasa hiraññakoṭiyo anekakoṭiagghanakā rukkhā ca jetassa pariccāgo, catupaññāsa
atk-s0503a:223_4: koṭiyo anāthapiṇḍikassa. Iti tesaṃ pariccāgaparikittanena “evaṃ puññakāmā puññāni
atk-s0503a:223_5: karontī”ti dassento dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko aññepi puññakāme tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjane niyojetīti.
atk-s0503a:224_0: Tattha siyā – yadi tāva bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati, “jetavane”ti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:224_1: Atha jetavane viharati, “sāvatthiya”nti na vattabbaṃ. Na hi sakkā ubhayattha ekaṃ
atk-s0503a:224_2: samayaṃ viharitunti. Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, nanu avocumhā “samīpatthe etaṃ
atk-s0503a:224_3: bhummavacana”nti. Tasmā yadidaṃ sāvatthiyā samīpe jetavanaṃ, tattha viharanto “sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:224_4: viharati jetavane”ti vutto. Gocaragāmanidassanatthaṃ hissa sāvatthivacanaṃ, pabbajitānurūpanivāsaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ sesavacananti.
atk-s0503a:225_0: Āyasmā ca sāriputtotiādīsu āyasmāti piyavacanaṃ. Casaddo samuccayattho. Rūpasāriyā
atk-s0503a:225_1: nāma brāhmaṇiyā puttoti sāriputto. Mahāmoggallānoti pūjāvacanaṃ. Guṇavisesehi mahanto
atk-s0503a:225_2: moggallānoti hi mahāmoggallāno. Revatoti khadiravanikarevato, na kaṅkhārevato. Ekasmiñhi
atk-s0503a:225_3: divase bhagavā rattasāṇiparikkhitto viya suvaṇṇayūpo, pavāḷadhajaparivārito viya
atk-s0503a:225_4: suvaṇṇapabbato, navutihaṃsasahassaparivārito viya dhataraṭṭho haṃsarājā, sattaratanasamujjalāya
atk-s0503a:225_5: caturaṅginiyā senāya parivārito viya cakkavatti rājā, mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto gaganamajjhe
atk-s0503a:225_6: candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya catunnaṃ parisānaṃ majjhe dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:225_7: samaye ime aggasāvakā mahāsāvakā ca bhagavato pāde vandanatthāya upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:226_0: Bhikkhū āmantesīti attānaṃ parivāretvā nisinnabhikkhū te āgacchante dassetvā abhāsi.
atk-s0503a:226_1: Bhagavā hi te āyasmante sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇasampanne paramena upasamena samannāgate
atk-s0503a:226_2: paramāya ākappasampattiyā yutte upasaṅkamante passitvā pasannamānaso tesaṃ guṇavisesaparikittanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:226_3: bhikkhū āmantesi “ete, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇā āgacchanti, ete, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇā āgacchantī”ti.
atk-s0503a:226_4: Pasādavasena etaṃ āmeḍitaṃ, pasaṃsāvasenātipi vattuṃ yuttaṃ. Evaṃ vutteti evaṃ bhagavatā
atk-s0503a:226_5: te āyasmante “brāhmaṇā”ti vutte. Aññataroti nāmagottena apākaṭo, tassaṃ parisāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:226_6: nisinno eko bhikkhu. Brāhmaṇajātikoti brāhmaṇakule jāto. So hi uḷārabhogā brāhmaṇamahāsālakulā
atk-s0503a:226_7: pabbajito. Tassa kira evaṃ ahosi “ime lokiyā ubhatosujātiyā brāhmaṇasikkhānipphattiyā
atk-s0503a:226_8: ca brāhmaṇo hoti, na aññathāti vadanti, bhagavā ca ete āyasmante brāhmaṇāti vadati,
atk-s0503a:226_9: handāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ brāhmaṇalakkhaṇaṃ puccheyya”nti etadatthameva hi bhagavā tadā
atk-s0503a:226_10: te there “brāhmaṇā”ti abhāsi. Brahmaṃ aṇatīti brāhmaṇoti hi jātibrāhmaṇānaṃ nibbacanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:226_11: Ariyā pana bāhitapāpatāya brāhmaṇā. Vuttañhetaṃ – “bāhitapāpoti brāhmaṇo, samacariyā
atk-s0503a:226_12: samaṇoti vuccatī”ti. Vakkhati ca “bāhitvā pāpake dhamme”ti.
atk-s0503a:227: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ brāhmaṇasaddassa paramatthato sikhāpattamatthaṃ jānitvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ paramatthabrāhmaṇabhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:228_0: Tattha bāhitvāti bahi katvā, attano santānato nīharitvā samucchedappahānavasena pajahitvāti
atk-s0503a:228_1: attho. Pāpake dhammeti lāmake dhamme, duccaritavasena tividhaduccaritadhamme, cittuppādavasena
atk-s0503a:228_3: anekabhedabhinne sabbepi akusaladhammeti attho. Ye caranti sadā satāti ye sativepullappattatāya
atk-s0503a:228_4: sabbakālaṃ rūpādīsu chasupi ārammaṇesu satatavihāravasena satā satimanto hutvā catūhi
atk-s0503a:228_5: iriyāpathehi caranti. Satiggahaṇeneva cettha sampajaññampi gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:228_6: Khīṇasaṃyojanāti catūhipi ariyamaggehi dasavidhassa saṃyojanassa samucchinnattā parikkhīṇasaṃyojanā.
atk-s0503a:228_7: Buddhāti catusaccasambodhena buddhā. Te ca pana sāvakabuddhā, paccekabuddhā, sammāsambuddhāti
atk-s0503a:228_8: tividhā, tesu idha sāvakabuddhā adhippetā. Te ve lokasmi brāhmaṇāti te seṭṭhatthena
atk-s0503a:228_9: brāhmaṇasaṅkhāte dhamme ariyāya jātiyā jātā, brāhmaṇabhūtassa vā bhagavato orasaputtāti
atk-s0503a:228_10: imasmiṃ sattaloke paramatthato brāhmaṇā nāma, na jātigottamattehi, na jaṭādhāraṇādimattena
atk-s0503a:228_11: vāti attho. Evaṃ imesu dvīsu suttesu brāhmaṇakarā dhammā arahattaṃ pāpetvā kathitā,
atk-s0503a:228_12: nānajjhāsayatāya pana sattānaṃ desanāvilāsena abhilāpanānattena desanānānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:231_0: 6. Chaṭṭhe rājagaheti evaṃnāmake nagare. Tañhi mahāmandhātumahāgovindādīhi pariggahitattā
atk-s0503a:231_2: aññenettha pakārena vaṇṇayanti. Kintehi? Nāmametaṃ tassa nagarassa. Taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle
atk-s0503a:231_3: cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hoti, sesakāle suññaṃ yakkhapariggahitaṃ tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:231_4: hutvā tiṭṭhati. Veḷuvane kalandakanivāpeti veḷuvananti tassa vihārassa nāmaṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0503a:231_5: kira aṭṭhārasahatthubbedhena pākārena parikkhittaṃ buddhassa bhagavato vasanānucchavikāya
atk-s0503a:231_7: bahi veḷūhi parikkhittaṃ ahosi nīlobhāsaṃ manoramaṃ, tena “veḷuvana”nti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:231_8: Kalandakānañcettha nivāpaṃ adaṃsu, tasmā “kalandakanivāpo”ti vuccati. Pubbe kira
atk-s0503a:231_9: aññataro rājā taṃ uyyānaṃ kīḷanatthaṃ paviṭṭho surāmadamatto divāseyyaṃ upagato supi,
atk-s0503a:231_10: parijanopissa “sutto rājā”ti pupphaphalādīhi palobhiyamāno ito cito ca pakkāmi. Atha
atk-s0503a:231_11: surāgandhena aññatarasmā rukkhasusirā kaṇhasappo nikkhamitvā rañño abhimukho āgacchati.
atk-s0503a:231_12: Taṃ disvā rukkhadevatā “rañño jīvitaṃ dassāmī”ti kalandakavesena gantvā kaṇṇamūle
atk-s0503a:231_13: saddamakāsi. Rājā paṭibujjhi, kaṇhasappo nivatto. So taṃ disvā “imāya kāḷakāya mama
atk-s0503a:231_14: jīvitaṃ dinna”nti kāḷakānaṃ nivāpaṃ tattha paṭṭhapesi, abhayaghosañca ghosāpesi.
atk-s0503a:231_15: Tasmā tato paṭṭhāya taṃ “kalandakanivāpa”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ. Kalandakāti hi kāḷakānaṃ
atk-s0503a:232_0: Mahākassapoti mahantehi sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgatattā mahanto kassapoti mahākassapo,
atk-s0503a:232_1: apica kumārakassapattheraṃ upādāya ayaṃ mahāthero “mahākassapo”ti vuccati. Pippaliguhāyanti
atk-s0503a:232_2: tassā kira guhāya dvārasamīpe eko pippalirukkho ahosi, tena sā “pippaliguhā”ti paññāyittha.
atk-s0503a:232_3: Tassaṃ pippaliguhāyaṃ. Ābādhikoti ābādho assa atthīti ābādhiko, byādhikoti attho.
atk-s0503a:232_4: Dukkhitoti kāyasannissitaṃ dukkhaṃ sañjātaṃ assāti dukkhito, dukkhappattoti attho.
atk-s0503a:232_5: Bāḷhagilānoti adhimattagelañño, taṃ pana gelaññaṃ sato sampajāno hutvā adhivāsesi.
atk-s0503a:232_6: Athassa bhagavā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā tattha gantvā bojjhaṅgaparittaṃ abhāsi, teneva
atk-s0503a:232_7: therassa so ābādho vūpasami. Vuttañhetaṃ bojjhaṅgasaṃyutte –
atk-s0503a:233_0: “Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahākassapo pippaliguhāyaṃ viharati ābādhiko dukkhito
atk-s0503a:233_1: bāḷhagilāno. Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahākassapo
atk-s0503a:233_2: tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Nisajja kho bhagavā…pe… etadavoca
atk-s0503a:233_3: – ‘kacci te, kassapa, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti,
atk-s0503a:233_4: no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamo’ti? ‘Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:233_5: na yāpanīyaṃ, bāḷhā me bhante, dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti, abhikkamosānaṃ
atk-s0503a:234_0: “‘Sattime, kassapa, bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya
atk-s0503a:234_1: nibbānāya saṃvattanti. Katame satta? Satisambojjhaṅgo kho, kassapa, mayā sammadakkhāto
atk-s0503a:234_2: bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati…pe… upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo
atk-s0503a:234_3: kho, kassapa, mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito bahulīkato abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya
atk-s0503a:234_4: saṃvattati. Ime kho, kassapa, satta bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahūlīkatā
atk-s0503a:234_5: abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī’ti. ‘Taggha bhagavā bojjhaṅgā, taggha,
atk-s0503a:235: “Idamavoca bhagavā. Attamano āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi. Vuṭṭhahi cāyasmā mahākassapo tamhā ābādhā, tathā pahīno cāyasmato mahākassapassa so ābādho ahosī”ti.
atk-s0503a:236: Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo aparena samayena tamhā ābādhā vuṭṭhāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:237_0: Etadahosīti pubbe gelaññadivasesu saddhivihārikehi upanītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0503a:237_1: vihāre eva ahosi. Athassa tamhā ābādhā vuṭṭhitassa etaṃ “yaṃnūnāhaṃ rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0503a:237_2: paviseyya”nti parivitakko ahosi. Pañcamattāni devatāsatānīti sakkassa devarañño paricārikā
atk-s0503a:237_3: pañcasatā kakuṭapādiniyo accharāyo. Ussukkaṃ āpannāni hontīti therassa piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0503a:237_4: dassāmāti pañcapiṇḍapātasatāni sajjetvā suvaṇṇabhājanehi ādāya antarāmagge ṭhatvā,
atk-s0503a:237_5: “bhante, imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gaṇhatha, saṅgahaṃ no karothā”ti vadamānā piṇḍapātadāne
atk-s0503a:237_6: yuttappayuttāni honti. Tena vuttaṃ “āyasmato mahākassapassa piṇḍapātappaṭilābhāyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:238_0: Sakko kira devarājā therassa cittappavattiṃ ñatvā tā accharāyo uyyojesi “gacchatha
atk-s0503a:238_1: tumhe ayyassa mahākassapattherassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā attano patiṭṭhaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0503a:238_2: Evaṃ hissa ahosi “imāsu sabbāsu gatāsu kadāci ekissāpi hatthato piṇḍapātaṃ thero
atk-s0503a:238_3: paṭiggaṇheyya, taṃ tassā bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti. Paṭikkhipi thero,
atk-s0503a:238_4: “bhante, mayhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gaṇhatha, mayhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadantiyo “gacchatha
atk-s0503a:238_5: tumhe katapuññā mahābhogā, ahaṃ duggatānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0503a:238_6: mā no nāsetha, saṅgahaṃ no karothā”ti vadantiyo punapi paṭikkhipitvā punapi apagantuṃ
atk-s0503a:238_7: anicchamānā yācantiyo “na attano pamāṇaṃ jānātha, apagacchathā”ti vatvā accharaṃ
atk-s0503a:238_8: pahari. Tā therassa accharāsaddaṃ sutvā santajjitā ṭhātuṃ asakkontiyo palāyitvā devalokameva
atk-s0503a:239_0: Pubbaṇhasamayanti pubbaṇhe ekaṃ samayaṃ, ekasmiṃ kāle. Nivāsetvāti vihāranivāsanaparivattanavasena
atk-s0503a:239_1: nivāsanaṃ daḷhaṃ nivāsetvā. Pattacīvaramādāyāti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ hatthena
atk-s0503a:239_2: gahetvā. Piṇḍāya pāvisīti piṇḍapātatthāya pāvisi. Daliddavisikhāti duggatamanussānaṃ
atk-s0503a:239_3: vasanokāso. Kapaṇavisikhāti bhogapārijuññappattiyā dīnamanussānaṃ vāso. Pesakāravisikhāti
atk-s0503a:239_4: tantavāyavāso. Addasā kho bhagavāti kathaṃ addasa? “Ābādhā vuṭṭhito mama putto kassapo
atk-s0503a:239_5: kinnu kho karotī”ti āvajjento veḷuvane nisinno eva bhagavā dibbacakkhunā addasa.
atk-s0503a:240_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yāyaṃ āyasmato mahākassapassa pañcahi accharāsatehi upanītaṃ
atk-s0503a:240_2: vuttā, etamatthaṃ jānitvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ paramappicchatādassanamukhena khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0503a:241_0: Tattha anaññaposinti aññaṃ posetīti aññaposī, na aññaposī anaññaposī, attanā posetabbassa
atk-s0503a:241_1: aññassa abhāvena adutiyo, ekakoti attho. Tena therassa subharataṃ dasseti. Thero
atk-s0503a:241_2: hi kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena ca piṇḍapātena attānameva posento
atk-s0503a:241_3: paramappiccho hutvā viharati, aññaṃ ñātimittādīsu kañci na poseti katthaci alaggabhāvato.
atk-s0503a:241_4: Atha vā aññena aññatarena posetabbatāya abhāvato anaññaposī. Yo hi ekasmiṃyeva paccayadāyake
atk-s0503a:241_5: paṭibaddhacatupaccayo so anaññaposī nāma na hoti ekāyattavuttito. Thero pana “yathāpi
atk-s0503a:241_6: bhamaro puppha”nti gāthāya vuttanayena jaṅghābalaṃ nissāya piṇḍāya caranto kulesu
atk-s0503a:241_7: niccanavo hutvā missakabhattena yāpeti. Tathā hi naṃ bhagavā candūpamappaṭipadāya
atk-s0503a:241_8: thomesi. Aññātanti abhiññātaṃ, yathābhuccaguṇehi patthaṭayasaṃ, teneva vā anaññaposibhāvena
atk-s0503a:241_9: appicchatāsantuṭṭhitāhi ñātaṃ. Atha vā aññātanti sabbaso pahīnataṇhatāya lābhasakkārasilokanikāmanahetu
atk-s0503a:241_10: attānaṃ jānāpanavasena na ñātaṃ. Avītataṇho hi pāpiccho kuhakatāya sambhāvanādhippāyena
atk-s0503a:241_11: attānaṃ jānāpeti. Dantanti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena indriyesu uttamadamanena dantaṃ.
atk-s0503a:241_12: Sāre patiṭṭhitanti vimuttisāre avaṭṭhitaṃ, asekkhasīlakkhandhādike vā sīlādisāre
atk-s0503a:241_13: patiṭṭhitaṃ. Khīṇāsavaṃ vantadosanti kāmāsavādīnaṃ catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ anavasesaṃ pahīnattā
atk-s0503a:241_14: khīṇāsavaṃ. Tato eva rāgādidosānaṃ sabbaso vantattā vantadosaṃ. Tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇanti
atk-s0503a:241_15: taṃ yathāvuttaguṇaṃ paramatthabrāhmaṇaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇanti vadāmīti. Idhāpi heṭṭhā
atk-s0503a:244_0: 7. Sattame pāvāyanti evaṃnāmake mallarājūnaṃ nagare. Ajakalāpake cetiyeti ajakalāpakena
atk-s0503a:244_1: nāma yakkhena pariggahitattā “ajakalāpaka”nti laddhanāme manussānaṃ cittīkataṭṭhāne.
atk-s0503a:244_2: So kira yakkho aje kalāpe katvā bandhanena ajakoṭṭhāsena saddhiṃ baliṃ paṭicchati,
atk-s0503a:244_3: na aññathā, tasmā “ajakalāpako”ti paññāyittha. Keci panāhu – ajake viya satte lāpetīti
atk-s0503a:244_4: ajakalāpakoti. Tassa kira sattā baliṃ upanetvā yadā ajasaddaṃ katvā baliṃ upaharanti,
atk-s0503a:244_5: tadā so tussati, tasmā “ajakalāpako”ti vuccatīti. So pana yakkho ānubhāvasampanno
atk-s0503a:244_6: kakkhaḷo pharuso tattha ca sannihito, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ manussā cittiṃ karonti, kālena
atk-s0503a:244_7: kālaṃ baliṃ upaharanti. Tena vuttaṃ “ajakalāpake cetiye”ti. Ajakalāpakassa yakkhassa
atk-s0503a:245_0: Tadā kira satthā taṃ yakkhaṃ dametukāmo sāyanhasamaye eko adutiyo pattacīvaraṃ ādāya
atk-s0503a:245_1: ajakalāpakassa yakkhassa bhavanadvāraṃ gantvā tassa dovārikaṃ bhavanapavisanatthāya
atk-s0503a:245_2: yāci. So “kakkhaḷo, bhante, ajakalāpako yakkho, samaṇoti vā brāhmaṇoti vā gāravaṃ
atk-s0503a:245_3: na karoti, tasmā tumhe eva jānātha, mayhaṃ pana tassa anārocanaṃ na yutta”nti tāvadeva
atk-s0503a:245_4: yakkhasamāgamaṃ gatassa ajakalāpakassa santikaṃ vātavegena agamāsi. Satthā antobhavanaṃ
atk-s0503a:245_5: pavisitvā ajakalāpakassa nisīdanamaṇḍape paññattāsane nisīdi. Yakkhassa orodhā satthāraṃ
atk-s0503a:245_6: upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Satthā tāsaṃ kālayuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0503a:245_7: kathesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “pāvāyaṃ viharati ajakalāpake cetiye ajakalāpakassa yakkhassa bhavane”ti.
atk-s0503a:246_0: Tasmiṃ samaye sātāgirahemavatā ajakalāpakassa bhavanamatthakena yakkhasamāgamaṃ gacchantā
atk-s0503a:246_1: attano gamane asampajjamāne “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti āvajjentā satthāraṃ ajakalāpakassa
atk-s0503a:246_2: bhavane nisinnaṃ disvā tattha gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “mayaṃ, bhante, yakkhasamāgamaṃ
atk-s0503a:246_3: gamissāmā”ti āpucchitvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gatā yakkhasannipāte ajakalāpakaṃ disvā
atk-s0503a:246_4: tuṭṭhiṃ pavedayiṃsu “lābhā te, āvuso, ajakalāpaka, yassa te bhavane sadevake loke
atk-s0503a:246_5: aggapuggalo bhagavā nisinno, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ payirupāsassu, dhammañca suṇāhī”ti.
atk-s0503a:246_6: So tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ime tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa mama bhavane nisinnabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:246_7: kathentī”ti kodhābhibhūto hutvā “ajja mayhaṃ tena samaṇena saddhiṃ saṅgāmo bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0503a:246_8: cintetvā yakkhasannipātato uṭṭhahitvā dakkhiṇaṃ pādaṃ ukkhipitvā saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ
atk-s0503a:246_9: pabbatakūṭaṃ akkami, taṃ bhijjitvā dvidhā ahosi. Sesaṃ ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ āḷavakasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:247_0: Ajakalāpakassa samāgamo hi āḷavakasamāgamasadisova ṭhapetvā pañhakaraṇaṃ vissajjanaṃ
atk-s0503a:247_1: bhavanato tikkhattuṃ nikkhamanaṃ pavesanañca. Ajakalāpako hi āgacchantoyeva “etehiyeva
atk-s0503a:247_2: taṃ samaṇaṃ palāpessāmī”ti vātamaṇḍalādike navavasse samuṭṭhāpetvā tehi bhagavato
atk-s0503a:247_3: calanamattampi kātuṃ asakkonto nānāvidhappaharaṇahatthe ativiya bhayānakarūpe bhūtagaṇe
atk-s0503a:247_4: nimminitvā tehi saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā antanteneva caranto sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0503a:247_5: nānappakāraṃ vippakāraṃ katvāpi bhagavato kiñci kesaggamattampi nisinnaṭṭhānato calanaṃ
atk-s0503a:247_6: kātuṃ nāsakkhi. Kevalaṃ pana “ayaṃ samaṇo maṃ anāpucchā mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0503a:247_7: nisīdatī”ti kodhavasena pajjali. Athassa bhagavā cittappavattiṃ ñatvā “seyyathāpi
atk-s0503a:247_8: nāma caṇḍassa kukkurassa nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyya, evaṃ so bhiyyosomattāya caṇḍataro
atk-s0503a:247_9: assa, evamevāyaṃ yakkho mayi idha nisinne cittaṃ padūseti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ bahi nikkhameyya”nti
atk-s0503a:247_10: sayameva bhavanato nikkhamitvā abbhokāse nisīdi. Tena vuttaṃ – “tena kho pana samayena
atk-s0503a:248_1: bahalandhakāreti attho. Caturaṅgasamannāgato kira tadā andhakāro pavattīti. Devoti
atk-s0503a:248_2: megho ekamekaṃ phusitakaṃ udakabinduṃ pāteti. Atha yakkho “iminā saddena tāsetvā
atk-s0503a:248_3: imaṃ samaṇaṃ palāpessāmī”ti bhagavato samīpaṃ gantvā “akkulo”tiādinā taṃ bhiṃsanaṃ
atk-s0503a:248_4: akāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho ajakalāpako”tiādi. Tattha bhayanti cittutrāsaṃ, chambhitattanti
atk-s0503a:248_5: ūrutthambhakasarīrassa chambhitabhāvaṃ. Lomahaṃsanti lomānaṃ pahaṭṭhabhāvaṃ, tīhipi
atk-s0503a:248_6: padehi bhayuppattimeva dasseti. Upasaṅkamīti kasmā panāyaṃ evamadhippāyo upasaṅkami,
atk-s0503a:248_7: nanu pubbe attanā kātabbaṃ vippakāraṃ akāsīti? Saccamakāsi, taṃ panesa “antobhavane
atk-s0503a:248_8: khemaṭṭhāne thirabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa na kiñci kātuṃ asakkhi, idāni bahi ṭhitaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0503a:248_9: bhiṃsāpetvā palāpetuṃ sakkā”ti maññamāno upasaṅkami. Ayañhi yakkho attano bhavanaṃ
atk-s0503a:248_10: “thirabhūmī”ti maññati, “tattha ṭhitattā ayaṃ samaṇo na bhāyatī”ti ca.
atk-s0503a:249_0: Tikkhattuṃ “akkulo pakkulo”ti akkulapakkulikaṃ akāsīti tayo vāre “akkulo pakkulo”ti
atk-s0503a:249_1: bhiṃsāpetukāmatāya evarūpaṃ saddaṃ akāsi. Anukaraṇasaddo hi ayaṃ. Tadā hi so yakkho
atk-s0503a:249_2: sineruṃ ukkhipanto viya mahāpathaviṃ parivattento viya ca mahatā ussāhena asanisatasaddasaṅghāṭaṃ
atk-s0503a:249_3: viya ekasmiṃ ṭhāne puñjīkataṃ hutvā viniccharantaṃ disāgajānaṃ hatthigajjitaṃ, kesarasīhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:249_4: sīhaninnādaṃ, yakkhānaṃ hiṃkārasaddaṃ, bhūtānaṃ aṭṭahāsaṃ, asurānaṃ apphoṭanaghosaṃ,
atk-s0503a:249_5: indassa devarañño vajiranigghātanigghosaṃ, attano gambhīratāya vipphārikatāya bhayānakatāya
atk-s0503a:249_6: ca avasesasaddaṃ avahasantamiva abhibhavantamiva ca kappavuṭṭhānamahāvātamaṇḍalikāya
atk-s0503a:249_7: vinigghosaṃ puthujjanānaṃ hadayaṃ phālentaṃ viya mahantaṃ paṭibhayanigghosaṃ abyattakkharaṃ
atk-s0503a:249_8: tikkhattuṃ attano yakkhagajjitaṃ gajji “etena imaṃ samaṇaṃ bhiṃsāpetvā palāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:249_9: Yaṃ yaṃ niccharati, tena tena pabbatā papaṭikaṃ muñciṃsu, vanappatijeṭṭhake upādāya
atk-s0503a:249_11: himavantapabbatarājā saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, bhummadevatā ādiṃ katvā yebhuyyena
atk-s0503a:249_12: devatānampi ahudeva bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso, pageva manussānaṃ. Aññesañca
atk-s0503a:249_13: apadadvipadacatuppadānaṃ mahāpathaviyā undriyanakālo viya mahatī vibhiṃsanakā ahosi,
atk-s0503a:249_14: sakalasmiṃ jambudīpatale mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ udapādi. Bhagavā pana taṃ saddaṃ “kimī”ti
atk-s0503a:249_15: amaññamāno niccalo nisīdi, “mā kassaci iminā antarāyo hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:250_0: Yasmā pana so saddo “akkula pakkula” iti iminā ākārena sattānaṃ sotapathaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0503a:250_1: tasmā tassa anukaraṇavasena “akkulo pakkulo”ti, yakkhassa ca tassaṃ nigghosanicchāraṇāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:250_2: akkulapakkulakaraṇaṃ atthīti katvā “akkulapakkulikaṃ akāsī”ti saṅgahaṃ āropayiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:250_3: Keci pana “ākulabyākula iti padadvayassa pariyāyābhidhānavasena akkulo bakkuloti
atk-s0503a:250_4: ayaṃ saddo vutto”ti vadanti yathā “ekaṃ ekaka”nti. Yasmā ekavāraṃ jāto paṭhamuppattivaseneva
atk-s0503a:250_5: nibbattattā ākuloti ādiattho ākāro, tassa ca kakārāgamaṃ katvā rassattaṃ katanti.
atk-s0503a:250_6: Dve vāre pana jāto bakkulo, kulasaddo cettha jātipariyāyo kolaṃkolotiādīsu viya.
atk-s0503a:250_7: Vuttaadhippāyānuvidhāyī ca saddappayogoti paṭhamena padena jalābujasīhabyagghādayo,
atk-s0503a:250_8: dutiyena aṇḍajaāsīvisakaṇhasappādayo vuccanti, tasmā sīhādiko viya āsīvisādiko viya
atk-s0503a:250_9: ca “ahaṃ te jīvitahārako”ti imaṃ atthaṃ yakkho padadvayena dassetīti aññe. Apare
atk-s0503a:250_10: pana “akkhulo bhakkhulo”ti pāḷiṃ vatvā “akkhetuṃ khepetuṃ vināsetuṃ ulati pavattetīti
atk-s0503a:250_11: akkhulo, bhakkhituṃ khādituṃ ulatīti bhakkhulo. Ko paneso? Yakkharakkhasapisācasīhabyagghādīsu
atk-s0503a:250_12: aññataro yo koci manussānaṃ anatthāvaho”ti tassa atthaṃ vadanti. Idhāpi pubbe vuttanayeneva
atk-s0503a:251: Eso te, samaṇa, pisācoti “ambho, samaṇa, tava pisitāsano pisāco upaṭṭhito”ti mahantaṃ bheravarūpaṃ abhinimminitvā bhagavato purato ṭhatvā attānaṃ sandhāya yakkho vadati.
atk-s0503a:252_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tena yakkhena kāyavācāhi pavattiyamānaṃ vippakāraṃ. Tena
atk-s0503a:252_1: ca attano anabhibhavanīyassa hetubhūtaṃ lokadhammesu nirupakkilesataṃ sabbākārato
atk-s0503a:252_2: viditvā. Tāyaṃ velāyanti tassaṃ vippakārakaraṇavelāyaṃ. Imaṃ udānanti taṃ vippakāraṃ
atk-s0503a:252_3: agaṇetvā assa agaṇanahetubhūtaṃ dhammānubhāvadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:253_0: Tattha yadā sakesu dhammesūti yasmiṃ kāle sakaattabhāvasaṅkhātesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhadhammesu.
atk-s0503a:253_1: Pāragūti pariññābhisamayapāripūrivasena pāraṅgato, tatoyeva tesaṃ hetubhūte samudaye,
atk-s0503a:253_3: pāragato. Hoti brāhmaṇoti evaṃ sabbaso bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇo nāma hoti, sabbaso
atk-s0503a:253_5: kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca lokasamudayañca paññapemī”tiādi. Atha vā sakesu
atk-s0503a:253_6: dhammesūti attano dhammesu, attano dhammā nāma atthakāmassa puggalassa sīlādidhammā.
atk-s0503a:253_8: attano dhammā nāma, na anatthāvahā saṃkilesadhammā viya asakadhammā. Pāragūti tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:254_0: Tattha sīlaṃ tāva lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhaṃ. Tesu lokiyaṃ pubbabhāgasīlaṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0503a:254_1: saṅkhepato pātimokkhasaṃvarādivasena catubbidhaṃ, vitthārato pana anekappabhedaṃ.
atk-s0503a:254_2: Lokuttaraṃ maggaphalavasena duvidhaṃ, atthato sammāvācāsammākammantasammāājīvā. Yathā
atk-s0503a:254_3: ca sīlaṃ, tathā samādhipaññā ca lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhā. Tattha lokiyasamādhi
atk-s0503a:254_4: saha upacārena aṭṭha samāpattiyo, lokuttarasamādhi maggapariyāpanno. Paññāpi lokiyā
atk-s0503a:254_5: sutamayā, cintāmayā, bhāvanāmayā ca sāsavā, lokuttarā pana maggasampayuttā phalasampayuttā
atk-s0503a:254_6: ca. Vimutti nāma phalavimutti nibbānañca, tasmā sā lokuttarāva. Vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:254_7: lokiyameva, taṃ ekūnavīsatividhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇabhāvato. Evaṃ etesaṃ sīlādidhammānaṃ
atk-s0503a:254_8: attano santāne arahattaphalādhigamena anavasesato nibbattapāripūriyā pāraṃ pariyantaṃ
atk-s0503a:255_0: Atha vā sotāpattiphalādhigamena sīlasmiṃ pāragū. So hi “sīlesu paripūrakārī”ti vutto,
atk-s0503a:255_1: sotāpannaggahaṇeneva cettha sakadāgāmīpi gahito hoti. Anāgāmiphalādhigamena samādhismiṃ
atk-s0503a:255_2: pāragū. So hi “samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī”ti vutto. Arahattaphalādhigamena itaresu
atk-s0503a:255_3: tīsu pāragū. Arahā hi paññāvepullappattiyā aggabhūtāya akuppāya cetovimuttiyā adhigatattā
atk-s0503a:255_5: nāma hoti. Evaṃ sabbathāpi catūsu ariyasaccesu catumaggavasena pariññādisoḷasavidhāya
atk-s0503a:255_6: kiccanipphattiyā yathāvuttesu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle sakesu dhammesu pāragato.
atk-s0503a:256_0: Hoti brāhmaṇoti tadā so bāhitapāpadhammatāya paramatthabrāhmaṇo hoti. Atha etaṃ pisācañca,
atk-s0503a:256_1: pakkulañcātivattatīti tato yathāvuttapāragamanato atha pacchā, ajakalāpaka, etaṃ
atk-s0503a:256_2: tayā dassitaṃ pisitāsanatthamāgataṃ pisācaṃ bhayajananatthaṃ samuṭṭhāpitaṃ akkulapakkulikañca
atk-s0503a:256_3: ativattati, atikkamati, abhibhavati, taṃ na bhāyatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:257_0: Ayampi gāthā arahattameva ullapitvā kathitā. Atha ajakalāpako attanā katena tathārūpenapi
atk-s0503a:257_1: paṭibhayarūpena vibhiṃsanena akampanīyassa bhagavato taṃ tādibhāvaṃ disvā “aho acchariyamanussovatāya”nti
atk-s0503a:257_2: pasannamānaso pothujjanikāya saddhāya attani niviṭṭhabhāvaṃ vibhāvento satthu sammukhā
atk-s0503a:260_0: 8. Aṭṭhame saṅgāmajīti evaṃnāmo. Ayañhi āyasmā sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa mahāvibhavassa
atk-s0503a:260_1: seṭṭhino putto, vayappattakāle mātāpitūhi patirūpena dārena niyojetvā sāpateyyaṃ
atk-s0503a:260_2: niyyātetvā gharabandhanena baddho hoti. So ekadivasaṃ sāvatthivāsino upāsake pubbaṇhasamayaṃ
atk-s0503a:260_3: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā sāyanhasamaye suddhavatthe suddhuttarāsaṅge gandhamālādihatthe
atk-s0503a:260_4: dhammassavanatthaṃ jetavanābhimukhe gacchante disvā “kattha tumhe gacchathā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0503a:260_5: “dhammassavanatthaṃ jetavane satthu santika”nti vutte “tena hi ahampi gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0503a:260_6: tehi saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ agamāsi. Tena ca samayena bhagavā kañcanaguhāyaṃ sīhanādaṃ
atk-s0503a:260_7: nadanto kesarasīho viya saddhammamaṇḍape paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīditvā catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0503a:261_0: Atha kho te upāsakā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu, saṅgāmajipi kulaputto
atk-s0503a:261_1: tassā parisāya pariyante dhammaṃ suṇanto nisīdi. Bhagavā anupubbikathaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0503a:261_2: cattāri saccāni pakāsesi, saccapariyosāne anekesaṃ pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0503a:261_3: ahosi. Saṅgāmajipi kulaputto sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā parisāya vuṭṭhitāya bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:261_4: upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāci “pabbājetha maṃ bhagavā”ti. “Anuññātosi pana
atk-s0503a:261_5: tvaṃ mātāpitūhi pabbajjāyā”ti? “Nāhaṃ, bhante, anuññāto”ti. “Na kho, saṅgāmaji, tathāgatā
atk-s0503a:261_6: mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ pabbājentī”ti. “Sohaṃ, bhante, tathā karissāmi, yathā
atk-s0503a:261_7: maṃ mātāpitaro pabbajituṃ anujānantī”ti. So bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0503a:261_8: mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā, “ammatātā, anujānātha maṃ pabbajitu”nti āha. Tato paraṃ
atk-s0503a:262_0: Atha so “pabbajitvā attānaṃ dassessāmī”ti paṭiññaṃ datvā anuññāto mātāpitūhi bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:262_1: upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Alattha kho ca bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca,
atk-s0503a:262_2: acirūpasampanno ca pana so uparimaggatthāya ghaṭento vāyamanto aññatarasmiṃ araññāvāse
atk-s0503a:262_3: vassaṃ vasitvā chaḷabhiñño hutvā vutthavasso bhagavantaṃ dassanāya mātāpitūnañca
atk-s0503a:262_4: paṭissavamocanatthaṃ sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā
atk-s0503a:263_0: So hāyasmā dhuragāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto jetavanaṃ
atk-s0503a:263_1: pavisitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ katapaṭisanthāro aññaṃ byākaritvā
atk-s0503a:263_2: puna bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā nikkhamitvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ
atk-s0503a:263_3: nisīdi. Athassa mātāpitaro ñātimittā cassa āgamanaṃ sutvā, “saṅgāmaji, kira idhāgato”ti
atk-s0503a:263_4: haṭṭhatuṭṭhā turitaturitā vihāraṃ gantvā pariyesantā naṃ tattha nisinnaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0503a:263_5: paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “mā aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājāno hareyyuṃ, appiyā dāyādā vā gaṇheyyuṃ,
atk-s0503a:263_6: nālaṃ pabbajjāya, ehi, tāta, vibbhamā”ti yāciṃsu. Taṃ sutvā thero “ime mayhaṃ kāmehi
atk-s0503a:263_7: anatthikabhāvaṃ na jānanti, gūthadhārī viya gūthapiṇḍe kāmesuyeva allīyanaṃ icchanti,
atk-s0503a:263_8: nayime sakkā dhammakathāya saññāpetu”nti assuṇanto viya nisīdi. Te nānappakāraṃ yācitvā
atk-s0503a:263_9: attano vacanaṃ aggaṇhantaṃ disvā gharaṃ pavisitvā puttena saddhiṃ tassa bhariyaṃ
atk-s0503a:263_10: saparivāraṃ uyyojesuṃ “mayaṃ nānappakāraṃ taṃ yācantāpi tassa manaṃ alabhitvā āgatā,
atk-s0503a:263_11: gaccha tvaṃ, bhadde, tava bhattāraṃ puttasandassanena yācitvā saññāpehī”ti. Tāya
atk-s0503a:263_12: kira āpannasattāya ayamāyasmā pabbajito. Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā dārakamādāya
atk-s0503a:263_13: mahatā parivārena jetavanaṃ agamāsi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “assosi kho āyasmato saṅgāmajissā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:264_0: Tattha purāṇadutiyikāti pubbe gihikāle pādaparicaraṇavasena dutiyikā, bhariyāti attho.
atk-s0503a:264_1: Ayyoti “ayyaputto”ti vattabbe pabbajitānaṃ anucchavikavohārena vadati. Kirāti anussavanatthe
atk-s0503a:264_2: nipāto, tassa anuppatto kirāti sambandho veditabbo. Khuddaputtañhi samaṇa, posa manti
atk-s0503a:264_3: āpannasattameva maṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajito, sāhaṃ etarahi khuddaputtā, tādisaṃ maṃ chaḍḍetvāva
atk-s0503a:264_4: tava samaṇadhammakaraṇaṃ ayuttaṃ, tasmā, samaṇa, puttadutiyaṃ maṃ ghāsacchādanādīhi
atk-s0503a:264_5: bharassūti. Āyasmā pana, saṅgāmaji, indriyāni ukkhipitvā taṃ neva oloketi, nāpi ālapati.
atk-s0503a:264_6: Tena vuttaṃ – “evaṃ vutte āyasmā saṅgāmaji tuṇhī ahosī”ti.
atk-s0503a:265_0: Sā tikkhattuṃ tatheva vatvā tuṇhībhūtameva taṃ disvā “purisā nāma bhariyāsu nirapekkhāpi
atk-s0503a:265_1: puttesu sāpekkhā honti, puttasineho pitu aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati, tasmā puttapemenāpi
atk-s0503a:265_2: mayhaṃ vase vatteyyā”ti maññamānā puttaṃ therassa aṅke nikkhipitvā ekamantaṃ apakkamma
atk-s0503a:265_3: “eso te, samaṇa, putto, posa na”nti vatvā thokaṃ agamāsi. Sā kira samaṇatejenassa
atk-s0503a:265_4: sammukhe ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi. Thero dārakampi neva oloketi nāpi ālapati. Atha sā itthī
atk-s0503a:265_5: avidūre ṭhatvā mukhaṃ parivattetvā olokentī therassa ākāraṃ ñatvā paṭinivattitvā
atk-s0503a:265_6: “puttenapi ayaṃ samaṇo anatthiko”ti dārakaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha
atk-s0503a:266_0: Tattha puttenapīti ayaṃ samaṇo attano orasaputtenapi anatthiko, pageva aññehīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:266_1: Dibbenāti ettha dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ. Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi
atk-s0503a:266_2: apalibuddhaṃ dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu hoti. Idampi
atk-s0503a:266_3: catutthajjhānasamādhinibbattaṃ abhiññācakkhuṃ tādisanti dibbaṃ viyāti dibbaṃ, dibbavihārasannissayena
atk-s0503a:266_4: laddhattā vā dibbaṃ, mahājutikattā mahāgatikattā vā dibbaṃ, tena dibbena. Visuddhenāti
atk-s0503a:266_6: Imaṃ evarūpaṃ vippakāranti imaṃ evaṃ vippakāraṃ yathāvuttaṃ pabbajitesu asāruppaṃ
atk-s0503a:267_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ āyasmato saṅgāmajissa puttadārādīsu sabbattha nirapekkhabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:267_1: atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ tassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:268_0: Tattha āyantinti āgacchantiṃ, purāṇadutiyikanti adhippāyo. Nābhinandatīti daṭṭhuṃ
atk-s0503a:268_1: maṃ āgatāti na nandati na tussati. Pakkamantinti sā ayaṃ mayā asammoditāva gacchatīti
atk-s0503a:268_2: gacchantiṃ. Na socatīti na cittasantāpamāpajjati. Yena pana kāraṇena thero evaṃ nābhinandati
atk-s0503a:268_3: na socati, taṃ dassetuṃ “saṅgā saṅgāmajiṃ mutta”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha saṅgāti rāgasaṅgo
atk-s0503a:268_5: saṅgāmajiṃ bhikkhuṃ. Tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇanti taṃ tādibhāvappattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ ahaṃ
atk-s0503a:271_0: 9. Navame gayāyanti ettha gayāti gāmopi titthampi vuccati. Gayāgāmassa hi avidūre
atk-s0503a:271_1: viharanto bhagavā “gayāyaṃ viharatī”ti vuccati, tathā gayātitthassa. Gayātitthanti
atk-s0503a:271_2: hi gayāgāmassa avidūre ekā pokkharaṇī atthi nadīpi, tadubhayaṃ “pāpapavāhanatittha”nti
atk-s0503a:271_3: lokiyamahājano samudācarati. Gayāsīseti gajasīsasadisasikharo tattha eko pabbato
atk-s0503a:271_4: gayāsīsanāmako, yattha hatthikumbhasadiso piṭṭhipāsāṇo bhikkhusahassassa okāso pahoti,
atk-s0503a:271_5: tatra bhagavā viharati. Tena vuttaṃ – “gayāyaṃ viharati gayāsīse”ti.
atk-s0503a:272_0: Jaṭilāti tāpasā. Te hi jaṭādhāritāya idha “jaṭilā”ti vuttā. Antaraṭṭhake himapātasamayeti
atk-s0503a:272_1: hemantassa utuno abbhantarabhūte māghamāsassa avasāne cattāro phagguṇamāsassa ādimhi
atk-s0503a:272_2: cattāroti aṭṭhadivasaparimāṇe himassa patanakāle. Gayāyaṃ ummujjantīti keci tasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:272_3: titthasammate udake paṭhamaṃ nimuggasakalasarīrā tato ummujjanti vuṭṭhahanti uppilavanti.
atk-s0503a:272_4: Nimujjantīti sasīsaṃ udake osīdanti. Ummujjanimujjampi karontīti punappunaṃ ummujjananimujjanānipi karonti.
atk-s0503a:273_0: Tattha hi keci “ekummujjaneneva pāpasuddhi hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā, te ummujjanameva
atk-s0503a:273_1: katvā gacchanti. Ummujjanaṃ pana nimujjanamantarena natthīti avinābhāvato nimujjanampi
atk-s0503a:273_2: te karontiyeva. Yepi “ekanimujjaneneva pāpasuddhi hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā, tepi ekavārameva
atk-s0503a:273_3: nimujjitvā vuttanayena avinābhāvato ummujjanampi katvā pakkamanti. Ye pana “tasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:273_4: titthe nimujjaneneva pāpasuddhi hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā, te tattha nimujjitvā assāse
atk-s0503a:273_5: sannirumbhitvā maruppapātapatitā viya tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇanti. Apare “punappunaṃ
atk-s0503a:273_6: ummujjananimujjanāni katvā nhāte pāpasuddhi hotī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā, te kālena kālaṃ
atk-s0503a:273_7: ummujjananimujjanāni karonti. Te sabbepi sandhāya vuttaṃ – “ummujjantipi nimujjantipi
atk-s0503a:273_8: ummujjanimujjampi karontī”ti. Ettha ca kiñcāpi nimujjanapubbakaṃ ummujjanaṃ, nimujjanameva
atk-s0503a:273_9: pana karontā katipayā, ummujjanaṃ tadubhayañca karontā bahūti tesaṃ yebhuyyabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:273_10: ummujjanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā sambahulā jaṭilāti jaṭilānaṃ yebhuyyatāya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:273_11: muṇḍasikhaṇḍinopi ca brāhmaṇā udakasuddhikā tasmiṃ kāle tattha tathā karonti.
atk-s0503a:274_0: Osiñcantīti keci gayāya udakaṃ hatthena gahetvā attano sīse ca sarīre ca osiñcanti,
atk-s0503a:274_1: apare ghaṭehi udakaṃ gahetvā tīre ṭhatvā tathā karonti. Aggiṃ juhantīti keci gayātīre
atk-s0503a:274_2: vediṃ sajjetvā dhūmadabbhipūjādike upakaraṇe upanetvā aggihutaṃ juhanti aggihutaṃ
atk-s0503a:274_3: paricaranti. Iminā suddhīti iminā gayāyaṃ ummujjanādinā aggiparicaraṇena ca pāpamalato
atk-s0503a:274_4: suddhi pāpapavāhanā saṃsārasuddhi eva vā hotīti evaṃdiṭṭhikā hutvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:275_0: Ummujjanādi cettha nidassanamattaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tesu hi keci udakavāsaṃ vasanti,
atk-s0503a:275_1: keci udakassañjaliṃ denti, keci tasmiṃ udake ṭhatvā candimasūriye anuparivattanti,
atk-s0503a:275_2: keci anekasahassavāraṃ sāvittiādike japanti, keci “inda āgacchā”tiādinā vijjājapaṃ
atk-s0503a:275_3: avhāyanti, keci mahatupaṭṭhānaṃ karonti, evañca karontā keci otaranti, keci uttaranti
atk-s0503a:275_4: keci uttaritvā suddhikaācamanaṃ karonti, keci antoudake ṭhitā tantī vādenti, vīṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:275_5: vādentīti evamādikā nānappakārakiriyā dassenti. Yasmā vā te evarūpā vikārakiriyā
atk-s0503a:275_6: karontāpi tasmiṃ udake nimujjanaummujjanapubbakameva karonti, tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ nimujjanummujjanantogadhameva
atk-s0503a:275_7: katvā “ummujjantī”tipiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ tattha ākulabyākule vattamāne uparipabbate
atk-s0503a:275_8: ṭhito bhagavā tesaṃ taṃ kolāhalaṃ sutvā “kinnu kho eta”nti olokento taṃ kiriyavikāraṃ
atk-s0503a:275_9: addasa, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “addasā kho bhagavā…pe… iminā suddhī”ti, taṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0503a:276_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ atthaṃ udakorohanādiasuddhimagge tesaṃ suddhimaggaparāmasanaṃ
atk-s0503a:276_1: saccādike ca suddhimagge attano aviparītāvabodhaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti
atk-s0503a:276_2: imaṃ udakasuddhiyā asuddhimaggabhāvadīpakaṃ saccādidhammānañca yāthāvato suddhimaggabhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:277_0: Tattha na udakena sucī hotīti ettha udakenāti udakummujjanādinā. Udakummujjanādi
atk-s0503a:277_1: hi idha uttarapadalopena “udaka”nti vuttaṃ yathā rūpabhavo rūpanti. Atha vā udakenāti
atk-s0503a:277_2: ummujjanādikiriyāya sādhanabhūtena udakena suci sattassa suddhi nāma na hoti, natthīti
atk-s0503a:277_3: attho. Atha vā sucīti tena yathāvuttena udakena suci pāpamalato suddho nāma satto
atk-s0503a:277_4: na hoti. Kasmā? Bahvettha nhāyatī jano. Yadi hi udakorohanādinā yathāvuttena pāpasuddhi
atk-s0503a:277_5: nāma siyā, bahu ettha udake jano nhāyati, mātughātādipāpakammakārī añño ca gomahiṃsādiko
atk-s0503a:277_6: antamaso macchakacchape upādāya, tassa sabbassāpi pāpasuddhi siyā, na panevaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:277_7: Kasmā? Nhānassa pāpahetūnaṃ appaṭipakkhabhāvato. Yañhi yaṃ vināseti, so tassa paṭipakkho
atk-s0503a:277_8: yathā āloko andhakārassa, vijjā ca avijjāya, na evaṃ nhānaṃ pāpassa. Tasmā niṭṭhamettha
atk-s0503a:278_0: Yena pana suci hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “yamhi saccañcā”tiādimāha. Tattha yamhīti yasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:278_1: puggale. Saccanti vacīsaccañceva viratisaccañca. Atha vā saccanti ñāṇasaccañceva
atk-s0503a:278_2: paramatthasaccañca. Dhammoti ariyamaggadhammo, phaladhammo ca, so sabbopi yasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:278_3: puggale upalabbhati, so sucī so ca brāhmaṇoti so ariyapuggalo visesato khīṇāsavo
atk-s0503a:278_4: accantasuddhiyā suci ca brāhmaṇo cāti. Kasmā panettha saccaṃ dhammato visuṃ katvā
atk-s0503a:278_5: gahitaṃ? Saccassa bahūpakārattā. Tathā hi “saccaṃ ve amatā vācā, saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ
atk-s0503a:278_6: rasānaṃ, sacce atthe ca dhamme ca, āhu santo patiṭṭhitā, sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā
atk-s0503a:278_7: cā”tiādinā anekesu suttapadesu saccaguṇā pakāsitā. Saccavipariyassa ca “ekaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:278_8: atītassa, musāvādissa jantuno, abhūtavādī nirayaṃ upetī”ti ca ādinā pakāsitāti.
atk-s0503a:281_0: 10. Dasame bāhiyoti tassa nāmaṃ. Dārucīriyoti dārumayacīro. Suppāraketi evaṃnāmake
atk-s0503a:281_1: paṭṭane vasati. Ko panāyaṃ bāhiyo, kathañca dārucīriyo ahosi, kathaṃ suppārake paṭṭane paṭivasatīti?
atk-s0503a:282_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbīkathā – ito kira kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttarasammāsambuddhakāle
atk-s0503a:282_1: eko kulaputto haṃsavatīnagare dasabalassa dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0503a:282_2: khippābhiññānaṃ etadagge ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mahā vatāyaṃ bhikkhu, yo satthārā evaṃ
atk-s0503a:282_3: etadagge ṭhapīyati, aho vatāhampi anāgate evarūpassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0503a:282_4: satthārā edise ṭhāne etadagge ṭhapetabbo bhaveyyaṃ yathāyaṃ bhikkhū”ti taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0503a:282_5: patthetvā tadanurūpaṃ adhikārakammaṃ katvā yāvajīvaṃ puññaṃ katvā saggaparāyaṇo hutvā
atk-s0503a:282_6: devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapadasabalassa sāsane pabbajitvā paripuṇṇasīlo samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:282_7: karontova jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā devaloke nibbatti. So ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke vasitvā
atk-s0503a:282_8: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bāhiyaraṭṭhe kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, taṃ bāhiyaraṭṭhe jātattā
atk-s0503a:282_9: bāhiyoti sañjāniṃsu. So vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto vaṇijjatthāya bahūnaṃ bhaṇḍānaṃ
atk-s0503a:282_10: nāvaṃ pūretvā samuddaṃ pavisitvā aparāparaṃ sañcaranto satta vāre saddhiṃyeva parisāya
atk-s0503a:283_0: Aṭṭhame vāre pana “suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ gamissāmī”ti āropitabhaṇḍo nāvaṃ abhiruhi. Nāvā
atk-s0503a:283_1: mahāsamuddaṃ ajjhogāhetvā icchitadesaṃ apatvāva samuddamajjhe vipannā. Mahājano macchakacchapabhakkho
atk-s0503a:283_2: ahosi. Bāhiyo pana ekaṃ nāvāphalakaṃ gahetvā taranto ūmivegena mandamandaṃ khipamāno
atk-s0503a:283_3: bhassitvā samudde patitattā jātarūpeneva samuddatīre nipanno. Parissamaṃ vinodetvā
atk-s0503a:283_4: assāsamattaṃ labhitvā uṭṭhāya lajjāya gumbantaraṃ pavisitvā acchādanaṃ aññaṃ kiñci
atk-s0503a:283_5: apassanto akkanāḷāni chinditvā vākehi paliveṭhetvā nivāsanapāvuraṇāni katvā acchādesi.
atk-s0503a:283_6: Keci pana “dāruphalakāni vijjhitvā vākena āvuṇitvā nivāsanapāvuraṇaṃ katvā acchādesī”ti
atk-s0503a:283_7: vadanti. Evaṃ sabbathāpi dārumayacīradhāritāya “dārucīriyo”ti purimavohārena “bāhiyo”ti ca paññāyittha.
atk-s0503a:284_0: Taṃ ekaṃ kapālaṃ gahetvā vuttaniyāmena suppārakapaṭṭane piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā manussā
atk-s0503a:284_1: cintesuṃ “sace loke arahanto nāma honti, evaṃvidhehi bhavitabbaṃ, kinnu kho ayaṃ
atk-s0503a:284_2: ayyo vatthaṃ diyyamānaṃ gaṇheyya, udāhu appicchatāya na gaṇheyyā”ti vīmaṃsantā nānādisāhi
atk-s0503a:284_3: vatthāni upanesuṃ. So cintesi – “sacāhaṃ iminā niyāmena nāgamissaṃ, nayime evaṃ mayi
atk-s0503a:284_4: pasīdeyyuṃ, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imāni paṭikkhipitvā imināva nīhārena vihareyyaṃ, evaṃ me lābhasakkāro
atk-s0503a:284_5: uppajjissatī”ti. So evaṃ cintetvā kohaññe ṭhatvā vatthāni na paṭiggaṇhi. Manussā
atk-s0503a:284_6: “aho appiccho vatāyaṃ ayyo”ti bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānasā mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0503a:285_0: Sopi bhattakiccaṃ katvā avidūraṭṭhāne ekaṃ devāyatanaṃ agamāsi. Mahājano tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0503a:285_1: eva gantvā taṃ devāyatanaṃ paṭijaggitvā adāsi. So “ime mayhaṃ cīradhāraṇamatte pasīditvā
atk-s0503a:285_2: evaṃvidhaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ karonti, etesaṃ mayā ukkaṭṭhavuttinā bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0503a:285_3: sallahukaparikkhāro appicchova hutvā vihāsi. “Arahā”ti pana tehi sambhāvīyamāno “arahā”ti
atk-s0503a:285_4: attānaṃ amaññi, uparūpari cassa sakkāragarukāro abhivaḍḍhi, lābhī ca ahosi uḷārānaṃ
atk-s0503a:285_5: paccayānaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “tena kho pana samayena bāhiyo dārucīriyo suppārake paṭivasati
atk-s0503a:286_0: Tattha sakkatoti sakkaccaṃ ādarena upaṭṭhānavasena sakkato. Garukatoti guṇavisesena
atk-s0503a:286_1: yuttoti adhippāyena pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garukaraṇavasena garukato. Mānitoti manasā
atk-s0503a:286_2: sambhāvanavasena mānito. Pūjitoti pupphagandhādīhi pūjāvasena pūjito. Apacitoti abhippasannacittehi
atk-s0503a:286_3: maggadānaāsanābhiharaṇādivasena apacito. Lābhī cīvara…pe… parikkhārānanti paṇītapaṇītānaṃ
atk-s0503a:286_4: uparūpari upanīyamānānaṃ cīvarādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ labhanavasena lābhī.
atk-s0503a:287_0: Aparo nayo – sakkatoti sakkārappatto. Garukatoti garukārappatto. Mānitoti bahumānito
atk-s0503a:287_1: manasā piyāyito ca. Pūjitoti catupaccayābhipūjāya pūjito. Apacitoti apacāyanappatto.
atk-s0503a:287_2: Yassa hi cattāro paccaye sakkatvā suabhisaṅkhate paṇītapaṇīte denti, so sakkato.
atk-s0503a:287_3: Yasmiṃ garubhāvaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā denti, so garukato. Yaṃ manasā piyāyanti bahumaññanti
atk-s0503a:287_4: ca, so mānito. Yassa sabbampetaṃ pūjanavasena karonti, so pūjito. Yassa abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānañjalikammādivasena
atk-s0503a:287_5: paramanipaccakāraṃ karonti, so apacito. Bāhiyassa pana te sabbametaṃ akaṃsu. Tena
atk-s0503a:287_6: vuttaṃ – “bāhiyo dārucīriyo suppārake paṭivasati sakkato”tiādi. Ettha ca cīvaraṃ
atk-s0503a:287_7: so aggaṇhantopi “ehi, bhante, imaṃ vatthaṃ paṭiggaṇhāhī”ti upanāmanavasena cīvarassāpi “lābhī”tveva vutto.
atk-s0503a:288_0: Rahogatassāti rahasi gatassa. Paṭisallīnassāti ekībhūtassa bahūhi manussehi “arahā”ti
atk-s0503a:288_1: vuccamānassa tassa idāni vuccamānākārena cetaso parivitakko udapādi cittassa micchāsaṅkappo
atk-s0503a:288_2: uppajji. Kathaṃ? Ye kho keci loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, ahaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:288_3: aññataroti. Tassattho – ye imasmiṃ sattaloke kilesārīnaṃ hatattā pūjāsakkārādīnañca
atk-s0503a:288_4: arahabhāvena arahanto, ye kilesārīnaṃ hananena arahattamaggaṃ samāpannā, tesu ahaṃ ekoti.
atk-s0503a:289_0: Purāṇasālohitāti purimasmiṃ bhavesālohitā bandhusadisā ekato katasamaṇadhammā devatā.
atk-s0503a:289_1: Keci pana “purāṇasālohitāti purāṇakāle bhavantare sālohitā mātubhūtā ekā devatā”ti
atk-s0503a:289_2: vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā purimoyevattho gahito.
atk-s0503a:290_0: Pubbe kira kassapadasabalassa sāsane osakkamāne sāmaṇerādīnaṃ vippakāraṃ disvā satta
atk-s0503a:290_1: bhikkhū saṃvegappattā “yāva sāsanaṃ na antaradhāyati, tāva attano patiṭṭhaṃ karissāmā”ti
atk-s0503a:290_2: suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ vanditvā araññaṃ paviṭṭhā ekaṃ pabbataṃ disvā “jīvite sālayā nivattantu,
atk-s0503a:290_3: nirālayā imaṃ pabbataṃ abhiruhantū”ti vatvā nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā sabbe taṃ pabbataṃ
atk-s0503a:290_4: abhiruyha nisseṇiṃ pātetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kariṃsu. Tesu saṅghatthero ekarattātikkameneva
atk-s0503a:290_5: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. So uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ ānetvā te bhikkhū, “āvuso, ito piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0503a:290_6: paribhuñjathā”ti āha. Te “tumhe, bhante, attano ānubhāvena evaṃ akattha, mayampi
atk-s0503a:290_7: sace tumhe viya visesaṃ nibbattessāma, sayameva āharitvā bhuñjissāmā”ti bhuñjituṃ
atk-s0503a:290_8: na icchiṃsu. Tato dutiyadivase dutiyatthero anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpuṇi, sopi tatheva piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0503a:290_9: ādāya tattha gantvā itare nimantesi, tepi tatheva paṭikkhipiṃsu. Tesu arahattappatto
atk-s0503a:290_10: parinibbāyi, anāgāmī suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ nibbatti. Itare pana pañca janā ghaṭentā
atk-s0503a:290_11: vāyamantāpi visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Te asakkontā tattheva parisussitvā devaloke
atk-s0503a:290_12: nibbattā. Ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devesuyeva saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devalokato
atk-s0503a:290_13: cavitvā tattha tattha kulaghare nibbattiṃsu. Tesu hi eko pakkusāti rājā ahosi, eko
atk-s0503a:290_14: kumārakassapo, eko dabbo mallaputto, eko sabhiyo paribbājako, eko bāhiyo dārucīriyo.
atk-s0503a:290_15: Tattha yo so anāgāmī brahmaloke nibbatto, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “purāṇasālohitā
atk-s0503a:290_16: devatā”ti. Devaputtopi hi devadhītā viya devo eva devatāti katvā devatāti vuccati
atk-s0503a:290_17: “atha kho aññatarā devatā”tiādīsu viya. Idha pana brahmā devatāti adhippeto.
atk-s0503a:291_0: Tassa hi brahmuno tattha nibbattasamanantarameva attano brahmasampattiṃ oloketvā
atk-s0503a:291_1: āgataṭṭhānaṃ āvajjentassa sattannaṃ janānaṃ pabbataṃ āruyha samaṇadhammakaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:291_2: tatthekassa parinibbutabhāvo, anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā attano ca ettha nibbattabhāvo upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0503a:291_3: So “kattha nu kho itare pañca janā”ti āvajjento kāmāvacaradevaloke tesaṃ nibbattabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:291_4: ñatvā aparabhāge kālānukālaṃ “kinnu kho karontī”ti tesaṃ pavattiṃ oloketiyeva. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:291_5: pana kāle “kahaṃ nu kho”ti āvajjento bāhiyaṃ suppārakapaṭṭanaṃ upanissāya dārucīradhāriṃ
atk-s0503a:291_6: kohaññena jīvikaṃ kappentaṃ disvā “ayaṃ mayā saddhiṃ pubbe nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā pabbataṃ
atk-s0503a:291_7: abhiruhitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto atisallekhavuttiyā jīvite anapekkho arahatāpi ābhataṃ
atk-s0503a:291_8: piṇḍapātaṃ aparibhuñjitvā idāni sambhāvanādhippāyo anarahāva arahattaṃ paṭijānitvā
atk-s0503a:291_9: vicarati lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nikāmayamāno, dasabalassa ca nibbattabhāvaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0503a:291_10: handa naṃ saṃvejetvā buddhuppādaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti tāvadeva brahmalokato otaritvā rattibhāge
atk-s0503a:291_11: suppārakapaṭṭane dārucīriyassa sammukhe pāturahosi. Bāhiyo attano vasanaṭṭhāne uḷāraṃ
atk-s0503a:291_12: obhāsaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti bahi nikkhamitvā olokento ākāse ṭhitaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ
atk-s0503a:291_13: disvā añjaliṃ paggayha “ke tumhe”ti pucchi. Athassa so brahmā “ahaṃ te porāṇakasahāyo
atk-s0503a:291_14: tadā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā brahmaloke nibbatto, tvaṃ pana kiñci visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ
atk-s0503a:291_15: asakkonto tadā puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ katvā saṃsaranto idāni titthiyavesadhārī anarahāva
atk-s0503a:291_16: samāno ‘arahā aha’nti imaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā vicarasīti ñatvā āgato, neva kho tvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:291_17: bāhiya, arahā, paṭinissajjetaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ, mā te ahosi dīgharattaṃ ahitāya
atk-s0503a:291_18: dukkhāya, sammāsambuddho loke uppanno. So hi bhagavā arahā, gaccha naṃ payirupāsassū”ti
atk-s0503a:291_19: āha. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa purāṇasālohitā devatā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:292_0: Tattha anukampikāti anuggahasīlā karuṇādhikā. Atthakāmāti hitakāmā mettādhikā. Purimapadena
atk-s0503a:292_1: cettha bāhiyassa dukkhāpanayanakāmataṃ tassā devatāya dasseti, pacchimena hitūpasaṃhāraṃ.
atk-s0503a:292_2: Cetasāti attano cittena, cetosīsena cettha cetopariyañāṇaṃ gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:292_3: Cetoparivitakkanti tassa cittappavattiṃ. Aññāyāti jānitvā. Tenupasaṅkamīti seyyathāpi
atk-s0503a:292_4: nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya,
atk-s0503a:292_5: evameva brahmaloke antarahito bāhiyassa purato pātubhavanavasena upasaṅkami. Etadavocāti
atk-s0503a:292_6: “ye kho keci loke arahanto vā”tiādipavattamicchāparivitakkaṃ bāhiyaṃ sahoḍhaṃ coraṃ
atk-s0503a:292_7: gaṇhanto viya “neva kho tvaṃ, bāhiya, arahā”tiādikaṃ etaṃ idāni vuccamānavacanaṃ
atk-s0503a:292_8: brahmā avoca. Neva kho tvaṃ, bāhiya, arahāti etena tadā bāhiyassa asekkhabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati,
atk-s0503a:292_9: nāpi arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannoti etena sekkhabhāvaṃ, ubhayenapissa anariyabhāvameva
atk-s0503a:292_10: dīpeti. Sāpi te paṭipadā natthi, yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assa arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannoti
atk-s0503a:292_11: iminā panassa kalyāṇaputhujjanabhāvampi paṭikkhipati. Tattha paṭipadāti sīlavisuddhiādayo
atk-s0503a:292_12: cha visuddhiyo. Paṭipajjati etāya ariyamaggeti paṭipadā. Assāti bhaveyyāsi.
atk-s0503a:293_0: Ayañcassa arahattādhimāno kiṃ nissāya uppannoti? “Appicchatāya santuṭṭhitāya sallekhatāya
atk-s0503a:293_1: dīgharattaṃ katādhikārattā tadaṅgappahānavasena kilesānaṃ vihatattā arahattādhimāno
atk-s0503a:293_2: uppanno”ti keci vadanti. Apare panāhu “bāhiyo paṭhamādijhānacatukkalābhī, tasmāssa
atk-s0503a:293_3: vikkhambhanappahānena kilesānaṃ asamudācārato arahattādhimāno uppajjatī”ti. Tadubhayampi
atk-s0503a:293_4: tesaṃ matimattameva “sambhāvanādhippāyo lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nikāmayamāno”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:294_0: Atha bāhiyo ākāse ṭhatvā kathentaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ oloketvā cintesi – “aho bhāriyaṃ
atk-s0503a:294_1: vata kammaṃ, yamahaṃ arahāti cintesiṃ, ayañca ‘arahattagāminī paṭipadāpi te natthī’ti
atk-s0503a:294_2: vadati, atthi nu kho loke koci arahā”ti? Atha naṃ pucchi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha ke
atk-s0503a:294_3: carahi devate loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā”ti.
atk-s0503a:295_0: Tattha athāti pucchārambhe nipāto. Ke carahīti ke etarahi. Loketi okāsaloke. Ayañhettha
atk-s0503a:295_1: adhippāyo – bhājanalokabhūte sakalasmiṃ jambudīpatale kasmiṃ ṭhāne arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ
atk-s0503a:295_2: vā samāpannā etarahi viharanti, yattha mayaṃ te upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā
atk-s0503a:295_3: vaṭṭadukkhato muccissāmāti. Uttaresūti suppārakapaṭṭanato pubbuttaradisābhāgaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:296_0: Arahanti ārakattā arahaṃ. Ārakā hi so sabbakilesehi suvidūravidūre ṭhito maggena
atk-s0503a:296_1: savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattā. Arīnaṃ vā hatattā arahaṃ. Bhagavatā hi kilesārayo
atk-s0503a:296_2: anavasesato ariyamaggena hatā samucchinnāti. Arānaṃ vā hatattā arahaṃ. Yañca avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhi
atk-s0503a:296_3: puññādiabhisaṅkhārāraṃ jarāmaraṇanemi āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā tibhavarathe
atk-s0503a:296_4: samāyojitaṃ anādikālappavattaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ. Tassānena bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ
atk-s0503a:296_5: patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakarañāṇapharasuṃ gahetvā sabbepi arā hatā vihatā
atk-s0503a:296_6: viddhaṃsitāti. Arahatīti vā arahaṃ. Bhagavā hi sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyattā uḷāre
atk-s0503a:296_7: cīvarādipaccaye pūjāvisesañca arahati. Rahābhāvato vā arahaṃ. Tathāgato hi sabbaso
atk-s0503a:296_8: samucchinnarāgādikilesattā pāpakilesassāpi asambhavato pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvatopi arahanti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:297_0: Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho. Bhagavā hi abhiññeyye dhamme
atk-s0503a:297_1: abhiññeyyato, pariññeyye dhamme pariññeyyato, pahātabbe dhamme pahātabbato, sacchikātabbe
atk-s0503a:297_2: dhamme sacchikātabbato, bhāvetabbe dhamme bhāvetabbato abhisambujjhi. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0503a:299: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-s0503a:300_0: Apica kusale dhamme anavajjasukhavipākato, akusale dhamme sāvajjadukkhavipākatotiādinā
atk-s0503a:300_1: sabbattikadukādivasena ayamattho netabbo. Iti aviparītaṃ sayambhuñāṇena sabbākārato
atk-s0503a:300_2: sabbadhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā sammāsambuddhoti ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana
atk-s0503a:300_3: visuddhimagge āgatanayeneva veditabbo. Arahattāyāti aggaphalappaṭilābhāya. Dhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:301_0: Saṃvejitoti “dhiratthu vata, bho, puthujjanabhāvassa, yenāhaṃ anarahāva samāno arahāti
atk-s0503a:301_1: amaññiṃ, sammāsambuddhañca loke uppajjitvā dhammaṃ desentaṃ na jāniṃ, dujjānaṃ kho
atk-s0503a:301_2: panidaṃ jīvitaṃ, dujjānaṃ maraṇa”nti saṃvegamāpādito, devatāvacanena yathāvuttenākārena
atk-s0503a:301_3: saṃviggamānasoti attho. Tāvadevāti tasmiṃyeva khaṇe. Suppārakā pakkāmīti buddhoti
atk-s0503a:301_4: nāmamapi savanena uppannāya buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā saṃvegena ca codiyamānahadayo
atk-s0503a:301_5: suppārakapaṭṭanato sāvatthiṃ uddissa pakkanto. Sabbattha ekarattiparivāsenāti sabbasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:301_6: magge ekarattivāseneva agamāsi. Suppārakapaṭṭanato hi sāvatthi vīsayojanasate hoti,
atk-s0503a:301_7: tañcāyaṃ ettakaṃ addhānaṃ ekarattivāsena agamāsi. Yadā suppārakato nikkhanto, tadaheva
atk-s0503a:302_0: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ evaṃ agamāsīti? Devatānubhāvena, “buddhānubhāvenā”tipi vadanti. “Sabbattha
atk-s0503a:302_1: ekarattiparivāsenā”ti pana vuttattā maggassa ca vīsayojanasatikattā antarāmagge gāmanigamarājadhānīsu
atk-s0503a:302_2: yattha yattha rattiyaṃ vasati, tattha tattha dutiyaṃ aruṇaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā sabbattha
atk-s0503a:302_3: ekarattivāseneva sāvatthiṃ upasaṅkamīti ayamattho dīpito hotīti. Nayidaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:302_4: Sabbasmiṃ vīsayojanasatike magge ekarattivāsenāti imassa atthassa adhippetattā. Ekarattimattaṃ
atk-s0503a:302_5: so sakalasmiṃ tasmiṃ magge vasitvā pacchimadivase pubbaṇhasamaye sāvatthiṃ anuppattoti.
atk-s0503a:303_0: Bhagavāpi bāhiyassa āgamanaṃ ñatvā “na tāvassa indriyāni paripākaṃ gatāni, khaṇantare
atk-s0503a:303_1: pana paripākaṃ gamissantī”ti tassa indriyānaṃ paripākaṃ āgamayamāno mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0503a:303_2: tasmiṃ khaṇe sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. So ca jetavanaṃ pavisitvā bhuttapātarāse kāyālasiyavimocanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:303_3: abbhokāse caṅkamante sambahule bhikkhū passitvā “kahaṃ nu kho etarahi bhagavā”ti
atk-s0503a:303_4: pucchi. Bhikkhū “bhagavā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti vatvā pucchiṃsu “tvaṃ pana
atk-s0503a:303_5: kuto āgato”ti? “Suppārakapaṭṭanato āgatomhī”ti. “Dūrato āgatosi, nisīda, tāva pāde
atk-s0503a:303_6: dhovitvā makkhetvā thokaṃ vissamāhi, āgatakāle satthāraṃ dakkhasī”ti. “Ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0503a:303_7: attano jīvitantarāyaṃ na jānāmi, ekarattenevamhi katthacipi ciraṃ aṭṭhatvā anisīditvā
atk-s0503a:303_8: vīsayojanasatikaṃ maggaṃ āgato, satthāraṃ passitvāva vissamissāmī”ti vatvā taramānarūpo
atk-s0503a:303_9: sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā anopamāya buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ passi. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:303_10: “tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū abbhokāse caṅkamanti. Atha kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo
atk-s0503a:304_0: Tattha kahanti kattha. Nūti saṃsaye, khoti padapūraṇe, kasmiṃ nu kho padeseti attho.
atk-s0503a:304_1: Dassanakāmamhāti daṭṭhukāmā amha. Mayañhi taṃ bhagavantaṃ andho viya cakkhuṃ, badhiro
atk-s0503a:304_2: viya sotaṃ, mūgo viya kalyāṇavākkaraṇaṃ, hatthapādavikalo viya hatthapāde, daliddo
atk-s0503a:304_3: viya dhanasampadaṃ, kantāraddhānappaṭipanno viya khemantabhūmiṃ, rogābhibhūto viya
atk-s0503a:304_4: ārogyaṃ, mahāsamudde bhinnanāvo viya mahākullaṃ passituṃ upasaṅkamituñca icchāmāti
atk-s0503a:305_4: pasādanīyaṃ pasīditabbayuttaṃ pasādārahaṃ vā. Santindriyanti cakkhādipañcindriyalolabhāvāpagamanena
atk-s0503a:305_7: uttamaṃ damathaṃ samathañca anuppatvā adhigantvā ṭhitaṃ. Dantanti suparisuddhakāyasamācāratāya
atk-s0503a:305_8: ceva hatthapādakukkuccābhāvato davādiabhāvato ca kāyena dantaṃ. Guttanti suparisuddhavacīsamācāratāya
atk-s0503a:305_9: ceva niratthakavācābhāvato davādiabhāvato ca vācāya guttaṃ. Yatindriyanti suparisuddhamanosamācāratāya
atk-s0503a:305_11: Nāganti chandādivasena agamanato, pahīnānaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ punānāgamanato, kassacipi
atk-s0503a:305_12: āgussa sabbathāpi akaraṇato, punabbhavassa ca agamanatoti imehi kāraṇehi nāgaṃ. Ettha
atk-s0503a:305_13: ca pāsādikanti iminā rūpakāyena bhagavato pamāṇabhūtataṃ dīpeti, pasādanīyanti iminā
atk-s0503a:305_14: dhammakāyena, santindriyantiādinā sesehi pamāṇabhūtataṃ dīpeti. Tena catuppamāṇike
atk-s0503a:305_15: lokasannivāse anavasesato sattānaṃ bhagavato pamāṇabhāvo pakāsitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:306_0: Evaṃbhūtañca bhagavantaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā “cirassaṃ vata me sammāsambuddho
atk-s0503a:306_1: diṭṭho”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭasarīro pītivipphāritavivaṭaniccalalocano
atk-s0503a:306_2: diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya oṇatasarīro bhagavato sarīrappabhāvemajjhaṃ ajjhogāhetvā
atk-s0503a:306_3: tattha nimujjanto bhagavato samīpaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā bhagavato
atk-s0503a:306_4: pāde sambāhanto paricumbanto “desetu me, bhante, bhagavā dhamma”nti āha. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:306_5: – “bhagavato pāde sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘desetu me, bhante, bhagavā
atk-s0503a:306_6: dhammaṃ, desetu sugato dhammaṃ, yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”’ti.
atk-s0503a:307_0: Tattha sugatoti sobhanagamanattā, sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā, sammā gatattā, sammā gadattā
atk-s0503a:307_1: sugato. Gamanampi hi gatanti vuccati, tañca bhagavato sobhanaṃ parisuddhaṃ anavajjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:307_2: Kiṃ pana tanti? Ariyamaggo. Tena hesa gamanena khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gato, aññepi
atk-s0503a:307_3: gametīti sobhanagamanattā sugato. Sundarañcesa ṭhānaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ gatoti sundaraṃ
atk-s0503a:307_4: ṭhānaṃ gatattā sugato. Sammā ca gatattā sugato tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna
atk-s0503a:308: “Sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato. Sakadāgāmi…pe… arahattamaggena…pe… na paccāgacchatīti sugato”ti.
atk-s0503a:309_0: Atha vā sammā gatattāti tīsupi avatthāsu sammāpaṭipattiyā gatattā, suppaṭipannattāti
atk-s0503a:309_1: attho. Dīpaṅkarapādamūlato hi paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhimaṇḍā tāva samatiṃsapāramipūritāya
atk-s0503a:309_2: sammāpaṭipattiyā ñātatthacariyāya lokatthacariyāya buddhatthacariyāya koṭiṃ pāpuṇitvā
atk-s0503a:309_3: sabbalokassa hitasukhameva paribrūhanto sassataṃ ucchedaṃ kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathanti
atk-s0503a:309_4: ime ante anupagacchantiyā anuttarāya bojjhaṅgabhāvanāsaṅkhātāya majjhimāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0503a:309_5: ariyasaccesu tato paraṃ samadhigatadhammādhipateyyo sabbasattesu avisayāya sammāpaṭipattiyā
atk-s0503a:309_6: ca gato paṭipannoti evampi sammā gatattā sugato. Sammā cesa gadati yuttaṭṭhāne yuttameva
atk-s0503a:310: “Kālavādī, bhūtavādī, atthavādī, dhammavādī, vinayavādī, nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasaṃhita”nti.
atk-s0503a:312: “Yā sā vācā abhūtā atacchā anatthasaṃhitā, yā ca paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā, na taṃ tathāgato vācaṃ bhāsatī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:314_0: Yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti yaṃ dhammassa upadisanaṃ cirakālaṃ mama
atk-s0503a:314_1: jhānavimokkhādihitāya tadadhigantabbasukhāya ca siyā. Akālo kho tāva bāhiyāti tava
atk-s0503a:314_2: dhammadesanāya na tāva kāloti attho. Kiṃ pana bhagavato sattahitapaṭipattiyā akālopi
atk-s0503a:314_3: nāma atthi, yato bhagavā kālavādīti? Vuccate – kāloti cettha veneyyānaṃ indriyaparipākakālo
atk-s0503a:314_4: adhippeto. Yasmā pana tadā bāhiyassa attano indriyānaṃ paripakkāparipakkabhāvo dubbiññeyyo,
atk-s0503a:314_5: tasmā bhagavā taṃ avatvā attano antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitabhāvamassa kāraṇaṃ apadisanto
atk-s0503a:314_6: āha “antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhamhā”ti. Dujjānanti dubbiññeyyaṃ. Jīvitantarāyānanti jīvitassa
atk-s0503a:314_7: antarāyakaradhammānaṃ vattanaṃ avattanaṃ vāti vattukāmo sambhamavasena “jīvitantarāyāna”nti
atk-s0503a:314_8: āha. Tathā hi anekapaccayappaṭibaddhavuttijīvitaṃ anekarūpā ca tadantarāyā. Vuttañhi –
atk-s0503a:316: Na hi no saṅgaraṃ tena, mahāsenena maccunā”ti. ;
atk-s0503a:317_0: Kasmā panāyaṃ jīvitantarāyameva tāva purakkharoti? “Nimittaññutāya adiṭṭhakosallena
atk-s0503a:317_1: vā”ti keci. Apare “devatāya santike jīvitantarāyassa sutattā”ti vadanti. Antimabhavikattā
atk-s0503a:317_2: pana upanissayasampattiyā codiyamāno evamāha. Na hi tesaṃ appattaarahattānaṃ jīvitakkhayo
atk-s0503a:317_3: hoti. Kiṃ pana kāraṇā bhagavā tassa dhammaṃ desetukāmova dvikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipi?
atk-s0503a:317_4: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “imassa maṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā nirantaraṃ
atk-s0503a:317_5: phuṭaṃ, atibalavā pītivego, dhammaṃ sutvāpi na tāva sakkhissati paṭivijjhituṃ. Yāva
atk-s0503a:317_6: pana majjhattupekkhā saṇṭhāti, tāva tiṭṭhatu, vīsayojanasataṃ maggaṃ āgatattā darathopissa
atk-s0503a:317_7: kāye balavā, sopi tāva paṭippassambhatū”ti. Tasmā dvikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipi. Keci pana
atk-s0503a:317_8: “dhammassavane ādarajananatthaṃ bhagavā evamakāsī”ti vadanti. Tatiyavāraṃ yācito
atk-s0503a:317_9: pana majjhattupekkhaṃ darathappaṭipassaddhiṃ paccupaṭṭhitañcassa jīvitantarāyaṃ disvā
atk-s0503a:317_10: “idāni dhammadesanāya kālo”ti cintetvā “tasmā tihā”tiādinā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0503a:318_0: Tattha tasmāti yasmā tvaṃ ussukkajāto hutvā ativiya maṃ yācasi, yasmā vā jīvitantarāyānaṃ
atk-s0503a:318_1: dujjānataṃ vadasi, indriyāni ca te paripākaṃ gatāni, tasmā. Tihāti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0503a:318_2: Teti tayā evanti idāni vattabbākāraṃ vadati.
atk-s0503a:319: Sikkhitabbanti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ tissannampi sikkhānaṃ vasena sikkhanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Yathā pana sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ dassento “diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:320_0: Tattha diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattanti rūpāyatane cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhamattaṃ. Yathā hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:320_1: rūpe rūpamattameva passati, na aniccādisabhāvaṃ, evameva sesaṃ. Cakkhudvārikaviññāṇena
atk-s0503a:320_2: hi me diṭṭhamattameva bhavissatīti sikkhitabbanti attho. Atha vā diṭṭhe diṭṭhaṃ nāma
atk-s0503a:320_3: cakkhuviññāṇena rūpavijānananti attho. Mattanti pamāṇaṃ. Diṭṭhā mattā etassāti diṭṭhamattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:320_4: cakkhuviññāṇamattameva cittaṃ bhavissatīti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā āpāthagate
atk-s0503a:320_5: rūpe cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na rajjati, na dussati, na muyhati, evaṃ rāgādivirahena cakkhuviññāṇamattameva
atk-s0503a:320_6: me javanaṃ bhavissati, cakkhuviññāṇappamāṇeneva javanaṃ ṭhapessāmīti.
atk-s0503a:321_0: Atha vā diṭṭhaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇena diṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ, diṭṭhamattaṃ nāma tattheva uppannaṃ
atk-s0503a:321_1: sampaṭicchanasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanasaṅkhātaṃ cittattayaṃ. Yathā taṃ na rajjati, na
atk-s0503a:321_2: dussati, na muyhati, evaṃ āpāthagate rūpe teneva sampaṭicchanādippamāṇena javanaṃ
atk-s0503a:321_3: uppādessāmi, nāhaṃ taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā rajjanādivasena uppajjituṃ dassāmīti evamettha
atk-s0503a:321_4: attho daṭṭhabbo. Eseva nayo sutamute. Mutanti tadārammaṇaviññāṇehi saddhiṃ gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
atk-s0503a:321_5: veditabbaṃ. Viññāte viññātamattanti ettha pana viññātaṃ nāma manodvārāvajjanena viññātārammaṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:321_6: Tasmiṃ viññāte viññātamattanti āvajjanappamāṇaṃ. Yathā āvajjanaṃ na rajjati, na dussati,
atk-s0503a:321_7: na muyhati, evaṃ rajjanādivasena ca uppajjituṃ adatvā āvajjanappamāṇeneva cittaṃ
atk-s0503a:321_8: ṭhapessāmīti ayamettha attho. Evañhi te, bāhiya, sikkhitabbanti evaṃ imāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0503a:321_9: tayā, bāhiya, tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ anuvattanavasena sikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:322_0: Iti bhagavā bāhiyassa saṃkhittarucitāya chahi viññāṇakāyehi saddhiṃ chaḷārammaṇabhedabhinnaṃ
atk-s0503a:322_1: vipassanāya visayaṃ diṭṭhādīhi catūhi koṭṭhāsehi vibhajitvā tatthassa ñātatīraṇapariññaṃ
atk-s0503a:322_2: dasseti. Kathaṃ? Ettha hi rūpāyatanaṃ passitabbaṭṭhena diṭṭhaṃ nāma, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:322_3: pana saddhiṃ taṃdvārikaviññāṇehi dassanaṭṭhena, tadubhayampi yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānaṃ
atk-s0503a:322_4: dhammamattameva, na ettha koci kattā vā kāretā vā, yato taṃ hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccaṃ,
atk-s0503a:322_5: udayabbayappaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhaṃ, avasavattanaṭṭhena anattāti kuto tattha paṇḍitassa
atk-s0503a:323_0: Idāni ñātatīraṇapariññāsu patiṭṭhitassa upari saha maggaphalena pahānapariññaṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:323_1: “yato kho te, bāhiyā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha yatoti yadā, yasmā vā. Teti tava. Tatoti
atk-s0503a:323_2: tadā, tasmā vā. Tenāti tena diṭṭhādinā, diṭṭhādipaṭibaddhena rāgādinā vā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:323_3: hoti – bāhiya, tava yasmiṃ kāle yena vā kāraṇena diṭṭhādīsu mayā vuttavidhiṃ paṭipajjantassa
atk-s0503a:323_4: aviparītasabhāvāvabodhena diṭṭhādimattaṃ bhavissati, tasmiṃ kāle tena vā kāraṇena
atk-s0503a:323_5: diṭṭhādipaṭibaddhena rāgādinā saha na bhavissasi, ratto vā duṭṭho vā mūḷho vā na
atk-s0503a:323_6: bhavissasi, pahīnarāgādikattā tena vā diṭṭhādinā saha paṭibaddho na bhavissasīti.
atk-s0503a:323_7: Tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tatthāti yadā yasmā vā tvaṃ tena rāgena vā ratto dosena vā
atk-s0503a:323_8: duṭṭho mohena vā mūḷho na bhavissasi, tadā tasmā vā tvaṃ tattha diṭṭhādike na bhavissasi,
atk-s0503a:323_9: tasmiṃ diṭṭhe vā sutamutaviññāte vā “etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi
atk-s0503a:323_10: allīno patiṭṭhito na bhavissasi. Ettāvatā pahānapariññaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā khīṇāsavabhūmi dassitā.
atk-s0503a:324_0: Tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarenāti yadā tvaṃ, bāhiya, tena
atk-s0503a:324_1: rāgādinā tattha diṭṭhādīsu paṭibaddho na bhavissasi, tadā tvaṃ neva idhaloke na paraloke
atk-s0503a:324_2: na ubhayatthāpi. Esevanto dukkhassāti kilesadukkhassa ca vaṭṭadukkhassa ca ayameva
atk-s0503a:324_3: hi anto ayaṃ parivaṭumabhāvoti ayameva hi ettha attho. Ye pana “ubhayamantarenā”ti
atk-s0503a:324_4: padaṃ gahetvā antarābhavaṃ nāma icchanti, tesaṃ taṃ micchā. Antarābhavassa hi bhāvo
atk-s0503a:324_5: abhidhamme paṭikkhittoyeva. Antarenāti vacanaṃ pana vikappantaradīpanaṃ, tasmā ayamettha
atk-s0503a:324_6: attho – “neva idha na huraṃ, aparo vikappo na ubhaya”nti.
atk-s0503a:325_0: Atha vā antarenāti vacanaṃ pana vikappantarābhāvadīpanaṃ. Tassattho – “neva idha
atk-s0503a:325_1: na huraṃ, ubhayamantare pana na aññaṭṭhānaṃ atthī”ti. Yepi ca “antarāparinibbāyī
atk-s0503a:325_2: sambhavesī”ti ca imesaṃ suttapadānaṃ atthaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “atthiyeva antarābhavo”ti
atk-s0503a:325_3: vadanti, tepi yasmā avihādīsu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā antarā aggamaggādhigamena
atk-s0503a:325_5: purimassa suttapadassa attho. Pacchimassa ca ye bhūtā eva, na bhavissanti, te khīṇāsavā
atk-s0503a:325_6: purimapade bhūtāti vuttā. Tabbiruddhatāya sambhavamesantīti sambhavesino, appahīnabhavasaṃyojanattā
atk-s0503a:325_7: sekhā puthujjanā ca. Catūsu vā yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujasattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca
atk-s0503a:325_8: na bhindanti, tāva sambhavesī nāma, aṇḍakosato vatthikosato ca bahi nikkhantā bhūtā
atk-s0503a:325_9: nāma. Saṃsedajā opapātikā ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesī nāma, dutiyacittakkhaṇato
atk-s0503a:325_10: paṭṭhāya bhūtā nāma. Yena vā iriyāpathena jāyanti, yāva tato aññaṃ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0503a:325_11: tāva sambhavesino, tato paraṃ bhūtāti attho. Tasmā natthīti paṭikkhipitabbā. Sati
atk-s0503a:325_12: hi ujuke pāḷianugate atthe kiṃ aniddhāritasāmatthiyena antarābhavena parikappitena payojananti.
atk-s0503a:326_0: Ye pana “santānavasena pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ avicchedena desantaresu pātubhāvo
atk-s0503a:326_1: diṭṭho, yathā taṃ vīhiādiaviññāṇakasantāne, evaṃ saviññāṇakasantānepi avicchedena
atk-s0503a:326_2: desantaresu pātubhāvena bhavitabbaṃ. Ayañca nayo sati antarābhave yujjati, na aññathā”ti
atk-s0503a:326_3: yuttiṃ vadanti. Tena hi iddhimato cetovasippattassa cittānugatikaṃ kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa
atk-s0503a:326_4: khaṇena brahmalokato idhūpasaṅkamane ito vā brahmalokagamane yutti vattabbā. Yadi
atk-s0503a:326_5: sabbattheva avicchinnadese dhammānaṃ pavatti icchitā, yadipi siyā iddhimantānaṃ iddhivisayo
atk-s0503a:326_6: acinteyyoti. Taṃ idhāpi samānaṃ “kammavipāko acinteyyo”ti vacanato. Tasmā taṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:326_7: matimattameva. Acinteyyasabhāvā hi sabhāvadhammā, te katthaci paccayavasena vicchinnadese
atk-s0503a:326_8: pātubhavanti, katthaci avicchinnadese. Tathā hi mukhaghosādīhi paccayehi aññasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:326_10: dissati, tasmā na sabbaṃ sabbattha upanetabbanti ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana
atk-s0503a:326_11: paṭibimbassa udāharaṇabhāvasādhanādiko antarābhavakathāvicāro kathāvatthupakaraṇassa ṭīkāyaṃ gahetabbo.
atk-s0503a:327_0: Apare pana “idhāti kāmabhavo, huranti arūpabhavo, ubhayamantarenāti rūpabhavo vutto”ti.
atk-s0503a:327_1: Aññe “idhāti ajjhattikāyatanāni, huranti bāhirāyatanāni, ubhayamantarenāti cittacetasikā”ti.
atk-s0503a:327_2: “Idhāti vā paccayadhammā, huranti paccayuppannadhammā, ubhayamantarenāti paṇṇattidhammā
atk-s0503a:327_3: vuttā”ti vadanti. Taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu natthi. Evaṃ tāva “diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ
atk-s0503a:327_4: bhavissatī”tiādinā diṭṭhādivasena catudhā tebhūmakadhammā saṅgahetabbā. Tattha subhasukhaniccaattaggāhaparivajjanamukhena
atk-s0503a:327_5: asubhadukkhāniccānattānupassanā dassitāti heṭṭhimāhi visuddhīhi saddhiṃ saṅkhepeneva
atk-s0503a:327_6: vipassanā kathitā. “Tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tenā”ti iminā rāgādīnaṃ samucchedassa adhippetattā
atk-s0503a:327_7: maggo. “Tato tvaṃ, bāhiya, na tatthā”ti iminā phalaṃ. “Nevidhā”tiādinā anupādisesā
atk-s0503a:327_8: parinibbānadhātu kathitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho bāhiyassa…pe… āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccī”ti.
atk-s0503a:328_0: Imāya saṃkhittapadāya desanāya tāvadevāti tasmiṃyeva khaṇe, na kālantare. Anupādāyāti
atk-s0503a:328_1: aggahetvā. Āsavehīti ābhavaggaṃ āgotrabhuṃ savanato pavattanato cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena
atk-s0503a:328_2: madirādiāsavasadisatāya ca “āsavā”ti laddhanāmehi kāmarāgādīhi. Vimuccīti samucchedavimuttiyā
atk-s0503a:328_3: paṭippassaddhivimuttiyā ca vimucci nissajji. So hi satthu dhammaṃ suṇanto eva sīlāni
atk-s0503a:328_4: sodhetvā yathāladdhaṃ cittasamādhiṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā khippābhiññatāya
atk-s0503a:328_5: tāvadeva sabbāsave khepetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. So saṃsārasotaṃ
atk-s0503a:328_6: chinditvā katavaṭṭapariyanto antimadehadharo hutvā ekūnavīsatiyā paccavekkhaṇāsu
atk-s0503a:328_7: pavattāsu dhammatāya codiyamāno bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci. “Paripuṇṇaṃ te pattacīvara”nti
atk-s0503a:328_8: puṭṭho “na paripuṇṇa”nti āha. Atha naṃ satthā “tena hi pattacīvaraṃ pariyesā”ti vatvā
atk-s0503a:328_9: pakkāmi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho bhagavā…pe… pakkāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:329_0: So kira kassapadasabalassa sāsane vīsavassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ karonto “bhikkhunā
atk-s0503a:329_1: nāma attanā paccaye labhitvā yathādānaṃ karontena attanāva paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0503a:329_2: ekassa bhikkhussapi pattena vā cīvarena vā saṅgahaṃ nākāsi, tenassa ehibhikkhuupasampadāya
atk-s0503a:329_3: upanissayo nāhosi. Keci panāhu – “so kira buddhasuññe loke coro hutvā dhanukalāpaṃ
atk-s0503a:329_4: sannayhitvā araññe corikaṃ karonto ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pattacīvaralobhena taṃ
atk-s0503a:329_5: usunā vijjhitvā pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhi, tenassa iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ na uppajjissatīti,
atk-s0503a:329_6: satthā taṃ ñatvā ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjaṃ na adāsī”ti. Tampi pattacīvarapariyesanaṃ
atk-s0503a:329_7: caramānaṃ ekā dhenu vegena āpatantī paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi. Taṃ sandhāya
atk-s0503a:329_8: vuttaṃ “atha kho acirapakkantassa bhagavato bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyaṃ gāvī taruṇavacchā
atk-s0503a:330_0: Tattha acirapakkantassāti na ciraṃ pakkantassa bhagavato. Gāvī taruṇavacchāti ekā
atk-s0503a:330_1: yakkhinī taruṇavacchadhenurūpā. Adhipatitvāti abhibhavitvā madditvā. Jīvitā voropesīti
atk-s0503a:330_2: purimasmiṃ attabhāve laddhāghātatāya diṭṭhamatteneva vericittaṃ uppādetvā siṅgena
atk-s0503a:331_0: Satthā piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nagarato nikkhamanto
atk-s0503a:331_1: bāhiyassa sarīraṃ saṅkāraṭṭhāne patitaṃ disvā bhikkhū āṇāpesi – “bhikkhave, ekasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:331_2: gharadvāre ṭhatvā mañcakaṃ āharāpetvā idaṃ sarīraṃ nagarato nīharitvā jhāpetvā thūpaṃ
atk-s0503a:331_3: karothā”ti, bhikkhū tathā akaṃsu. Katvā ca pana vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0503a:331_4: attanā katakiccaṃ ārocetvā tassa abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ bhagavā tassa
atk-s0503a:331_5: parinibbutabhāvaṃ ācikkhi. Bhikkhū “tumhe, bhante, ‘bāhiyo dārucīriyo arahattaṃ patto’ti
atk-s0503a:331_6: vadatha, kadā so arahattaṃ patto”ti pucchiṃsu. “Mama dhammaṃ sutakāle”ti ca vutte
atk-s0503a:331_7: “kadā panassa tumhehi dhammo kathito”ti? “Piṇḍāya carantena ajjeva antaravīthiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:331_8: ṭhatvā”ti. “Appamattako so, bhante, tumhehi antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā kathitadhammo,
atk-s0503a:331_9: kathaṃ so tāvatakena visesaṃ nibbattesī”ti? “Kiṃ, bhikkhave, mama dhammaṃ ‘appaṃ
atk-s0503a:331_10: vā bahuṃ vā’ti pamiṇatha, anekāni gāthāsahassānipi anatthasaṃhitāni na seyyo, atthanissitaṃ
atk-s0503a:333: Ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammatī”ti. –
atk-s0503a:334_0: Dhammapade imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā “na kevalaṃ so parinibbānamattena, atha kho mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0503a:334_1: bhikkhūnaṃ khippābhiññānaṃ aggabhāvenapi pūjāraho”ti dassento “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0503a:334_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khippābhiññānaṃ, yadidaṃ bāhiyo dārucīriyo”ti taṃ āyasmantaṃ
atk-s0503a:334_3: etadagge ṭhapesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā…pe…
atk-s0503a:335_0: Tattha pacchābhattanti bhattakiccato pacchā. Piṇḍapātapaṭikkantoti piṇḍapātapariyesanato
atk-s0503a:335_1: paṭinivatto. Padadvayenāpi katabhattakiccoti vuttaṃ hoti. Nīharitvāti nagarato bahi
atk-s0503a:335_2: netvā. Jhāpethāti dahatha. Thūpañcassa karothāti assa bāhiyassa sarīradhātuyo gahetvā
atk-s0503a:335_3: cetiyañca karotha. Tattha kāraṇamāha – “sabrahmacārī vo, bhikkhave, kālakato”ti.
atk-s0503a:335_4: Tassattho – yaṃ tumhe seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmaṃ adhisīlādipaṭipattidhammaṃ sandiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0503a:335_5: caratha, taṃ so tumhehi samānaṃ brahmaṃ acarīti sabrahmacārī maraṇakālassa pattiyāva
atk-s0503a:335_6: kālakato, tasmā taṃ mañcakena nīharitvā jhāpetha, thūpañcassa karothāti.
atk-s0503a:336_0: Tassa kā gatīti pañcasu gatīsu tassa katamā gati upapatti bhavabhūtā, gatīti nipphatti,
