atk-s0503a:336_1: ariyo puthujjano vāti kā niṭṭhāti attho. Abhisamparāyoti pecca bhavuppatti bhavanirodho
atk-s0503a:336_2: vā. Kiñcāpi tassa thūpakaraṇāṇattiyāva parinibbutabhāvo atthato pakāsito hoti, ye
atk-s0503a:336_3: pana bhikkhū tattakena na jāniṃsu, te “tassa kā gatī”ti pucchiṃsu. Pākaṭataraṃ vā
atk-s0503a:337_0: Paṇḍitoti aggamaggapaññāya adhigatattā paṇḍena ito gato pavattoti paṇḍito. Paccapādīti
atk-s0503a:337_2: Atha vā dhammassāti nibbānadhammassa. Anudhammanti ariyamaggaphaladhammaṃ. Na ca
atk-s0503a:337_3: maṃ dhammādhikaraṇanti dhammadesanāhetu na ca maṃ vihesesi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipannattā.
atk-s0503a:337_4: Yo hi satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā gahetvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ na paṭipajjati,
atk-s0503a:337_5: so satthāraṃ viheseti nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “vihiṃsasaññī paguṇaṃ na bhāsiṃ,
atk-s0503a:337_6: dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ manujesu brahme”ti. Atha vā na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇanti na ca imaṃ
atk-s0503a:337_7: dhammādhikaraṇaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – vaṭṭadukkhato niyyānahetubhūtaṃ imaṃ mama sāsanadhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:337_8: suppaṭipannattā na viheseti. Duppaṭipanno hi sāsanaṃ bhindanto satthu dhammasarīre
atk-s0503a:337_9: pahāraṃ deti nāma. Ayaṃ pana sammāpaṭipattiṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0503a:337_10: parinibbāyi. Tena vuttaṃ – “parinibbuto, bhikkhave, bāhiyo dārucīriyo”ti.
atk-s0503a:338_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ therassa bāhiyassa anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:338_1: tathā parinibbutānañca khīṇāsavānaṃ gatiyā pacurajanehi dubbiññeyyabhāvaṃ sabbākārato
atk-s0503a:338_2: viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ appatiṭṭhitaparinibbānānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:339_0: Tattha yatthāti yasmiṃ nibbāne āpo ca na gādhati, pathavī ca tejo ca vāyo ca na gādhati,
atk-s0503a:339_1: na patiṭṭhāti. Kasmā? Nibbānassa asaṅkhatasabhāvattā. Na hi tattha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ
atk-s0503a:339_2: lesopi sambhavati. Sukkāti sukkavaṇṇatāya sukkāti laddhanāmā gahanakkhattatārakā.
atk-s0503a:339_3: Na jotantīti na bhāsanti. Ādicco nappakāsatīti tīsu dīpesu ekasmiṃ khaṇe ālokapharaṇasamattho
atk-s0503a:339_4: ādiccopi ābhāvasena na dibbati. Na tattha candimā bhātīti satipi bhāsurabhāve kantasītalakiraṇo
atk-s0503a:339_5: candopi tasmiṃ nibbāne abhāvato eva attano juṇhāvibhāsanena na virocati. Yadi tattha
atk-s0503a:339_6: candimasūriyādayo natthi, lokantaro viya niccandhakārameva taṃ bhaveyyāti āsaṅkaṃ
atk-s0503a:339_7: sandhāyāha “tamo tattha na vijjatī”ti. Sati hi rūpābhāve tamo nāma na siyā.
atk-s0503a:340_0: Yadā ca attanā vedi, muni monena brāhmaṇoti catusaccamunanato monanti laddhanāmena
atk-s0503a:340_1: maggañāṇena kāyamoneyyādīhi ca samannāgatattā “munī”ti laddhanāmo ariyasāvakabrāhmaṇo
atk-s0503a:340_2: teneva monasaṅkhātena paṭivedhañāṇena yadā yasmiṃ kāle aggamaggakkhaṇe attanā sayameva
atk-s0503a:340_3: anussavādike pahāya attapaccakkhaṃ katvā nibbānaṃ vedi paṭivijjhi. “Avedī”tipi pāṭho,
atk-s0503a:340_4: aññāsīti attho. Atha rūpā arūpā ca, sukhadukkhā pamuccatīti athāti tassa nibbānassa
atk-s0503a:340_5: jānanato pacchā. Rūpāti rūpadhammā, tena pañcavokārabhavo ekavokārabhavo ca gahito
atk-s0503a:340_6: hoti. Arūpāti arūpadhammā, tena rūpenāmissīkato arūpabhavo gahito hoti. So “catuvokārabhavo”tipi
atk-s0503a:340_7: vuccati. Sukhadukkhāti sabbattha uppajjanakasukhadukkhatopi vaṭṭato. Atha vā rūpāti
atk-s0503a:340_9: Kāmabhavo hi byāmissasukhadukkho. Evametasmā sakalatopi vaṭṭato accantameva muccatīti
atk-s0503a:340_10: gāthādvayenapi bhagavā “mayhaṃ puttassa bāhiyassa evarūpā nibbānagatī”ti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:345_0: 11. Mucalindavaggassa paṭhame mucalindamūleti ettha mucalindo vuccati nīparukkho.
atk-s0503a:345_1: So “niculo”tipi vuccati, tassa samīpe. Keci pana “mucaloti tassa rukkhassa nāmaṃ,
atk-s0503a:345_2: taṃ vanajeṭṭhakatāya pana mucalindoti vutta”nti vadanti. Mahā akālameghoti asampatte
atk-s0503a:345_3: vassakāle uppannamahāmegho. So hi gimhānaṃ pacchime māse sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūrento
atk-s0503a:345_4: udapādi. Sattāhavaddalikāti tasmiṃ uppanne sattāhaṃ avicchinnavuṭṭhikā ahosi. Sītavātaduddinīti
atk-s0503a:345_5: sā ca sattāhavaddalikā udakaphusitasammissena sītavātena samantato paribbhamantena
atk-s0503a:345_6: dusitadivasattā duddinī nāma ahosi. Mucalindo nāma nāgarājāti tasseva mucalindarukkhassa
atk-s0503a:345_7: samīpe pokkharaṇiyā heṭṭhā nāgabhavanaṃ atthi, tattha nibbatto mahānubhāvo nāgarājā.
atk-s0503a:345_8: Sakabhavanāti attano nāgabhavanato. Sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvāti sattavāre
atk-s0503a:345_9: attano sarīrabhogehi bhagavato kāyaṃ parivāretvā. Uparimuddhani mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ vihaccāti
atk-s0503a:345_10: bhagavato muddhappadesassa upari attano mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ pasāretvā. “Phaṇaṃ karitvā”tipi pāṭho, so evattho.
atk-s0503a:346_0: Tassa kira nāgarājassa etadahosi “bhagavā ca mayhaṃ bhavanasamīpe rukkhamūle nisinno,
atk-s0503a:346_1: ayañca sattāhavaddalikā vattati, vāsāgāramassa laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So sattaratanamayaṃ
atk-s0503a:346_2: pāsādaṃ nimminituṃ sakkontopi “evaṃ kate kāyasāro gahito na bhavissati, dasabalassa
atk-s0503a:346_3: kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ karissāmī”ti mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā satthāraṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi
atk-s0503a:346_4: parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ katvā dhāresi. “Parikkhepabbhantaraṃ lohapāsāde bhaṇḍāgāragabbhappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:346_6: “Icchiticchitena iriyāpathena satthā viharissatī”ti kira nāgarājassa ajjhāsayo. Bhagavā
atk-s0503a:346_7: pana yathānisinnova sattāhaṃ vītināmesi. Tañca ṭhānaṃ supihitavātapānaṃ suphusitaaggaḷadvāraṃ
atk-s0503a:346_8: kūṭāgāraṃ viya ahosi. Mā bhagavantaṃ sītantiādi tassa tathā karitvā ṭhānakāraṇaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:346_9: So hi “mā bhagavantaṃ sītaṃ bādhayittha, mā uṇhaṃ, mā ḍaṃsādisamphasso bādhayitthā”ti
atk-s0503a:347_0: Tattha kiñcāpi sattāhavaddalikāya uṇhameva natthi, sace pana antarantarā megho vigaccheyya,
atk-s0503a:347_1: uṇhaṃ bhaveyya, tampi mā bādhayitthāti evaṃ tassa cintetuṃ yuttaṃ. Keci panettha
atk-s0503a:347_3: hi tasmiṃ bhagavantaṃ nāgassa sarīrasambhūtā usmā bādheyya, vipulabhāvakaraṇena pana
atk-s0503a:347_4: tādisaṃ ‘mā uṇhaṃ bādhayitthā’ti tathā karitvā aṭṭhāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:348_0: Viddhanti ubbiddhaṃ, meghavigamena dūrībhūtanti attho. Vigatavalāhakanti apagatameghaṃ.
atk-s0503a:348_1: Devanti ākāsaṃ. Viditvāti “idāni vigatavalāhako ākāso, natthi bhagavato sītādiupaddavo”ti
atk-s0503a:348_2: ñatvā. Viniveṭhetvāti apanetvā. Sakavaṇṇanti attano nāgarūpaṃ. Paṭisaṃharitvāti antaradhāpetvā.
atk-s0503a:349: Etamatthanti vivekasukhappaṭisaṃvedino yattha katthaci sukhameva hotīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārena jānitvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ vivekasukhānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:350_0: Tattha sukho vivekoti nibbānasaṅkhāto upadhiviveko sukho. Tuṭṭhassāti catumaggañāṇasantosena
atk-s0503a:350_1: tuṭṭhassa. Sutadhammassāti pakāsitadhammassa vissutadhammassa. Passatoti taṃ vivekaṃ,
atk-s0503a:350_2: yaṃ vā kiñci passitabbaṃ nāma, taṃ sabbaṃ attano vīriyabalādhigatena ñāṇacakkhunā
atk-s0503a:350_3: passantassa. Abyāpajjanti akuppanabhāvo, etena mettāpubbabhāgo dassito. Pāṇabhūtesu
atk-s0503a:350_4: saṃyamoti sattesu ca saṃyamo avihiṃsanabhāvo sukhoti attho. Etena karuṇāpubbabhāgo dassito.
atk-s0503a:351_0: Sukhā virāgatā loketi vigatarāgatāpi loke sukhā. Kīdisī? Kāmānaṃ samatikkamoti, yā
atk-s0503a:351_1: kāmānaṃ samatikkamoti vuccati, sā vigatarāgatāpi sukhāti attho, etena anāgāmimaggo
atk-s0503a:351_2: kathito. Asmimānassa yo vinayoti iminā pana arahattaṃ kathitaṃ. Arahattañhi asmimānassa
atk-s0503a:351_3: paṭippassaddhivinayoti vuccati, ito parañca sukhaṃ nāma natthi, tenāha “etaṃ ve paramaṃ
atk-s0503a:351_4: sukha”nti. Evaṃ arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhīti.
atk-s0503a:354_0: 12. Dutiye sambahulānanti vinayapariyāyena tayo janā “sambahulā”ti vuccanti, tato
atk-s0503a:354_1: paraṃ saṅgho. Suttantapariyāyena pana tayo tayo eva, tato uddhaṃ sambahulā. Tasmā
atk-s0503a:354_2: idhāpi suttantapariyāyena sambahulāti veditabbā. Upaṭṭhānasālāyanti dhammasabhāmaṇḍape.
atk-s0503a:354_3: Sā hi dhammaṃ desetuṃ āgatassa tathāgatassa bhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhānakaraṇaṭṭhānanti “upaṭṭhānasālā”ti
atk-s0503a:354_4: vuccati. Atha vā yattha bhikkhū vinayaṃ vinicchinanti, dhammaṃ kathenti, sākacchaṃ
atk-s0503a:354_5: samāpajjanti, sannipatanavasena pakatiyā upatiṭṭhanti, sā sālāpi maṇḍapopi “upaṭṭhānasālā”tveva
atk-s0503a:354_6: vuccati. Tatthāpi hi buddhāsanaṃ niccaṃ paññattameva hoti. Idañhi buddhānaṃ dharamānakāle
atk-s0503a:354_7: bhikkhūnaṃ cārittaṃ. Sannisinnānanti nisajjanavasena saṅgamma nisinnānaṃ. Sannipatitānanti
atk-s0503a:354_8: tato tato āgantvā sannipatanavasena sannipatitānaṃ. Atha vā buddhāsanaṃ purato katvā
atk-s0503a:354_9: satthu sammukhe viya ādaruppattiyā sakkaccaṃ nisīdanavasena sannisinnānaṃ, samānajjhāsayattā
atk-s0503a:354_10: aññamaññasmiṃ ajjhāsayena suṭṭhu sammā ca nipatanavasena sannipatitānaṃ. Ayanti idāni
atk-s0503a:354_12: aññā ekā kathā, atha vā majjhanhike laddhassa sugatovādassa, sāyaṃ labhitabbassa
atk-s0503a:354_13: dhammassavanassa ca antarā pavattattā antarākathā, samaṇasamācārasseva vā antarā
atk-s0503a:354_14: pavattā aññā ekā kathāti antarākathā. Udapādīti uppannā.
atk-s0503a:355_0: Imesaṃ dvinnaṃ rājūnanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. Mahaddhanataro vātiādīsu pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0503a:355_1: nikhaṇitvā ṭhapitaṃ sattaratananicayasaṅkhātaṃ mahantaṃ dhanaṃ etassāti mahaddhano,
atk-s0503a:355_2: dvīsu ayaṃ atisayena mahaddhanoti mahaddhanataro. Vāsaddo vikappattho. Sesapadesupi
atk-s0503a:355_3: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – niccaparibbayavasena mahanto bhogo etassāti mahābhogo.
atk-s0503a:355_4: Devasikaṃ pavisanaāyabhūto mahanto koso etassāti mahākoso. Apare pana “devasikaṃ
atk-s0503a:355_6: sāragabbhādīsu nihitaṃ koso”ti vadanti. Vajiro, mahānīlo, indanīlo, marakato, veḷuriyo,
atk-s0503a:355_7: padumarāgo, phussarāgo, kakketano, pulāko, vimalo, lohitaṅko, phaliko, pavāḷo, jotiraso,
atk-s0503a:355_8: gomuttako, gomedako, sogandhiko, muttā, saṅkho, añjanamūlo, rājapaṭṭo, amataṃsako,
atk-s0503a:355_9: piyako, brāhmaṇī cāti catubbīsati maṇi nāma. Satta lohāni kahāpaṇo ca sāro nāma.
atk-s0503a:355_12: dhaññavikatiṃ ādiṃ katvā yaṃ sattānaṃ upabhogaparibhogabhūtaṃ vatthu, taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0503a:355_13: saṅgayhati. Mahantaṃ vijitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ etassāti mahāvijito. Mahanto hatthiassādivāhano
atk-s0503a:355_14: etassāti mahāvāhano. Mahantaṃ senābalañceva thāmabalañca etassāti mahabbalo. Icchitanibbattisaṅkhātā
atk-s0503a:355_15: puññakammanipphannā mahatī iddhi etassāti mahiddhiko. Tejasaṅkhāto ussāhamantapabhusattisaṅkhāto
atk-s0503a:356_0: Ettha ca paṭhamena āyasampadā, dutiyena vittūpakaraṇasampadā, tatiyena vibhavasampadā,
atk-s0503a:356_1: catutthena janapadasampadā, pañcamena yānasampadā, chaṭṭhena parivārasampadāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0503a:356_2: attasampadā, sattamena puññakammasampadā, aṭṭhamena pabhāvasampadā tesaṃ rājūnaṃ
atk-s0503a:356_3: pakāsitā hoti. Tena yā sā sāmisampatti, amaccasampatti, senāsampatti, raṭṭhasampatti,
atk-s0503a:356_4: vibhavasampatti, mittasampatti, duggasampattīti satta pakatisampadā rājūnaṃ icchitabbā.
atk-s0503a:357_0: Dānādīhi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisaṃ rañjetīti rājā. Magadhānaṃ issaroti māgadho.
atk-s0503a:357_1: Mahatiyā senāya samannāgatattā seniyagottattā vā seniyo. Bimbi vuccati suvaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:357_2: tasmā sārabimbivaṇṇatāya bimbisāro. Keci pana “nāmamevetaṃ tassa rañño”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:357_3: Paccāmittaṃ parasenaṃ jinātīti pasenadi. Kosalaraṭṭhassa adhipatīti kosalo. Ayañcarahīti
atk-s0503a:357_4: ettha carahīti nipātamattaṃ. Vippakatāti apariyositā. Ayaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antarākathā aniṭṭhitāti attho.
atk-s0503a:358_0: Sāyanhasamayanti sāyanhe ekaṃ samayaṃ. Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti tato tato rūpādiārammaṇato
atk-s0503a:358_2: vuṭṭhito. Bhagavā hi pubbaṇhasamayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0503a:358_3: sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ katvā katabhattakicco bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sāvatthito nikkhamitvā
atk-s0503a:358_4: vihāraṃ pavisitvā gandhakuṭippamukhe ṭhatvā vattaṃ dassetvā ṭhitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yathāsamuṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0503a:358_5: sugatovādaṃ datvā tesu araññarukkhamūlādidivāṭṭhānaṃ uddissa gatesu gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0503a:358_6: phalasamāpattisukhena divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā yathākālaparicchede samāpattito vuṭṭhāya,
atk-s0503a:358_7: “mayhaṃ upagamanaṃ āgamayamānā catasso parisā sakalavihāraṃ paripūrentiyo nisinnā,
atk-s0503a:358_8: idāni me dhammadesanatthaṃ dhammasabhāmaṇḍalaṃ upagantuṃ kālo”ti āsanato vuṭṭhāya,
atk-s0503a:358_9: kesarasīho viya kañcanaguhāya surabhigandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā yūthaṃ upasaṅkamanto
atk-s0503a:358_12: vasena chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjentiyā acinteyyānubhāvāya anupamāya buddhalīlāya
atk-s0503a:358_13: samannāgatāya rūpakāyasampattiyā sakalavihāraṃ ekālokaṃ kurumāno upaṭṭhānasālaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:359_0: Evaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vattaṃ dassetvā nisinne te bhikkhū tuṇhībhūte disvā “mayi akathente
atk-s0503a:359_1: ime bhikkhū buddhagāravena kappampi na kathessantī”ti kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ “kāya
atk-s0503a:359_2: nuttha, bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Tattha kāya nutthāti katamāya nu bhavatha. “Kāya notthā”tipi
atk-s0503a:359_3: pāḷi, so evattho, “kāya nvetthā”tipi paṭhanti, tassa katamāya nu etthāti attho. Tatrāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:359_4: saṅkhepattho – bhikkhave, katamāya nāma kathāya idha sannisinnā bhavatha, katamā
atk-s0503a:359_5: ca tumhākaṃ kathā mamāgamanapaccayā aniṭṭhitā, taṃ niṭṭhāpessāmīti evaṃ sabbaññupavāraṇāya pavāresi.
atk-s0503a:360_0: Na khvetanti na kho etaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. “Na khota”ntipi paṭhanti, na kho etaṃ
atk-s0503a:360_1: icceva padavibhāgo. Kulaputtānanti jātiācārakulaputtānaṃ. Saddhāti saddhāya, kammaphalasaddhāya
atk-s0503a:360_2: ratanattayasaddhāya ca. Agārasmāti gharato, gahaṭṭhabhāvāti attho. Anagāriyanti pabbajjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:360_3: Pabbajitānanti upagatānaṃ. Yanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ padayojanā – “bhikkhave,
atk-s0503a:360_4: tumhe neva rājābhinītā na corābhinītā na iṇaṭṭā na jīvitapakatā pabbajitā, atha kho
atk-s0503a:360_5: saddhāya agārato nikkhamitvā mama sāsane pabbajitā, tumhe etarahi evarūpiṃ rājappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:360_6: tiracchānakathaṃ katheyyātha, yaṃ evarūpāya kathāya kathanaṃ, etaṃ tumhākaṃ na kho
atk-s0503a:361_0: Evaṃ sannipatitānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ appatirūpaṃ paṭikkhipitvā idāni nesaṃ patirūpaṃ
atk-s0503a:361_1: paṭipattiṃ anujānanto “sannipatitānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhammī vā kathā
atk-s0503a:361_2: ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo”ti āha. Tattha voti tumhākaṃ. Karaṇīyanti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā
atk-s0503a:361_3: kattari sāmivacanametaṃ, tasmā tumhehīti attho. Dvayaṃ karaṇīyanti dve kātabbā. Dhammī
atk-s0503a:361_4: kathāti catusaccadhammato anapetā kathā, pavattinivattiparidīpinī dhammadesanāti
atk-s0503a:361_5: attho. Dasakathāvatthusaṅkhātāpi hi dhammakathā tadekadesā evāti. Ariyoti ekantahitāvahattā
atk-s0503a:361_6: ariyo, visuddho uttamoti vā ariyo. Tuṇhībhāvoti samathavipassanābhāvanābhūtaṃ akathanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:361_7: Keci pana “vacīsaṅkhārapaṭipakkhabhāvato dutiyajjhānaṃ ariyo tuṇhībhāvo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:361_8: Apare “catutthajjhānaṃ ariyo tuṇhībhāvo”ti vadanti. Ayaṃ panettha attho – “bhikkhave,
atk-s0503a:361_9: cittavivekassa paribrūhanatthaṃ vivekaṭṭhakāyā suññāgāre viharantā sace kadāci sannipatatha,
atk-s0503a:361_10: evaṃ sannipatitehi tumhehi ‘assutaṃ sāveti sutaṃ vā pariyodapetī’ti vuttanayena aññamaññassūpakārāya
atk-s0503a:361_11: khandhādīnaṃ aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttā dhammakathā vā pavattetabbā, aññamaññaṃ abyābādhanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:362_0: Tattha purimena karaṇīyavacanena anotiṇṇānaṃ sāsane otaraṇūpāyaṃ dasseti, pacchimena
atk-s0503a:362_1: otiṇṇānaṃ saṃsārato nissaraṇūpāyaṃ. Purimena vā āgamaveyyattiye niyojeti, pacchimena
atk-s0503a:362_2: adhigamaveyyattiye. Atha vā purimena sammādiṭṭhiyā paṭhamaṃ uppattihetuṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0503a:363: “Dveme, bhikkhave, hetū dve paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāya parato ca ghoso, paccattañca yoniso manasikāro”ti.
atk-s0503a:364: Purimena vā lokiyasammādiṭṭhiyā mūlakāraṇaṃ vibhāveti, pacchimena lokuttarasammādiṭṭhiyā mūlakāraṇanti evamādinā ettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:365_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti tehi bhikkhūhi kittitakāmasampattito jhānādisampatti santatarā
atk-s0503a:365_1: ceva paṇītatarā cāti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ ariyavihārasukhānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:366: Tattha yañca kāmasukhaṃ loketi lokasaddo “khandhaloko āyatanaloko dhātuloko”tiādīsu saṅkhāresu āgato.
atk-s0503a:371_0: Ādīsu okāse āgato. “Addasā kho bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento”tiādīsu sattesu.
atk-s0503a:371_1: Idha pana sattaloke okāsaloke ca veditabbo. Tasmā avīcito paṭṭhāya upari brahmalokato
atk-s0503a:371_2: heṭṭhā etasmiṃ loke yaṃ vatthukāme paṭicca kilesakāmavasena uppajjanato kāmasahagataṃ
atk-s0503a:371_3: sukhaṃ. Yañcidaṃ diviyaṃ sukhanti yañca idaṃ divi bhavaṃ dibbavihāravasena ca laddhabbaṃ
atk-s0503a:371_4: brahmānaṃ manussānañca rūpasamāpattisukhaṃ. Taṇhakkhayasukhassāti yaṃ āgamma taṇhā
atk-s0503a:371_5: khīyati, taṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā taṇhāya ca paṭipassambhanavasena pavattaphalasamāpattisukhaṃ
atk-s0503a:371_6: taṇhakkhayasukhaṃ nāma, tassa taṇhakkhayasukhassa. Eteti liṅgavipallāsena niddeso,
atk-s0503a:371_7: etāni sukhānīti attho. Keci ubhayampi sukhasāmaññena gahetvā “eta”nti paṭhanti, tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:372_0: Soḷasinti soḷasannaṃ pūraṇiṃ. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – cakkavattisukhaṃ ādiṃ katvā
atk-s0503a:372_1: sabbasmiṃ manussaloke manussasukhaṃ, nāgasupaṇṇādiloke nāgādīhi anubhavitabbaṃ sukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:372_2: cātumahārājikādidevaloke chabbidhaṃ kāmasukhanti yaṃ ekādasavidhe kāmaloke uppajjantaṃ
atk-s0503a:372_3: kāmasukhaṃ, yañca idaṃ rūpārūpadevesu dibbavihārabhūtesu rūpārūpajjhānesu ca uppannattā
atk-s0503a:372_5: phalasamāpattisukhaṃ soḷasa bhāge katvā tato ekabhāgaṃ soḷasabhāgaguṇe laddhaṃ ekabhāgasaṅkhātaṃ kalaṃ na agghatīti.
atk-s0503a:373: Ayañca atthavaṇṇanā phalasamāpattisāmaññena vuttā. Pāḷiyaṃ avisesena taṇhakkhayassa āgatattā paṭhamaphalasamāpattisukhassāpi kalaṃ lokiyaṃ na agghati eva. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:377_0: “Kiñcāpi, bhikkhave, rājā cakkavattī catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0503a:377_1: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sahabyataṃ,
atk-s0503a:377_2: so tattha nandane vane accharāsaṅghaparivuto dibbehi ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito
atk-s0503a:377_3: samaṅgībhūto paricāreti, so catūhi dhammehi asamannāgato. Atha kho so aparimuttova
atk-s0503a:377_4: nirayā, aparimutto tiracchānayoniyā, aparimutto pettivisayā, aparimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
atk-s0503a:377_5: Kiñcāpi, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako piṇḍiyālopena yāpeti, nantakāni ca dhāreti, so catūhi
atk-s0503a:377_6: dhammehi samannāgato, atha kho so parimutto nirayā, parimutto tiracchānayoniyā, parimutto
atk-s0503a:378_0: “Katamehi catūhi? Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato
atk-s0503a:378_1: hoti ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ…pe... buddho bhagavā’ti. Dhamme aveccappasādena…pe…
atk-s0503a:378_2: viññūhī’ti. Saṅghe aveccappasādena…pe… puññakkhettaṃ lokassā’ti. Ariyakantehi sīlehi
atk-s0503a:378_3: samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi…pe… samādhisaṃvattanikehi. Imehi catūhi dhammehi samannāgato
atk-s0503a:378_4: hoti. Yo ca, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ paṭilābho, yo catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭilābho,
atk-s0503a:378_5: catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ paṭilābho catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭilābhassa kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasi”nti.
atk-s0503a:379: Evaṃ bhagavā sabbattha lokiyasukhaṃ sauttaraṃ sātisayaṃ, lokuttarasukhameva anuttaranti atisayanti bhājesīti.
atk-s0503a:382_0: 13. Tatiye kumārakāti dārakā. Antarā ca sāvatthiṃ antarā ca jetavananti antarāsaddo
atk-s0503a:382_1: “tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya, aññatra tathāgatā”ti, “janā saṅgamma mantenti, mañca tvañca
atk-s0503a:382_2: kimantara”ntiādīsu kāraṇe āgato. “Addasā maṃ, bhante, aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya
atk-s0503a:382_3: bhājanaṃ dhovantī”tiādīsu khaṇe. “Yassantarato na santi kopā”tiādīsu citte. “Antarā
atk-s0503a:382_4: vosānamāpādī”tiādīsu vemajjhe. “Apicāyaṃ, bhikkhave, tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ
atk-s0503a:382_5: antarikāya āgacchatī”tiādīsu vivare. Svāyamidhāpi vivare veditabbo. Tasmā sāvatthiyā
atk-s0503a:382_6: ca jetavanassa ca vivareti, evamettha attho veditabbo. Antarāsaddayogato cettha upayogavacanaṃ
atk-s0503a:382_7: “antarā ca sāvatthiṃ antarā ca jetavana”nti. Īdisesu ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā
atk-s0503a:382_8: gāmañca nadiñca gacchatī”ti ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti, so dutiyapadenapi yojetabbo
atk-s0503a:383_0: Ahiṃ daṇḍena hanantīti bilato nikkhamitvā gocarāya gacchantaṃ kaṇhasappaṃ chātajjhattaṃ
atk-s0503a:383_1: anubandhitvā yaṭṭhīhi pothenti. Tena ca samayena bhagavā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya gacchanto
atk-s0503a:383_2: antarāmagge te dārake ahiṃ daṇḍena hanante disvā “kasmā kumārakā imaṃ ahiṃ daṇḍena
atk-s0503a:383_3: hanathā”ti pucchitvā “ḍaṃsanabhayena, bhante”ti ca vutte “ime attano sukhaṃ karissāmāti
atk-s0503a:383_4: imaṃ paharantā nibbattaṭṭhāne dukkhaṃ anubhavissanti, aho avijjāya nikatikosalla”nti
atk-s0503a:383_5: dhammasaṃvegaṃ uppādesi. Teneva ca dhammasaṃvegena udānaṃ udānesi. Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:384_0: Tattha etamatthaṃ viditvāti “ime dārakā attasukhāya paradukkhaṃ karontā sayaṃ parattha
atk-s0503a:384_1: sukhaṃ na labhissantī”ti etamatthaṃ jānitvāti evameke vaṇṇenti. Aññesaṃ duppaṭipannānaṃ
atk-s0503a:384_2: sukhapariyesanaṃ āyatiṃ dukkhāya saṃvattati, suppaṭipannānaṃ ekantena sukhāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0503a:384_3: Tasmā “paravihesāvinimuttā accantameva sukhabhāgino vata mayhaṃ ovādappaṭikarā”ti
atk-s0503a:384_4: somanassavasenevetampi satthā udānaṃ udānesīti vadanti. Apare pana bhaṇanti “evaṃ
atk-s0503a:384_5: tehi kumārakehi pavattitaṃ paraviheṭhanaṃ sabbākārena ādīnavato viditvā paravihesāya
atk-s0503a:384_6: parānukampāya ca yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:385_0: Tattha sukhakāmānīti ekanteneva attano sukhassa icchanato sukhānugiddhāni. Bhūtānīti
atk-s0503a:385_1: pāṇino. Yo daṇḍena vihiṃsatīti ettha daṇḍenāti desanāmattaṃ, daṇḍena vā leḍḍusatthapāṇippahārādīhi
atk-s0503a:385_2: vāti attho. Atha vā daṇḍenāti daṇḍanena. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo sukhakāmāni sabbabhūtāni
atk-s0503a:385_3: jātiādinā ghaṭṭanavasena vacīdaṇḍena vā pāṇimuggarasatthādīhi pothanatāḷanacchedanādivasena
atk-s0503a:385_4: sarīradaṇḍena vā sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā ṭhāpanavasena dhanadaṇḍena vāti imesu daṇḍesu
atk-s0503a:385_5: yena kenaci daṇḍena vihiṃsati viheṭheti dukkhaṃ pāpeti, attano sukhamesāno, pecca
atk-s0503a:385_6: so na labhate sukhanti so puggalo attano sukhaṃ esanto gavesanto patthento pecca
atk-s0503a:385_7: paraloke manussasukhaṃ dibbasukhaṃ nibbānasukhanti tividhampi sukhaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0503a:385_8: aññadatthu tena daṇḍena dukkhameva labhatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:386_0: Pecca so labhate sukhanti yo khantimettānuddayasampanno “yathāhaṃ sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo,
atk-s0503a:386_1: evaṃ sabbepī”ti cintetvā sampattaviratiādīsu ṭhito vuttanayena kenaci daṇḍena sabbānipi
atk-s0503a:386_2: bhūtāni na hiṃsati na bādhati, so puggalo paraloke manussabhūto manussasukhaṃ, devabhūto
atk-s0503a:386_3: dibbasukhaṃ, ubhayaṃ atikkamanto nibbānasukhaṃ labhatīti. Ettha ca tādisassa puggalassa
atk-s0503a:386_4: avassaṃbhāvitāya taṃ sukhaṃ paccuppannaṃ viya hotīti dassanatthaṃ “labhate”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:389_0: 14. Catutthe tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hotīti kappānaṃ satasahassādhikesu
atk-s0503a:389_1: catūsu asaṅkhyeyyesu paripūritassa puññasambhāravisesassa phalabhūtena “ito paraṃ
atk-s0503a:389_2: mayhaṃ okāso natthī”ti ussahajātena viya uparūpari vaḍḍhamānena sakkārādinā bhagavā
atk-s0503a:389_3: sakkato hoti. Sabbadisāsu hi yamakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā mahoghaṃ viya sabbapāramiyo
atk-s0503a:389_4: “ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ dassāmā”ti sampiṇḍitā viya bhagavato lābhasakkāramahoghaṃ
atk-s0503a:389_6: āgantvā “kahaṃ buddho, kahaṃ bhagavā, kahaṃ devadevo, kahaṃ narāsabho, kahaṃ purisasīho”ti
atk-s0503a:389_7: bhagavantaṃ pariyesanti. Sakaṭasatehi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā
atk-s0503a:389_8: gāvutappamāṇepi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuraṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti ceva anubandhanti ca
atk-s0503a:389_9: andhakavindabrāhmaṇādayo viya. Sabbaṃ taṃ khandhake tesu tesu ca suttesu āgatanayena
atk-s0503a:389_10: veditabbaṃ. Yathā ca bhagavato, evaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassāti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0503a:390: “Yāvatā kho, cunda, etarahi saṅghā vā gaṇā vā loke uppannā, nāhaṃ, cunda, aññaṃ ekasaṅghampi samanupassāmi evaṃ lābhaggayasaggappattaṃ, yatharivāyaṃ, cunda, bhikkhusaṅgho”ti.
atk-s0503a:391_0: Svāyaṃ bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro ekato hutvā dvinnaṃ
atk-s0503a:391_1: mahānadīnaṃ udakogho viya appameyyo ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ – “tena kho pana samayena
atk-s0503a:391_2: bhagavā sakkato hoti…pe… parikkhārānaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghopi sakkato…pe… parikkhārāna”nti.
atk-s0503a:392_0: Titthiyā pana pubbe akatapuññatāya ca duppaṭipannatāya ca asakkatā agarukatā, buddhuppādena
atk-s0503a:392_1: pana visesato vipannasobhā sūriyuggamane khajjopanakā viya nippabhā nittejā hatalābhasakkārā
atk-s0503a:392_2: ahesuṃ. Te tādisaṃ bhagavato saṅghassa ca lābhasakkāraṃ asahamānā issāpakatā “evaṃ
atk-s0503a:392_3: ime pharusāhi vācāhi ghaṭṭetvāva palāpessāmā”ti usūyā visuggāraṃ uggirantā tattha
atk-s0503a:392_4: tattha bhikkhū akkosantā paribhāsantā vicariṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “aññatitthiyā pana
atk-s0503a:392_5: paribbājakā asakkatā honti…pe… parikkhārānaṃ. Atha kho te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā
atk-s0503a:392_6: bhagavato sakkāraṃ asahamānā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca gāme ca araññe ca bhikkhū disvā
atk-s0503a:392_7: asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkosanti paribhāsanti rosenti vihesentī”ti.
atk-s0503a:393_0: Tattha asabbhāhīti asabhāyoggāhi sabhāyaṃ sādhujanasamūhe vattuṃ ayuttāhi, duṭṭhullāhīti
atk-s0503a:393_1: attho. Pharusāhīti kakkhaḷāhi mammacchedikāhi. Akkosantīti jātiādīhi akkosavatthūhi
atk-s0503a:393_2: khuṃsenti. Paribhāsantīti bhaṇḍanavasena bhayaṃ uppādentā tajjenti. Rosentīti yathā
atk-s0503a:393_3: parassa roso hoti, evaṃ anuddhaṃsanavasena rosaṃ uppādenti. Vihesentīti viheṭhenti,
atk-s0503a:394_0: Kathaṃ panete samantapāsādike bhagavati bhikkhusaṅghe ca akkosādīni pavattesunti?
atk-s0503a:394_1: Bhagavato uppādato pahīnalābhasakkāratāya upahatacittā pathaviṃ khaṇitvā pakkhalantā
atk-s0503a:394_2: viya avaṇe veḷuriyamaṇimhi vaṇaṃ uppādentā viya ca sundarikaṃ nāma paribbājikaṃ saññāpetvā
atk-s0503a:394_3: tāya satthu bhikkhūnañca avaṇṇaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā akkosādīni pavattesuṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ sundarīvatthu
atk-s0503a:394_4: parato sundarīsutte pāḷiyaṃyeva āgamissati, tasmā yamettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ tattheva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0503a:395: Bhikkhū bhagavato santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ pavattimārocesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu…pe… vihesentī”ti. Taṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0503a:396_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ issāpakatānaṃ titthiyānaṃ vippaṭipattiṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:396_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ tehi kate vippakāre pasannacittehi ca parehi kate upakāre tādibhāvānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:397_0: Tattha gāme araññe sukhadukkhaphuṭṭhoti gāme vā araññe vā yattha katthaci sukhena
atk-s0503a:397_1: dukkhena ca phuṭṭho sukhadukkhāni anubhavanto, tesaṃ vā paccayehi samaṅgībhūto. Nevattato
atk-s0503a:397_2: no parato dahethāti “ahaṃ sukhito, ahaṃ dukkhito, mama sukhaṃ, mama dukkhaṃ, parenidaṃ
atk-s0503a:397_3: mayhaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ uppādita”nti ca neva attato na parato taṃ sukhadukkhaṃ ṭhapetha.
atk-s0503a:397_4: Kasmā? Na hettha khandhapañcake ahanti vā mamanti vā paroti vā parassāti vā passitabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0503a:397_5: kiñci atthi, kevalaṃ saṅkhārā eva pana yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjitvā khaṇe khaṇe bhijjantīti.
atk-s0503a:397_6: Sukhadukkhaggahaṇañcettha desanāsīsaṃ, sabbassāpi lokadhammassa vasena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:397_7: Iti bhagavā “nāhaṃ kvacani, kassaci kiñcanatasmiṃ, na ca mama kvacani, katthaci kiñcanatatthī”ti
atk-s0503a:398_0: Idāni tassa attato parato ca adahanassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti “phusanti phassā upadhiṃ
atk-s0503a:398_1: paṭiccā”ti. Ete sukhavedanīyā dukkhavedanīyā ca phassā nāma khandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:398_2: upadhiṃ paṭicca tasmiṃ sati yathāsakaṃ visayaṃ phusanti, tattha pavattantiyeva. Adukkhamasukhā
atk-s0503a:398_3: hi vedanā santasabhāvatāya sukhe eva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti duvidhasamphassavasenevāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā katā.
atk-s0503a:399_0: Yathā pana te phassā na phusanti, taṃ dassetuṃ “nirupadhiṃ kena phuseyyuṃ phassā”ti
atk-s0503a:399_1: vuttaṃ. Sabbaso hi khandhūpadhiyā asati kena kāraṇena te phassā phuseyyuṃ, na taṃ
atk-s0503a:399_2: kāraṇaṃ atthi. Yadi hi tumhe akkosādivasena uppajjanasukhadukkhaṃ na icchatha, sabbaso
atk-s0503a:399_3: nirupadhibhāveyeva yogaṃ kareyyāthāti anupādisesanibbānadhātuyā gāthaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:402_0: 15. Pañcame icchānaṅgalakoti icchānaṅgalanāmako kosalesu eko brāhmaṇagāmo, taṃnivāsitāya
atk-s0503a:402_1: tattha vā jāto bhavoti vā icchānaṅgalako. Upāsakoti tīhi saraṇagamanehi bhagavato
atk-s0503a:402_2: santike upāsakabhāvassa paveditattā upāsako pañcasikkhāpadiko buddhamāmako, dhammamāmako,
atk-s0503a:402_3: saṅghamāmako. Kenacideva karaṇīyenāti uddhārasodhāpanādinā kenacideva kattabbena.
atk-s0503a:402_4: Tīretvāti niṭṭhāpetvā. Ayaṃ kira upāsako pubbe abhiṇhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0503a:402_5: payirupāsati, so katipayaṃ kālaṃ bahukaraṇīyatāya satthu dassanaṃ nābhisambhosi.
atk-s0503a:402_6: Tenāha bhagavā – “cirassaṃ kho tvaṃ, upāsaka, imaṃ pariyāyamakāsi, yadidaṃ idhāgamanāyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:403_0: Tattha cirassanti cirena. Pariyāyanti vāraṃ. Yadidanti nipāto, yo ayanti attho. Idaṃ
atk-s0503a:403_1: vuttaṃ hoti – idha mama santike āgamanāya yo ayaṃ ajja kato vāro, taṃ imaṃ cirena
atk-s0503a:403_2: papañcaṃ katvā akāsīti. Cirapaṭikāhanti cirapaṭiko ahaṃ, cirakālato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ
atk-s0503a:403_3: upasaṅkamitukāmoti sambandho. Kehici kehicīti ekaccehi ekaccehi. Atha vā kehici kehicīti
atk-s0503a:403_4: yehi vā tehi vā. Tattha gāravaṃ dasseti. Satthari abhippasannassa hi satthudassanadhammassavanesu
atk-s0503a:403_5: viya na aññattha ādaro hoti. Kiccakaraṇīyehīti ettha avassaṃ kātabbaṃ kiccaṃ, itaraṃ
atk-s0503a:403_6: karaṇīyaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ vā kātabbaṃ kiccaṃ, pacchā kātabbaṃ karaṇīyaṃ. Khuddakaṃ vā kiccaṃ,
atk-s0503a:403_7: mahantaṃ karaṇīyaṃ. Byāvaṭoti ussukko. Evāhanti evaṃ iminā pakārena ahaṃ nāsakkhiṃ
atk-s0503a:404_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti dullabhe buddhuppāde manussattalābhe ca sattānaṃ sakiñcanabhāvena
atk-s0503a:404_1: kiccapasutatāya kusalantarāyo hoti, na akiñcanassāti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā.
atk-s0503a:404_2: Imaṃ udānanti tadatthaparidīpanameva imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:405_0: Tattha sukhaṃ vata tassa na hoti kiñcīti yassa puggalassa kiñci rūpādīsu ekavatthumpi
atk-s0503a:405_1: “mameta”nti taṇhāya pariggahitabhāvena na hoti natthi na vijjati, sukhaṃ vata tassa
atk-s0503a:405_2: puggalassa, aho sukhamevāti attho. “Na hosī”tipi pāṭho, tassa atītakālavasena attho
atk-s0503a:405_3: veditabbo. Keci pana na hoti kiñcīti padassa “rāgādikiñcanaṃ yassa na hotī”ti atthaṃ
atk-s0503a:405_4: vaṇṇenti, taṃ na sundaraṃ pariggahadhammavasena desanāya āgatattā. Rāgādikiñcananti
atk-s0503a:405_5: pariggahetabbassāpi saṅgahe sati yuttameva vuttaṃ siyā atha vā yassa puggalassa kiñci
atk-s0503a:405_6: appampi kiñcanaṃ palibodhajātaṃ rāgādikiñcanābhāvato eva na hoti, taṃ tassa akiñcanattaṃ
atk-s0503a:405_7: sukhassa paccayabhāvato sukhaṃ vataṃ, aho sukhanti attho. Kassa pana na hoti kiñcananti
atk-s0503a:405_8: ce, āha “saṅkhātadhammassa bahussutassā”ti. Yo catūhipi maggasaṅkhāhi soḷasakiccanipphattiyā
atk-s0503a:405_9: saṅkhātadhammo katakicco, tato eva paṭivedhabāhusaccena bahussuto, tassa.
atk-s0503a:406_0: Iti bhagavā akiñcanabhāve ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā sakiñcanabhāve ādīnavaṃ dassetuṃ “sakiñcanaṃ
atk-s0503a:406_1: passā”tiādimāha. Tassattho – rāgādikiñcanānaṃ āmisakiñcanānañca atthitāya sakiñcanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:406_2: sakiñcanattā eva aladdhānañca laddhānañca kāmānaṃ pariyesanārakkhaṇahetu kiccakaraṇīyavasena
atk-s0503a:406_3: “ahaṃ mamā”ti gahaṇavasena ca vihaññamānaṃ vighātaṃ āpajjamānaṃ passāti dhammasaṃvegappatto
atk-s0503a:406_4: satthā attano cittaṃ vadati. Jano janasmiṃ paṭibandharūpoti sayaṃ añño jano samāno
atk-s0503a:406_5: aññasmiṃ jane “ahaṃ imassa, mama aya”nti taṇhāvasena paṭibandhasabhāvo hutvā vihaññati
atk-s0503a:408: Attā hi attano natthi, kuto puttā kuto dhana”nti. –
atk-s0503a:412_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe aññatarassa paribbājakassāti ekassa kuṭumbikassa paribbājakassa. Daharāti
atk-s0503a:412_1: taruṇī. Māṇavikāti brāhmaṇadhītāya vohāro. Pajāpatīti bhariyā. Gabbhinīti āpannasattā.
atk-s0503a:412_2: Upavijaññāti ajja suveti paccupaṭṭhitavijāyanakālā hotīti sambandho. So kira brāhmaṇajātiko
atk-s0503a:412_3: sabhariyo vādapatthassame ṭhito, tena naṃ sapajāpatikaṃ paribbājakavohārena samudācaranti.
atk-s0503a:412_4: Bhariyā panassa brāhmaṇajātikattā brāhmaṇāti ālapati. Telanti tilatelaṃ. Telasīsena
atk-s0503a:412_5: cettha yaṃ yaṃ vijātāya pasavadukkhappaṭikāratthaṃ icchitabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ sappiloṇādiṃ
atk-s0503a:412_6: āharāti āṇāpeti. Yaṃ me vijātāya bhavissatīti yaṃ telādi mayhaṃ vijātāya bahinikkhantagabbhāya
atk-s0503a:412_7: upakārāya bhavissati. “Paribbājikāyā”tipi pāṭho. Kutoti kasmā ṭhānā, yato ñātikulā
atk-s0503a:412_8: vā mittakulā vā telādiṃ āhareyyaṃ, taṃ ṭhānaṃ me natthīti adhippāyo. Telaṃ āharāmīti
atk-s0503a:412_9: vattamānasamīpatāya vattamānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, telaṃ āharissāmīti attho. Samaṇassa
atk-s0503a:412_10: vā brāhmaṇassa vā sappissa vā telassa vāti ca samuccayattho vā-saddo “aggito vā udakato
atk-s0503a:412_11: vā mithubhedā vā”tiādīsu viya. Sappissa vā telassa vāti paccatte sāmivacanaṃ, sappi
atk-s0503a:412_12: ca telañca yāvadatthaṃ pātuṃ pivituṃ dīyatīti attho. Apare pana “sappissa vā telassa
atk-s0503a:412_13: vāti avayavasambandhe sāmivacanaṃ. Sappitelasamudāyassa hi avayavo idha yāvadatthasaddena
atk-s0503a:412_14: vuccatī”ti vadanti. No nīharitunti bhājanena vā hatthena vā bahi netuṃ no dīyati,
atk-s0503a:412_15: ucchadditvānāti vamitvā, yaṃnūna dadeyyanti sambandho. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “ahaṃ rañño
atk-s0503a:412_16: koṭṭhāgāraṃ gantvā telaṃ kaṇṭhamattaṃ pivitvā tāvadeva gharaṃ āgantvā ekasmiṃ bhājane
atk-s0503a:412_17: yathāpītaṃ vamitvā uddhanaṃ āropetvā pacissāmi, yaṃ pittasemhādimissitaṃ, taṃ agginā
atk-s0503a:412_18: jhāyissati, telaṃ pana gahetvā imissā paribbājikāya kamme upanessāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:413_0: Uddhaṃ kātunti vamanavasena uddhaṃ nīharituṃ. Na pana adhoti viriñcanavasena heṭṭhā
atk-s0503a:413_1: nīharituṃ na pana sakkoti. So hi “adhikaṃ pītaṃ sayameva mukhato niggamissatī”ti
atk-s0503a:413_2: pivitvā āsayassa arittatāya aniggate vamanavirecanayogaṃ ajānanto alabhanto vā kevalaṃ
atk-s0503a:413_3: dukkhāhi vedanāhi phuṭṭho āvaṭṭati ca parivaṭṭati ca. Dukkhāhīti dukkhamāhi. Tibbāhīti
atk-s0503a:413_4: bahalāhi tikhiṇāhi vā. Kharāhīti kakkhaḷāhi. Kaṭukāhīti ativiya aniṭṭhabhāvena dāruṇāhi.
atk-s0503a:413_5: Āvaṭṭatīti ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne anipajjitvā attano sarīraṃ ito cito ākaḍḍhanto āvaṭṭati.
atk-s0503a:413_6: Parivaṭṭatīti ekasmiṃ padese nipannopi aṅgapaccaṅgāni parito khipanto vaṭṭati, abhimukhaṃ
atk-s0503a:413_7: vā vaṭṭanto āvaṭṭati, samantato vaṭṭanto parivaṭṭati.
atk-s0503a:414_1: akiñcanassa pana sabbaso ayaṃ natthī”ti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato jānitvā tadatthappakāsanaṃ
atk-s0503a:415_0: Tattha sukhino vatāti sukhino vata sappurisā. Ke pana teti? Ye akiñcanā, ye rāgādikiñcanassa
atk-s0503a:415_1: pariggahakiñcanassa ca abhāvena akiñcanā, kesaṃ panidaṃ kiñcanaṃ natthīti āha – “vedaguno
atk-s0503a:415_2: hi janā akiñcanā”ti, ye ariyamaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ vedaṃ gatā adhigatā, tena vā vedena
atk-s0503a:415_3: nibbānaṃ gatāti vedaguno, te ariyajanā khīṇāsavapuggalā anavasesarāgādikiñcanānaṃ
atk-s0503a:415_4: aggamaggena samucchinnattā akiñcanā nāma. Asati hi rāgādikiñcane kuto pariggahakiñcanassa
atk-s0503a:415_5: sambhavo. Evaṃ gāthāya purimabhāgena arahante pasaṃsitvā aparabhāgena andhaputhujjane
atk-s0503a:415_6: garahanto “sakiñcanaṃ passā”tiādimāha. Taṃ purimasutte vuttatthameva. Evaṃ imāyapi
atk-s0503a:418_0: 17. Sattame ekaputtakoti eko putto, so ca anukampitabbaṭṭhena ekaputtako, piyāyitabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0503a:418_1: piyo, manassa vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena manāpo. Sarīrasobhāsampattiyā vā dassanīyaṭṭhena piyo,
atk-s0503a:418_2: sīlācārasampattiyā kalyāṇadhammatāya manāpo. Kaleti satte khepetīti kālo, maraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:418_3: Taṃ kato pattoti kālaṅkato, kālena vā maccunā kato naṭṭho adassanaṃ gatoti kālaṅkato, matoti attho.
atk-s0503a:419_0: Sambahulā upāsakāti sāvatthivāsino bahū upāsakā mataputtaupāsakassa sahasokībhāvena
atk-s0503a:419_1: yāva āḷāhanā pacchato gantvā matasarīrassa kattabbaṃ kāretvā paṭinivattā yathānivatthāva
atk-s0503a:419_2: udakaṃ otaritvā sīsaṃnhātā vatthāni pīḷetvā anotāpetvāva ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ
atk-s0503a:419_3: katvā upāsakaṃ purato katvā “sokavinodanaṃ dhammaṃ satthu santike sossāmā”ti bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:420_0: Tattha allavatthāti udakena tintavatthā. Divā divassāti divasassapi divā, majjhanhike
atk-s0503a:420_1: kāleti attho. Yasmā jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti, jānantāpi na pucchanti. Kālaṃ
atk-s0503a:420_2: viditvā pucchanti, kālaṃ viditvā na pucchanti, tasmā jānantoyeva bhagavā kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:420_3: pucchanto “kiṃ nu kho tumhe upāsakā”tiādimāha. Tassattho – tumhe upāsakā aññesu divasesu
atk-s0503a:420_4: mama santikaṃ āgacchantā otāpitasuddhavatthā sāyanhe āgacchatha, ajja pana allavatthā
atk-s0503a:420_5: allakesā ṭhitamajjhanhike kāle idhāgatā, taṃ kiṃ kāraṇanti. Tena mayanti tena puttaviyogajanitacittasantāpena
atk-s0503a:421: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti piyavatthusambhavā sokadukkhadomanassādayo, asati piyavatthusmiṃ sabbaso ete na santīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato jānitvā tadatthappakāsanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:422_1: gadhitā paṭibaddhacittā. Gadhitāseti hi gadhitāiccevattho. Seti vā nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0503a:422_2: Piyarūpā nāma cakkhādayo puttadārādayo ca. Vuttañhetaṃ – “kiñca loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ
atk-s0503a:422_3: cakkhu loke …pe… dhammataṇhā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpa”nti.
atk-s0503a:424: Thiyo bandhū puthu kāme, yo naro anugijjhatī”ti ca. ;
atk-s0503a:425_0: Tasmā tesu piyarūpesu assādena giddhā mucchitā ajjhāpannāti attho. Ke pana te piyarūpassādagadhitāti
atk-s0503a:425_1: te dasseti “devakāyā puthumanussā cā”ti, cātumahārājikādayo bahudevasamūhā ceva jambudīpakādikā
atk-s0503a:425_2: bahumanussā ca. Aghāvinoti kāyikacetasikadukkhena dukkhitā. Parijunnāti jarārogādivipattiyā
atk-s0503a:425_3: yobbanārogyādisampattito parihīnā. Yathālābhavasena vāyamattho devamanussesu veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:425_4: Atha vā kāmañcekantasukhasamappitānaṃ devānaṃ dukkhajarārogā na sambhavanti, tadanativattasabhāvatāya
atk-s0503a:425_5: pana tepi “aghāvino”ti “parijunnā”ti ca vuttā. Tesampi vā pubbanimittuppattiyā paṭicchannajarāya
atk-s0503a:425_6: cetasikarogassa ca vasena dukkhādīnaṃ sambhavo veditabbo. Maccurājassa vasaṃ gacchantīti
atk-s0503a:425_7: piyavatthuvisayāya taṇhāya appahīnattā punappunaṃ gabbhūpagamanato dhātuttayissaratāya
atk-s0503a:426_0: Ettāvatā vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni “ye ve divā”tiādinā vivaṭṭaṃ dasseti. Tattha ye ve
atk-s0503a:426_1: divā ca ratto ca appamattāti “divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ
atk-s0503a:426_2: parisodhetī”tiādinā vuttanayena divasabhāge rattibhāge ca daḷhaṃ appamattā appamādappaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0503a:426_3: pūrenti. Jahanti piyarūpanti catusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggādhigamena
atk-s0503a:426_5: Te ve khaṇanti aghamūlaṃ, maccuno āmisaṃ durativattanti te ariyapuggalā aghassa vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0503a:426_6: mūlabhūtaṃ, maccunā maraṇena āmasitabbato āmisaṃ, ito bahiddhā kehicipi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi
atk-s0503a:426_7: nivattituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya durativattaṃ, saha avijjāya taṇhaṃ ariyamaggañāṇakudālena
atk-s0503a:428: Appamattā na mīyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā”ti. –
atk-s0503a:432: 18. Aṭṭhame kuṇḍikāyanti evaṃnāmake koliyānaṃ nagare. Kuṇḍadhānavaneti tassa nagarassa avidūre kuṇḍadhānasaṅkhāte vane.
atk-s0503a:433_0: Pubbe kira kuṇḍo nāma eko yakkho tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vāsaṃ kappesi, kuṇḍadhānamissakena
atk-s0503a:433_1: ca balikammena tussatīti tassa tathā tattha baliṃ upaharanti, tenetaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0503a:433_2: kuṇḍadhānavanantveva paññāyittha. Tassa avidūre ekā gāmapatikā ahosi, sāpi tassa
atk-s0503a:433_3: yakkhassa āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne niviṭṭhattā teneva paripālitattā kuṇḍikāti voharīyittha.
atk-s0503a:433_4: Aparabhāge tattha koliyarājāno nagaraṃ kāresuṃ, tampi purimavohārena kuṇḍikātveva
atk-s0503a:433_5: vuccati. Tasmiñca vanasaṇḍe koliyarājāno bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca vasanatthāya
atk-s0503a:433_6: vihāraṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ, tampi kuṇḍadhānavanantveva paññāyittha. Atha bhagavā janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0503a:433_7: caranto anukkamena taṃ vihāraṃ patvā tattha vihāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0503a:434_0: Suppavāsāti tassā upāsikāya nāmaṃ. Koliyadhītāti koliyarājaputtī. Sā hi bhagavato
atk-s0503a:434_1: aggupaṭṭhāyikā paṇītadāyikānaṃ sāvikānaṃ etadagge ṭhapitā sotāpannā ariyasāvikā.
atk-s0503a:434_2: Yañhi kiñci bhagavato yuttarūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ bhesajjaṃ vā na tattha aññāhi
atk-s0503a:434_3: saṃvidhātabbaṃ atthi, sabbaṃ taṃ sayameva attano paññāya vicāretvā sakkaccaṃ sampādetvā
atk-s0503a:434_4: upaneti. Devasikañca aṭṭhasataṃ saṅghabhattapāṭipuggalikabhattāni deti. Yo koci bhikkhu
atk-s0503a:434_5: vā bhikkhunī vā taṃ kulaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho rittahattho na gacchati. Evaṃ muttacāgā
atk-s0503a:434_6: payatapāṇī vossaggaratā yācayogā dānasaṃvibhāgaratā. Assā kucchiyaṃ purimabuddhesu
atk-s0503a:434_7: katādhikāro pacchimabhaviko sāvakabodhisatto paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Sā taṃ gabbhaṃ kenacideva
atk-s0503a:434_8: pāpakammena satta vassāni kucchinā parihari, sattāhañca mūḷhagabbhā ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:435_0: Tattha satta vassānīti satta saṃvaccharāni, accantasaṃyoge ca idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:435_1: Gabbhaṃ dhāretīti gabbhaṃ vahati, gabbhinī hotīti attho. Sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhāti satta
atk-s0503a:435_2: ahāni byākulagabbhā. Gabbho hi paripakko sampajjamāno vijāyanakāle kammajavātehi
atk-s0503a:435_3: sañcāletvā parivattito uddhaṃpādo adhosiro hutvā yonimukhābhimukho hoti, evaṃ so
atk-s0503a:435_4: katthaci alaggo bahi nikkhamati. Vipajjamāno pana viparivattanavasena yonimaggaṃ
atk-s0503a:435_5: pidahitvā tiriyaṃ nipajjati, sayameva vā yonimaggo pidahati, so tattha kammajavātehi
atk-s0503a:435_6: aparāparaṃ parivattamāno byākulo mūḷhagabbhoti vuccati. Tassāpi satta divase evaṃ
atk-s0503a:436_0: Ayañca gabbho sīvalitthero. Tassa kathaṃ satta vassāni gabbhavāsadukkhaṃ, sattāhaṃ
atk-s0503a:436_1: mūḷhagabbhabhāvappatti, mātu cassāpi sotāpannāya ariyasāvikāya tathā dukkhānubhavanaṃ
atk-s0503a:436_2: jātanti? Vuccate – atīte kāsikarāje bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ kārente eko kosalarājā mahantena
atk-s0503a:436_3: balenāgantvā bārāṇasiṃ gahetvā taṃ rājānaṃ māretvā tassa aggamahesiṃ attano aggamahesiṃ
atk-s0503a:436_4: akāsi. Bārāṇasirañño pana putto pitu maraṇakāle niddhamanadvārena palāyitvā attano
atk-s0503a:436_5: ñātimittabandhave ekajjhaṃ katvā anukkamena balaṃ saṃharitvā bārāṇasiṃ āgantvā avidūre
atk-s0503a:436_6: mahantaṃ khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā tassa rañño paṇṇaṃ pesesi “rajjaṃ vā detu, yuddhaṃ
atk-s0503a:436_7: vā”ti. Rājakumārassa mātā sāsanaṃ sutvā “yuddhena kammaṃ natthi, sabbadisāsu sañcāraṃ
atk-s0503a:436_8: pacchinditvā bārāṇasinagaraṃ parivāretu, tato dārūdakabhattaparikkhayena kilantā
atk-s0503a:436_9: nagare manussā vināva yuddhena rājānaṃ gahetvā dassantī”ti paṇṇaṃ pesesi. So mātu
atk-s0503a:436_10: sāsanaṃ sutvā cattāri mahādvārāni rakkhanto satta vassāni nagaraṃ uparundhi, nagare
atk-s0503a:436_11: manussā cūḷadvārena nikkhamitvā dārūdakāni āharanti, sabbakiccāni karonti.
atk-s0503a:437_0: Atha rājakumārassa mātā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “bālo mama putto upāyaṃ na jānāti, gacchatha,
atk-s0503a:437_1: assa cūḷadvārāni pidhāya nagaraṃ uparundhatūti vadethā”ti puttassa gūḷhasāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0503a:437_2: So mātu sāsanaṃ sutvā satta divase tathā akāsi. Nāgarā bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhantā
atk-s0503a:437_3: sattame divase tassa rañño sīsaṃ gahetvā kumārassa adaṃsu. Kumāro nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0503a:437_4: rajjaṃ aggahesi. So tadā satta vassāni nagararundhanakammanissandena etarahi satta
atk-s0503a:437_5: vassāni mātukucchisaṅkhātāya lohitakumbhiyā vasi, avasesato pana sattāhaṃ nagarūparundhanena
atk-s0503a:437_6: sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhabhāvaṃ āpajji. Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “satta divasāni nagaraṃ
atk-s0503a:437_7: rundhitvā gahitakammanissandena sattavassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ vasitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:437_8: āpajjī”ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana so padumuttarasammāsambuddhapādamūle “lābhīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0503a:437_9: mahādānaṃ datvā patthanaṃ akāsi, yañca vipassissa bhagavato kāle nāgarehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0503a:437_10: sahassagghanikaṃ guḷadadhiṃ datvā patthanaṃ akāsi, tassānubhāvena lābhīnaṃ aggo jāto.
atk-s0503a:437_11: Suppavāsāpi “nagaraṃ rundhitvā gaṇha, tātā”ti pesitabhāvena satta vassāni kucchinā
atk-s0503a:437_12: gabbhaṃ pariharitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhājātā. Evaṃ te mātāputtā attano kammassa anurūpaṃ
atk-s0503a:438_0: Tīhi vitakkehīti ratanattayaguṇānussatipaṭisaṃyuttehi tīhi sammāvitakkehi. Adhivāsetīti
atk-s0503a:438_1: mūḷhagabbhatāya uppannadukkhaṃ sahati. Sā hi bhagavato sambuddhabhāvaṃ, ariyasaṅghassa
atk-s0503a:438_2: suppaṭipattiṃ, nibbānassa ca dukkhanissaraṇabhāvaṃ anussarantī attano uppajjamānadukkhaṃ
atk-s0503a:438_3: amanasikaraṇeneva abhibhavitvā khamati. Tena vuttaṃ “tīhi vitakkehi adhivāsetī”ti.
atk-s0503a:439_0: Sammāsambuddho vatātiādi tesaṃ vitakkānaṃ pavattiākāradassanaṃ. Tassattho – yo bhagyavantatādīhi
atk-s0503a:439_1: kāraṇehi bhagavā lokanātho sammā aviparītaṃ sāmaṃ sayameva sabbadhamme aho vata buddho,
atk-s0503a:439_2: so bhagavā evarūpassa etarahi mayā anubhaviyamānassa aññassa ca evaṃjātikassa sakalassa
atk-s0503a:439_3: vaṭṭadukkhassa pahānāya accantaṃ anuppādanirodhāya dhammaṃ katheti, aviparītadhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:439_4: katheti. Aviparītadhammadesanatāya hi satthu sammāsambodhisiddhi. Tassa yathāvuttaguṇassa
atk-s0503a:439_5: bhagavato dhammassavanante jātattā sīladiṭṭhisāmaññena saṃhatattā ca sāvakasaṅghoti
atk-s0503a:439_6: laddhanāmo aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūho suppaṭipanno vata aho vata sammā paṭipanno, yo
atk-s0503a:439_7: ariyasaṅgho evarūpassa īdisassa vaṭṭadukkhassa pahānāya anuppādanirodhāya anivattipaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0503a:439_8: paṭipanno. Susukhaṃ vata aho vata suṭṭhu sukhaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ, yasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:439_9: nibbāne īdisaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ na upalabbhatīti. Ettha ca paṭipajjamānāpi paṭipannā
atk-s0503a:439_10: icceva vuttā paṭipattiyā anivattibhāvato. Atha vā uppannasaddo viya paṭipannasaddo
atk-s0503a:440_0: Sāmikanti attano patiṃ koliyarājaputtaṃ. Āmantesīti abhāsi. Mama vacanena bhagavato
atk-s0503a:440_1: pāde sirasā vandāhīti mayhaṃ vacanena cakkalakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitāni vikasitapadumasassirīkāni
atk-s0503a:440_2: bhagavato caraṇāni tava sirasā vandāhi, uttamaṅgena abhivādanaṃ karohīti attho. Appābādhantiādīsu
atk-s0503a:440_3: ābādhoti visabhāgavedanā vuccati, yā ekadese uppajjitvāpi sakalasarīraṃ ayapaṭṭena
atk-s0503a:440_4: ābandhitvā viya gaṇhati. Ātaṅkoti kicchajīvitakaro rogo. Atha vā yāpetabbarogo ātaṅko,
atk-s0503a:440_5: itaro ābādho. Khuddako vā rogo ātaṅko, balavā ābādho. Keci pana “ajjhattasamuṭṭhāno
atk-s0503a:440_6: ābādho, bahiddhāsamuṭṭhāno ātaṅko”ti vadanti. Tadubhayassāpi abhāvaṃ pucchāti vadati.
atk-s0503a:440_7: Gilānasseva ca uṭṭhānaṃ nāma garukaṃ hoti, kāye balaṃ na hoti, tasmā niggelaññatāya
atk-s0503a:440_8: lahuparivattisaṅkhātaṃ kāyassa lahuṭṭhānaṃ sarīrabalañca pucchāti vadati. Phāsuvihāranti
atk-s0503a:440_9: ṭhānanisinnagamanasayanasaṅkhātesu catūsu iriyāpathesu sukhavihārañca pucchāti vadati.
atk-s0503a:440_10: Athassa pucchitabbākāraṃ dassentī “suppavāsā, bhante”tiādimāha. Evañca vadehīti idāni
atk-s0503a:441_0: Paramanti vacanasampaṭicchanaṃ. Tena sādhu, bhadde, yathā vuttaṃ, tathā paṭipajjāmīti
atk-s0503a:441_1: dasseti. Koliyaputtoti suppavāsāya sāmiko koliyarājaputto. Sukhinī hotūti sadevake
atk-s0503a:441_2: loke aggadakkhiṇeyyo satthā suppavāsāya pesitavandanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tadanantaraṃ
atk-s0503a:441_3: attano mettāvihārasaṃsūcakaṃ buddhāciṇṇaṃ sukhūpasaṃhāraṃ tassā sāmaññato pakāsetvā
atk-s0503a:441_5: nidassento “sukhinī…pe… arogā, arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:442_0: Saha vacanāti bhagavato vacanena saheva. Yasmiṃ kāle bhagavā tathā avoca, tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0503a:442_1: kāle tampi kammaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsi. Tassa parikkhīṇabhāvaṃ oloketvā satthā tathā
atk-s0503a:442_2: abhāsi. Apare pana vadanti – sace tathā satthā nācikkhissā, tato parampi kiñci kālaṃ
atk-s0503a:442_3: tassā taṃ dukkhaṃ anubandhissā. Yasmā pana bhagavatā “sukhinī arogā arogañca puttaṃ
atk-s0503a:442_4: vijāyatū”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā tassa vacanasamakālameva so gabbho byākulabhāvaṃ vijahitvā
atk-s0503a:442_5: sukheneva bahi nikkhami, evaṃ tesaṃ mātāputtānaṃ sotthi ahosi. Acinteyyo hi buddhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:442_6: buddhānubhāvo. Yathā hi paṭācārāya piyavippayogasambhūtena sokena ummādaṃ patvā –
atk-s0503a:443: “Ubho puttā kālakatā, panthe mayhaṃ patī mato;
atk-s0503a:444: Mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, ekacitakamhi jhāyare”ti. –
atk-s0503a:445_0: Vatvā jātarūpeneva carantiyā “satiṃ paṭilabhāhi bhaginī”ti bhagavato vacanasamanantarameva
atk-s0503a:445_1: ummādo vūpasami, tathā suppiyāpi upāsikā attanāva attano ūruyaṃ katena mahāvaṇena
atk-s0503a:445_2: vuṭṭhātuṃ asakkontī sayanapiṭṭhe nipannā “āgantvā maṃ vandatū”ti vacanasamanantarameva
atk-s0503a:445_3: vaṇe pākatike jāte sayameva gantvā bhagavantaṃ vandīti evamādīni vatthūni idha udāharitabbānīti.
atk-s0503a:446_0: Evaṃ, bhanteti, bhante, yathā bhagavā saputtāya mātuyā arogabhāvaṃ āsīsanto āha –
atk-s0503a:446_1: “sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti, taṃ evameva. Na hi kadāci buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ
atk-s0503a:446_2: vacanassa aññathābhāvoti adhippāyo. Keci pana “evamatthū”ti vadanti, apare “hotū”ti
atk-s0503a:446_3: padassa atthaṃ ānetvā vaṇṇayanti. Abhinanditvāti karavīkarutamañjunā brahmassarena
atk-s0503a:446_4: bhagavatā vuccamāne tasmiṃ vacane pītisomanassapaṭilābhato abhimukhabhāvena nanditvā.
atk-s0503a:446_5: Anumoditvāti tato pacchāpi sammodanaṃ uppādetvā, cittena vā abhinanditvā vācāya anumoditvā,
atk-s0503a:446_6: vacanasampattiyā vā abhinanditvā atthasampattiyā anumoditvā. Sakaṃ gharaṃ paccāyāsīti
atk-s0503a:446_7: attano gharaṃ paṭigacchi. Ye pana “yena sakaṃ ghara”nti paṭhanti, tesaṃ yadipi ya-ta-saddānaṃ
atk-s0503a:446_8: sambandhabhāvato “tenā”ti padaṃ vuttameva hoti, tathāpi “paṭiyāyitvā”ti pāṭhaseso yojetabbo hoti.
atk-s0503a:447_0: Vijātanti pajātaṃ, pasutanti attho. Acchariyanti andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya niccaṃ
atk-s0503a:447_1: na hotīti acchariyaṃ, ayaṃ tāva saddanayo. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana “accharāyoggaṃ acchariya”nti
atk-s0503a:447_2: vuttaṃ, accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttanti attho. Vatāti sambhāvane, aho acchariyanti attho.
atk-s0503a:448_0: Tathāgatassāti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato – tathā āgatoti tathāgato, tathā
atk-s0503a:448_1: gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti
atk-s0503a:448_2: tathāgato, tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathavāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato,
atk-s0503a:449_0: Kathaṃ bhagavā tathā āgatoti tathāgato? Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā
atk-s0503a:449_1: sammāsambuddhā āgatāti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yena abhinīhārena te bhagavanto āgatā, tena
atk-s0503a:449_2: aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgatena ayampi bhagavā āgato. Yathā ca te bhagavanto dānapāramiṃ pūretvā
atk-s0503a:449_4: dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā pañca mahāpariccāge
atk-s0503a:449_6: koṭiṃ patvā āgatā, tathā ayampi bhagavā āgato. Yathā ca te bhagavanto cattāro satipaṭṭhāne…pe…
atk-s0503a:449_7: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgatā, tathā ayampi bhagavā āgato. Evaṃ
atk-s0503a:450_0: Kathaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yathā sampatijātā te bhagavanto samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0503a:450_1: patiṭṭhāya uttarābhimukhā sattapadavītihārena gatā, setacchatte dhāriyamāne sabbāva
atk-s0503a:450_2: disā anuvilokesuṃ, āsabhiñca vācaṃ bhāsiṃsu loke attano jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ pakāsentā,
atk-s0503a:450_3: tañca nesaṃ gamanaṃ tathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena,
atk-s0503a:450_4: tathā ayampi bhagavā gato, tañcassa gamanaṃ kathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ tesaññeva visesādhigamānaṃ
atk-s0503a:451_0: Yathā vā te bhagavanto nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ pahāya gatā, abyāpādena byāpādaṃ,
atk-s0503a:451_1: ālokasaññāya thinamiddhaṃ, avikkhepena uddhaccakukkuccaṃ, dhammavavatthānena vicikicchaṃ
atk-s0503a:451_2: pahāya gatā, ñāṇena avijjaṃ padāletvā, pāmojjena aratiṃ vinodetvā, aṭṭhasamāpattīhi
atk-s0503a:451_3: aṭṭhārasahi mahāvipassanāhi catūhi ca ariyamaggehi taṃ taṃ paṭipakkhaṃ pahāya gatā,
atk-s0503a:451_4: evaṃ ayampi bhagavā gato. Evampi tathā gatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:452_0: Kathaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato? Pathavīdhātuyā kakkhaḷalakkhaṇaṃ, āpodhātuyā
atk-s0503a:452_2: ākāsadhātuyā asamphuṭṭhalakkhaṇaṃ, rūpassa ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ, vedanāya vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:452_3: saññāya sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ, saṅkhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, viññāṇassa vijānanalakkhaṇanti
atk-s0503a:452_4: evaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ, dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ, aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ, bāvīsatiyā
atk-s0503a:452_5: indriyānaṃ, catunnaṃ saccānaṃ, dvādasapadikassa paccayākārassa, catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ,
atk-s0503a:452_6: catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ, catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ, pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ, pañcannaṃ
atk-s0503a:452_7: balānaṃ, sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ, ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa, sattannaṃ visuddhīnaṃ,
atk-s0503a:452_8: amatogadhassa nibbānassāti evaṃ tassa tassa dhammassa yaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:452_9: taṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto adhigatoti
atk-s0503a:453_0: Kathaṃ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato? Tathadhammā nāma cattāri
atk-s0503a:453_1: ariyasaccāni. Yathāha – “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0503a:453_2: Katamāni cattāri? Idaṃ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathameta”nti
atk-s0503a:453_3: vitthāro. Tāni ca bhagavā abhisambuddho, tasmā tathānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:454_0: Apica jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe…
atk-s0503a:454_1: saṅkhārānaṃ avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho, tathā avijjāya
atk-s0503a:454_2: saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho…pe... jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayaṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho,
atk-s0503a:454_3: taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavā abhisambuddho, tasmāpi tathānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato. Abhisambuddhattho
atk-s0503a:454_4: hi ettha gatasaddoti. Evaṃ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:455_0: Kathaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato? Yaṃ sadevake…pe… sadevamanussāya pajāya aparimāṇāsu
atk-s0503a:455_1: lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma
atk-s0503a:455_2: atthi, taṃ bhagavā sabbākārato jānāti passati. Evaṃ jānatā passatā ca tena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena
atk-s0503a:455_3: vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānakapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:455_4: yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ
atk-s0503a:455_5: pītaka”ntiādinā nayena anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvipaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ
atk-s0503a:455_6: tathameva hoti, vitathaṃ natthi. Esa nayo sotadvārādīsu āpāthamāgacchantesu saddādīsu.
atk-s0503a:456_0: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ
atk-s0503a:456_1: pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ jānāmi, tamahaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, taṃ
atk-s0503a:456_2: tathāgatassa viditaṃ, taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:457: Evaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato. Tattha tathadassīatthe tathāgatoti padasambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:458_0: Kathaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato? Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0503a:458_1: yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi, etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇakālaṃ
atk-s0503a:458_2: yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ suttageyyādi, sabbaṃ taṃ parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ rāgamadādinimmathanaṃ
atk-s0503a:459_0: “Yañca, cunda, rattiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhati, yañca rattiṃ
atk-s0503a:459_1: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati, yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0503a:459_2: sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti, no aññathā, tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:460: Gadaattho ettha gatasaddo. Evaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:461: Apica āgadanaṃ āgado, vacananti attho. Tatho avitatho aviparīto āgado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:462_0: Kathaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato? Bhagavato hi vācāya kāyo anulometi, kāyassapi vācā,
atk-s0503a:462_1: tasmā yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti. Evaṃbhūtassa cassa yathāvācā,
atk-s0503a:462_2: kāyopi tathā gato pavattoti attho. Yathā ca kāyo, vācāpi tathā gatā pavattāti tathāgato. Tenāha –
atk-s0503a:463: “Yathāvādī, bhikkhave, tathāgato tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī. Iti yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī. Tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:465_0: Kathaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato? Yasmā upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ
atk-s0503a:465_1: karitvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi
atk-s0503a:465_2: paññāyapi vimuttiyāpi vimuttiñāṇadassanenapi, na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0503a:465_3: atha kho atulo appameyyo anuttaro devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko, brahmānaṃ atibrahmā
atk-s0503a:466: “Sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavatti, tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:467_0: Tatrāyaṃ padasiddhi – agado viya agado, desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo ca. Tena so
atk-s0503a:467_1: mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca lokaṃ
atk-s0503a:467_2: abhibhavati. Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho avitatho aviparīto yathāvuttova agado
atk-s0503a:467_3: etassāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo. Evaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:468_0: Apica tathāya gatoti tathāgato, tathaṃ gatoti tathāgato. Tattha sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya
atk-s0503a:468_1: tathāya gato avagatoti tathāgato. Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti
atk-s0503a:468_2: tathāgato. Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato adhigatoti tathāgato. Lokanirodhagāminiṃ
atk-s0503a:468_3: paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgato. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0503a:469_0: “Loko, bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokasmā tathāgato visaṃyutto. Lokasamudayo,
atk-s0503a:469_1: bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokasamudayo tathāgatassa pahīno, lokanirodho,
atk-s0503a:469_2: bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokanirodho tathāgatassa sacchikato. Lokanirodhagāminī
atk-s0503a:469_3: paṭipadā, bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadā tathāgatassa
atk-s0503a:469_4: bhāvitā. Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatena abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:470_0: Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato – tathāya āgatoti tathāgato, tathāya
atk-s0503a:470_1: gatoti tathāgato, tathāni āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatoti tathāgato, tathāvidhoti
atk-s0503a:470_2: tathāgato, tathā pavattitoti tathāgato, tathehi agatoti tathāgato, tathā gatabhāvena tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:471: Kathaṃ tathāya āgatoti tathāgato? Yā sā bhagavatā sumedhabhūtena dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūle –
atk-s0503a:475_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ abhinīhāraṃ sampādentena “ahaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ tiṇṇo
atk-s0503a:475_1: tāressāmi, mutto mocessāmi, danto damessāmi, santo samessāmi, assattho assāsessāmi,
atk-s0503a:475_2: parinibbuto parinibbāpessāmi, buddho bodhessāmī”ti mahāpaṭiññā pavattitā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0503a:484_0: Taṃ panetaṃ mahāpaṭiññaṃ sakalassāpi buddhakaradhammasamudāyassa pavicaya paccavekkhaṇasamādānānaṃ
atk-s0503a:484_1: kāraṇabhūtaṃ avisaṃvādetvā lokanāyako yasmā mahākappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri
atk-s0503a:484_2: asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ niravasesato dānapāramiādayo samatiṃsapāramiyo
atk-s0503a:484_3: pūretvā, aṅgapariccāgādayo pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā, saccādhiṭṭhānādīni cattāri
atk-s0503a:484_5: ukkaṃsāpetvā, buddhicariyaṃ paramakoṭiṃ pāpetvā, anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhi,
atk-s0503a:484_6: tasmā tasseva sā mahāpaṭiññā tathā avitathā anaññathā, na tassa vālaggamattampi vitathaṃ
atk-s0503a:484_7: atthi. Tathā hi dīpaṅkaradasabalo koṇḍañño maṅgalo…pe… kassapo bhagavāti ime catuvīsati
atk-s0503a:484_8: sammāsambuddhā paṭipāṭiyā uppannā “buddho bhavissatī”ti byākariṃsu. Evaṃ catuvīsatiyā
atk-s0503a:484_9: buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇo ye te katābhinīhārehi bodhisattehi laddhabbā ānisaṃsā,
atk-s0503a:484_10: te labhitvāva āgatoti tāya yathāvuttāya mahāpaṭiññāya tathāya abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:484_11: āgato adhigatoti tathāgato. Evaṃ tathāya āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:485_0: Kathaṃ tathāya gatoti tathāgato? Yāya mahākaruṇāya lokanātho mahādukkhasambādhappaṭipannaṃ
atk-s0503a:485_1: sattanikāyaṃ disvā “tassa natthañño koci paṭissaraṇaṃ, ahameva namito saṃsāradukkhato
atk-s0503a:485_2: mutto mocessāmī”ti samussāhitamānaso mahābhinīhāramakāsi. Katvā ca yathāpaṇidhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:485_3: sakalalokahitasampādanāya ussukkamāpanno attano kāyajīvitanirapekkho paresaṃ sotapathāgamanamattenapi
atk-s0503a:485_4: cittutrāsasamuppādikā atidukkarā dukkaracariyā samācaranto yathā mahābodhiyā paṭipatti
atk-s0503a:485_5: hānabhāgiyā saṃkilesabhāgiyā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na hoti, atha kho uttaruttari visesabhāgiyāva
atk-s0503a:485_6: hoti, tathā paṭipajjamāno anupubbena niravasese bodhisambhāre sampādetvā abhisambodhiṃ
atk-s0503a:485_7: pāpuṇi. Tato parañca tāyeva mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānaso pavivekaratiṃ paramañca
atk-s0503a:485_8: santaṃ vimokkhasukhaṃ pahāya bālajanabahule loke tehi samuppāditaṃ sammānāvamānavippakāraṃ
atk-s0503a:485_9: agaṇetvā vineyyajanassa vinayanena niravasesaṃ buddhakiccaṃ niṭṭhapesi. Tattha yo
atk-s0503a:485_10: bhagavato sattesu mahākaruṇāya samokkamanākāro, so parato āvibhavissati. Yathā ca
atk-s0503a:485_11: buddhabhūtassa lokanāthassa sattesu mahākaruṇā, evaṃ bodhisattabhūtassapi mahābhinīhārakālādīsūti
atk-s0503a:485_12: sabbattha sabbadā ca ekasadisatāya tathā avitathā anaññathā, tasmā tīsupi avatthāsu
atk-s0503a:485_13: sabbasattesu samānarasāya tathāya mahākaruṇāya sakalalokahitāya gato paṭipannoti
atk-s0503a:486_0: Kathaṃ tathāni āgatoti tathāgato? Tathāni nāma cattāri ariyamaggañāṇāni. Tāni hi
atk-s0503a:486_1: idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo, ayaṃ dukkhanirodho, ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti
atk-s0503a:486_3: dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho, samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho
atk-s0503a:486_4: nidānaṭṭho saṃyogaṭṭho palibodhaṭṭho, nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho vivekaṭṭho asaṅkhataṭṭho
atk-s0503a:486_5: amataṭṭho, maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetvaṭṭho dassanaṭṭho ādhipateyyaṭṭhotiādīnaṃ tabbibhāgānañca
atk-s0503a:486_8: avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni, tāni bhagavā anaññaneyyo sayameva
atk-s0503a:486_9: āgato adhigato, tasmā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:487_0: Yathā ca maggañāṇāni, evaṃ bhagavato tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni catupaṭisambhidāñāṇāni
atk-s0503a:487_2: aṭṭhamaggaṅgavibhāvanañāṇāni navānupubbavihārasamāpattiñāṇāni dasabalañāṇāni ca tathabhāve veditabbāni.
atk-s0503a:488_0: Tatrāyaṃ vibhāvanā – yañhi kiñci aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ hīnādibhedabhinnāsu
atk-s0503a:488_2: ca jānitabbaṃ. Anindriyabaddhesu ca atisukhumatirohitavidūradesesupi rūpadhammesu
atk-s0503a:488_4: tattha sabbattheva hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalake viya paccakkhato appaṭihataṃ bhagavato
atk-s0503a:488_5: ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tathā anāgatāsu paccuppannāsu cāti imāni tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:489: “Atītaṃse buddhassa bhagavato appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ, anāgataṃse buddhassa bhagavato appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ, paccuppannaṃse buddhassa bhagavato appaṭihataṃ ñāṇa”nti.
atk-s0503a:490_0: Tāni panetāni tattha tattha dhammānaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni
atk-s0503a:490_1: avitathāni anaññathāni, tāni bhagavā sayambhūñāṇena adhigañchīti. Evampi tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:492: “Atthe ñāṇaṃ atthappaṭisambhidā, dhamme ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttippaṭisambhidā, ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānappaṭisambhidā”ti.
atk-s0503a:493_0: Ettha ca hetuanusārena araṇīyato adhigantabbato ca saṅkhepato hetuphalaṃ attho nāma.
atk-s0503a:493_1: Pabhedato pana yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannaṃ, nibbānaṃ, bhāsitattho, vipāko, kiriyāti
atk-s0503a:493_2: ime pañca dhammā attho. Taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:493_3: atthappaṭisambhidā. Dhammoti saṅkhepato paccayo. So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vidahati
atk-s0503a:493_4: pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca, tasmā dhammoti vuccati, pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattanako
atk-s0503a:493_5: hetu ariyamaggo bhāsitaṃ kusalaṃ akusalanti ime pañca dhammā dhammo, taṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:493_6: paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0503a:494: “Dukkhe ñāṇaṃ atthappaṭisambhidā, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthappaṭisambhidā, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā”ti.
atk-s0503a:495_0: Atha vā hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā, hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthappaṭisambhidā. Ye
atk-s0503a:495_1: dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā, imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ atthappaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0503a:495_2: Yamhā dhammā te dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā, tesu dhammesu
atk-s0503a:495_3: ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā. Jarāmaraṇe ñāṇaṃ atthappaṭisambhidā, jarāmaraṇasamudaye
atk-s0503a:495_4: ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā. Jarāmaraṇanirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthappaṭisambhidā, jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminiyā
atk-s0503a:495_5: paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā. Jātiyā, bhave, upādāne, taṇhāya, vedanāya,
atk-s0503a:495_6: phasse, saḷāyatane, nāmarūpe, viññāṇe, saṅkhāresu ñāṇaṃ atthappaṭisambhidā, saṅkhārasamudaye
atk-s0503a:495_7: ñāṇaṃ dhammappaṭisambhidā. Saṅkhāranirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthappaṭisambhidā, saṅkhāranirodhagāminiyā
atk-s0503a:496_0: “Idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ jānāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati dhammappaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0503a:496_1: So tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti ‘ayaṃ imassa bhāsitassa attho, ayaṃ imassa
atk-s0503a:497_0: “Katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ
atk-s0503a:497_1: ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe… dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:497_2: samaye phasso hoti…pe… avikkhepo hoti…pe… ime dhammā kusalā. Imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:497_3: dhammappaṭisambhidā, tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthappaṭisambhidā”tiādi vitthāro.
atk-s0503a:498_0: Yā panetasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca sabhāvanirutti abyabhicāravohāro abhilāpo, tasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:498_2: ayaṃ asabhāvaniruttī”ti pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttippaṭisambhidā. Yathāvuttesu tesu
atk-s0503a:498_3: ñāṇesu gocarakiccato vitthārato pavattaṃ sabbampi taṃ ñāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa
atk-s0503a:498_4: tasmiṃ ñāṇe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānappaṭisambhidā. Iti imāni cattāri paṭisambhidāñāṇāni
atk-s0503a:498_5: sayameva bhagavatā adhigatāni atthadhammādike tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attano visaye avisaṃvādanavasena
atk-s0503a:498_6: aviparītākārappavattiyā tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Evampi bhagavā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:499_0: Tathā yaṃkiñci ñeyyaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ taṃ bhagavatā sabbākārena ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ adhigataṃ
atk-s0503a:499_1: abhisambuddhaṃ. Tathā hissa abhiññeyyā dhammā abhiññeyyato buddhā, pariññeyyā dhammā
atk-s0503a:499_2: pariññeyyato, pahātabbā dhammā pahātabbato, sacchikātabbā dhammā sacchikātabbato,
atk-s0503a:499_3: bhāvetabbā dhammā bhāvetabbato, yato naṃ koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro
atk-s0503a:499_4: vā brahmā vā “ime nāma te dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0503a:500_0: Yaṃkiñci pahātabbaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ taṃ bhagavato anavasesato bodhimūleyeva pahīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:500_1: anuppattidhammaṃ, na tassa pahānāya uttari karaṇīyaṃ atthi. Tathā hissa lobhadosamohaviparītamanasikāraahirikānottappathinamiddhakodhūpanāha-
atk-s0503a:500_6: diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ saha vāsanāya pahīnaṃ samucchinnaṃ samūhataṃ, yato naṃ koci
atk-s0503a:500_7: samaṇo vā…pe… brahmā vā “ime nāma te kilesā appahīnā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0503a:501_0: Ye cime bhagavatā kammavipākakilesūpavādaāṇāvītikkamappabhedā antarāyikā vuttā, alameva
atk-s0503a:501_1: te paṭisevato ekantena antarāyāya. Yato naṃ koci samaṇo vā…pe… brahmā vā “nālaṃ te
atk-s0503a:501_2: paṭisevato antarāyāyā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0503a:502_0: Yo ca bhagavatā niravasesavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇāya sīlasamādhipaññāya saṅgaho sattakoṭṭhāsiko
atk-s0503a:502_1: sattatiṃsappabhedo ariyamaggapubbaṅgamo anuttaro niyyāniko dhammo desito, so ekanteneva
atk-s0503a:502_2: niyyāti, paṭipannassa vaṭṭadukkhato mokkhāya hoti, yato naṃ koci samaṇo vā…pe… brahmā
atk-s0503a:502_3: vā “niyyāniko dhammoti tayā desito na niyyātī”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho
atk-s0503a:502_4: natthīti. Vuttañhetaṃ – “sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti
atk-s0503a:502_5: vitthāro. Evametāni attano ñāṇappahānadesanāvisesānaṃ avitathabhāvāvabodhanato aviparītākārappavattitāni
atk-s0503a:502_6: bhagavato catuvesārajjañāṇāni tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Evampi bhagavā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:503_0: Tathā nirayagati, tiracchānagati, petagati, manussagati, devagatīti pañca gatiyo,
atk-s0503a:503_1: tāsu sañjīvādayo aṭṭha mahānirayā, kukkuḷādayo soḷasa ussadanirayā, lokantarikanirayoti
atk-s0503a:503_2: sabbepime ekantadukkhatāya nirassādaṭṭhena nirayā, yathākammunā gantabbato gati cāti
atk-s0503a:503_4: tiriyaṃ añchitabhāvena tiracchānā, te eva gatīti tiracchānagati. Khuppipāsitattā
atk-s0503a:503_5: paradattūpajīvinijjhāmataṇhikādayo dukkhabahulatāya pākaṭasukhato itā vigatāti petā,
atk-s0503a:503_6: te eva gatīti petagati, kālakañcikādiasurāpi etesvevantogadhā. Parittadīpavāsīhi
atk-s0503a:503_7: saddhiṃ jambudīpādicatumahādīpavāsino manaso ussannatāya manussā, te eva gatīti manussagati.
atk-s0503a:503_8: Cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagāti ime chabbīsati devanikāyā
atk-s0503a:503_9: dibbanti attano iddhānubhāvena kīḷanti jotanti cāti devā, te eva gatīti devagati.
atk-s0503a:504_0: Tā panetā gatiyo yasmā taṃtaṃkammanibbatto upapattibhavaviseso, tasmā atthato vipākakkhandhā
atk-s0503a:504_1: kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. Tattha “ayaṃ nāma gati iminā nāma kammunā jāyati, tassa ca kammassa
atk-s0503a:504_2: paccayavisesehi evaṃ vibhāgabhinnattā visuṃ ete sattanikāyā evaṃ vibhāgabhinnā”ti
atk-s0503a:504_3: yathāsakaṃ hetuphalavibhāgaparicchindanavasena ṭhānaso hetuso bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0503a:505_0: “Pañca kho imā, sāriputta, gatiyo. Katamā pañca? Nirayo, tiracchānayoni, pettivisayo,
atk-s0503a:505_1: manussā, devā. Nirayañcāhaṃ, sāriputta, pajānāmi nirayagāmiñca maggaṃ nirayagāminiñca
atk-s0503a:505_2: paṭipadaṃ, yathā paṭipanno ca kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ
atk-s0503a:506: Tāni panetāni bhagavato ñāṇāni tasmiṃ tasmiṃ visaye aviparītākārappavattiyā avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Evampi bhagavā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:507_1: paññāsāya ākārehi pavattaṃ bhagavato indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “saddho
atk-s0503a:507_2: puggalo apparajakkho, assaddho puggalo mahārajakkho”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0503a:508_0: Yañca “ayaṃ puggalo apparajakkho, ayaṃ sassatadiṭṭhiko, ayaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiko, ayaṃ
atk-s0503a:508_1: anulomikāyaṃ khantiyaṃ ṭhito, ayaṃ yathābhūtañāṇe ṭhito, ayaṃ kāmāsayo, na nekkhammādiāsayo,
atk-s0503a:508_2: ayaṃ nekkhammāsayo, na kāmādiāsayo”tiādinā “imassa kāmarāgo ativiya thāmagato, na
atk-s0503a:508_3: paṭighādiko, imassa paṭigho ativiya thāmagato, na kāmarāgādiko”tiādinā “imassa puññābhisaṅkhāro
atk-s0503a:508_4: adhiko, na apuññābhisaṅkhāro na āneñjābhisaṅkhāro, imassa apuññābhisaṅkhāro adhiko,
atk-s0503a:508_5: na puññābhisaṅkhāro na āneñjābhisaṅkhāro, imassa āneñjābhisaṅkhāro adhiko, na puññābhisaṅkhāro
atk-s0503a:508_6: na apuññābhisaṅkhāro. Imassa kāyasucaritaṃ adhikaṃ, imassa vacīsucaritaṃ, imassa
atk-s0503a:508_7: manosucaritaṃ, ayaṃ hīnādhimuttiko, ayaṃ paṇītādhimuttiko, ayaṃ kammāvaraṇena samannāgato,
atk-s0503a:508_8: ayaṃ kilesāvaraṇena samannāgato, ayaṃ vipākāvaraṇena samannāgato, ayaṃ na kammāvaraṇena
atk-s0503a:508_9: samannāgato, na kilesāvaraṇena samannāgato, na vipākāvaraṇena samannāgato”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:508_10: ca sattānaṃ āsayādīnaṃ yathābhūtaṃ vibhāvanākārappavattaṃ bhagavato āsayānusayañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:509: “Idha tathāgato sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti, anusayaṃ jānāti, caritaṃ jānāti, adhimuttiṃ jānāti, bhabbābhabbe satte jānātī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:510_2: vividhavikubbaniddhinimmāpanakaṃ bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyañāṇaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:511_0: “Idha tathāgato yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karoti asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi, uparimakāyato aggikkhandho
atk-s0503a:511_1: pavattati, heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati. Heṭṭhimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati,
atk-s0503a:512_0: Yañca rāgādīhi jātiādīhi ca anekehi dukkhadhammehi upaddutaṃ sattanikāyaṃ tato nīharitukāmatāvasena
atk-s0503a:512_1: nānānayehi pavattassa bhagavato mahākaruṇokkamanassa paccayabhūtaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiñāṇaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:513_0: “Katamaṃ tathāgatassa mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā ñāṇaṃ? Bahukehi ākārehi passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:513_1: bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati, āditto lokasannivāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:513_2: bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati. Uyyutto, payāto, kummaggappaṭipanno, upanīyati
atk-s0503a:513_3: loko addhuvo, atāṇo loko anabhissaro, assako loko, sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyaṃ, ūno loko
atk-s0503a:513_4: atitto taṇhādāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.
atk-s0503a:514_0: “Atāyano lokasannivāso, aleṇo, asaraṇo, asaraṇībhūto. Uddhato loko avūpasanto, sasallo
atk-s0503a:514_1: lokasannivāso viddho puthusallehi, avijjandhakārāvaraṇo kilesapañjarapakkhitto, avijjāgato
atk-s0503a:514_2: lokasannivāso aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho tantākulakajāto kulaguṇḍikajāto muñjapabbajabhūto
atk-s0503a:514_3: apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattati, avijjāvisadosasaṃlitto, kilesakalalībhūto,
atk-s0503a:515: “Taṇhāsaṅghāṭapaṭimukko, taṇhājālena otthaṭo, taṇhāsotena vuyhati, taṇhāsaññojanena saṃyutto, taṇhānusayena anusaṭo, taṇhāsantāpena santappati, taṇhāpariḷāhena pariḍayhati.
atk-s0503a:516: “Diṭṭhisaṅghāṭapaṭimukko, diṭṭhijālena otthaṭo, diṭṭhisotena vuyhati, diṭṭhisaññojanena saṃyutto, diṭṭhānusayena anusaṭo, diṭṭhisantāpena santappati, diṭṭhipariḷāhena pariḍayhati.
atk-s0503a:517: “Jātiyā anugato, jarāya anusaṭo, byādhinā abhibhūto, maraṇena abbhāhato, dukkhe patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0503a:518_2: mahāpalibodhena palibuddho, mahāpapāte patito, mahākantārappaṭipanno, mahāsaṃsārappaṭipanno,
atk-s0503a:519_0: “Abbhāhato lokasannivāso, āditto lokasannivāso rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā jātiyā
atk-s0503a:519_1: jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, unnītako lokasannivāso
atk-s0503a:519_2: haññati niccamatāṇo pattadaṇḍo takkaro, vajjabandhanabaddho āghātanapaccupaṭṭhito,
atk-s0503a:519_3: anātho lokasannivāso paramakāruññappatto, dukkhābhitunno cirarattaṃ pīḷito, gadhito niccaṃ pipāsito.
atk-s0503a:520: “Andho acakkhuko, hatanetto apariṇāyako, vipathapakkhando añjasāparaddho, mahoghapakkhando.
atk-s0503a:521_0: “Dvīhi diṭṭhigatehi pariyuṭṭhito, tīhi duccaritehi vippaṭipanno, catūhi yogehi yojito,
atk-s0503a:521_1: catūhi ganthehi ganthito, catūhi upādānehi upādiyati, pañcagatisamāruḷho, pañcahi
atk-s0503a:521_2: kāmaguṇehi rajjati, pañcahi nīvaraṇehi otthaṭo, chahi vivādamūlehi vivadati, chahi
atk-s0503a:521_3: taṇhākāyehi rajjati, chahi diṭṭhigatehi pariyuṭṭhito, sattahi anusayehi anusaṭo,
atk-s0503a:521_4: sattahi saññojanehi saṃyutto, sattahi mānehi unnato, aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi samparivattati,
atk-s0503a:521_5: aṭṭhahi micchattehi niyyāto, aṭṭhahi purisadosehi dussati, navahi āghātavatthūhi
atk-s0503a:521_6: āghātito, navavidhamānehi unnato, navahi taṇhāmūlakehi dhammehi rajjati, dasahi kilesavatthūhi
atk-s0503a:521_7: kilissati, dasahi āghātavatthūhi āghātito, dasahi akusalakammapathehi samannāgato,
atk-s0503a:521_8: dasahi saṃyojanehi saṃyutto, dasahi micchattehi niyyāto, dasavatthukāya micchādiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0503a:521_9: samannāgato, dasavatthukāya antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato, aṭṭhasatataṇhāpapañcehi
atk-s0503a:521_10: papañcito, dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatehi pariyuṭṭhito, lokasannivāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:522_0: “Ahañcamhi tiṇṇo, loko ca atiṇṇo. Ahañcamhi mutto, loko ca amutto. Ahañcamhi danto,
atk-s0503a:522_1: loko ca adanto. Ahañcamhi santo, loko ca asanto. Ahañcamhi assattho, loko ca anassattho.
atk-s0503a:522_2: Ahañcamhi parinibbuto, loko ca aparinibbuto. Pahomi khvāhaṃ tiṇṇo tāretuṃ, mutto
atk-s0503a:522_3: mocetuṃ, danto dametuṃ, santo sametuṃ, assattho assāsetuṃ, parinibbuto parinibbāpetunti
atk-s0503a:522_4: passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:524_0: Yaṃ pana yāvatā dhammadhātuyā yattakaṃ ñātabbaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatādikassa sabbassa
atk-s0503a:524_3: tatthāvaraṇābhāvato nissaṅgappavattimupādāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti vuccati. Ekameva hi
atk-s0503a:524_4: taṃ ñāṇaṃ visayappavattimukhena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ duvidhena uddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:524_5: Aññathā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇānaṃ sādhāraṇatā sabbavisayatā āpajjeyyuṃ, na ca taṃ
atk-s0503a:524_6: yuttaṃ kiñcāpi imāya yuttiyā. Ayañhettha pāḷi –
atk-s0503a:525_0: “Sabbaṃ saṅkhatamasaṅkhataṃ anavasesaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha āvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:525_1: natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ. Atītaṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha āvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:525_2: natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ. Anāgataṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha āvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:525_3: natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ. Paccuppannaṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha āvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:526: Evametāni bhagavato chaasādhāraṇañāṇāni aviparītākārappavattiyā yathāsakavisayassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Evampi bhagavā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:528_3: anekesaṃ upaddavānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā satiādibhedā dhammasāmaggī, yāya ariyasāvako
atk-s0503a:528_4: bujjhati kilesaniddāya uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva
atk-s0503a:528_5: vā sacchikarotīti, sā dhammasāmaggī bodhīti vuccati. Tassā ‘bodhiyā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā,
atk-s0503a:528_6: ariyasāvako vā yathāvuttāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā bodhīti vuccati, tassa
atk-s0503a:528_7: bodhissa aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā”ti evaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇato. “Upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇo satisambojjhaṅgo,
atk-s0503a:529_0: “Tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo? Idha, bhikkhu, satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena
atk-s0503a:529_1: samannāgato, cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā”tiādinā sattannaṃ
atk-s0503a:529_2: bojjhaṅgānaṃ aññamaññopakāravasena ekakkhaṇe pavattidassanato, “tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo?
atk-s0503a:529_3: Atthi ajjhattaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammesu sati, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu satī”tiādinā tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:529_4: visayavibhāgena pavattidassanato. “Tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo? Idha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0503a:529_5: bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmi”ntiādinā
atk-s0503a:529_6: bhāvanāvidhidassanato. “Tattha katame satta bojjhaṅgā? Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye
atk-s0503a:529_7: lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti…pe… tasmiṃ samaye satta bojjhaṅgā honti satisambojjhaṅgo…pe…
atk-s0503a:529_8: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo. Tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo? Yā sati…pe… anussatī”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:529_9: channavutiyā nayasahassavibhāgehīti evaṃ nānākārato pavattāni bhagavato sambojjhaṅgavibhāvanañāṇāni
atk-s0503a:529_10: tassa tassa atthassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Evampi bhagavā
atk-s0503a:531_0: “Tattha katamaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ? Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
atk-s0503a:531_1: maggo. Seyyathidaṃ, sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhī”ti evaṃ sarūpato. Sabbakilesehi
atk-s0503a:531_2: ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalappaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo, aṭṭhavidhattā nibbānādhigamāya
atk-s0503a:531_3: ekantakāraṇattā ca aṭṭhaṅgiko. Kilese mārento gacchati, nibbānatthikehi maggīyati,
atk-s0503a:531_4: sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ maggatīti maggoti evaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇato. “Sammā dassanalakkhaṇā
atk-s0503a:531_5: sammādiṭṭhi, sammā abhiniropanalakkhaṇo sammāsaṅkappo, sammā pariggahaṇalakkhaṇā
