atk-s0503a:531_6: sammāvācā, sammā samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇo sammākammanto, sammā vodānalakkhaṇo sammāājīvo,
atk-s0503a:531_7: sammā paggahalakkhaṇo sammāvāyāmo, sammā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā sammāsati, sammā avikkhepalakkhaṇo
atk-s0503a:531_8: sammāsamādhī”ti evaṃ visesalakkhaṇato. Sammādiṭṭhi aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi
atk-s0503a:531_9: saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati, nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, tappaṭicchādakamohavidhamanena
atk-s0503a:531_10: asammohato sampayuttadhamme ca passati. Tathā sammāsaṅkappādayopi micchāsaṅkappādīni
atk-s0503a:531_12: ca karontīti evaṃ kiccavibhāgato. Sammādiṭṭhi pubbabhāge nānakkhaṇā visuṃ visuṃ dukkhādiārammaṇā
atk-s0503a:531_13: hutvā maggakāle ekakkhaṇā nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīni
atk-s0503a:531_14: cattāri nāmāni labhati, sammāsaṅkappādayopi pubbabhāge nānakkhaṇā nānārammaṇā maggakāle
atk-s0503a:532_0: Tesu sammāsaṅkappo kiccato nekkhammasaṅkappotiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati, sammāvācādayo
atk-s0503a:532_1: tayo pubbabhāge musāvādāveramaṇītiādivibhāgā viratiyopi cetanāyopi hutvā maggakkhaṇe
atk-s0503a:532_2: viratiyova, sammāvāyāmasatiyo kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri nāmāni
atk-s0503a:532_3: labhanti. Sammāsamādhi pana maggakkhaṇepi paṭhamajjhānādivasena nānā evāti evaṃ pubbabhāgaparabhāgesu
atk-s0503a:532_4: pavattivibhāgato, “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”ntiādinā
atk-s0503a:532_5: bhāvanāvidhito, “tattha katamo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo? Idha, bhikkhu, yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ
atk-s0503a:532_6: jhānaṃ bhāveti…pe… dukkhāpaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo
atk-s0503a:532_7: hoti sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo”tiādinā caturāsītiyā nayasahassavibhāgehīti evaṃ anekākārato
atk-s0503a:532_8: pavattāni bhagavato ariyamaggavibhāvanañāṇāni atthassa avisaṃvādanato sabbānipi tathāni
atk-s0503a:532_9: avitathāni anaññathāni. Evampi bhagavā tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:533_0: Tathā paṭhamajjhānasamāpatti yā ca nirodhasamāpattīti etāsu anupaṭipāṭiyā viharitabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0503a:533_2: yathārahaṃ sampayogavasena ca pavattāni bhagavato ñāṇāni tadatthasiddhiyā tathāni
atk-s0503a:533_3: avitathāni anaññathāni. Tathā “idaṃ imassa ṭhānaṃ, idaṃ aṭṭhāna”nti aviparītaṃ tassa
atk-s0503a:533_4: tassa phalassa kāraṇākāraṇajānanaṃ, tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ atītādibhedabhinnassa kammasamādānassa
atk-s0503a:533_5: anavasesato yathābhūtaṃ vipākantarajānanaṃ, āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva tassa tassa sattassa
atk-s0503a:533_6: “ayaṃ nirayagāminī paṭipadā…pe… ayaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā”ti yāthāvato sāsavānāsavakammavibhāgajānanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:533_8: “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imasmiṃ dhammappabandhe ayaṃ viseso jāyatī”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:533_9: nayena yathābhūtaṃ dhātunānattajānanaṃ, anavasesato sattānaṃ hīnādiajjhāsayādhimuttijānanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:533_11: sattānaṃ aparimāṇāsu jātīsu tappaṭibandhena saddhiṃ anavasesato pubbenivutthakkhandhasantatijānanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:533_12: hīnādivibhāgehi saddhiṃ cutipaṭisandhijānanaṃ, “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0503a:533_13: catusaccajānananti imāni bhagavato dasabalañāṇāni avirajjhitvā yathāsakaṃ visayāvagāhanato
atk-s0503a:533_14: yathādhippetatthasādhanato ca yathābhūtavuttiyā tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0503a:534: “Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:536_0: Yathā cetesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vasena, evaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ satipaṭṭhānasammappadhānavibhāvanañāṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:536_1: anantāparimeyyabhedānaṃ anaññasādhāraṇānaṃ paññāvisesānaṃ vasena bhagavā tathāni
atk-s0503a:536_2: ñāṇāni āgato adhigatoti tathāgato. Evampi tathāni āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:537_0: Kathaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yā sā bhagavato abhijāti abhisambodhi dhammavinayapaññāpanā
atk-s0503a:537_1: anupādisesanibbānadhātu, sā tathā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yadatthaṃ lokanāthena abhisambodhi
atk-s0503a:537_2: patthitā pavattitā ca, tadatthassa ekantasiddhiyā avisaṃvādanato aviparītatthavuttiyā
atk-s0503a:537_3: tathā avitathā anaññathā. Tathā hi ayaṃ bhagavā bodhisattabhūto samatiṃsapāramiparipūraṇādikaṃ
atk-s0503a:537_4: vuttappabhedaṃ sabbaṃ buddhattahetuṃ sampādetvā tusitapure ṭhitova buddhakolāhalaṃ
atk-s0503a:540_0: Āyācito uppannapubbanimitto pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā “idānāhaṃ manussayoniyaṃ
atk-s0503a:540_1: uppajjitvā abhisambujjhissāmī”ti āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya sakyarājakule mahāmāyāya deviyā
atk-s0503a:540_2: kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasa māse devamanussehi mahatā parihārena parihariyamāno
atk-s0503a:541_0: Abhijātikkhaṇe panassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakkhaṇe viya dvattiṃsapubbanimittāni pāturahesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:541_1: Ayañhi dasasahassī lokadhātu kampi saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu
atk-s0503a:541_2: appamāṇo obhāso phari, tassa taṃ siriṃ daṭṭhukāmā viya jaccandhā cakkhūni paṭilabhiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:541_3: badhirā saddaṃ suṇiṃsu. Mūgā samālapiṃsu, khujjā ujugattā ahesuṃ, paṅgulā padasā
atk-s0503a:541_4: gamanaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu, bandhanagatā sabbasattā andubandhanādīhi mucciṃsu, sabbanirayesu
atk-s0503a:541_5: aggi nibbāyi, pettivisaye khuppipāsā vūpasami, tiracchānānaṃ bhayaṃ nāhosi, sabbasattānaṃ
atk-s0503a:541_6: rogo vūpasami, sabbasattā piyaṃvadā ahesuṃ, madhurenākārena assā hasiṃsu, vāraṇā
atk-s0503a:541_7: gajjiṃsu, sabbatūriyāni sakaṃ sakaṃ ninnādaṃ muñciṃsu, aghaṭṭitāni eva manussānaṃ
atk-s0503a:541_8: hatthūpagādīni ābharaṇāni madhurenākārena raviṃsu, sabbadisā vippasannā ahesuṃ, sattānaṃ
atk-s0503a:541_9: sukhaṃ uppādayamāno mudusītalavāto vāyi, akālamegho vassi, pathavitopi udakaṃ ubbhijjitvā
atk-s0503a:541_10: vissandi, pakkhino ākāsagamanaṃ vijahiṃsu, nadiyo asandamānā aṭṭhaṃsu, mahāsamudde
atk-s0503a:541_11: madhuraṃ udakaṃ ahosi, upakkilesavimutte sūriye dissamāne eva ākāsagatā sabbā jotiyo
atk-s0503a:541_12: jaliṃsu, ṭhapetvā arūpāvacare deve avasesā sabbe devā sabbepi nerayikā dissamānarūpā
atk-s0503a:541_13: ahesuṃ, tarukuṭṭakavāṭaselādayo anāvaraṇabhūtā ahesuṃ, sattānaṃ cutūpapātā nāhesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:541_14: sabbaṃ aniṭṭhagandhaṃ abhibhavitvā dibbagandho vāyi, sabbe phalūpagā rukkhā phaladharā
atk-s0503a:541_15: sampajjiṃsu, mahāsamuddo sabbatthakameva pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannatalo ahosi,
atk-s0503a:541_16: thalajajalajādīni sabbapupphāni pupphiṃsu, rukkhānaṃ khandhesu khandhapadumāni, sākhāsu
atk-s0503a:541_17: sākhapadumāni, latāsu latāpadumāni pupphiṃsu, mahītale silātalāni bhinditvā uparūpari
atk-s0503a:541_18: satta satta hutvā daṇḍapadumāni nāma nikkhamiṃsu, ākāse olambakapadumāni nibbattiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:541_19: samantato pupphavassaṃ vassi, ākāse dibbatūriyāni vajjiṃsu, sakaladasasahassī lokadhātu
atk-s0503a:541_20: vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamālāguḷaṃ viya uppīḷetvā baddhamālākalāpo viya alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0503a:541_21: mālāsanaṃ viya ca ekamālāmālinī vipphurantavāḷabījanī pupphadhūpagandhaparivāsitā
atk-s0503a:541_22: paramasobhaggappattā ahosi, tāni ca pubbanimittāni upari adhigatānaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ
atk-s0503a:541_23: nimittabhūtāni eva ahesuṃ. Evaṃ anekacchariyapātubhāvappaṭimaṇḍitā cāyaṃ abhijāti
atk-s0503a:541_24: yadatthaṃ anena abhisambodhi patthitā, tassā abhisambodhiyā ekantasiddhiyā tathāva
atk-s0503a:542_0: Tathā ye buddhaveneyyā bodhaneyyabandhavā, te sabbepi anavasesato sayameva bhagavatā
atk-s0503a:542_1: vinītā. Ye ca sāvakaveneyyā dhammaveneyyā ca, tepi sāvakādīhi vinītā vinayaṃ gacchanti
atk-s0503a:542_2: gamissanti cāti yadatthaṃ bhagavatā abhisambodhi abhipatthitā, tadatthassa ekantasiddhiyā
atk-s0503a:543_0: Apica yassa yassa ñeyyadhammassa yo yo sabhāvo bujjhitabbo, so so hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ
atk-s0503a:543_1: viya āvajjanamattappaṭibaddhena attano ñāṇena aviparītaṃ anavasesato bhagavatā abhisambuddhoti
atk-s0503a:544_0: Tathā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ tathā tathā desetabbappakāraṃ tesaṃ tesañca sattānaṃ
atk-s0503a:544_1: āsayānusayacaritādhimuttiṃ sammadeva oloketvā dhammataṃ avijahanteneva paññattinayavohāramaggaṃ
atk-s0503a:544_2: anatidhāvanteneva ca dhammataṃ vibhāvantena yathāparādhaṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ yathādhammañca
atk-s0503a:544_3: anusāsantena bhagavatā veneyyā vinītā ariyabhūmiṃ sampāpitāti dhammavinayapaññāpanāpissa
atk-s0503a:544_4: tadatthasiddhiyā yathābhūtavuttiyā ca tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0503a:545_1: lujjanabhāvābhāvato lokasabhāvātītā tamasā visaṃsaṭṭhattā kenaci anobhāsanīyā lokasabhāvābhāvato
atk-s0503a:545_2: eva gatiādibhāvarahitā appatiṭṭhā anārammaṇā amatamahānibbānadhātu khandhasaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-s0503a:545_3: upādīnaṃ lesamattassapi abhāvato anupādisesāti vuccati, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:546_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatanaṃ, yattha neva pathavī na āpo na tejo na vāyo na ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ
atk-s0503a:546_1: na viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ na ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nāyaṃ loko na
atk-s0503a:546_2: paro loko na ca ubho candimasūriyā, tatrāpāhaṃ, bhikkhave, neva āgatiṃ vadāmi na
atk-s0503a:546_3: gatiṃ na ṭhitiṃ na cutiṃ na upapattiṃ, appatiṭṭhaṃ appavattaṃ anārammaṇamevetaṃ,
atk-s0503a:547_0: Sā sabbesampi upādānakkhandhānaṃ atthaṅgamo, sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ samatho, sabbūpadhīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:547_1: paṭinissaggo, sabbadukkhānaṃ vūpasamo, sabbālayānaṃ samugghāto, sabbavaṭṭānaṃ upacchedo,
atk-s0503a:547_2: accantasantilakkhaṇoti yathāvuttasabhāvassa kadācipi avisaṃvādanato tathā avitathā
atk-s0503a:547_3: anaññathā. Evametā abhijātiādikā tathā gato upagato adhigato paṭipanno pattoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:548_0: Kathaṃ tathāvidhoti tathāgato? Yathāvidhā purimakā sammāsambuddhā, ayampi bhagavā
atk-s0503a:548_1: tathāvidho. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathāvidhā te bhagavanto maggasīlena phalasīlena sabbenapi
atk-s0503a:548_3: maggapaññāya phalapaññāya sabbāyapi lokiyalokuttarapaññāya, devasikaṃ valañjitabbehi
atk-s0503a:548_6: pana anantāparimāṇabhedehi acinteyyānubhāvehi sakalasabbaññuguṇehi, ayampi amhākaṃ
atk-s0503a:548_7: bhagavā tathāvidho. Sabbesañhi sammāsambuddhānaṃ āyuvemattaṃ, sarīrappamāṇavemattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:548_8: kulavemattaṃ, dukkaracariyāvemattaṃ, rasmivemattanti, imehi pañcahi vemattehi siyā
atk-s0503a:548_9: vemattaṃ, na pana sīlavisuddhiyādīsu visuddhīsu samathavipassanāpaṭipattiyaṃ attanā
atk-s0503a:548_10: paṭiladdhaguṇesu ca kiñci nānākaraṇaṃ atthi. Atha kho majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya
atk-s0503a:548_11: aññamaññaṃ nibbisesā te buddhā bhagavanto. Tasmā yathāvidhā purimakā sammāsambuddhā,
atk-s0503a:548_12: ayampi bhagavā tathāvidho. Evaṃ tathāvidhoti tathāgato. Vidhattho cettha gatasaddo,
atk-s0503a:548_13: tathā hi lokiyā vidhayuttagatasadde pakāratthe vadanti.
atk-s0503a:549_0: Kathaṃ tathā pavattitoti tathāgato? Anaññasādhāraṇena iddhānubhāvena samannāgatattā
atk-s0503a:549_2: kāyappavattiyādīnaṃ katthaci paṭighātābhāvato yathā ruci tathā gataṃ gati gamanaṃ
atk-s0503a:549_3: kāyavacīcittappavatti etassāti tathāgato. Evaṃ tathā pavattitoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:550_0: Kathaṃ tathehi agatoti tathāgato? Bodhisambhārasambharaṇe tappaṭipakkhappavattisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:550_1: natthi etassa gatanti agato. So panassa agatabhāvo maccheradānapāramiādīsu aviparītaṃ
atk-s0503a:551_0: Atha vā kilesābhisaṅkhārappavattisaṅkhātaṃ khandhappavattisaṅkhātameva vā pañcasupi
atk-s0503a:551_1: gatīsu gataṃ gamanaṃ etassa natthīti agato. Saupādisesaanupādisesanibbānappattiyā
atk-s0503a:551_2: svāyamassa agatabhāvo tathehi ariyamaggañāṇehīti evampi bhagavā tathehi agatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:552_0: Kathaṃ tathā gatabhāvena tathāgato? Tathā gatabhāvenāti ca tathāgatassa sabbhāvena
atk-s0503a:552_1: atthitāyāti attho. Ko panesa tathāgato, yassa atthitāya bhagavā tathāgatoti vuccatīti?
atk-s0503a:552_2: Saddhammo. Saddhammo hi ariyamaggo tāva yathā yuganaddhasamathavipassanābalena anavasesato
atk-s0503a:552_3: kilesapakkhaṃ samūhanantena samucchedappahānavasena gantabbaṃ, tathā gato. Phaladhammo
atk-s0503a:552_4: yathā attano maggānurūpaṃ paṭippassaddhipahānavasena gantabbaṃ, tathā gato pavatto.
atk-s0503a:552_5: Nibbānadhammo pana yathā gato paññāya paṭividdho sakalavaṭṭadukkhavūpasamāya sampajjati,
atk-s0503a:552_6: buddhādīhi tathā gato sacchikatoti tathāgato. Pariyattidhammopi yathā purimabuddhehi
atk-s0503a:552_7: suttageyyādivasena pavattiādippakāsanavasena ca veneyyānaṃ āsayādianurūpaṃ pavattito,
atk-s0503a:552_8: amhākampi bhagavatā tathā gato gadito pavattitoti vā tathāgato. Yathā bhagavatā desito,
atk-s0503a:552_9: tathā bhagavato sāvakehi gato avagatoti tathāgato. Evaṃ sabbopi saddhammo tathāgato.
atk-s0503a:552_10: Tenāha sakko devānamindo – “tathāgataṃ devamanussapūjitaṃ, dhammaṃ namassāma suvatthi
atk-s0503a:553_0: Yathā ca dhammo, evaṃ ariyasaṅghopi yathā attahitāya parahitāya ca paṭipannehi suvisuddhaṃ
atk-s0503a:553_1: pubbabhāgasamathavipassanāpaṭipadaṃ purakkhatvā tena tena maggena gantabbaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0503a:553_2: taṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato. Yathā vā bhagavatā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādayo desitā,
atk-s0503a:553_3: tathāva buddhattā tathā gadanato ca tathāgato. Tenāha sakko devarājā – “tathāgataṃ
atk-s0503a:553_4: devamanussapūjitaṃ, saṅghaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotū”ti. Svāssa sāvakabhūto atthīti
atk-s0503a:554_0: Idampi ca tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvadīpane mukhamattakameva, sabbākārena pana tathāgatova
atk-s0503a:554_1: tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya. Idañhi tathāgatapadaṃ mahatthaṃ mahāgatikaṃ
atk-s0503a:554_2: mahāvisayaṃ, tassa appamādapadassa viya tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ yuttito atthabhāvena
atk-s0503a:604_1: mahatiyā iddhiyā samannāgamo mahiddhikatā. Cirakālasambhūtena suvidūrappaṭipakkhena
atk-s0503a:604_3: Yatrāti acchariyapasaṃsākotuhalahāsapasādiko paccattatthe nipāto. Tena yuttattā vijāyissatīti
atk-s0503a:604_4: anāgatakālavacanaṃ, attho pana atītakāloyeva. Ayañhettha attho – yā hi nāma ayaṃ
atk-s0503a:604_5: suppavāsā tathā dukkhanimuggā kicchāpannā bhagavato vacanasamakālameva sukhinī arogā
atk-s0503a:604_6: arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyīti. Attamanoti sakamano, bhagavati pasādena kilesarahitacittoti
atk-s0503a:604_7: attho. Kilesapariyuṭṭhitañhi cittaṃ vase avattanato attamanoti na sakkā vattunti.
atk-s0503a:604_8: Attamanoti vā pītisomanassehi gahitamano. Pamuditoti pāmojjena yutto. Pītisomanassajātoti
atk-s0503a:604_9: jātabalavapītisomanasso. Athāti pacchā, tato katipāhassa accayena. Sattabhattānīti
atk-s0503a:604_10: sattasu divasesu dātabbabhattāni. Svātanāyāti svātanapuññatthaṃ, yaṃ sve buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0503a:604_11: saṅghassa dānavasena payirupāsanavasena ca bhavissati puññaṃ tadatthaṃ.
atk-s0503a:605_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ āmantesīti kasmā āmantesi? Suppavāsāya
atk-s0503a:605_1: sāmikassa pasādarakkhaṇatthaṃ. Suppavāsā pana acalappasādāva, upāsakassa pana pasādarakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:605_2: mahāmoggallānattherassa bhāro. Tenāha “tuyheso upaṭṭhāko”ti. Tattha tuyhesoti tuyhaṃ
atk-s0503a:605_3: eso. Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ pāṭibhogoti mama bhogādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ ahāniyā avināsāya
atk-s0503a:605_4: ayyo mahāmoggallāno yadi pāṭibhogo yadi patibhū, ito satta divase atikkamitvā mama
atk-s0503a:605_5: sakkā dānaṃ dātunti yadi ayyena ñātanti dīpeti. Theropi tassa tesu divasesu bhogānaṃ
atk-s0503a:605_6: jīvitassa ca anupaddavaṃ passitvā āha – “dvinnaṃ kho nesaṃ, āvuso, dhammānaṃ pāṭibhogo
atk-s0503a:605_7: bhogānañca jīvitassa cā”ti. Saddhā panassa cittappaṭibaddhāti tasseva bhāraṃ karonto
atk-s0503a:605_8: “saddhāya pana tvaññeva pāṭibhogo”ti āha. Api ca so upāsako diṭṭhasacco, tassa saddhāya
atk-s0503a:605_9: aññathābhāvo natthīti tathā vuttaṃ. Teneva ca kāraṇena bhagavatā “pacchāpi tvaṃ karissasīti
atk-s0503a:605_10: saññāpehī”ti vuttaṃ. Upāsakopi satthari there ca gāravena subbacatāya tassā ca puññena
atk-s0503a:605_11: vaḍḍhiṃ icchanto “karotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā satta bhattāni, pacchāhaṃ karissāmī”ti anujāni.
atk-s0503a:606_0: Tañca dārakanti vijātadivasato paṭṭhāya ekādasamaṃ divasaṃ atikkamitvā tato paraṃ
atk-s0503a:606_1: sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ bhojetvā sattame divase taṃ sattavassikaṃ
atk-s0503a:606_2: dārakaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca vandāpesi. Satta me vassānīti satta me saṃvaccharāni,
atk-s0503a:606_3: accantasaṃyogavasena cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Lohitakumbhiyaṃ vutthānīti mātukucchiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:606_4: attano gabbhavāsadukkhaṃ sandhāya vadati. Aññānipi evarūpāni satta puttānīti “aññepi
atk-s0503a:606_5: evarūpe satta putte”ti vattabbe liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttaṃ “evarūpānī”ti. Evaṃ satta
atk-s0503a:606_6: vassāni gabbhadhāraṇavasena sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhatāya ca mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpetvā
atk-s0503a:606_7: uppajjanakaputteti attho. Etena mātugāmānaṃ puttalolatāya puttalābhena titti natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:607_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ sattadivasādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni gabbhadhāraṇādivasena
atk-s0503a:607_1: pavattaṃ mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ ekapade visaritvā puttalolatāvasena tāya vuttamatthaṃ viditvā.
atk-s0503a:607_2: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ cittasukhappamatto viya pamattapuggale iṭṭhākārena vañcetvā taṇhāsinehassa
atk-s0503a:608_0: Tattha asātanti amadhuraṃ asundaraṃ aniṭṭhaṃ. Sātarūpenāti iṭṭhasabhāvena. Piyarūpenāti
atk-s0503a:608_1: piyāyitabbabhāvena. Sukhassa rūpenāti sukhasabhāvena. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā asātaṃ
atk-s0503a:608_2: appiyaṃ dukkhameva samānaṃ sakalampi vaṭṭagataṃ saṅkhārajātaṃ appahīnavipallāsattā
atk-s0503a:608_3: ayonisomanasikārena iṭṭhaṃ viya piyaṃ viya sukhaṃ viya ca hutvā upaṭṭhahamānaṃ sativippavāsena
atk-s0503a:608_4: pamattapuggalaṃ ativattati abhibhavati ajjhottharati, tasmā imampi suppavāsaṃ punapi
atk-s0503a:608_5: sattakkhattuṃ evarūpaṃ asātaṃ appiyaṃ dukkhaṃ sātādipatirūpakena dukkhena puttasaṅkhātapemavatthusukhena ajjhottharatīti.
atk-s0503a:611: 19. Navame pubbārāmeti sāvatthiyā pācīnadisābhāge anurādhapurassa uttamadevīvihārasadise ṭhāne kārite ārāme. Migāramātupāsādeti migāramātuyā pāsāde.
atk-s0503a:612_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – atīte satasahassakappamatthake padumuttaradasabalaṃ ekā
atk-s0503a:612_1: upāsikā aññataraṃ upāsikaṃ attano aggupaṭṭhāyikaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:612_2: nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusatasahassassa dānaṃ datvā bhagavato nipaccakāraṃ
atk-s0503a:612_3: katvā “anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0503a:612_4: Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle bhaddiyanagare
atk-s0503a:612_5: meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa dhanañjayaseṭṭhino gehe sumanadeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0503a:612_6: gaṇhi. Jātakāle cassā visākhāti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Sā yadā bhagavā bhaddiyanagaraṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0503a:612_7: tadā pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ katvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpannā ahosi.
atk-s0503a:613_0: Aparabhāge sāvatthiyaṃ migāraseṭṭhiputtassa puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumārassa gehaṃ gatā, tattha
atk-s0503a:613_1: naṃ sasuro migāraseṭṭhi upakāravasena mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Tasmā migāramātāti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:613_2: Sā attano mahallatāpasādhanaṃ vissajjetvā navakoṭīhi bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca
atk-s0503a:613_3: vasanatthāya karīsamatte bhūmibhāge uparibhūmiyaṃ pañcagabbhasatāni heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:613_4: pañcagabbhasatānīti gabbhasahassehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ pāsādaṃ kāresi. Tena vuttaṃ “migāramātupāsāde”ti.
atk-s0503a:614_0: Kocideva atthoti kiñcideva payojanaṃ. Raññeti rājini. Paṭibaddhoti āyatto. Visākhāya
atk-s0503a:614_1: ñātikulato maṇimuttādiracitaṃ tādisaṃ bhaṇḍajātaṃ tassā paṇṇākāratthāya pesitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:614_2: taṃ nagaradvārappattaṃ suṅkikā tattha suṅkaṃ gaṇhantā tadanurūpaṃ aggahetvā atirekaṃ
atk-s0503a:614_3: gaṇhiṃsu. Taṃ sutvā visākhā rañño tamatthaṃ nivedetukāmā patirūpaparivārena rājanivesanaṃ
atk-s0503a:614_4: agamāsi, tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā mallikāya deviyā saddhiṃ antepuraṃ gato hoti. Visākhā
atk-s0503a:614_5: okāsaṃ alabhamānā “idāni labhissāmi, idāni labhissāmī”ti bhojanavelaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0503a:614_6: chinnabhattā hutvā pakkāmi. Evaṃ dvīhatīhaṃ gantvāpi okāsaṃ na labhiyeva. Iti rājā
atk-s0503a:614_7: aniveditopi tassa atthavinicchayassa okāsākaraṇena “yathādhippāyaṃ na tīretī”ti vutto.
atk-s0503a:614_8: Tattha yathādhippāyanti adhippāyānurūpaṃ. Na tīretīti na niṭṭhāpeti. Mahāupāsikāya
atk-s0503a:614_9: hi rājāyattasuṅkameva rañño datvā itaraṃ vissajjāpetuṃ adhippāyo, so raññā na diṭṭhattā
atk-s0503a:614_10: eva na tīrito. Handāti vossaggatthe nipāto. Divā divassāti divasassa divā, majjhanhike
atk-s0503a:614_11: kāleti attho. Kenacideva karaṇīyena dvīhatīhaṃ rājanivesanadvāraṃ gacchantī tassa
atk-s0503a:614_12: atthassa aniṭṭhitattā niratthakameva upasaṅkamiṃ, bhagavati upasaṅkamanameva pana
atk-s0503a:614_13: dassanānuttariyādippaṭilābhakāraṇattā sātthakanti evāhaṃ, bhante, imāya velāya idhāgatāti
atk-s0503a:615: Etamatthanti etaṃ parāyattatāya adhippāyāsamijjhanasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ parādhīnāparādhīnavuttīsu ādīnavānisaṃsaparidīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:616_0: Tattha sabbaṃ paravasaṃ dukkhanti yaṃ kiñci atthajātaṃ payojanaṃ paravasaṃ parāyattaṃ
atk-s0503a:616_1: attano icchāya nipphādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya dukkhaṃ dukkhāvahaṃ hotīti attho. Sabbaṃ
atk-s0503a:616_2: issariyaṃ sukhanti duvidhaṃ issariyaṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca. Tattha lokiyaṃ rājissariyādi
atk-s0503a:616_4: nirodhissariyaṃ. Tesu yaṃ cakkavattibhāvapariyosānaṃ manussesu issariyaṃ, yañca sakkādīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:616_5: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ devanikāye ādhipaccabhūtaṃ issariyaṃ, tadubhayaṃ yadipi kammānubhāvena
atk-s0503a:616_6: yathicchitanipphattiyā sukhanimittatāya sukhaṃ, vipariṇāmadukkhatāya pana sabbathā
atk-s0503a:616_7: dukkhameva. Tathā aniccantikatāya lokiyajjhānanibbattaṃ cittissariyaṃ, nirodhissariyameva
atk-s0503a:616_8: pana lokadhammehi akampanīyato anivattisabhāvattā ca ekantasukhaṃ nāma. Yaṃ panettha
atk-s0503a:616_9: sabbattheva aparādhīnatāya labhati cittasukhaṃ, taṃ sandhāya satthā “sabbaṃ issariyaṃ sukha”nti āha.
atk-s0503a:617_0: Sādhāraṇe vihaññantīti idaṃ “sabbaṃ paravasaṃ dukkha”nti imassa padassa atthavivaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:617_1: Ayañhettha attho – sādhāraṇe payojane sādhetabbe sati tassa parādhīnatāya yathādhippāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:617_2: anipphādanato ime sattā vihaññanti vighātaṃ āpajjanti kilamanti. Kasmā? Yogā hi duratikkamāti
atk-s0503a:617_4: pajahituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya duratikkamā. Etesu diṭṭhiyogo paṭhamamaggena atikkamitabbo,
atk-s0503a:617_5: kāmayogo tatiyamaggena. Itare aggamaggena. Iti ariyamaggānaṃ duradhigamanīyattā ime
atk-s0503a:617_6: yogā duratikkamā. Tasmā kāmayogādivasena icchitālābhahetu sattā vihaññanti, asādhāraṇe
atk-s0503a:617_7: pana cittissariye nirodhissariye ca sati na kadācipi vighātassa sambhavoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:618_0: Atha vā sabbaṃ paravasanti yaṃ attano aññappaṭibaddhavuttisaṅkhātaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ aniccasabhāvatāya
atk-s0503a:618_1: dukkhaṃ. “Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti hi vuttaṃ. Sabbaṃ issariyanti yaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭaṃ
atk-s0503a:618_2: issariyaṭṭhānatāya issariyanti laddhanāmaṃ nibbānaṃ, taṃ upādisesādivibhāgaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0503a:618_3: sukhaṃ. “Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha”nti hi vuttaṃ. Sādhāraṇeti evaṃ dukkhasukhe vavatthite
atk-s0503a:618_4: ime sattā bahusādhāraṇe dukkhakāraṇe nimuggā hutvā vihaññanti. Kasmā? Yogā hi duratikkamāti
atk-s0503a:618_5: yasmā te sabbattha nimujjanassa hetubhūtā kāmayogādayo duratikkamā, tasmā tvampi
atk-s0503a:618_6: visākhe parāyattamatthaṃ patthetvā alabhamānā vihaññasīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:621_0: 20. Dasame anupiyāyanti evaṃ nāmake nagare. Ambavaneti tassa nagarassa avidūre mallarājūnaṃ
atk-s0503a:621_1: ekaṃ ambavanaṃ ahosi, tattha mallarājūhi bhagavato vihāro kārito, so “ambavana”ntveva
atk-s0503a:621_2: vuccati. Anupiyaṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā tattha bhagavā viharati, tena vuttaṃ “anupiyāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:621_3: viharati ambavane”ti. Bhaddiyoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ. Kāḷīgodhāya puttoti kāḷīgodhā
atk-s0503a:621_4: nāma sākiyānī sakyarājadevī ariyasāvikā āgataphalā viññātasāsanā, tassā ayaṃ putto.
atk-s0503a:621_5: Tassa pabbajjāvidhi khandhake āgatova. So pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā na cirasseva
atk-s0503a:621_6: chaḷabhiñño ahosi, terasapi dhutaṅgāni samādāya vattati. Bhagavatā ca “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0503a:621_7: bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uccakulikānaṃ, yadidaṃ bhaddiyo kāḷīgodhāya
atk-s0503a:621_8: putto”ti uccakulikabhāve etadagge ṭhapito asītiyā sāvakānaṃ abbhantaro.
atk-s0503a:622_0: Suññāgāragatoti “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ araññaṃ
atk-s0503a:622_1: rukkhamūlañca ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pabbatakandarādi pabbajitasāruppaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ janasambādhābhāvato
atk-s0503a:622_2: idha suññāgāranti adhippetaṃ. Atha vā jhānakaṇṭakānaṃ saddānaṃ abhāvato vivittaṃ
atk-s0503a:622_3: yaṃ kiñci agārampi suññāgāranti veditabbaṃ. Taṃ suññāgāraṃ upagato. Abhikkhaṇanti
atk-s0503a:622_4: bahulaṃ. Udānaṃ udānesīti so hi āyasmā araññe divāvihāraṃ upagatopi rattivāsūpagatopi
atk-s0503a:622_5: yebhuyyena phalasamāpattisukhena nirodhasukhena ca vītināmeti, tasmā taṃ sukhaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0503a:622_6: pubbe attanā anubhūtaṃ sabhayaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ jigucchitvā “aho sukhaṃ aho
atk-s0503a:623_0: Sutvāna nesaṃ etadahosīti nesaṃ sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tassa āyasmato “aho sukhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:623_1: aho sukha”nti udānentassa udānaṃ sutvā “nissaṃsayaṃ esa anabhirato brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0503a:623_2: caratī”ti evaṃ parivitakkitaṃ ahosi. Te bhikkhū puthujjanā tassa āyasmato vivekasukhaṃ
atk-s0503a:623_3: sandhāya udānaṃ ajānantā evaṃ amaññiṃsu, tena vuttaṃ “nissaṃsaya”ntiādi. Tattha nissaṃsayanti
atk-s0503a:623_4: asandehena ekantenāti attho. “Yaṃ so pubbe agāriyabhūto samāno”ti pāḷiṃ vatvā “anubhavī”ti
atk-s0503a:623_5: vacanasesena keci atthaṃ vaṇṇenti, apare “yaṃ sā”ti paṭhanti, “yaṃsa pubbe agāriyabhūtassā”ti
atk-s0503a:623_6: pana pāḷi. Tattha yaṃsāti yaṃ assa, sandhivasena hi akārasakāralopo “evaṃsa te, pupphaṃsā
atk-s0503a:623_7: uppajjī”tiādīsu viya. Tassattho – assa āyasmato bhaddiyassa pabbajitato pubbe agāriyabhūtassa
atk-s0503a:623_8: gahaṭṭhassa sato yaṃ rajjasukhaṃ anubhūtaṃ. Sā tamanussaramānoti so taṃ sukhaṃ etarahi
atk-s0503a:624_0: Te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocunti te sambahulā bhikkhū ullapanasabhāvasaṇṭhitā
atk-s0503a:624_1: tassa anuggahaṇādhippāyena bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ, na ujjhānavasena. Aññataranti
atk-s0503a:624_2: nāmagottena apākaṭaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ. Āmantesīti āṇāpesi te bhikkhū saññāpetukāmo.
atk-s0503a:624_3: Evanti vacanasampaṭiggahe, sādhūti attho. Puna evanti paṭiññāya. Abhikkhaṇaṃ “aho
atk-s0503a:624_4: sukhaṃ, aho sukha”nti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesīti yathā te bhikkhū vadanti, taṃ evaṃ tathevāti
atk-s0503a:624_5: attano udānaṃ paṭijānāti. Kiṃ pana tvaṃ bhaddiyāti kasmā bhagavā pucchati, kiṃ tassa
atk-s0503a:624_6: cittaṃ na jānātīti? No na jānāti, teneva pana tamatthaṃ vadāpetvā te bhikkhū saññāpetuṃ
atk-s0503a:624_7: pucchati. Vuttañhetaṃ – “jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti, jānantāpi na pucchantī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:625_0: Antepureti itthāgārassa sañcaraṇaṭṭhānabhūte rājagehassa abbhantare, yattha rājā
atk-s0503a:625_1: nhānabhojanasayanādiṃ kappeti. Rakkhā susaṃvihitāti ārakkhādikatapurisehi gutti suṭṭhu
atk-s0503a:625_2: samantato vihitā. Bahipi antepureti aḍḍakaraṇaṭṭhānādike antepurato bahibhūte rājagehe.
atk-s0503a:625_3: Evaṃ rakkhito gopito santoti evaṃ rājageharājadhānirajjadesesu anto ca bahi ca anekesu
atk-s0503a:625_4: ṭhānesu anekasatehi susaṃvihitarakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā mameva nibbhayatthaṃ phāsuvihāratthaṃ
atk-s0503a:625_5: rakkhito gopito samāno. Bhītotiādīni padāni aññamaññavevacanāni. Atha vā bhītoti
atk-s0503a:625_6: pararājūhi bhāyamāno. Ubbiggoti sakarajjepi pakatito uppajjanakabhayubbegena ubbiggo
atk-s0503a:625_7: calito. Ussaṅkīti “raññā nāma sabbakālaṃ avissatthena bhavitabba”nti vacanena sabbattha
atk-s0503a:625_8: avissāsavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ kiccakaraṇīyānaṃ paccayaparisaṅkāya ca uddhamukhaṃ saṅkamāno.
atk-s0503a:625_9: Utrāsīti “santikāvacarehipi ajānantasseva me kadāci anattho bhaveyyā”ti uppannena
atk-s0503a:625_10: sarīrakampaṃ uppādanasamatthena tāsena utrāsī. “Utrasto”tipi paṭhanti. Vihāsinti
atk-s0503a:626_0: Etarahīti idāni pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya. Ekoti asahāyo, tena vūpakaṭṭhakāyataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:626_1: Abhītotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Bhayādinimittassa pariggahassa
atk-s0503a:626_2: taṃ nimittassa ca kilesassa abhāvenevassa abhītāditāti. Etena cittavivekaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:626_3: Appossukkoti sarīraguttiyaṃ nirussukko. Pannalomoti lomahaṃsuppādakassa chambhitattassa
atk-s0503a:626_4: abhāvena anuggatalomo. Padadvayenapi serivihāraṃ dasseti. Paradattavuttoti parehi
atk-s0503a:626_5: dinnena cīvarādinā vattamāno, etena sabbaso saṅgābhāvadīpanamukhena anavasesabhayahetuvirahaṃ
atk-s0503a:626_6: dasseti. Migabhūtena cetasāti vissatthavihāritāya migassa viya jātena cittena. Migo
atk-s0503a:626_7: hi amanussapathe araññe vasamāno vissattho tiṭṭhati, nisīdati, nipajjati, yenakāmañca
atk-s0503a:626_8: pakkamati appaṭihatacāro, evaṃ ahampi viharāmīti dasseti. Vuttañhetaṃ paccekabuddhena –
atk-s0503a:631_0: Imaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, atthavasanti, bhante, bhagavā yadidaṃ mama etarahi paramaṃ
atk-s0503a:631_1: vivekasukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ, idameva kāraṇaṃ sampassamāno “aho sukhaṃ, aho
atk-s0503a:632: Etamatthanti etaṃ bhaddiyattherassa puthujjanavisayātītaṃ vivekasukhasaṅkhātamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti idaṃ sahetukabhayasokavigamānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:633_0: Tattha yassantarato na santi kopāti yassa ariyapuggalassa antarato abbhantare attano
atk-s0503a:633_1: citte cittakālussiyakaraṇato cittappakopā rāgādayo āghātavatthuādikāraṇabhedato anekabhedā
atk-s0503a:633_2: dosakopā eva kopā na santi maggena pahīnattā na vijjanti. Ayañhi antarasaddo kiñcāpi
atk-s0503a:633_4: vemajjhe, “antarā ca jetavanaṃ antarā ca sāvatthi”ntiādīsu vivare, “bhayamantarato
atk-s0503a:633_5: jāta”ntiādīsu citte, idhāpi citte eva daṭṭhabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “antarato attano citte”ti.
atk-s0503a:634_0: Itibhavābhavatañca vītivattoti yasmā bhavoti sampatti, abhavoti vipatti. Tathā bhavoti
atk-s0503a:634_1: vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti vā sassataṃ, abhavoti ucchedo. Bhavoti vā puññaṃ,
atk-s0503a:634_2: abhavoti pāpaṃ. Bhavoti vā sugati, abhavoti duggati. Bhavoti vā khuddako, abhavoti
atk-s0503a:634_4: khuddakamahantaupapattibhavānaṃ vasena iti anekappakārā bhavābhavatā vuccati. Catūhipi
atk-s0503a:634_5: ariyamaggehi yathāsambhavaṃ tena tena nayena taṃ itibhavābhavatañca vītivatto atikkanto
atk-s0503a:634_6: hoti. Atthavasena vibhatti vipariṇāmetabbā. Taṃ vigatabhayanti taṃ evarūpaṃ yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgataṃ
atk-s0503a:634_7: khīṇāsavaṃ cittakopābhāvato itibhavābhavasamatikkamato ca bhayahetuvigamena vigatabhayaṃ,
atk-s0503a:634_8: vivekasukhena aggaphalasukhena ca sukhiṃ, vigatabhayattā eva asokaṃ. Devā nānubhavanti
atk-s0503a:634_9: dassanāyāti adhigatamagge ṭhapetvā sabbepi upapattidevā vāyamantāpi cittacāradassanavasena
atk-s0503a:634_10: dassanāya daṭṭhuṃ nānubhavanti na abhisambhuṇanti na sakkonti, pageva manussā. Sekkhāpi
atk-s0503a:634_11: hi puthujjanā viya arahato cittappavattiṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0503a:639_0: 21. Nandavaggassa paṭhame aññataro bhikkhūti nāmagottena apākaṭo eko khīṇāsavabhikkhu.
atk-s0503a:639_1: So kira rājagahavāsī kulaputto moggallānattherena saṃvejito saṃsāradosaṃ disvā satthu
atk-s0503a:639_2: santike pabbajitvā sīlāni sodhetvā catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā na cirasseva vipassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:639_3: ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tassa aparabhāge kharo ābādho uppajji, so paccavekkhaṇāya
atk-s0503a:639_4: adhivāsento viharati. Khīṇāsavānañhi cetasikadukkhaṃ nāma natthi, kāyikadukkhaṃ pana
atk-s0503a:639_5: hotiyeva. So ekadivasaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ desentassa nātidūre ṭhāne dukkhaṃ adhivāsento
atk-s0503a:639_6: pallaṅkena nisīdi. Tena vuttaṃ “bhagavato avidūre nisinno hotī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:640_0: Tattha pallaṅkanti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ. Ābhujitvāti bandhitvā. Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti
atk-s0503a:640_1: uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā.
atk-s0503a:640_2: Evañhi nisinnassa cammamaṃsanhārūni na namanti, tasmā so tathā nisinno hoti. Purāṇakammavipākajanti
atk-s0503a:640_3: pubbe katassa kammassa vipākabhāvena jātaṃ, purāṇakammavipāke vā sukhadukkhappakāre
atk-s0503a:640_4: vipākavaṭṭasamudāye tadekadesabhāvena jātaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Dukkhaṃ. Purāṇakammavipākajanti
atk-s0503a:640_5: ca iminā tassa ābādhassa kammasamuṭṭhānataṃ dassento opakkamikautuvipariṇāmajādibhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:640_6: paṭikkhipati. Dukkhanti pacurajanehi khamituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ. Tibbanti tikhiṇaṃ, abhibhavitvā
atk-s0503a:640_7: pavattiyā bahalaṃ vā. Kharanti kakkhaḷaṃ. Kaṭukanti asātaṃ. Adhivāsentoti upari vāsento sahanto khamanto.
atk-s0503a:641_0: Sato sampajānoti vedanāpariggāhakānaṃ satisampajaññānaṃ vasena satimā sampajānanto
atk-s0503a:641_1: ca. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “ayaṃ vedanā nāma hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā, aniṭṭhārammaṇādipaccaye
atk-s0503a:641_2: paṭicca uppannattā paṭiccasamuppannā, uppajjitvā ekantena bhijjanasabhāvattā khayadhammā
atk-s0503a:641_3: vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā”ti vedanāya aniccatāsallakkhaṇavasena satokāritāya
atk-s0503a:641_4: sato, aviparītasabhāvapaṭivijjhanavasena sampajāno ca hutvā. Atha vā sativepullapattiyā
atk-s0503a:641_5: sabbattheva kāyavedanācittadhammesu suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitasatitāya sato, tathā paññāvepullappattiyā
atk-s0503a:641_7: aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṃ
atk-s0503a:641_8: kandati sammohaṃ āpajjatī”ti vuttanayena andhaputhujjano viya na vihaññamāno maggeneva
atk-s0503a:641_9: samugghātitattā cetodukkhaṃ anuppādento kevalaṃ kammavipākajaṃ sarīradukkhaṃ adhivāsento
atk-s0503a:641_10: samāpattiṃ samāpanno viya nisinno hoti. Addasāti taṃ āyasmantaṃ adhivāsanakhantiyā
atk-s0503a:642_0: Etamatthanti etaṃ tādisassapi rogassa vejjādīhi tikicchanatthaṃ anussukkāpajjanakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:642_1: khīṇāsavānaṃ lokadhammehi anupalepitasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti
atk-s0503a:642_2: imaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ yehi kehici dukkhadhammehi avighātapattivibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:643_0: Tattha sabbakammajahassāti pahīnasabbakammassa. Aggamaggassa hi uppannakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0503a:643_1: arahato sabbāni kusalākusalakammāni pahīnāni nāma honti paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ asamatthabhāvato,
atk-s0503a:643_2: yato ariyamaggañāṇaṃ kammakkhayakaranti vuccati. Bhikkhunoti bhinnakilesatāya bhikkhuno.
atk-s0503a:643_3: Dhunamānassa pure kataṃ rajanti arahattappattito pubbe kataṃ rāgarajādimissatāya
atk-s0503a:643_4: rajanti laddhanāmaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ vipākapaṭisaṃvedanena taṃ dhunantassa
atk-s0503a:643_5: viddhaṃsentassa, arahattappattiyā parato pana sāvajjakiriyāya sambhavoyeva natthi,
atk-s0503a:643_6: anavajjakiriyā ca bhavamūlassa samucchinnattā samucchinnamūlatāya pupphaṃ viya phaladānasamatthatāya
atk-s0503a:644_0: Amamassāti rūpādīsu katthaci mamanti gahaṇābhāvato amamassa mamaṅkārarahitassa. Yassa
atk-s0503a:644_1: hi mamaṅkāro atthi, so attasinehena vejjādīhi sarīraṃ paṭijaggāpeti. Arahā pana amamo,
atk-s0503a:644_2: tasmā so sarīrajagganepi udāsīnadhātukova. Ṭhitassāti catubbidhampi oghaṃ taritvā
atk-s0503a:644_3: nibbānathale ṭhitassa, paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena vā sandhāvanassa abhāvena ṭhitassa.
atk-s0503a:644_4: Sekkhaputhujjanā hi kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ appahīnattā cutipaṭisandhivasena saṃsāre
atk-s0503a:644_5: dhāvanti nāma, arahā pana tadabhāvato ṭhitoti vuccati. Atha vā dasavidhe khīṇāsavasaṅkhāte
atk-s0503a:644_6: ariyadhamme ṭhitassa. Tādinoti “paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī viharatī”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0503a:644_7: vuttāya pañcavidhāya ariyiddhiyā aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi akampaniyāya chaḷaṅgupekkhāya
atk-s0503a:644_8: ca samannāgatena iṭṭhādīsu ekasadisatāsaṅkhātena tādībhāvena tādino. Attho natthi
atk-s0503a:644_9: janaṃ lapetaveti “mama bhesajjādīni karothā”ti janaṃ lapituṃ kathetuṃ payojanaṃ natthi
atk-s0503a:644_10: sarīre nirapekkhabhāvato. Paṇḍupalāso viya hi bandhanā pavutto sayamevāyaṃ kāyo bhijjitvā
atk-s0503a:647_0: Atha vā yaṃkiñci nimittaṃ dassetvā “kiṃ ayyassa icchitabba”nti janaṃ lapetave paccayehi
atk-s0503a:647_1: nimantanavasena lapāpetuṃ khīṇāsavassa attho natthi tādisassa micchājīvassa maggeneva
atk-s0503a:647_2: samugghātitattāti attho. Iti bhagavā “kissāyaṃ thero attano rogaṃ vejjehi atikicchāpetvā
atk-s0503a:647_3: bhagavato avidūre nisīdatī”ti cintentānaṃ tassa atikicchāpane kāraṇaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0503a:650_0: 22. Dutiye nandoti tassa nāmaṃ. So hi cakkavattilakkhaṇūpetattā mātāpitaro saparijanaṃ
atk-s0503a:650_1: sakalañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ nandayanto jātoti “nando”ti nāmaṃ labhi. Bhagavato bhātāti
atk-s0503a:650_2: bhagavato ekapituputtatāya bhātā. Na hi bhagavato sahodarā uppajjanti, tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:650_3: “mātucchāputto”ti, cūḷamātuputtoti attho. Mahāpajāpatigotamiyā hi so putto. Anabhiratoti
atk-s0503a:650_4: na abhirato. Brahmacariyanti brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ cariyaṃ ekāsanaṃ ekaseyyaṃ methunaviratiṃ.
atk-s0503a:650_5: Sandhāretunti paṭhamacittato yāvacarimakacittaṃ sammā paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ dhāretuṃ
atk-s0503a:650_6: pavattetuṃ. Dutiyena cettha brahmacariyapadena maggabrahmacariyassāpi saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:650_7: Sikkhaṃ paccakkhāyāti upasampadakāle bhikkhubhāvena saddhiṃ samādinnaṃ nibbattetabbabhāvena
atk-s0503a:650_8: anuṭṭhitaṃ tividhampi sikkhaṃ paṭikkhipitvā, vissajjetvāti attho. Hīnāyāti gihibhāvāya.
atk-s0503a:651_0: Kasmā panāyaṃ evamārocesīti? Etthāyaṃ anupubbikathā – bhagavā pavattavaradhammacakko
atk-s0503a:651_1: rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane viharanto “puttaṃ me ānetvā dassethā”ti suddhodanamahārājena
atk-s0503a:651_2: pesitesu sahassasahassaparivāresu dasasu dūtesu saha parivārena arahattaṃ pattesu
atk-s0503a:651_3: sabbapacchā gantvā arahattappattena kāḷudāyittherena gamanakālaṃ ñatvā maggavaṇṇanaṃ
atk-s0503a:651_5: gantvā ñātisamāgame pokkharavassaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā vessantarajātakaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0503a:651_6: punadivase piṇḍāya paviṭṭho “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”ti gāthāya pitaraṃ sotāpattiphale
atk-s0503a:651_7: patiṭṭhāpetvā nivesanaṃ gantvā “dhammañcare”ti gāthāya mahāpajāpatiṃ sotāpattiphale,
atk-s0503a:652_0: Bhattakiccāvasāne pana rāhulamātuguṇakathaṃ nissāya candakinnarījātakaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0503a:652_2: pavisitvā nandakumārassa hatthe pattaṃ datvā maṅgalaṃ vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamanto
atk-s0503a:652_3: kumārassa hatthato pattaṃ na gaṇhi. Sopi tathāgate gāravena “pattaṃ te, bhante, gaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0503a:652_4: vattuṃ nāsakkhi. Evaṃ pana cintesi, “sopānasīse pattaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti, satthā tasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:652_5: ṭhāne na gaṇhi. Itaro “sopānamūle gaṇhissatī”ti cintesi, satthā tatthapi na gaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:652_6: Itaro “rājaṅgaṇe gaṇhissatī”ti cintesi, satthā tatthapi na gaṇhi. Kumāro nivattitukāmo
atk-s0503a:652_7: anicchāya gacchanto gāravena “pattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ na sakkoti, “idha gaṇhissati,
atk-s0503a:653_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe janapadakalyāṇiyā ācikkhiṃsu, “ayye bhagavā, nandarājānaṃ gahetvā gacchati,
atk-s0503a:653_1: tumhehi vinā karissatī”ti. Sā udakabindūhi paggharantehi aḍḍhullikhitehi kesehi vegena
atk-s0503a:653_2: pāsādaṃ āruyha sīhapañjaradvāre ṭhatvā “tuvaṭaṃ kho, ayyaputta, āgaccheyyāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:653_3: Taṃ tassā vacanaṃ tassa hadaye tiriyaṃ patitvā viya ṭhitaṃ. Satthāpissa hatthato
atk-s0503a:653_4: pattaṃ aggahetvāva taṃ vihāraṃ netvā “pabbajissasi nandā”ti āha. So buddhagāravena
atk-s0503a:653_5: “na pabbajissāmī”ti avatvā, “āma, pabbajissāmī”ti āha. Satthā tena hi nandaṃ pabbājethāti
atk-s0503a:653_6: kapilavatthupuraṃ gantvā tatiyadivase taṃ pabbājesi. Sattame divase mātarā alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0503a:653_7: pesitaṃ “dāyajjaṃ me, samaṇa, dehī”ti vatvā attanā saddhiṃ ārāmāgataṃ rāhulakumāraṃ
atk-s0503a:653_8: pabbājesi. Punekadivasaṃ mahādhammapālajātakaṃ kathetvā rājānaṃ anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0503a:654_0: Iti bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṃ sotāpattiphale, pitaraṃ tīsu phalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0503a:654_1: punadeva rājagahaṃ gantvā tato anāthapiṇḍikena sāvatthiṃ āgamanatthāya gahitapaṭiñño
atk-s0503a:654_2: niṭṭhite jetavanamahāvihāre tattha gantvā vāsaṃ kappesi. Evaṃ satthari jetavane viharante
atk-s0503a:654_3: āyasmā nando attano anicchāya pabbajito kāmesu anādīnavadassāvī janapadakalyāṇiyā
atk-s0503a:654_4: vuttavacanamanussaranto ukkaṇṭhito hutvā bhikkhūnaṃ attano anabhiratiṃ ārocesi. Tena
atk-s0503a:654_5: vuttaṃ “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nando…pe… hīnāyāvattissāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:655_0: Kasmā pana naṃ bhagavā evaṃ pabbājesīti? “Puretarameva ādīnavaṃ dassetvā kāmehi naṃ
atk-s0503a:655_1: vivecetuṃ na sakkā, pabbājetvā pana upāyena tato vivecetvā uparivisesaṃ nibbattessāmī”ti
atk-s0503a:655_2: veneyyadamanakusalo satthā evaṃ naṃ paṭhamaṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0503a:656_0: Sākiyānīti sakyarājadhītā. Janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī rūpena uttamā chasarīradosarahitā,
atk-s0503a:656_1: pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā. Sā hi yasmā nātidīghā nātirassā nātikisā nātithūlā nātikāḷikā
atk-s0503a:656_2: naccodātā atikkantā mānusakavaṇṇaṃ appattā dibbavaṇṇaṃ, tasmā chasarīradosarahitā.
atk-s0503a:656_3: Chavikalyāṇaṃ maṃsakalyāṇaṃ nakhakalyāṇaṃ aṭṭhikalyāṇaṃ vayakalyāṇanti imehi pañcahi
atk-s0503a:657_0: Tattha attano sarīrobhāsena dasadvādasahatthe ṭhāne ālokaṃ karoti, piyaṅgusamā vā
atk-s0503a:657_1: suvaṇṇasamā vā hoti, ayamassā chavikalyāṇatā. Cattāro panassā hatthapādā mukhapariyosānañca
atk-s0503a:657_2: lākhārasaparikammakataṃ viya rattapavāḷarattakambalena sadisaṃ hoti, ayamassā maṃsakalyāṇatā.
atk-s0503a:657_3: Vīsati nakhapattāni maṃsato amuttaṭṭhāne lākhārasaparikitāni viya muttaṭṭhāne khīradhārāsadisāni
atk-s0503a:657_4: honti, ayamassā nakhakalyāṇatā. Dvattiṃsadantā suphusitā parisuddhapavāḷapantisadisā
atk-s0503a:657_5: vajirapantī viya khāyanti, ayamassā aṭṭhikalyāṇatā. Vīsativassasatikāpi samānā soḷasavassuddesikā
atk-s0503a:657_6: viya hoti nippalitā, ayamassā vayakalyāṇatā. Sundarī ca hoti evarūpaguṇasamannāgatā,
atk-s0503a:658_0: Gharā nikkhamantassāti anādare sāmivacanaṃ, gharato nikkhamatoti attho. “Gharā nikkhamanta”ntipi
atk-s0503a:658_1: paṭhanti. Upaḍḍhullikhitehi kesehīti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ, vippakatullikhitehi
atk-s0503a:658_2: kesehi upalakkhitāti attho. “Aḍḍhullikhitehī”tipi paṭhanti. Ullikhananti ca phaṇakādīhi
atk-s0503a:658_4: aḍḍhakkhinā ābandhantī viya oloketvā. Maṃ, bhanteti pubbepi “ma”nti vatvā ukkaṇṭhākulacittatāya
atk-s0503a:658_5: puna “maṃ etadavocā”ti āha. Tuvaṭanti sīghaṃ. Tamanussaramānoti taṃ tassā vacanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:658_6: taṃ vā tassā ākārasahitaṃ vacanaṃ anussaranto.
atk-s0503a:659_0: Bhagavā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “upāyenassa rāgaṃ vūpasamessāmī”ti iddhibalena naṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
atk-s0503a:659_1: nento antarāmagge ekasmiṃ jhāmakhette jhāmakhāṇumatthake nisinnaṃ chinnakaṇṇanāsānaṅguṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0503a:659_2: ekaṃ paluṭṭhamakkaṭiṃ dassetvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ nesi. Pāḷiyaṃ pana ekakkhaṇeneva
atk-s0503a:659_3: satthārā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gataṃ viya vuttaṃ, taṃ gamanaṃ avatvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
atk-s0503a:659_4: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Gacchantoyeva hi bhagavā āyasmato nandassa antarāmagge taṃ paluṭṭhamakkaṭiṃ
atk-s0503a:659_5: dasseti. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ samiñjanādinidassanaṃ? Taṃ antaradhānanidassananti gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:659_6: Evaṃ satthā taṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā sakkassa devarañño upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatāni kakuṭapādāni
atk-s0503a:659_7: pañca accharāsatāni attānaṃ vanditvā ṭhitāni dassetvā janapadakalyāṇiyā tāsaṃ pañcannaṃ
atk-s0503a:659_8: accharāsatānaṃ rūpasampattiṃ paṭicca visesaṃ pucchi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho bhagavā
atk-s0503a:660_0: Tattha bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti bāhumhi gahetvā viya. Bhagavā hi tadā tādisaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0503a:660_1: abhisaṅkhāresi, yathā āyasmā nando bhuje gahetvā bhagavatā nīyamāno viya ahosi. Tattha
atk-s0503a:660_2: ca bhagavatā sace tassa āyasmato tāvatiṃsadevalokassa dassanaṃ pavesanameva vā icchitaṃ
atk-s0503a:660_3: siyā, yathānisinnasseva tassa taṃ devalokaṃ dasseyya lokavivaraṇiddhikāle viya, tameva
atk-s0503a:660_4: vā iddhiyā tattha peseyya. Yasmā panassa dibbattabhāvato manussattabhāvassa yo nihīnajigucchanīyabhāvo,
atk-s0503a:660_5: tassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ antarāmagge taṃ makkaṭiṃ dassetukāmo, devalokasirivibhavasampattiyo
atk-s0503a:660_6: ca ogāhetvā dassetukāmo ahosi, tasmā taṃ gahetvā tattha nesi. Evañhissa tadatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:661_0: Kakuṭapādānīti rattavaṇṇatāya pārāvatasadisapādāni. Tā kira sabbāpi kassapassa bhagavato
atk-s0503a:661_1: sāvakānaṃ pādamakkhanateladānena tādisā sukumārapādā ahesuṃ. Passasi noti passasi
atk-s0503a:661_2: nu. Abhirūpatarāti visiṭṭharūpatarā. Dassanīyatarāti divasampi passantānaṃ atittikaraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0503a:662_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā avassutacittaṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ accharāyo olokāpesi? Sukhenevassa
atk-s0503a:662_1: kilese nīharituṃ. Yathā hi kusalo vejjo ussannadosaṃ puggalaṃ tikicchanto sinehapānādinā
atk-s0503a:662_2: paṭhamaṃ dose ukkiledetvā pacchā vamanavirecanehi sammadeva nīharāpeti, evaṃ vineyyadamanakusalo
atk-s0503a:662_3: bhagavā ussannarāgaṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ devaccharāyo dassetvā ukkiledesi ariyamaggabhesajjena
atk-s0503a:663_0: Paluṭṭhamakkaṭīti jhāmaṅgapaccaṅgamakkaṭī. Evameva khoti yathā sā, bhante, tumhehi
atk-s0503a:663_1: mayhaṃ dassitā chinnakaṇṇanāsā paluṭṭhamakkaṭī janapadakalyāṇiṃ upādāya, evameva
atk-s0503a:663_2: janapadakalyāṇī imāni pañca accharāsatāni upādāyāti attho. Pañcannaṃ accharāsatānanti
atk-s0503a:663_3: upayoge sāmivacanaṃ, pañca accharāsatānīti attho. Avayavasambandhe vā etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:663_4: tena pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ rūpasampattiṃ upanidhāyāti adhippāyo. Upanidhāyāti
atk-s0503a:663_5: ca samīpe ṭhapetvā, upādāyāti attho. Saṅkhyanti itthīti gaṇanaṃ. Kalabhāganti kalāyapi
atk-s0503a:663_6: bhāgaṃ, ekaṃ soḷasakoṭṭhāse katvā tato ekakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā soḷasadhā gaṇite tattha
atk-s0503a:663_7: yo ekeko koṭṭhāso, so kalabhāgoti adhippeto, tampi kalabhāgaṃ na upetīti vadati.
atk-s0503a:663_8: Upanidhinti “imāya ayaṃ sadisī”ti upamābhāvena gahetvā samīpe ṭhapanampi.
atk-s0503a:664_0: Yatthāyaṃ anabhirato, taṃ brahmacariyaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ pākaṭañcāti taṃ anāmasitvā tattha
atk-s0503a:664_1: abhiratiyaṃ ādarajananatthaṃ abhirama, nanda, abhirama, nandā”ti āmeḍitavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:664_2: Ahaṃ te pāṭibhogoti kasmā bhagavā tassa brahmacariyavāsaṃ icchanto abrahmacariyavāsassa
atk-s0503a:664_3: pāṭibhogaṃ upagañchi? Yatthassa ārammaṇe rāgo daḷhaṃ nipati, taṃ āgantukārammaṇe
atk-s0503a:664_4: saṅkāmetvā sukhena sakkā jahāpetunti pāṭibhogaṃ upagañchi. Anupubbikathāyaṃ saggakathā
atk-s0503a:665_0: Assosunti kathamassosuṃ? Bhagavā hi tadā āyasmante nande vattaṃ dassetvā attano divāṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:665_1: gate upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ kathetvā yathā nāma kusalo puriso
atk-s0503a:665_2: anikkhantaṃ āṇiṃ aññāya āṇiyā nīharitvā puna taṃ hatthādīhi sañcāletvā apaneti, evameva
atk-s0503a:665_3: āciṇṇavisaye tassa rāgaṃ āgantukavisayena nīharitvā puna tadapi brahmacariyamaggahetuṃ
atk-s0503a:665_4: katvā apanetukāmo “etha tumhe, bhikkhave, nandaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhatakavādena ca upakkitakavādena
atk-s0503a:665_5: ca samudācarathā”ti āṇāpesi, evaṃ bhikkhū assosuṃ. Keci pana “bhagavā tathārūpaṃ
atk-s0503a:665_6: iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāresi, yathā te bhikkhū tamatthaṃ jāniṃsū”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:666_0: Bhatakavādenāti bhatakoti vādena. Yo hi bhatiyā kammaṃ karoti, so bhatakoti vuccati,
atk-s0503a:666_1: ayampi āyasmā accharāsambhoganimittaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caranto bhatako viya hotīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:666_2: “bhatakavādenā”ti. Upakkitakavādenāti yo kahāpaṇādīhi kiñci kiṇāti, so upakkitakoti
atk-s0503a:666_3: vuccati, ayampi āyasmā accharānaṃ hetu attano brahmacariyaṃ kiṇāti, tasmā “upakkitako”ti
atk-s0503a:666_4: evaṃ vacanena. Atha vā bhagavato āṇāya accharāsambhogasaṅkhātāya bhatiyā brahmacariyavāsasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:666_5: jīvitaṃ pavattento tāya bhatiyā yāpane bhagavatā bhariyamāno viya hotīti “bhatako”ti
atk-s0503a:666_6: vutto, tathā accharāsambhogasaṅkhātaṃ vikkayaṃ ādātabbaṃ katvā bhagavato āṇattiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:666_7: tiṭṭhanto tena vikkayena bhagavatā upakkito viya hotīti vuttaṃ “upakkitako”ti.
atk-s0503a:667_0: Aṭṭīyamānoti pīḷiyamāno dukkhāpiyamāno. Harāyamānoti lajjamāno. Jigucchamānoti pāṭikulyato
atk-s0503a:667_1: dahanto. Ekoti asahāyo. Vūpakaṭṭhoti vatthukāmehi kilesakāmehi ca kāyena ceva cittena
atk-s0503a:667_2: ca vūpakaṭṭho. Appamattoti kammaṭṭhāne satiṃ avijahanto. Ātāpīti kāyikacetasikavīriyātāpena
atk-s0503a:667_3: ātāpavā, ātāpeti kileseti ātāpo, vīriyaṃ. Pahitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya
atk-s0503a:667_4: pesitatto vissaṭṭhaattabhāvo, nibbāne vā pesitacitto. Na cirassevāti kammaṭṭhānārambhato
atk-s0503a:667_5: na cireneva. Yassatthāyāti yassa atthāya. Kulaputtāti duvidhā kulaputtā jātikulaputtā
atk-s0503a:667_6: ca ācārakulaputtā ca, ayaṃ pana ubhayathāpi kulaputto. Sammadevāti hetunā ca kāraṇena
atk-s0503a:667_7: ca. Agārasmāti gharato. Anagāriyanti pabbajjaṃ. Kasivaṇijjādikammañhi agārassa hitanti
atk-s0503a:667_8: agāriyaṃ nāma, taṃ ettha natthīti pabbajjā anagāriyāti vuccati. Pabbajantīti upagacchanti.
atk-s0503a:667_9: Tadanuttaranti taṃ anuttaraṃ. Brahmacariyapariyosānanti maggabrahmacariyassa pariyosānabhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:667_10: arahattaphalaṃ. Tassa hi atthāya kulaputtā idha pabbajanti. Diṭṭheva dhammeti tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0503a:667_11: attabhāve. Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanāyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā, aparappaccayena
atk-s0503a:667_12: ñatvāti attho. Upasampajja vihāsīti pāpuṇitvā sampādetvā vā vihāsi. Evaṃ viharantova
atk-s0503a:667_13: khīṇā jāti…pe… abbhaññāsīti. Iminā assa paccavekkhaṇabhūmi dassitā.
atk-s0503a:668_0: Tattha khīṇā jātīti na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā, na anāgatā anāgatattā
atk-s0503a:668_1: eva, na paccuppannā vijjamānattā. Maggassa pana abhāvitattā yā ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu
atk-s0503a:668_2: ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti uppajjeyya, sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ
atk-s0503a:668_3: āpajjanena khīṇā. Taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāvena
atk-s0503a:668_4: vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanena abbhaññāsi. Vusitanti
atk-s0503a:668_5: vutthaṃ parivutthaṃ kataṃ caritaṃ, niṭṭhāpitanti attho. Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:668_6: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma, khīṇāsavo
atk-s0503a:668_7: vutthavāso, tasmā so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti
atk-s0503a:668_8: abbhaññāsi. Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena
atk-s0503a:668_9: soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ. Puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo hi taṃ kiccaṃ karonti
atk-s0503a:668_10: nāma, khīṇāsavo katakaraṇīyo, tasmā so attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti
atk-s0503a:668_11: abbhaññāsi. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti “idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya
atk-s0503a:668_12: kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanāya kiccaṃ me natthī”ti abbhaññāsi. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti
atk-s0503a:668_13: vā “itthabhāvato imasmā evaṃpakārā vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ
atk-s0503a:668_14: mayhaṃ natthi, ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā viya rukkhā,
atk-s0503a:668_15: te carimakacittanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissanti, apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:668_16: gamissantī”ti abbhaññāsi. Aññataroti eko. Arahatanti bhagavato sāvakānaṃ arahantānaṃ
atk-s0503a:669_0: Aññatarā devatāti adhigatamaggā ekā brahmadevatā. Sā hi sayaṃ asekkhattā asekkhavisayaṃ
atk-s0503a:669_1: abbhaññāsi. Sekkhā hi taṃ taṃ sekkhavisayaṃ, puthujjanā ca attano puthujjanavisayameva
atk-s0503a:669_2: jānanti. Abhikkantāya rattiyāti parikkhīṇāya rattiyā, majjhimayāmeti attho. Abhikkantavaṇṇāti
atk-s0503a:669_3: atiuttamavaṇṇā. Kevalakappanti anavasesena samantato. Obhāsetvāti attano pabhāya
atk-s0503a:669_4: cando viya sūriyo viya ca jetavanaṃ ekobhāsaṃ katvā. Tenupasaṅkamīti āyasmato nandassa
atk-s0503a:669_5: arahattappattiṃ viditvā pītisomanassajātā “taṃ bhagavato paṭivedessāmī”ti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:670_0: Āsavānaṃ khayāti ettha āsavantīti āsavā, cakkhudvārādīhi pavattantīti attho. Atha
atk-s0503a:670_1: vā āgotrabhuṃ ābhavaggaṃ vā savantīti āsavā, ete dhamme etañca okāsaṃ anto karitvā
atk-s0503a:670_2: pavattantīti attho. Cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madirādiāsavā viyāti āsavā. “Purimā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0503a:670_3: koṭi na paññāyati avijjāyā”tiādivacanehi nesaṃ cirapārivāsiyatā veditabbā. Atha vā
atk-s0503a:670_4: āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi, āsavā. Purimo cettha attho kilesesu
atk-s0503a:670_5: yujjati, pacchimo kammepi. Na kevalañca kammakilesā eva āsavā, atha kho nānappakārā
atk-s0503a:670_6: upaddavāpi. Tathā hi “nāhaṃ, cunda, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:670_7: desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
atk-s0503a:673: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinalīkatā”ti. –
atk-s0503a:674_0: Ettha tebhūmikaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā āsavāti āgatā. “Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ
atk-s0503a:674_1: āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti parūpaghātavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo
atk-s0503a:675_0: Te panete āsavā vinaye – “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ
atk-s0503a:675_1: paṭighātāyā”ti dvidhā āgatā. Saḷāyatane “tayome, āvuso, āsavā – kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo,
atk-s0503a:675_2: avijjāsavo”ti tidhā āgatā, tathā aññesu ca suttantesu. Abhidhamme teyeva diṭṭhāsavena
atk-s0503a:675_3: saddhiṃ catudhā āgatā. Nibbedhikapariyāye “atthi, bhikkhave, āsavā nirayagāminiyā”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:675_4: pañcadhā āgatā. Chakkanipāte “atthi, bhikkhave, āsavā saṃvarāya pahātabbā”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:675_5: nayena chadhā āgatā. Sabbāsavapariyāye teyeva dassanapahātabbehi saddhiṃ sattadhā
atk-s0503a:675_6: āgatā. Idha pana abhidhammanayena cattāro āsavā veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:676_0: Khayāti ettha pana “yo āsavānaṃ khayo bhedo paribhedo”tiādīsu āsavānaṃ sarasabhedo
atk-s0503a:676_1: āsavakkhayoti vutto. “Jānato ahaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī”tiādīsu
atk-s0503a:678: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. –
atk-s0503a:679: Ādīsu maggo āsavakkhayoti vutto. “Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī”tiādīsu phalaṃ.
atk-s0503a:681: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti. –
atk-s0503a:682: Ādīsu nibbānaṃ. Idha pana āsavānaṃ accantakhayo anuppādo vā maggo vā “āsavānaṃ khayo”ti vutto.
atk-s0503a:683_0: Anāsavanti paṭipassaddhivasena sabbaso pahīnāsavaṃ. Cetovimuttinti arahattaphalasamādhiṃ.
atk-s0503a:683_1: Paññāvimuttinti arahattaphalapaññaṃ. Ubhayavacanaṃ magge viya phalepi samathavipassanānaṃ
atk-s0503a:683_3: “kathaṃ nu kho”ti āvajjentassa bhagavato ñāṇaṃ uppajji “nandena arahattaṃ sacchikata”nti.
atk-s0503a:683_4: So hi āyasmā sahāyabhikkhūhi tathā uppaṇḍiyamāno “bhāriyaṃ vata mayā kataṃ, yohaṃ
atk-s0503a:683_5: evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā accharānaṃ paṭilābhāya satthāraṃ pāṭibhogaṃ
atk-s0503a:683_6: akāsi”nti uppannasaṃvego hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto arahattaṃ
atk-s0503a:683_7: patvā cintesi – “yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ etasmā paṭissavā moceyya”nti. So bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:683_8: upasaṅkamitvā attano adhippāyaṃ satthu ārocesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho āyasmā nando…pe…
atk-s0503a:683_9: etasmā paṭissavā”ti. Tattha paṭissavāti pāṭibhogappaṭissavā, “accharānaṃ paṭilābhāya
atk-s0503a:684_0: Athassa bhagavā “yasmā tayā aññā ārādhitāti ñātametaṃ mayā, devatāpi me ārocesi,
atk-s0503a:684_1: tasmā nāhaṃ paṭissavā idāni mocetabbo arahattappattiyāva mocitattā”ti āha. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:684_2: “yadeva kho te nandā”tiādi. Tattha yadevāti yadā eva. Teti tava. Muttoti pamutto.
atk-s0503a:684_3: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmiṃyeva kāle āsavehi tava cittaṃ vimuttaṃ, atha anantaramevāhaṃ
atk-s0503a:685_0: Sopi āyasmā vipassanākāleyeva “yadevāhaṃ indriyāsaṃvaraṃ nissāya imaṃ vippakāraṃ
atk-s0503a:685_1: patto, tameva suṭṭhu niggahessāmī”ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo tattha ca katādhikārattā
atk-s0503a:686_0: “Sace, bhikkhave, nandassa puratthimā disā āloketabbā hoti, sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā
atk-s0503a:686_1: nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato na abhijjhādomanassā
atk-s0503a:686_2: pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyu’nti, itiha tattha sampajāno hoti.
atk-s0503a:687_0: “Sace, bhikkhave, nandassa pacchimā…pe… uttarā… dakkhiṇā… uddhaṃ… adho… anudisā āloketabbā
atk-s0503a:687_1: hoti, sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me…pe… sampajāno hotī”’ti.
atk-s0503a:688: Teneva taṃ āyasmantaṃ satthā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:689: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato nandassa sabbāsave khepetvā sukhādīsu tādibhāvappattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti tadatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:690_0: Tattha yassa nittiṇṇo paṅkoti yena ariyapuggalena ariyamaggasetunā sabbo diṭṭhipaṅko
atk-s0503a:690_1: saṃsārapaṅko eva vā nibbānapāragamanena tiṇṇo. Maddito kāmakaṇḍakoti yena sattānaṃ
atk-s0503a:690_2: vijjhanato. “Kāmakaṇḍako”ti laddhanāmo sabbo kilesakāmo sabbo kāmavisūko aggañāṇadaṇḍena
atk-s0503a:690_3: maddito bhaggo anavasesato mathito. Mohakkhayaṃ anuppattoti evaṃbhūto ca dukkhādivisayassa
atk-s0503a:690_4: sabbassa sammohassa khepanena mohakkhayaṃ patto, arahattaphalaṃ nibbānañca anuppatto.
atk-s0503a:690_5: Sukhadukkhesu na vedhatī sa bhikkhūti so bhinnakileso bhikkhu iṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogato
atk-s0503a:690_6: uppannesu sukhesu aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogato uppannesu dukkhesu ca na vedhati na kampati,
atk-s0503a:690_7: taṃ nimittaṃ cittavikāraṃ nāpajjati. “Sukhadukkhesū”ti ca desanāmattaṃ, sabbesupi
atk-s0503a:693: 23. Tatiye yasojappamukhānīti ettha yasojoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ, taṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pabbajitattā vicaraṇato ca tāni pañca bhikkhusatāni “yasojappamukhānī”ti vuttāni.
atk-s0503a:694_0: Tesaṃ ayaṃ pubbayogo – atīte kira kassapadasabalassa sāsane aññataro bhikkhu āraññako
atk-s0503a:694_1: araññe piṭṭhipāsāṇe katapaṇṇakuṭiyaṃ viharati. Tasmiñca samaye pañcasatā corā gāmaghātakādīni
atk-s0503a:694_2: katvā corikāya jīvantā corakammaṃ katvā janapadamanussehi anubaddhā palāyamānā araññaṃ
atk-s0503a:694_3: pavisitvā tattha kiñci gahaṇaṃ vā paṭisaraṇaṃ vā apassantā avidūre taṃ bhikkhuṃ pāsāṇe
atk-s0503a:694_4: nisinnaṃ disvā vanditvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā “amhākaṃ, bhante, paṭisaraṇaṃ hothā”ti
atk-s0503a:694_5: yāciṃsu. Thero “tumhākaṃ sīlasadisaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ natthi, sabbe pañca sīlāni samādiyathā”ti
atk-s0503a:694_6: āha. Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā sīlāni samādiyiṃsu. Thero “tumhe idāni sīlesu patiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0503a:694_7: attano jīvitaṃ vināsayantesupi mā manaṃ padosayitthā”ti kakacūpamavidhiṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0503a:694_8: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchiṃsu. Atha te jānapadā taṃ sampattā ito cito ca gavesantā
atk-s0503a:694_9: te core disvā sabbeva jīvitā voropesuṃ. Te tesu manopadosamattampi akatvā akkhaṇḍasīlā
atk-s0503a:694_10: kālaṃ katvā kāmāvacaradevesu nibbattiṃsu. Tesu jeṭṭhacoro jeṭṭhadevaputto ahosi,
atk-s0503a:695_0: Te aparāparaṃ saṃsarantā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke khepetvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle
atk-s0503a:695_1: devalokato cavitvā jeṭṭhadevaputto sāvatthinagaradvāre kevaṭṭagāme pañcasatakulagāmajeṭṭhakassa
atk-s0503a:695_2: kevaṭṭassa putto hutvā nibbatti, yasojotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Itarepi avasesakevaṭṭānaṃ
atk-s0503a:695_3: puttā hutvā nibbattiṃsu. Te pubbasannivāsena sabbepi sahāyakā hutvā sahapaṃsukīḷitaṃ
atk-s0503a:695_4: kīḷantā anupubbena vayappattā ahesuṃ, yasojo tesaṃ aggo ahosi. Te sabbeva ekato hutvā
atk-s0503a:695_5: jālāni gahetvā naditaḷākādīsu macche bandhantā vicaranti.
atk-s0503a:696_0: Athekadivasaṃ aciravatiyā nadiyā jāle khitte suvaṇṇavaṇṇo maccho antojāle pāvisi.
atk-s0503a:696_1: Taṃ disvā sabbepi kevaṭṭā “amhākaṃ puttā macche bandhantā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ macchaṃ bandhiṃsū”ti
atk-s0503a:696_2: haṭṭhatuṭṭhā ahesuṃ. Atha te pañcasatāpi sahāyakā macchaṃ nāvāya pakkhipitvā nāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:696_3: ukkhipitvā rañño dassesuṃ. Rājā taṃ disvā “bhagavā etassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇakāraṇaṃ jānissatī”ti
atk-s0503a:696_4: macchaṃ gāhāpetvā bhagavato dassesi. Satthā “ayaṃ kassapasammāsambuddhassa sāsane
atk-s0503a:696_5: osakkamāne pabbajitvā micchā paṭipajjanto sāsanaṃ osakkāpetvā niraye nibbatto ekaṃ
atk-s0503a:696_6: buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā tato cuto aciravatiyaṃ maccho hutvā nibbatto”ti vatvā
atk-s0503a:696_7: tassa mātubhaginīnañca niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ, tassa bhātikattherassa parinibbutabhāvañca
atk-s0503a:696_8: teneva kathāpetvā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā kapilasuttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0503a:697_0: Satthu desanaṃ sutvā te pañcasatā kevaṭṭaputtā saṃvegajātā hutvā bhagavato santike
atk-s0503a:697_1: pabbajitvā, upasampannā hutvā vivekavāsaṃ vasantā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0503a:697_2: Tena vuttaṃ – “tena kho pana samayena yasojappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatānī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:698_0: Tattha tedhāti te idha. Nevāsikehīti nibaddhavāsaṃ vasamānehi. Paṭisammodamānāti
atk-s0503a:698_2: “āmāvuso, khamanīya”ntiādinā, puna sammodamānā tehi saddhiṃ samappavattamodā. Senāsanāni
atk-s0503a:698_3: paññāpayamānāti ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ attano ca pāpuṇakāni senāsanāni pucchitvā tehi
atk-s0503a:698_4: nevāsikehi tesaṃ “idaṃ tumhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ, idaṃ tumhākaṃ upajjhāyānaṃ, idaṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0503a:698_5: pāpuṇātī”ti senāsanāni saṃvidhāpetvā attanā ca tattha gantvā, dvārakavāṭāni vivaritvā,
atk-s0503a:698_6: mañcapīṭhakaṭasārakādīni nīharitvā papphoṭetvā yathāṭhānaṃ ṭhapanādivasena paññāpentā ca.
atk-s0503a:699_0: Pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānāti, “bhante, imaṃ me pattaṃ ṭhapetha, idaṃ cīvaraṃ, idaṃ
atk-s0503a:699_1: thālakaṃ, idaṃ udakatumbaṃ, idaṃ me kattarayaṭṭhi”nti evaṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ saṃgopayamānā.
atk-s0503a:699_2: Uccāsaddā mahāsaddāti uddhaṃ gataṭṭhena ucco saddo yesante uccāsaddā akārassa ākāraṃ
atk-s0503a:699_3: katvā. Samantato patthaṭaṭṭhena mahanto saddo yesante mahāsaddā. Kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilopeti
atk-s0503a:699_4: kevaṭṭā viya macchavilumpane. Yathā nāma kevaṭṭā udake vaṭṭanato macchaggahaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:699_5: pavattanato “kevaṭṭā”ti laddhanāmā macchabandhā macchaggahaṇatthaṃ jale jālaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0503a:699_6: “paviṭṭho na paviṭṭho, gahito na gahito”tiādinā uccāsaddamahāsaddā honti. Yathā ca
atk-s0503a:699_7: te macchapacchiādīni ṭhapitaṭṭhāne mahājane gantvā “mayhaṃ ekaṃ macchaṃ detha, mayhaṃ
atk-s0503a:699_8: ekaṃ macchaphālaṃ detha, amukassa dinno mahanto, mayhaṃ khuddako”tiādīni vatvā vilumpamāne
atk-s0503a:699_9: tesaṃ paṭisedhanādivasena uccāsaddamahāsaddā ca honti, evamete bhikkhūti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:699_10: Teteti te ete. Kiṃnūti kissa nu, kimatthaṃ nūti attho. Temeti te ime. Paṇāmemīti
atk-s0503a:699_11: nīharāmi. Voti tumhe. Na vo mama santike vatthabbanti tumhehi mayhaṃ santike na vasitabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:699_12: Ye tumhe mādisassa buddhassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā evaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karotha, attano
atk-s0503a:699_13: dhammatāya vasantā kiṃ nāma sāruppaṃ karissatha, tumhādisānaṃ mama santike vasanakiccaṃ
atk-s0503a:699_14: natthīti dīpeti. Evaṃ paṇāmitesu ca bhagavatā tesu ekabhikkhupi “bhagavā tumhe mahāsaddamattakena
atk-s0503a:699_15: amhe paṇāmethā”ti vā aññaṃ vā kiñci paṭivacanaṃ avatvā buddhagāravena sabbe bhagavato
atk-s0503a:699_16: vacanaṃ sampaṭicchantā “evaṃ, bhante”ti vatvā nikkhamiṃsu. Evaṃ pana tesaṃ ahosi
atk-s0503a:699_17: “mayaṃ satthāraṃ passissāma, dhammaṃ sossāma, satthu santike vasissāmāti āgatā, evarūpassa
atk-s0503a:699_18: pana garuno satthu santikaṃ āgantvā mahāsaddaṃ karimhā, amhākameva dosoyaṃ, paṇāmitamhā
atk-s0503a:699_19: tato, na laddhaṃ satthu santike vatthuṃ, samantapāsādikaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ oloketuṃ,
atk-s0503a:699_20: madhurassarena desitaṃ dhammaṃ sotu”nti. Te balavadomanassajātā hutvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:700_0: Saṃsāmetvāti suguttaṃ katvā. Vajjīti evaṃnāmako janapado, vajjī nāma jānapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0503a:700_1: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena “vajjī”tveva vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ “vajjīsū”ti.
atk-s0503a:700_2: Vaggumudāti evaṃnāma lokassa puññasammatā ekā nadī. “Vaggamudā”tipi pāṭho. Atthakāmenāti
atk-s0503a:700_3: kiñci payojanaṃ anapekkhitvā atthameva icchantena. Hitesināti atthaṃ icchantena,
atk-s0503a:700_4: “kinti me sāvakā vaṭṭadukkhā parimucceyyu”nti tassa atthasaṅkhātassa atthassa vā
atk-s0503a:700_5: hetubhūtassa hitassa esanasīlena. Tato eva attano sarīrakhedaṃ agaṇetvā dūrepi veneyyasantikaṃ
atk-s0503a:700_6: gantvā anukampanato anukampakena. Tameva anukampaṃ upādāya mayaṃ paṇāmitā, na attano
atk-s0503a:700_7: veyyāvaccādipaccāsīsāya. Yasmā dhammagaruno buddhā bhagavanto sammāpaṭipattiyāva
atk-s0503a:700_8: pūjetabbā, ye uccāsaddakaraṇamattepi paṇāmenti, tasmā handa mayaṃ, āvuso, tathā vihāraṃ
atk-s0503a:700_9: kappema sabbattha satisampajaññayogena apaṇṇakappaṭipadaṃ pūrentā yathāgahitakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:700_10: matthakaṃ pāpentā catuiriyāpathavihāraṃ kappema viharāma. Yathā no viharatanti yathā
atk-s0503a:700_11: amhesu viharantesu, bhagavā attamano assa, sammāpaṭipattiyā pūjāya ārādhito bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0503a:701_0: Tenevantaravassenāti tasmiṃyeva antaravasse mahāpavāraṇaṃ anatikkamitvāva. Sabbeva
atk-s0503a:701_1: tisso vijjā sacchākaṃsūti sabbeyeva te pañcasatā bhikkhū pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:701_3: vinivijjhanaṭṭhena vijjā attapaccakkhā akaṃsu. Lokiyābhiññāsu imāyeva dve abhiññā
atk-s0503a:701_4: āsavakkhayañāṇassa bahūpakārā, na tathā dibbasotacetopariyaiddhividhañāṇānīti dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:701_5: vijjattayamevettha tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adhigamadassanavasena uddhaṭaṃ. Tathā hi verañjasutte
atk-s0503a:701_6: bhagavā verañjabrāhmaṇassa attano adhigamaṃ dassento vijjattayameva desesi, na dibbasotañāṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:701_7: abhāvato. Evaṃ tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ vijjamānānipi dibbasotañāṇādīni na uddhaṭāni. Chaḷabhiññā
atk-s0503a:701_8: hi te bhikkhū. Evañca katvā “vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre antarahitā mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:701_9: bhagavato sammukhe pāturahesu”nti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhivaḷañjanaṃ vakkhati.
atk-s0503a:702_0: Yathābhirantanti yathābhiratiṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ. Buddhānañhi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ
atk-s0503a:702_1: chāyūdakavipattiṃ vā aphāsukasenāsanaṃ vā manussānaṃ assaddhādibhāvaṃ vā āgamma anabhirati
atk-s0503a:702_2: nāma natthi, tesaṃ sampattiyā “phāsuṃ viharāmā”ti ciravihāropi natthi. Yattha pana
atk-s0503a:702_3: bhagavati viharante manussā saraṇesu vā patiṭṭhahanti, sīlāni vā samādiyanti pabbajanti,
atk-s0503a:702_4: sotāpattimaggādīni vā pāpuṇanti, satthā tāsu sampattīsu tesaṃ patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ vasati,
atk-s0503a:702_5: tadabhāve pakkamati. Tadā hi sāvatthiyaṃ kattabbabuddhakiccaṃ nāhosi. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:702_6: – “atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena vesālī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:703_0: Cārikaṃ caramānoti addhānagamanaṃ gacchanto. Cārikā ca nāmesā bhagavato duvidhā turitacārikā
atk-s0503a:703_1: aturitacārikāti. Tattha dūrepi bodhaneyyapuggalaṃ disvā tassa bodhanatthaṃ sahasā
atk-s0503a:703_2: gamanaṃ turitacārikā nāma, sā mahākassapapaccuggamanādīsu daṭṭhabbā. Yā pana gāmanigamarājadhānīpaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0503a:703_3: devasikaṃ yojanaddhayojanavasena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto gacchati,
atk-s0503a:703_4: ayaṃ aturitacārikā nāma, ayameva idhādhippetā. Tadavasarīti tena avasari, taṃ vā
atk-s0503a:704_0: Tatrāti tassaṃ. Sudanti nipātamattaṃ. Vesāliyanti tikkhattuṃ visālībhūtattā “vesālī”ti
atk-s0503a:704_1: laddhanāme licchavirājūnaṃ nagare. Mahāvaneti mahāvanaṃ nāma sayaṃjātaṃ aropimaṃ
atk-s0503a:704_2: saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ. Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ himavantena saha
atk-s0503a:704_3: ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ. Idaṃ tādisaṃ na hoti, saparicchedaṃ
atk-s0503a:704_4: mahantaṃ vananti mahāvanaṃ. Kūṭāgārasālāyanti tasmiṃ mahāvane bhagavantaṃ uddissa
atk-s0503a:704_5: kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ anto katvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katā sabbākārasampannā buddhassa
atk-s0503a:704_6: bhagavato gandhakuṭi kūṭāgārasālā nāma, tassaṃ kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ. Vaggumudātīriyānanti
atk-s0503a:704_7: vaggumudātīravāsīnaṃ. Cetasā ceto paricca manasi karitvāti attano cittena tesaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0503a:704_8: paricchijja manasi karitvā, cetopariyañāṇena vā sabbaññutaññāṇena vā tehi adhigatavisesaṃ jānitvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:705_0: Ālokajātā viyāti sañjātālokā viya. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ, candasahassasūriyasahassehi
atk-s0503a:705_1: obhāsitā viyāti attho. Yasmā te yasojappamukhā pañcasatā bhikkhū sabbaso avijjandhakāravidhamanena
atk-s0503a:705_2: ālokabhūtā obhāsabhūtā hutvā viharanti, tasmā bhagavā tehi ṭhitadisāya “ālokajātā
atk-s0503a:705_3: viya me, ānanda, esā disā”tiādinā vaṇṇabhaṇanāpadesena te bhikkhū pasaṃsati. Tena
atk-s0503a:705_4: vuttaṃ – “yassaṃ disāyaṃ vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū viharantī”ti. Appaṭikūlāti na paṭikūlā,
atk-s0503a:705_5: manāpā manoharāti attho. Yasmiñhi padese sīlādiguṇasampannā mahesino viharanti, taṃ
atk-s0503a:705_6: kiñcāpi ukkūlavikūlavisamaduggākāraṃ, atha kho manuññaṃ ramaṇīyameva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0503a:706: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0503a:708_0: Pahiṇeyyāsīti peseyyāsi. Satthā āyasmantānaṃ dassanakāmoti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike
atk-s0503a:708_1: paheṇākāradassanaṃ. Iti bhagavā yadatthaṃ te bhikkhū paṇāmesi, tamatthaṃ matthakappattaṃ
atk-s0503a:708_2: disvā āraddhacitto tesaṃ dassanakāmataṃ therassa ārocesi. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “ahaṃ
atk-s0503a:708_3: ime uccāsaddamahāsaddakaraṇe paṇāmessāmi, atha te bhadro assājānīyo viya kasābhighātena,
atk-s0503a:708_4: tena coditā saṃvegappattā mamārādhanatthaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭentā vāyamantā khippameva
atk-s0503a:708_5: arahattaṃ sacchikarissantī”ti. Idāni te aggaphalappatte disvā tāya arahattappattiyā
atk-s0503a:708_6: ārādhitacitto tesaṃ dassanakāmo hutvā evaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0503a:709_0: So bhikkhūti ānandattherena tathā āṇatto chaḷabhiñño eko bhikkhu. Pamukheti sammukhe.
atk-s0503a:709_2: vadanti. “Āneñjena samādhinā”tipi pāṭho. Kasmā pana bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanaṃ
atk-s0503a:709_3: jānanto paṭisanthāraṃ akatvā samāpattiṃyeva samāpajji? Tesaṃ attanā samāpannasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0503a:709_4: jānitvā samāpajjanatthaṃ, tesaṃ pubbe paṇāmitānaṃ idāni attanā samānasambhogadassanatthaṃ,
atk-s0503a:709_5: ānubhāvadīpanatthaṃ, vinā vacībhedena aññabyākaraṇadīpanatthañca. Apare panāhu “pubbe
atk-s0503a:709_6: paṇāmitānaṃ idāni attano santikaṃ āgatānaṃ anuttarasukhuppādanena anaññasādhāraṇapaṭisanthārakaraṇattha”nti.
atk-s0503a:709_7: Tepi āyasmanto bhagavato ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā taṃyeva samāpattiṃ samāpajjiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:709_8: – “katamena nu kho bhagavā vihārena etarahi viharatī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:710_0: Ettha ca rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ kosajjādīnaṃ pāripantikadhammānaṃ suvidūrabhāvato
atk-s0503a:710_1: iddhiyā mūlabhūtehi anoṇamanādīhi soḷasahi vodānadhammehi samannāgamanato āneñjappattaṃ
atk-s0503a:711_0: “Anoṇataṃ cittaṃ kosajje na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Anuṇṇataṃ cittaṃ uddhacce na iñjatīti
atk-s0503a:711_1: āneñjaṃ. Anabhirataṃ cittaṃ rāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Anapanataṃ cittaṃ byāpāde na
atk-s0503a:711_2: iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Anissitaṃ cittaṃ diṭṭhiyā na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Appaṭibaddhaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0503a:711_3: chandarāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Vippamuttaṃ cittaṃ kāmarāge na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_4: Visaṃyuttaṃ cittaṃ kilese na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Vimariyādikataṃ cittaṃ kilesamariyādāya
atk-s0503a:711_5: na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Ekattagataṃ cittaṃ nānattakilese na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Saddhāya
atk-s0503a:711_6: pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ assaddhiye na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Vīriyena pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0503a:711_7: kosajje na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Satiyā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ pamāde na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ.
atk-s0503a:711_8: Samādhinā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ uddhacce na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Paññāya pariggahitaṃ
atk-s0503a:711_9: cittaṃ avijjāya na iñjatīti āneñjaṃ. Obhāsagataṃ cittaṃ avijjandhakāre na iñjatīti āneñja”nti.
atk-s0503a:712_1: catubbidhaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānanti etesaṃ pañcannaṃ jhānānaṃ āneñjavohāro. Tesaṃ yaṃ
atk-s0503a:712_2: kiñci pādakaṃ katvā samāpannā arahattaphalasamāpatti āneñjasamādhīti porāṇā.
atk-s0503a:713_0: Abhikkantāyāti atītāya. Nikkhanteti niggate, apagateti attho. Tuṇhī ahosīti bhagavā
atk-s0503a:713_1: ariyena tuṇhībhāvena tuṇhī ahosi. Uddhaste aruṇeti uggate aruṇe, aruṇo nāma puratthimadisāya
atk-s0503a:713_2: sūriyodayato puretarameva uṭṭhitobhāso. Nandimukhiyāti rattiyā aruṇassa uggatattā
atk-s0503a:713_3: eva aruṇappabhāya sūriyālokūpajīvino satte nandāpanamukhiyā viya rattiyā jātāya,
atk-s0503a:714_0: Tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvāti yathāparicchedaṃ tato āneñjasamādhito arahattaphalasamāpattito
atk-s0503a:714_1: uṭṭhāya. Sace kho tvaṃ, ānanda, jāneyyāsīti bhagavā “ime ca bhikkhū ettakaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0503a:714_2: iminā nāma samāpattisukhena vītināmentī”ti, ānanda, yadi tvaṃ jāneyyāsi. Ettakampi
atk-s0503a:714_3: te nappaṭibhāseyyāti lokiyapaṭisammodanaṃ sandhāya yadidaṃ te “abhikkantā, bhante,
atk-s0503a:714_4: rattī”tiādinā tikkhattuṃ paṭibhānaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ, tayidaṃ ettakampi te na upaṭṭhaheyya.
atk-s0503a:714_5: Yasmā ca kho tvaṃ, ānanda, sekkho asekkhaṃ samāpattivihāraṃ na jānāsi, tasmā maṃ
atk-s0503a:714_6: imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lokiyapaṭisammodanaṃ kāretuṃ ussukkaṃ āpajji. Ahaṃ pana imehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0503a:714_7: saddhiṃ lokuttarapaṭisammodaneneva tiyāmarattiṃ vītināmesinti dassento bhagavā āha
atk-s0503a:714_8: – “ahañca, ānanda, imāni ca pañca bhikkhusatāni sabbeva āneñjasamādhinā nisīdimhā”ti.
atk-s0503a:715_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ attanā samaṃ āneñjasamādhisamāpajjanasamatthatāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:715_1: vasībhāvatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anavasesarāgādippahānasaṃsiddhitādisabhāvadīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:716_0: Tattha yassa jito kāmakaṇḍakoti kusalapakkhavijjhanaṭṭhena kaṇḍakabhūto kilesakāmo
atk-s0503a:716_1: yena ariyapuggalena anavasesaṃ jito pahīno, etenassa anunayābhāvaṃ dasseti. “Gāmakaṇṭako”tipi
atk-s0503a:716_2: pāṭho. Tassattho – gāme kaṇṭako kaṇṭakaṭṭhāniyo sakalo vatthukāmo yassa jitoti. Jayo
atk-s0503a:716_3: cassa tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahāneneva veditabbo, tena tesaṃ anāgāmimaggo vutto
atk-s0503a:716_4: hoti. Akkoso ca jitoti sambandho. Vadho ca bandhanañcāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tesu
atk-s0503a:716_5: akkosajayena vacīduccaritābhāvo, itarena kāyaduccaritābhāvo dassito. Tena taṃnimittakassa
atk-s0503a:716_6: byāpādassa anavasesappahānena tatiyamaggo vutto hoti. Atha vā akkosādijayavacanena
atk-s0503a:716_7: tatiyamaggo vutto hoti, akkosādīnaṃ accantakhamanaṃ tattha pakāsitaṃ hoti, ubhayathāpi
atk-s0503a:716_8: nesaṃ virodhābhāvaṃ dasseti. Pabbato viya so ṭhito anejoti ejā vuccati calanakilesaparipantho,
atk-s0503a:716_9: ejāhetūnaṃ avasesakilesānaṃ abhāvena anejo, anejattāyeva sabbakilesehi paravādavātehi
atk-s0503a:716_10: ca akampanīyattā ṭhito ekagghanapabbatasadiso. Sukhadukkhesu na vedhati sa bhikkhūti
atk-s0503a:716_11: so bhinnakileso bhikkhu sukhadukkhanimittaṃ na kampatīti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho
atk-s0503a:716_12: veditabbo. Iti bhagavā tesaṃ pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ arahattādhigamena tādibhāvappattiṃ
atk-s0503a:719: 24. Catutthe parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā mukhasamīpe katvā. Tathā hi vibhaṅge vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:720: “Ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti supaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā, tena vuccati parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti.
atk-s0503a:721_0: Atha vā “parīti pariggahaṭṭho, mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho, satīti upaṭṭhānaṭṭho, tena vuccati
atk-s0503a:721_1: ‘parimukhaṃ sati”’nti. Evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayenapettha attho veditabbo. Tatrāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:721_2: saṅkhepattho – pariggahitaniyyānasatiṃ katvāti. Niyyānanti ca satiyā ogāhitabbaṃ
atk-s0503a:721_3: ārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca purimo pacchimo ca attho sabbasaṅgāhakavasena, itaro
atk-s0503a:721_4: samāpattiyā pubbabhāgasamannāhāravasena daṭṭhabbo. Satīti vā satisīsena jhānaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:721_5: “ye kāyagatāsatiṃ paribhuñjantī”tiādīsu viya. Katamaṃ pana taṃ jhānanti? Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:721_6: pādakaṃ katvā samāpannaṃ arahattaphalajjhānaṃ. Kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbanti? Āneñjasamādhiyogena
atk-s0503a:721_7: therassa savisesaṃ niccalabhāvaṃ kenaci akampanīyatañca pabbatopamāya pakāsento bhagavā
atk-s0503a:721_8: imaṃ udānaṃ abhāsīti gāthāya eva ayamattho viññāyati. Na cāyaṃ nisajjā therassa saccappaṭivedhāya,
atk-s0503a:721_9: atha kho diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya. Pubbeyeva hi sūkarakhataleṇe attano bhāgineyyassa
atk-s0503a:721_10: dīghanakhaparibbājakassa bhagavati dhammaṃ desente ayaṃ mahāthero saccappaṭivedhakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpesīti.
atk-s0503a:722: Etamatthanti etaṃ therassa āneñjasamādhiyogena tādibhāvappattiyā ca kenaci akampanīyatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:723_0: Tattha yathāpi pabbato seloti yathā silāmayo ekagghanasilāpabbato, na paṃsupabbato
atk-s0503a:723_1: na missakapabbatoti attho. Acalo suppatiṭṭhitoti suppatiṭṭhitamūlo pakativātehi acalo
atk-s0503a:723_2: akampanīyo hoti. Evaṃ mohakkhayā bhikkhu, pabbatova na vedhatīti mohassa anavasesappahānā
atk-s0503a:723_3: mohamūlakattā ca sabbākusalānaṃ pahīnasabbākusalo bhikkhu, yathā so pabbato pakativātehi,
atk-s0503a:723_4: evaṃ lokadhammehi na vedhati na kampati. Mohakkhayoti vā yasmā nibbānaṃ arahattañca
atk-s0503a:723_5: vuccati, tasmā mohakkhayassa hetu nibbānassa arahattassa vā adhigatattā catūsu ariyasaccesu
atk-s0503a:723_6: suppatiṭṭhito asamāpannakālepi yathāvuttapabbato viya na kenaci vedhati, pageva samāpannakāleti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:726_0: 25. Pañcame kāyagatāya satiyāti kāyānupassanāvasena kāye gatāya kāyārammaṇāya satiyā,
atk-s0503a:726_1: itthambhūtalakkhaṇe idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Ajjhattanti idha ajjhattaṃ nāma niyakajjhattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:726_2: tasmā attani attasantāneti attho. Atha vā yasmā kammaṭṭhānabhūto kesādiko dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsasamudāyo
atk-s0503a:726_3: idha kāyoti adhippeto, tasmā ajjhattanti padassa gocarajjhattanti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:726_4: Sūpaṭṭhitāyāti niyakajjhattabhūte gocarajjhattabhūte vā kāye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitāya.
atk-s0503a:726_5: Kā panāyaṃ sati, yā “ajjhattaṃ sūpaṭṭhitā”ti vuttā? Yvāyaṃ bhagavatā “atthi imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:726_6: kāye kesā lomā”tiādinā ajjhattakesādiko dvattiṃsākāro kāyo vutto, tattha yā paṭikūlamanasikāraṃ
atk-s0503a:726_7: pavattentassa upacārappanāvasena kāye upaṭṭhitā sati, sā “kāyagatā satī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0503a:726_8: Yathā cāyaṃ, evaṃ ānāpānacatuiriyāpathasatisampajaññānaṃ vasena uddhumātakavinīlakādivasena
atk-s0503a:726_9: ca manasikāraṃ pavattentassa yathārahaṃ upacārappanāvasena kāye upaṭṭhitā sati “kāyagatā
atk-s0503a:726_10: satī”ti vuccati. Idha pana ajjhattaṃ kāyagatā sati pathavīādikā catasso dhātuyo sasambhārasaṅkhepādīsu
atk-s0503a:726_11: catūsu yena kenaci ekenākārena vavatthapetvā tesaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0503a:726_12: upaṭṭhitā vipassanāsampayuttā sati “kāyagatā satī”ti adhippetā. Thero pana tathā
atk-s0503a:726_13: vipassitvā attano phalasamāpattimeva samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Idhāpi gāthāya evaṃ imassa
atk-s0503a:726_14: atthassa viññātabbatā “na cāyaṃ nisajjā”tiādinā vuttanayānusārena yojetabbā.
atk-s0503a:727_1: vipassanaṃ ogāhetvā phalasamāpattisamāpajjanasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti
atk-s0503a:728_0: Tattha sati kāyagatā upaṭṭhitāti pubbe vuttalakkhaṇā sati saddhāpubbaṅgamānaṃ samādhivīriyapaññānaṃ
atk-s0503a:728_1: yathāsakaṃ kiccanipphādanena sahāyabhāvaṃ āpannattā pahīnappaṭipakkhā tato eva tikkhavisadabhūtā
atk-s0503a:728_2: ca yathāvuttakāyasaṃvaraṇavasena ekatthasamosaraṇavasena ca aviparītasabhāvaṃ sallakkhentī
atk-s0503a:728_3: upagantvā ṭhitā hoti, etena kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ tannissitānañca upādārūpānaṃ
atk-s0503a:728_4: sallakkhaṇavasena, paccaye vavatthapetvā tato paraṃ tesaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena
atk-s0503a:728_5: ca pavattaṃ ñāṇaparamparāgataṃ satiṃ dasseti, satisīsena vā taṃsampayuttaṃ pariññāttayapariyāpannañāṇaparamparameva
atk-s0503a:728_6: dasseti. Chasu phassāyatanesu saṃvutoti yathāvuttāya kāye upaṭṭhitāya satiyā samannāgato
atk-s0503a:728_7: cakkhādīsu phassassa kāraṇabhūtesu chasu dvāresu kāyānupassanāya abhāvitāya uppajjanārahānaṃ
atk-s0503a:728_8: abhijjhādīnaṃ tassā bhāvitattā ñāṇappavattiṃ paṭivedhento te pidahanto “tattha saṃvuto”ti
atk-s0503a:729_0: Satataṃ bhikkhu samāhitoti so bhikkhu evaṃ upaṭṭhitassati sabbattha ca saṃvuto puthuttārammaṇe
atk-s0503a:729_1: cittaṃ avissajjetvā aniccādivasena sammasanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ñāṇe tikkhe
atk-s0503a:729_2: sūre vahante vipassanāsamādhinā tāva satataṃ nirantaraṃ samāhito anulomañāṇānantaraṃ
atk-s0503a:729_3: gotrabhuñāṇodayato paṭṭhāya. Jaññā nibbānamattanoti aññesaṃ puthujjanānaṃ supinantepi
atk-s0503a:729_4: agocarabhāvato, ariyānaṃ pana tassa tasseva āveṇikattā attasadisattā ca “attā”ti
atk-s0503a:729_6: asaṅkhatadhātu “attano”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ nibbānaṃ jaññā jāneyya, maggaphalañāṇehi paṭivijjheyya,
atk-s0503a:729_7: sacchikareyyāti attho. Etena ariyānaṃ nibbāne adhimuttataṃ dasseti. Ariyā hi adhicittappavattikālepi
atk-s0503a:729_8: ekanteneva nibbāne ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena viharanti. Ettha ca yassa sati kāyagatā
atk-s0503a:729_9: upaṭṭhitā, so bhikkhu chasu phassāyatanesu saṃvuto, tato eva satataṃ samāhito attapaccakkhakaraṇena
