atk-s0503a:729_10: nibbānaṃ attano jāneyyāti evaṃ gāthāpadānaṃ sambandho veditabbo. Evaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānamukhena
atk-s0503a:729_11: yāva arahattā ekassa bhikkhuno niyyānamaggaṃ dasseti dhammarājā.
atk-s0503a:730_0: Aparo nayo – sati kāyagatā upaṭṭhitāti etena kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:730_1: Chasu phassāyatanesu saṃvutoti phasso āyatanaṃ kāraṇaṃ etesanti phassāyatanāni, tesu
atk-s0503a:730_2: phassāyatanesu. Phassahetukesu phassapaccayā nibbattesu chasu cakkhusamphassajādivedayitesu
atk-s0503a:730_3: taṇhādīnaṃ appavattiyā saṃvuto, etena vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti. Satataṃ
atk-s0503a:730_4: bhikkhu samāhitoti satataṃ niccakālaṃ nirantaraṃ vikkhepābhāvato samāhito bhikkhu.
atk-s0503a:730_5: So cāyaṃ avikkhepo sabbaso satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya matthakappattāya hoti. Sammasanto
atk-s0503a:730_6: hi atītādibhedabhinnesu pañcupādānakkhandhesu anavasesatova pariggahetvā sammasatīti.
atk-s0503a:730_7: Etena sesasatipaṭṭhāne dasseti. Jaññā nibbānamattanoti evaṃ catusatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ
atk-s0503a:730_8: matthakaṃ pāpetvā ṭhito bhinnakileso bhikkhu attano kilesanibbānaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇena
atk-s0503a:731_0: Atha vā sati kāyagatā upaṭṭhitāti attano paresañca kāyassa yathāsabhāvapariññādīpanena
atk-s0503a:731_1: therassa sativepullappatti dīpitā. Chasu phassāyatanesu saṃvutoti cakkhādīsu chasu
atk-s0503a:731_2: dvāresu accantasaṃvaradīpanena satatavihārivasena therassa sampajaññappakāsinī paññāvepullappatti
atk-s0503a:731_3: dīpitā. Satataṃ bhikkhu samāhitoti samāpattibahulatādassanena navānupubbavihārasamāpattiyo
atk-s0503a:731_4: dassitā. Evaṃbhūto pana bhikkhu jaññā nibbānamattanoti katakiccattā uttari karaṇīyābhāvato
atk-s0503a:731_5: kevalaṃ attano anupādisesanibbānameva jāneyya cinteyya, aññampi tassa cintetabbaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:734_0: 26. Chaṭṭhe pilindavacchoti pilindātissa nāmaṃ, vacchoti gottavasena theraṃ sañjānanti.
atk-s0503a:734_1: Vasalavādena samudācaratīti “ehi, vasala, apehi, vasalā”tiādinā bhikkhū vasalavādena
atk-s0503a:734_2: voharati ālapati. Sambahulā bhikkhūti bahū bhikkhū. Te theraṃ tathā samudācarantaṃ
atk-s0503a:734_3: disvā “arahāva samāno appahīnavāsanattā evaṃ bhaṇatī”ti ajānantā “dosantaro maññe
atk-s0503a:734_4: ayaṃ thero evaṃ samudācaratī”ti cintetvā ullapanādhippāyā taṃ tato vuṭṭhāpetuṃ bhagavato
atk-s0503a:734_5: ārocesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “āyasmā, bhante, pilindavaccho bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācaratī”ti.
atk-s0503a:734_6: Keci panāhu – “imaṃ theraṃ bhikkhū ‘arahā’ti sañjānanti, ayañca bhikkhū pharusavacanena
atk-s0503a:734_7: evaṃ samudācarati, ‘abhūto eva nu kho imasmiṃ uttarimanussadhammo’ti vāsanāvasena
atk-s0503a:734_8: tassa tathā samudācāraṃ ajānantā ariyabhāvañcassa asaddahantā ujjhānasaññino bhagavato
atk-s0503a:734_9: tamatthaṃ ārocesu”nti. Bhagavā therassa dosantarābhāvaṃ pakāsetukāmo ekena bhikkhunā
atk-s0503a:734_10: taṃ pakkosāpetvā sammukhā tassa “pubbāciṇṇavasenāyaṃ tathā samudācarati, na pharusavacanādhippāyo”ti
atk-s0503a:734_11: āha. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho bhagavā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:735_0: Tattha pubbenivāsaṃ manasi karitvāti satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, vaccha, bhikkhū vasalavādena
atk-s0503a:735_1: samudācarasī”ti theraṃ pucchitvā tena “evaṃ, bhante”ti vutte “ayaṃ vaccho kilesavāsanāya
atk-s0503a:735_2: vasalavādaṃ na pariccajati, kiṃ nu kho atītesupi attabhāvesu brāhmaṇajātiko ahosī”ti
atk-s0503a:735_3: āvajjento pubbenivāsañāṇena sabbaññutaññāṇena vā tassa pubbenivāsaṃ atītāsu jātīsu
atk-s0503a:735_4: nivutthakkhandhasantānaṃ manasi karitvā hatthatale ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya paccakkhakaraṇavasena
atk-s0503a:735_5: attano manasi katvā. Bhikkhū āmantesīti te bhikkhū saññāpetuṃ ālapi, abhāsi. Tena
atk-s0503a:736_0: Tattha māti paṭisedhe nipāto, tassa “ujjhāyitthā”ti iminā sambandho. Mā ujjhāyitthāti
atk-s0503a:736_1: mā heṭṭhā katvā cintayittha, olokayitthāti attho. Vacchassa bhikkhunoti ca ujjhāyanassa
atk-s0503a:736_2: usūyanatthattā sampadānavacanaṃ. Idānissa anujjhāyitabbe kāraṇaṃ dassento “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0503a:736_3: vaccho dosantaro bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācaratī”ti āha. Tassattho – bhikkhave,
atk-s0503a:736_4: ayaṃ vaccho dosantaro dosacitto dosena byāpādena dūsitacitto hutvā bhikkhū vasalavādena
atk-s0503a:736_5: na samudācarati, maggeneva cassa byāpādo samugghātito. Evaṃ adosantarattepi tassa
atk-s0503a:736_6: tathā samudācārassa purimajātisiddhaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassento “vacchassa, bhikkhave”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:737_0: Tattha abbokiṇṇānīti khattiyādijātiantarehi avomissāni anantaritāni. Pañca jātisatāni
atk-s0503a:737_1: brāhmaṇakule paccājātānīti sabbāni tāni vacchassa pañca jātisatāni paṭipāṭiyā brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0503a:737_2: eva jātāni, ahesunti attho. So tassa vasalavādo dīgharattaṃ samudāciṇṇoti yo etarahi
atk-s0503a:737_3: khīṇāsavenapi satā pavattiyati, so tassa vacchassa bhikkhuno vasalavādo dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0503a:737_4: ito jātito paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ ārohanavasena pañcajātisatamattaṃ kālaṃ brāhmaṇajātikattā
atk-s0503a:737_5: samudāciṇṇo samudācarito ahosi. Brāhmaṇā hi jātisiddhena mānena thaddhā aññaṃ vasalavādena
atk-s0503a:737_6: samudācaranti. “Ajjhāciṇṇo”tipi paṭhanti, so eva attho. Tenāti tena dīgharattaṃ tathā
atk-s0503a:737_7: samudāciṇṇabhāvena, etenassa tathā samudācārassa kāraṇaṃ vāsanāti dasseti. Kā panāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:737_8: vāsanā nāma? Yaṃ kilesarahitassāpi santāne appahīnakilesānaṃ samācārasadisasamācārahetubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0503a:737_9: anādikālabhāvitehi kilesehi āhitaṃ sāmatthiyamattaṃ, tathārūpā adhimuttīti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:737_10: Taṃ panetaṃ abhinīhārasampattiyā ñeyyāvaraṇappahānavasena yattha kilesā pahīnā, tattha
atk-s0503a:737_11: bhagavato santāne natthi. Yattha pana tathā kilesā na pahīnā, tattha sāvakānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca
atk-s0503a:738_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato pilindavacchassa satipi vasalasamudācāre dosantarābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:738_1: atthaṃ viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti tassa aggaphalādhigamavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:739_0: Tattha yamhi na māyā vasati na mānoti yasmiṃ ariyapuggale santadosappaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā
atk-s0503a:739_1: māyā, “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā sampaggahavasena pavatto uṇṇatilakkhaṇo māno ca na vasati,
atk-s0503a:739_2: maggena samugghātitattā na pavattati na uppajjati. Yo vītalobho amamo nirāsoti yo
atk-s0503a:739_3: ca rāgādipariyāyavasena pavattassa ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇassa lobhassa sabbathā vigatattā
atk-s0503a:739_4: vītalobho, tato eva rūpādīsu katthaci mamāyanābhāvato amamo apariggaho, anāgatānampi
atk-s0503a:739_5: bhavādīnaṃ anāsīsanato nirāso. Panuṇṇakodhoti kujjhanalakkhaṇassa kodhassa anāgāmimaggena
atk-s0503a:739_6: sabbaso pahīnattā panuṇṇakodho samucchinnāghāto. Abhinibbutattoti yo evaṃ māyāmānalobhakodhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:739_7: samugghātena tadekaṭṭhatāya sabbassa saṃkilesapakkhassa suppahīnattā sabbaso kilesaparinibbānena
atk-s0503a:739_8: abhinibbutacitto sītibhūto. So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhūti so evarūpo khīṇāsavo
atk-s0503a:739_9: sabbaso bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇo, so eva samitapāpattā samacariyāya ca samaṇo, so eva
atk-s0503a:739_10: ca sabbaso bhinnakilesattā bhikkhu nāma. Evaṃbhūto ca, bhikkhave, vaccho so kathaṃ
atk-s0503a:739_11: dosantaro kiñci kāyakammādiṃ pavatteyya, kevalaṃ pana vāsanāya appahīnattā vasalavādena samudācaratīti.
atk-s0503a:742_0: 27. Sattame sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinno hoti aññataraṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjitvāti
atk-s0503a:742_1: ettha keci tāva āhu “arahattaphalasamādhi idha ‘aññataro samādhī’ti adhippeto”ti.
atk-s0503a:742_2: Tañhi so āyasmā bahulaṃ samāpajjati diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ, pahoti ca sattāhampi
atk-s0503a:743: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi vivicceva kāmehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi…pe… viharāmi. Kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhati vivicceva kāmehi…pe… viharatī”ti –
atk-s0503a:744_1: ṭhapito, na cettha “yadi evaṃ thero yamakapāṭihāriyampi kareyyā”ti vattabbaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇānaṃyeva
atk-s0503a:745_0: Porāṇā panāhu – aññataraṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjitvāti nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā.
atk-s0503a:745_1: Kathaṃ pana nirodhasamāpatti samādhīti vuttā? Samādhānaṭṭhena. Ko panāyaṃ samādhānaṭṭho?
atk-s0503a:745_2: Sammadeva ādhātabbatā. Yā hi esā paccanīkadhammehi akampanīyā balappattiyā samathabalaṃ
atk-s0503a:745_4: cattāri maggañāṇāni cattāri ca phalañāṇānīti imesaṃ soḷasannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vasena soḷasahi
atk-s0503a:745_5: ñāṇacariyāhi, paṭhamajjhānasamādhiādayo aṭṭha samādhī ekajjhaṃ katvā gahito tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:745_6: upacārasamādhi cāti imesaṃ navannaṃ samādhīnaṃ vasena navahi samādhicariyāhi kāyasaṅkhāro
atk-s0503a:745_7: vacīsaṅkhāro cittasaṅkhāroti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ tattha tattha paṭippassaddhiyā
atk-s0503a:745_8: tathā viharitukāmena yathāvuttesu ṭhānesu vasībhāvappattena arahatā anāgāminā vā
atk-s0503a:745_9: yathādhippetaṃ kālaṃ cittacetasikasantānassa sammadeva appavatti ādhātabbā, tassā
atk-s0503a:745_10: tathā samādhātabbatā idha samādhānaṭṭho, tenāyaṃ vihāro samādhīti vutto, na avikkhepaṭṭhena.
atk-s0503a:745_11: Etenassa samāpattiatthopi vuttoti veditabbo. Imañhi nirodhasamāpattiṃ sandhāya paṭisambhidāmagge –
atk-s0503a:746: “Kathaṃ dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi vasībhāvatāya saññānirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa”nti –
atk-s0503a:747_0: Pucchitvā “dvīhi balehī”ti dve balāni samathabalaṃ vipassanābalanti vitthāro. Sāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:747_1: nirodhasamāpattikathā visuddhimagge saṃvaṇṇitāva. Kasmā panāyaṃ thero phalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0503a:747_2: asamāpajjitvā nirodhaṃ samāpajji? Sattesu anukampāya. Ayañhi mahāthero sabbāpi samāpattiyo
atk-s0503a:747_3: vaḷañjeti, sattānuggahena pana yebhuyyena nirodhaṃ samāpajjati. Tañhi samāpajjitvā
atk-s0503a:747_4: vuṭṭhitassa kato appakopi sakkāro visesato mahapphalo mahānisaṃso hotīti.
atk-s0503a:748: Vuṭṭhāsīti arahattaphalacittuppattiyā vuṭṭhāsi. Nirodhaṃ samāpanno hi arahā ce arahattaphalassa, anāgāmī ce anāgāmiphalassa uppādena vuṭṭhito nāma hoti.
atk-s0503a:749_0: Tena kho pana samayena sakko devānamindo āyasmato mahākassapassa piṇḍapātaṃ dātukāmo
atk-s0503a:749_1: hotīti kathaṃ tassa dātukāmatā jātā? Yāni “tāni pañcamattāni devatāsatānī”ti vuttāni,
atk-s0503a:749_2: tā sakkassa devarañño paricārikā kakuṭapādiniyo pubbe “ayyo mahākassapo rājagahaṃ
atk-s0503a:749_3: piṇḍāya pavisati, gacchatha therassa dānaṃ dethā”ti sakkena pesitā upagantvā dibbāhāraṃ
atk-s0503a:749_4: dātukāmā ṭhitā therena paṭikkhittā devalokameva gatā. Idāni purimappaṭikkhepaṃ cintetvā
atk-s0503a:749_5: “kadāci gaṇheyyā”ti samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa therassa dānaṃ dātukāmā sakkassa anārocetvā
atk-s0503a:749_6: sayameva āgantvā dibbabhojanāni upanentiyo purimanayeneva therena paṭikkhittā devalokaṃ
atk-s0503a:749_7: gantvā sakkena “kahaṃ gatatthā”ti puṭṭhā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “dinno vo therassa piṇḍapāto”ti
atk-s0503a:749_8: sakkena vutte “gaṇhituṃ na icchatī”ti. “Kiṃ kathesī”ti? “‘Duggatānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī’ti
atk-s0503a:749_9: āha, devā”ti. “Tumhe kenākārena gatā”ti? “Imināva, devā”ti. Sakko “tumhādisiyo therassa
atk-s0503a:749_10: piṇḍapātaṃ kiṃ dassantī”ti? Sayaṃ dātukāmo, jarājiṇṇo khaṇḍadanto palitakeso obhaggasarīro
atk-s0503a:749_11: mahallako tantavāyo hutvā, sujampi asuradhītaraṃ tathārūpimeva mahallikaṃ katvā,
atk-s0503a:749_12: ekaṃ pesakāravīthiṃ māpetvā tantaṃ pasārento acchi, sujā tasaraṃ pūreti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:749_13: – “tena kho pana samayena sakko devānamindo…pe… tasaraṃ pūretī”ti.
atk-s0503a:750_0: Tattha tantaṃ vinātīti pasāritatantaṃ vinanto viya hoti. Tasaraṃ pūretīti tasaravaṭṭiṃ
atk-s0503a:750_1: vaḍḍhentī viya. Yena sakkassa devānamindassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamīti thero nivāsetvā
atk-s0503a:750_3: sakkena māpitaṃ pesakāravīthiṃ paṭipajjitvā olokento addasa oluggaviluggajiṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0503a:750_4: tattha ca te jāyampatike yathāvuttarūpe tantavāyakammaṃ karonte disvā cintesi – “ime
atk-s0503a:750_5: mahallakakālepi kammaṃ karonti. Imasmiṃ nagare imehi duggatatarā natthi maññe. Imehi
atk-s0503a:750_6: dinnaṃ sākamattampi gahetvā imesaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti. So tesaṃ gehābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:750_7: Sakko taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā sujaṃ āha – “bhadde, mayhaṃ ayyo ito āgacchati, taṃ tvaṃ
atk-s0503a:750_8: apassantī viya tuṇhī hutvā nisīda. Khaṇeneva vañcetvā piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmā”ti thero
atk-s0503a:750_9: gantvā gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Tepi apassantā viya attano kammameva karontā thokaṃ āgamayiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:750_10: Atha sakko “gehadvāre ṭhito eko thero viya khāyati, upadhārehi tāvā”ti āha. “Tumhe
atk-s0503a:750_11: gantvā upadhāretha, sāmī”ti. So gehā nikkhamitvā theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā
atk-s0503a:750_12: ubhohi hatthehi jaṇṇukāni olumbitvā nitthunanto uṭṭhāya “kataratthero nu kho ayyo”ti
atk-s0503a:750_13: thokaṃ osakkitvā “akkhīni me dhūmāyantī”ti vatvā nalāṭe hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā uddhaṃ ulloketvā
atk-s0503a:750_14: “aho dukkhaṃ ayyo no mahākassapattherova cirassaṃ me kuṭidvāraṃ āgato. Atthi nu kho
atk-s0503a:750_15: kiñci gehe”ti āha. Sujā thokaṃ ākulā viya hutvā “atthi, sāmī”ti paṭivacanaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0503a:750_16: Sakko, “bhante, lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti acintetvā saṅgahaṃ no karothā”ti pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0503a:750_17: Thero pattaṃ dento “imesaṃ eva duggatānaṃ jarājiṇṇānaṃ mayā saṅgaho kātabbo”ti cintesi.
atk-s0503a:750_18: So anto pavisitvā ghaṭiodanaṃ nāma ghaṭito uddharitvā, pattaṃ pūretvā, therassa hatthe
atk-s0503a:750_19: ṭhapesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “addasā kho sakko devānamindo…pe… adāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:751_0: Tattha ghaṭiyāti bhattaghaṭito. “Ghaṭiodana”ntipi pāṭho, tassa ghaṭiodanaṃ nāma devānaṃ
atk-s0503a:751_1: koci āhāravisesoti atthaṃ vadanti. Uddharitvāti kutoci bhājanato uddharitvā. Anekasūpo
atk-s0503a:751_2: so eva āhāro patte pakkhipitvā therassa hatthe ṭhapanakāle kapaṇānaṃ upakappanakalūkhāhāro
atk-s0503a:751_3: viya paññāyittha, hatthe ṭhapitamatte pana attano dibbasabhāveneva aṭṭhāsi. Anekasūpoti
atk-s0503a:751_4: muggamāsādisūpehi ceva khajjavikatīhi ca anekavidhasūpo. Anekabyañjanoti nānāvidhauttaribhaṅgo.
atk-s0503a:751_5: Anekarasabyañjanoti anekehi sūpehi ceva byañjanehi ca madhurādimūlarasānañceva sambhinnarasānañca
atk-s0503a:752_0: So kira piṇḍapāto therassa hatthe ṭhapitakāle rājagahanagaraṃ attano dibbagandhena
atk-s0503a:752_1: ajjhotthari, tato thero cintesi – “ayaṃ puriso appesakkho, piṇḍapāto ativiya paṇīto
atk-s0503a:752_2: sakkassa bhojanasadiso. Ko nu kho eso”ti? Atha naṃ “sakko”ti ñatvā āha – “bhāriyaṃ
atk-s0503a:752_3: te, kosiya, kammaṃ kataṃ duggatānaṃ sampattiṃ vilumpantena, ajja mayhaṃ dānaṃ datvā
atk-s0503a:752_4: kocideva duggato senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ vā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ vā labheyyā”ti. “Ko mayā duggatataro
atk-s0503a:752_5: atthi, bhante”ti? “Kathaṃ tvaṃ duggato devarajjasiriṃ anubhavanto”ti? “Bhante, evaṃ
atk-s0503a:752_6: nāmetaṃ, mayā pana anuppanne buddhe kalyāṇakammaṃ kataṃ, buddhuppāde pana vattamāne
atk-s0503a:752_7: puññakammaṃ katvā cūḷarathadevaputto mahārathadevaputto anekavaṇṇadevaputtoti ime
atk-s0503a:752_8: tayo devaputtā mamāsannaṭṭhāne nibbattā mahātejavantatarā. Ahaṃ tesu devaputtesu
atk-s0503a:752_9: ‘nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā’ti paricārikāyo gahetvā antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇesu palāyitvā gehaṃ
atk-s0503a:752_10: pavisāmi. Tesañhi sarīrato tejo mama sarīraṃ ottharati, mama sarīrato tejo tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:752_11: sarīraṃ na ottharati. Ko mayā duggatataro, bhante”ti? “Evaṃ santepi ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0503a:752_12: mayhaṃ mā evaṃ vañcetvā dānamadāsī”ti. “Vañcetvā tumhākaṃ dāne dinne mayhaṃ kusalaṃ
atk-s0503a:752_13: atthi natthī”ti? “Atthi, āvuso”ti. “Evaṃ sante kusalakaraṇaṃ nāma mayhaṃ bhāro, bhante”ti
atk-s0503a:752_14: vatvā theraṃ vanditvā sujaṃ ādāya theraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā, vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0503a:752_15: “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ, kassape suppatiṭṭhita”nti tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānesi. Tena
atk-s0503a:753_0: Tattha kosiyāti sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ gottena ālapati. Puññena atthoti puññena payojanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:753_1: Atthīti vacanaseso. Vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvāti pathavito vehāsaṃ abhiuggantvā. Ākāse
atk-s0503a:753_2: antalikkheti ākāsameva pariyāyasaddena antalikkheti vadanti. Atha vā antalikkhasaṅkhāte
atk-s0503a:753_3: ākāse na kasiṇugghāṭimādiākāseti visesento vadati. Aho dānanti ettha ahoti acchariyatthe
atk-s0503a:753_4: nipāto. Sakko hi devānamindo, “yasmā nirodhā vuṭṭhitassa ayyassa mahākassapattherassa
atk-s0503a:753_5: sakkaccaṃ sahatthena cittīkatvā anapaviddhaṃ kālena paresaṃ anupahacca, sammādiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0503a:753_6: purakkhatvā idamīdisaṃ mayā dibbabhojanadānaṃ dinnaṃ, tasmā khettasampatti deyyadhammasampatti
atk-s0503a:753_7: cittasampattīti, tividhāyapi sampattiyā samannāgatattā sabbaṅgasampannaṃ vata mayā
atk-s0503a:753_8: dānaṃ pavattita”nti acchariyabbhutacittajāto tadā attano hadayabbhantaragataṃ pītisomanassaṃ
atk-s0503a:753_9: samuggiranto “aho dāna”nti vatvā tassa dānassa vuttanayena uttamadānabhāvaṃ khettaṅgatabhāvañca
atk-s0503a:754_0: Evaṃ pana sakkassa udānentassa bhagavā vihāre ṭhitoyeva dibbasotena saddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0503a:754_1: “passatha, bhikkhave, sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā ākāsena gacchanta”nti bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0503a:754_2: vatvā tehi “kiṃ pana, bhante, tena kata”nti puṭṭho “mama puttassa kassapassa vañcetvā
atk-s0503a:754_3: dānaṃ adāsi, tena ca attamano udānesī”ti āha. Tena vuttaṃ “assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:755_0: Tattha dibbāya sotadhātuyāti dibbasadisattā dibbā. Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattā
atk-s0503a:755_1: pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhā upakkilesavinimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇaṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0503a:755_2: samatthā dibbapasādasotadhātu hoti. Ayañcāpi bhagavato vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattā
atk-s0503a:755_3: ñāṇamayā sotadhātu tādisā evāti dibbasadisattā dibbā. Api ca dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā
atk-s0503a:755_4: attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbā. Savanaṭṭhena ca sabhāvadhāraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0503a:755_5: ca sotadhātu, sotadhātuyāpi kiccakaraṇena sotadhātu viyāti sotadhātu, tāya dibbāya
atk-s0503a:755_6: sotadhātuyā. Visuddhāyāti parisuddhāya nirupakkilesāya. Atikkantamānusikāyāti manussūpacāraṃ
atk-s0503a:756: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti “sammāpaṭipattiyā guṇavisese patiṭṭhitaṃ purisātisayaṃ devāpi manussāpi ādarajātā ativiya pihayantī”ti imamatthaṃ viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:757_0: Tatra piṇḍapātikaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ samādāya tassa paripūraṇena piṇḍapātikassa.
atk-s0503a:757_1: Nanu cāyaṃ gāthā āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ nimittaṃ katvā bhāsitā, thero ca sabbesaṃ
atk-s0503a:757_2: dhutavādānaṃ aggo terasadhutaṅgadharo, so kasmā ekeneva dhutaṅgena kittitoti? Aṭṭhuppattivasenāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:757_3: niddeso. Atha vā desanāmattametaṃ, iminā desanāsīsena sabbepissa dhutaṅgā vuttāti
atk-s0503a:757_4: veditabbā. Atha vā “yathāpi bhamaro puppha”nti gāthāya vuttanayena paramappicchatāya
atk-s0503a:757_5: kulānuddayatāya cassa sabbaṃ piṇḍapātikavattaṃ akkhaṇḍetvā tattha sātisayaṃ paṭipattiyā
atk-s0503a:757_6: pakāsanatthaṃ “piṇḍapātikassā”ti vuttaṃ. Piṇḍapātikassāti ca pihayantīti padaṃ apekkhitvā
atk-s0503a:757_7: sampadānavacanaṃ, taṃ upayogatthe daṭṭhabbaṃ. Attabharassāti “appāni ca tāni sulabhāni
atk-s0503a:757_8: anavajjānī”ti evaṃ vuttehi appānavajjasulabharūpehi catūhi paccayehi attānameva bharantassa.
atk-s0503a:757_9: Anaññaposinoti āmisasaṅgaṇhanena aññe sissādike posetuṃ anussukkatāya anaññaposino.
atk-s0503a:757_10: Padadvayenassa kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena vicaraṇato
atk-s0503a:757_11: sallahukavuttitaṃ subharataṃ paramañca santuṭṭhiṃ dasseti. Atha vā attabharassāti
atk-s0503a:757_12: ekavacanicchāya attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃyeva imaṃ attānaṃ bharati, na ito paraṃ aññanti
atk-s0503a:757_13: attabharo, tato eva attanā aññassa posetabbassa abhāvato anaññaposī, tassa attabharassa
atk-s0503a:757_14: anaññaposino. Padadvayenapi khīṇāsavabhāvena āyatiṃ anādānataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0503a:758_0: Devā pihayanti…pe… satīmatoti taṃ aggaphalādhigamena sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:758_1: vūpasamena paṭippassaddhiyā upasantaṃ, sativepullappattiyā niccakālaṃ satokāritāya
atk-s0503a:758_2: satimantaṃ, tato eva iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇappattaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ sakkādayo devā
atk-s0503a:758_3: pihayanti patthenti, tassa sīlādiguṇavisesesu bahumānaṃ uppādentā ādaraṃ janenti, pageva manussāti.
atk-s0503a:761_0: 28. Aṭṭhame pacchābhattanti ekāsanikakhalupacchābhattikānaṃ pātova bhuttānaṃ antomajjhanhikopi
atk-s0503a:761_1: pacchābhattameva, idha pana pakatibhattasseva pacchato pacchābhattanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:761_2: Piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānanti piṇḍapātato paṭikkantānaṃ, piṇḍapātaṃ pariyesitvā bhattakiccassa
atk-s0503a:761_3: niṭṭhāpanavasena tato nivattānaṃ. Karerimaṇḍalamāḷeti ettha karerīti varuṇarukkhassa
atk-s0503a:761_4: nāmaṃ. So kira gandhakuṭiyā maṇḍapassa sālāya ca antare hoti, tena gandhakuṭīpi “karerikuṭikā”ti
atk-s0503a:761_5: vuccati, maṇḍapopi sālāpi “karerimaṇḍalamāḷo”ti. Tasmā karerirukkhassa avidūre kate
atk-s0503a:762_0: Kālena kālanti kāle kāle antarantarā, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samayeti attho. Manāpiketi manavaḍḍhake,
atk-s0503a:762_1: piyarūpe iṭṭheti attho. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvo ca puggalavasena ca dvāravasena ca gahetabbo.
atk-s0503a:762_2: Ekaccassa hi iṭṭhābhimato ekaccassa aniṭṭho hoti, ekaccassa aniṭṭhābhimato ekaccassa
atk-s0503a:762_3: iṭṭho. Tathā ekassa dvārassa iṭṭho aññassa aniṭṭho. Vipākavasena panettha vinicchayo
atk-s0503a:762_4: veditabbo. Kusalavipāko hi ekantena iṭṭho, akusalavipāko aniṭṭho evāti. Cakkhunā
atk-s0503a:762_5: rūpe passitunti gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho upāsakehi gehaṃ pavesetvā pūjāsakkārakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:762_6: upanītesu āsanavitānādīsu nānāvirāgasamujjalavaṇṇasaṅkhāte rajanīye aññe ca saviññāṇakarūpe
atk-s0503a:762_7: cakkhudvārikaviññāṇehi passituṃ. Saddeti tatheva issarajanānaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭho tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:762_8: payutte gītavāditasadde sotuṃ. Gandheti tathā tehi pūjāsakkāravasena upanīte pupphadhūmādigandhe
atk-s0503a:762_9: ghāyituṃ. Raseti tehi dinnāhāraparibhoge nānaggarase sāyituṃ. Phoṭṭhabbeti mahagghapaccattharaṇesu
atk-s0503a:762_10: āsanesu nisinnakāle sukhasamphasse phoṭṭhabbe phusituṃ. Evañca pañcadvārikaiṭṭhārammaṇappaṭilābhaṃ
atk-s0503a:763_0: Kiṃ pana apiṇḍapātikānaṃ ayaṃ nayo na labbhatīti? Labbhati. Tesampi hi nimantanasalākabhattādiatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:763_1: gāmaṃ gatakāle uḷāravibhavā upāsakā tathā sakkārasammānaṃ karontiyeva, taṃ pana aniyataṃ.
atk-s0503a:763_2: Piṇḍapātikānaṃ pana tadā niccameva tattha pūjāsakkāraṃ kariyamānaṃ disvā, sakkāragarutāya
atk-s0503a:763_3: anissaraṇamagge ṭhatvā, ayonisomanasikāravasena te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu. Tenevāha –
atk-s0503a:764_0: Tattha handāti vossaggatthe nipāto. Lacchāmāti labhissāma. Tenupasaṅkamīti tattha
atk-s0503a:764_1: surabhigandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinno tesaṃ taṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā “ime bhikkhū mādisassa
atk-s0503a:764_2: nāma buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā mayā saddhiṃ ekavihāre vasantāpi evaṃ ayonisomanasikāravasena
atk-s0503a:764_3: kathaṃ pavattenti, sallekhe na vattanti, handa te tato nivāretvā sallekhavihāre niyojessāmī”ti
atk-s0503a:765_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti “appicchatāsantuṭṭhitāsallekhānaṃ vasena kilese dhunituṃ taṇhaṃ
atk-s0503a:765_1: visosetuṃ paṭipannoti piṇḍapātikassa sato devā pihayanti, tassa paṭipattiyā ādarajātā
atk-s0503a:765_2: piyāyanti, na ito aññathā”ti imamatthaṃ viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:766_0: Tattha no ce saddasilokanissitoti “aho ayyo appiccho santuṭṭho paramasallekhavuttī”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:766_1: parehi kittitabbasaddasaṅkhātaṃ silokaṃ. Taṇhāya nissito na hoti ceti attho. Saddo
atk-s0503a:766_2: vā sammukhā vaṇṇabhaṇanathutighoso, siloko parammukhabhūtā pasaṃsā patthaṭayasatā
atk-s0503a:769_0: 29. Navame ko nu kho, āvuso, sippaṃ jānātīti, āvuso, amhesu idha sannipatitesu ko
atk-s0503a:769_1: nu jīvitanimittaṃ sikkhitabbaṭṭhena “sippa”nti laddhanāmaṃ yaṃkiñci ājīvaṃ vijānāti?
atk-s0503a:769_2: Ko kiṃ sippaṃ sikkhīti ko dīgharattaṃ sippācariyakulaṃ payirupāsitvā āgamato payogato
atk-s0503a:769_3: ca hatthisippādīsu kiṃ sippaṃ sikkhi? Kataraṃ sippaṃ sippānaṃ agganti sabbasippānaṃ
atk-s0503a:769_4: agārayhatāya mahapphalatāya akicchasiddhiyā ca kataraṃ sippaṃ aggaṃ uttamaṃ? Yaṃ
atk-s0503a:769_5: nissāya sukhena sakkā jīvitunti adhippāyo. Tatthekacceti tesu bhikkhūsu ekacce bhikkhū.
atk-s0503a:769_6: Ye hatthācariyakulā pabbajitā te. Evamāhaṃsūti te evaṃ bhaṇiṃsu. Ito parampi “ekacce”ti
atk-s0503a:769_7: vuttaṭṭhāne eseva nayo. Hatthisippanti yaṃ hatthīnaṃ pariggaṇhanadamanasāraṇarogatikicchādibhedaṃ
atk-s0503a:769_8: kattabbaṃ, taṃ uddissa pavattaṃ sabbampi sippaṃ idha “hatthisippa”nti adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0503a:769_9: Assasippanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Rathasippaṃ pana rathayoggānaṃ damanasāraṇādividhānavasena
atk-s0503a:769_10: ceva rathassa karaṇavasena ca veditabbaṃ. Dhanusippanti issāsasippaṃ, yo dhanubbedhoti
atk-s0503a:769_11: vuccati. Tharusippanti sesaāvudhasippaṃ. Muddāsippanti hatthamuddāya gaṇanasippaṃ.
atk-s0503a:769_13: piṇḍagaṇanasippaṃ. Taṃ yassa paguṇaṃ hoti, so rukkhampi disvā “ettakāni ettha paṇṇānī”ti
atk-s0503a:769_14: gaṇituṃ jānāti. Lekhāsippanti nānākārehi akkharalikhanasippaṃ, lipiñāṇaṃ vā. Kāveyyasippanti
atk-s0503a:769_15: attano cintāvasena vā parato paṭiladdhasutavasena vā, “imassa ayamattho, evaṃ naṃ
atk-s0503a:769_16: yojessāmī”ti evaṃ atthavasena vā, kiñcideva kabbaṃ disvā, “tappaṭibhāgaṃ kabbaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0503a:769_17: ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānavasena vā cintākaviādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kavīnaṃ kabbakaraṇasippaṃ.
atk-s0503a:770: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, kavī – cintākavi, sutakavi, atthakavi, paṭibhānakavī”ti.
atk-s0503a:771_0: Lokāyatasippanti “kāko seto aṭṭhīnaṃ setattā, balākā rattā lohitassa rattattā”ti
atk-s0503a:771_2: abbheyyamāsurakkhādinītisatthasippaṃ. Imāni kira dvādasa mahāsippāni nāma. Tenevāha
atk-s0503a:772_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ sabbasippāyatanānaṃ jīvikatthatāya vaṭṭadukkhato anissaraṇabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:772_1: sīlādīnaṃyeva pana suparisuddhānaṃ nissaraṇabhāvaṃ, taṃ samaṅginoyeva ca bhikkhubhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:772_2: sabbākārato viditvā tadatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:773_0: Tattha asippajīvīti catunnaṃ taṇhuppādānaṃ samucchedavikkhambhanena paccayāsāya visositattā
atk-s0503a:773_1: yaṃkiñci sippaṃ upanissāya jīvikaṃ na kappetīti asippajīvī, etena ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ
atk-s0503a:773_2: dasseti. Lahūti appakiccatāya sallahukavuttitāya ca lahu abahulasambhāro, etena catupaccayasantosasiddhaṃ
atk-s0503a:773_3: subharataṃ dasseti. Atthakāmoti sadevakassa lokassa atthameva kāmetīti atthakāmo,
atk-s0503a:773_4: etena sattānaṃ anatthaparivajjanassa pakāsitattā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ dasseti pāṇātipātādianatthaviramaṇaparidīpanato.
atk-s0503a:773_5: Yatindriyoti cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ abhijjhādyappavattito saṃyamena yatindriyo,
atk-s0503a:773_6: etena indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbadhi vippamuttoti evaṃ suparisuddhasīlo catupaccayasantose
atk-s0503a:773_7: avaṭṭhito sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pariggahetvā aniccādivasena saṅkhāre sammasanto vipassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:773_8: ussukkāpetvā tato paraṃ paṭipāṭiyā pavattitehi catūhi ariyamaggehi saṃyojanānaṃ pahīnattā
atk-s0503a:774_0: Anokasārī amamo nirāsoti tathā sabbadhi vippamuttattā eva okasaṅkhātesu chasupi āyatanesu
atk-s0503a:774_1: taṇhābhisaraṇassa abhāvena anokasārī, rūpādīsu katthaci mamaṅkārābhāvato amamo, sabbena
atk-s0503a:774_2: sabbaṃ anāsīsanato nirāso. Hitvā mānaṃ ekacaro sa bhikkhūti evaṃbhūto ca so arahattamaggappattisamakālameva
atk-s0503a:774_3: anavasesaṃ mānaṃ hitvā pajahitvā ime bhikkhū viya gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ akatvā pavivekakāmatāya
atk-s0503a:774_4: taṇhāsahāyavirahena ca sabbiriyāpathesu ekacaro, so sabbaso bhinnakilesattā paramatthato
atk-s0503a:774_5: bhikkhu nāma. Ettha ca “asippajīvī”tiādinā lokiyaguṇā kathitā, “sabbadhi vippamutto”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:774_6: lokuttaraguṇā kathitā. Tattha asippajīvītiādi “vibhave ṭhitasseva ayaṃ dhammo, na
atk-s0503a:774_7: sippaṃ nissāya micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappentassa, tasmā sippesu sāraggahaṇaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0503a:777: 30. Dasame buddhacakkhunāti ettha āsayānusayañāṇaṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇañca buddhacakkhu nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:778: “Addasā kho bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:779: Lokanti tayo lokā – okāsaloko, saṅkhāraloko, sattalokoti. Tattha –
atk-s0503a:784_0: Ādīsu okāsaloko. “Eko loko – sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā, dve lokā – nāmañca rūpañca,
atk-s0503a:784_1: tayo lokā – tisso vedanā, cattāro lokā – cattāro āhārā, pañca lokā – pañcupādānakkhandhā,
atk-s0503a:784_2: cha lokā – cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, satta lokā – satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, aṭṭha
atk-s0503a:784_3: lokā – aṭṭha lokadhammā, nava lokā – nava sattāvāsā, dasa lokā – dasāyatanāni, dvādasa
atk-s0503a:784_4: lokā – dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa lokā – aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo”tiādīsu saṅkhāraloko.
atk-s0503a:784_5: “Sassato loko, asassato loko”tiādīsu sattaloko vutto. Idhāpi sattaloko veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:785_0: Tattha lokīyati vicittākārato dissatīti cakkavāḷasaṅkhāto loko okāsaloko, saṅkhāro
atk-s0503a:785_1: lujjati palujjatīti loko, lokīyati ettha puññapāpaṃ tabbipāko cāti sattaloko. Tesu
atk-s0503a:785_2: bhagavā mahākaruṇāya anukampamāno saṃsāradukkhato mocetukāmo sattalokaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0503a:785_3: Katamassa pana sattāhassa accayena olokesi? Paṭhamassa sattāhassa. Bhagavā hi pallaṅkasattāhassa
atk-s0503a:785_4: pariyosāne pacchimayāmāvasāne “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā…pe… sūriyova obhāsayamantalikkha”nti
atk-s0503a:785_5: imaṃ ariyamaggānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā, “ahaṃ tāva evaṃ suduttaraṃ saṃsāramahoghaṃ
atk-s0503a:785_6: imāya dhammanāvāya samuttaritvā nibbānapāre ṭhito, handa dāni lokampi tāressāmi,
atk-s0503a:785_7: kīdiso nu kho loko”ti lokaṃ volokesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “atha kho bhagavā tassa
atk-s0503a:785_8: sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:786_0: Tattha volokesīti vividhehi ākārehi passi, hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya attano
atk-s0503a:786_1: ñāṇena paccakkhaṃ akāsi. Anekehi santāpehītiādi volokitākāradassanaṃ. Anekehi santāpehīti
atk-s0503a:786_2: anekehi dukkhehi. Dukkhañhi santāpanapīḷanaṭṭhena santāpoti vuccati. Yathāha – “dukkhassa
atk-s0503a:786_3: pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho”ti. Tañca dukkhadukkhādivasena
atk-s0503a:786_4: ceva jātiādivasena ca anekappakāraṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “anekehi santāpehī”ti. Anekehi dukkhehi
atk-s0503a:786_5: santappamāne pīḷiyamāne bādhiyamāne. Pariḷāhehīti paridāhehi. Pariḍayhamāneti indhanaṃ
atk-s0503a:786_6: viya agginā samantato ḍayhamāne. Rāgajehīti rāgasambhūtehi. Esa nayo sesesupi. Rāgādayo
atk-s0503a:786_7: hi yasmiṃ santāne uppajjanti, taṃ niddahantā viya vibādhenti, tena vuttaṃ – “tayome,
atk-s0503a:786_8: bhikkhave, aggī – rāgaggi, dosaggi, mohaggī”ti. Yato te cittaṃ kāyañca kilesentīti
atk-s0503a:786_9: kilesāti vuccanti. Ettha ca pariḍayhamāneti etena bhagavā rāgādikilesānaṃ pavattidukkhataṃ,
atk-s0503a:786_10: tena ca sattānaṃ abhibhūtataṃ dasseti. Santappamāneti iminā pana tesaṃ kālantaradukkhataṃ,
atk-s0503a:787_0: Bhagavā hi bodhirukkhamūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinno paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā
atk-s0503a:787_1: majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā
atk-s0503a:787_2: kilesamūlakaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ abhiññāya saṅkhāre pariggahetvā sammasanto anukkamena
atk-s0503a:787_3: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggādhigamena sayaṃ vigataviddhastakileso abhisambuddho
atk-s0503a:787_4: hutvā paccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ anavasesānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā attano vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0503a:787_6: teneva pallaṅkena sattāhaṃ vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī nisinno sattamāya rattiyā tīsu
atk-s0503a:787_7: yāmesu vuttanayena tīṇi udānāni udānetvā tatiyaudānānantaraṃ buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ
atk-s0503a:787_8: volokento “sakalamidaṃ sattānaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ kilesamūlakaṃ, kilesā nāmete pavattidukkhā
atk-s0503a:787_9: āyatimpi dukkhahetubhūtā, tehi ime sattā santappanti pariḍayhanti cā”ti passi. Tena
atk-s0503a:788_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ lokassa yathāvuttasantāpapariḷāhehi abhibhuyyamānataṃ sabbākārato
atk-s0503a:788_1: viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ sabbasantāpapariḷāhato parinibbānavibhāvanaṃ mahāudānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:789_0: Tattha ayaṃ loko santāpajātoti ayaṃ sabbopi loko jarārogamaraṇehi ceva nānāvidhabyasanehi
atk-s0503a:789_1: ca kilesapariyuṭṭhānehi ca jātasantāpo, uppannakāyikacetasikadukkhābhibhavoti attho.
atk-s0503a:789_2: Phassaparetoti tato eva anekehi dukkhasamphassehi parihato upadduto. Atha vā phassaparetoti
atk-s0503a:789_3: sukhādisaṅkhātānaṃ tissannaṃ dukkhatānaṃ paccayabhūtehi chahi phassehi abhibhūto,
atk-s0503a:789_4: tato tato dvārato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe pavattivasena upassaṭṭho. Rogaṃ vadati attatoti
atk-s0503a:789_5: phassapaccayā uppajjamānaṃ vedanāsaṅkhātaṃ rogaṃ dukkhaṃ, khandhapañcakameva vā yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:789_6: ajānanto “aha”nti saññāya diṭṭhigāhavasena “ahaṃ sukhito dukkhito”ti attato vadati.
atk-s0503a:789_7: “Attano”tipi paṭhanti. Tassattho – yvāyaṃ loko kenaci dukkhadhammena phuṭṭho abhāvitattatāya
atk-s0503a:789_8: adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto “aho dukkhaṃ, īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ attanopi mā hotū”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:789_9: vippalapanto kevalaṃ attano rogaṃ vadati, tassa pana pahānāya na paṭipajjatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:789_10: Atha vā taṃ yathāvuttaṃ dukkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ajānanto taṇhāgāhavasena “mama”nti saññāya
atk-s0503a:790_0: Yena yena hi maññatīti evamimaṃ rogabhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ attato attano vā vadanto
atk-s0503a:790_1: loko yena yena rūpavedanādinā kāraṇabhūtena, yena vā sassatādinā pakārena diṭṭhimānataṇhāmaññanāhi
atk-s0503a:790_2: maññati. Tato taṃ hoti aññathāti tato attanā parikappitākārato taṃ maññanāya vatthubhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:790_3: khandhapañcakaṃ aññathā anattānattaniyameva hoti. Vase vattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ahaṅkāramamaṅkārattaṃ
atk-s0503a:790_4: na nipphādetīti attho. Atha vā tatoti tasmā maññanāmattabhāvato taṃ khandhapañcakaṃ
atk-s0503a:790_5: niccādivasena maññitaṃ aññathā aniccādisabhāvameva hoti. Na hi maññanā bhāvaññathattaṃ
atk-s0503a:791_0: Aññathābhāvī bhavasattoti asambhave vaḍḍhiyaṃ hitasukhe satto laggo sattaloko maññanāya
atk-s0503a:791_1: yathāruci cintiyamānopi viparītappaṭipattiyā tato aññathābhāvī ahitadukkhabhāvī vighātaṃyeva
atk-s0503a:791_2: pāpuṇāti. Bhavamevābhinandatīti evaṃ santepi taṃ maññanāparikappitaṃ avijjamānaṃ
atk-s0503a:791_3: bhavaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ abhinandati eva abhikaṅkhati eva. Atha vā aññathābhāvīti “nicco me
atk-s0503a:791_4: attā”tiādinā maññanāya parikappitākārato sayaṃ aññathābhāvī samāno anicco adhuvoti
atk-s0503a:791_5: attho. Bhavasattoti kāmādibhavesu bhavataṇhāya satto laggo gadhito. Bhavamevābhinandatīti
atk-s0503a:791_6: aniccādisabhāvaṃ bhavameva niccādivasena parāmasitvā, tattha vā adhimuttisaññaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinandanāhi
atk-s0503a:791_7: abhinandati, na tattha nibbindati. Yadabhinandati taṃ bhayanti yaṃ vaḍḍhisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:791_8: bhavaṃ kāmādibhavaṃ vā abhinandati, taṃ aniccādivipariṇāmasabhāvattā anekabyasanānubandhattā
atk-s0503a:791_9: ca bhavahetubhāvato ativiya bhayānakaṭṭhena bhayaṃ. Yassa bhāyatīti yato jarāmaraṇādito
atk-s0503a:791_10: bhāyati, taṃ jarāmaraṇādi dukkhādhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhadukkhabhāvato ca dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:791_11: Atha vā yassa bhāyatīti bhavābhinandanena yassa vibhavassa bhāyati, so ucchedasaṅkhāto
atk-s0503a:791_12: vibhavo, tato bhāyanañca dukkhavatthubhāvato jātiādidukkhassa anativattanato ca dukkhaṃ
atk-s0503a:791_13: dukkhasabhāvamevāti attho. Atha vā yassa bhāyati taṃ dukkhanti yassa aniccādikassa
atk-s0503a:791_14: bhāyati taṃ nissaraṇaṃ ajānanto, taṃ bhayaṃ tassa dukkhaṃ hoti, dukkhaṃ āvahatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:792_0: Ettakena vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ, “bhavavippahānāya kho panidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ
atk-s0503a:792_1: vussatī”ti āha. Tattha bhavavippahānāyāti kāmādibhavassa pajahanatthāya. Khoti avadhāraṇe,
atk-s0503a:792_2: panāti padapūraṇe nipāto. Idanti āsannapaccakkhavacanaṃ. Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:792_3: Vussatīti pūressati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ekanteneva kāmādibhavassa samudayappahānena
atk-s0503a:792_4: anavasesapajahanatthāya idaṃ mayā satasahassakappādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atidukkarāni
atk-s0503a:792_5: ācaritvā pāramiyo pūretvā bodhimaṇḍe tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā adhigataṃ
atk-s0503a:793_0: Evaṃ ariyamaggassa ekaṃseneva niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni aññamaggassa tadabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:793_1: dassento “ye hi kecī”tiādimāha. Tattha yeti aniyamaniddeso. Hīti nipātamattaṃ. Kecīti
atk-s0503a:793_2: ekacce. Padadvayenāpi tathāvādino diṭṭhigatike aniyamato pariyādiyati. Samaṇāti pabbajjūpagamanamattena
atk-s0503a:793_3: samaṇā, na samitapāpā. Brāhmaṇāti jātimattena brāhmaṇā, na bāhitapāpā. Vāsaddo vikappattho.
atk-s0503a:793_4: Bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamāhaṃsūti ekacce kāmabhavena rūpabhavena vā sabbabhavato
atk-s0503a:794_0: Ke panevaṃ vadantīti? Diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādino tesu hi keci “uḷārehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi
atk-s0503a:794_1: samappito attā diṭṭheva dhamme paramaṃ nibbutiṃ patto hotī”ti vadanti. Keci “rūpāvacarajjhānesu
atk-s0503a:794_3: paramaṃ nibbutiṃ patto hotī”ti vadanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0503a:795: “Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃvādī hoti evaṃdiṭṭhi ‘yato kho bho ayaṃ attā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito”’ti vitthāro.
atk-s0503a:796_0: Te pana yasmā yāvadatthaṃ pītattā suhitāya jalūkāya viya ruhirapipāsā kāmādisukhehi
atk-s0503a:796_1: samappitassa tassa attano kāmesanādayo na bhavissanti, tadabhāve ca bhavassa abhāvoyeva,
atk-s0503a:796_2: yasmiṃ yasmiñca bhave ṭhitassa ayaṃ nayo labbhati, tena tena bhavena sabbabhavato
atk-s0503a:796_3: vimutti hotīti vadanti, tasmā “bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamāhaṃsū”ti vuttā. Yesañca
atk-s0503a:796_4: “ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ saṃsaritvā bālā ca paṇḍitā ca pariyosānabhave ṭhatvā saṃsārato
atk-s0503a:796_5: vimuccantī”ti laddhi, tepi bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhaṃ vadanti nāma. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0503a:797: “Cullāsīti mahākappino satasahassāni yāni bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0503a:798_0: Atha vā bhavenāti bhavadiṭṭhiyā. Bhavati sassataṃ tiṭṭhatīti pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi
atk-s0503a:798_1: bhavadiṭṭhīti vuccati, bhavadiṭṭhi evettha uttarapadalopena bhavataṇhātiādīsu viya
atk-s0503a:798_2: bhavoti vutto. Bhavadiṭṭhivasena ca ekacce bhavavisesaṃyeva kilesānaṃ vūpasantavuttiyā
atk-s0503a:798_3: āyuno ca dīghāvāsatāya niccādisabhāvaṃ bhavavimokkhaṃ maññanti, seyyathāpi bako brahmā
atk-s0503a:798_4: “idaṃ niccaṃ, idaṃ dhuvaṃ, idaṃ sassataṃ, idaṃ avipariṇāmadhamma”nti avoca. Tesamevaṃ
atk-s0503a:798_5: viparītagāhīnaṃ anissaraṇe nissaraṇadiṭṭhīnaṃ kuto bhavavimokkho. Tenāha bhagavā
atk-s0503a:799_0: Vibhavenāti ucchedena. Bhavassa nissaraṇamāhaṃsūti sabbabhavato niggamanaṃ nikkhantiṃ
atk-s0503a:799_1: saṃsārasuddhiṃ vadiṃsu. Te hi “bhavena bhavassa vippamokkho”ti vadantānaṃ vādaṃ ananujānantā
atk-s0503a:799_2: bhavūpacchedena nissaraṇaṃ paṭijāniṃsu. Vibhavenāti vā ucchedadiṭṭhiyā. Vibhavati
atk-s0503a:799_3: vinassati ucchijjati attā ca loko cāti pavattanato ucchedadiṭṭhi vuttanayena “vibhavo”ti
atk-s0503a:799_4: vuccati. Ucchedadiṭṭhivasena hi sattā adhimuccitvā tattha tattha uppannā ucchijjanti,
atk-s0503a:800: “Yato kho bho ayaṃ attā rūpī cātumahābhūtiko…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati, ettāvatā kho bho ayaṃ attā sammā samucchinno hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:802: “Natthi, mahārāja, dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ natthi hutaṃ…pe… bāle ca paṇḍite ca kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassanti na honti paraṃ maraṇā”ti ca.
atk-s0503a:803_0: Tesampi evaṃ viparītagāhīnaṃ kuto bhavanissaraṇaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā – “sabbe te ‘anissaṭā
atk-s0503a:803_1: bhavasmā’ti vadāmī”ti. Na hi ariyamaggabhāvanāya anavasesakilesaṃ asamugghātetvā
atk-s0503a:803_2: kadācipi bhavato nissaraṇavimutti sambhavati. Tathā hi tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ yathābhūtāvabodhābhāvato
atk-s0503a:803_4: yato te diṭṭhigatikā pavattihetūsupi sammūḷhā sakkāyabhūmiyaṃ sunikhāte viparītadassanathambhe
atk-s0503a:803_5: taṇhābandhanena baddhā gaddūlabandhanā viya sā na vijahanti bandhanaṭṭhānaṃ, kuto nesaṃ vimokkho?
atk-s0503a:804_0: Ye pana catusaccavibhāvanena pavattiādīsu asammohato taṃ antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimaṃ
atk-s0503a:804_1: paṭipadaṃ samāruḷhā, tesaṃyeva bhavavippamokkho nissaraṇañcāti dassento satthā “upadhiṃ
atk-s0503a:804_2: hī”tiādimāha. Tattha upadhinti khandhādiupadhiṃ. Hīti nipātamattaṃ. Paṭiccāti nissāya,
atk-s0503a:804_3: paccayaṃ katvā. Dukkhanti jātiādi dukkhaṃ. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yatthime diṭṭhigatikā
atk-s0503a:804_4: vimokkhasaññino, tattha khandhakilesābhisaṅkhārūpadhayo adhigatā, kuto tattha dukkhanissaraṇaṃ?
atk-s0503a:804_5: Yatra hi kilesā, tatrābhisaṅkhārasambhavato bhavapabandhassa avicchedoyevāti vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0503a:804_6: anivatti. Tena vuttaṃ – “upadhiñhi paṭicca dukkhamidaṃ sambhotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:805_0: Idāni yaṃ paramatthato dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ, “sabbupādānakkhayā natthi
atk-s0503a:805_1: dukkhassa sambhavo”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha sabbupādānakkhayāti kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ
atk-s0503a:805_2: sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānanti sabbesaṃ imesaṃ catunnampi upādānānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamena
atk-s0503a:805_3: anavasesappahānato. Tattha diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānanti imāni
atk-s0503a:805_4: tīṇi upādānāni sotāpattimaggena khīyanti, anuppattidhammataṃ āpajjanti. Kāmupādānaṃ
atk-s0503a:805_5: apāyagamanīyaṃ paṭhamena, kāmarāgabhūtaṃ bahalaṃ dutiyena, sukhumaṃ tatiyena, rūparāgārūparāgappahānaṃ
atk-s0503a:805_6: catutthenāti catūhipi maggehi khīyati, anuppattidhammataṃ āpajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:805_7: Natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti evaṃ sabbaso upādānakkhayā tadekaṭṭhatāya sabbassapi
atk-s0503a:805_8: kilesagaṇassa anuppādanato appamattakassapi vaṭṭadukkhassa sambhavo pātubhāvo natthi.
atk-s0503a:806_0: Evaṃ bhagavā hetunā saddhiṃ pavattiṃ nivattiñca dassetvā “imaṃ nayaṃ ajānanto ayaṃ
atk-s0503a:806_1: sattaloko vaṭṭatopi sīsaṃ na ukkhipatī”ti dassento “lokamimaṃ passā”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0503a:806_2: lokamimaṃ passāti attano buddhacakkhunā paccakkhato visayabhāvassa upagatattā “lokamimaṃ
atk-s0503a:806_3: passā”ti bhagavādassanakiriyāya niyojento attānamevālapati. Puthūti bahū, visuṃ visuṃ
atk-s0503a:806_4: vā. Avijjāya paretāti “dukkhe aññāṇa”ntiādinā nayena vuttāya catusaccapaṭicchādikāya
atk-s0503a:806_5: avijjāya abhibhūtā. Bhūtāti kammakilesehi jātā nibbattā. Bhūtaratāti bhūtesu mātāpituputtadārādisaññāya
atk-s0503a:806_6: aññasattesu taṇhāya ratā, bhūte vā khandhapañcake aniccāsubhadukkhānattasabhāve taṃsabhāvānavabodhato
atk-s0503a:806_7: itthipurisādiparikappavasena niccādivasena attattaniyagāhavasena ca abhiratā. Bhavā
atk-s0503a:806_8: aparimuttāti yathāvuttena taṇhādiṭṭhigāhena bhavato saṃsārato na parimuttā.
atk-s0503a:807_0: Ettha ca “lokamima”nti paṭhamaṃ tāva sakalampi sattanikāyaṃ sāmaññato ekattaṃ upanento
atk-s0503a:807_1: ekavacanena anodhiso gahaṇaṃ dīpetvā “svāyaṃ loko bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsādivasena
atk-s0503a:807_2: ceva tatthāpi taṃtaṃsattanikāyādivasena ca anekabhedabhinno paccekaṃ mayā volokito”ti
atk-s0503a:807_3: attano buddhacakkhuñāṇānubhāvaṃ pakāsento satthā puna vacanabhedaṃ katvā bahuvacanena
atk-s0503a:807_4: odhiso gahaṇaṃ dīpeti “puthū avijjāya paretā bhūtā”tiādinā. Evañca katvā “lokamima”nti
atk-s0503a:807_6: hoti bhinnavākyattā. Keci pana ekavākyatādhippāyena “avijjāya paretaṃ bhūtaṃ bhūtarataṃ
atk-s0503a:807_7: bhavā aparimutta”nti paṭhanti, vibhattibhedavaseneva pana purāṇapāṭho.
atk-s0503a:808_0: Idāni yena upāyena bhavavippamokkho hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ titthiyānaṃ avisayabhūtaṃ buddhagocaraṃ
atk-s0503a:808_1: vipassanāvīthiṃ dassento “ye hi kecī”tiādimāha. Tattha ye hi keci bhavāti kāmabhavādi
atk-s0503a:808_2: saññībhavādi ekavokārabhavādivibhāgena nānābhedabhinnā sātavanto vā asātavanto vā
atk-s0503a:808_3: dīghāyukā vā ittarakkhaṇā vā ye hi keci bhavā. Sabbadhīti uddhaṃ adho tiriyanti ādivibhāgena
atk-s0503a:808_4: sabbattha. Sabbatthatāyāti saggāpāyamanussādivibhāgena. Sabbe tetiādīsu sabbepi te
atk-s0503a:808_5: bhavā rūpavedanādidhammā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā, udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā dukkhā,
atk-s0503a:808_6: jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatāya vipariṇāmadhammā. Itisaddo ādiattho
atk-s0503a:808_7: pakārattho vā, tena anattalakkhaṇampi saṅgahetvā avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā, vipariṇāmadhammatāya
atk-s0503a:809_0: Evaṃ lakkhaṇattayapaṭivijjhanākārena etaṃ bhavasaṅkhātaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:809_1: aviparītaṃ sammappaññāya sammā ñāyena vipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya passato pariññābhisamayādivasena
atk-s0503a:809_2: paṭivijjhato “bhavo nicco”ti ādinayappavattā bhavesu taṇhā pahīyati, aggamaggappattisamakālameva
atk-s0503a:809_3: anavasesaṃ nirujjhati, ucchedadiṭṭhiyā sabbaso pahīnattā vibhavaṃ vicchedaṃ nābhinandati
atk-s0503a:809_4: na pattheti. Evaṃbhūtassa tassa yā kāmataṇhādivasena aṭṭhasatabhedā avatthādivibhāgena
atk-s0503a:809_5: anantabhedā ca, tāsaṃ sabbaso sabbappakārena taṇhānaṃ khayā pahānā, tadekaṭṭhatāya
atk-s0503a:809_6: sabbassapi saṃkilesapakkhassa asesaṃ nissesaṃ virāgena ariyamaggena yo anuppādanirodho, taṃ nibbānanti.
atk-s0503a:810_0: Evaṃ taṇhāya pahānamukhena saupādisesanibbānaṃ dassetvā idāni anupādisesanibbānaṃ
atk-s0503a:810_1: dassento “tassa nibbutassā”tiādimāha. Tassattho – yo so sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā kilesaparinibbānena
atk-s0503a:810_2: nibbuto vuttanayena bhinnakileso khīṇāsavabhikkhu, tassa nibbutassa bhikkhuno anupādā
atk-s0503a:810_3: upādānābhāvato kilesābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ vā aggahaṇato punabbhavo na hoti, āyatiṃ
atk-s0503a:810_4: paṭisandhivasena upapattibhavo natthi. Evaṃbhūtena ca tena abhibhūto māro, ariyamaggakkhaṇe
atk-s0503a:810_5: kilesamāro abhisaṅkhāramāro devaputtamāro ca carimakacittakkhaṇe khandhamāro maccumāro
atk-s0503a:810_6: cāti pañcavidho māro abhibhūto parājito, puna sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ appadānena nibbisevano
atk-s0503a:810_7: kato, yato tena vijito saṅgāmo mārehi tattha tattha pavattito. Evaṃ vijitasaṅgāmo
atk-s0503a:810_8: pana iṭṭhādīsu sabbesu vikārābhāvena tādilakkhaṇappattiyā tādī arahā sabbabhavāni
atk-s0503a:810_9: yathāvuttabhede sabbepi bhave upaccagā samatikkanto, na yattha katthaci saṅkhaṃ upeti,
atk-s0503a:810_10: aññadatthu anupādāno viya jātavedo parinibbānato uddhaṃ apaññattikova hotīti. Iti
atk-s0503a:810_11: bhagavā imaṃ mahāudānaṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā kūṭaṃ gahetvā niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0503a:815_0: 31. Meghiyavaggassa paṭhame cālikāyanti evaṃ nāmake nagare. Tassa kira nagarassa
atk-s0503a:815_1: dvāraṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samantato calapaṅkaṃ hoti, taṃ calapaṅkaṃ nissāya ṭhitattā
atk-s0503a:815_2: olokentānaṃ calamānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti, tasmā “cālikā”ti vuccati. Cālike pabbateti
atk-s0503a:815_3: tassa nagarassa avidūre eko pabbato, sopi sabbasetattā kālapakkhauposathe olokentānaṃ
atk-s0503a:815_4: calamāno viya upaṭṭhāti, tasmā “cālikapabbato”ti saṅkhaṃ gato. Tattha bhagavato mahantaṃ
atk-s0503a:815_5: vihāraṃ kārayiṃsu, bhagavā tadā taṃ nagaraṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā tasmiṃ cālikapabbatamahāvihāre
atk-s0503a:815_6: viharati. Tena vuttaṃ – “cālikāyaṃ viharati cālike pabbate”ti. Meghiyoti tassa therassa
atk-s0503a:815_7: nāmaṃ. Upaṭṭhāko hotīti paricārako hoti. Bhagavato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ upaṭṭhākā anibaddhā
atk-s0503a:815_8: ahesuṃ, ekadā nāgasamālo, ekadā nāgito, ekadā upavāno, ekadā sunakkhatto, tadāpi
atk-s0503a:815_9: meghiyattherova upaṭṭhāko. Tenāha – “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā meghiyo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:816_0: Jantugāmanti evaṃ nāmakaṃ tasseva vihārassa aparaṃ gocaragāmaṃ. “Jattugāma”ntipi
atk-s0503a:816_1: pāṭho. Kimikāḷāyāti kāḷakimīnaṃ bahulatāya “kimikāḷā”ti laddhanāmāya nadiyā. Jaṅghavihāranti
atk-s0503a:816_2: ciranisajjāya jaṅghāsu uppannakilamathavinodanatthaṃ vicaraṇaṃ. Pāsādikanti aviraḷarukkhatāya
atk-s0503a:816_3: siniddhapattatāya ca passantānaṃ pasādamāvahatīti pāsādikaṃ. Sandacchāyatāya manuññabhūmibhāgatāya
atk-s0503a:816_4: ca manuññaṃ. Anto paviṭṭhānaṃ pītisomanassajananaṭṭhena cittaṃ rametīti ramaṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:816_5: Alanti pariyattaṃ, yuttantipi attho. Padhānatthikassāti yogena bhāvanāya atthikassa.
atk-s0503a:816_6: Padhānāyāti samaṇadhammakaraṇāya. Āgaccheyyāhanti āgaccheyyaṃ ahaṃ. Therena kira
atk-s0503a:816_7: pubbe taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupaṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni raññā eva satā anubhūtaṃ uyyānaṃ
atk-s0503a:816_8: ahosi, tenassa diṭṭhamatteyeva tattha viharituṃ cittaṃ nami. Āgamehi tāvāti satthā
atk-s0503a:816_9: therassa vacanaṃ sutvā upadhārento “na tāvassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gata”nti ñatvā paṭikkhipanto
atk-s0503a:816_10: evamāha. Ekakamhi tāvāti idaṃ panassa “evamayaṃ gantvāpi kamme anipphajjamāne nirāsaṅko
atk-s0503a:816_11: hutvā pemavasena puna āgacchissatī”ti cittamaddavajananatthaṃ āha. Yāva aññopi koci
atk-s0503a:816_12: bhikkhu āgacchatīti añño koci bhikkhu mama santikaṃ yāva āgacchati, tāva āgamehīti
atk-s0503a:816_13: attho. “Koci bhikkhu dissatī”tipi pāṭho. “Āgacchatū”tipi paṭhanti, tathā “dissatū”ti.
atk-s0503a:817_0: Natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ
atk-s0503a:817_1: kiccānaṃ katattā, abhisambodhiyā vā adhigatattā tato aññaṃ uttari karaṇīyaṃ nāma
atk-s0503a:817_2: natthi. Natthi katassa vā paticayoti katassa vā puna paticayopi natthi. Na hi bhāvitamaggo
atk-s0503a:817_3: puna bhāvīyati, pahīnakilesānaṃ vā puna pahānena kiccaṃ atthi. Atthi katassa paticayoti
atk-s0503a:817_4: mayhaṃ santāne nipphāditassa sīlādidhammassa ariyamaggassa anadhigatattā tadatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:817_5: puna vaḍḍhanasaṅkhāto paticayo atthi, icchitabboti attho. Padhānanti kho meghiya
atk-s0503a:817_6: vadamānaṃ kinti vadeyyāmāti “samaṇadhammaṃ karomī”ti taṃ vadamānaṃ mayaṃ aññaṃ kiṃ nāma vadeyyāma?
atk-s0503a:818_0: Divāvihāraṃ nisīdīti divāvihāratthāya nisīdi. Nisinno ca yasmiṃ maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe
atk-s0503a:818_1: pubbe anupaṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni rājā hutvā uyyānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto vividhanāṭakaparivāro
atk-s0503a:818_2: nisinnapubbo, tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nisīdi. Athassa nisinnakālato paṭṭhāya samaṇabhāvo
atk-s0503a:818_3: vigato viya ahosi, rājavesaṃ gahetvā nāṭakaparivāraparivuto setacchattassa heṭṭhā
atk-s0503a:818_4: mahārahe pallaṅke nisinno viya jāto. Athassa taṃ sampattiṃ assādayato kāmavitakko
atk-s0503a:818_5: udapādi. So tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sahoḍḍhaṃ gahite dve core ānetvā purato ṭhapite viya
atk-s0503a:818_6: addasa. Tesu ekassa vadhaṃ āṇāpanavasena byāpādavitakko uppajji, ekassa bandhanaṃ
atk-s0503a:818_7: āṇāpanavasena vihiṃsāvitakko, evaṃ so latājālena rukkho viya madhumakkhikāhi madhughātako
atk-s0503a:818_8: viya ca akusalavitakkehi parikkhitto samparikiṇṇo ahosi. Taṃ sandhāya “atha kho āyasmato
atk-s0503a:819_0: Acchariyaṃ vata bhoti garahaṇacchariyaṃ nāma kiretaṃ yathā āyasmā ānando bhagavato
atk-s0503a:819_1: valiyagattaṃ disvā avoca “acchariyaṃ, bhante, abbhutaṃ, bhante”ti. Apare pana “tasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:819_2: samaye pupphaphalapallavādīsu lobhavasena kāmavitakko, kharassarānaṃ pakkhiādīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:819_3: saddassavanena byāpādavitakko, leḍḍuādīhi tesaṃ paṭibāhanādhippāyena vihiṃsāvitakko,
atk-s0503a:819_4: ‘idhevāhaṃ vaseyya’nti tattha sāpekkhatāvasena kāmavitakko, vanacarake tattha tattha
atk-s0503a:819_5: disvā tesu cittadubbhanena byāpādavitakko, tesaṃ viheṭhanādhippāyena vihiṃsāvitakko
atk-s0503a:819_6: tassa uppajjī”tipi vadanti. Yathā vā tathā vā tassa micchāvitakkuppattiyeva acchariyakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:819_7: Anvāsattāti anulaggā vokiṇṇā. Attani garumhi ca ekattepi bahuvacanaṃ dissati. “Anusanto”tipi pāṭho.
atk-s0503a:820_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti evaṃ micchāvitakkehi samparikiṇṇo kammaṭṭhānasappāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:820_1: kātuṃ asakkonto “idaṃ vata disvā dīghadassī bhagavā paṭisedhesī”ti sallakkhetvā “imaṃ
atk-s0503a:820_2: kāraṇaṃ dasabalassa ārocessāmī”ti nisinnāsanato vuṭṭhāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0503a:820_3: Upasaṅkamitvā ca “idha mayhaṃ, bhante”tiādinā attano pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0503a:821_0: Tattha yebhuyyenāti bahulaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ. Pāpakāti lāmakā. Akusalāti akosallasambhūtā.
atk-s0503a:821_1: Duggatisampāpanaṭṭhena vā pāpakā, kusalapaṭipakkhatāya akusalā. Vitakketi ūhati ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:821_2: cittaṃ abhiniropetīti vitakko, kāmasahagato vitakko kāmavitakko, kilesakāmasampayutto
atk-s0503a:821_3: vatthukāmārammaṇo vitakkoti attho. Byāpādasahagato vitakko byāpādavitakko. Vihiṃsāsahagato
atk-s0503a:821_4: vitakko vihiṃsāvitakko. Tesu kāmānaṃ abhinandanavasena pavatto nekkhammapaṭipakkho
atk-s0503a:821_5: kāmavitakko, “ime sattā haññantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesu”nti sattesu sampadussanavasena
atk-s0503a:821_6: pavatto mettāpaṭipakkho byāpādavitakko, pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhi sattānaṃ viheṭhetukāmatāvasena
atk-s0503a:822_0: Kasmā panassa bhagavā tattha gamanaṃ anujāni? “Ananuññātopi cāyaṃ maṃ ohāya gacchissateva,
atk-s0503a:822_1: ‘paricārakāmatāya maññe bhagavā gantuṃ na detī’ti cassa siyā aññathattaṃ. Tadassa
atk-s0503a:823_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ attano pavattiṃ ārocetvā nisinne athassa bhagavā sappāyaṃ dhammaṃ desento
atk-s0503a:823_2: appattāya. Cetovimuttiyāti kilesehi cetaso vimuttiyā. Pubbabhāge hi tadaṅgavasena
atk-s0503a:823_3: ceva vikkhambhanavasena ca kilesehi cetaso vimutti hoti, aparabhāge samucchedavasena
atk-s0503a:823_4: ceva paṭipassaddhivasena ca. Sāyaṃ vimutti heṭṭhā vitthārato kathitāva, tasmā tattha
atk-s0503a:823_5: vuttanayena veditabbā. Tattha vimuttiparipācanīyehi dhammehi āsaye paripācite pabodhite
atk-s0503a:823_6: vipassanāya maggagabbhaṃ gaṇhantiyā paripākaṃ gacchantiyā cetovimutti paripakkā nāma
atk-s0503a:824: Katame pana vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā? Saddhindriyādīnaṃ visuddhikaraṇavasena pannarasa dhammā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0503a:825: “Assaddhe puggale parivajjayato, saddhe puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, pasādanīye suttante paccavekkhato – imehi tīhākārehi saddhindriyaṃ visujjhati.
atk-s0503a:826: “Kusīte puggale parivajjayato, āraddhavīriye puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, sammappadhāne paccavekkhato – imehi tīhākārehi vīriyindriyaṃ visujjhati.
atk-s0503a:827: “Muṭṭhassatī puggale parivajjayato, upaṭṭhitassatī puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, satipaṭṭhāne paccavekkhato – imehi tīhākārehi satindriyaṃ visujjhati.
atk-s0503a:828: “Asamāhite puggale parivajjayato, samāhite puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, jhānavimokkhe paccavekkhato – imehi tīhākārehi samādhindriyaṃ visujjhati.
atk-s0503a:829: “Duppaññe puggale parivajjayato, paññavante puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ paccavekkhato – imehi tīhākārehi paññindriyaṃ visujjhati.
atk-s0503a:830: “Iti ime pañca puggale parivajjayato, pañca puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, pañca suttante paccavekkhato – imehi pannarasahi ākārehi, imāni pañcindriyāni visujjhantī”ti.
atk-s0503a:831_0: Aparepi pannarasa dhammā vimuttiparipācanīyā – saddhāpañcamāni indriyāni, aniccasaññā
atk-s0503a:831_1: dukkhasaññā anattasaññā pahānasaññā virāgasaññāti imā pañca nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā,
atk-s0503a:831_2: kalyāṇamittatā sīlasaṃvaro abhisallekhatā vīriyārambho nibbedhikapaññāti. Tesu vineyyadamanakusalo
atk-s0503a:831_3: satthā vineyyassa meghiyattherassa ajjhāsayavasena idha kalyāṇamittatādayo vimuttiparipācanīye
atk-s0503a:831_4: dhamme dassento “pañca dhammā paripākāya saṃvattantī”ti vatvā te vitthārento “idha,
atk-s0503a:832_0: Tattha kalyāṇamittoti kalyāṇo bhaddo sundaro mitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto. Yassa sīlādiguṇasampanno
atk-s0503a:832_1: “aghassa ghātā, hitassa vidhātā”ti evaṃ sabbākārena upakāro mitto hoti, so puggalo
atk-s0503a:832_2: kalyāṇamittova. Yathāvuttehi kalyāṇapuggaleheva sabbiriyāpathesu saha ayati pavattati,
atk-s0503a:832_3: na vinā tehīti kalyāṇasahāyo.Kalyāṇapuggalesu eva cittena ceva kāyena ca ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena
atk-s0503a:832_4: pavattatīti kalyāṇasampavaṅko. Padattayena kalyāṇamittasaṃsagge ādaraṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0503a:833_0: Tatridaṃ kalyāṇamittalakkhaṇaṃ – idha kalyāṇamitto saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno
atk-s0503a:833_1: sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
atk-s0503a:833_2: Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ kammaphalañca, tena sammāsambodhihetubhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:833_3: sattesu hitesitaṃ na pariccajati. Sīlasampattiyā sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti manāpo
atk-s0503a:833_4: garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo, sutasampattiyā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ
atk-s0503a:833_5: gambhīrānaṃ kathānaṃ kattā hoti, cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto
atk-s0503a:833_6: asaṃsaṭṭho, vīriyasampattiyā āraddhavīriyo hoti sattānaṃ hitappaṭipattiyā, satisampattiyā
atk-s0503a:833_7: upaṭṭhitassati hoti, samādhisampattiyā avikkhitto hoti samāhitacitto, paññāsampattiyā
atk-s0503a:833_8: aviparītaṃ jānāti. So satiyā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamāno paññāya sattānaṃ
atk-s0503a:833_9: hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā, samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā, vīriyena satte
atk-s0503a:835: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojaye”ti. ;
atk-s0503a:836_0: Ayaṃ paṭhamo dhammo paripākāya saṃvattatīti, ayaṃ kalyāṇamittatāsaṅkhāto brahmacariyavāsassa
atk-s0503a:836_1: ādibhāvato, sabbesañca kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bahukāratāya padhānabhāvato ca imesu pañcasu
atk-s0503a:836_2: dhammesu ādito vuttattā paṭhamo anavajjadhammo avisuddhānaṃ saddhādīnaṃ visuddhikaraṇavasena
atk-s0503a:836_3: cetovimuttiyā paripākāya saṃvattati. Ettha ca kalyāṇamittassa bahukāratā padhānatā
atk-s0503a:836_4: ca “upaḍḍhamidaṃ, bhante, brahmacariyassa yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā”ti vadantaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ,
atk-s0503a:836_5: “mā hevaṃ, ānandā”ti dvikkhattuṃ paṭisedhetvā, “sakalameva hidaṃ, ānanda, brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:837_0: Puna caparanti puna ca aparaṃ dhammajātaṃ. Sīlavāti ettha kenaṭṭhena sīlaṃ? Sīlanaṭṭhena
atk-s0503a:837_1: sīlaṃ. Kimidaṃ sīlanaṃ nāma? Samādhānaṃ, kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena avippakiṇṇatāti
atk-s0503a:837_2: attho. Atha vā upadhāraṇaṃ, jhānādikusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhānavasena ādhārabhāvoti
atk-s0503a:837_3: attho. Tasmā sīleti sīlatīti vā sīlaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva saddalakkhaṇanayena sīlattho. Apare
atk-s0503a:837_4: pana “siraṭṭho sītalaṭṭho sīlaṭṭho saṃvaraṭṭho”ti niruttinayena atthaṃ vaṇṇenti.
atk-s0503a:837_5: Tayidaṃ pāripūrito atisayato vā sīlaṃ assa atthīti sīlavā, sīlasampannoti attho.
atk-s0503a:838_0: Yathā ca sīlavā hoti sīlasampanno, taṃ dassetuṃ “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:838_1: Tattha pātimokkhanti sikkhāpadasīlaṃ. Tañhi yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti
atk-s0503a:838_2: āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhaṃ. Saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvaro, kāyavācāhi avītikkamo. Pātimokkhameva
atk-s0503a:838_3: saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro, tena saṃvuto pihitakāyavācoti pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto,
atk-s0503a:838_4: idamassa tasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Viharatīti tadanurūpavihārasamaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:838_5: Ācāragocarasampannoti heṭṭhā pātimokkhasaṃvarassa, upari visesānaṃ yogassa ca upakārakadhammaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:838_6: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti pātimokkhasīlato acavanadhammatāparidīpanaṃ. Samādāyāti
atk-s0503a:838_7: sikkhāpadānaṃ anavasesato ādānaparidīpanaṃ. Sikkhatīti sikkhāya samaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:839_0: Aparo nayo – kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato, pāpakiriyāya sukarabhāvato, puññakiriyāya ca
atk-s0503a:839_1: dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī, puthujjano. Aniccatāya vā
atk-s0503a:839_2: bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭīyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti
atk-s0503a:839_3: pātī, maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa patanasīloti vā pātī,
atk-s0503a:839_4: sattasantāno cittameva vā. Taṃ pātinaṃ saṃsāradukkhato mokkhetīti pātimokkhaṃ. Cittassa
atk-s0503a:839_5: hi vimokkhena satto “vimutto”ti vuccati. Vuttañhi “cittavodānā sattā visujjhantī”ti,
atk-s0503a:840_0: Atha vā avijjādihetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti, “avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ
atk-s0503a:840_1: sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ. Tassa pātino sattassa
atk-s0503a:840_2: taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkho, “kaṇṭhekālo”tiādīnaṃ viya samāsasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:841_0: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkhehīti pāti, cittaṃ. Vuttañhi “cittena niyyatī loko,
atk-s0503a:841_1: cittena parikassatī”ti. Tassa pātino mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe
atk-s0503a:841_2: saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti, taṇhādisaṃkilesā. Vuttañhi – “taṇhā janeti purisaṃ, taṇhādutiyo
atk-s0503a:841_3: puriso”ti cādi. Tato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkho.
atk-s0503a:842_0: Atha vā patati etthāti pāti, cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni. Vuttañhi – “chasu
atk-s0503a:842_1: loko samuppanno, chasu kubbati santhava”nti. Tato cha ajjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātapātito
atk-s0503a:842_2: mokkhoti pātimokkho. Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. Tato mokkhoti pātimokkho.
atk-s0503a:843_0: Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā patīti vuccati, muccati etenāti
atk-s0503a:843_1: mokkho. Patino mokkho tena paññattattāti patimokkho, patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Sabbaguṇānaṃ
atk-s0503a:843_2: vā tammūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca, so yathāvuttaṭṭhena mokkho cāti patimokkho,
atk-s0503a:843_3: patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhantiādimetaṃ mukhameta”nti vitthāro.
atk-s0503a:844_0: Atha vā paiti pakāre, atīti accantatthe nipāto, tasmā pakārehi accantaṃ mokkhetīti
atk-s0503a:844_1: pātimokkhaṃ. Idañhi sīlaṃ sayaṃ tadaṅgavasena, samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena
atk-s0503a:844_2: samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkhaṃ. Pati mokkhoti vā patimokkho,
atk-s0503a:844_3: tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho. Patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Mokkhoti
atk-s0503a:844_4: vā nibbānaṃ, tassa mokkhassa paṭibimbabhūtoti patimokkho. Sīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa
atk-s0503a:844_5: aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo ca yathārahaṃ saṃkilesanibbāpanato.
atk-s0503a:844_6: Patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Pativattati mokkheti dukkhanti vā patimokkhaṃ, patimokkhameva
atk-s0503a:844_7: pātimokkhanti evaṃ tāvettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:845_0: Saṃvarati pidahati etenāti saṃvaro, pātimokkhameva saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro. Atthato
atk-s0503a:845_1: pana tato tato vītikkamitabbato viratiyo cetanā ca. Tena pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto
atk-s0503a:846: “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato, tena vuccati pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti.
atk-s0503a:848_1: anācāraṃ vajjetvā “kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo”ti
atk-s0503a:848_3: upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānasaṅkhātena gocarena ca sampannattā ācāragocarasampanno.
atk-s0503a:849_0: Apica yo bhikkhu satthari sagāravo sappatisso sabrahmacārīsu sagāravo sappatisso
atk-s0503a:849_1: hirottappasampanno sunivattho supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena
atk-s0503a:849_2: vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena iriyāpathasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane
atk-s0503a:849_3: mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto
atk-s0503a:849_4: asaṃsaṭṭho ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo viharati, ayaṃ vuccati ācārasampanno.
atk-s0503a:850_0: Gocaro pana upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti tividho. Tattha yo
atk-s0503a:850_1: dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato vuttalakkhaṇo kalyāṇamitto, yaṃ nissāya asutaṃ suṇāti,
atk-s0503a:850_2: sutaṃ pariyodāpeti, kaṅkhaṃ vitarati, diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karoti, cittaṃ pasādeti, yañca
atk-s0503a:850_3: anusikkhanto saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena, paññāya vaḍḍhati, ayaṃ vuccati upanissayagocaro.
atk-s0503a:851_0: Yo bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthiṃ paṭipanno okkhittacakkhu yugamattadassāvī
atk-s0503a:851_1: cakkhundriyasaṃvutova gacchati, na hatthiṃ olokento, na assaṃ, na rathaṃ, na pattiṃ,
atk-s0503a:851_2: na itthiṃ, na purisaṃ olokento, na uddhaṃ olokento, na adho olokento, na disāvidisaṃ
atk-s0503a:852: Upanibandhagocaro pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, yattha bhikkhu attano cittaṃ upanibandhati, vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0503a:853: “Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo, yadidaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
atk-s0503a:854: Tattha upanissayagocarassa pubbe vuttattā itaresaṃ vasenettha gocaro veditabbo. Iti yathāvuttāya ācārasampattiyā, imāya ca gocarasampattiyā samannāgatattā ācāragocarasampanno.
atk-s0503a:855_0: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti appamattakattā aṇuppamāṇesu assatiyā asañcicca
atk-s0503a:855_1: āpannasekhiyaakusalacittuppādādibhedesu vajjesu bhayadassanasīlo. Yo hi bhikkhu paramāṇumattaṃ
atk-s0503a:855_3: katvā passati, yopi sabbalahukaṃ dubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ katvā passati,
atk-s0503a:855_4: ayampi aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī nāma. Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci
atk-s0503a:855_5: sikkhāpadesu sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ sammā ādiyitvā
atk-s0503a:856_0: Abhisallekhikāti ativiya kilesānaṃ sallekhanī, tesaṃ tanubhāvāya pahānāya yuttarūpā.
atk-s0503a:856_1: Cetovivaraṇasappāyāti cetaso paṭicchādakānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvakaraṇena cetovivaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ
atk-s0503a:856_2: samathavipassanānaṃ sappāyā, samathavipassanācittasseva vā vivaraṇāya pākaṭīkaraṇāya
atk-s0503a:857_0: Idāni yena nibbidādiāvahanena ayaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ca nāma
atk-s0503a:857_1: hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “ekantanibbidāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ekantanibbidāyāti ekaṃseneva
atk-s0503a:857_2: vaṭṭadukkhato nibbindanatthāya. Virāgāya nirodhāyāti tasseva virajjanatthāya ca nirujjhanatthāya
atk-s0503a:857_3: ca. Upasamāyāti sabbakilesūpasamāya. Abhiññāyāti sabbassāpi abhiññeyyassa abhijānanāya.
atk-s0503a:857_4: Sambodhāyāti catumaggasambodhāya. Nibbānāyāti anupādisesanibbānāya. Etesu hi ādito
atk-s0503a:857_5: tīhi padehi vipassanā vuttā, dvīhi maggo, dvīhi nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ. Samathavipassanā
atk-s0503a:857_6: ādiṃ katvā nibbānapariyosāno ayaṃ sabbo uttarimanussadhammo dasakathāvatthulābhino sijjhatīti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:858_0: Idāni taṃ kathaṃ vibhajitvā dassento “appicchakathā”tiādimāha. Tattha appicchoti
atk-s0503a:858_1: na iccho, tassa kathā appicchakathā, appicchabhāvappaṭisaṃyuttā kathā vā appicchakathā.
atk-s0503a:858_2: Ettha ca atriccho pāpiccho mahiccho appicchoti icchāvasena cattāro puggalā. Tesu
atk-s0503a:858_3: attanā yathāladdhena lābhena atitto uparūpari lābhaṃ icchanto atriccho nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:863: Lābhasakkārasilokanikāmayatāya asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyo pāpiccho. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:864: “Tattha katamā kuhanā? Lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassa pāpicchassa icchāpakatassa paccayappaṭisevanasaṅkhātena vā sāmantajappitena vā iriyāpathassa vā aṭhapanā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:865: Santaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyo paṭiggahaṇe amattaññū mahiccho. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:866: “Idhekacco saddho samāno ‘saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati, sīlavā samāno ‘sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchatī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:867: Duttappiyatāya hissa vijātamātāpi cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0503a:870_0: Ete pana atricchatādayo dose ārakā parivajjetvā santaguṇanigūhanādhippāyo paṭiggahaṇe
atk-s0503a:870_1: ca mattaññū appiccho. So attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ paṭicchādetukāmatāya saddho samāno
atk-s0503a:870_2: “saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati, sīlavā, bahussuto, pavivitto, āraddhavīriyo,
atk-s0503a:870_3: upaṭṭhitassati, samāhito, paññavā samāno “paññavāti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati.
atk-s0503a:871_0: Svāyaṃ paccayappiccho dhutaṅgappiccho pariyattiappiccho adhigamappicchoti catubbidho.
atk-s0503a:871_1: Tattha catūsu paccayesu appiccho paccayadāyakaṃ deyyadhammaṃ attano thāmañca oloketvā
atk-s0503a:871_2: sacepi hi deyyadhammo bahu hoti, dāyako appaṃ dātukāmo, dāyakassa vasena appameva
atk-s0503a:871_3: gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammo ce appo, dāyako bahuṃ dātukāmo, deyyadhammassa vasena appameva
atk-s0503a:871_4: gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammopi ce bahu, dāyakopi bahuṃ dātukāmo, attano thāmaṃ ñatvā pamāṇayuttameva
atk-s0503a:871_5: gaṇhāti. Evarūpo hi bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti, uppannaṃ lābhaṃ thāvaraṃ
atk-s0503a:871_6: karoti, dāyakānaṃ cittaṃ ārādheti. Dhutaṅgasamādānassa pana attani atthibhāvaṃ na
atk-s0503a:871_7: jānāpetukāmo dhutaṅgappiccho. Yo attano bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati, ayaṃ
atk-s0503a:871_8: pariyattiappiccho. Yo pana sotāpannādīsu aññataro hutvā sabrahmacārīnampi attano
atk-s0503a:871_9: sotāpannādibhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati, ayaṃ adhigamappiccho. Evametesaṃ appicchānaṃ
atk-s0503a:871_10: yā appicchatā, tassā saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā anekākāravokāraānisaṃsavibhāvanavasena,
atk-s0503a:871_11: tappaṭipakkhassa atricchādibhedassa icchācārassa ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā
atk-s0503a:872_0: Santuṭṭhikathāti ettha santuṭṭhīti sakena attanā laddhena tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi. Atha
atk-s0503a:872_1: vā visamaṃ paccayicchaṃ pahāya samaṃ tuṭṭhi, santuṭṭhi. Santena vā vijjamānena tuṭṭhi
atk-s0503a:875_0: Sammā vā ñāyena bhagavatā anuññātavidhinā paccayehi tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi. Atthato itarītarapaccayasantoso,
atk-s0503a:875_1: so dvādasavidho hoti. Kathaṃ? Cīvare yathālābhasantoso, yathābalasantoso, yathāsāruppasantosoti
atk-s0503a:876_0: Tatrāyaṃ pabhedavaṇṇanā – idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā,
atk-s0503a:876_1: so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayamassa cīvare yathālābhasantoso.
atk-s0503a:876_2: Atha pana pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā, garuṃ cīvaraṃ pārupanto kilamati,
atk-s0503a:876_3: so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
atk-s0503a:876_4: ayamassa cīvare yathābalasantoso. Aparo paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ
atk-s0503a:876_5: labhitvā “idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ, idaṃ bahussutānaṃ anurūpaṃ, idaṃ gilānānaṃ
atk-s0503a:876_6: dubbalānaṃ, idaṃ appalābhīnaṃ vā hotū”ti tesaṃ datvā attanā saṅkārakūṭādito nantakāni
atk-s0503a:876_7: uccinitvā saṅghāṭiṃ katvā tesaṃ vā purāṇacīvarāni gahetvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova
atk-s0503a:877_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ
atk-s0503a:877_1: na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathālābhasantoso. Atha pana
atk-s0503a:877_2: ābādhiko hoti, lūkhaṃ pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0503a:877_3: gāḷhaṃ rogātaṅkaṃ pāpuṇāti, so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ
atk-s0503a:877_4: bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathābalasantoso.
atk-s0503a:877_5: Aparo bhikkhu paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, so “ayaṃ piṇḍapāto cirapabbajitādīnaṃ anurūpo”ti
atk-s0503a:877_6: cīvaraṃ viya tesaṃ datvā, tesaṃ vā santakaṃ gahetvā, attanā piṇḍāya caritvā, missakāhāraṃ
atk-s0503a:877_7: vā paribhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathāsāruppasantoso.
atk-s0503a:878_0: Idha pana bhikkhuno senāsanaṃ pāpuṇāti manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā antamaso tiṇakuṭikāpi
atk-s0503a:878_1: tiṇasanthārakampi, so teneva santussati, puna aññaṃ sundarataraṃ vā pāpuṇāti, taṃ
atk-s0503a:878_2: na gaṇhāti, ayamassa senāsane yathālābhasantoso. Atha pana ābādhiko hoti dubbalo
atk-s0503a:878_3: vā, so byādhiviruddhaṃ vā pakativiruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati, yatthassa vasato
atk-s0503a:878_4: aphāsu hoti, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasitvā
atk-s0503a:878_5: samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa senāsane yathābalasantoso. Aparo
atk-s0503a:878_6: sundaraṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati “paṇītasenāsanaṃ pamādaṭṭhāna”nti, mahāpuññatāya
atk-s0503a:878_7: vā leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati, so tāni cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitādīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:878_8: datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa senāsane yathāsāruppasantoso.
atk-s0503a:879_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva tussati, aññaṃ
atk-s0503a:879_1: na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayamassa gilānapaccaye yathālābhasantoso. Atha
atk-s0503a:879_2: pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā, tassa hatthato
atk-s0503a:879_3: telaṃ gahetvā, bhesajjaṃ katvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa
atk-s0503a:879_4: gilānapaccaye yathābalasantoso. Aparo mahāpuñño bahuṃ telamadhuphāṇitādipaṇītabhesajjaṃ
atk-s0503a:879_5: labhati, so taṃ cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitādīnaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatena yena kenaci
atk-s0503a:879_6: bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ, ekasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:879_7: catumadhuraṃ ṭhapetvā “gaṇhatha, bhante, yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu aññatarenapi
atk-s0503a:879_8: rogo vūpasammati, “muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇitaṃ, pūtimuttabhesajjaṃ nissāya
atk-s0503a:879_9: pabbajjā, tattha te yāvajīvaṃ ussāho karaṇīyo”ti vacanamanussaranto catumadhuraṃ
atk-s0503a:879_10: paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa
atk-s0503a:880_0: So evaṃpabhedo sabbopi santoso santuṭṭhīti pavuccati. Tena vuttaṃ “atthato itarītarapaccayasantoso”ti.
atk-s0503a:880_2: atricchatādibhedassa icchāpakatattassa ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā kathā santuṭṭhikathā.
atk-s0503a:880_3: Ito parāsupi kathāsu eseva nayo, visesamattameva vakkhāma.
atk-s0503a:881_0: Pavivekakathāti ettha kāyaviveko cittaviveko upadhivivekoti tayo vivekā. Tesu eko
atk-s0503a:881_1: gacchati, eko tiṭṭhati, eko nisīdati, eko seyyaṃ kappeti, eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati,
atk-s0503a:881_2: eko paṭikkamati, eko abhikkamati, eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, eko carati, eko viharatīti
atk-s0503a:881_3: evaṃ sabbiriyāpathesu sabbakiccesu gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vivittavāso kāyaviveko nāma.
atk-s0503a:881_4: Aṭṭha samāpattiyo pana cittaviveko nāma. Nibbānaṃ upadhiviveko nāma. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0503a:882: “Kāyaviveko ca vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṃ nekkhammābhiratānaṃ, cittaviveko ca parisuddhacittānaṃ paramavodānappattānaṃ, upadhiviveko ca nirupadhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ visaṅkhāragatāna”nti.
atk-s0503a:884_0: Asaṃsaggakathāti ettha savanasaṃsaggo dassanasaṃsaggo samullapanasaṃsaggo sambhogasaṃsaggo
atk-s0503a:884_1: kāyasaṃsaggoti pañca saṃsaggā. Tesu idhekacco bhikkhu suṇāti “asukasmiṃ gāme vā nigame
atk-s0503a:884_2: vā itthī abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā”ti, so
atk-s0503a:884_3: taṃ sutvā saṃsīdati visīdati, na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya
atk-s0503a:884_5: nāma. Na heva kho bhikkhu suṇāti, apica kho sāmaṃ passati itthiṃ abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ
atk-s0503a:884_6: pāsādikaṃ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ, so taṃ disvā saṃsīdati visīdati,
atk-s0503a:884_7: na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati, evaṃ visabhāgārammaṇadassanena
atk-s0503a:884_8: uppannakilesasanthavo dassanasaṃsaggo nāma. Disvā pana aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpavasena
atk-s0503a:884_9: uppanno kilesasanthavo samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma. Sahajagghanādīnipi eteneva saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0503a:884_10: Attano pana santakaṃ yaṃkiñci mātugāmassa datvā vā adatvā vā tena dinnassa vanabhaṅgiyādino
atk-s0503a:884_11: paribhogavasena uppannakilesasanthavo sambhogasaṃsaggo nāma. Mātugāmassa hatthaggāhādivasena
atk-s0503a:885: “Gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikena saṃsaggena sahasokī sahanandī sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā uyyogaṃ āpajjatī”ti –
atk-s0503a:886_0: Evaṃ vutto ananulomiko gihisaṃsaggo, yo ca sabrahmacārīhipi kilesuppattihetubhūto
atk-s0503a:886_1: saṃsaggo, taṃ sabbaṃ pahāya yvāyaṃ saṃsāre thirataraṃ saṃvegaṃ, saṅkhāresu tibbaṃ
atk-s0503a:886_2: bhayasaññaṃ, sarīre paṭikūlasaññaṃ, sabbākusalesu jigucchāpubbaṅgamaṃ hirottappaṃ,
atk-s0503a:886_3: sabbakiriyāsu satisampajaññanti sabbaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā kamaladale jalabindu viya
atk-s0503a:886_4: sabbattha alaggabhāvo, ayaṃ sabbasaṃsaggappaṭipakkhatāya asaṃsaggo. Tappaṭisaṃyuttā
atk-s0503a:887_0: Vīriyārambhakathāti ettha vīrassa bhāvo, kammanti vā vīriyaṃ, vidhinā īrayitabbaṃ
atk-s0503a:887_1: pavattetabbanti vā vīriyaṃ, vīriyañca taṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ
atk-s0503a:887_2: dhammānaṃ upasampadāya ārambhanaṃ vīriyārambho. Svāyaṃ kāyiko cetasiko cāti duvidho,
atk-s0503a:887_3: ārambhadhātu, nikkamadhātu, parakkamadhātu cāti tividho; sammappadhānavasena catubbidho.
atk-s0503a:887_4: So sabbopi yo bhikkhu gamane uppannaṃ kilesaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti; ṭhāne uppannaṃ
atk-s0503a:887_5: nisajjaṃ, nisajjāya uppannaṃ sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti, tattha tattheva ajapadena
atk-s0503a:887_6: daṇḍena kaṇhasappaṃ uppīḷetvā gaṇhanto viya, tikhiṇena asinā amittaṃ gīvāya paharanto
atk-s0503a:887_7: viya ca sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ adatvā vīriyabalena niggaṇhāti, tassevaṃ āraddhavīriyassa
atk-s0503a:888_0: Sīlakathādīsu duvidhaṃ sīlaṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca. Tattha lokiyaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarādi
atk-s0503a:888_1: catupārisuddhisīlaṃ, lokuttaraṃ maggasīlaṃ phalasīlañca. Tathā vipassanāya pādakabhūtā
atk-s0503a:888_2: saha upacārena aṭṭha samāpattiyo lokiyo samādhi, maggasampayutto panettha lokuttaro
atk-s0503a:888_3: samādhi nāma. Tathā paññāpi lokiyā sutamayā cintāmayā jhānasampayuttā vipassanāñāṇañca.
atk-s0503a:888_4: Visesato panettha vipassanāpaññā gahetabbā, lokuttarā maggapaññā phalapaññā ca. Vimuttīpi
atk-s0503a:888_6: vasenettha atthaṃ vaṇṇenti. Vimuttiñāṇadassanampi ekūnavīsatividhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:888_7: Iti imesaṃ sīlādīnaṃ saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā anekākāravokāraānisaṃsavibhāvanavasena
atk-s0503a:888_8: ceva tappaṭipakkhānaṃ dussīlyādīnaṃ ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā kathā, tappaṭisaṃyuttā
atk-s0503a:889_0: Ettha ca “attanā ca appiccho hoti, appicchakathañca paresaṃ kattā”ti “santuṭṭho hoti
atk-s0503a:889_1: itarītarena cīvarena, itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī”ti ca ādivacanato sayañca
atk-s0503a:889_2: appicchatādiguṇasamannāgatena paresampi tadatthāya hitajjhāsayena pavattetabbā tathārūpī
atk-s0503a:889_3: kathā, yā idha abhisallekhikādibhāvena visesetvā vuttā appicchakathādīti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:889_4: Kārakasseva hi kathā visesato adhippetatthasādhinī. Tathā hi vakkhati “kalyāṇamittassetaṃ,
atk-s0503a:890_0: Evarūpāyāti īdisāya, yathāvuttāya. Nikāmalābhīti yathicchitalābhī yathārucilābhī,
atk-s0503a:890_1: sabbakālaṃ imā kathā sotuṃ vicāretuñca yathāsukhaṃ labhanto. Akicchalābhīti niddukkhalābhī.
atk-s0503a:891_0: Āraddhavīriyoti paggahitavīriyo. Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāyāti akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena
atk-s0503a:891_1: akusalānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pajahanatthāya. Kusalānaṃ dhammānanti kucchitānaṃ salanādiatthena
atk-s0503a:891_2: anavajjaṭṭhena ca kusalānaṃ sahavipassanānaṃ maggaphaladhammānaṃ. Upasampadāyāti
atk-s0503a:891_3: sampādanāya, attano santāne uppādanāya. Thāmavāti ussoḷhisaṅkhātena vīriyathāmena
atk-s0503a:891_4: samannāgato. Daḷhaparakkamoti thiraparakkamo asithilavīriyo. Anikkhittadhuroti anorohitadhuro anosakkitavīriyo.
atk-s0503a:892_0: Paññavāti vipassanāpaññāya paññavā. Udayatthagāminiyāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayañca
atk-s0503a:892_1: vayañca paṭivijjhantiyā. Ariyāyāti vikkhambhanavasena kilesehi ārakā dūre ṭhitāya
atk-s0503a:892_2: niddosāya. Nibbedhikāyāti nibbedhabhāgiyāya. Sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyāti vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0503a:892_3: khepanato “dukkhakkhayo”ti laddhanāmaṃ ariyamaggaṃ sammā hetunā ñāyena gacchantiyā.
atk-s0503a:893_0: Imesu ca pana pañcasu dhammesu sīlaṃ vīriyaṃ paññā ca yogino ajjhattikaṃ aṅgaṃ, itaradvayaṃ
atk-s0503a:893_1: bāhiraṃ aṅgaṃ. Tathāpi kalyāṇamittasannissayeneva sesaṃ catubbidhaṃ ijjhati, kalyāṇamittassevettha
atk-s0503a:893_2: bahūpakārataṃ dassento satthā “kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkha”ntiādinā
atk-s0503a:893_3: desanaṃ vaḍḍheti. Tattha pāṭikaṅkhanti ekaṃsena icchitabbaṃ, avassaṃbhāvīti attho.
atk-s0503a:893_4: Yanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “sīlavā bhavissatī”ti ettha yadetaṃ kalyāṇamittassa
atk-s0503a:893_5: bhikkhuno sīlavantatāya bhavanaṃ sīlasampannattaṃ, tassa bhikkhuno sīlasampannattā
atk-s0503a:893_6: etaṃ tassa pāṭikaṅkhaṃ, avassaṃbhāvī ekaṃseneva tassa tattha niyojanatoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:894_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sadevake loke uttamakalyāṇamittasaṅkhātassa attano vacanaṃ anādiyitvā
atk-s0503a:894_1: taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā tādisaṃ vippakāraṃ pattassa āyasmato meghiyassa kalyāṇamittatādinā
atk-s0503a:894_2: sakalaṃ sāsanasampattiṃ dassetvā, idānissa tattha ādarajātassa pubbe yehi kāmavitakkādīhi
atk-s0503a:894_3: upaddutattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajji, tassa tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtattā ca bhāvanānayaṃ
atk-s0503a:894_4: pakāsetvā, tato paraṃ arahattassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto, “tena ca pana, meghiya,
atk-s0503a:894_5: bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:894_6: Tattha tenāti evaṃ kalyāṇamittasannissayena yathāvuttasīlādiguṇasamannāgatena. Tenevāha
atk-s0503a:894_7: “imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāyā”ti. Uttarīti āraddhataruṇavipassanassa rāgādiparissayā
atk-s0503a:894_8: ce uppajjeyyuṃ, tesaṃ visodhanatthaṃ tato uddhaṃ cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā uppādetabbā vaḍḍhetabbā ca.
atk-s0503a:895_0: Asubhāti ekādasasu asubhakammaṭṭhānesu yathārahaṃ yattha katthaci asubhabhāvanā.
