atk-s0503a:895_1: Rāgassa pahānāyāti kāmarāgassa pajahanatthāya. Ayamattho sālilāyakopamāya vibhāvetabbo
atk-s0503a:895_2: – eko hi puriso asitaṃ gahetvā koṭito paṭṭhāya sālikhette sāliyo lāyati, athassa
atk-s0503a:895_3: vatiṃ bhinditvā gāvo pavisiṃsu. So asitaṃ ṭhapetvā, yaṭṭhiṃ ādāya, teneva maggena
atk-s0503a:895_4: gāvo nīharitvā, vatiṃ pākatikaṃ katvā, puna asitaṃ gahetvā sāliyo lāyi. Tattha sālikhettaṃ
atk-s0503a:895_5: viya buddhasāsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, sālilāyako viya yogāvacaro, asitaṃ viya paññā, lāyanakālo
atk-s0503a:895_6: viya vipassanāya kammakaraṇakālo, yaṭṭhi viya asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ, vati viya saṃvaro,
atk-s0503a:895_7: vatiṃ bhinditvā gāvīnaṃ pavisanaṃ viya sahasā appaṭisaṅkhāya pamādaṃ āgamma rāgassa
atk-s0503a:895_8: uppajjanaṃ, asitaṃ ṭhapetvā, yaṭṭhiṃ ādāya, paviṭṭhamaggeneva gāvo nīharitvā, vatiṃ
atk-s0503a:895_9: paṭipākatikaṃ katvā, puna ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya sālilāyanaṃ viya asubhakammaṭṭhānena
atk-s0503a:895_10: rāgaṃ vikkhambhetvā, puna vipassanāya kammakaraṇakāloti idamettha upamāsaṃsandanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:895_11: Evaṃbhūtaṃ bhāvanāvidhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:896_0: Mettāti mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ. Byāpādassa pahānāyāti vuttanayeneva uppannakopassa pajahanatthāya.
atk-s0503a:896_1: Ānāpānassatīti soḷasavatthukā ānāpānassati. Vitakkupacchedāyāti vuttanayeneva uppannānaṃ
atk-s0503a:896_2: vitakkānaṃ upacchedanatthāya. Asmimānasamugghātāyāti asmīti uppajjanakassa navavidhassa
atk-s0503a:896_3: mānassa samucchedanatthāya. Aniccasaññinoti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato pabhaṅguto
atk-s0503a:896_4: tāvakālikato niccappaṭipakkhato ca “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti pavattaaniccānupassanāvasena
atk-s0503a:896_5: aniccasaññino. Anattasaññā saṇṭhātīti asārakato avasavattanato parato rittato tucchato
atk-s0503a:896_6: suññato ca “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti evaṃ pavattā anattānupassanāsaṅkhātā anattasaññā
atk-s0503a:896_7: citte saṇṭhahati, atidaḷhaṃ patiṭṭhāti. Aniccalakkhaṇe hi diṭṭhe anattalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:896_8: diṭṭhameva hoti. Tīsu hi lakkhaṇesu ekasmiṃ diṭṭhe itaradvayaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti. Tena
atk-s0503a:896_9: vuttaṃ – “aniccasaññino hi, meghiya, anattasaññā saṇṭhātī”ti. Anattalakkhaṇe diṭṭhe
atk-s0503a:896_10: asmīti uppajjanakamāno suppajahova hotīti āha – “anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ
atk-s0503a:896_11: pāpuṇātī”ti diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānanti diṭṭheyeva dhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve apaccayaparinibbānaṃ
atk-s0503a:896_12: pāpuṇāti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana asubhādibhāvanānayo visuddhimagge vuttanayena gahetabbo.
atk-s0503a:897_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato meghiyassa micchāvitakkacorehi kusalabhaṇḍupacchedasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:897_1: atthaṃ jānitvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ avinodane vinodane ca ādīnavānisaṃsadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:898_0: Tattha khuddāti hīnā lāmakā. Vitakkāti kāmavitakkādayo tayo pāpavitakkā. Te hi sabbavitakkehi
atk-s0503a:898_1: patikiṭṭhatāya idha khuddāti vuttā “na ca khuddamācare”tiādīsu viya. Sukhumāti ñātivitakkādayo
atk-s0503a:898_2: adhippetā. Ñātivitakko janapadavitakko amarāvitakko parānuddayatāya paṭisaṃyutto
atk-s0503a:898_4: ete hi vitakkā kāmavitakkādayo viya dāruṇā na hontīti anoḷārikasabhāvatāya sukhumāti
atk-s0503a:898_5: vuttā. Anugatāti cittena anuvattitā. Vitakke hi uppajjamāne cittaṃ tadanugatameva
atk-s0503a:898_6: hoti tassa ārammaṇābhiniropanato. “Anuggatā”tipi pāḷi, anuuṭṭhitāti attho. Manaso
atk-s0503a:899_0: Ete avidvā manaso vitakketi ete kāmavitakkādike manovitakke assādādīnavanissaraṇato
atk-s0503a:899_1: ñātatīraṇapahānapariññāhi yathābhūtaṃ ajānanto. Hurā huraṃ dhāvati bhantacittoti
atk-s0503a:899_2: appahīnamicchāvitakkattā anavaṭṭhitacitto “kadāci rūpe, kadāci sadde”tiādinā tasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:899_3: tasmiṃ ārammaṇe assādādivasena aparāparaṃ dhāvati paribbhamati. Atha vā hurā huraṃ
atk-s0503a:899_4: dhāvati bhantacittoti apariññātavitakkattā tannimittānaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ vasena paribbhamanamānaso
atk-s0503a:899_5: idhalokato paralokaṃ ādānanikkhepehi aparāparaṃ dhāvati saṃsaratīti attho.
atk-s0503a:900_0: Ete ca vidvā manaso vitakketi ete yathāvuttappabhede kāmavitakkādike manovitakke
atk-s0503a:900_1: assādādito yathābhūtaṃ jānanto. Ātāpiyoti vīriyavā. Saṃvaratīti pidahati. Satimāti
atk-s0503a:900_2: satisampanno. Anuggateti dullabhavasena anuppanne. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ete vuttappakāre
atk-s0503a:900_3: kāmavitakkādike manovitakke cittassa uppilāvitahetutāya manaso uppilāve vidvā vipassanāpaññāsahitāya
atk-s0503a:900_4: maggapaññāya sammadeva jānanto, tassa sahāyabhūtānaṃ sammāvāyāmasatīnaṃ atthitāya
atk-s0503a:900_5: ātāpiyo satimā te ariyamaggabhāvanāya āyatiṃ uppattirahe anuggate anuppanne eva maggakkhaṇe
atk-s0503a:900_6: saṃvarati, ñāṇasaṃvaravasena pidahati, āgamanapathaṃ pacchindati, evaṃbhūto ca catusaccappabodhena
atk-s0503a:900_7: buddho ariyasāvako arahattādhigamena asesaṃ, anavasesaṃ ete kāmavitakkādike pajahāsi
atk-s0503a:900_8: samucchindīti. Etthāpi “anugate”tipi paṭhanti. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0503a:903_0: 32. Dutiye kusinārāyanti kusinārāyaṃ nāma mallarājūnaṃ nagare. Upavattane mallānaṃ
atk-s0503a:903_1: sālavaneti yathā hi anurādhapurassa thūpārāmo, evaṃ kusinārāya uyyānaṃ dakkhiṇapacchimadisāya
atk-s0503a:903_2: hoti. Yathā thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena nagarapavisanamaggo pācīnamukho gantvā uttarena
atk-s0503a:903_3: nivattati, evaṃ uyyānato sālapanti pācīnamukhā gantvā uttarena nivattā, tasmā “upavattana”nti
atk-s0503a:903_4: vuccati. Tasmiṃ upavattane mallarājūnaṃ sālavane. Araññakuṭikāyanti sālapantiyā avidūre
atk-s0503a:903_5: rukkhagacchasañchannaṭṭhāne katā kuṭikā, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “araññakuṭikāyaṃ viharatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:903_6: Te pana bhikkhū paṭisaṅkhānavirahitā ossaṭṭhavīriyā pamattavihārino, tena vuttaṃ “uddhatā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:904_0: Tattha uddhaccabahulattā avūpasantacittatāya uddhatā. Tucchabhāvena māno naḷo viyāti
atk-s0503a:904_1: naḷo, mānasaṅkhāto uggato naḷo etesanti unnaḷā, uggatatucchamānāti attho. Pattacīvaramaṇḍanādicāpallena
atk-s0503a:904_2: samannāgatattā bahukatāya vā capalā. Pharusavācatāya mukhena kharāti mukharā. Tiracchānakathābahulatāya
atk-s0503a:904_3: vikiṇṇā byākulā vācā etesanti vikiṇṇavācā. Muṭṭhā naṭṭhā sati etesanti muṭṭhassatino,
atk-s0503a:904_4: sativirahitā pamādavihārinoti attho. Sabbena sabbaṃ sampajaññābhāvato asampajānā.
atk-s0503a:904_5: Gaddūhanamattampi kālaṃ cittasamādhānassa abhāvato na samāhitāti asamāhitā. Lolasabhāvattā
atk-s0503a:905_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddhaccādivasena pamādavihāraṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0503a:905_1: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ pamādavihāre appamādavihāre ca yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsavibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:906_0: Tattha arakkhitenāti satiārakkhābhāvena aguttena. Kāyenāti chaviññāṇakāyena cakkhuviññāṇena
atk-s0503a:906_1: hi rūpaṃ disvā tattha nimittānubyañjanaggahaṇavasena abhijjhādipavattito viññāṇadvārassa
atk-s0503a:906_2: satiyā arakkhitabhāvato. Sotaviññāṇādīsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ chaviññāṇakāyassa arakkhitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:906_3: sandhāyāha “arakkhitena kāyenā”ti. Keci pana “kāyenā”ti atthaṃ vadanti, tesampi vuttanayeneva
atk-s0503a:906_4: atthayojanāya sati yujjeyya. Apare pana “arakkhitena cittenā”ti paṭhanti, tesampi
atk-s0503a:906_5: vuttanayo eva attho. Micchādiṭṭhihatenāti sassatādimicchābhinivesadūsitena. Thinamiddhābhibhūtenāti
atk-s0503a:906_6: cittassa akalyatālakkhaṇena thinena kāyassa akalyatālakkhaṇena middhena ca ajjhotthaṭena,
atk-s0503a:906_7: tena kāyena cittenāti vā sambandho. Vasaṃ mārassa gacchatīti kilesamārādikassa sabbassapi
atk-s0503a:906_8: mārassa vasaṃ yathākāmakaraṇīyataṃ upagacchati, tesaṃ visayaṃ nātikkamatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:907_0: Imāya hi gāthāya bhagavā ye satiārakkhābhāvena sabbaso arakkhitacittā, yonisomanasikārassa
atk-s0503a:907_1: hetubhūtāya paññāya abhāvato ayoniso ummujjanena niccantiādinā vipariyesagāhino,
atk-s0503a:907_2: tato eva kusalakiriyāya vīriyārambhābhāvato kosajjābhibhūtā saṃsāravaṭṭato sīsaṃ
atk-s0503a:907_3: na ukkhipissantīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pamādavihāragarahāmukhena vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni
atk-s0503a:908_0: Tattha tasmā rakkhitacittassāti yasmā arakkhitacitto mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyo hutvā
atk-s0503a:908_1: saṃsāreyeva hoti, tasmā satisaṃvarena manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ rakkhaṇena pidahanena
atk-s0503a:908_2: rakkhitacitto assa. Citte hi rakkhite cakkhādiindriyāni rakkhitāneva hontīti. Sammāsaṅkappagocaroti
atk-s0503a:908_3: yasmā micchāsaṅkappagocaro tathā tathā ayoniso vitakketvā nānāvidhāni micchādassanāni
atk-s0503a:908_4: gaṇhanto micchādiṭṭhihatena cittena mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyo hoti, tasmā yonisomanasikārena
atk-s0503a:908_5: kammaṃ karonto nekkhammasaṅkappādisammāsaṅkappagocaro assa, jhānādisampayuttaṃ sammāsaṅkappameva
atk-s0503a:908_6: attano cittassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ kareyya. Sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāroti sammāsaṅkappagocaratāya
atk-s0503a:908_8: sammādiṭṭhiṃ purato katvā pubbe vuttanayeneva sīlasamādhīsu yutto payutto vipassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:908_9: ārabhitvā saṅkhāre sammasanto ñatvāna udayabbayaṃ pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu samapaññāsāya
atk-s0503a:908_10: ākārehi uppādanirodhaṃ vavatthapetvā udayabbayañāṇamadhigantvā tato paraṃ bhaṅgānupassanādivasena
atk-s0503a:908_11: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā anukkamena ariyamaggaṃ gaṇhanto aggamaggena, thinamiddhābhibhū
atk-s0503a:908_12: bhikkhu sabbā duggatiyo jaheti, evaṃ so heṭṭhimamaggavajjhānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭhamameva
atk-s0503a:908_14: arahattamaggena samucchindanato tadekaṭṭhānaṃ mānādīnampi pahīnattā sabbaso bhinnakileso
atk-s0503a:908_15: khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tividhadukkhatāyogena duggatisaṅkhātā sabbāpi gatiyo ucchinnabhavamūlattā
atk-s0503a:908_16: jahe, pajaheyya. Tāsaṃ parabhāge nibbāne patiṭṭheyyāti attho.
atk-s0503a:911_0: 33. Tatiye kosalesūti kosalā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado
atk-s0503a:911_1: “kosalā”tveva vuccati, tesu kosalesu janapade. Cārikaṃ caratīti aturitacārikāvasena
atk-s0503a:911_2: janapadacārikaṃ carati. Mahatāti guṇamahattenapi mahatā, aparicchinnasaṅkhyattā saṅkhyāmahattenapi
atk-s0503a:911_3: mahatā. Bhikkhusaṅghenāti diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṃhatena samaṇagaṇena. Saddhinti ekato.
atk-s0503a:911_4: Maggā okkammāti maggato apakkamitvā. Aññataraṃ rukkhamūlanti ghanapattasākhāviṭapasampannassa
atk-s0503a:912_0: Aññataro gopālakoti eko gogaṇarakkhako, nāmena pana nando nāma. So kira aḍḍho mahaddhano
atk-s0503a:912_1: mahābhogo, yathā keṇiyo jaṭilo pabbajjāvasena, evaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa goyūthaṃ rakkhanto
atk-s0503a:912_2: gopālakattena rājapīḷaṃ apaharanto attano kuṭumbaṃ rakkhati. So kālena kālaṃ pañca
atk-s0503a:912_3: gorase gahetvā, mahāseṭṭhissa santikaṃ āgantvā niyyātetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0503a:912_4: satthāraṃ passati, dhammaṃ suṇāti, attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgamanatthāya satthāraṃ yācati.
atk-s0503a:912_5: Satthā tasseva ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno agantvā, aparabhāge mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0503a:912_6: parivuto janapadacārikaṃ caranto, “idānissa ñāṇaṃ paripakka”nti ñatvā tassa vasanaṭṭhānassa
atk-s0503a:912_7: avidūre maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi tassa āgamanaṃ āgamayamāno.
atk-s0503a:912_8: Nandopi kho “satthā kira janapadacārikaṃ caranto ito āgacchatī”ti sutvā, haṭṭhatuṭṭho
atk-s0503a:912_9: vegena gantvā, satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro ekamantaṃ nisīdi,
atk-s0503a:912_10: athassa bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi. So sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0503a:912_11: sattāhaṃ pāyāsadānamadāsi, sattame divase bhagavā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Tena
atk-s0503a:912_12: vuttaṃ – “ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ gopālakaṃ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi…pe…
atk-s0503a:913_0: Tattha sandassesīti “ime dhammā kusalā, ime dhammā akusalā”tiādinā kusalādidhamme
atk-s0503a:913_1: kammavipāke idhalokaparaloke paccakkhato dassento anupubbikathāvasāne cattāri ariyasaccāni
atk-s0503a:913_2: sammā dassesi. Samādapesīti “saccādhigamāya ime nāma dhammā attani uppādetabbā”ti
atk-s0503a:913_3: sīlādidhamme sammā gaṇhāpetvā tesu taṃ patiṭṭhapesi. Samuttejesīti te dhammā samādinnā
atk-s0503a:913_4: anukkamena bhāviyamānā nibbedhabhāgiyā hutvā tikkhavisadā yathā khippaṃ ariyamaggaṃ
atk-s0503a:913_5: āvahanti, tathā sammā uttejesi sammadeva tejesi. Sampahaṃsesīti bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ
atk-s0503a:913_6: visesabhāvadassanena cittassa pamodāpanavasena suṭṭhu pahaṃsesi. Apicettha sāvajjānavajjadhammesu
atk-s0503a:913_7: dukkhādīsu ca sammohavinodanena sandassanaṃ, sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ pamādāpanodanena samādapanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:913_9: veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ so bhagavato sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0503a:913_10: Adhivāsesīti tena diṭṭhasaccena “adhivāsetu me, bhante bhagavā”tiādinā nimantito
atk-s0503a:913_11: kāyaṅgavācaṅgaṃ acopento citteneva adhivāsesi sādiyi. Tenevāha “tuṇhībhāvenā”ti.
atk-s0503a:914_0: Appodakapāyāsanti nirudakapāyāsaṃ. Paṭiyādāpetvāti sampādetvā sajjetvā. Navañca sappinti
atk-s0503a:914_1: navanītaṃ gahetvā tāvadeva vilīnaṃ maṇḍasappiñca paṭiyādāpetvā. Sahatthāti ādarajāto
atk-s0503a:914_2: sahattheneva parivisanto. Santappesīti paṭiyattaṃ bhojanaṃ bhojesi. Sampavāresīti
atk-s0503a:914_3: “alaṃ ala”nti vācāya paṭikkhipāpesi. Bhuttāvinti katabhattakiccaṃ. Onītapattapāṇinti
atk-s0503a:914_4: pattato apanītapāṇiṃ, “dhotapattapāṇi”ntipi pāṭho, dhotapattahatthanti attho. Nīcanti
atk-s0503a:914_5: anuccaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā āsaneyeva nisīdanaṃ ariyadesavāsīnaṃ cārittaṃ, so pana satthu
atk-s0503a:914_6: santike upacāravasena paññattassa dāruphalakāsanassa samīpe nisīdi. Dhammiyā kathāyātiādi
atk-s0503a:914_7: sattame divase kataṃ anumodanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. So kira sattāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca
atk-s0503a:914_8: tattha vasāpetvā mahādānaṃ pavattesi. Sattame pana divase appodakapāyāsadānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0503a:914_9: Satthā tassa tasmiṃ attabhāve uparimaggatthāya ñāṇaparipākābhāvato anumodanameva katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:915_0: Sīmantarikāyāti sīmantare, tassa gāmassa antaraṃ. Gāmavāsino kira ekaṃ taḷākaṃ nissāya
atk-s0503a:915_1: tena saddhiṃ kalahaṃ akaṃsu. So te abhibhavitvā taṃ taḷākaṃ gaṇhi. Tena baddhāghāto
atk-s0503a:915_2: eko puriso taṃ satthu pattaṃ gahetvā dūraṃ anugantvā “nivattāhi upāsakā”ti vutte
atk-s0503a:915_3: bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ca añjaliṃ katvā yāva dassanūpacārasamatikkamā
atk-s0503a:915_4: dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi paggayha paṭinivattitvā dvinnaṃ gāmānaṃ
atk-s0503a:915_5: antare araññappadese ekakaṃ gacchantaṃ sarena vijjhitvā māresi. Tena vuttaṃ acirapakkantassa…pe…
atk-s0503a:915_6: voropesī”ti. Kenacideva karaṇīyena ohīyitvā pacchā gacchantā bhikkhū taṃ tathā mataṃ
atk-s0503a:915_7: disvā bhagavato tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:916_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yasmā diṭṭhisampannaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ nandaṃ mārentena purisena
atk-s0503a:916_1: ānantariyakammaṃ bahulaṃ apuññaṃ pasutaṃ, tasmā yaṃ corehi ca verīhi ca kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0503a:916_2: tatopi ghorataraṃ imesaṃ sattānaṃ micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ karotīti imamatthaṃ jānitvā
atk-s0503a:917_0: Tattha diso disanti dūsako dūsanīyaṃ coro coraṃ, disvāti vacanaseso. Yaṃ taṃ kayirāti
atk-s0503a:917_1: yaṃ tassa anayabyasanaṃ kareyya, dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – eko
atk-s0503a:917_2: ekassa mittadubbhī coro puttadārakhettavatthugomahiṃsādīsu aparajjhanto yassa aparajjhati,
atk-s0503a:917_3: tampi tatheva attani aparajjhantaṃ coraṃ disvā, verī vā pana kenacideva kāraṇena
atk-s0503a:917_4: baddhaveraṃ veriṃ disvā attano kakkhaḷatāya dāruṇatāya yaṃ tassa anayabyasanaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0503a:917_5: puttadāraṃ vā pīḷeyya, khettādīni vā nāseyya, jīvitā vā voropeyya, dasasu akusalakammapathesu
atk-s0503a:917_6: micchāṭhapitattā micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ pāpiyo naṃ tato kare, naṃ purisaṃ pāpataraṃ
atk-s0503a:917_7: tato kareyya. Vuttappakāro hi diso vā verī vā disassa vā verino vā imasmiṃyeva attabhāve
atk-s0503a:917_8: dukkhaṃ vā uppādeyya, jīvitakkhayaṃ vā kareyya. Idaṃ pana akusalakammapathesu micchāṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0503a:917_9: cittaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme anayabyasanaṃ pāpeti, attabhāvasatasahassesupi catūsu apāyesu
atk-s0503a:920_0: 34. Catutthe kapotakandarāyanti evaṃnāmake vihāre. Tasmiṃ kira pabbatakandare pubbe
atk-s0503a:920_1: bahū kapotā vasiṃsu, tena sā pabbatakandarā “kapotakandarā”ti vuccati. Aparabhāge
atk-s0503a:920_3: evaṃnāmake vihāre”ti. Juṇhāya rattiyāti sukkapakkharattiyaṃ. Navoropitehi kesehīti
atk-s0503a:920_4: aciraohāritehi kesehi, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Abbhokāseti yattha
atk-s0503a:920_5: uparicchadanaṃ parikkhepo vā natthi, tādise ākāsaṅgaṇe.
atk-s0503a:921_0: Tattha āyasmā sāriputto suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, āyasmā mahāmoggallāno nīluppalavaṇṇo. Ubhopi
atk-s0503a:921_1: pana te mahātherā udiccabrāhmaṇajaccā kappānaṃ satasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
atk-s0503a:921_3: sāvakapāramiñāṇānaṃ matthakappattā etaṃ kapotakandaravihāraṃ upasobhayantā ekaṃ kanakaguhaṃ
atk-s0503a:921_4: paviṭṭhā dve sīhā viya, ekaṃ vijambhanabhūmiṃ otiṇṇā dve byagghā viya, ekaṃ supupphitasālavanaṃ
atk-s0503a:921_5: paviṭṭhā dve chaddantanāgarājāno viya, ekaṃ simbalivanaṃ paviṭṭhā dve supaṇṇarājāno
atk-s0503a:921_6: viya, ekaṃ naravāhanayānaṃ abhiruḷhā dve vessavaṇā viya, ekaṃ paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ
atk-s0503a:921_7: abhinisinnā dve sakkā viya, ekavimānabbhantaragatā dve mahābrahmāno viya, ekasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:921_8: gaganaṭṭhāne ṭhitāni dve candamaṇḍalāni viya, dve sūriyamaṇḍalāni viya ca virociṃsu.
atk-s0503a:921_9: Tesu āyasmā mahāmoggallāno tuṇhī nisīdi, āyasmā pana sāriputto samāpajji. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:922_1: vadanti, apare panāhu “āruppapādakaṃ phalasamāpatti”nti. Imā eva hi tisso kāyarakkhaṇasamatthā
atk-s0503a:922_2: samāpattiyo. Tattha nirodhasamāpattiyā samādhipariyāyasambhavo heṭṭhā vuttova, pacchimaṃyeva
atk-s0503a:922_3: pana ācariyā vaṇṇenti. Uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ gacchantīti uttarāya disāya
atk-s0503a:922_4: yakkhasamāgamaṃ gantvā attano bhavanaṃ gantuṃ dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ gacchanti. Paṭibhāti
atk-s0503a:922_5: manti upaṭṭhāti mama. Manti hi paṭisaddayogena sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ, imassa sīse
atk-s0503a:922_6: pahāraṃ dātuṃ cittaṃ me uppajjatīti attho. So kira purimajātiyaṃ there baddhāghāto,
atk-s0503a:922_7: tenassa theraṃ disvā paduṭṭhacittassa evaṃ ahosi. Itaro pana sappaññajātiko, tasmā
atk-s0503a:922_8: taṃ paṭisedhento “alaṃ sammā”tiādimāha. Tattha mā āsādesīti mā ghaṭṭesi, mā pahāraṃ
atk-s0503a:922_9: dehīti vuttaṃ hoti. Uḷāroti uḷārehi uttamehi sīlādiguṇehi samannāgato.
atk-s0503a:923_0: Anādiyitvāti ādaraṃ akatvā, tassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā. Yasmā pana tassa vacanaṃ aggaṇhanto
atk-s0503a:923_1: taṃ anādiyanto nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ – “taṃ yakkhaṃ anādiyitvā”ti. Sīse pahāraṃ
atk-s0503a:923_2: adāsīti sabbathāmena ussāhaṃ janetvā ākāse ṭhitova sīse khaṭakaṃ adāsi, muddhani
atk-s0503a:923_3: muṭṭhighātaṃ akāsīti attho. Tāva mahāti thāmamahattena tattakaṃ mahanto pahāro ahosi.
atk-s0503a:923_4: Tena pahārenāti tena pahārena karaṇabhūtena. Sattaratananti pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa
atk-s0503a:923_5: ratanena sattaratanaṃ. Nāganti hatthināgaṃ. Osādeyyāti pathaviyaṃ osīdāpeyya nimujjāpeyya.
atk-s0503a:923_6: “Osāreyyā”tipi pāṭho, cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kareyyāti attho. Aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratananti aḍḍhena
atk-s0503a:923_7: aṭṭhannaṃ pūraṇāni aḍḍhaṭṭhamāni, aḍḍhaṭṭhamāni ratanāni pamāṇaṃ etassāti aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratano,
atk-s0503a:923_8: taṃ aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanaṃ. Mahantaṃ pabbatakūṭanti kelāsakūṭappamāṇaṃ vipulaṃ girikūṭaṃ.
atk-s0503a:923_9: Padāleyyāti sakalikākārena bhindeyya. Api osādeyya, api padāleyyāti sambandho.
atk-s0503a:924_0: Tāvadeva cassa sarīre mahāpariḷāho uppajji, so vedanāturo ākāse ṭhātuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0503a:924_3: taṃ pāpasattaṃ dhāretuṃ asakkontī viya vivaramadāsi. Avīcito jālā uṭṭhahitvā kandantaṃyeva
atk-s0503a:924_4: taṃ gaṇhiṃsu, so kandanto vippalapanto pati. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha ca pana so yakkho
atk-s0503a:924_5: ‘ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī’ti vatvā tattheva mahānirayaṃ apatāsīti. Tattha apatāsīti apati.
atk-s0503a:925_0: Kiṃ pana so yakkhattabhāveneva nirayaṃ upagacchīti? Na upagacchi, yañhettha diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0503a:925_1: pāpakammaṃ ahosi, tassa balena yakkhattabhāve mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavi. Yaṃ pana
atk-s0503a:925_2: upapajjavedanīyaṃ ānantariyakammaṃ, tena cutianantaraṃ niraye uppajjīti. Therassa
atk-s0503a:925_3: pana samāpattibalena upatthambhitasarīrassa na koci vikāro ahosi. Samāpattito avuṭṭhitakāle
atk-s0503a:925_4: hi taṃ yakkho pahari, tathā paharantaṃ dibbacakkhunā disvā āyasmā mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0503a:925_5: dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkami, upasaṅkamanasamakālameva ca dhammasenāpati samāpattito
atk-s0503a:925_6: uṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ mahāmoggallāno sarīravuttiṃ pucchi, sopissa byākāsi, tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:925_7: – “addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno…pe… api ca me sīsaṃ thokaṃ dukkha”nti.
atk-s0503a:926_0: Tattha thokaṃ dukkhanti thokaṃ appamattakaṃ madhurakajātaṃ viya me sīsaṃ dukkhitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:926_1: dukkhappattanti attho. Dukkhādhiṭṭhānañhi sīsaṃ dukkhanti vuttaṃ. “Sīse thokaṃ dukkha”ntipi
atk-s0503a:926_2: pāṭho. Kathaṃ pana samāpattibalena sarīre upatthambhite therassa sīse thokampi dukkhaṃ
atk-s0503a:926_3: ahosīti? Acireneva vuṭṭhitattā. Antosamāpattiyaṃ apaññāyamānadukkhañhi kāyanissitattā
atk-s0503a:926_4: niddaṃ upagatassa makasādijanitaṃ viya paṭibuddhassa thokaṃ paññāyittha.
atk-s0503a:927_0: “Mahābalena yakkhena tathā sabbussāhena pahaṭe sarīrepi vikāro nāma natthī”ti acchariyabbhutacittajātena
atk-s0503a:927_1: āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena “acchariyaṃ, āvuso sāriputtā”tiādinā dhammasenāpatino mahānubhāvatāya
atk-s0503a:927_3: attano issāmacchariyāhaṅkārādimalānaṃ suppahīnataṃ dīpeti. Paṃsupisācakampi na passāmāti
atk-s0503a:927_4: saṅkārakūṭādīsu vicaraṇakakhuddakapetampi na passāma. Iti adhigamappicchānaṃ aggabhūto
atk-s0503a:927_5: mahāthero tasmiṃ kāle anāvajjanena tesaṃ adassanaṃ sandhāya vadati. Tenevāha “etarahī”ti.
atk-s0503a:928: Bhagavā pana veḷuvane ṭhito ubhinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ dibbasotena assosi. Tena vuttaṃ – “assosi kho bhagavā”tiādi, taṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0503a:929: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa samāpattibalūpagataṃ iddhānubhāvamahantataṃ viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti tasseva tādibhāvappattidīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:930_0: Tattha yassa selūpamaṃ cittaṃ, ṭhitaṃ nānupakampatīti yassa khīṇāsavassa cittaṃ ekagghanasilāmayapabbatūpamaṃ
atk-s0503a:930_1: sabbesaṃ iñjanānaṃ abhāvato vasībhāvappattiyāva ṭhitaṃ sabbehipi lokadhammehi nānupakampati
atk-s0503a:930_2: na pavedhati. Idānissa akampanākāraṃ saddhiṃ kāraṇena dassetuṃ “viratta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:930_3: Tattha virattaṃ rajanīyesūti virāgasaṅkhātena ariyamaggena rajanīyesu rāguppattihetubhūtesu
atk-s0503a:930_4: sabbesu tebhūmakadhammesu virattaṃ, tattha sabbaso samucchinnarāganti attho. Kopaneyyeti
atk-s0503a:930_5: paṭighaṭṭhānīye sabbasmimpi āghātavatthusmiṃ na kuppati na dussati na vikāraṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0503a:930_6: Yassevaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittanti yassa yathāvuttassa ariyapuggalassa cittaṃ evaṃ vuttanayena
atk-s0503a:930_7: tādibhāvāvahanabhāvena bhāvitaṃ. Kuto taṃ dukkhamessatīti taṃ uttamapuggalaṃ kuto
atk-s0503a:930_8: sattato saṅkhārato vā dukkhaṃ upagamissati, na tādisassa dukkhaṃ atthīti attho.
atk-s0503a:933_0: 35. Pañcame kosambiyanti kusumbena nāma isinā vasitaṭṭhāne māpitattā “kosambī”ti
atk-s0503a:933_1: evaṃladdhanāmake nagare. Ghositārāmeti ghositaseṭṭhinā kārite ārāme. Bhagavā ākiṇṇo
atk-s0503a:933_2: viharatīti bhagavā sambādhappatto viharati. Kiṃ pana bhagavato sambādho atthi, saṃsaggo
atk-s0503a:933_3: vāti? Natthi. Na hi koci bhagavantaṃ anicchāya upasaṅkamituṃ sakkoti. Durāsadā hi
atk-s0503a:933_4: buddhā bhagavanto sabbattha ca anupalittattā. Hitesitāya pana sattesu anukampaṃ upādāya
atk-s0503a:933_5: “mutto mocessāmī”ti paṭiññānurūpaṃ caturoghanittharaṇatthaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ parisānaṃ attano
atk-s0503a:933_6: santikaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ adhivāseti, sayañca mahākaruṇāsamussāhito kālaññū
atk-s0503a:933_7: hutvā tattha upasaṅkamati, idaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ, ayamidha ākiṇṇavihāroti adhippeto.
atk-s0503a:934_0: Idha pana kosambikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalahajātānaṃ satthā dīghītissa kosalarañño vatthuṃ
atk-s0503a:934_1: āharitvā, “na hi verena verāni, sammantīdha kudācana”ntiādinā ovādaṃ adāsi, taṃ divasaṃ
atk-s0503a:934_2: tesaṃ kalahaṃ karontānaṃyeva ratti vibhātā. Dutiyadivasepi bhagavā tameva vatthuṃ
atk-s0503a:934_3: kathesi, taṃ divasampi tesaṃ kalahaṃ karontānaṃyeva ratti vibhātā. Tatiyadivasepi
atk-s0503a:934_4: bhagavā tameva vatthuṃ kathesi, athaññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ evamāha – “appossukko,
atk-s0503a:934_5: bhante bhagavā, diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramanuyutto viharatu, mayametena bhaṇḍanena
atk-s0503a:934_6: kalahena viggahena vivādena paññāyissāmā”ti. Satthā “pariyādinnacittā kho ime moghapurisā
atk-s0503a:934_7: na dānime sakkā saññāpetuṃ, natthi cettha saññāpetabbā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ ekacārikavāsaṃ
atk-s0503a:934_8: vaseyyaṃ, evaṃ ime bhikkhū kalahato oramissantī”ti cintesi. Evaṃ tehi kalahakārakehi
atk-s0503a:934_9: bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekavihāre vāsaṃ vinetabbābhāvato upāsakādīhi upasaṅkamanañca ākiṇṇavihāraṃ
atk-s0503a:934_10: katvā vuttaṃ – “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā ākiṇṇo viharatī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:935_0: Tattha dukkhanti na sukhaṃ, anārādhitacittatāya na iṭṭhanti attho. Tenevāha “na phāsu
atk-s0503a:935_1: viharāmī”ti. Vūpakaṭṭhoti pavivekaṭṭho dūrībhūto. Tathā cintetvāva bhagavā pātova
atk-s0503a:935_2: sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kañci anāmantetvā eko adutiyo
atk-s0503a:935_3: gantvā kosalaraṭṭhe pālileyyake vanasaṇḍe bhaddasālamūle vihāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha
atk-s0503a:935_4: kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ…pe… bhaddasālamūle”ti. Tattha sāmanti sayaṃ. Saṃsāmetvāti
atk-s0503a:935_5: paṭisāmetvā. Pattacīvaramādāyāti etthāpi sāmanti padaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. Upaṭṭhāketi
atk-s0503a:935_6: kosambinagaravāsino ghositaseṭṭhiādike upaṭṭhāke, vihāre ca aggupaṭṭhākaṃ āyasmantaṃ
atk-s0503a:936_0: Evaṃ gate satthari pañcasatā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āhaṃsu – “āvuso ānanda, satthā
atk-s0503a:936_1: ekakova gato, mayaṃ anubandhissāmā”ti. “Āvuso, yadā bhagavā sāmaṃ senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā
atk-s0503a:936_2: pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke ca anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ adutiyo gacchati,
atk-s0503a:936_3: tadā ekacāraṃ carituṃ bhagavato ajjhāsayo, sāvakena nāma satthu ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
atk-s0503a:936_4: paṭipajjitabbaṃ, tasmā na imesu divasesu bhagavā anugantabbo”ti nivāresi, sayampi nānugacchi.
atk-s0503a:937_0: Anupubbenāti anukkamena, gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā cārikaṃ caramāno “ekacāravāsaṃ tāva
atk-s0503a:937_1: vasamānaṃ bhikkhuṃ passissāmī”ti bālakaloṇakāragāmaṃ gantvā tattha bhaguttherassa
atk-s0503a:937_2: sakalaṃ pacchābhattañceva tiyāmañca rattiṃ ekacāravāse ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā punadivase
atk-s0503a:937_3: tena pacchāsamaṇena piṇḍāya caritvā taṃ tattheva nivattetvā “samaggavāsaṃ vasamāne
atk-s0503a:937_4: tayo kulaputte passissāmī”ti pācīnavaṃsamigadāyaṃ gantvā tesampi sakalarattiṃ samaggavāse
atk-s0503a:937_5: ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā tepi tattheva nivattetvā ekakova pālileyyagāmaṃ sampatto. Pālileyyagāmavāsino
atk-s0503a:937_6: paccuggantvā bhagavato dānaṃ datvā pālileyyagāmassa avidūre rakkhitavanasaṇḍo nāma
atk-s0503a:937_7: atthi, tattha bhagavato paṇṇasālaṃ katvā “ettha bhagavā vasatū”ti yācitvā vāsayiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:937_8: Bhaddasāloti pana tattheko manāpo bhaddako sālarukkho, bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0503a:937_9: vanasaṇḍe paṇṇasālasamīpe tasmiṃ rukkhamūle vihāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “pālileyyake viharati
atk-s0503a:938_0: Hatthināgoti mahāhatthī yūthapati. Hatthikalabhehīti hatthipotakehi. Hatthicchāpehīti
atk-s0503a:938_1: khīrūpagehi daharahatthipotakehi, ye “bhiṅkā”tipi vuccanti. Chinnaggānīti purato
atk-s0503a:938_2: purato gacchantehi tehi hatthiādīhi chinnaggāni khāditāvasesāni khāṇusadisāni khādati.
atk-s0503a:938_3: Obhaggobhagganti tena hatthināgena uccaṭṭhānato bhañjitvā bhañjitvā pātitaṃ. Assa
atk-s0503a:938_4: sākhābhaṅganti etassa santakaṃ sākhābhaṅgaṃ te khādanti. Āvilānīti tehi paṭhamataraṃ
atk-s0503a:938_5: otaritvā pivantehi āluḷitattā āvilāni kaddamamissāni pānīyāni pivati. Ogāhāti titthato.
atk-s0503a:938_6: “Ogāha”ntipi pāḷi. Assāti hatthināgassa. Upanighaṃsantiyoti ghaṭṭentiyo, upanighaṃsiyamānopi
atk-s0503a:938_7: attano uḷārabhāvena na kujjhati, tena tā taṃ ghaṃsantiyeva. Yūthāti hatthighaṭā.
atk-s0503a:939_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti so kira hatthināgo yūthavāse ukkaṇṭhito taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0503a:939_1: paviṭṭho tattha bhagavantaṃ disvā ghaṭasahassena nibbāpitasantāpo viya nibbuto hutvā
atk-s0503a:939_2: pasannacitto bhagavato santike aṭṭhāsi, tato paṭṭhāya vattasīse ṭhatvā bhaddasālassa
atk-s0503a:939_3: paṇṇasālāya ca samantato appaharitakaṃ katvā sākhābhaṅgehi sammajjati, bhagavato
atk-s0503a:939_4: mukhadhovanaṃ deti, nhānodakaṃ āharati, dantakaṭṭhaṃ deti, araññato madhurāni phalāni
atk-s0503a:939_5: āharitvā satthu upaneti, satthā tāni paribhuñjati. Tena vuttaṃ – “tatra sudaṃ so
atk-s0503a:939_6: hatthināgo yasmiṃ padese bhagavā viharati, taṃ padesaṃ appaharitañca karoti, soṇḍāya
atk-s0503a:939_7: bhagavato pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī”ti. Soṇḍāya dārūni āharitvā aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0503a:939_8: ghaṃsitvā aggiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā dārūni jālāpetvā tattha pāsāṇakhaṇḍāni tāpetvā tāni daṇḍakehi
atk-s0503a:939_9: pavaṭṭetvā soṇḍiyaṃ khipitvā udakassa tattabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavato santikaṃ upagantvā
atk-s0503a:939_10: tiṭṭhati, bhagavā “hatthināgo mama nhānaṃ icchatī”ti tattha gantvā nhānakiccaṃ karoti,
atk-s0503a:939_11: pānīyepi eseva nayo. Tasmiṃ pana sītale sañjāte upasaṅkamati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:940_0: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassātiādi ubhinnaṃ mahānāgānaṃ vivekasukhapaccavekkhaṇadassanaṃ,
atk-s0503a:940_1: taṃ vuttatthameva. Attano ca pavivekaṃ viditvāti kehici anākiṇṇabhāvaladdhaṃ kāyavivekaṃ
atk-s0503a:940_2: jānitvā, itare pana vivekā bhagavato sabbakālaṃ vijjantiyeva.
atk-s0503a:941: Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ attano hatthināgassa ca pavivekābhiratiyā samānajjhāsayabhāvadīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:942_0: Tatthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – etaṃ īsādantassa rathaīsāsadisadantassa hatthināgassa cittaṃ
atk-s0503a:942_1: nāgena buddhanāgassa cittena sameti saṃsandati. Kathaṃ sameti ce? Yadeko ramatī vane
atk-s0503a:942_2: yasmā buddhanāgo “ahaṃ kho pubbe ākiṇṇo vihāsi”nti purimaṃ ākiṇṇavihāraṃ jigucchitvā
atk-s0503a:942_3: vivekaṃ upabrūhayamāno idāni yathā eko adutiyo vane araññe ramati abhiramati, evaṃ
atk-s0503a:942_4: ayampi hatthināgo pubbe attano hatthiādīhi ākiṇṇavihāraṃ jigucchitvā vivekaṃ upabrūhayamāno
atk-s0503a:942_5: idāni eko asahāyo vane araññe ramati abhiramati. Tasmāssa cittaṃ nāgena sameti tassa
atk-s0503a:942_6: cittena sametīti katvā ekībhāvaratiyā ekasadisaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0503a:945_0: 36. Chaṭṭhe piṇḍolabhāradvājoti piṇḍaṃ ulamāno pariyesamāno pabbajitoti piṇḍolo.
atk-s0503a:945_1: So kira parijiṇṇabhogo brāhmaṇo hutvā mahantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa lābhasakkāraṃ disvā
atk-s0503a:945_2: piṇḍatthāya nikkhamitvā pabbajito. So mahantaṃ kapallaṃ “patta”nti gahetvā carati,
atk-s0503a:945_3: kapallapūraṃ yāguṃ pivati, bhattaṃ bhuñjati, pūvakhajjakañca khādati. Athassa mahagghasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:945_4: satthu ārocesuṃ. Satthā tassa pattatthavikaṃ nānujāni, heṭṭhāmañce pattaṃ nikkujjitvā
atk-s0503a:945_5: ṭhapeti, so ṭhapentopi ghaṃsentova paṇāmetvā ṭhapeti, gaṇhantopi ghaṃsentova ākaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0503a:945_6: gaṇhāti. Taṃ gacchante gacchante kāle ghaṃsanena parikkhīṇaṃ, nāḷikodanamattasseva
atk-s0503a:945_7: gaṇhanakaṃ jātaṃ. Tato satthu ārocesuṃ, athassa satthā pattatthavikaṃ anujāni. Thero
atk-s0503a:945_8: aparena samayena indriyabhāvanaṃ bhāvento aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Iti so pubbe
atk-s0503a:945_9: savisesaṃ piṇḍatthāya ulatīti piṇḍolo, gottena pana bhāradvājoti ubhayaṃ ekato katvā
atk-s0503a:946_0: Āraññakoti gāmantasenāsanapaṭikkhipanena araññe nivāso assāti āraññako, āraññakadhutaṅgaṃ
atk-s0503a:946_1: samādāya vattantassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tathā bhikkhāsaṅkhātānaṃ āmisapiṇḍānaṃ pāto piṇḍapāto,
atk-s0503a:946_2: parehi dinnānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ patte nipatananti attho. Piṇḍapātaṃ uñchati taṃ taṃ kulaṃ
atk-s0503a:946_3: upasaṅkamanto gavesatīti piṇḍapātiko, piṇḍāya vā patituṃ carituṃ vatametassāti piṇḍapātī,
atk-s0503a:946_4: piṇḍapātīyeva piṇḍapātiko. Saṅkārakūṭādīsu paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena
atk-s0503a:946_5: paṃsukūlaṃ viyāti paṃsukūlaṃ, paṃsu viya vā kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlaṃ,
atk-s0503a:946_6: paṃsukūlassa dhāraṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ, taṃ sīlaṃ etassāti paṃsukūliko. Saṅghāṭiuttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakasaṅkhātāni
atk-s0503a:946_7: tīṇi cīvarāni ticīvaraṃ, ticīvarassa dhāraṇaṃ ticīvaraṃ, taṃ sīlaṃ etassāti tecīvariko.
atk-s0503a:947_0: Dhutavādoti dhuto vuccati dhutakileso puggalo, kilesadhunanakadhammo vā. Tattha atthi
atk-s0503a:947_1: dhuto, na dhutavādo, atthi na dhuto, dhutavādo, atthi neva dhuto, na dhutavādo, atthi
atk-s0503a:947_2: dhuto ceva, dhutavādo cāti idaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tesu yo sayaṃ dhutadhamme samādāya
atk-s0503a:947_3: vattati, na paraṃ tadatthāya samādapeti, ayaṃ paṭhamo. Yo pana sayaṃ na dhutadhamme
atk-s0503a:947_4: samādāya vattati, paraṃ samādapeti, ayaṃ dutiyo. Yo ubhayarahito, ayaṃ tatiyo. Yo
atk-s0503a:947_5: pana ubhayasampanno, ayaṃ catuttho. Evarūpo ca āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājoti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:947_6: “dhutavādo”ti. Ekadesasarūpekasesavasena hi ayaṃ niddeso yathā taṃ “nāmarūpa”nti.
atk-s0503a:948_1: vā cittassa adhicittabhāvo veditabbo, idha pana “arahattaphalacitta”nti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:948_2: Taṃtaṃsamāpattīsu samādhi eva adhicittaṃ, idha pana arahattaphalasamādhi veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:948_3: Keci pana “adhicittamanuyuttena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā kālena kālaṃ tīṇi nimittāni
atk-s0503a:948_4: manasi kātabbānīti etasmiṃ adhicittasutte viya samathavipassanācittaṃ adhicittanti
atk-s0503a:948_5: idhādhippeta”nti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Purimoyevattho gahetabbo.
atk-s0503a:949_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa adhiṭṭhānaparikkhārasampadāsampannaṃ
atk-s0503a:949_1: adhicittānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Evaṃ “adhicittānuyogo mama sāsanānuṭṭhāna”nti
atk-s0503a:950_0: Tattha anūpavādoti vācāya kassacipi anupavadanaṃ. Anūpaghātoti kāyena kassaci upaghātākaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:950_1: Pātimokkheti ettha pātimokkhapadassa attho heṭṭhā nānappakārehi vutto, tasmiṃ pātimokkhe.
atk-s0503a:950_2: Sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇo saṃvaro. Mattaññutāti paṭiggahaṇaparibhogavasena
atk-s0503a:950_3: pamāṇaññutā. Pantañca sayanāsananti vivittaṃ saṅghaṭṭanavirahitaṃ senāsanaṃ. Adhicitte
atk-s0503a:950_4: ca āyogoti aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ adhigamāya bhāvanānuyogo.
atk-s0503a:951_0: Aparo nayo – anūpavādoti kassacipi uparujjhanavacanassa avadanaṃ. Tena sabbampi vācasikaṃ
atk-s0503a:951_1: sīlaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Anūpaghātoti kāyena kassaci upaghātassa paraviheṭhanassa akaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:951_2: Tena sabbampi kāyikaṃ sīlaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Yādisaṃ panidaṃ ubhayaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanantogadhaṃ
atk-s0503a:951_3: hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ – “pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro”ti vuttaṃ. Casaddo nipātamattaṃ. Pātimokkhe
atk-s0503a:951_4: ca saṃvaroti pātimokkhasaṃvarabhūto anūpavādo anūpaghāto cāti attho.
atk-s0503a:952_0: Atha vā pātimokkheti adhikaraṇe bhummaṃ. Pātimokkhe nissayabhūte saṃvaro. Ko pana
atk-s0503a:952_1: soti? Anūpavādo anūpaghāto. Upasampadavelāyañhi avisesena pātimokkhasīlaṃ samādinnaṃ
atk-s0503a:952_2: nāma hoti, tasmiṃ pātimokkhe ṭhitassa tato paraṃ upavādūpaghātānaṃ akaraṇavasena
atk-s0503a:952_3: saṃvaro, so anūpavādo anūpaghāto cāti vutto.
atk-s0503a:953_0: Atha vā pātimokkheti nipphādetabbe bhummaṃ yathā “cetaso avūpasamo ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0503a:953_1: Tena pātimokkhena sādhetabbo anūpavādo anūpaghāto, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṅgahito anūpavādo
atk-s0503a:953_2: anūpaghātoicceva attho. Saṃvaroti iminā pana satisaṃvaro, ñāṇasaṃvaro, khantisaṃvaro,
atk-s0503a:953_3: vīriyasaṃvaroti imesaṃ catunnaṃ saṃvarānaṃ gahaṇaṃ, pātimokkhasādhanaṃ idaṃ saṃvaracatukkaṃ.
atk-s0503a:954_2: Adhicitte ca āyogoti sabbacittānaṃ adhikattā uttamattā adhicittasaṅkhāte arahattaphalacitte
atk-s0503a:954_3: sādhetabbe tassa nipphādanatthaṃ samathavipassanābhāvanāvasena āyogo. Etaṃ buddhāna
atk-s0503a:954_4: sāsananti etaṃ parassa anūpavadanaṃ, anūpaghātanaṃ, pātimokkhasaṃvaro, pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇādīsu
atk-s0503a:954_5: mattaññutā, vivittavāso, yathāvuttaadhicittānuyogo ca buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhīti
atk-s0503a:954_6: attho. Evaṃ imāya gāthāya tisso sikkhā kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:957_0: 37. Sattame apubbaṃ natthi. Gāthāya adhicetasoti adhicittavato, sabbacittānaṃ adhikena
atk-s0503a:957_1: arahattaphalacittena samannāgatassāti attho. Appamajjatoti na pamajjato, appamādena
atk-s0503a:957_2: anavajjadhammesu sātaccakiriyāya samannāgatassāti vuttaṃ hoti. Muninoti “yo munāti
atk-s0503a:957_3: ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti evaṃ ubhayalokamunanena monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, tena
atk-s0503a:957_4: arahattaphalañāṇasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgatattā vā khīṇāsavo muni nāma, tassa munino.
atk-s0503a:957_5: Monapathesu sikkhatoti arahattañāṇasaṅkhātassa monassa pathesu sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammesu
atk-s0503a:957_6: tīsu vā sikkhāsu sikkhato. Idañca pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Pariniṭṭhitasikkho
atk-s0503a:957_7: hi arahā, tasmā evaṃ sikkhato, imāya sikkhāya munibhāvaṃ pattassa muninoti evamettha
atk-s0503a:957_8: attho daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā ca etadeva, tasmā heṭṭhimamaggaphalacittānaṃ vasena adhicetaso,
atk-s0503a:957_10: muninoti evametesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ attho yujjatiyeva. Atha vā “appamajjato sikkhato”ti
atk-s0503a:957_11: padānaṃ hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā appamajjanahetu sikkhanahetu ca adhicetasoti.
atk-s0503a:958_0: Sokā na bhavanti tādinoti tādisassa khīṇāsavamunino abbhantare iṭṭhaviyogādivatthukā
atk-s0503a:958_1: sokā cittasantāpā na honti. Atha vā tādinoti tādilakkhaṇasamannāgatassa evarūpassa
atk-s0503a:958_2: munino sokā na bhavantīti ayamettha attho. Upasantassāti rāgādīnaṃ accantūpasamena
atk-s0503a:958_3: upasantassa. Sadā satīmatoti sativepullappattiyā niccakālaṃ satiyā avirahitassa.
atk-s0503a:959_0: Ettha ca “adhicetaso”ti iminā adhicittasikkhā, “appamajjato”ti etena adhisīlasikkhā,
atk-s0503a:959_1: “munino monapathesu sikkhato”ti etehi adhipaññāsikkhā. “Munino”ti vā etena adhipaññāsikkhā,
atk-s0503a:959_3: na bhavantī”tiādīhi sikkhāpāripūriyā ānisaṃso pakāsitoti veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0503a:962: 38. Aṭṭhame sakkatotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vaṇṇitoyeva. Asahamānāti na sahamānā, usūyantāti attho. Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca sakkāraṃ asahamānāti sambandho.
atk-s0503a:963_0: Sundarīti tassā nāmaṃ. Sā kira tasmiṃ kāle sabbaparibbājikāsu abhirūpā dassanīyā
atk-s0503a:963_1: pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā, teneva sā “sundarī”ti paññāyittha.
atk-s0503a:963_2: Sā ca anatītayobbanā asaṃyatasamācārāva hoti, tasmā te sundariṃ paribbājikaṃ pāpakamme
atk-s0503a:963_3: uyyojesuṃ. Te hi aññatitthiyā buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya sayaṃ hatalābhasakkārā heṭṭhā
atk-s0503a:963_4: akkosasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ āgatanayena bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uḷāraṃ aparimitaṃ
atk-s0503a:963_5: lābhasakkāraṃ pavattamānaṃ disvā issāpakatā ekato hutvā sammantayiṃsu – mayaṃ samaṇassa
atk-s0503a:963_6: gotamassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya naṭṭhā hatalābhasakkārā, na no koci atthibhāvampi
atk-s0503a:963_7: jānāti, kiṃ nissāya nu kho loko samaṇe gotame abhippasanno uḷāraṃ sakkārasammānaṃ
atk-s0503a:963_8: upanetīti? Tattheko āha – “uccākulappasuto asambhinnāya mahāsammatappaveṇiyā jāto”ti,
atk-s0503a:963_9: aparo “abhijātiyaṃ tassa anekāni acchariyāni pātubhūtānī”ti, añño “kāladevilaṃ vandāpetuṃ
atk-s0503a:963_10: upanītassa pādā parivattitvā tassa jaṭāsu patiṭṭhitā”ti, aparo “vappamaṅgalakāle
atk-s0503a:963_11: jambucchāyāya sayāpitassa vītikkantepi majjhanhike jambucchāyā aparivattitvā ṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0503a:963_13: disvā saṃvegajāto āgāminaṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito”ti. Evaṃ aparimāṇakāle
atk-s0503a:963_14: sambhataṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato puññañāṇasambhāraṃ ukkaṃsapāramippattaṃ nirupamaṃ
atk-s0503a:963_16: yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāsutaṃ dharamānaṃ taṃ taṃ bhagavato bahumānakāraṇaṃ kittetvā abahumānakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:963_17: pariyesitvā apassantā “kena nu kho kāraṇena mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa ayasaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0503a:963_18: lābhasakkāraṃ nāseyyāmā”ti. Tesu eko tikhiṇamantī evamāha – “ambho imasmiṃ sattaloke
atk-s0503a:963_19: mātugāmasukhe asattasattā nāma natthi, ayañca samaṇo gotamo abhirūpo devasamo taruṇo,
atk-s0503a:963_20: attano samarūpaṃ mātugāmaṃ labhitvā sajjeyya. Athāpi na sajjeyya, janassa pana saṅkiyo
atk-s0503a:963_21: bhaveyya, handa mayaṃ sundariṃ paribbājikaṃ tathā uyyojema, yathā samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0503a:964_0: Taṃ sutvā itare “idaṃ suṭṭhu tayā cintitaṃ, evañhi kate samaṇo gotamo ayasakena upadduto
atk-s0503a:964_1: sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ asakkonto yena vā tena vā palāyissatī”ti sabbeva ekajjhāsayā hutvā
atk-s0503a:964_2: tathā uyyojetuṃ sundariyā santikaṃ agamaṃsu. Sā te disvā “kiṃ tumhe ekato āgatatthā”ti
atk-s0503a:964_3: āha. Titthiyā anālapantā ārāmapariyante paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīdiṃsu. Sā tattha gantvā
atk-s0503a:964_4: punappunaṃ ālapantī paṭivacanaṃ alabhitvā kiṃ tumhākaṃ aparajjhaṃ? Kasmā me paṭivacanaṃ
atk-s0503a:964_5: na dethāti? Tathā hi pana tvaṃ amhe viheṭhiyamāne ajjhupekkhasīti. Ko tumhe viheṭhetīti?
atk-s0503a:964_6: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ na passasi, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ amhe viheṭhetvā hatalābhasakkāre katvā
atk-s0503a:964_7: vicaranta”nti vatvā “tattha mayā kiṃ kātabba”nti vutte “tena hi tvaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:964_8: jetavanasamīpaṃ gantvā mahājanassa evañcevañca vadeyyāsī”ti āhaṃsu. Sāpi “sādhū”ti
atk-s0503a:964_9: sampaṭicchi. Tena vuttaṃ – “aññatitthiyā paribbājakā bhagavato sakkāraṃ asahamānā”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:965_0: Tattha ussahasīti sakkosi. Atthanti hitaṃ kiccaṃ vā. Kyāhanti kiṃ ahaṃ. Yasmā te
atk-s0503a:965_1: titthiyā tassā aññātakāpi samānā pabbajjasambandhamattena saṅgaṇhituṃ ñātakā viya
atk-s0503a:965_2: hutvā “ussahasi tvaṃ bhagini ñātīnaṃ atthaṃ kātu”nti āhaṃsu. Tasmā sāpi migaṃ valli
atk-s0503a:965_3: viya pāde laggā jīvitampi me pariccattaṃ ñātīnaṃ atthāyāti āha.
atk-s0503a:966_0: Tena hīti “yasmā tvaṃ ‘jīvitampi me tumhākaṃ atthāya pariccatta’nti vadasi, tvañca
atk-s0503a:966_1: paṭhamavaye ṭhitā abhirūpā sobhaggappattā ca, tasmā yathā taṃ nissāya samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0503a:966_2: ayaso uppajjissati, tathā kareyyāsī”ti vatvā “abhikkhaṇaṃ jetavanaṃ gacchāhī”ti uyyojesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:966_3: Sāpi kho bālā kakacadantapantiyā pupphāvalikīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmā viya, pabhinnamadaṃ caṇḍahatthiṃ
atk-s0503a:966_4: soṇḍāya parāmasantī viya, nalāṭena maccuṃ gaṇhantī viya titthiyānaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0503a:966_5: mālāgandhavilepanatambūlamukhavāsādīni gahetvā mahājanassa satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0503a:966_6: nagaraṃ pavisanakāle jetavanābhimukhī gacchantī “kahaṃ gacchasī”ti ca puṭṭhā “samaṇassa
atk-s0503a:966_7: gotamassa santikaṃ, ahañhi tena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasāmī”ti vatvā aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:966_8: titthiyārāme vasitvā pātova jetavanamaggaṃ otaritvā nagarābhimukhī āgacchantī “kiṃ
atk-s0503a:966_9: sundari kahaṃ gatāsī”ti ca puṭṭhā “samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā
atk-s0503a:966_10: taṃ kilesaratiyā ramāpetvā āgatāmhī”ti vadati. Tena vuttaṃ – “evaṃ ayyāti kho sundarī
atk-s0503a:966_11: paribbājikā tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ paṭissutvā abhikkhaṇaṃ jetavanaṃ agamāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:967_0: Titthiyā katipāhassa accayena dhuttānaṃ kahāpaṇe datvā “gacchatha, sundariṃ māretvā
atk-s0503a:967_1: samaṇassa gotamassa gandhakuṭiyā avidūre mālākacavarantare nikkhipitvā ethā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:967_2: Te tathā akaṃsu. Tato titthiyā “sundariṃ na passāmā”ti kolāhalaṃ katvā rañño ārocetvā
atk-s0503a:967_3: “kattha pana tumhe parisaṅkathā”ti raññā vuttā imesu divasesu jetavane vasati, tatthassā
atk-s0503a:967_4: pavattiṃ na jānāmāti. “Tena hi gacchatha, naṃ tattha vicinathā”ti raññā anuññātā
atk-s0503a:967_5: attano upaṭṭhāke gahetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā vicinantā viya hutvā mālākacavaraṃ byūhitvā
atk-s0503a:967_6: tassā sarīraṃ mañcakaṃ āropetvā nagaraṃ pavesetvā “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā ‘satthunā
atk-s0503a:967_7: kataṃ pāpakammaṃ paṭicchādessāmā’ti sundariṃ māretvā mālākacavarantare nikkhipiṃsū”ti
atk-s0503a:967_8: rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājāpi anupaparikkhitvā “tena hi gacchatha, nagaraṃ āhiṇḍathā”ti
atk-s0503a:967_9: āha. Te nagaravīthīsu “passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma”ntiādīni vadantā
atk-s0503a:967_10: vicaritvā puna rañño nivesanadvāraṃ agamaṃsu. Rājā sundariyā sarīraṃ āmakasusāne
atk-s0503a:967_11: aṭṭakaṃ āropetvā rakkhāpesi. Sāvatthivāsino ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake yebhuyyena “passatha
atk-s0503a:967_12: samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma”ntiādīni vatvā antonagare bahinagare ca bhikkhū akkosantā
atk-s0503a:967_13: vicariṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “yadā te aññiṃsu titthiyā paribbājakā ‘vodiṭṭhā kho sundarī”’tiādi.
atk-s0503a:968_0: Tattha aññiṃsūti jāniṃsu. Vodiṭṭhāti byapadiṭṭhā, jetavanaṃ āgacchantī ca gacchantī
atk-s0503a:968_1: ca visesato diṭṭhā, bahulaṃ diṭṭhāti attho. Parikhākūpeti dīghikāvāṭe. Yā sā, mahārāja,
atk-s0503a:968_2: sundarīti, mahārāja, yā sā imasmiṃ nagare rūpasundaratāya “sundarī”ti pākaṭā abhiññātā
atk-s0503a:968_3: paribbājikā. Sā no na dissatīti sā amhākaṃ cakkhu viya jīvitaṃ viya ca piyāyitabbā,
atk-s0503a:968_4: idāni na dissati. Yathānikkhittanti purise āṇāpetvā mālākacavarantare attanā yathāṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0503a:969_0: Rathiyāya rathiyanti vīthito vīthiṃ. Vīthīti hi vinivijjhanakaracchā. Siṅghāṭakanti
atk-s0503a:969_1: tikoṇaracchā. Alajjinoti na lajjino, pāpajigucchāvirahitāti attho. Dussīlāti nissīlā.
atk-s0503a:969_2: Pāpadhammāti lāmakasabhāvā nihīnācārā. Musāvādinoti dussīlā samānā “sīlavanto maya”nti
atk-s0503a:969_4: hi nāmā”ti hīḷentā vadanti. Dhammacārinoti kusaladhammacārino. Samacārinoti kāyakammādisamacārino.
atk-s0503a:969_5: Kalyāṇadhammāti sundarasabhāvā, paṭijānissanti nāmāti sambandho. Nāmasaddayogena
atk-s0503a:969_6: hi ettha paṭijānissantīti anāgatakālavacanaṃ. Sāmaññanti samaṇabhāvo samitapāpatā.
atk-s0503a:969_7: Brahmaññanti seṭṭhabhāvo bāhitapāpatā. Kutoti kena kāraṇena. Apagatāti apetā paribhaṭṭhā.
atk-s0503a:970_0: Atha bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Satthā “tena hi, bhikkhave, tumhepi
atk-s0503a:970_1: te manusse imāya gāthāya paṭicodethā”ti vatvā “abhūtavādī”ti gāthamāha. Taṃ sandhāya
atk-s0503a:970_2: vuttaṃ – “atha kho sambahulā…pe… nihīnakammā manujā paratthā”ti. Tattha neso, bhikkhave,
atk-s0503a:970_3: saddo ciraṃ bhavissatīti idaṃ satthā tassa ayasassa nipphattiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-s0503a:971_0: Gāthāyaṃ abhūtavādīti parassa dosaṃ adisvāva musāvādaṃ katvā abhūtena atacchena paraṃ
atk-s0503a:971_1: abbhācikkhanto. Yo vāpi katvāti yo vā pana pāpakammaṃ katvā “nāhaṃ etaṃ karomī”ti
atk-s0503a:971_2: āha. Pecca samā bhavantīti te ubhopi janā ito paralokaṃ gantvā nirayūpagamanena gatiyā
atk-s0503a:971_3: samā bhavanti. Gatiyeva hi nesaṃ paricchinnā, āyū pana aparicchinnā. Bahukañhi pāpaṃ
atk-s0503a:971_4: katvā ciraṃ niraye paccati, parittakaṃ katvā appamattakameva kālaṃ paccati. Yasmā
atk-s0503a:971_5: pana nesaṃ ubhinnampi lāmakameva kammaṃ, tena vuttaṃ – nihīnakammā manujā paratthāti.
atk-s0503a:971_6: “Paratthā”ti imassa pana padassa purato “peccā”tipadena sambandho, pecca parattha
atk-s0503a:971_7: ito gantvā te nihīnakammā paraloke samā bhavantīti attho.
atk-s0503a:972_0: Pariyāpuṇitvāti uggahetvā. Akārakāti aparādhassa na kārakā. Nayimehi katanti evaṃ
atk-s0503a:972_1: kira nesamahosi – imehi samaṇehi sakyaputtiyehi addhā taṃ pāpakammaṃ na kataṃ, yaṃ
atk-s0503a:972_2: aññatitthiyā ugghositvā sakalanagaraṃ āhiṇḍiṃsu, yasmā ime amhesu evaṃ asabbhāhi
atk-s0503a:972_3: pharusāhi vācāhi abbhācikkhantesupi na kiñci vikāraṃ dassenti, khantisoraccañca na
atk-s0503a:972_4: vijahanti, kevalaṃ pana “abhūtavādī nirayaṃ upetī”ti dhammaṃyeva vadantā sapantiyeva,
atk-s0503a:972_5: ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā amhe anupadhāretvā abbhācikkhante sapanti, sapathaṃ karontā
atk-s0503a:972_6: viya vadanti. Atha vā “yo vāpi katvā ‘na karomi’ cāhā”ti vadantā sapanti, attano
atk-s0503a:972_7: akārakabhāvaṃ bodhetuṃ amhākaṃ sapathaṃ karonti imeti attho.
atk-s0503a:973_0: Tesañhi manussānaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitagāthāya savanasamanantarameva buddhānubhāvena
atk-s0503a:973_1: sārajjaṃ okkami, saṃvego uppajji “nayidaṃ amhehi paccakkhato diṭṭhaṃ, sutaṃ nāma
atk-s0503a:973_2: tathāpi hoti, aññathāpi hoti, ete ca aññatitthiyā imesaṃ anatthakāmā ahitakāmā, tasmā
atk-s0503a:973_3: te saddhāya nayidaṃ amhehi vattabbaṃ, dujjānā hi samaṇā”ti. Te tato paṭṭhāya tato oramiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:974_0: Rājāpi yehi sundarī māritā, tesaṃ jānanatthaṃ purise āṇāpesi. Atha te dhuttā tehi
atk-s0503a:974_1: kahāpaṇehi suraṃ pivantā aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ kariṃsu. Tesu hi eko ekaṃ āha – “tvaṃ
atk-s0503a:974_2: sundariṃ ekappahārena māretvā mālākacavarantare khipitvā tato laddhakahāpaṇehi suraṃ
atk-s0503a:974_3: pivasi, hotu hotū”ti. Rājapurisā taṃ sutvā te dhutte gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ. Rājā
atk-s0503a:974_4: “tumhehi sā māritā”ti te dhutte pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti. “Kehi mārāpitā”ti? “Aññatitthiyehi,
atk-s0503a:974_5: devā”ti. Rājā titthiye pakkosāpetvā tamatthaṃ paṭijānāpetvā, “ayaṃ sundarī tassa
atk-s0503a:974_6: samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ āropetukāmehi amhehi mārāpitā, neva gotamassa, na gotamasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0503a:974_7: doso atthi, amhākameva dosoti evaṃ vadantā nagaraṃ āhiṇḍathā”ti āṇāpesi. Te tathā
atk-s0503a:974_8: akaṃsu. Mahājano sammadeva saddahi. Titthiyānaṃ dhikkāraṃ akāsi, titthiyā manussavadhadaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0503a:974_9: pāpuṇiṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya buddhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhiyyosomattāya sakkārasammāno
atk-s0503a:974_10: mahā ahosi. Bhikkhū acchariyabbhutacittajātā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā attamanā paṭivedesuṃ.
atk-s0503a:974_11: Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū…pe… antarahito so, bhante, saddo”ti.
atk-s0503a:975_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā “titthiyānaṃ idaṃ kamma”nti bhikkhūnaṃ nārocesi? Ariyānaṃ tāva
atk-s0503a:975_1: ārocanena payojanaṃ natthi, puthujjanesu pana “ye na saddaheyyuṃ, tesaṃ taṃ dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0503a:975_2: ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvatteyyā”ti nārocesi. Apicetaṃ buddhānaṃ anāciṇṇaṃ, yaṃ anāgatassa
atk-s0503a:975_3: īdisassa vatthussa ācikkhanaṃ. Parānuddesikameva hi bhagavā saṃkilesapakkhaṃ vibhāveti,
atk-s0503a:975_4: kammañca katokāsaṃ na sakkā nivattetunti abbhakkhānaṃ tannimittañca bhagavā ajjhupekkhanto
atk-s0503a:980_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti mammacchedanavasenāpi bālajanehi pavattitaṃ duruttavacanaṃ khantibalasamannāgatassa
atk-s0503a:980_1: dhīrassa duttitikkhā nāma natthīti imamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti
atk-s0503a:981_0: Tattha tudanti vācāya janā asaññatā, sarehi saṅgāmagataṃva kuñjaranti kāyikasaṃvarādīsu
atk-s0503a:981_1: kassacipi saṃvarassa abhāvena asaṃyatā avinītā bālajanā sarehi sāyakehi saṅgāmagataṃ
atk-s0503a:981_2: yuddhagataṃ kuñjaraṃva hatthināgaṃ paṭiyodhā viya vācāsattīhi tudanti vijjhanti,
atk-s0503a:981_3: ayaṃ tesaṃ sabhāvo. Sutvāna vākyaṃ pharusaṃ udīritaṃ, adhivāsaye bhikkhu aduṭṭhacittoti
atk-s0503a:981_4: taṃ pana tehi bālajanehi udīritaṃ bhāsitaṃ mammaghaṭṭanavasena pavattitaṃ pharusaṃ
atk-s0503a:981_5: vākyaṃ vacanaṃ abhūtaṃ bhūtato nibbeṭhento mama kakacūpamaovādaṃ anussaranto īsakampi
atk-s0503a:981_6: aduṭṭhacitto hutvā “saṃsārasabhāvo eso”ti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhaṇasīlo bhikkhu adhivāsaye,
atk-s0503a:982_0: Etthāha – kiṃ pana taṃ kammaṃ, yaṃ aparimāṇakālaṃ sakkaccaṃ upacitavipulapuññasambhāro
atk-s0503a:982_1: satthā evaṃ dāruṇaṃ abhūtabbhakkhānaṃ pāpuṇīti? Vuccate – ayaṃ so bhagavā bodhisattabhūto
atk-s0503a:982_2: atītajātiyaṃ munāḷi nāma dhutto hutvā pāpajanasevī ayonisomanasikārabahulo vicarati.
atk-s0503a:982_3: So ekadivasaṃ surabhiṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ cīvaraṃ pārupantaṃ
atk-s0503a:982_4: passi. Tasmiñca samaye aññatarā itthī tassa avidūrena gacchati. Dhutto “abrahmacārī
atk-s0503a:982_5: ayaṃ samaṇo”ti abbhācikkhi. So tena kammena bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā
atk-s0503a:982_6: tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena idāni buddho hutvāpi sundariyā kāraṇā abhūtabbhakkhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:982_7: pāpuṇi. Yathā cetaṃ, evaṃ ciñcamāṇavikādīnaṃ vikārakitthīnaṃ bhagavato abbhakkhānādīni
atk-s0503a:982_8: dukkhāni pattāni, sabbāni pubbe katassa kammassa vipākāvasesāni, yāni “kammapilotikānī”ti
atk-s0503a:987: “Suṇātha bhikkhavo mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
atk-s0503a:998: Taṃ abbhakkhāya niraye, ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ mayā.
atk-s0503a:1033: Pāde chaviṃ pakappesi, na hi kammaṃ vinassati.
atk-s0503a:1038: Sakkā ca sabbe haññiṃsu, yadā hani viṭaṭūbho.
atk-s0503a:1041: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo.
atk-s0503a:1052: Kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā.
atk-s0503a:1063: 39. Navame upasenassāti ettha upasenoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ, vaṅgantabrāhmaṇassa pana puttattā “vaṅgantaputto”ti ca naṃ voharanti.
atk-s0503a:1064_0: Ayañhi thero āyasmato sāriputtassa kaniṭṭhabhātā, sāsane pabbajitvā apaññatte sikkhāpade
atk-s0503a:1064_1: upasampadāya dvivasso upajjhāyo hutvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasampādetvā tena saddhiṃ bhagavato
atk-s0503a:1064_2: upaṭṭhānaṃ gato, tassa bhikkhuno bhagavatā tassa saddhivihārikabhāvaṃ pucchitvā khandhake
atk-s0503a:1064_3: āgatanayena “atilahuṃ kho tvaṃ, moghapurisa, āvatto bāhullāya, yadidaṃ gaṇabandhiya”nti
atk-s0503a:1064_4: vigarahito patodābhitunno viya ājānīyo saṃviggamānaso “yadipāhaṃ idāni parisaṃ nissāya
atk-s0503a:1064_5: bhagavatā vigarahito, parisaṃyeva pana nissāya pāsaṃsiyo bhaveyya”nti ussāhajāto
atk-s0503a:1064_6: sabbe dhutadhamme samādāya vattamāno vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā na cirasseva chaḷabhiñño
atk-s0503a:1064_7: paṭisambhidāppatto mahākhīṇāsavo hutvā attano nissitake dhutaṅgadhare eva katvā tehi
atk-s0503a:1064_8: saddhiṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā santhatasikkhāpade āgatanayena “pāsādikā kho tyāyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1064_9: upasena, parisā”ti parisavasena bhagavato santikā laddhapasaṃso “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0503a:1064_10: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ samantapāsādikānaṃ yadidaṃ upaseno vaṅgantaputto”ti etadagge
atk-s0503a:1065_0: So ekadivasaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto antevāsikesu attano attano divāṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1065_1: gatesu udakakumbhato udakaṃ gahetvā pāde pakkhāletvā gattāni sītiṃ katvā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0503a:1065_2: attharitvā divāṭṭhāne divāvihāraṃ nisinno attano guṇe āvajjesi. Tassa te anekasatā
atk-s0503a:1065_3: anekasahassā poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu. So “mayhaṃ tāva sāvakassa sato ime evarūpā
atk-s0503a:1065_4: guṇā, kīdisā nu kho mayhaṃ satthu guṇā”ti bhagavato guṇābhimukhaṃ manasikāraṃ pesesi.
atk-s0503a:1065_5: Te tassa ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ anekakoṭisahassā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. So “evaṃsīlo me satthā evaṃdhammo
atk-s0503a:1065_6: evaṃpañño evaṃvimuttī”tiādinā ca “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1065_7: ca āvibhāvānurūpaṃ satthu guṇe anussaritvā, tato “svākkhāto”tiādinā dhammassa, “suppaṭipanno”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1065_8: ariyasaṅghassa ca guṇe anussari. Evaṃ mahāthero anekākāravokāraṃ ratanattayaguṇesu
atk-s0503a:1065_9: āvibhūtesu attamano pamudito uḷārapītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi. Tamatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1066_0: Tattha rahogatassāti rahasi gatassa. Paṭisallīnassāti ekībhūtassa. Evaṃ cetaso parivitakko
atk-s0503a:1066_1: udapādīti evaṃ idāni vuccamānākāro cittassa vitakko uppajji. Lābhā vata meti ye ime
atk-s0503a:1066_2: manussattabuddhuppādasaddhāsamadhigamādayo, aho vata me ete lābhā. Suladdhaṃ vata
atk-s0503a:1066_3: meti yañcidaṃ mayā bhagavato sāsane pabbajjūpasampadāratanattayapayirupāsanādi paṭiladdhaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1066_4: taṃ me aho vata suṭṭhu laddhaṃ. Tattha kāraṇamāha “satthā ca me”tiādinā.
atk-s0503a:1067_0: Tattha diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ satte anusāsatīti satthā.
atk-s0503a:1067_1: Bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā. Ārakattā kilesehi, kilesārīnaṃ hatattā, saṃsāracakkassa
atk-s0503a:1067_2: vā arānaṃ hatattā, paccayādīnaṃ arahattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvā arahaṃ. Sammā sāmañca
atk-s0503a:1067_3: sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhoti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge
atk-s0503a:1068_0: Svākkhāteti suṭṭhu akkhāte, ekantaniyyānikaṃ katvā bhāsite. Dhammavinayeti pāvacane.
atk-s0503a:1068_1: Tañhi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamānānaṃ saṃsāradukkhapātato dhāraṇena, rāgādikilese
atk-s0503a:1068_2: vinayanena ca dhammavinayoti vuccati. Sabrahmacārinoti seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1068_3: bhagavato sāsanaṃ ariyamaggaṃ saha caranti paṭipajjantīti sabrahmacārino. Sīlavantoti
atk-s0503a:1068_5: kalyāṇā sundarā dhammā etesaṃ atthīti kalyāṇadhammā. Etena saṅghassa suppaṭipattiṃ
atk-s0503a:1068_6: dasseti. Sīlesu camhi paripūrakārīti “ahampi pabbajitvā na tiracchānakathākathiko
atk-s0503a:1068_7: kāyadaḷhibahulo hutvā vihāsiṃ, atha kho pātimokkhasaṃvarādiṃ catubbidhampi sīlaṃ
atk-s0503a:1068_8: akhaṇḍaṃ achiddaṃ asabalaṃ akammāsaṃ bhujissaṃ viññuppasatthaṃ aparāmaṭṭhaṃ katvā
atk-s0503a:1068_9: paripūrento ariyamaggaṃyeva pāpesi”nti vadati. Etena heṭṭhimaphaladvayasampattimattano
atk-s0503a:1068_10: dīpeti. Sotāpannasakadāgāmino hi sīlesu paripūrakārino. Susamāhito camhi ekaggacittoti
atk-s0503a:1068_11: upacārappanābhedena samādhinā sabbathāpi samāhito ca amhi avikkhittacitto. Iminā
atk-s0503a:1068_12: samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritāvacanena tatiyaphalasampattimattano dīpeti. Anāgāmino hi
atk-s0503a:1068_13: samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino. Arahā camhi khīṇāsavoti kāmāsavādīnaṃ sabbaso khīṇattā
atk-s0503a:1068_14: khīṇāsavo, tato eva parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyatāya arahā
atk-s0503a:1068_15: camhi. Etena attano katakaraṇīyataṃ dasseti. Mahiddhiko camhi mahānubhāvoti adhiṭṭhānavikubbanādiiddhīsu
atk-s0503a:1068_16: mahatā vasībhāvena samannāgatattā mahiddhiko uḷārassa puññānubhāvassa guṇānubhāvassa
atk-s0503a:1068_17: ca sampattiyā mahānubhāvo ca asmi. Etena lokiyābhiññānavānupubbavihārasamāpattiyogamattano
atk-s0503a:1068_18: dīpeti. Abhiññāsu vasībhāvena hi ariyā yathicchitanipphādanena mahiddhikā, pubbūpanissayasampattiyā
atk-s0503a:1068_19: nānāvihārasamāpattīhi ca visodhitasantānattā mahānubhāvā ca hontīti.
atk-s0503a:1069_0: Bhaddakaṃ me jīvitanti evaṃvidhasīlādiguṇasamannāgatassa me yāvāyaṃ kāyo dharati,
atk-s0503a:1069_1: tāva sattānaṃ hitasukhameva vaḍḍhati, puññakkhettabhāvato jīvitampi me bhaddakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1069_2: sundaraṃ. Bhaddakaṃ maraṇanti sace panidaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ ajja vā imasmiṃyeva vā
atk-s0503a:1069_3: khaṇe anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyati, taṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ parinibbānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1069_4: maraṇampi me bhaddakanti ubhayattha tādibhāvaṃ dīpeti. Evaṃ mahāthero appahīnasomanassuppilāvitavāsanussannattā
atk-s0503a:1070: Taṃ satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitvā jīvite maraṇe ca tassa tādibhāvavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho bhagavā…pe… udānesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1071_0: Tattha yaṃ jīvitaṃ na tapatīti yaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ jīvitaṃ āyatiṃ khandhappavattiyā
atk-s0503a:1071_1: sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato na tapati na bādhati, vattamānameva vā jīvitaṃ sabbaso saṅkhatadhammattā
atk-s0503a:1071_2: satipaññāvepullappattiyā sabbattha satisampajaññasamāyogato na bādhati. Yo hi andhaputhujjano
atk-s0503a:1071_3: pāpajanasevī ayonisomanasikārabahulo akatakusalo akatapuñño, so “akataṃ vata me kalyāṇa”ntiādinā
atk-s0503a:1071_4: vippaṭisārena tapatīti tassa jīvitaṃ taṃ tapati nāma. Itare pana akatapāpā katapuññā
atk-s0503a:1071_5: kalyāṇaputhujjanena saddhiṃ satta sekhā tapanīyadhammaparivajjanena atapanīyadhammasamannāgamena
atk-s0503a:1071_6: ca pacchānutāpena na tapantīti na tesaṃ jīvitaṃ tapati. Khīṇāsave pana vattabbameva
atk-s0503a:1072_0: Maraṇante na socatīti maraṇasaṅkhāte ante pariyosāne, maraṇasamīpe vā na socati anāgāmimaggeneva
atk-s0503a:1072_1: sokassa samugghātitattā. Sa ve diṭṭhapado dhīro, sokamajjhe na socatīti so anabhijjhādīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:1072_2: catunnaṃ dhammapadānaṃ nibbānasseva vā diṭṭhattā diṭṭhapado, dhitisampannattā dhīro
atk-s0503a:1072_3: khīṇāsavo socanadhammattā “sokā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ avītarāgānaṃ sattānaṃ, sokahetūnaṃ
atk-s0503a:1072_4: vā lokadhammānaṃ majjhe ṭhatvāpi na socati.
atk-s0503a:1073_0: Idānissa sabbaso sokahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ “ucchinnabhavataṇhassā”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0503a:1073_1: yassa aggamaggena sabbaso ucchinnā bhavataṇhā, so ucchinnabhavataṇho. Tassa avasesakilesānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1073_2: anavasesavūpasamena santacittassa khīṇāsavabhikkhuno. Vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāroti jātiādiko –
atk-s0503a:1076_0: Vuttalakkhaṇo saṃsāro visesato khīṇo. Tasmā natthi tassa punabbhavoti yasmā tassa
atk-s0503a:1076_1: evarūpassa ariyapuggalassa āyatiṃ punabbhavo natthi, tasmā tassa jātisaṃsāro khīṇo.
atk-s0503a:1076_2: Kasmā panassa punabbhavo natthi? Yasmā ucchinnabhavataṇho santacitto ca hoti, tasmāti
atk-s0503a:1076_3: āvattetvā vattabbaṃ. Atha vā vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, tato eva natthi tassa punabbhavoti attho yojetabbo.
atk-s0503a:1079: 40. Dasame attano upasamanti sāvakapāramīmatthakappattiyā hetubhūtaṃ aggamaggena attano anavasesakilesavūpasamaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1080_2: disvā atītānāgatepi nesaṃ vaṭṭamūlakadukkhaṃ parituletvā karuṇāyamāno attanāpi puthujjanakāle
atk-s0503a:1080_3: anubhūtaṃ kilesanimittaṃ vā anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ anussaritvā “īdisassa nāma mahādukkhassa
atk-s0503a:1080_4: hetubhūtā kilesā idāni me suppahīnā”ti attano kilesavūpasamaṃ abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhati.
atk-s0503a:1080_5: Paccavekkhanto ca “ime ettakā kilesā sotāpattimaggena upasamitā, ettakā sakadāgāmimaggena,
atk-s0503a:1080_6: ettakā anāgāmimaggena, ettakā arahattamaggena upasamitā”ti taṃtaṃmaggañāṇehi odhiso
atk-s0503a:1080_7: kilesānaṃ upasamitabhāvaṃ paccavekkhati, tena vuttaṃ – “attano upasamaṃ paccavekkhamāno”ti.
atk-s0503a:1081_0: Apare “thero arahattaphalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā taṃ paccavekkhitvā ‘imassa vatāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1081_1: santapaṇītabhāvo accantasantāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā ārammaṇato, sayañca sammadeva
atk-s0503a:1081_2: kilesavūpasamato’ti evaṃ abhiṇhaṃ upasamaṃ paccavekkhatī”ti vadanti. Aññe pana “anavasesakilesānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1081_3: upasamapariyosāne jātaṃ aggaphalamevettha upasamo nāma, taṃ paccavekkhamāno nisinno”ti.
atk-s0503a:1082_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti yadidaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa mahāpaññatādihetubhūtaṃ sāvakesu
atk-s0503a:1082_1: anaññasādhāraṇaṃ kilesappahānaṃ aggaphalaṃ vā upasamapariyāyena vuttaṃ, tassa paccavekkhaṇasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1082_2: atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadanubhāvadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1083_0: Tattha upasantasantacittassāti upasantameva hutvā santaṃ cittaṃ etassāti upasantasantacitto.
atk-s0503a:1083_1: Samāpattiyā vikkhambhanena hi upasantakilesattā upasantacittaṃ na sabbathā “upasantasanta”nti
atk-s0503a:1083_2: vuccati tassa upasamassa anaccantikabhāvato, na tathā aggamaggena. Tena pana accantameva
atk-s0503a:1083_3: kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā arahato cittaṃ puna kilesānaṃ anupasametabbatāya samathavipassanāheṭṭhimamaggehi
atk-s0503a:1083_4: upasantakilesaṃ hutvā accantasantabhāvatova “upasantasanta”nti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:1083_5: – “upasantameva hutvā santaṃ cittaṃ etassāti upasantasantacitto”ti. Upasantanti vā
atk-s0503a:1083_6: upasamo vuccati, tasmā “upasantasantacittassā”ti accantūpasamena santacittassāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1084_0: Atha vā satipi sabbesaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ anavasesakilesavūpasame sāvakapāramīñāṇassa
atk-s0503a:1084_1: pana matthakappattihetubhūto sāvakesu anaññasādhāraṇo saviseso dhammasenāpatino kilesavūpasamoti
atk-s0503a:1085_0: Tatrāyamattho – bhusaṃ daḷhaṃ vā santaṃ upasantaṃ, tena upasantena upasantameva hutvā
atk-s0503a:1085_1: santaṃ upasantasantaṃ, tādisaṃ cittaṃ etassāti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva. Tathā hesa
atk-s0503a:1085_2: bhagavatā – “sāriputto, bhikkhave, mahāpañño puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño tikkhapañño
atk-s0503a:1085_3: nibbedhikapañño”tiādinā anekapariyāyena vaṇṇito thomito. Netticchinnassāti netti
atk-s0503a:1085_4: vuccati bhavataṇhā saṃsārassa nayanato, sā netti chinnā etassāti netticchinno. Tassa
atk-s0503a:1085_5: netticchinnassa, pahīnataṇhassāti attho. Mutto so mārabandhanāti so evaṃvidho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano
atk-s0503a:1085_6: sabbasmā mārabandhanato mutto, na tassa mārabandhanamocanāya karaṇīyaṃ atthi, tasmā
atk-s0503a:1085_7: dhammasenāpati attano upasamaṃ paccavekkhatīti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0503a:1090_0: 41. Mahāvaggassa paṭhame mallikāya deviyā saddhinti mallikāya nāma attano mahesiyā
atk-s0503a:1090_1: saha. Uparipāsādavaragatoti pāsādavarassa upari gato. Kocañño attanā piyataroti koci
atk-s0503a:1090_2: añño attanā piyāyitabbataro. Atthi nu kho teti “kiṃ te atthī”ti deviṃ pucchati.
atk-s0503a:1091_0: Kasmā pucchati? Ayañhi sāvatthiyaṃ duggatamālākārassa dhītā. Ekadivasaṃ āpaṇato pūvaṃ
atk-s0503a:1091_1: gahetvā mālārāmaṃ gantvā “khādissāmī”ti gacchantī paṭipathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ
atk-s0503a:1091_2: bhagavantaṃ bhikkhācāraṃ pavisantaṃ disvā pasannacittā taṃ bhagavato adāsi. Satthā
atk-s0503a:1091_3: tathārūpe ṭhāne nisīdanākāraṃ dassesi. Ānandatthero cīvaraṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. Bhagavā
atk-s0503a:1091_4: tattha nisīditvā taṃ pūvaṃ paribhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi. Thero
atk-s0503a:1091_5: “ko imissā, bhante, dānassa vipāko bhavissatī”ti pucchi. “Ajjesā, ānanda, tathāgatassa
atk-s0503a:1091_6: paṭhamaṃ bhojanaṃ adāsi, ajjeva kosalarañño aggamahesī bhavissati piyā manāpā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1091_7: Taṃ divasameva ca rājā kāsigāme bhāgineyyena saddhiṃ yujjhitvā parājito palāyitvā
atk-s0503a:1091_8: āgato nagaraṃ pavisanto “balakāyassa āgamanaṃ āgamessāmī”ti taṃ mālārāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0503a:1091_9: Sā rājānaṃ āgataṃ passitvā tassa vattamakāsi. Rājā tassā vatte pasīditvā pitaraṃ
atk-s0503a:1091_10: pakkosāpetvā mahantaṃ issariyaṃ datvā taṃ antepuraṃ paṭiharāpetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne
atk-s0503a:1091_11: ṭhapesi. Athekadivasaṃ rājā cintesi – “mayā imissā mahantaṃ issariyaṃ dinnaṃ, yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1091_12: imaṃ puccheyyaṃ ‘ko te piyo’ti? Sā ‘tvaṃ me, mahārāja, piyo’ti vatvā, puna maṃ pucchissati,
atk-s0503a:1091_13: athassāhaṃ ‘mayhampi tvaṃyeva piyā’ti vakkhāmī”ti. Iti so aññamaññaṃ vissāsajananatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1092_0: Devī pana paṇḍitā buddhupaṭṭhāyikā saṅghupaṭṭhāyikā “nāyaṃ pañho rañño mukhaṃ ulloketvā
atk-s0503a:1092_1: kathetabbo”ti cintetvā yathābhūtameva vadantī “natthi kho me, mahārāja, kocañño attanā
atk-s0503a:1092_2: piyataro”ti āha. Vatvāpi attanā byākatamatthaṃ upāyena rañño paccakkhaṃ kātukāmā
atk-s0503a:1092_3: “tuyhaṃ pana, mahārāja, atthañño koci attanā piyataro”ti tatheva rājānaṃ pucchi yathā
atk-s0503a:1092_4: raññā sayaṃ puṭṭhā. Rājāpi tāya sarasalakkhaṇena kathitattā nivattituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0503a:1092_5: sayampi sarasalakkhaṇeneva kathento tatheva byākāsi yathā deviyā byākataṃ.
atk-s0503a:1093_0: Byākaritvā ca mandadhātukatāya evaṃ cintesi – “ahaṃ rājā pathavissaro mahantaṃ pathavimaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0503a:1093_1: abhivijiya ajjhāvasāmi, mayhaṃ tāva yuttaṃ ‘attanā piyataraṃ aññaṃ na passāmī’ti,
atk-s0503a:1093_2: ayaṃ pana vasalī hīnajaccā samānā mayā ucce ṭhāne ṭhapitā sāmibhūtaṃ maṃ na tathā
atk-s0503a:1093_3: piyāyati, ‘attāva piyataro’ti mama sammukhā vadati, yāva kakkhaḷā vatāya”nti anattamano
atk-s0503a:1093_4: hutvā “nanu te tīṇi ratanāni piyatarānī”ti codesi. Devī ‘ratanattayaṃpāhaṃ deva attano
atk-s0503a:1093_5: saggasukhaṃ mokkhasukhañca patthayantī sampiyāyāmi, tasmā attāva me piyataro”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:1093_6: Sabbo cāyaṃ loko attadatthameva paraṃ piyāyati, puttaṃ patthentopi “ayaṃ maṃ jiṇṇakāle
atk-s0503a:1093_7: posessatī”ti pattheti, dhītaraṃ “mama kulaṃ vaḍḍhissatī”ti, bhariyaṃ “mayhaṃ pāde
atk-s0503a:1093_8: paricarissatī”ti, aññepi ñātimittabandhave taṃtaṃkiccavasena, iti attadatthameva
atk-s0503a:1093_9: sampassanto loko paraṃ piyāyatīti. Ayañhi deviyā adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1094_0: Atha rājā cintesi – “ayaṃ mallikā kusalā paṇḍitā nipuṇā ‘attāva me piyataro’ti vadati,
atk-s0503a:1094_1: mayhampi attāva piyataro hutvā upaṭṭhāti, handāhaṃ imamatthaṃ satthu ārocessāmi,
atk-s0503a:1094_2: yathā ca me satthā byākarissati, tathā naṃ dhāressāmī”ti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā satthu
atk-s0503a:1094_3: santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo…pe… piyataro”ti.
atk-s0503a:1095: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ “loke sabbasattānaṃ attāva attano piyataro”ti raññā vuttamatthaṃ sabbaso jānitvā tadatthaparidīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1096_0: Tattha sabbā disā anuparigamma cetasāti sabbā anavasesā dasapi disā pariyesanavasena
atk-s0503a:1096_1: cittena anugantvā. Nevajjhagā piyataramattanā kvacīti attanā atisayena piyaṃ aññaṃ
atk-s0503a:1096_2: koci puriso sabbussāhena pariyesanto kvaci katthaci sabbadisāsu neva adhigaccheyya
atk-s0503a:1096_3: na passeyya. Evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresanti evaṃ kassaci attanā piyatarassa anupalabbhanavasena
atk-s0503a:1096_4: puthu visuṃ visuṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ attāva piyo. Tasmā na hiṃse paramattakāmoti
atk-s0503a:1096_5: yasmā evaṃ sabbopi satto attānaṃ piyāyati attano sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo, tasmā
atk-s0503a:1096_6: attakāmo attano hitasukhaṃ icchanto paraṃ sattaṃ antamaso kunthakipillikaṃ upādāya
atk-s0503a:1096_7: na hiṃse na haneyya na pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhipi viheṭheyya. Parassa hi attanā kate dukkhe
atk-s0503a:1096_8: taṃ tato saṅkamantaṃ viya kālantare attani sandissati. Ayañhi kammānaṃ dhammatāti.
atk-s0503a:1099_0: 42. Dutiye acchariyaṃ, bhanteti idampi meghiyasutte viya garahaṇacchariyavasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1099_1: Yāva appāyukāti yattakaṃ parittāyukā, atiittarajīvitāti attho. Sattāhajāteti sattāhena
atk-s0503a:1099_2: jāto sattāhajāto. Tasmiṃ sattāhajāte, jātassa sattame ahanīti attho. Tusitaṃ kāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1100_0: Ekadivasaṃ kira thero pacchābhattaṃ divāṭṭhāne nisinno lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1100_1: sobhaggappattaṃ dassanānuttariyabhūtaṃ bhagavato rūpakāyasiriṃ manasi karitvā, “aho
atk-s0503a:1100_2: buddhānaṃ rūpakāyasampatti dassanīyā samantapāsādikā manoharā”ti uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ
atk-s0503a:1100_3: paṭisaṃvedento evaṃ cintesi – “vijātamātuyā nāma virūpopi putto surūpo viya manāpo
atk-s0503a:1100_4: hoti, sace pana buddhānaṃ mātā mahāmāyā devī dhareyya, kīdisaṃ nu kho tassā bhagavato
atk-s0503a:1100_5: rūpadassane pītisomanassaṃ uppajjeyya, mahājāni kho mayhaṃ mahāmātu deviyā, yā sattāhajāte
atk-s0503a:1100_6: bhagavati kālakatā”ti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano parivitakkitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1101_0: Keci panāhu – “mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ mahatā āyāsena pabbajjaṃ yācitvāpi
atk-s0503a:1101_1: paṭikkhittā, mayā pana upāyena yācito bhagavā aṭṭhagarudhammappaṭiggahaṇavasena tassā
atk-s0503a:1101_2: pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca anujāni, sā te dhamme paṭiggahetvā laddhapabbajjūpasampadā
atk-s0503a:1101_3: bhagavato dutiyaṃ parisaṃ uppādetvā catutthāya parisāya paccayo ahosi. Sace pana
atk-s0503a:1101_4: bhagavato janetti mahāmāyā devī dhareyya, evametā cubhopi khattiyabhaginiyo ekato
atk-s0503a:1101_5: hutvā imaṃ sāsanaṃ sobheyyuṃ, bhagavā ca mātari bahumānena mātugāmassa sāsane pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0503a:1101_6: upasampadañca sukheneva anujāneyya, appāyukatāya panassā kasirena nipphannamidanti
atk-s0503a:1101_7: iminā adhippāyena thero bhagavato santike ‘acchariyaṃ, bhante’tiādimāhā”ti. Taṃ akāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1101_8: Bhagavā hi mātuyā vā aññassa vā mātugāmassa attano sāsane pabbajjaṃ anujānanto garukaṃyeva
atk-s0503a:1102_1: thero manasi karitvā yā evaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ nāma loke aggapuggalaṃ satthāraṃ kucchinā
atk-s0503a:1102_2: dasa māse parihari, sā buddhamātā kassaci paricārikā bhavissatīti ayuttamidaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:1102_3: Satthu guṇānucchavikamevetaṃ, yadidaṃ sattāhajāte bhagavati janetti kālaṃ karoti,
atk-s0503a:1102_4: kālakatā ca tusitesu uppajjatīti acchariyabbhutacittajāto hutvā taṃ attano vitakkuppādanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1103_0: Satthā pana yasmā sattāhajātesu bodhisattesu bodhisattamātu kālakiriyā dhammatā siddhā,
atk-s0503a:1103_1: tasmā taṃ dhammataṃ paridīpento “evametaṃ, ānandā”tiādimāha. Sā panāyaṃ dhammatā
atk-s0503a:1103_2: yasmā yathā sabbe bodhisattā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0503a:1103_3: ṭhatvā āyupariyosāne dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi sannipatitvā abhisambodhiṃ pattuṃ
atk-s0503a:1103_4: manussaloke paṭisandhiggahaṇāya ajjhesitā kāladīpadesakulāni viya janettiyā āyuparimāṇampi
atk-s0503a:1103_5: oloketvā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti, ayampi bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tatheva tusitapure
atk-s0503a:1103_6: ṭhito pañca mahāvilokanāni vilokento sattadivasādhikadasamāsaparimāṇaṃ mātuyā āyuparimāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1103_7: paricchinditvā “ayaṃ mama paṭisandhiggahaṇassa kālo, idāni uppajjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0503a:1103_8: ñatvāva paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi, tasmā sabbabodhisattānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇavaseneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1103_9: Tenāha bhagavā – “appāyukā hi, ānanda, bodhisattamātaro hontī”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:1104_0: Tattha kālaṃ karontīti yathāvuttaāyuparikkhayeneva kālaṃ karonti, na vijātapaccayā.
atk-s0503a:1104_1: Carimattabhāvehi bodhisattehi vasitaṭṭhānaṃ cetiyagharasadisaṃ hoti, na aññesaṃ paribhogārahaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1104_2: na ca sakkā bodhisattamātaraṃ apanetvā aññaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapetunti tattakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1104_3: eva bodhisattamātu āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti, tasmā tadā kālaṃ karonti. Imameva hi atthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1105_0: Katarasmiṃ pana vaye kālaṃ karontīti? Majjhimavaye. Paṭhamavayasmiñhi sattānaṃ attabhāve
atk-s0503a:1105_1: chandarāgo balavā hoti, tena tadā sañjātagabbhā itthiyo yebhuyyena gabbhaṃ anurakkhituṃ
atk-s0503a:1105_2: na sakkonti. Gaṇheyyuṃ ce, gabbho bahvābādho hoti. Majjhimavayassa pana dve koṭṭhāse
atk-s0503a:1105_3: atikkamitvā tatiyakoṭṭhāse vatthu visadaṃ hoti, visade vatthumhi nibbattadārakā arogā
atk-s0503a:1105_4: honti, tasmā bodhisattamātaro paṭhamavaye sampattiṃ anubhavitvā majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse
atk-s0503a:1106_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ bodhisattamātu aññesañca sabbasattānaṃ attabhāve āyussa
atk-s0503a:1107_0: Tattha ye kecīti aniyamaniddeso. Bhūtāti nibbattā. Bhavissantīti anāgate nibbattissanti.
atk-s0503a:1107_1: Vāsaddo vikappattho, apisaddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena nibbattamānepi saṅgaṇhāti. Ettāvatā
atk-s0503a:1107_2: atītādivasena tiyaddhapariyāpanne satte anavasesato pariyādiyati. Apica gabbhaseyyakasattā
atk-s0503a:1107_3: gabbhato nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya bhūtā nāma, tato pubbe bhavissanti nāma. Saṃsedajūpapātikā
atk-s0503a:1107_4: paṭisandhicittato parato bhūtā nāma, tato pubbe uppajjitabbabhavavasena bhavissanti
atk-s0503a:1107_5: nāma. Sabbepi vā paccuppannabhavavasena bhūtā nāma, āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena bhavissanti
atk-s0503a:1107_6: nāma. Khīṇāsavā bhūtā nāma. Te hi bhūtā eva, na puna bhavissantīti, tadaññe bhavissanti nāma.
atk-s0503a:1108_0: Sabbe gamissanti pahāya dehanti sabbe yathāvuttabhedā sabbabhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsādivasena
atk-s0503a:1108_1: anekabhedabhinnā sattā dehaṃ attano sarīraṃ pahāya nikkhipitvā paralokaṃ gamissanti,
atk-s0503a:1108_2: asekkhā pana nibbānaṃ. Ettha koci acavanadhammo nāma natthīti dasseti. Taṃ sabbajāniṃ
atk-s0503a:1108_3: kusalo viditvāti tadetaṃ sabbassa sattassa jāniṃ hāniṃ maraṇaṃ, sabbassa vā sattassa
atk-s0503a:1108_4: jāniṃ vināsaṃ pabhaṅgutaṃ kusalo paṇḍitajātiko maraṇānussativasena aniccatāmanasikāravasena
atk-s0503a:1108_5: vā jānitvā. Ātāpiyo brahmacariyaṃ careyyāti vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto ātāpiyasaṅkhātena
atk-s0503a:1108_6: vīriyena samannāgatattā ātāpiyo catubbidhasammappadhānavasena āraddhavīriyo anavasesamaraṇasamatikkamanūpāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1111_0: 43. Tatiye rājagahe suppabuddho nāma kuṭṭhī ahosīti suppabuddhanāmako eko puriso
atk-s0503a:1111_1: rājagahe ahosi. So ca kuṭṭhī kuṭṭharogena bāḷhavidūsitagatto. Manussadaliddoti yattakā
atk-s0503a:1111_2: rājagahe manussā tesu sabbaduggato. So hi saṅkārakūṭavatiādīsu manussehi chaḍḍitapilotikakhaṇḍāni
atk-s0503a:1111_3: sibbitvā paridahati, kapālaṃ gahetvā gharā gharaṃ gantvā laddhaācāmaucchiṭṭhabhattāni
atk-s0503a:1111_4: nissāya jīvati, tampi pubbe katakammapaccayā na yāvadatthaṃ labhati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:1111_6: manussānaṃ hīḷitaparibhūtatāya ativiya dīno. Mahatiyā parisāyāti mahatiyā bhikkhuparisāya
atk-s0503a:1112_0: Ekadivasaṃ kira bhagavā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0503a:1112_2: nikkhanto yehi dānaṃ dinnaṃ, tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ avasesabhikkhūnañca āgamanaṃ āgamayamāno
atk-s0503a:1112_3: antonagareyeva aññatarasmiṃ ramaṇīye padese aṭṭhāsi. Tāvadeva bhikkhū tato tato āgantvā
atk-s0503a:1112_4: bhagavantaṃ parivāresuṃ, upāsakāpi “anumodanaṃ sutvā vanditvā nivattissāmā”ti bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1112_5: upasaṅkamiṃsu, mahāsannipāto ahosi. Bhagavā nisīdanākāraṃ dassesi. Tāvadeva buddhārahaṃ
atk-s0503a:1112_6: āsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ. Atha bhagavā asītianubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitehi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi
atk-s0503a:1112_8: vasena chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjentiyā anupamāya rūpakāyasiriyā sakalameva taṃ
atk-s0503a:1112_9: padesaṃ obhāsento tārāgaṇaparivuto viya puṇṇacando bhikkhugaṇaparivuto paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0503a:1112_10: nisīditvā manosilātale kesarasīho viya sīhanādaṃ nadanto karavīkarutamañjunā brahmassarena dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0503a:1113_0: Bhikkhūpi kho appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā āraddhavīriyā pahitattā codakā
atk-s0503a:1113_1: pāpagarahino vattāro vacanakkhamā sīlasampannā samādhisampannā paññāsampannā vimuttisampannā
atk-s0503a:1113_2: vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā suvammitā viya
atk-s0503a:1113_3: gandhahatthino bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti. Upāsakāpi suddhavatthanivatthā
atk-s0503a:1113_4: suddhuttarāsaṅgā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ mahādānāni pavattetvā gandhamālādīhi bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1113_5: pūjetvā vanditvā bhikkhusaṅghassa nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca
atk-s0503a:1113_6: parivāretvā saṃyatahatthapādā ohitasotā sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇanti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:1113_7: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hotī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1114_0: Suppabuddho pana jighacchādubbalyapareto ghāsapariyesanaṃ caramāno antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇo
atk-s0503a:1114_1: dūratova taṃ mahājanasannipātaṃ disvā, “kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ mahājanakāyo sannipatito,
atk-s0503a:1114_2: addhā ettha bhojanaṃ dīyati maññe, appeva nāmettha gatena kiñci khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1114_3: vā laddhuṃ sakkā”ti sañjātābhilāso tattha gantvā addasa bhagavantaṃ pāsādikaṃ dassanīyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1114_4: pasādanīyaṃ uttamadamathasamathamanuppattaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santindriyaṃ susamāhitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1114_5: tāya parisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ, disvāna purimajātisambhatāya paripakkāya
atk-s0503a:1114_7: nisīdi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “addasā kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī…pe… tattheva ekamantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1115_0: Sabbāvantanti sabbāvatiṃ hīnādisabbapuggalavataṃ, tattha kiñcipi anavasesetvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1115_2: ñāṇaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ, tasmā āsayānusayañāṇena indriyaparopariyattañāṇena cāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1115_3: Ceto paricca manasākāsīti tassā parisāya cittaṃ paccekaṃ paricchinditvā manasi akāsi
atk-s0503a:1115_4: te volokesi. Bhabbo dhammaṃ viññātunti maggaphaladhammaṃ adhigantuṃ samattho, upanissayasampannoti
atk-s0503a:1115_5: attho. Etadahosīti ayaṃ suppabuddho kiñcāpi tagarasikhimhi paccekabuddhe aparajjhitvā
atk-s0503a:1115_6: īdiso jāto, maggaphalūpanissayo panassa paṃsupaṭicchannasuvaṇṇanikkhaṃ viya antohadayeyeva
atk-s0503a:1115_7: vijjotati, tasmā suviññāpiyoti idaṃ ahosi. Tenāha – “ayaṃ kho idha bhabbo dhammaṃ viññātu”nti.
atk-s0503a:1116_0: Anupubbiṃ kathanti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ, sīlānantaraṃ saggaṃ, saggānantaraṃ magganti
atk-s0503a:1116_1: evaṃ anupaṭipāṭikathaṃ. Bhagavā hi paṭhamaṃ hetunā saddhiṃ assādaṃ dassetvā tato
atk-s0503a:1116_2: satte vivecetuṃ nānānayehi ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā ādīnavasavanena saṃviggahadayānaṃ nekkhammaguṇavibhāvanamukhena
atk-s0503a:1117_0: Dānakathanti idaṃ nāma sukhānaṃ nidānaṃ, sampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ, bhogānaṃ patiṭṭhā, visamagatassa
atk-s0503a:1117_1: tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ, idhalokaparalokesu dānasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ālambanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1117_2: tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi. Idañhi avassayaṭṭhena ratanamayasīhāsanasadisaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1117_5: maccheramalādīhi anupalittaṭṭhena padumaṃ, tesaṃ nidahanaṭṭhena jātavedo, durāsadaṭṭhena
atk-s0503a:1117_6: āsīviso, asantāsaṭṭhena sīho, balavantaṭṭhena hatthī, abhimaṅgalasammataṭṭhena setausabho,
atk-s0503a:1117_7: khemantabhūmisampāpanaṭṭhena valāhako assarājā. Dānañhi loke rajjasiriṃ deti, cakkavattisampattiṃ
atk-s0503a:1118_0: Yasmā pana dānaṃ dento sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkoti, tasmā dānakathānantaraṃ sīlakathaṃ
atk-s0503a:1118_1: kathesi. Sīlakathanti sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ sattānaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ālambanaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1118_2: gati parāyaṇaṃ. Idhalokaparalokasampattīnañhi sīlasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ālambanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1118_3: tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi, sīlālaṅkārasadiso alaṅkāro, sīlapupphasadisaṃ
atk-s0503a:1118_4: pupphaṃ, sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthi, sīlālaṅkārena hi alaṅkataṃ sīlakusumapiḷandhitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1118_5: sīlagandhānulittaṃ sadevako loko olokento tittiṃ na gacchatīti evamādīhi sīlaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ.
