atk-s0503a:1119_0: Idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labbhatīti dassetuṃ sīlānantaraṃ saggakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0503a:1119_1: Saggakathanti saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo, niccamettha kīḷā niccasampattiyo labbhanti,
atk-s0503a:1119_2: cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhanti,
atk-s0503a:1119_3: tāvatiṃsā tisso vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānīti evamādisaggaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1119_4: Saggasampattiṃ kathentānañhi buddhānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ “anekapariyāyena
atk-s0503a:1120_0: Evaṃ hetunā saddhiṃ saggakathāya palobhetvā puna hatthiṃ alaṅkaritvā tassa soṇḍaṃ
atk-s0503a:1120_1: chindanto viya “ayampi saggo anicco adhuvo, na ettha chandarāgo kātabbo”ti dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1120_2: “appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādinā nayena kāmānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1120_3: ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ kathesi. Tattha ādīnavanti dosaṃ. Okāranti lāmakasabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1120_4: aseṭṭhehi sevitabbaṃ seṭṭhehi na sevitabbaṃ nihīnasabhāvanti attho. Saṃkilesanti
atk-s0503a:1120_5: tehi sattānaṃ saṃsāre saṃkilissanaṃ. Tenāha – “kilissanti vata bho sattā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1121_0: Evaṃ kāmādīnavena tajjetvā nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi pabbajjāya jhānādīsu ca guṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1121_1: dīpesi vaṇṇesi. Kallacittantiādīsu kallacittanti kammaniyacittaṃ, heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya
atk-s0503a:1121_2: assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā uparidesanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamanena kammaniyacittaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1121_4: vinīvaraṇacittaṃ. Sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ uḷārapītipāmojjayogena udaggacittaṃ. Tattha saddhāsampattiyā
atk-s0503a:1122_0: Atha vā kallacittanti kāmacchandavigamena arogacittaṃ. Muducittanti byāpādavigamena
atk-s0503a:1122_2: na pihitacittaṃ. Udaggacittanti thinamiddhavigamena sampaggahavasena alīnacittaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1123_0: Athāti pacchā. Sāmukkaṃsikāti sāmaṃ ukkaṃsikā attanāva uddharitvā gahitā, sayambhūñāṇena
atk-s0503a:1123_1: sāmaṃ diṭṭhā, aññesaṃ asādhāraṇāti attho. Kā ca pana sāti? Ariyasaccadesanā. Tenevāha
atk-s0503a:1123_2: – “dukkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ magga”nti. Idañhi saccānaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ, tasmā imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1123_3: ṭhāne ariyasaccāni kathetabbāni, tāni sabbākārato vitthārena visuddhimagge vuttānīti
atk-s0503a:1124_0: Seyyathāpītiādinā upamāvasena suppabuddhassa kilesappahānaṃ ariyamagguppādañca dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1124_1: Apagatakāḷakanti vigatakāḷakaṃ. Sammadevāti suṭṭhuyeva. Rajananti nīlapītalohitamañjeṭṭhādiraṅgajātaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1124_2: Paṭiggaṇheyyāti gaṇheyya, pabhassaraṃ bhaveyya. Tasmiṃyeva āsaneti tassaṃyeva nisajjāyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1124_3: Etenassa lahuvipassanakatā tikkhapaññatā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññatā ca dassitā
atk-s0503a:1124_4: honti. Virajaṃ vītamalanti apāyagamanīyarāgarajādīnaṃ abhāvena virajaṃ, anavasesadiṭṭhivicikicchāmalāpagamena
atk-s0503a:1124_6: vītamalaṃ. Dhammacakkhunti sotāpattimaggo adhippeto. Tassa uppattiākāradassanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1124_7: “yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti vuttaṃ. Tañhi nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1124_8: katvā kiccavasena eva saṅkhatadhamme paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0503a:1125_0: Tatridaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ – vatthaṃ viya cittaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, vatthassa āgantukamalehi
atk-s0503a:1125_1: kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo, dhovanaphalakaṃ viya anupubbikathā,
atk-s0503a:1125_2: udakaṃ viya saddhā, udakena temetvā temetvā gomayakhārehi kāḷake sammadditvā vatthassa
atk-s0503a:1125_3: dhovanappayogo viya saddhāsalilena temetvā satisamādhipaññāhi dose sithile katvā
atk-s0503a:1125_4: saddhādividhinā cittassa sodhane vīriyārambho, tena payogena vatthe kāḷakāpagamo
atk-s0503a:1125_5: viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ, raṅgajātaṃ viya ariyamaggo, tena suddhassa
atk-s0503a:1125_6: vatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa cittassa maggena pariyodāpananti.
atk-s0503a:1126_0: Evaṃ pana suppabuddho parisapariyante nisinno dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ
atk-s0503a:1126_1: patvā attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ satthu ārocetukāmo parisamajjhaṃ ogāhituṃ avisahanto
atk-s0503a:1126_2: mahājanassa satthāraṃ vanditvā anugantvā nivattakāle bhagavati vihāraṃ gate sayampi
atk-s0503a:1126_3: vihāraṃ agamāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko devarājā “ayaṃ suppabuddho kuṭṭhī attanā satthu
atk-s0503a:1126_4: sāsane paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātukāmo”ti ñatvā “vīmaṃsissāmi na”nti gantvā ākāse
atk-s0503a:1126_5: ṭhito etadavoca – “suppabuddha tvaṃ manussadaliddo manussakapaṇo manussavarāko, ahaṃ
atk-s0503a:1126_6: te aparimitaṃ dhanaṃ dassāmi, ‘buddho na buddho, dhammo na dhammo, saṅgho na saṅgho,
atk-s0503a:1126_7: alaṃ me buddhena, alaṃ me dhammena, alaṃ me saṅghenā’ti vadehī”ti. Atha naṃ so āha
atk-s0503a:1126_8: “kosi tva”nti? “Ahaṃ sakko devarājā”ti. “Andhabāla ahirika, tvaṃ mayā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ
atk-s0503a:1126_9: na yuttarūpo, yo tvaṃ evaṃ avattabbaṃ vadesi, apica maṃ tvaṃ ‘duggato daliddo kapaṇo’ti
atk-s0503a:1126_10: kasmā vadesi, nanu ahaṃ lokanāthassa orasaputto, nevāhaṃ duggato na daliddo na kapaṇo,
atk-s0503a:1126_11: atha kho sukhappatto paramena sukhena apāhamasmi mahaddhano”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0503a:1128: Sutadhanañca cāgo ca, paññā ve sattamaṃ dhanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1129: “Yassa ete dhanā atthi, itthiyā purisassa vā;
atk-s0503a:1131: Tassimāni me satta ariyadhanāni santi. Yesañhi imāni dhanāni santi, na tveva te buddhehi vā paccekabuddhehi vā ‘daliddā’ti vuccantī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1132_0: Sakko tassa kathaṃ sutvā taṃ antarāmagge ohāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ taṃ
atk-s0503a:1132_1: vacanaṃ paṭivacanañca ārocesi. Atha naṃ bhagavā āha – “na kho sakka sakkā tādisānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1132_2: satenapi sahassenapi suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ ‘buddho na buddho, dhammo na dhammo, saṅgho
atk-s0503a:1132_3: na saṅgho’ti kathāpetu”nti. Suppabuddhopi kho kuṭṭhī satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthārā
atk-s0503a:1132_4: katapaṭisanthāro attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho suppabuddho
atk-s0503a:1133_0: Tattha diṭṭhadhammoti diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo etenāti diṭṭhadhammo. Sesapadesupi
atk-s0503a:1133_1: eseva nayo. Tattha “diṭṭhadhammo”ti cettha sāmaññavacano dhammasaddo. Dassanaṃ nāma
atk-s0503a:1133_2: ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthīti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “pattadhammo”ti vuttaṃ. Patti ca
atk-s0503a:1133_3: ñāṇasampattito aññāpi vijjatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “viditadhammo”ti vuttaṃ. Sā panāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1133_4: viditadhammatā dhammesu ekadesenāpi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “pariyogāḷhadhammo”ti
atk-s0503a:1133_5: vuttaṃ. Tenassa yathāvuttaṃ saccābhisambodhaṃyeva dīpeti. Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena
atk-s0503a:1133_6: pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesenapi pariññeyyadhammaṃ samantato ogāḷhaṃ nāma
atk-s0503a:1133_7: hoti, na tadaññañāṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo etenāti diṭṭhadhammo”ti.
atk-s0503a:1134_0: Tattha paṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā ca aṭṭhavatthukā ca tiṇṇā vicikicchā
atk-s0503a:1134_1: etenāti tiṇṇavicikiccho. Tato eva pavattiādīsu “evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho”ti evaṃ pavattitā
atk-s0503a:1134_2: vigatā samucchinnā kathaṃkathā etassāti vigatakathaṃkatho. Sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1134_3: pahīnattā tappaṭipakkhesu ca sīlādiguṇesu suppatiṭṭhitattā vesārajjaṃ visāradabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:1134_4: veyyattiyaṃ pattoti vesārajjappatto. Nāssa paro paccayo, na parassa saddhāya ettha
atk-s0503a:1135_1: anekesu atthesu dissati, idha pana abbhanumodane daṭṭhabbo. Teneva so pasādavasena
atk-s0503a:1135_2: pasaṃsāvasena ca dvikkhattuṃ vutto, sādhu sādhu, bhanteti vuttaṃ hoti. Abhikkantanti
atk-s0503a:1135_3: vā atikantaṃ atiiṭṭhaṃ atimanāpaṃ, atisundaranti attho. Tattha ekena abhikkantasaddena
atk-s0503a:1135_4: bhagavato desanaṃ thometi, ekena attano pasādaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1136_0: Ayañhettha adhippāyo – abhikkantaṃ, bhante, yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanā, abhikkantaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1136_1: bhante, yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādoti. Bhagavato eva vā vacanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1136_2: abhikkantaṃ dosanāsanato, abhikkantaṃ guṇādhigamanato, tathā saddhāvaḍḍhanato, paññājananato,
atk-s0503a:1136_3: sātthato, sabyañjanato, uttānapadato, gambhīratthato, kaṇṇasukhato, hadayaṅgamato,
atk-s0503a:1136_5: vimaddakkhamato, suyyamānasukhato, vīmaṃsiyamānahitatoti evamādinayehi thomento padadvayaṃ āha.
atk-s0503a:1137_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi. Tattha nikkujjitanti adhomukhaṭṭhapitaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1137_1: heṭṭhāmukhajātaṃ vā. Ukkujjeyyāti upari mukhaṃ kareyya. Paṭicchannanti tiṇapaṇṇādinā
atk-s0503a:1137_2: chāditaṃ. Vivareyyāti ugghāṭeyya. Mūḷhassāti disāmūḷhassa. Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe
atk-s0503a:1137_3: gahetvā “esa maggo”ti maggaṃ upadiseyya. Andhakāreti caturaṅgasamannāgate. Ayaṃ tāva padattho.
atk-s0503a:1138_0: Ayaṃ pana adhippāyayojanā – yathā koci nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyya, evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1138_1: asaddhamme patiṭṭhitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena, yathā paṭicchannaṃ vivareyya,
atk-s0503a:1138_2: evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato paṭṭhāya micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ
atk-s0503a:1138_3: sāsanaṃ vivarantena, yathā mūḷhassa maggaṃ ācikkheyya, evaṃ kummaggamicchāmaggappaṭipannassa
atk-s0503a:1138_4: me saggamokkhamaggaṃ āvikarontena, yathā andhakāre telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, evaṃ mohandhakāre
atk-s0503a:1138_6: bhagavatā nānānayehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
atk-s0503a:1139_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā tāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto
atk-s0503a:1139_1: “esāha”ntiādimāha. Tattha esāhanti eso ahaṃ. Bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti bhagavā
atk-s0503a:1139_2: me saraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ aghassa ghātā, hitassa vidhātāti iminā adhippāyena bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1139_3: gacchāmi bhajāmi, evaṃ vā jānāmi bujjhāmīti. Yesañhi dhātūnaṃ gatiattho, buddhipi
atk-s0503a:1139_4: tesaṃ atthoti. Dhammanti adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne
atk-s0503a:1139_5: catūsu apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo. So atthato ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0503a:1140: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1141: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti ca –
atk-s0503a:1142: Na kevalaṃ ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañca, apica kho ariyaphalehi saddhiṃ pariyattidhammopi. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0503a:1145: Ettha hi rāgavirāganti maggo vutto. Anejamasokanti phalaṃ. Asaṅkhatanti nibbānaṃ. Appaṭikūlaṃ madhuramimaṃ paguṇaṃ suvibhattanti pariyattidhammo vuttoti.
atk-s0503a:1146_1: suppabuddho tīṇi saraṇagamanāni paṭivedesi. Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge
atk-s0503a:1146_2: pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatanti ajjataggeti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvā. “Ajjadagge”tipi pāṭho,
atk-s0503a:1146_3: tattha dakāro padasandhikaro, ajja agge ajja ādiṃ katvāti attho. Pāṇupetanti pāṇehi
atk-s0503a:1146_4: upetaṃ, yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva upetaṃ anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi
atk-s0503a:1146_5: saraṇaṃ gataṃ ratanattayassa upāsanato upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhagavā upadhāretu
atk-s0503a:1146_6: jānātūti attho. Imassa ca saraṇagamanaṃ ariyamaggādhigameneva nipphannaṃ, ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1147_0: Bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvāti bhagavato vacanaṃ cittena abhinanditvā
atk-s0503a:1147_1: tameva abhinanditabhāvaṃ pakāsento vuttanayena vācāya anumoditvā. Abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1147_2: katvā pakkāmīti taṃ bhagavantaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1147_3: katvā satthu guṇaninnacitto yāva dassanavisayasamatikkamā bhagavantaṃyeva pekkhamāno
atk-s0503a:1148_0: Pakkanto ca kuṭṭharogābhibhavena chinnahatthapādaṅguli ukkāragatto samantato vissandamānāsavo
atk-s0503a:1148_1: kaṇḍūtipatipīḷito asuci duggandho jegucchatamo paramakāruññataṃ patto “nāyaṃ kāyo
atk-s0503a:1148_2: imassa accantasantassa paṇītatamassa ariyadhammassa ādhāro bhavituṃ yutto”ti uppannābhisandhinā
atk-s0503a:1148_3: viya saggasaṃvattaniyena puññakammena okāse kate appāyukasaṃvattaniyena upacchedakena
atk-s0503a:1148_4: pāpakammena katūpacitena codiyamāno taruṇavacchāya dhenuyā āpatitvā mārito. Tena
atk-s0503a:1148_5: vuttaṃ – “atha kho acirapakkantaṃ suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ gāvī taruṇavacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1149_0: So kira atīte eko seṭṭhiputto hutvā attano sahāyehi tīhi seṭṭhiputtehi saddhiṃ kīḷanto
atk-s0503a:1149_1: ekaṃ nagarasobhiniṃ gaṇikaṃ uyyānaṃ netvā divasaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavitvā atthaṅgate
atk-s0503a:1149_2: sūriye sahāye etadavoca – “imissā hatthe kahāpaṇasahassaṃ bahukañca suvaṇṇaṃ mahagghāni
atk-s0503a:1149_3: ca pasādhanāni saṃvijjanti, imasmiṃ vane añño koci natthi, ratti ca jātā, handa imaṃ
atk-s0503a:1149_4: mayaṃ māretvā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā gacchāmā”ti. Te cattāropi janā ekajjhāsayā hutvā
atk-s0503a:1149_5: taṃ māretuṃ upakkamiṃsu. Sā tehi māriyamānā “ime nillajjā nikkaruṇā mayā saddhiṃ
atk-s0503a:1149_6: kilesasanthavaṃ katvā niraparādhaṃ maṃ kevalaṃ dhanalobhena mārenti, ekavāraṃ tāva
atk-s0503a:1149_7: maṃ ime mārentu, ahaṃ pana yakkhinī hutvā anekavāraṃ ime māretuṃ samatthā bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0503a:1149_8: patthanaṃ katvā kālamakāsi. Tesu kira eko pakkusāti kulaputto ahosi, eko bāhiyo dārucīriyo,
atk-s0503a:1149_9: eko tambadāṭhiko coraghātako, eko suppabuddho kuṭṭhī, iti imesaṃ catunnaṃ janānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1149_10: anekasate attabhāve sā yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbattā gāvī hutvā jīvitā voropesi. Te tassa
atk-s0503a:1149_11: kammassa nissandena tattha tattha antarāmaraṇaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Evaṃ suppabuddhassa kuṭṭhissa
atk-s0503a:1149_12: sahasā maraṇaṃ jātaṃ, tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho acirapakkantaṃ…pe… voropesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1150: Atha sambahulā bhikkhū tassa kālakiriyaṃ bhagavato ārocetvā abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu. Bhagavā byākāsi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:1151_0: Tattha tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayāti sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāsoti
atk-s0503a:1151_1: imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhavabandhanānaṃ samucchedavasena pahānā. Sotāpannoti sotasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1152: “Soto sototi idaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, vuccati. Katamo nu kho, āvuso, sototi? Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:1153_0: Avinipātadhammoti vinipatanaṃ vinipāto, nāssa vinipāto dhammoti avinipātadhammo,
atk-s0503a:1153_1: catūsu apāyesu upapajjanavasena apatanasabhāvoti attho. Niyatoti dhammaniyāmena sammattaniyāmena
atk-s0503a:1153_2: niyato. Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ assa gati
atk-s0503a:1153_3: paṭisaraṇaṃ avassaṃ pattabbanti sambodhiparāyaṇo. Etena “tassa kā gati, ko abhisamparāyo”ti
atk-s0503a:1153_4: pucchāya bhaddikā eva suppabuddhassa gati, na pāpikāti ayamattho dassito. Na pana
atk-s0503a:1153_5: tena sampattā gati, taṃ pana pucchānusandhivasena pakāsetukāmo dhammarājā ettakameva
atk-s0503a:1153_6: abhāsi. Passati hi bhagavā “mayā ettake kathite imissaṃyeva parisati anusandhikusalo
atk-s0503a:1153_7: eko bhikkhu suppabuddhassa kuṭṭhibhāvadāliddiyakapaṇabhāvānaṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchissati,
atk-s0503a:1153_8: athāhaṃ tassa taṃ kāraṇaṃ tena pucchānusandhinā pakāsetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1153_9: Tenevāha – “evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhū”tiādi. Tattha hetūti asādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ, sādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1153_10: pana paccayoti, ayametesaṃ viseso. Yenāti yena hetunā yena paccayena ca.
atk-s0503a:1154_0: Bhūtapubbanti jātapubbaṃ. Atīte kāle nibbattaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ “suppabuddho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1154_1: Kadā pana bhūtanti? Atīte kira anuppanne tathāgate bārāṇasiyā sāmantā ekasmiṃ gāme
atk-s0503a:1154_2: ekā kuladhītā khettaṃ rakkhati. Sā ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pasannacittā tassa pañcahi
atk-s0503a:1154_3: lājāsatehi saddhiṃ ekaṃ padumapupphaṃ datvā pañca puttasatāni patthesi. Tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0503a:1154_4: khaṇe pañcasatā migaluddakā paccekabuddhassa madhuramaṃsaṃ datvā “etissā puttā bhaveyyāma,
atk-s0503a:1154_5: tumhehi pattavisesaṃ labheyyāmā”ti ca patthayiṃsu. Sā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devaloke
atk-s0503a:1154_6: nibbattā. Tato cutā ekasmiṃ jātassare padumagabbhe nibbatti. Tameko tāpaso disvā
atk-s0503a:1154_7: paṭijaggi. Tassā vicarantiyā pāduddhāre pāduddhāre bhūmito padumāni uṭṭhahanti. Eko
atk-s0503a:1154_8: vanacarako disvā bārāṇasirañño ārocesi. Rājā taṃ ānetvā aggamahesiṃ akāsi. Tassā
atk-s0503a:1154_9: kucchiyaṃ gabbho saṇṭhāsi. Mahāpadumakumāro tassā kucchiyaṃ vasi, sesā gabbhamalaṃ
atk-s0503a:1154_10: nissāya nibbattā, te vayappattā uyyāne padumasare kīḷantā ekekasmiṃ padume nisīditvā
atk-s0503a:1154_11: paripakkañāṇā saṅkhāresu khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā paccekabodhiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tesaṃ byākaraṇagāthā ahosi –
atk-s0503a:1159_0: Evaṃ paccekabodhiṃ abhisambuddhesu tesu pañcasu paccekabuddhasatesu abbhantaro tagarasikhī
atk-s0503a:1159_1: nāma paccekasambuddho gandhamādanapabbate nandamūlapabbhāre sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0503a:1159_2: samāpajjitvā sattāhassa accayena nirodhā vuṭṭhito ākāsena āgantvā isigilipabbate
atk-s0503a:1159_3: otaritvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Tasmiñca
atk-s0503a:1159_4: samaye rājagahe eko seṭṭhiputto mahatā parivārena uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ nagarato nikkhamanto
atk-s0503a:1159_5: tagarasikhipaccekabuddhaṃ disvā “ko ayaṃ bhaṇḍukāsāvavasano, kuṭṭhī bhavissati, tathā
atk-s0503a:1159_6: hi kuṭṭhicīvarena sarīraṃ pārupitvā gacchatī”ti niṭṭhubhitvā apasabyaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0503a:1159_7: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “suppabuddho kuṭṭhī imasmiṃyeva rājagahe…pe… pakkāmī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1160_0: Tattha kvāyanti ko ayaṃ. Khuṃsanavasena vadati. “Kovāya”ntipi pāḷi. Kuṭṭhīti akuṭṭhiṃyeva
atk-s0503a:1160_1: taṃ seṭṭhi kuṭṭharogaṃ akkosavatthuṃ pāpento vadati. Kuṭṭhicīvarenāti kuṭṭhīnaṃ cīvarena.
atk-s0503a:1160_3: yaṃ vā taṃ vā pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pārupati, evamayampīti dasseti. Paṃsukūlacīvaradharattā
atk-s0503a:1160_4: vā aggaḷānaṃ anekavaṇṇabhāvena kuṭṭhasarīrasadisoti hīḷento “kuṭṭhicīvarenā”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:1160_5: Niṭṭhubhitvāti kheḷaṃ pātetvā. Apasabyato karitvāti paṇḍitā tādisaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1160_6: disvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ karonti, ayaṃ pana aviññutāya paribhavena taṃ apasabyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1160_7: katvā attano apasabyaṃ apadakkhiṇaṃ katvā gato. “Apasabyāmato”tipi pāṭho. Tassa kammassāti
atk-s0503a:1160_9: pavattapāpakammassa. Niraye paccitthāti niraye nirayagginā dayhittha. “Paccitvā nirayagginā”tipi
atk-s0503a:1160_10: paṭhanti. Tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenāti yena kammena so niraye paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0503a:1160_11: na taṃ kammaṃ manussaloke vipākaṃ deti. Yā panassa nānakkhaṇikā cetanā tadā paccekabuddhe
atk-s0503a:1160_13: puññakammena manussesu tihetukapaṭisandhiyā dinnāya pavattiyaṃ kuṭṭhibhāvaṃ dāliddiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1160_14: paramakāruññataṃ āpādesi. Taṃ sandhāya kammasabhāgatāvasena “tasseva kammassa vipākavasesenā”ti
atk-s0503a:1160_15: vuttaṃ. Sadisepi hi loke tabbohāro diṭṭho yathā taṃ “sā eva tittirī, tāniyeva osadhānī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1161_0: Ettāvatā “ko nu kho, bhante, hetū”ti tena bhikkhunā puṭṭhapañhaṃ vissajjetvā idāni
atk-s0503a:1161_1: yo “tassa kā gati, ko abhisamparāyo”ti pubbe bhikkhūhi puṭṭhapañho, taṃ vissajjetuṃ
atk-s0503a:1161_2: “so tathāgatappavedita”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tathāgatappaveditanti tathāgatena bhagavatā
atk-s0503a:1161_3: desitaṃ akkhātaṃ pakāsitanti tathāgatappaveditaṃ. Āgammāti adhigantvā, nissāya ñatvā
atk-s0503a:1161_4: vā. “Tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye”tipi pāṭho. Saddhaṃ samādiyīti sammāsambuddho
atk-s0503a:1161_5: bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti ratanattayasannissayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1161_6: pubbabhāgasaddhañceva lokuttarasaddhañcāti duvidhampi saddhaṃ sammā ādiyi. Yathā
atk-s0503a:1161_7: na puna ādātabbā hoti, evaṃ yāva bhavakkhayā gaṇhi, attano cittasantāne uppādesīti
atk-s0503a:1161_8: attho. Sīlaṃ samādiyītiādīsupi eseva nayo. Sīlanti pubbabhāgasīlena saddhiṃ maggasīlaṃ
atk-s0503a:1161_9: phalasīlañca. Sutanti pariyattibāhusaccaṃ paṭivedhabāhusaccañcāti duvidhampi sutaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1161_10: Pariyattidhammāpi hi tena dhammassavanakāle saccappaṭivedhāya sāvakehi yathāladdhappakāraṃ
atk-s0503a:1161_11: sutā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā cāti. Cāganti paṭhamamaggavajjhakilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1161_12: vossaggasaṅkhātaṃ cāgaṃ, yena ariyasāvakā deyyadhammesu muttacāgā ca honti payatapāṇī
atk-s0503a:1161_13: vossaggaratā. Paññanti saddhiṃ vipassanāpaññāya maggapaññañceva phalapaññañca.
atk-s0503a:1162_0: Kāyassa bhedāti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā. Paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhagahaṇā.
atk-s0503a:1162_1: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā. Paraṃ maraṇāti cutito uddhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1162_2: Sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokanti padattayenāpi devalokameva vadati. So hi sampattīnaṃ sobhanattā
atk-s0503a:1162_3: sundarā gatīti sugati, rūpādīhi visesehi suṭṭhu aggoti saggo, sabbakālaṃ sukhamevettha
atk-s0503a:1162_4: lokiyati, lujjatīti vā lokoti vuccati. Upapannoti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena upagato.
atk-s0503a:1162_5: Sahabyatanti sahabhāvaṃ. Vacanattho pana saha byati pavattati, vasatīti vā sahabyo,
atk-s0503a:1162_6: sahaṭhāyī sahavāyī vā. Tassa bhāvo sahabyatā. Atirocatīti atikkamma abhibhavitvā
atk-s0503a:1162_7: rocati virocati. Vaṇṇenāti rūpasampattiyā. Yasasāti parivārena. So hi asucimakkhitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1162_9: gaṇhanto viya vuttappakāraṃ kaḷevaraṃ idha nikkhipitvā ekacittakkhaṇena yathāvuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:1163: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ pāpānaṃ aparivajjane ādīnavaṃ, parivajjane ca ānisaṃsaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthavibhāvanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1164_0: Tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yathā cakkhumā puriso parakkame kāyikavīriye vijjamāne sarīre
atk-s0503a:1164_1: vahante visamāni papātādiṭṭhānāni caṇḍabhāvena vā visamāni hatthiassaahikukkuragorūpādīni
atk-s0503a:1164_2: parivajjaye, evaṃ jīvalokasmiṃ imasmiṃ sattaloke paṇḍito sappañño puriso tāya sappaññatāya
atk-s0503a:1164_3: attano hitaṃ jānanto pāpāni lāmakāni duccaritāni parivajjeyya. Evañhi yathāyaṃ suppabuddho
atk-s0503a:1164_4: tagarasikhimhi paccekabuddhe pāpaṃ aparivajjetvā mahantaṃ anayabyasanaṃ āpajji, evaṃ
atk-s0503a:1164_5: āpajjeyyāti adhippāyo. Yathā vā suppabuddho kuṭṭhī mama dhammadesanaṃ āgamma idāni
atk-s0503a:1164_6: saṃvegappatto pāpāni parivajjento uḷāraṃ visesaṃ adhigañchi, evaṃ aññopi uḷāraṃ visesādhigamaṃ
atk-s0503a:1167_0: 44. Catutthe kumārakāti taruṇapuggalā. Ye subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthaṃ jānanti,
atk-s0503a:1167_1: te idha kumārakāti adhippetā. Ime hi sattā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva pañcadasavassakā,
atk-s0503a:1167_2: tāva “kumārakā, bālā”ti ca vuccanti, tato paraṃ vīsativassāni “yuvāno”ti. Macchake
atk-s0503a:1167_3: bādhentīti maggasamīpe ekasmiṃ taḷāke nidāghakāle udake parikkhīṇe ninnaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1167_4: udakaṃ ussiñcitvā khuddakamacche gaṇhanti ceva hananti ca “pacitvā khādissāmā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1167_5: Tenupasaṅkamīti maggato thokaṃ taḷākaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhito, tasmā “upasaṅkamī”ti vadati.
atk-s0503a:1167_6: Kasmā pana upasaṅkami? Te kumārake attani vissāsaṃ janetuṃ upasaṅkami. Bhāyatha voti
atk-s0503a:1167_7: ettha voti nipātamattaṃ. Dukkhassāti nissakke sāmivacanaṃ, dukkhasmāti attho. Appiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1167_8: vo dukkhanti “kiṃ tumhākaṃ sarīre uppajjanakadukkhaṃ appiyaṃ aniṭṭha”nti pucchati.
atk-s0503a:1168_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti ime sattā attano dukkhaṃ anicchantā eva hutvā dukkhahetuṃ paṭipajjantā
atk-s0503a:1168_1: attano taṃ icchantā eva nāma hontīti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti
atk-s0503a:1168_2: imaṃ pāpakiriyāya nisedhanaṃ ādīnavavibhāvanañca udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1169_0: Tassattho – yadi tumhākaṃ sakalamāpāyikaṃ, sugatiyañca appāyukatāmanussadobhaggiyādibhedaṃ
atk-s0503a:1169_1: dukkhaṃ appiyaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ, yadi tumhe tato bhāyatha, āvi vā paresaṃ pākaṭabhāvavasena
atk-s0503a:1169_2: appaṭicchannaṃ katvā kāyena vā vācāya vā pāṇātipātādippabhedaṃ yadi vā raho apākaṭabhāvavasena
atk-s0503a:1169_3: paṭicchannaṃ katvā manodvāre eva abhijjhādippabhedaṃ aṇumattampi pāpakaṃ lāmakadhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:1169_4: mākattha mā karittha, atha pana taṃ pāpakammaṃ etarahi karotha, āyatiṃ vā karissatha,
atk-s0503a:1169_5: nirayādīsu catūsu apāyesu manussesu ca tassa phalabhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ ito vā etto vā palāyante
atk-s0503a:1169_6: amhe nānubandhissatīti adhippāyena upecca apecca palāyatampi tumhākaṃ tato mutti
atk-s0503a:1169_8: paṭhanti, vuttanayena yattha katthaci gamane pakkamane satīti attho. Ayañca attho
atk-s0503a:1169_9: “na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe…pe… pāpakammā”ti imāya gāthāya dīpetabbo.
atk-s0503a:1172_0: 45. Pañcame tadahūti tasmiṃ ahani tasmiṃ divase. Uposatheti ettha upavasanti etthāti
atk-s0503a:1172_1: uposatho, upavasantīti sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho. Ayañhi
atk-s0503a:1172_5: divase. Idhāpi divaseyeva daṭṭhabbo, tasmā “tadahuposathe”ti tasmiṃ uposathadivasabhūte
atk-s0503a:1172_6: ahanīti attho. Nisinno hotīti mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ
atk-s0503a:1172_7: nisinno hoti. Nisajja pana bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni olokento ekaṃ dussīlapuggalaṃ disvā,
atk-s0503a:1172_8: “sacāhaṃ imasmiṃ puggale idha nisinneyeva pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi, sattadhāssa muddhā
atk-s0503a:1173_0: Ettha ca uddhastaṃ aruṇanti aruṇuggamanaṃ vatvāpi “uddisatu, bhante bhagavā, bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0503a:1173_1: pātimokkha”nti thero bhagavantaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ yāci tasmiṃ kāle “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0503a:1173_2: anuposathe uposatho kātabbo”tisikkhāpadassa apaññattattā. Aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisāti
atk-s0503a:1173_3: tikkhattuṃ therena pātimokkhuddesassa yācitattā anuddesassa kāraṇaṃ kathento “asukapuggalo
atk-s0503a:1173_4: aparisuddho”ti avatvā “aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā”ti āha. Kasmā pana bhagavā tiyāmarattiṃ
atk-s0503a:1173_5: tathā vītināmesi? Tato paṭṭhāya ovādapātimokkhaṃ anuddisitukāmo tassa vatthuṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0503a:1174_0: Addasāti kathaṃ addasa. Attano cetopariyañāṇena tassaṃ parisati bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni
atk-s0503a:1174_1: parijānanto tassa moghapurisassa dussīlyacittaṃ passi. Yasmā pana citte diṭṭhe taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo
atk-s0503a:1174_2: diṭṭho nāma hoti, tasmā “addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ dussīla”ntiādi
atk-s0503a:1174_3: vuttaṃ. Yatheva hi anāgate sattasu divasesu pavattamānaṃ paresaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇalābhī
atk-s0503a:1174_4: jānāti, evaṃ atītepīti. Dussīlanti nissīlaṃ, sīlavirahitanti attho. Pāpadhammanti
atk-s0503a:1174_5: dussīlattā eva hīnajjhāsayatāya lāmakasabhāvaṃ. Asucinti aparisuddhehi kāyakammādīhi
atk-s0503a:1174_6: samannāgatattā na suciṃ. Saṅkassarasamācāranti kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ iminā
atk-s0503a:1174_7: kataṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyatāya saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ, atha
atk-s0503a:1174_8: vā kenacideva karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā “kacci nu kho ime mayā katakammaṃ
atk-s0503a:1175_0: Lajjitabbatāya paṭicchādetabbakāraṇato paṭicchannaṃ kammantaṃ etassāti paṭicchannakammantaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1175_1: Kucchitasamaṇavesadhāritāya na samaṇanti assamaṇaṃ. Salākaggahaṇādīsu “kittakā samaṇā”ti
atk-s0503a:1175_2: ca gaṇanāya “ahampi samaṇomhī”ti micchāpaṭiññāya samaṇapaṭiññaṃ. Aseṭṭhacāritāya
atk-s0503a:1175_3: abrahmacāriṃ. Aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe supārute supattadhare gāmanigamādīsu piṇḍāya
atk-s0503a:1175_4: caritvā jīvikaṃ kappente disvā abrahmacārī samāno sayampi tādisena ākārena paṭipajjanto
atk-s0503a:1175_5: uposathādīsu sandissanto “ahampi brahmacārī”ti paṭiññaṃ dento viya hotīti brahmacāripaṭiññaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1175_6: Pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā antopūtiṃ. Chahi dvārehi rāgādikilesavassanena
atk-s0503a:1175_7: tintattā avassutaṃ. Sañjātarāgādikacavarattā sīlavantehi chaḍḍetabbattā ca kasambujātaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1175_8: Majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinnanti saṅghapariyāpanno viya bhikkhusaṅghassa anto nisinnaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1175_9: Diṭṭhosīti ayaṃ pana na pakatattoti bhagavatā diṭṭho asi. Yasmā ca evaṃ diṭṭho, tasmā
atk-s0503a:1175_10: natthi te tava bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekakammādisaṃvāso. Yasmā pana so saṃvāso tava natthi,
atk-s0503a:1175_11: tasmā uṭṭhehi, āvusoti evamettha padayojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:1176_0: Tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosīti anekavāraṃ vatvāpi thero “sayameva nibbinno
atk-s0503a:1176_1: oramissatī”ti vā, “idāni imesaṃ paṭipattiṃ jānissāmī”ti vā adhippāyena tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1176_2: Bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti bhagavatā mayā ca yāthāvato diṭṭho, yāvatatiyaṃ uṭṭhehīti vutto
atk-s0503a:1176_3: na uṭṭhāti, “idānissa nikkaḍḍhanakālo mā saṅghassa uposathantarāyo ahosī”ti taṃ bāhāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1176_4: aggahesi, tathā gahetvā. Bahidvārakoṭṭhakā nikkhāmetvāti dvārakoṭṭhakasālato bahi
atk-s0503a:1176_5: nikkhāmetvā. Bahīti pana nikkhāmitaṭṭhānadassanaṃ, atha vā bahidvārakoṭṭhakāti bahidvārakoṭṭhakatopi
atk-s0503a:1176_6: nikkhāmetvā, na antodvārakoṭṭhakato, evaṃ ubhayathāpi vihārato bahi katvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1176_7: Sūcighaṭikaṃ datvāti aggaḷasūciñca uparighaṭikañca ādahitvā, suṭṭhutaraṃ kavāṭaṃ
atk-s0503a:1176_8: thaketvāti attho. Yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāmāti iminā “aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā”ti
atk-s0503a:1176_9: vacanaṃ sutvā eva hi tena pakkamitabbaṃ siyā, evaṃ apakkamitvā yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi
atk-s0503a:1176_10: nāma so moghapuriso āgamessatīti acchariyamidanti dasseti. Idampi garahaṇacchariyamevāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1177_0: Atha bhagavā cintesi – “idāni bhikkhusaṅgho abbudajāto, aparisuddhā puggalā uposathaṃ
atk-s0503a:1177_1: āgacchanti, na ca tathāgatā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ karonti, pātimokkhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1177_2: uddisanti, anuddisante ca bhikkhusaṅghassa uposatho pacchijjati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0503a:1177_3: bhikkhūnaṃyeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya”nti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhikkhūnaṃyeva
atk-s0503a:1177_4: pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāni. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho bhagavā…pe… pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1178_0: Tattha na dānāhanti idāni ahaṃ uposathaṃ na karissāmi, pātimokkhaṃ na uddisissāmīti
atk-s0503a:1178_1: paccekaṃ na-kārena sambandho. Duvidhañhi pātimokkhaṃ āṇāpātimokkhaṃ ovādapātimokkhanti.
atk-s0503a:1178_2: Tesu “suṇātu me, bhante”tiādikaṃ āṇāpātimokkhaṃ, taṃ sāvakāva uddisanti, na buddhā,
atk-s0503a:1178_3: ayaṃ anvaddhamāsaṃ uddisiyati. “Khantī paramaṃ…pe… sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ…pe… anūpavādo
atk-s0503a:1178_4: anūpaghāto…pe… etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti imā pana tisso gāthā ovādapātimokkhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0503a:1178_5: taṃ buddhāva uddisanti, na sāvakā, channampi vassānaṃ accayena uddisanti. Dīghāyukabuddhānañhi
atk-s0503a:1178_6: dharamānakāle ayameva pātimokkhuddeso, appāyukabuddhānaṃ pana paṭhamabodhiyaṃyeva.
atk-s0503a:1178_7: Tato paraṃ itaro, tañca kho bhikkhū eva uddisanti, na buddhā, tasmā amhākampi bhagavā
atk-s0503a:1178_8: vīsativassamattaṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisitvā imaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā tato paraṃ na uddisi.
atk-s0503a:1178_9: Aṭṭhānanti akāraṇaṃ. Anavakāsoti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Kāraṇañhi yathā tiṭṭhati ettha
atk-s0503a:1178_10: phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānanti vuccati, evaṃ anavakāsotipi vuccatīti. Yanti
atk-s0503a:1179_0: Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddeti ko anusandhi? Yvāyaṃ aparisuddhāya parisāya pātimokkhassa
atk-s0503a:1179_1: anuddeso vutto, so imasmiṃ dhammavinaye acchariyo abbhuto dhammoti taṃ aparehi sattahi
atk-s0503a:1179_2: acchariyabbhutadhammehi saddhiṃ vibhajitvā dassetukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva tesaṃ upamābhāvena
atk-s0503a:1179_3: mahāsamudde aṭṭha acchariyabbhutadhamme dassento satthā “aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:1180_0: Pakatidevā viya na suranti na isanti na virocantīti asurā, surā nāma devā, tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:1180_1: paṭipakkhāti vā asurā, vepacittipahārādādayo. Tesaṃ bhavanaṃ sinerussa heṭṭhābhāge,
atk-s0503a:1180_2: te tattha pavisantā nikkhamantā sinerupāde maṇḍapādiṃ nimminitvā kīḷantāva abhiramanti.
atk-s0503a:1180_3: Tattha tesaṃ abhirati ime guṇe disvāti āha – “ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramantī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1180_4: Tattha abhiramantīti ratiṃ vindanti, anukkaṇṭhamānā vasantīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1181_0: Anupubbaninnotiādīni sabbāni anupaṭipāṭiyā ninnabhāvasseva vevacanāni. Na āyatakeneva
atk-s0503a:1181_1: papātoti na chinnataṭo mahāsobbho viya ādito eva papāto. So hi tīradesato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0503a:1181_3: hutvā gacchanto gacchanto sinerupādamūle caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro hutvā ṭhitoti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1182_0: Ṭhitadhammoti ṭhitasabhāvo avaṭṭhitasabhāvo. Na matena kuṇapena saṃvasatīti yena
atk-s0503a:1182_1: kenaci hatthiassādīnaṃ kaḷevarena saddhiṃ na saṃvasati. Tīraṃ vāhetīti tīraṃ apaneti.
atk-s0503a:1182_2: Thalaṃ ussāretīti hatthena gahetvā viya vīcippahāreneva thale khipati. Gaṅgā yamunāti
atk-s0503a:1182_3: anotattadahassa dakkhiṇamukhato nikkhantanadī pañca dhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne gaṅgātiādinā
atk-s0503a:1183_0: Tatrāyaṃ imāsaṃ nadīnaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya uppattikathā – ayañhi jambudīpo dasasahassayojanaparimāṇo,
atk-s0503a:1183_1: tattha catusahassayojanappamāṇo padeso udakena ajjhotthaṭo samuddoti saṅkhaṃ gato,
atk-s0503a:1183_2: tisahassayojanappamāṇe manussā vasanti, tisahassayojanappamāṇe himavā patiṭṭhito
atk-s0503a:1183_4: yattha āyāmena vitthārena gambhīratāya ca paṇṇāsayojanappamāṇo diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalo
atk-s0503a:1183_5: anotattadaho kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinidaho
atk-s0503a:1184_0: Tesu anotattadaho sudassanakūṭaṃ cittakūṭaṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ kelāsakūṭanti
atk-s0503a:1184_1: imehi pañcahi pabbatakūṭehi parikkhitto. Tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ tiyojanasatubbedhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1184_2: antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ, cittakūṭaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1184_3: Kāḷakūṭaṃ añjanamayaṃ. Gandhamādanakūṭaṃ masāragallamayaṃ abbhantare muggavaṇṇaṃ;
atk-s0503a:1184_4: mūlagandho, sāragandho, pheggugandho, tacagandho, papaṭikāgandho, khandhagandho,
atk-s0503a:1184_5: rasagandho, pupphagandho, phalagandho, pattagandhoti imehi dasahi gandhehi ussannaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1184_6: nānappakāraosadhasañchannaṃ, kāḷapakkhuposathadivase ādittaṃ viya aṅgāraṃ pajjalantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1184_7: tiṭṭhati. Kelāsakūṭaṃ rajatamayaṃ. Sabbāni cetāni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni
atk-s0503a:1184_8: tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni. Tattha devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena ca devo vassati,
atk-s0503a:1184_9: nadiyo ca sandanti, taṃ sabbampi udakaṃ anotattameva pavisati, candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena
atk-s0503a:1184_10: vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena tattha obhāsaṃ karonti, ujukaṃ gacchantā
atk-s0503a:1185_1: tadupabhogasattānaṃ kammanibbattāneva nahānatitthāni ca honti, yattha buddhapaccekabuddhā
atk-s0503a:1185_2: iddhimanto sāvakā isayo ca nahānādīni karonti, devayakkhādayo udakakīḷaṃ kīḷanti.
atk-s0503a:1186_0: Tassa catūsu passesu sīhamukhaṃ, hatthimukhaṃ, assamukhaṃ, usabhamukhanti cattāri
atk-s0503a:1186_1: udakanikkhamanamukhāni honti, yehi catasso nadiyo sandanti. Sīhamukhena nikkhantanadītīre
atk-s0503a:1186_2: kesarasīhā bahutarā honti, tathā hatthimukhādīhi hatthiassausabhā. Puratthimadisato
atk-s0503a:1186_3: nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma
atk-s0503a:1186_4: pācīnahimavanteneva amanussapathaṃ gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisati. Pacchimadisato uttaradisato
atk-s0503a:1186_5: ca nikkhantanadiyopi tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva
atk-s0503a:1187_0: Dakkhiṇadisato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dakkhiṇena ujukaṃ
atk-s0503a:1187_1: pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā pabbataṃ paharitvā uṭṭhāya parikkhepena tigāvutappamāṇaudakadhārā
atk-s0503a:1187_2: hutvā ākāsena saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā, pāsāṇo udakadhārāvegena
atk-s0503a:1187_3: bhinno. Tattha paññāsayojanappamāṇā tiyaggaḷā nāma pokkharaṇī jātā, pokkharaṇiyā
atk-s0503a:1187_4: kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā tato ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0503a:1187_5: umaṅgena saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā hatthatale
atk-s0503a:1188_0: Sā tikkhattuṃ anotattaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne “āvaṭṭagaṅgā”ti vuccati, ujukaṃ
atk-s0503a:1188_1: pāsāṇapiṭṭhena saṭṭhiyojanāni gataṭṭhāne “kaṇhagaṅgā”ti, ākāsena saṭṭhiyojanāni gataṭṭhāne
atk-s0503a:1188_3: kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhiyojanāni gataṭṭhāne “bahalagaṅgā”ti, umaṅgena
atk-s0503a:1188_4: saṭṭhiyojanāni gataṭṭhāne “umaṅgagaṅgā”ti vuccati, viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ
atk-s0503a:1188_5: paharitvā pañcadhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne gaṅgā, yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū, mahīti
atk-s0503a:1188_6: pañcadhā saṅkhaṃ gatā. Evametā pañca mahānadiyo himavantato pavattantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0503a:1189_0: Tattha nadī ninnagātiādikaṃ gottaṃ, gaṅgā yamunātiādikaṃ nāmaṃ. Savantiyoti yā kāci
atk-s0503a:1189_1: savamānā sandamānā gacchantiyo mahānadiyo vā kunnadiyo vā. Appentīti allīyanti osaranti.
atk-s0503a:1189_2: Dhārāti vuṭṭhidhārā. Pūrattanti puṇṇabhāvo. Mahāsamuddassa hi ayaṃ dhammatā – “imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1189_3: kāle devo mando jāto, jālakkhipādīni ādāya macchakacchape gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “imasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1189_4: kāle atimahantī vuṭṭhi, na labhissāma nu kho piṭṭhipasāraṇaṭṭhāna”nti vā taṃ na sakkā
atk-s0503a:1189_5: vattuṃ. Paṭhamakappikakālato paṭṭhāya hi yaṃ vassitvā sinerumekhalaṃ āhacca udakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1189_6: ṭhitaṃ, taṃ tato ekaṅgulamattampi udakaṃ neva heṭṭhā otarati, na uddhaṃ uttarati.
atk-s0503a:1190_0: Ekarasoti asambhinnaraso. Muttāti khuddakamahantavaṭṭadīghādibhedā anekavidhā muttā.
atk-s0503a:1190_1: Maṇīti rattanīlādibhedo anekavidho maṇi. Veḷuriyoti vaṃsavaṇṇasirīsapupphavaṇṇādisaṇṭhānato
atk-s0503a:1190_4: anekavidhaṃ. Lohitaṅgoti padumarāgādibhedo anekavidho masāragallanti kabaramaṇi.
atk-s0503a:1191_0: Mahataṃ bhūtānanti mahantānaṃ sattānaṃ. Timitimiṅgalādikā tisso macchajātiyo. Timiṃ
atk-s0503a:1191_1: gilanasamatthā timiṅgalā, timiñca timiṅgalañca gilanasamatthā “timitimiṅgalā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:1192_0: Evameva khoti kiñcāpi satthā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye soḷasapi bāttiṃsapi tato bhiyyopi
atk-s0503a:1192_1: acchariyabbhutadhamme vibhajitvā dassetuṃ sakkoti, tadā upamābhāvena pana gahitānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1192_2: aṭṭhannaṃ anurūpavasena aṭṭheva te upametabbadhamme vibhajitvā dassento “evameva
atk-s0503a:1192_3: kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:1193_0: Tattha anupubbasikkhāya tisso bhikkhā gahitā, anupubbakiriyāya terasa dhutaṅgadhammā,
atk-s0503a:1193_1: anupubbapaṭipadāya satta anupassanā aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇavibhattiyo
atk-s0503a:1193_2: sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā ca gahitā. Na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedhoti maṇḍūkassa
atk-s0503a:1193_3: uppatitvā gamanaṃ viya āditova sīlapūraṇādīni akatvā arahattapaṭivedho nāma natthi,
atk-s0503a:1193_4: paṭipāṭiyā pana sīlasamādhipaññāyo pūretvāva arahattappattīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1194_0: Mama sāvakāti sotāpannādike ariyapuggale sandhāya vadati. Na saṃvasatīti uposathakammādivasena
atk-s0503a:1194_1: saṃvāsaṃ na karoti. Ukkhipatīti apaneti. Ārakāvāti dūreyeva. Na tena nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0503a:1194_2: ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vāti asaṅkhyeyyepi mahākappe buddhesu anuppajjantesu ekasattopi
atk-s0503a:1194_3: parinibbātuṃ na sakkoti, tadāpi “tucchā nibbānadhātū”ti na sakkā vattuṃ, buddhakāle
atk-s0503a:1194_4: pana ekekasmiṃ samāgame asaṅkhyeyyāpi sattā amataṃ ārādhenti, tadāpi na sakkā vattuṃ
atk-s0503a:1194_5: “pūrā nibbānadhātū”ti. Vimuttirasoti kilesehi vimuccanaraso. Sabbā hi sāsanassa sampatti
atk-s0503a:1194_6: yāvadeva anupādāya āsavehi cittassa vimuttiyā hoti.
atk-s0503a:1195: Ratanānīti ratijananaṭṭhena ratanāni. Satipaṭṭhānādayo hi bhāviyamānā pubbabhāgepi anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ nibbattenti, pageva aparabhāge. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0503a:1198: Lokiyaratananimittaṃ pana pītipāmojjaṃ na tassa kalabhāgampi agghatīti ayamattho heṭṭhā dassito eva. Apica –
atk-s0503a:1201_0: Yadi ca cittīkatādibhāvena ratanaṃ nāma hoti, satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃyeva bhūtato ratanabhāvo.
atk-s0503a:1201_1: Bodhipakkhiyadhammānañhi so ānubhāvo, yaṃ sāvakā sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ, paccekabuddhā
atk-s0503a:1201_3: Paramparakāraṇañhi dānādiupanissayoti evaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena cittīkatādiatthena ca
atk-s0503a:1201_4: ratanabhāvo bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ sātisayo. Tena vuttaṃ – “tatrimāni ratanāni, seyyathidaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1202_0: Tattha ārammaṇe pakkhanditvā upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena paṭṭhānaṃ, satiyeva paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1202_1: Ārammaṇassa pana kāyādivasena catubbidhattā vuttaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti. Tathā
atk-s0503a:1203_0: Sammā padahanti etena, sayaṃ vā sammā padahati, pasatthaṃ, sundaraṃ vā padahanti
atk-s0503a:1203_1: sammappadhānaṃ. Puggalassa vā sammadeva padhānabhāvakaraṇato sammappadhānaṃ. Vīriyassetaṃ
atk-s0503a:1203_2: adhivacanaṃ. Tampi anuppannuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanapahānavasena anuppannuppannānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1203_3: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādanabhāvanavasena ca catukiccaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “cattāro sammappadhānā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1204_0: Ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati nipphajjatīti attho. Ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā
atk-s0503a:1204_1: ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi. Iti paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti
atk-s0503a:1204_2: attho. Dutiyena atthena iddhiyā pādo patiṭṭhā adhigamūpāyoti iddhipādo. Tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1204_3: iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti, svāyaṃ iddhipādo yasmā chandādike cattāro adhipatidhamme
atk-s0503a:1204_4: dhure jeṭṭhake katvā nibbattiyati, tasmā vuttaṃ “cattāro iddhipādā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1205_0: Pañcindriyānīti saddhādīni pañca indriyāni. Tattha assaddhiyaṃ abhibhavitvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇe
atk-s0503a:1205_1: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti saddhindriyaṃ, kosajjaṃ abhibhavitvā paggahalakkhaṇe, pamādaṃ
atk-s0503a:1205_2: abhibhavitvā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe, vikkhepaṃ abhibhavitvā avikkhepalakkhaṇe, aññāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1206: Tāniyeva assaddhiyādīhi anabhibhavanīyato akampiyaṭṭhena sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena “balānī”ti veditabbāni.
atk-s0503a:1207_0: Satta bojjhaṅgāti bodhiyā, bodhissa vā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā. Yā hi esā dhammasāmaggī
atk-s0503a:1207_3: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhati, kilesaniddāya vuṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni
atk-s0503a:1207_4: paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti “bodhī”ti vuccati, tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya
atk-s0503a:1207_5: bodhiyā aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viya. Yopesa vuttappakārāya dhammasāmaggiyā
atk-s0503a:1207_6: bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti vuccati, tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā
atk-s0503a:1207_7: senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya. Tenāhu porāṇā – “bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1207_8: “Bodhiyā saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā”tiādinā nayenapi bojjhaṅgānaṃ bojjhaṅgattho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1208_0: Ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā
atk-s0503a:1208_1: ca ariyo. Sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni assa atthi, aṭṭha aṅgāniyeva vā aṭṭhaṅgiko.
atk-s0503a:1208_2: Kilese mārento gacchati, nibbānatthikehi maggiyati, sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ maggatīti maggoti.
atk-s0503a:1209_0: Sotāpannoti maggasaṅkhātaṃ sotaṃ āpajjitvā pāpuṇitvā ṭhito, sotāpattiphalaṭṭhoti
atk-s0503a:1209_2: paṭipajjamāno paṭhamamaggaṭṭho, yo aṭṭhamakotipi vuccati. Sakadāgāmīti sakideva imaṃ
atk-s0503a:1209_3: lokaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena āgamanasīlo dutiyaphalaṭṭho. Anāgāmīti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena
atk-s0503a:1209_4: kāmalokaṃ anāgamanasīlo tatiyaphalaṭṭho. Yo pana saddhānusārī dhammānusārī ekabījīti
atk-s0503a:1209_5: evamādiko ariyapuggalavibhāgo, so etesaṃyeva pabhedoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0503a:1210_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ attano dhammavinaye matakuṇapasadisena dussīlapuggalena
atk-s0503a:1210_1: saddhiṃ saṃvāsābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ asaṃvāsārahasaṃvāsārahavibhāgakāraṇaparidīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1211_0: Tattha channamativassatīti āpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādento aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0503a:1211_1: tato paraṃ tato paranti evaṃ āpattivassaṃ kilesavassaṃ ativiya vassati. Vivaṭaṃ nātivassatīti
atk-s0503a:1211_2: āpattiṃ āpanno taṃ appaṭicchādetvā vivaranto sabrahmacārīnaṃ pakāsento yathādhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:1211_3: yathāvinayaṃ paṭikaronto desento vuṭṭhahanto aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati, tenassa
atk-s0503a:1211_4: vivaṭaṃ puna āpattivassaṃ kilesavassaṃ na vassati. Yasmā ca etadevaṃ, tasmā channaṃ
atk-s0503a:1211_5: chāditaṃ āpattiṃ vivaretha pakāsetha. Evaṃ taṃ nātivassatīti evaṃ sante taṃ āpattiāpajjanakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1211_6: āpannapuggalaṃ attabhāvaṃ ativijjhitvā kilesavassaṃ na vassati na temeti. Evaṃ so
atk-s0503a:1211_7: kilesehi anavassuto parisuddhasīlo samāhito hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sammasanto
atk-s0503a:1214_0: 46. Chaṭṭhe avantīsūti avantiraṭṭhe. Kuraraghareti evaṃnāmake nagare. Pavatte pabbateti
atk-s0503a:1214_1: pavattanāmake pabbate. “Papāte pabbate”tipi paṭhanti. Soṇo upāsako kuṭikaṇṇoti nāmena
atk-s0503a:1214_2: soṇo nāma, tīhi saraṇagamanehi upāsakabhāvappaṭivedanena upāsako, koṭiagghanakassa
atk-s0503a:1214_4: na sukhumālasoṇoti adhippāyo. Ayañhi āyasmato mahākaccāyanassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0503a:1214_5: sāsane abhippasanno, saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhito pavatte pabbate chāyūdakasampanne
atk-s0503a:1214_6: ṭhāne vihāraṃ kāretvā theraṃ tattha vasāpetvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhāti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:1215_0: So kālena kālaṃ therassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati. Thero cassa dhammaṃ deseti. Tena saṃvegabahulo
atk-s0503a:1215_1: dhammacariyāya ussāhajāto viharati. So ekadā satthena saddhiṃ vāṇijjatthāya ujjeniṃ
atk-s0503a:1215_2: gacchanto antarāmagge aṭaviyaṃ satthe niviṭṭhe rattiyaṃ janasambādhabhayena ekamantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1215_3: apakkamma niddaṃ upagañchi. Sattho paccūsavelāyaṃ uṭṭhāya gato, na ekopi soṇaṃ pabodhesi,
atk-s0503a:1215_4: sabbepi visaritvā agamaṃsu. So pabhātāya rattiyā pabujjhitvā uṭṭhāya kañci apassanto
atk-s0503a:1215_5: sattheneva gatamaggaṃ gahetvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gacchanto ekaṃ vaṭarukkhaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0503a:1215_6: Tattha addasa ekaṃ mahākāyaṃ virūpadassanaṃ gacchantaṃ purisaṃ aṭṭhito muttāni attano
atk-s0503a:1215_7: maṃsāni sayameva khādantaṃ, disvāna “kosi tva”nti pucchi. “Petomhi, bhante”ti. “Kasmā
atk-s0503a:1215_8: evaṃ karosī”ti. “Attano pubbakammenā”ti. “Kiṃ pana taṃ kamma”nti. “Ahaṃ pubbe bhārukacchanagaravāsī
atk-s0503a:1215_9: kūṭavāṇijo hutvā paresaṃ santakaṃ vañcetvā khādiṃ, samaṇe ca bhikkhāya upagate ‘tumhākaṃ
atk-s0503a:1215_10: maṃsaṃ khādathā’ti akkosiṃ, tena kammena etarahi imaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavāmī”ti. Taṃ
atk-s0503a:1216_0: Tato paraṃ gacchanto mukhato paggharitakāḷalohite dve petadārake passitvā tatheva
atk-s0503a:1216_1: pucchi. Tepissa attano kammaṃ kathesuṃ. Te kira bhārukacchanagare dārakakāle gandhavāṇijjāya
atk-s0503a:1216_2: jīvikaṃ kappentā attano mātari khīṇāsave nimantetvā bhojentiyā gehaṃ gantvā “amhākaṃ
atk-s0503a:1216_3: santakaṃ kasmā samaṇānaṃ desi, tayā dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjanakasamaṇānaṃ mukhato kāḷalohitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1216_4: paggharatū”ti akkosiṃsu. Te tena kammena niraye paccitvā tassa vipākāvasesena petayoniyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1216_5: nibbattitvā tadā imaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanti. Tampi sutvā soṇo ativiya saṃvegajāto ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1217_0: So ujjeniṃ gantvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ tīretvā kulagharaṃ paccāgato theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0503a:1217_1: katapaṭisanthāro therassa tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Theropissa pavattinivattīsu ādīnavānisaṃse
atk-s0503a:1217_2: vibhāvento dhammaṃ desesi. So theraṃ vanditvā gehaṃ gato sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1217_3: upagato thokaṃyeva niddāyitvā pabujjhitvā sayanatale nisajja yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhituṃ
atk-s0503a:1217_4: āraddho. Tassa taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhato, te ca petattabhāve anussarato saṃsāradukkhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1217_5: ativiya bhayānakaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāsi, pabbajjāya cittaṃ nami. So vibhātāya rattiyā
atk-s0503a:1217_6: sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano ajjhāsayaṃ ārocetvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0503a:1217_7: yāci. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho soṇassa upāsakassa kuṭikaṇṇassa rahogatassa…pe… pabbājetu
atk-s0503a:1218_0: Tattha yathā yathātiādīnaṃ padānaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yena yena ākārena ayyo mahākaccāno
atk-s0503a:1218_1: dhammaṃ deseti ācikkhati paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti pakāseti,
atk-s0503a:1218_2: tena tena me upaparikkhato evaṃ hoti, yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ
atk-s0503a:1218_3: akkhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ. Ekadivasampi kilesamalena
atk-s0503a:1218_4: amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ. Saṅkhalikhitanti likhitasaṅkhasadisaṃ
atk-s0503a:1218_5: dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāgaṃ caritabbaṃ. Idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe
atk-s0503a:1218_6: vasantena ekanta paripuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ceva massūni ca ohāretvā
atk-s0503a:1218_7: voropetvā kāsāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni
atk-s0503a:1218_8: acchādetvā nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1218_9: Yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati, tañca pabbajjāya natthi,
atk-s0503a:1218_10: tasmā pabbajjā anagāriyā nāma. Taṃ anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbajeyyaṃ upagaccheyyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1219_0: Evaṃ attanā rahovitakkitaṃ soṇo upāsako therassa ārocetvā taṃ paṭipajjitukāmo “pabbājetu
atk-s0503a:1219_1: maṃ, bhante, ayyo mahākaccāno”ti āha. Thero pana “tāvassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ katha”nti
atk-s0503a:1219_2: upadhāretvā ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno “dukkaraṃ kho”tiādinā pabbajjāchandaṃ nivāresi.
atk-s0503a:1220_0: Tattha ekabhattanti “ekabhattiko hoti rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:1220_1: vikālabhojanaviratiṃ sandhāya vadati. Ekaseyyanti adutiyaseyyaṃ. Ettha ca seyyāsīsena
atk-s0503a:1220_2: “eko tiṭṭhati, eko gacchati, eko nisīdatī”tiādinā nayena vuttesu catūsu iriyāpathesu
atk-s0503a:1220_3: kāyavivekaṃ dīpeti, na ekākinā hutvā sayanamattaṃ. Brahmacariyanti methunaviratibrahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1220_4: sikkhattayānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ vā. Iṅghāti codanatthe nipāto. Tatthevāti
atk-s0503a:1220_5: geheyeva. Buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ anuyuñjāti niccasīlauposathasīlādibhedaṃ pañcaṅgaaṭṭhaṅgadasaṅgasīlaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1220_6: tadanurūpañca samādhipaññābhāvanaṃ anuyuñja. Etañhi upāsakena pubbabhāge anuyuñjitabbaṃ
atk-s0503a:1220_7: buddhasāsanaṃ nāma. Tenāha – “kālayuttaṃ ekabhattaṃ ekaseyyaṃ brahmariya”nti.
atk-s0503a:1221_1: yathāvuttakāle vā tuyhaṃ anuyuñjantassa yuttaṃ patirūpaṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ, na sabbakālaṃ
atk-s0503a:1221_2: pabbajjāti adhippāyo. Sabbametaṃ ñāṇassa aparipakkattā tassa kāmānaṃ duppahānatāya
atk-s0503a:1221_3: sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ yogyaṃ kārāpetuṃ vadati, na pabbajjāchandaṃ nivāretuṃ. Pabbajjābhisaṅkhāroti
atk-s0503a:1221_4: pabbajituṃ ārambho ussāho. Paṭipassambhīti indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā, saṃvegassa ca
atk-s0503a:1221_5: nātitikkhabhāvato vūpasami. Kiñcāpi paṭipassambhi, therena vuttavidhiṃ pana anutiṭṭhanto
atk-s0503a:1221_6: kālena kālaṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsanto dhammaṃ suṇāti. Tassa vuttanayeneva
atk-s0503a:1221_7: dutiyaṃ pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppajji, therassa ca ārocesi. Dutiyampi thero paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0503a:1221_8: Tatiyavāre pana ñāṇassa paripakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā “idāni naṃ pabbājetuṃ kālo”ti thero
atk-s0503a:1221_9: pabbājesi, pabbajitañca taṃ tīṇi saṃvaccharāni atikkamitvā gaṇaṃ pariyesitvā upasampādesi.
atk-s0503a:1221_10: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “dutiyampi kho soṇo…pe… upasampādesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1222_0: Tattha appabhikkhukoti katipayabhikkhuko. Tadā kira bhikkhū yebhuyyena majjhimadese
atk-s0503a:1222_1: eva vasiṃsu. Tasmā tattha katipayā eva ahesuṃ, te ca ekasmiṃ nigame eko, ekasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1222_2: dveti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ vasiṃsu. Kicchenāti dukkhena. Kasirenāti āyāsena. Tato tatoti
atk-s0503a:1222_3: tasmā tasmā gāmanigamādito. Therena hi katipaye bhikkhū ānetvā aññesu ānīyamānesu
atk-s0503a:1222_4: pubbe ānītā kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamiṃsu, kiñci kālaṃ āgametvā puna tesu ānīyamānesu
atk-s0503a:1222_5: itare pakkamiṃsu. Evaṃ punappunaṃ ānayanena sannipāto cireneva ahosi, thero ca tadā
atk-s0503a:1222_6: ekavihārī ahosi. Dasavaggaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvāti tadā bhagavatā paccantadesepi
atk-s0503a:1222_7: dasavaggeneva saṅghena upasampadā anuññātā. Itonidānañhi therena yācito pañcavaggena
atk-s0503a:1222_8: saṅghena paccantadese upasampadaṃ anujāni. Tena vuttaṃ – “tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ…pe… sannipātetvā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1223_0: Vassaṃvuṭṭhassāti upasampajjitvā paṭhamavassaṃ upagantvā vusitavato. Īdiso ca īdiso
atk-s0503a:1223_1: cāti evarūpo ca evarūpo ca, evarūpāya nāmakāyarūpakāyasampattiyā samannāgato, evarūpāya
atk-s0503a:1223_2: dhammakāyasampattiyā samannāgatoti sutoyeva me so bhagavā. Na kho me so bhagavā sammukhā
atk-s0503a:1223_3: diṭṭhoti etena puthujjanasaddhāya evaṃ āyasmā soṇo bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0503a:1223_4: Aparabhāge pana satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā paccūsasamayaṃ ajjhiṭṭho
atk-s0503a:1223_5: soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggikāni satthu sammukhā aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā
atk-s0503a:1223_6: atthadhammappaṭisaṃvedī hutvā bhaṇanto dhammūpasañhitapāmojjādimukhena samāhito sarabhaññapariyosāne
atk-s0503a:1223_7: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto anupubbena arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Etadatthameva
atk-s0503a:1223_8: hissa bhagavatā attanā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vāso āṇattoti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:1224_0: Keci panāhu – “na kho me so bhagavā sammukhā diṭṭho”ti idaṃ rūpakāyadassanameva sandhāya
atk-s0503a:1224_1: vuttanti. Āyasmā hi soṇo pabbajitvāva therassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭento
atk-s0503a:1224_2: vāyamanto anupasampannova sotāpanno hutvā upasampajjitvā “upāsakāpi sotāpannā honti,
atk-s0503a:1224_3: ahampi sotāpanno, kimettha citta”nti uparimaggatthāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā antovasseyeva
atk-s0503a:1224_4: chaḷabhiñño hutvā visuddhipavāraṇāya pavāresi. Ariyasaccadassanena hi bhagavato dhammakāyo
atk-s0503a:1225: “Yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passati. Yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ passatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1226: Tasmāssa dhammakāyadassanaṃ pageva siddhaṃ, pavāretvā pana rūpakāyaṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:1227_0: “Sace maṃ upajjhāyo anujānātī”tipi pāṭho. “Bhante”ti pana likhanti. Tathā “sādhu
atk-s0503a:1227_1: sādhu, āvuso soṇa, gaccha tvaṃ, āvuso soṇā”tipi pāṭho. “Āvuso”ti pana kesuci potthakesu
atk-s0503a:1227_2: natthi. Tathā “evamāvusoti kho āyasmā soṇo”tipi pāṭho. Āvusovādoyeva hi aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0503a:1227_3: bhikkhūnaṃ bhagavato dharamānakāle āciṇṇo. Bhagavantaṃ pāsādikantiādīnaṃ padānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1228_0: Kacci bhikkhu khamanīyanti bhikkhu idaṃ tuyhaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1228_1: kacci khamanīyaṃ, kiṃ sakkā khamituṃ sahituṃ pariharituṃ, kiṃ dukkhabhāro nābhibhavati.
atk-s0503a:1228_2: Kacci yāpanīyanti kiṃ taṃtaṃkiccesu yāpetuṃ gametuṃ sakkā, na kañci antarāyanti dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1228_3: Kaccisi appakilamathenāti anāyāsena imaṃ ettakaṃ addhānaṃ kacci āgatosi.
atk-s0503a:1229_0: Etadahosīti buddhāciṇṇaṃ anussarantassa āyasmato ānandassa etaṃ “yassa kho maṃ bhagavā”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1229_1: idāni vuccamānaṃ citte āciṇṇaṃ ahosi. Ekavihāreti ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ. Gandhakuṭi hi
atk-s0503a:1230_0: Nisajjāya vītināmetvāti ettha yasmā bhagavā āyasmato soṇassa samāpattisamāpajjane
atk-s0503a:1230_1: paṭisanthāraṃ karonto sāvakasādhāraṇā sabbā samāpattiyo anulomapaṭilomaṃ samāpajjanto
atk-s0503a:1230_2: bahudeva rattiṃ…pe… vihāraṃ pāvisi, tasmā āyasmāpi soṇo bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0503a:1230_3: tadanurūpaṃ sabbā tā samāpattiyo samāpajjanto “bahudeva rattiṃ…pe… vihāraṃ pāvisī”ti
atk-s0503a:1230_4: keci vadanti. Pavisitvā ca bhagavatā anuññāto cīvaraṃ tirokaraṇīyaṃ katvāpi bhagavato
atk-s0503a:1230_5: pādapasse nisajjāya vītināmesi. Ajjhesīti āṇāpesi. Paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsitunti
atk-s0503a:1230_6: bhikkhu tuyhaṃ dhammo bhāsituṃ upaṭṭhātu ñāṇamukhe āgacchatu, yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ
atk-s0503a:1231_0: Soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggikānīti aṭṭhakavaggabhūtāni kāmasuttādīni soḷasa suttāni. Sarena
atk-s0503a:1231_1: abhaṇīti suttussāraṇasarena abhāsi, sarabhaññavasena kathesīti attho. Sarabhaññapariyosāneti
atk-s0503a:1231_2: ussāraṇāvasāne. Suggahitānīti sammā uggahitāni. Sumanasikatānīti suṭṭhu manasi katāni.
atk-s0503a:1231_3: Ekacco uggahaṇakāle sammā uggahetvāpi pacchā sajjhāyādivasena manasi karaṇakāle byañjanāni
atk-s0503a:1231_4: vā micchā ropeti, padapacchābhaṭṭhaṃ vā karoti, na evamayaṃ. Iminā pana sammadeva
atk-s0503a:1231_5: yathuggahitaṃ manasi katāni. Tena vuttaṃ – “sumanasikatānīti suṭṭhu manasi katānī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1231_6: Sūpadhāritānīti atthatopi suṭṭhu upadhāritāni. Atthe hi suṭṭu upadhārite sakkā pāḷiṃ
atk-s0503a:1231_7: sammā ussāretuṃ. Kalyāṇiyāsi vācāya samannāgatoti sithiladhanitādīnaṃ yathāvidhānavacanena
atk-s0503a:1231_8: parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanaparipuṇṇāya poriyā vācāya samannāgato āsi. Vissaṭṭhāyāti vimuttāya.
atk-s0503a:1231_9: Etenassa vimuttavāditaṃ dasseti. Anelagaḷāyāti elā vuccati doso, taṃ na paggharatīti
atk-s0503a:1231_10: anelagaḷā, tāya niddosāyāti attho. Atha vā anelagaḷāyāti anelāya ca agaḷāya ca niddosāya
atk-s0503a:1231_11: agaḷitapadabyañjanāya, aparihīnapadabyañjanāyāti attho. Tathā hi naṃ bhagavā “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1231_12: bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ yadidaṃ soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo”ti
atk-s0503a:1231_13: etadagge ṭhapesi. Atthassa viññāpaniyāti yathādhippetaṃ atthaṃ viññāpetuṃ samatthāya.
atk-s0503a:1232_0: Kativassoti so kira majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse ṭhito ākappasampanno ca paresaṃ
atk-s0503a:1232_1: ciratarapabbajito viya khāyati. Taṃ sandhāya bhagavā pucchatīti keci, taṃ akāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1232_2: Evaṃ sante samādhisukhaṃ anubhavituṃ yutto, ettakaṃ kālaṃ kasmā pamādamāpannoti puna
atk-s0503a:1232_3: anuyuñjituṃ satthā “kativassosī”ti taṃ pucchati. Tenevāha – “kissa pana tvaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0503a:1233_0: Tattha kissāti kiṃ kāraṇā. Evaṃ ciraṃ akāsīti evaṃ cirāyi, kena kāraṇena evaṃ cirakālaṃ
atk-s0503a:1233_1: pabbajjaṃ anupagantvā agāramajjhe vasīti attho. Ciraṃ diṭṭho meti cirena cirakālena
atk-s0503a:1233_2: mayā diṭṭho. Kāmesūti kilesakāmesu ca vatthukāmesu ca. Ādīnavoti doso. Api cāti kāmesu
atk-s0503a:1233_3: ādīnave kenaci pakārena diṭṭhepi na tāvāhaṃ gharāvāsato nikkhamituṃ asakkhiṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0503a:1233_4: Sambādho gharāvāso uccāvacehi kiccakaraṇīyehi samupabyūḷho agāriyabhāvo. Tenevāha
atk-s0503a:1234_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti kāmesu yathābhūtaṃ ādīnavadassino cittaṃ cirāyitvāpi na patiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0503a:1234_1: aññadatthu padumapalāse udakabindu viya vinivattatiyevāti etamatthaṃ sabbākārato
atk-s0503a:1234_2: viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti pavattiṃ nivattiñca sammadeva jānanto pavattiyaṃ tannimitte
atk-s0503a:1234_3: ca na kadācipi ramatīti idamatthadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1235_0: Tattha disvā ādīnavaṃ loketi sabbasmiṃ saṅkhāraloke “anicco dukkho vipariṇāmadhammo”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1235_1: ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ paññāya passitvā. Etena vipassanāvāro kathito. Ñatvā dhammaṃ nirupadhinti
atk-s0503a:1235_2: sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggattā nirupadhiṃ nibbānadhammaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā nissaraṇavivekāsaṅkhatāmatasabhāvato
atk-s0503a:1235_3: maggañāṇena paṭivijjhitvā. “Disvā ñatvā”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ “sappiṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti,
atk-s0503a:1235_4: sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hoti, paññāya disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthatā
atk-s0503a:1235_5: daṭṭhabbā. Ariyo na ramatī pāpeti kilesehi ārakattā ariyo sappuriso aṇumattepi pāpe
atk-s0503a:1235_6: na ramati. Kasmā? Pāpe na ramatī sucīti suvisuddhakāyasamācārāditāya visuddhapuggalo
atk-s0503a:1235_7: rājahaṃso viya ukkāraṭṭhāne pāpe saṃkiliṭṭhadhamme na ramati nābhinandati. “Pāpo
atk-s0503a:1235_8: na ramatī suci”ntipi pāṭho. Tassattho – pāpo pāpapuggalo suciṃ anavajjaṃ vodānadhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:1235_9: na ramati, aññadatthu gāmasūkarādayo viya ukkāraṭṭhānaṃ asuciṃ saṃkilesadhammaṃyeva
atk-s0503a:1236_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā udāne udānite āyasmā soṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano
atk-s0503a:1236_1: upajjhāyassa vacanena paccantadese pañcavaggena upasampadādipañcavatthūni yāci. Bhagavāpi
atk-s0503a:1236_2: tāni anujānīti taṃ sabbaṃ khandhake āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1239_0: 47. Sattame kaṅkhārevatoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ. So hi sāsane pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado
atk-s0503a:1239_1: sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo viharati, “akappiyā muggā, na kappanti muggā paribhuñjituṃ,
atk-s0503a:1239_2: akappiyo guḷo”ti ca ādinā vinayakukkuccasaṅkhātakaṅkhābahulo pana hoti. Tena kaṅkhārevatoti
atk-s0503a:1239_3: paññāyittha. So aparabhāge satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto
atk-s0503a:1239_4: chaḷabhiññā sacchikatvā jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmeti, yebhuyyena pana attanā
atk-s0503a:1239_5: adhigataṃ ariyamaggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati. Tena vuttaṃ – “attano kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiṃ
atk-s0503a:1239_6: paccavekkhamāno”ti. Maggapaññā hi “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādinayapavattāya
atk-s0503a:1239_7: soḷasavatthukāya, “buddhe kaṅkhati…pe… paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhatī”ti evaṃ
atk-s0503a:1239_8: vuttāya aṭṭhavatthukāya, pageva itarāsanti anavasesato sabbakaṅkhānaṃ vitaraṇato
atk-s0503a:1239_9: samatikkamanato, aññehi ca attanā pahātabbakilesehi accantavisujjhanato “kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhī”ti
atk-s0503a:1239_10: idhādhippetā. Tañhi ayamāyasmā dīgharattaṃ kaṅkhāpakatattā “imaṃ maggadhammaṃ adhigamma
atk-s0503a:1239_11: imā me kaṅkhā anavasesā pahīnā”ti garuṃ katvā paccavekkhamāno nisīdi, na sappaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1240: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ ariyamaggassa anavasesakaṅkhāvitaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā tadatthadīpakaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1241_0: Tattha yā kāci kaṅkhā idha vā huraṃ vāti idha imasmiṃ paccuppanne attabhāve “ahaṃ
atk-s0503a:1241_1: nu khosmi no nu khosmī”tiādinā huraṃ vā, atītānāgatesu attabhāvesu “ahosiṃ nu kho
atk-s0503a:1241_2: ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādinā uppajjanakā kaṅkhā. Sakavediyā vā paravediyā vāti tā
atk-s0503a:1241_3: evaṃ vuttanayeneva sakaattabhāve ārammaṇavasena paṭilabhitabbāya pavattiyā sakavediyā
atk-s0503a:1241_4: vā parassa attabhāve paṭilabhitabbāya “buddho nu kho, no nu kho”tiādinā vā parasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1241_5: padhāne uttame paṭilabhitabbāya pavattiyā paravediyā vā yā kāci kaṅkhā vicikicchā.
atk-s0503a:1241_6: Ye jhāyino tā pajahanti sabbā, ātāpino brahmacariyaṃ carantāti ye ārammaṇūpanijjhānena
atk-s0503a:1241_8: ātāpino maggabrahmacariyaṃ carantā adhigacchantā saddhānusārīādippabhedā paṭhamamaggaṭṭhā
atk-s0503a:1241_9: puggalā, tā sabbā kaṅkhā pajahanti samucchindanti maggakkhaṇe. Tato paraṃ pana tā
atk-s0503a:1241_10: pahīnā nāma honti, tasmā ito aññaṃ tāsaṃ accantappahānaṃ nāma natthīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1242_0: Iti bhagavā jhānamukhena āyasmato kaṅkhārevatassa jhānasīsena ariyamaggādhigamaṃ
atk-s0503a:1242_1: thomento thomanāvasena udānaṃ udānesi. Teneva ca naṃ “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama
atk-s0503a:1242_2: sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ yadidaṃ kaṅkhārevato”ti jhāyībhāvena etadagge ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0503a:1245_0: 48. Aṭṭhame āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocāti abhimāre payojetvā nāḷāgiriṃ vissajjāpetvā
atk-s0503a:1245_1: silaṃ pavaṭṭetvā bhagavato anatthaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto “saṅghaṃ bhinditvā cakkabhedaṃ
atk-s0503a:1245_2: karissāmī”ti adhippāyena etaṃ “ajjatagge”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Aññatreva bhagavatāti
atk-s0503a:1245_3: vinā eva bhagavantaṃ, satthāraṃ akatvāti attho. Aññatra bhikkhusaṅghāti vinā eva
atk-s0503a:1245_4: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ. Uposathaṃ karissāmi saṅghakammāni cāti bhagavato ovādakārakaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0503a:1245_5: visuṃ katvā maṃ anuvattantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ saṅghakammāni
atk-s0503a:1245_6: ca karissāmīti attho. Devadatto saṅghaṃ bhindissatīti bhedakarānaṃ sabbesaṃ devadattena
atk-s0503a:1245_7: sajjitattā ekaṃseneva devadatto ajja saṅghaṃ bhindissati dvidhā karissati. “Adhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:1245_8: dhammo”tiādīsu hi aṭṭhārasasu bhedakaravatthūsu yaṃkiñci ekampi vatthuṃ dīpetvā tena
atk-s0503a:1245_9: tena kāraṇena “imaṃ gaṇhatha, imaṃ rocethā”ti saññāpetvā salākaṃ gāhetvā visuṃ saṅghakamme
atk-s0503a:1246: “Pañcahi, upāli, ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati kammena uddesena voharanto anussāvanena salākaggāhenā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1247_0: Tattha kammenāti apalokanakammādīsu catūsu kammesu aññatarena kammena. Uddesenāti
atk-s0503a:1247_1: pañcasu pātimokkhuddesesu aññatarena uddesena. Voharantoti tāhi tāhi uppattīhi “adhammaṃ
atk-s0503a:1247_2: dhammo”tiādīni aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthūni dīpento. Anussāvanenāti “nanu tumhe jānātha
atk-s0503a:1247_3: mayhaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca, mādiso nāma uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1247_4: gāheyyāti kiṃ tumhākaṃ cittampi uppādetuṃ yuttaṃ, kimahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmī”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1247_5: nayena kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena. Salākaggāhenāti evaṃ anussāvetvā
atk-s0503a:1247_6: tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā anāvattidhamme katvā “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena.
atk-s0503a:1248_0: Ettha ca kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ, vohārānussāvanasalākaggāhā pana pubbabhāgā.
atk-s0503a:1248_1: Aṭṭhārasavatthudīpanavasena hi voharantena tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāvetvā salākāya
atk-s0503a:1248_2: gāhitāyapi abhinnova hoti saṅgho. Yadā panevaṃ cattāro vā atirekā vā salākaṃ gāhetvā
atk-s0503a:1248_3: āveṇikaṃ uddesaṃ vā kammaṃ vā karonti, tadā saṅgho bhinno nāma hoti. Devadatto ca
atk-s0503a:1248_4: sabbaṃ saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāgaṃ nipphādetvā “ekaṃseneva ajja āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ
atk-s0503a:1248_6: bhante, devadatto saṅghaṃ bhindissatī”ti. Yato avocumhā “bhedakarānaṃ sabbesaṃ devadattena sajjitattā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1249_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ avīcimahānirayuppattisaṃvattaniyaṃ kappaṭṭhiyaṃ atekicchaṃ
atk-s0503a:1249_1: devadattena nibbattiyamānaṃ saṅghabhedakammaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti
atk-s0503a:1250_0: Tattha sukaraṃ sādhunā sādhūti attano paresañca hitaṃ sādhetīti sādhu, sammāpaṭipanno.
atk-s0503a:1250_1: Tena sādhunā sāriputtādinā sāvakena paccekabuddhena sammāsambuddhena aññena vā lokiyasādhunā
atk-s0503a:1250_2: sādhu sundaraṃ bhaddakaṃ attano paresañca hitasukhāvahaṃ sukaraṃ sukhena kātuṃ sakkā.
atk-s0503a:1250_3: Sādhu pāpena dukkaranti tadeva pana vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sādhu pāpena devadattādinā pāpapuggalena
atk-s0503a:1250_4: dukkaraṃ kātuṃ na sakkā, na so taṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti attho. Pāpaṃ pāpena sukaranti
atk-s0503a:1250_5: pāpaṃ asundaraṃ attano paresañca anatthāvahaṃ pāpena yathāvuttapāpapuggalena sukaraṃ
atk-s0503a:1250_6: sukhena kātuṃ sakkuṇeyya. Pāpamariyehi dukkaranti ariyehi pana buddhādīhi taṃ taṃ
atk-s0503a:1250_7: pāpaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ. Setughātoyeva hi tesanti satthā dīpeti.
atk-s0503a:1253: 49. Navame māṇavakāti taruṇā. Paṭhame yobbane ṭhitā brāhmaṇakumārakā idhādhippetā.
atk-s0503a:1254_0: Sadhāyamānarūpāti uppaṇḍanajātikaṃ vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aññesaṃ uppaṇḍentā sadhanti,
atk-s0503a:1254_1: tadatthavacanasīlāti attho. Tassāyaṃ vacanattho – sadhanaṃ sadho, taṃ ācikkhantīti
atk-s0503a:1254_2: sadhayamānāti vattabbe dīghaṃ katvā “sadhāyamānā”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā visesato sasedhe
atk-s0503a:1254_3: viya attānaṃ āvadantīti sadhāyamānā. Te evaṃ sabhāvatāya “sadhāyamānarūpā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1254_4: “Saddāyamānarūpā”tipi pāṭho, uccāsaddamahāsaddaṃ karontāti attho. Bhagavato avidūre
atk-s0503a:1254_5: atikkamantīti bhagavato savanavisaye taṃ taṃ mukhāruḷhaṃ vadantā atiyanti.
atk-s0503a:1255: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ vācāya asaññatabhāvaṃ jānitvā tadatthadīpakaṃ dhammasaṃvegavasena imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1256_0: Tattha parimuṭṭhāti dandhā muṭṭhassatino. Paṇḍitābhāsāti paṇḍitapatirūpakā “ke aññe
atk-s0503a:1256_1: jānanti, mayamevettha jānāmā”ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe attānameva jānantaṃ katvā samudācaraṇato.
atk-s0503a:1256_2: Vācāgocarabhāṇinoti yesaṃ vācā eva gocaro visayo, te vācāgocarabhāṇino, vācāvatthumattasseva
atk-s0503a:1256_3: bhāṇino atthassa apariññātattā. Atha vā vācāya agocaraṃ ariyānaṃ kathāya avisayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1256_4: musāvādaṃ bhaṇantīti vācāgocarabhāṇino. Atha vā “gocarabhāṇino”ti ettha ākārassa
atk-s0503a:1256_5: rassabhāvo kato. Vācāgocarā, na satipaṭṭhānādigocarā bhāṇinova. Kathaṃ bhāṇino? Yāvicchanti
atk-s0503a:1256_6: mukhāyāmaṃ attano yāva mukhāyāmaṃ yāva mukhappasāraṇaṃ icchanti, tāva pasāretvā bhāṇino,
atk-s0503a:1256_7: paresu gāravena, attano avisayatāya ca mukhasaṅkocaṃ na karontīti attho. Atha vā
atk-s0503a:1256_8: vācāgocarā eva hutvā bhāṇino, sayaṃ ajānitvā parapattikā eva hutvā vattāroti attho.
atk-s0503a:1256_9: Tato eva yāvicchanti mukhāyāmaṃ yena vacanena sāvetabbā, taṃ acintetvā yāvadeva attano
atk-s0503a:1256_10: mukhappasāraṇamattaṃ icchantīti attho. Yena nītā na taṃ vidūti yena muṭṭhassaccādinā
atk-s0503a:1256_11: nillajjabhāvaṃ paṇḍitamānībhāvañca nītā “mayamevaṃ bhaṇāmā”ti, taṃ tathā attano bhaṇantassa
atk-s0503a:1256_12: kāraṇaṃ na vidū, aviddasuno asūrā na jānantīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1259_0: 50. Dasame cūḷapanthakoti mahāpanthakattherassa kaniṭṭhabhātikattā panthe jātattā
atk-s0503a:1259_1: ca daharakāle laddhavohārena aparabhāgepi ayamāyasmā “cūḷapanthako”tveva paññāyittha.
atk-s0503a:1259_2: Guṇavisesehi pana chaḷabhiñño pabhinnapaṭisambhido “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1259_3: bhikkhūnaṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ yadidaṃ cūḷapanthako, cetovivaṭṭakusalānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1259_4: yadidaṃ cūḷapanthako”ti dvīsu ṭhānesu bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapito asītiyā mahāsāvakesu abbhantaro.
atk-s0503a:1260_0: So ekadivasaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto attano divāṭṭhāne divāvihāraṃ nisinno
atk-s0503a:1260_1: samāpattīhi divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ upāsakesu dhammassavanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1260_2: anāgatesu eva vihāramajjhaṃ pavisitvā bhagavati gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinne “akālo tāva
atk-s0503a:1260_3: bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ upasaṅkamitu”nti gandhakuṭipamukhe ekamantaṃ nisīdi pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0503a:1260_4: ābhujitvā. Tena vuttaṃ – “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā cūḷapanthako bhagavato avidūre
atk-s0503a:1260_5: nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1260_6: So hi tadā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0503a:1261_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato cūḷapanthakassa kāyacittānaṃ sammāpaṇihitabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1261_1: atthaṃ jānitvā. Imaṃ udānanti aññopi yo passaddhakāyo sabbiriyāpathesu upaṭṭhitassati
atk-s0503a:1261_2: samāhito, tassa bhikkhuno anupādā parinibbānapariyosānassa visesādhigamassa tattha
atk-s0503a:1262_0: Tattha ṭhitena kāyenāti kāyadvārikassa asaṃvarassa pahānena akaraṇena sammā ṭhapitena
atk-s0503a:1262_1: copanakāyena, tathā cakkhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ nibbisevanabhāvakaraṇena suṭṭhu ṭhapitena
atk-s0503a:1262_3: ṭhitena karajakāyena cāti saṅkhepato sabbenapi kāyena nibbikāratāsaṅkhātena niccalabhāvena
atk-s0503a:1262_4: ṭhitena. Etenassa sīlapārisuddhi dassitā. Itthambhūtalakkhaṇe ca idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1262_5: Ṭhitena cetasāti cittassa ṭhitiparidīpanena samādhisampadaṃ dasseti. Samādhi hi cittassa
atk-s0503a:1262_6: ‘ṭhitī’ti vuccati. Tasmā samathavasena vipassanāvaseneva vā ekaggatāya sati cittaṃ
atk-s0503a:1262_7: ārammaṇe ekodibhāvūpagamanena ṭhitaṃ nāma hoti, na aññathā. Idañca yathāvuttakāyacittānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1262_8: ṭhapanaṃ samādahanaṃ sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbesu ca iriyāpathesu icchitabbanti dassento
atk-s0503a:1262_9: āha – “tiṭṭhaṃ nisinno uda vā sayāno”ti. Tattha vā-saddo aniyamattho. Tena tiṭṭhanto
atk-s0503a:1262_10: vā nisinno vā sayāno vā tadaññiriyāpatho vāti ayamattho dīpito hotīti caṅkamanassāpi
atk-s0503a:1263_0: Etaṃ satiṃ bhikkhu adhiṭṭhahānoti yāya pageva parisuddhasamācāro kāyacittaduṭṭhullabhāvūpasamanena
atk-s0503a:1263_1: kāyaṃ cittañca asāraddhaṃ katvā paṭiladdhāya anavajjasukhādhiṭṭhāya kāyacittapassaddhivasena
atk-s0503a:1263_2: cittaṃ lahuṃ muduṃ kammaññañca katvā sammā ṭhapento samādahanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ paribrūheti
atk-s0503a:1263_3: matthakañca pāpeti, taṃ eva kammaṭṭhānānuyogassa ādimajjhapariyosānesu bahūpakāraṃ
atk-s0503a:1263_4: satiṃ bhikkhu adhiṭṭhahāno sīlavisodhanaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva visesādhigamā tattha tattha
atk-s0503a:1263_5: adhiṭṭhahantoti attho. Labhetha pubbāpariyaṃ visesanti so evaṃ satiārakkhena cetasā
atk-s0503a:1263_6: kammaṭṭhānaṃ uparūpari vaḍḍhento brūhento phātiṃ karonto pubbāpariyaṃ pubbāpariyavantaṃ
atk-s0503a:1264_0: Tattha duvidho pubbāpariyaviseso samathavasena vipassanāvasena cāti. Tesu samathavasena
atk-s0503a:1264_1: tāva nimittuppattito paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavasībhāvo, tāva pavatto
atk-s0503a:1264_2: bhāvanāviseso pubbāpariyaviseso. Vipassanāvasena pana rūpamukhena abhinivisantassa
atk-s0503a:1264_3: rūpadhammapariggahato, itarassa nāmadhammapariggahato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattādhigamo,
atk-s0503a:1264_4: tāva pavatto bhāvanāviseso pubbāpariyaviseso. Ayameva ca idhādhippeto.
atk-s0503a:1265_0: Laddhāna pubbāpariyaṃ visesanti pubbāpariyavisesaṃ ukkaṃsapāramippattaṃ arahattaṃ
atk-s0503a:1265_1: labhitvā. Adassanaṃ maccurājassa gaccheti jīvitupacchedavasena sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1265_2: abhibhavanato maccurājasaṅkhātassa maraṇassa visayabhūtaṃ bhavattayaṃ samatikkantattā
atk-s0503a:1265_3: adassanaṃ agocaraṃ gaccheyya. Imasmiṃ vagge yaṃ avuttaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0503a:1270_0: 51. Jaccandhavaggassa paṭhame vesāliyantiādi heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Vesāliṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0503a:1270_1: pāvisīti kadā pāvisi? Ukkācelato nikkhamitvā vesāliṃ gatakāle. Bhagavā hi veḷuvagāmake
atk-s0503a:1270_2: vassaṃ vasitvā tato nikkhamitvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavane vihāsi. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1270_3: kāle dhammasenāpati attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ oloketvā “sattāhameva pavattissatī”ti ñatvā
atk-s0503a:1270_4: bhagavantaṃ anujānāpetvā nāḷakagāmaṃ gantvā tattha mātaraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0503a:1270_5: parinibbāyi. Satthā cundena ābhatā tassa dhātuyo gahetvā dhātucetiyaṃ kārāpetvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0503a:1270_6: rājagahaṃ agamāsi. Tattha gatakāle āyasmā mahāmoggallāno parinibbāyi. Bhagavā tassapi
atk-s0503a:1270_7: dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā rājagahato nikkhamitvā anupubbena ukkācelaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1270_8: Tattha gaṅgātīre bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisīditvā aggasāvakānaṃ parinibbānappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:1270_9: dhammaṃ desetvā ukkācelato nikkhamitvā vesāliṃ agamāsi. Evaṃ gato bhagavā “pubbaṇhasamayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1270_10: nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṃ piṇḍāya pāvisī”ti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ – “ukkācelato
atk-s0503a:1271_0: Nisīdananti idha cammakkhaṇḍaṃ adhippetaṃ. Cāpālaṃ cetiyanti pubbe cāpālassa nāma
atk-s0503a:1271_1: yakkhassa vasitaṭṭhānaṃ “cāpālacetiya”nti paññāyittha. Tattha bhagavato katavihāropi
atk-s0503a:1271_2: tāya ruḷhiyā “cāpālacetiya”nti vuccati. Udenaṃ cetiyanti evamādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0503a:1271_3: Sattambanti kikissa kira kāsirañño dhītaro satta kumāriyo saṃvegajātā rājagehato
atk-s0503a:1271_4: nikkhamitvā yattha padhānaṃ padahiṃsu, taṃ ṭhānaṃ “sattambaṃ cetiya”nti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:1271_5: Bahuputtanti bahupāroho eko nigrodharukkho, tasmiṃ adhivatthaṃ devataṃ bahū manussā
atk-s0503a:1271_6: putte patthenti, tadupādāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ “bahuputtaṃ cetiya”nti paññāyittha. Sārandadanti
atk-s0503a:1271_7: sārandadassa nāma yakkhassa vasitaṭṭhānaṃ. Iti sabbāneva tāni buddhuppādato pubbe
atk-s0503a:1271_8: devatāpariggahitattā cetiyavohārena voharitāni, bhagavato vihāre katepi ca tatheva
atk-s0503a:1271_9: paññāyanti. Ramaṇīyāti ettha vesāliyā tāva bhūmibhāgasampattiyā puggalasampattiyā
atk-s0503a:1271_10: sulabhapaccayatāya ca ramaṇīyabhāvo veditabbo. Vihārānaṃ pana nagarato nātidūratāya
atk-s0503a:1271_12: pavivekapatirūpatāya ca ramaṇīyatā daṭṭhabbā. Cattāro iddhipādāti ettha iddhipādapadassa
atk-s0503a:1271_13: attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Bhāvitāti vaḍḍhitā. Bahulīkatāti punappunaṃ katā. Yānīkatāti
atk-s0503a:1271_14: yuttayānaṃ viya katā. Vatthukatāti patiṭṭhaṭṭhena vatthu viya katā. Anuṭṭhitāti adhiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0503a:1271_15: Paricitāti samantato citā suvaḍḍhitā. Susamāraddhāti suṭṭhu samāraddhā, ativiya sammā nipphāditāti.
atk-s0503a:1272_0: Evaṃ aniyamena kathetvā puna niyametvā dassetuṃ, “tathāgatassa kho”tiādimāha. Ettha
atk-s0503a:1272_1: ca kappanti āyukappaṃ. Tiṭṭheyyāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1272_2: taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā tiṭṭheyya dhareyya. Kappāvasesaṃ vāti “appaṃ vā bhiyyo vā”ti
atk-s0503a:1272_3: vuttaṃ vassasatato atirekaṃ vā. Mahāsīvatthero panāha – “buddhānaṃ aṭṭhāne gajjitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1272_4: nāma natthi. Yatheva hi veḷuvagāmake uppannaṃ māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ dasa māse vikkhambhesi,
atk-s0503a:1272_5: evaṃ punappunaṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vikkhambhento imaṃ bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1272_6: Kasmā pana na ṭhitoti? Upādinnakasarīraṃ nāma khaṇḍiccādīhi abhibhuyyati, buddhā
atk-s0503a:1272_7: ca pana khaṇḍiccādibhāvaṃ appatvā pañcame āyukoṭṭhāse bahujanassa piyamanāpakāleyeva
atk-s0503a:1272_9: ekakeneva ṭhātabbaṃ hoti, daharasāmaṇeraparivārena vā. Tato “aho buddhānaṃ parisā”ti
atk-s0503a:1272_10: hīḷetabbataṃ āpajjeyya, tasmā na ṭhitoti. Evaṃ vuttepi so pana na ruccati, “āyukappo”ti
atk-s0503a:1273_0: Oḷārike nimitteti thūle saññuppādane. Thūlasaññuppādanañhetaṃ, “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā
atk-s0503a:1273_1: kappa”nti sakalakappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya yadidaṃ “yassa kassaci, ānanda, cattāro
atk-s0503a:1273_2: iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ
atk-s0503a:1273_3: avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvibhāvanaṃ. Obhāseti pākaṭavacane. Pākaṭañcetaṃ vacanaṃ pariyāyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1274_0: Bahujanahitāyāti mahājanassa hitatthāya. Bahujanasukhāyāti mahājanassa sukhatthāya.
atk-s0503a:1274_1: Lokānukampāyāti sattalokassa anukampaṃ paṭicca. Katarassa sattalokassa? Yo bhagavato
atk-s0503a:1274_2: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭivijjhati, amatapānaṃ pivati, tassa. Bhagavato hi dhammacakkappavattanasuttadesanāya
atk-s0503a:1274_3: aññātakoṇḍaññappamukhā aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo dhammaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu. Evaṃ yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā
atk-s0503a:1274_4: dhammapaṭividdhasattānaṃ gaṇanā natthi, mahāsamayasuttaṃ maṅgalasuttaṃ cūḷarāhulovādasuttaṃ
atk-s0503a:1274_5: samacittasuttanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ suttānaṃ desanākāle abhisamayappattasattānaṃ paricchedo
atk-s0503a:1274_6: natthi, etassa aparimāṇassa sattalokassa anukampāya bhagavato ṭhānaṃ jātaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0503a:1274_7: anāgatepi bhavissatīti adhippāyena vadati. Devamanussānanti na kevalaṃ devamanussānaṃyeva,
atk-s0503a:1274_8: avasesānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi atthāya hitāya sukhāya bhagavato ṭhānaṃ hoti. Sahetukapaṭisandhike
atk-s0503a:1274_9: pana maggaphalasacchikiriyāya bhabbapuggale dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā aññesampi
atk-s0503a:1274_10: atthatthāya hitatthāya sukhatthāya bhagavā tiṭṭhatūti attho. Tattha atthāyāti idhalokasampattiatthāya.
atk-s0503a:1275_0: Yathā taṃ mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittoti ettha nti nipātamattaṃ, yathā mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto
atk-s0503a:1275_1: ajjhotthaṭacitto aññopi koci puthujjano paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya, evameva nāsakkhi
atk-s0503a:1275_2: paṭivijjhitunti attho. Māro hi yassa keci vipallāsā appahīnā, tassa cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti.
atk-s0503a:1275_3: Yassa pana sabbena sabbaṃ dvādasa vipallāsā appahīnā, tassa vattabbameva natthi,
atk-s0503a:1275_4: therassa ca cattāro vipallāsā appahīnā, tenassa cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāsi. So pana cittapariyuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1275_5: karonto kiṃ karotīti? Bheravaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā dasseti, saddārammaṇaṃ vā sāveti,
atk-s0503a:1275_6: tato sattā taṃ disvā vā sutvā vā satiṃ vissajjetvā vivaṭamukhā honti. Tesaṃ mukhena
atk-s0503a:1275_7: hatthaṃ pavesetvā hadayaṃ maddati, tato visaññino hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Therassa panesa
atk-s0503a:1275_8: mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati, bheravārammaṇaṃ pana dasseti. Taṃ disvā
atk-s0503a:1275_9: thero nimittobhāsaṃ na paṭivijjhi. Jānantoyeva bhagavā kimatthaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ āmantesi?
atk-s0503a:1275_10: Parato “tiṭṭhatu, bhante bhagavā”ti yācite “tuyhevetaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, tuyhevetaṃ aparaddha”nti
atk-s0503a:1275_11: dosāropanena sokatanukaraṇatthaṃ. Passati hi bhagavā “ayaṃ mayi ativiya siniddhahadayo,
atk-s0503a:1275_12: so parato bhūmicālakāraṇañca āyusaṅkhārossajjanañca sutvā mama ciraṭṭhānaṃ yācissati,
atk-s0503a:1275_13: athāhaṃ ‘kissa tvaṃ puretaraṃ na yācasī’ti tasseva sīse dosaṃ pātessāmi, sattā ca
atk-s0503a:1275_14: attano aparādhena na tathā vihaññanti, tenassa soko tanuko bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1276: Gaccha tvaṃ, ānandāti yasmā divāvihāratthāya idhāgato, tasmā, ānanda, gaccha tvaṃ yathārucitaṃ ṭhānaṃ divāvihārāya. Tenevāha – “yassa dāni kālaṃ maññasī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1277_0: Māro pāpimāti ettha satte anatthe niyojento māretīti māro. Pāpimāti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1277_1: So hi pāpadhammena samannāgatattā ‘pāpimā’ti vuccati. Bhāsitā kho panesāti ayañhi
atk-s0503a:1277_2: bhagavati bodhimaṇḍe satta sattāhe atikkamitvā ajapālanigrodhe viharante attano dhītāsu
atk-s0503a:1277_3: āgantvā icchāvighātaṃ patvā gatāsu ayaṃ “attheso upāyo”ti cintento āgantvā “bhagavā
atk-s0503a:1277_4: yadatthaṃ tumhehi pāramiyo pūritā, so vo attho anuppatto, paṭividdhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1277_5: kiṃ te lokavicaraṇenā”ti vatvā yathā ajja evameva “parinibbātu dāni, bhante bhagavā”ti
atk-s0503a:1277_6: yāci. Bhagavā cassa “na tāvāha”ntiādīni vatvā paṭikkhipi. Taṃ sandhāya idāni “bhāsitā
atk-s0503a:1278_0: Tattha viyattāti ariyamaggādhigamavasena byattā. Vinītāti tatheva kilesavinayanena
atk-s0503a:1278_1: vinītā. Visāradāti sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādīnaṃ pahānena visāradabhāvaṃ pattā.
