atk-s0503a:1426_0: 66. Chaṭṭhe aññāsikoṇḍaññoti ettha koṇḍaññoti tassāyasmato gottato āgatanāmaṃ. Sāvakesu
atk-s0503a:1426_1: pana sabbapaṭhamaṃ ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhīti bhagavatā “aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍañño”ti
atk-s0503a:1426_3: taṇhā saṅkhīyati pahīyati etthāti taṇhāsaṅkhayo, nibbānaṃ. Tasmiṃ taṇhāsaṅkhaye vimutti.
atk-s0503a:1426_4: Taṇhā vā saṅkhīyati pahīyati etenāti taṇhāsaṅkhayo, ariyamaggo. Tassa phalabhūtā,
atk-s0503a:1426_5: pariyosānabhūtā vā vimuttīti taṇhāsaṅkhayavimutti, nippariyāyena arahattaphalasamāpatti.
atk-s0503a:1426_6: Taṃ paccavekkhamāno nisinno hoti. Ayañhi āyasmā bahulaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
atk-s0503a:1427: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa aggaphalapaccavekkhaṇaṃ viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1428_0: Tattha yassa mūlaṃ chamā natthīti yassa ariyapuggalassa attabhāvarukkhamūlabhūtā
atk-s0503a:1428_1: avijjā, tassāva patiṭṭhā hetubhūtā āsavanīvaraṇaayonisomanasikārasaṅkhātā chamā pathavī
atk-s0503a:1428_2: ca natthi aggamaggena samugghātitattā. Paṇṇā natthi kuto latāti natthi latā kuto
atk-s0503a:1428_3: paṇṇāti padasambandho. Mānātimānādipabhedā sākhāpasākhādisaṅkhātā latāpi natthi,
atk-s0503a:1428_4: kuto eva madappamādamāyāsāṭheyyādipaṇṇānīti attho. Atha vā paṇṇā natthi kuto latāti
atk-s0503a:1428_5: rukkhaṅkurassa vaḍḍhamānassa paṭhamaṃ paṇṇāni nibbattanti. Pacchā sākhāpasākhāsaṅkhātā
atk-s0503a:1428_6: latāti katvā vuttaṃ. Tattha yassa ariyamaggabhāvanāya asati uppajjanārahassa attabhāvarukkhassa
atk-s0503a:1428_7: ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā yaṃ avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ mūlaṃ, tassa patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ āsavādi
atk-s0503a:1428_8: ca natthi. Mūlaggahaṇeneva cettha mūlakāraṇattā bījaṭṭhāniyaṃ kammaṃ tadabhāvopi
atk-s0503a:1428_9: gahitoyevāti veditabbo. Asati ca kammabīje taṃnimitto viññāṇaṅkuro, viññāṇaṅkuranimittā
atk-s0503a:1428_10: ca nāmarūpasaḷāyatanapattasākhādayo na nibbattissantiyeva. Tena vuttaṃ – “yassa mūlaṃ
atk-s0503a:1428_11: chamā natthi, paṇṇā natthi kuto latā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1429_0: Taṃ dhīraṃ bandhanā muttanti taṃ catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyayogena vijitamārattā
atk-s0503a:1429_1: dhīraṃ, tato eva sabbakilesābhisaṅkhārabandhanato muttaṃ. Ko taṃ ninditumarahatīti
atk-s0503a:1429_2: ettha nti nipātamattaṃ. Evaṃ sabbakilesavippamuttaṃ sīlādianuttaraguṇasamannāgataṃ
atk-s0503a:1429_3: ko nāma viññujātiko nindituṃ garahituṃ arahati nindānimittasseva abhāvato. Devāpi
atk-s0503a:1429_4: naṃ pasaṃsantīti aññadatthu devā sakkādayo guṇavisesavidū, apisaddena manussāpi khattiyapaṇḍitādayo
atk-s0503a:1429_5: pasaṃsanti. Kiñca bhiyyo brahmunāpi pasaṃsito mahābrahmunāpi aññehipi brahmanāgayakkhagandhabbādīhipi
atk-s0503a:1432_0: 67. Sattame papañcasaññāsaṅkhāpahānanti papañcenti yattha sayaṃ uppannā, taṃ santānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1432_1: vitthārenti ciraṃ ṭhapentīti papañcā, kilesā. Visesato rāgadosamohataṇhādiṭṭhimānā. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0503a:1433: “Rāgo papañco, doso papañco, moho papañco, taṇhā papañco, diṭṭhi papañco, māno papañco”ti. –
atk-s0503a:1434_0: Apica saṃkilesaṭṭho papañcaṭṭho, kacavaraṭṭho papañcaṭṭho. Tattha rāgapapañcassa
atk-s0503a:1434_1: subhasaññā nimittaṃ, dosapapañcassa āghātavatthu, mohapapañcassa āsavā, taṇhāpapañcassa
atk-s0503a:1434_2: vedanā, diṭṭhipapañcassa saññā, mānapapañcassa vitakko nimittaṃ. Tehi papañcehi sahagatā
atk-s0503a:1434_3: saññā papañcasaññā. Papañcasaññānaṃ saṅkhā bhāgā koṭṭhāsā papañcasaññāsaṅkhā. Atthato
atk-s0503a:1434_4: saddhiṃ nimittehi taṃtaṃpapañcassa pakkhiyo kilesagaṇo. Saññāgahaṇañcettha tassa
atk-s0503a:1434_5: nesaṃ sādhāraṇahetubhāvena. Vuttañhetaṃ – “saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā”ti. Tesaṃ
atk-s0503a:1434_6: pahānaṃ, tena tena maggena rāgādikilesānaṃ samucchedananti attho.
atk-s0503a:1435_0: Tadā hi bhagavā atītāsu anekakoṭisatasahassasaṅkhāsu attano jātīsu anatthassa nimittabhūte
atk-s0503a:1435_1: kilese imasmiṃ carimabhave ariyamaggena bodhimaṇḍe savāsane pahīne paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0503a:1435_2: sattasantānañca kilesacaritaṃ rāgādikilesasaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ kañjiyapuṇṇalābuṃ viya takkabharitacāṭiṃ
atk-s0503a:1435_3: viya vasāpītapilotikaṃ viya ca dubbinimociyaṃ disvā “evaṃ gahanaṃ nāmidaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0503a:1435_4: anādikālabhāvitaṃ mayhaṃ anavasesaṃ pahīnaṃ, aho suppahīna”nti uppannapītipāmojjo
atk-s0503a:1435_5: udānaṃ udānesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho bhagavā attano papañcasaññāsaṅkhāpahānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1435_6: viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1436_0: Tattha yassa papañcā ṭhiti ca natthīti yasmā bhagavā attānameva paraṃ viya katvā
atk-s0503a:1436_1: niddisati tasmā yassa aggapuggalassa vuttalakkhaṇā papañcā, tehi katā saṃsāre ṭhiti
atk-s0503a:1436_2: ca natthi. Nettiyaṃ pana “ṭhiti nāma anusayo”ti vuttaṃ. Anusayo hi bhavapavattiyā
atk-s0503a:1436_3: mūlanti. Satte saṃsāre papañcentīti papañcā. “Papañcaṭṭhitī”ti ca pāṭho. Tassattho
atk-s0503a:1436_4: – papañcānaṃ ṭhiti vijjamānatā maggena asamucchedo papañcaṭṭhiti, papañcā eva vā
atk-s0503a:1436_5: avasiṭṭhakusalākusalavipākānaṃ pavattiyā hetubhāvato vaṭṭassa ṭhiti papañcaṭṭhiti,
atk-s0503a:1436_6: sā yassa aggapuggalassa natthi. Sandānaṃ palighañca vītivattoti yo bandhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0503a:1436_8: palighasadisattā palighasaṅkhātaṃ avijjañca vītivatto savāsanapahānena visesato atikkanto.
atk-s0503a:1436_9: Apare pana kodhaṃ “sandāna”nti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. So hi “parābhisajjanī”ti vuttoti.
atk-s0503a:1437_0: Taṃ nittaṇhaṃ muniṃ carantanti taṃ sabbathāpi taṇhābhāvena nittaṇhaṃ, ubhayalokamunanato
atk-s0503a:1437_1: attahitaparahitamunanato ca muniṃ, ekanteneva sabbasattahitatthaṃ catūhi iriyāpathehi
atk-s0503a:1437_2: nānāsamāpatticārehi anaññasādhāraṇena ñāṇacārena ca carantaṃ. Nāvajānāti sadevakopi
atk-s0503a:1437_3: lokoti sabbo sapaññajātiko sattaloko sadevakopi sabrahmakopi na kadācipi avajānāti
atk-s0503a:1437_4: na paribhoti, atha kho ayameva loke aggo seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti garuṃ karonto sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0503a:1440_0: 68. Aṭṭhame ajjhattanti ettha ayaṃ ajjhattasaddo “cha ajjhattikāni āyatanānī”tiādīsu
atk-s0503a:1440_1: ajjhattajjhatte āgato. “Ajjhattā dhammā, ajjhattaṃ vā kāye kāyānupassī”tiādīsu niyakajjhatte.
atk-s0503a:1440_2: “Sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ upasampajja viharatī”tiādīsu visayajjhatte,
atk-s0503a:1440_3: issariyaṭṭhāneti attho. Phalasamāpatti hi buddhānaṃ issariyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. “Tenānanda,
atk-s0503a:1440_4: bhikkhunā tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabba”ntiādīsu
atk-s0503a:1440_5: gocarajjhatte. Idhāpi gocarajjhatteyeva daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā ajjhattanti gocarajjhattabhūte
atk-s0503a:1440_6: kammaṭṭhānārammaṇeti vuttaṃ hoti. Parimukhanti abhimukhaṃ. Sūpaṭṭhitāyāti suṭṭhu
atk-s0503a:1440_7: upaṭṭhitāya kāyagatāya satiyā. Satisīsena cettha jhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0503a:1441_0: Ayañhi thero bhagavati sāvatthiyaṃ viharante ekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā
atk-s0503a:1441_1: pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā divāṭṭhāne
atk-s0503a:1441_2: divāvihāraṃ nisinno nānāsamāpattīhi divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ vihāramajjhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1441_3: otaritvā bhagavati gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinne “akālo tāva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitu”nti
atk-s0503a:1441_4: gandhakuṭiyā avidūre, aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle kālaparicchedaṃ katvā yathāvuttaṃ samāpattiṃ
atk-s0503a:1441_5: samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Satthā taṃ tathānisinnaṃ gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnoyeva passi. Tena
atk-s0503a:1441_6: vuttaṃ – “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahākaccāno…pe… sūpaṭṭhitāyā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1442_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ āyasmato mahākaccānattherassa satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāvasena
atk-s0503a:1442_1: adhigataṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā samāpajjanaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1443_0: Tattha yassa siyā sabbadā sati, satataṃ kāyagatā upaṭṭhitāti yassa āraddhavipassakassa
atk-s0503a:1443_1: ekadivasaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā sabbasmimpi kāle nāmarūpabhedena duvidhepi kāye gatā
atk-s0503a:1443_2: kāyārammaṇā pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ aniccādisammasanavasena satataṃ nirantaraṃ
atk-s0503a:1444_0: Ayaṃ kirāyasmā paṭhamaṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānavasena jhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1444_1: katvā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānamukhena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patto. So
atk-s0503a:1444_2: aparabhāgepi yebhuyyena tameva jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva ca vipassitvā
atk-s0503a:1444_3: phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati. Svāyaṃ yena vidhinā arahattaṃ patto, taṃ vidhiṃ dassento
atk-s0503a:1444_4: satthā “yassa siyā sabbadā sati, satataṃ kāyagatā upaṭṭhitā”ti vatvā tassā upaṭṭhānākāraṃ
atk-s0503a:1444_5: vibhāvetuṃ “no cassa no ca me siyā, na bhavissati na ca me bhavissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:1445_0: Tassattho dvidhā veditabbo sammasanato pubbabhāgavasena sammasanakālavasena cāti.
atk-s0503a:1445_1: Tesu pubbabhāgavasena tāva no cassa no ca me siyāti atītakāle mama kilesakammaṃ no
atk-s0503a:1445_2: cassa na bhaveyya ce, imasmiṃ paccuppannakāle ayaṃ attabhāvo no ca me siyā na me
atk-s0503a:1445_3: uppajjeyya. Yasmā pana me atīte kammakilesā ahesuṃ, tasmā taṃnimitto etarahi ayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1445_4: me attabhāvo pavattati. Na bhavissati na ca me bhavissatīti imasmiṃ attabhāve paṭipakkhādhigamena
atk-s0503a:1445_5: kilesakammaṃ na bhavissati na uppajjissati me, āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ na ca me bhavissati
atk-s0503a:1445_6: na me pavattissatīti. Evaṃ kālattaye kammakilesahetukaṃ idaṃ mayhaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1445_7: khandhapañcakaṃ, na issarādihetukaṃ, yathā ca mayhaṃ, evaṃ sabbasattānanti sappaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0503a:1446_0: Sammasanakālavasena pana no cassa no ca me siyāti yasmā idaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ hutvā
atk-s0503a:1446_1: abhāvaṭṭhena aniccaṃ, abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhaṃ, avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā,
atk-s0503a:1446_2: evaṃ yadi ayaṃ attā nāma nāpi khandhapañcakavinimutto koci no cassa no ca siyā na
atk-s0503a:1446_3: bhaveyya, evaṃ, bhante, no ca me siyā mama santakaṃ nāma kiñci na bhaveyya. Na bhavissatīti
atk-s0503a:1446_4: attani attaniye bhavitabbaṃ yathā cidaṃ nāmarūpaṃ etarahi ca atīte ca attattaniyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1446_5: suññaṃ, evaṃ na bhavissati na me bhavissati, anāgatepi khandhavinimutto attā nāma
atk-s0503a:1446_6: na koci na me bhavissati na pavattissati, tato eva kiñci palibodhaṭṭhāniyaṃ na me
atk-s0503a:1446_7: bhavissati āyatimpi attaniyaṃ nāma na me kiñci bhavissatīti. Iminā tīsu kālesu “aha”nti
atk-s0503a:1446_8: gahetabbassa abhāvato “mama”nti gahetabbassa ca abhāvaṃ dasseti. Tena catukkoṭikā
atk-s0503a:1447_0: Anupubbavihāri tattha soti evaṃ tīsupi kālesu attattaniyaṃ suññataṃ tattha saṅkhāragate
atk-s0503a:1447_2: anupubbavihārī samāno. Kāleneva tare visattikanti so evaṃ vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā
atk-s0503a:1447_3: ṭhito yogāvacaro indriyānaṃ paripākagatakālena vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya maggena
atk-s0503a:1447_4: ghaṭitakālena ariyamaggassa uppattikālena sakalassa bhavattayassa saṃtananato visattikāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1447_5: taṇhaṃ tareyya, vitaritvā tassā paratīre tiṭṭheyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0503a:1448: Iti bhagavā aññāpadesena āyasmato mahākaccānassa arahattuppattidīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1451_0: 69. Navame mallesūti mallā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado
atk-s0503a:1451_1: ruḷhīvasena “mallā”ti vuccati, tesu mallesu, yaṃ loke “mallo”ti vuccati. Keci pana
atk-s0503a:1451_3: caramāno. Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghenāti aparicchedaguṇena mahantena samaṇagaṇena. Tadā
atk-s0503a:1451_4: hi bhagavato mahābhikkhuparivāro ahosi. Thūṇaṃ nāma mallānaṃ brāhmaṇagāmoti puratthimadakkhiṇāya
atk-s0503a:1451_5: disāya majjhimadesassa avadhiṭṭhāne malladese thūṇanāmako brāhmaṇabahulatāya brāhmaṇagāmo.
atk-s0503a:1451_6: Tadavasarīti taṃ avasari, thūṇagāmamaggaṃ pāpuṇīti attho. Assosunti suṇiṃsu, sotadvārasampattavacananigghosānusārena
atk-s0503a:1451_7: jāniṃsūti attho. Khoti padapūraṇe, avadhāraṇatthe vā nipāto. Tattha avadhāraṇatthena
atk-s0503a:1451_8: assosuṃyeva, na tesaṃ savanantarāyo ahosīti vuttaṃ hoti. Padapūraṇena padabyañjanasiliṭṭhattamattameva.
atk-s0503a:1451_9: Thūṇeyyakāti thūṇagāmavāsino. Brāhmaṇagahapatikāti ettha brahmaṃ aṇantīti brāhmaṇā,
atk-s0503a:1451_10: mante sajjhāyantīti attho. Idameva hi jātibrāhmaṇānaṃ nibbacanaṃ, ariyā pana bāhitapāpattā
atk-s0503a:1451_11: “brāhmaṇā”ti vuccanti. Gahapatikāti khattiyabrāhmaṇe vajjetvā ye keci agāraṃ ajjhāvasantā
atk-s0503a:1451_12: vuccanti, visesato vessā. Brāhmaṇā ca gahapatikā ca brāhmaṇagahapatikā.
atk-s0503a:1452_0: Idāni yamatthaṃ te assosuṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1452_1: Tattha samitapāpattā “samaṇo”ti veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ – “samitāssa honti pāpakā
atk-s0503a:1452_2: akusalā dhammā”tiādi. Bhagavā ca anuttarena ariyamaggena sabbaso samitapāpo. Tenassa
atk-s0503a:1452_3: yathābhuccaguṇādhigatametaṃ nāmaṃ, yadidaṃ samaṇoti. Khalūti anussavatthe nipāto.
atk-s0503a:1452_4: Bhoti brāhmaṇajātikānaṃ jātisamudāgataṃ ālapanamattaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ “bhovādi nāma
atk-s0503a:1452_5: so hoti, sace hoti sakiñcano”ti. Gotamoti gottavasena bhagavato parikittanaṃ. Tasmā
atk-s0503a:1452_6: “samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo”ti samaṇo kira, bho, gotamagottoti ayamettha attho. Sakyaputtoti
atk-s0503a:1452_7: idaṃ pana bhagavato uccākulaparidīpanaṃ. Sakyakulā pabbajitoti saddhāpabbajitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1452_8: Kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāya nekkhammādhigamasaddhāya
atk-s0503a:1452_9: pabbajitoti vuttaṃ hoti. Udapānaṃ tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūresunti pānīyakūpaṃ
atk-s0503a:1452_10: tiṇena ca bhusena ca mukhappamāṇena vaḍḍhesuṃ, tiṇādīni pakkhipitvā kūpaṃ pidahiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0503a:1453_0: Tassa kira gāmassa bahi bhagavato āgamanamagge brāhmaṇānaṃ paribhogabhūto eko udapāno
atk-s0503a:1453_1: ahosi. Taṃ ṭhapetvā tattha sabbāni kūpataḷākādīni udakaṭṭhānāni tadā visukkhāni nirudakāni
atk-s0503a:1453_2: ahesuṃ. Atha thūṇeyyakā ratanattaye appasannā maccherapakatā bhagavato āgamanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0503a:1453_3: “sace samaṇo gotamo sasāvako imaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā dvīhatīhaṃ vaseyya, sabbaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0503a:1453_4: janaṃ attano vacane ṭhapeyya, tato brāhmaṇadhammo patiṭṭhaṃ na labheyyā”ti tattha
atk-s0503a:1453_5: bhagavato avāsāya parisakkantā “imasmiṃ gāme aññattha udakaṃ natthi, amuṃ udapānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1453_6: aparibhogaṃ karissāma, evaṃ samaṇo gotamo sasāvako imaṃ gāmaṃ na pavisissatī”ti sammantayitvā
atk-s0503a:1453_7: sabbe gāmavāsino sattāhassa udakaṃ gahetvā cāṭiādīni pūretvā udapānaṃ tiṇena ca bhusena
atk-s0503a:1453_8: ca pidahiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ – “udapānaṃ tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūresuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1454_0: Tattha muṇḍakā samaṇakāti muṇḍe “muṇḍā”ti samaṇe “samaṇā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭeyya, te pana
atk-s0503a:1454_1: khuṃsanādhippāyena hīḷentā evamāhaṃsu. Māti paṭisedhe, mā apaṃsu mā piviṃsūti attho.
atk-s0503a:1454_2: Maggā okkammāti maggato apasakkitvā. Etamhāti yo udapāno tehi tathā kato, tameva
atk-s0503a:1454_3: niddisanto āha. Kiṃ pana bhagavā tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vippakāraṃ anāvajjitvā evamāha
atk-s0503a:1454_4: – “etamhā udapānā pānīyaṃ āharā”ti, udāhu āvajjitvā jānantoti? Jānanto eva bhagavā
atk-s0503a:1454_5: attano buddhānubhāvaṃ pakāsetvā te dametvā nibbisevane kātuṃ evamāha, na pānīyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1454_6: pātukāmo. Tenevettha mahāparinibbānasutte viya “pipāsitosmī”ti na vuttaṃ. Dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko
atk-s0503a:1454_7: pana satthu ajjhāsayaṃ ajānanto thūṇeyyakehi kataṃ vippakāraṃ ācikkhanto “idāni so, bhante”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:1455_0: Tattha idānīti adhunā, amhākaṃ āgamanavelāyamevāti attho. Eso, bhante, udapānoti
atk-s0503a:1455_1: paṭhanti. Thero dvikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā tatiyavāre “na kho tathāgatā tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0503a:1455_2: paccanīkā kātabbā, kāraṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ bhavissati dīghadassinā”ti mahārājadattiyaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0503a:1455_3: pattaṃ gahetvā udapānaṃ agamāsi. Gacchante there udapāne udakaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hutvā
atk-s0503a:1455_4: uttaritvā samantato sandati, sabbaṃ tiṇaṃ bhusañca uplavitvā sayameva apagacchi.
atk-s0503a:1455_5: Tena ca sandamānena salilena uparūpari vaḍḍhantena tasmiṃ gāme sabbeva pokkharaṇīādayo
atk-s0503a:1455_6: jalāsayā visukkhā paripūriṃsu, tathā parikhākusubbhaninnādīni ca. Sabbo gāmappadeso
atk-s0503a:1455_7: mahoghena ajjhotthaṭo mahāvassakāle viya ahosi. Kumuduppalapadumapuṇḍarīkādīni jalajapupphāni
atk-s0503a:1455_8: tattha tattha ubbhijjitvā vikasamānāni udakaṃ sañchādiṃsu. Saresu haṃsakoñcacakkavākakāraṇḍavabakādayā
atk-s0503a:1455_9: e udakasakuṇikā vassamānā tattha tattha vicariṃsu. Thūṇeyyakā taṃ mahoghaṃ tathā
atk-s0503a:1455_10: uttarantaṃ samantato vīcitaraṅgasamākulaṃ pariyantato samuṭṭhahamānaṃ ruciraṃ pheṇabubbuḷakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1455_11: disvā acchariyabbhutacittajātā evaṃ sammantesuṃ “mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa udakupacchedaṃ
atk-s0503a:1455_12: kātuṃ vāyamimhā, ayaṃ pana mahogho tassa āgamanakālato paṭṭhāya evaṃ abhivaḍḍhati,
atk-s0503a:1455_13: nissaṃsayaṃ kho ayaṃ tassa iddhānubhāvo. Mahiddhiko hi so mahānubhāvo. Ṭhānaṃ kho
atk-s0503a:1455_14: panetaṃ vijjati, yathā yaṃ mahogho uṭṭhahitvā amhākaṃ gāmampi otthareyya. Handa mayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1455_15: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsitvā accayaṃ desentā khamāpeyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1456_0: Te sabbeva ekajjhāsayā hutvā saṅghasaṅghī gaṇībhūtā gāmato nikkhamitvā yena bhagavā
atk-s0503a:1456_1: tenupasaṅkamiṃsu. Upasaṅkamitvā appekacce bhagavato pāde sirasā vandiṃsu, appekacce
atk-s0503a:1456_2: añjaliṃ paṇāmesuṃ, appekacce bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu, appekacce tuṇhībhūtā nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1456_3: appekacce nāmagottaṃ sāvesuṃ. Evaṃ pana katvā sabbeva ekamantaṃ nisīditvā “idha mayaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1456_4: bho gotama, bhoto ceva gotamassa gotamasāvakānañca udakappaṭisedhaṃ kārayimha, amukasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1456_5: udapāne tiṇañca bhusañca pakkhipimha. So pana udapāno acetanopi samāno sacetano viya
atk-s0503a:1456_6: bhoto guṇaṃ jānanto viya sayameva sabbaṃ tiṇaṃ bhusaṃ apanetvā suvisuddho jāto, sabbopi
atk-s0503a:1456_7: cettha ninnappadeso mahatā udakoghena paripuṇṇo ramaṇīyova jāto, udakūpajīvino sattā
atk-s0503a:1456_8: parituṭṭhā. Mayaṃ pana manussāpi samānā bhoto guṇe na jānimha, ye mayaṃ evaṃ akarimha,
atk-s0503a:1456_9: sādhu no bhavaṃ gotamo tathā karotu, yathāyaṃ mahogho imaṃ gāmaṃ na otthareyya, accayo
atk-s0503a:1456_10: no accagamā yathābālaṃ, taṃ no bhavaṃ gotamo accayaṃ paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti
atk-s0503a:1456_11: accayaṃ desesuṃ. Bhagavāpi “taggha tumhe accayo accagamā yathābālaṃ, taṃ vo mayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1456_12: paṭiggaṇhāma āyatiṃ saṃvarāyā”ti tesaṃ accayaṃ paṭiggahetvā pasannacittataṃ ñatvā
atk-s0503a:1456_13: uttari ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desesi. Te bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacittā
atk-s0503a:1456_14: saraṇādīsu patiṭṭhitā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu. Tesaṃ pana
atk-s0503a:1456_15: āgamanato puretaraṃyeva āyasmā ānando taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajāto
atk-s0503a:1456_16: pattena pānīyaṃ ādāya bhagavato upanāmetvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “evaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1457_0: Tattha mukhato ovamitvāti sabbaṃ taṃ tiṇādiṃ mukhena chaḍḍetvā. Vissandanto maññeti
atk-s0503a:1457_1: pubbe dīgharajjukena udapānena ussiñcitvā gahetabbaudakogho bhagavato pattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0503a:1457_2: therassa gatakāle mukhena vissandanto viya samatittiko kākapeyyo hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Idañca
atk-s0503a:1457_3: therassa gatakāle udakappavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ pana pubbe vuttanayena
atk-s0503a:1457_4: tasmiṃ gāme sakalaṃ ninnaṭṭhānaṃ udakena paripuṇṇaṃ ahosīti. Ayaṃ paniddhi na buddhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1457_5: adhiṭṭhānena, nāpi devānubhāvena, atha kho bhagavato puññānubhāvena parittadesanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1457_6: rājagahato vesāligamane viya. Keci pana “thūṇeyyakānaṃ bhagavati pasādajananatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1457_7: tesaṃ atthakāmāhi devatāhi kata”nti. Apare “udapānassa heṭṭhā vasanakanāgarājā evamakāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1457_8: Sabbaṃ taṃ akāraṇaṃ, yathā bhagavato puññānubhāvenayeva tathā udakuppattiyā paridīpitattā.
atk-s0503a:1458: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ adhiṭṭhānena vinā attanā icchitanipphattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1459_0: Tattha kiṃ kayirā udapānena, āpā ce sabbadā siyunti yassa sabbakālaṃ sabbattha ca
atk-s0503a:1459_1: āpā ce yadi siyuṃ yadi upalabbheyyuṃ yadi ākaṅkhāmattapaṭibaddho, tesaṃ lābho, tena
atk-s0503a:1459_2: udapānena kiṃ kayirā kiṃ kareyya, kiṃ payojananti attho. Taṇhāya mūlato chetvā, kissa
atk-s0503a:1459_3: pariyesanaṃ careti yāya taṇhāya vinibaddhā sattā akatapuññā hutvā icchitālābhadukkhena
atk-s0503a:1459_4: vihaññanti, tassā taṇhāya mūlaṃ, mūle vā chinditvā ṭhito mādiso sabbaññubuddho kissa
atk-s0503a:1459_5: kena kāraṇena pānīyapariyesanaṃ, aññaṃ vā paccayapariyesanaṃ careyya. “Mūlato chettā”tipi
atk-s0503a:1459_6: paṭhanti, taṇhāya mūlaṃ mūleyeva vā chedakoti attho. Atha vā mūlato chettāti mūlato
atk-s0503a:1459_7: paṭṭhāya taṇhāya chedako. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo bodhiyā mūlabhūtamahāpaṇidhānato
atk-s0503a:1459_8: paṭṭhāya aparimitaṃ sakalaṃ puññasambhāraṃ attano acintetvā lokahitatthameva pariṇāmanavasena
atk-s0503a:1459_9: paripūrento mūlato pabhuti taṇhāya chettā, so taṇhāhetukassa icchitālābhassa abhāvato
atk-s0503a:1459_10: kissa kena kāraṇena udakapariyesanaṃ careyya, ime pana thūṇeyyakā andhabālā imaṃ
atk-s0503a:1462_0: 70. Dasame rañño utenassāti utenassa nāma rañño, yo “vajjirājā”tipi vuccati. Uyyānagatassāti
atk-s0503a:1462_1: uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ uyyānaṃ gatassa. Anādare hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, “antepura”nti pana
atk-s0503a:1462_2: padaṃ apekkhitvā sambandhepetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ hoti. Kālaṅkatānīti aggidaḍḍhāni hutvā
atk-s0503a:1462_3: matāni honti. Sāmāvatīpamukhānīti ettha kā panāyaṃ sāmāvatī, kathañca daḍḍhāti? Vuccate,
atk-s0503a:1462_4: bhaddavatiyaṃ seṭṭhino dhītā ghosakaseṭṭhinā dhītuṭṭhāne ṭhapitā pañcasataitthiparivārā
atk-s0503a:1462_5: rañño utenassa aggamahesī mettāvihārabahulā ariyasāvikā sāmāvatī nāma. Ayamettha
atk-s0503a:1462_6: saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana ādito paṭṭhāya sāmāvatiyā uppattikathā dhammapadavatthumhi
atk-s0503a:1462_7: vuttanayena veditabbā. Māgaṇḍiyassa nāma brāhmaṇassa dhītā attano mātāpitūnaṃ –
atk-s0503a:1467_0: Bhagavatā desitaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā satthari baddhāghātā māgaṇḍiyā aparabhāge raññā
atk-s0503a:1467_1: utenena mahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapitā bhagavato kosambiṃ upagatabhāvaṃ, sāmāvatīpamukhānañca
atk-s0503a:1467_2: pañcannaṃ itthisatānaṃ upāsikābhāvaṃ ñatvā “āgato nāma samaṇo gotamo imaṃ nagaraṃ,
atk-s0503a:1467_3: dānissa kattabbaṃ jānissāmi, imāpi tassa upaṭṭhāyikā, imāsampi sāmāvatīpamukhānañca
atk-s0503a:1467_4: kattabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti anekapariyāyehi tathāgatassa tāsañca anatthaṃ kātuṃ vāyamitvāpi
atk-s0503a:1467_5: asakkontī punekadivasaṃ raññā saddhiṃ uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchantī cūḷapitu sāsanaṃ pahiṇi
atk-s0503a:1467_6: “sāmāvatiyā pāsādaṃ gantvā dussakoṭṭhāgāratelakoṭṭhāgārāni vivarāpetvā dussāni telacāṭīsu
atk-s0503a:1467_7: temetvā thambhe veṭhetvā tā sabbā ekato katvā dvāraṃ pidahitvā bahi yantaṃ datvā
atk-s0503a:1467_8: daṇḍadīpikāhi gehe aggiṃ dadamāno otaritvā gacchatū”ti.
atk-s0503a:1468_0: Taṃ sutvā so pāsādaṃ abhiruyha koṭṭhāgārāni vivaritvā vatthāni telacāṭīsu temetvā
atk-s0503a:1468_1: thambhe veṭhetuṃ ārabhi. Atha naṃ sāmāvatīpamukhā itthiyo “kiṃ etaṃ cūḷapitā”ti vadantiyo
atk-s0503a:1468_2: upasaṅkamiṃsu. “Ammā, rājā daḷhikammatthāya ime thambhe telapilotikāhi bandhāpeti,
atk-s0503a:1468_3: rājagehe nāma suyuttaduyuttaṃ dujjānaṃ, mā me santike hothā”ti vatvā tā āgatā gabbhesu
atk-s0503a:1468_4: pavesetvā dvārāni pidahitvā bahi yantakaṃ datvā ādito paṭṭhāya aggiṃ dento otari.
atk-s0503a:1468_5: Sāmāvatī tāsaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi, “ammā, anamatagge saṃsāre vicarantīnaṃ evameva agginā
atk-s0503a:1468_6: jhāmattabhāvānaṃ buddhañāṇenapi paricchedo na sukaro, appamattā hothā”ti. Tā satthu
atk-s0503a:1468_7: santike dhammaṃ sutvā adhigataphalāya viññātasāsanāya khujjuttarāya ariyasāvikāya
atk-s0503a:1468_8: sekkhapaṭisambhidāpattāya satthārā desitaniyāmeneva dhammaṃ desentiyā santike sotāpattiphalassa
atk-s0503a:1468_9: adhigatā antarantarā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena yuttappayuttā gehe jhāyante vedanāpariggahakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1468_10: manasi karontiyo kāci dutiyaphalaṃ, kāci tatiyaphalaṃ pāpuṇitvā kālamakaṃsu. Atha
atk-s0503a:1468_11: bhikkhū kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya carantā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā pacchābhattaṃ bhagavato ārocetvā
atk-s0503a:1468_12: tāsaṃ abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu. Bhagavā ca tāsaṃ ariyaphalādhigamaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0503a:1468_13: Tena vuttaṃ – “tena kho pana samayena rañño utenassa…pe… anipphalā kālaṅkatā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1469: Tattha anipphalāti na nipphalā, sampattasāmaññaphalā eva kālaṅkatā. Tā pana phalāni paṭilabhantiyo sāmāvatiyā –
atk-s0503a:1474_0: Gāthāhi ovadiyamānā vedanāpariggahakammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karontiyo vipassitvā dutiyatatiyaphalāni
atk-s0503a:1474_1: paṭilabhiṃsu. Khujjuttarā pana āyusesassa atthitāya, pubbe tādisassa kammassa akatattā
atk-s0503a:1474_2: ca tato pāsādato bahi ahosi. “Dasayojanantare pakkāmī”ti ca vadanti. Atha bhikkhū
atk-s0503a:1474_3: dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso, ananucchavikaṃ vata ariyasāvikānaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-s0503a:1474_4: maraṇa”nti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0503a:1474_5: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, yadipi tāsaṃ imasmiṃ attabhāve ayuttaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1474_6: pubbe katakammassa pana yuttameva tāhi laddha”nti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0503a:1475_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente aṭṭha paccekabuddhā rañño nivesane nibaddhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1475_1: bhuñjanti. Pañcasatā itthiyo te upaṭṭhahanti. Tesu satta janā himavantaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0503a:1475_2: eko nadītīrasamīpe ekasmiṃ tiṇagahane samāpattiyā nisīdati. Athekadivasaṃ rājā paccekabuddhesu
atk-s0503a:1475_3: gatesu tāhi itthīhi saddhiṃ udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo tattha gato. Tā itthiyo divasabhāgaṃ
atk-s0503a:1475_4: udake kīḷitvā sītapīḷitā visibbitukāmā taṃ tiṇagahanaṃ upari visukkhatiṇasañchannaṃ
atk-s0503a:1475_5: “tiṇarāsī”ti saññāya parivāretvā aggiṃ datvā tiṇesu jhāyitvā patantesu paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1475_6: disvā “rañño paccekabuddho jhāyati, taṃ rājā ñatvā amhe nāsessati, sudaḍḍhaṃ naṃ
atk-s0503a:1475_7: karissāmā”ti sabbā ito cito ca dāruādīni āharitvā tassa upari rāsiṃ katvā ālimpetvā
atk-s0503a:1475_8: “idāni jhāyissatī”ti pakkamiṃsu. Tā paṭhamaṃ asañcetanikā hutvā idāni kammunā bajjhiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1475_9: Paccekabuddhaṃ pana antosamāpattiyaṃ sace dārūnaṃ sakaṭasahassampi āharitvā ālimpentā
atk-s0503a:1475_10: usumākāramattampi gāhetuṃ na sakkonti, tasmā so sattame divase uṭṭhāya yathāsukhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1475_11: agamāsi. Tā tassa kammassa katattā bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni
atk-s0503a:1475_12: niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena attabhāvasate imināva niyāmena gehe
atk-s0503a:1476_0: Yasmā pana te imasmiṃ attabhāve ariyaphalāni sacchākaṃsu, ratanattayaṃ payirupāsiṃsu,
atk-s0503a:1476_1: tasmā tattha anāgāminiyo suddhāvāsesu upapannā, itarā kāci tāvatiṃsesu, kāci yāmesu,
atk-s0503a:1476_2: kāci tusitesu, kāci nimmānaratīsu, kāci paranimmitavasavattīsu upapannā.
atk-s0503a:1477_0: Rājāpi kho uteno “sāmāvatiyā gehaṃ kira jhāyatī”ti sutvā vegena āgacchantopi taṃ
atk-s0503a:1477_1: padesaṃ tāsu daḍḍhāsuyeva sampāpuṇi. Āgantvā pana gehaṃ nibbāpetvā uppannabalavadomanasso
atk-s0503a:1477_2: māgaṇḍiyāya tathā kāritabhāvaṃ upāyena ñatvā ariyasāvikāsu katāparādhakammunā codiyamāno
atk-s0503a:1477_3: tassā rājāṇaṃ kāresi saddhiṃ ñātakehi. Evaṃ sā saparijanā samittabandhavā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0503a:1478_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ sāmāvatīpamukhānaṃ tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ aggimhi anayabyasanāpattihetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1478_1: māgaṇḍiyāya ca samittabandhavāya rājāṇāya anayabyasanāpattinimittaṃ sabbākārato viditvā
atk-s0503a:1479_0: Tattha mohasambandhano loko, bhabbarūpova dissatīti yo idha sattaloko bhabbarūpova
atk-s0503a:1479_1: hetusampanno viya hutvā dissati, sopi mohasambandhano mohena paliguṇṭhito attahitāhitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1479_2: ajānanto hite na paṭipajjati, ahitaṃ dukkhāvahaṃ bahuñca apuññaṃ ācināti. “Bhavarūpova
atk-s0503a:1479_3: dissatī”tipi pāṭho. Tassattho – ayaṃ loko mohasambandhano mohena paliguṇṭhito, tato
atk-s0503a:1479_4: eva bhavarūpova sassatasabhāvo viyassa attā dissati, ajarāmaro viya upaṭṭhāti, yena
atk-s0503a:1480_0: Upadhibandhano bālo, tamasā parivārito. Sassatoriva khāyatīti na kevalañca mohasambandhano
atk-s0503a:1480_1: eva, apica kho upadhibandhanopi ayaṃ andhabālaloko avijjātamasā parivārito. Idaṃ
atk-s0503a:1480_2: vuttaṃ hoti – yena ñāṇena aviparītaṃ kāme ca khandhe ca “aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā”ti
atk-s0503a:1480_3: passeyya, tassa abhāvato yasmā bālo andhaputhujjano aññāṇatamasā samantato parivārito
atk-s0503a:1480_4: nivuto, tasmā so kāmūpadhi kilesūpadhi khandhūpadhīti imesaṃ upadhīnaṃ vasena ca
atk-s0503a:1480_5: upadhibandhano, tato eva cassa sopadhissa passato sassato viya nicco sabbakālabhāvī
atk-s0503a:1480_6: viya khāyati. “Asassatiriva khāyatī”tipi pāṭho. Tassattho – attā sabbakālaṃ vijjati
atk-s0503a:1480_7: upalabbhatīti añño asassati aniccoti lokassa so upadhi micchābhinivesavasena ekadeso
atk-s0503a:1480_8: viya khāyati, upaṭṭhahatīti attho. Rakāro hi padasandhikaro. Passato natthi kiñcananti
atk-s0503a:1480_9: yo pana saṅkhāre pariggahetvā aniccādivasena vipassati, tasseva vipassanāpaññāsahitāya
atk-s0503a:1480_10: maggapaññāya yathābhūtaṃ passato jānato paṭivijjhato rāgādikiñcanaṃ natthi, yena
atk-s0503a:1480_11: saṃsāre bajjheyya. Tathā apassanto eva hi avijjātaṇhādiṭṭhiādibandhanehi saṃsāre
atk-s0503a:1485_1: pavedanavasena pavattāya. Dhammiyā kathāyāti dhammadesanāya. Sandassetīti sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇato
atk-s0503a:1485_2: nibbānaṃ dasseti. Samādapetīti tameva atthaṃ te bhikkhū gaṇhāpeti. Samuttejetīti
atk-s0503a:1485_3: tadatthagahaṇe ussāhaṃ janento tejeti joteti. Sampahaṃsetīti nibbānaguṇehi sammadeva
atk-s0503a:1486_0: Atha vā sandassetīti “so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggā taṇhakkhayo
atk-s0503a:1486_1: virāgo nirodho”tiādinā nayeneva sabbathā tena tena pariyāyena tesaṃ tesaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ
atk-s0503a:1486_2: sammā dasseti. Samādapetīti “iminā ariyamaggena taṃ adhigantabba”nti adhigamapaṭipadāya
atk-s0503a:1486_3: saddhiṃ tattha bhikkhū ninnapoṇapabbhāre karonto sammā ādapeti gaṇhāpeti. Samuttejetīti
atk-s0503a:1486_4: etaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavanti “mā sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ pamādaṃ antarāvosānaṃ āpajjatha,
atk-s0503a:1486_5: upanissayasampannassa vīriyavato nayidaṃ dukkaraṃ, tasmā sīlavisuddhiādivisuddhipaṭipadāya
atk-s0503a:1486_6: uṭṭhahatha ghaṭayatha vāyameyyāthā”ti nibbānādhigamāya ussāheti, tattha vā cittaṃ
atk-s0503a:1486_8: dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti, asaṅkhatanti, amatañca santantiādinā ca anekapariyāyena
atk-s0503a:1486_9: nibbānānisaṃsappakāsanena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittaṃ tosento hāsento sampahaṃseti samassāseti.
atk-s0503a:1487_0: Tedhāti te idha. Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti “atthi kiñci ayaṃ no attho adhigantabbo”ti evaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0503a:1487_1: tāya desanāya atthikā hutvā. Manasi katvāti citte ṭhapetvā anaññavihitā taṃ desanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1487_2: attano cittagatameva katvā. Sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvāti sabbena kārakacittena
atk-s0503a:1487_3: ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā desanaṃ āvajjetvā, taggatameva ābhogaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1487_4: Atha vā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvāti sabbasmā cittato desanaṃ sammā anu anu āharitvā.
atk-s0503a:1487_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – desentassa yehi cittehi desanā katā, sabbasmā cittato pavattaṃ
atk-s0503a:1487_6: desanaṃ bahi gantuṃ adento sammā aviparītaṃ anu anu āharitvā attano cittasantānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1487_7: āharitvā yathādesitadesitaṃ desanaṃ suṭṭhu upadhāretvā. Ohitasotāti avahitasotā,
atk-s0503a:1487_8: suṭṭhu upitasotā. Ohitasotāti vā avikkhittasotā. Tameva upalabbhamānopi hi savane
atk-s0503a:1487_9: avikkhepo satisaṃvaro viya cakkhundriyādīsu sotindriyepi vattumarahatīti. Ettha ca
atk-s0503a:1487_10: “aṭṭhiṃ katvā”tiādīhi catūhipi padehi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tapparabhāvato savane ādaradīpanena
atk-s0503a:1488_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tassā nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammakathāya
atk-s0503a:1488_1: savane ādarakāritaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti imaṃ nibbānassa tabbidhuradhammadesanāmukhena
atk-s0503a:1489_0: Tattha atthīti vijjati, paramatthato upalabbhatīti attho. Bhikkhaveti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0503a:1489_1: ālapanaṃ. Nanu ca udānaṃ nāma pītisomanassasamuṭṭhāpito vā dhammasaṃvegasamuṭṭhāpito
atk-s0503a:1489_2: vā dhammapaṭiggāhakanirapekkho udāhāro, tathā ceva ettakesu suttesu āgataṃ, idha
atk-s0503a:1489_3: kasmā bhagavā udānento te bhikkhū āmantesīti? Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saññāpanatthaṃ. Nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttañhi
atk-s0503a:1489_4: bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā nibbānaguṇānussaraṇena uppannapītisomanassā
atk-s0503a:1489_5: udānaṃ udānesi. Idha nibbānavajjo sabbo sabhāvadhammo paccayāyattavuttikova upalabbhati,
atk-s0503a:1489_6: na paccayanirapekkho. Ayaṃ pana nibbānadhammo katamapaccaye upalabbhatīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0503a:1489_7: cetoparivitakkamaññāya te ca saññāpetukāmo “atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatana”ntiādimāha,
atk-s0503a:1489_8: na ekantatova te paṭiggāhake katvāti veditabbaṃ. Tadāyatananti taṃ kāraṇaṃ. Dakāro
atk-s0503a:1489_9: padasandhikaro. Nibbānañhi maggaphalañāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāvato rūpādīni viya
atk-s0503a:1489_11: ca bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvaṃ pavedesi.
atk-s0503a:1490_0: Tatrāyaṃ dhammanvayo – idha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ vijjamānattā asaṅkhatāyapi dhātuyā
atk-s0503a:1490_1: bhavitabbaṃ tappaṭipakkhattā sabhāvadhammānaṃ. Yathā hi dukkhe vijjamāne tappaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:1490_2: sukhampi vijjatiyeva, tathā uṇhe vijjamāne sītampi vijjati, pāpadhammesu vijjamānesu
atk-s0503a:1497: Apica nibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvavicāraṇaṃ parato āvibhavissati.
atk-s0503a:1498_0: Evaṃ bhagavā asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvaṃ sammukhena dassetvā idāni
atk-s0503a:1498_1: tabbidhuradhammāpohanamukhenassa sabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ, “yattha neva pathavī na āpo”tiādimāha.
atk-s0503a:1498_2: Tattha yasmā nibbānaṃ sabbasaṅkhāravidhurasabhāvaṃ yathā saṅkhatadhammesu katthaci
atk-s0503a:1498_3: natthi, tathā tatthapi sabbe saṅkhatadhammā. Na hi saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammānaṃ samodhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1498_4: sambhavati. Tatrāyaṃ atthavibhāvanā – yattha yasmiṃ nibbāne yassaṃ asaṅkhatadhātuyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1498_5: neva kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu atthi, na paggharaṇalakkhaṇā āpodhātu, na uṇhalakkhaṇā
atk-s0503a:1498_6: tejodhātu, na vitthambhanalakkhaṇā vāyodhātu atthi. Iti catumahābhūtābhāvavacanena
atk-s0503a:1498_7: yathā sabbassapi upādārūpassa abhāvo vutto hoti tannissitattā. Evaṃ anavasesato kāmarūpabhavassa
atk-s0503a:1498_8: tattha abhāvo vutto hoti tadāyattavuttibhāvato. Na hi mahābhūtanissayena vinā pañcavokārabhavo
atk-s0503a:1499_0: Idāni arūpasabhāvattepi nibbānassa arūpabhavapariyāpannānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha abhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:1499_1: dassetuṃ, “na ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ…pe… na nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0503a:1499_2: na ākāsānañcāyatananti saddhiṃ ārammaṇena kusalavipākakiriyabhedo tividhopi ākāsānañcāyatanacittuppādo
atk-s0503a:1499_3: natthīti attho. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Yadaggena ca nibbāne kāmalokādīnaṃ abhāvo hoti,
atk-s0503a:1499_4: tadaggena tattha idhalokaparalokānampi abhāvoti āha – “nāyaṃ loko na paraloko”ti.
atk-s0503a:1499_5: Tassattho – yvāyaṃ “itthattaṃ diṭṭhadhammo idhaloko”ti ca laddhavohāro khandhādiloko,
atk-s0503a:1499_6: yo ca “tato aññathā paro abhisamparāyo”ti ca laddhavohāro khandhādiloko, tadubhayampi
atk-s0503a:1499_7: tattha natthīti. Na ubho candimasūriyāti yasmā rūpagate sati tamo nāma siyā, tamassa
atk-s0503a:1499_8: ca vidhamanatthaṃ candimasūriyehi vattitabbaṃ. Sabbena sabbaṃ pana yattha rūpagatameva
atk-s0503a:1499_9: natthi, kuto tattha tamo. Tamassa vā vidhamanā candimasūriyā, tasmā candimā sūriyo
atk-s0503a:1499_10: cāti ubhopi tattha nibbāne natthīti attho. Iminā ālokasabhāvataṃyeva nibbānassa dasseti.
atk-s0503a:1500_0: Ettāvatā ca anabhisametāvīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anādimatisaṃsāre supinantepi ananubhūtapubbaṃ
atk-s0503a:1500_1: paramagambhīraṃ atiduddasaṃ saṇhasukhumaṃ atakkāvacaraṃ accantasantaṃ paṇḍitavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1500_2: atipaṇītaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ vibhāvento paṭhamaṃ tāva “atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatana”nti
atk-s0503a:1500_3: tassa atthibhāvā tesaṃ aññāṇādīni apanetvā “yattha neva pathavī …pe… na ubho candimasūriyā”ti
atk-s0503a:1500_5: yā asaṅkhatā dhātu, taṃ nibbānanti dīpitaṃ hoti. Tenevāha, “tatrāpāhaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0503a:1501_0: Tattha tatrāti tasmiṃ. Apisaddo samuccaye. Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yattha saṅkhārapavatte
atk-s0503a:1501_1: kutoci kassaci āgatiṃ na vadāmi yathāpaccayaṃ tattha dhammamattassa uppajjanato.
atk-s0503a:1501_2: Evaṃ tasmimpi āyatane nibbāne kutoci āgatiṃ āgamanaṃ neva vadāmi āgantabbaṭṭhānatāya
atk-s0503a:1501_3: abhāvato. Na gatinti katthaci gamanaṃ na vadāmi gantabbaṭṭhānatāya abhāvato. Na hi
atk-s0503a:1501_4: tattha sattānaṃ ṭhapetvā ñāṇena ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ āgatigatiyo sambhavanti, nāpi ṭhiticutūpapattiyo
atk-s0503a:1501_5: vadāmi. “Tadāpaha”ntipi pāḷi. Tassattho – tampi āyatanaṃ gāmantarato gāmantaraṃ viya
atk-s0503a:1501_6: na āgantabbatāya na āgati, na gantabbatāya na gati, pathavīpabbatādi viya apatiṭṭhānatāya
atk-s0503a:1501_7: na ṭhiti, apaccayattā vā uppādābhāvo, tato amatasabhāvattā cavanābhāvo, uppādanirodhābhāvato
atk-s0503a:1501_8: ceva tadubhayaparicchinnāya ṭhitiyā ca abhāvato na ṭhitiṃ na cutiṃ na upapattiṃ vadāmi.
atk-s0503a:1501_9: Kevalaṃ pana taṃ arūpasabhāvattā apaccayattā ca na katthaci patiṭṭhitanti appatiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1501_10: Tattha pavattābhāvato pavattappaṭipakkhato ca appavattaṃ. Arūpasabhāvattepi vedanādayo
atk-s0503a:1501_11: viya kassacipi ārammaṇassa anālambanato upatthambhanirapekkhato ca anārammaṇameva
atk-s0503a:1501_12: taṃ “āyatana”nti vuttaṃ nibbānaṃ. Ayañca evasaddo appatiṭṭhameva appavattamevāti
atk-s0503a:1501_13: padadvayenapi yojetabbo. Esevanto dukkhassāti yadidaṃ “appatiṭṭha”ntiādīhi vacanehi
atk-s0503a:1501_14: vaṇṇitaṃ thomitaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇaṃ nibbānaṃ, eso eva sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa
atk-s0503a:1501_15: anto pariyosānaṃ tadadhigame sati sabbadukkhābhāvato. Tasmā “dukkhassa anto”ti ayameva
atk-s0503a:1504_0: 72. Dutiye imaṃ udānanti imaṃ nibbānassa pakatiyā gambhīrabhāvato duddasabhāvadīpanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1504_1: udānaṃ udānesi. Tattha duddasanti sabhāvagambhīrattā atisukhumasaṇhasabhāvattā ca
atk-s0503a:1504_2: anupacitañāṇasambhārehi passituṃ na sakkāti duddasaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “tañhi te, māgaṇḍiya,
atk-s0503a:1504_3: ariyaṃ paññācakkhu natthi, yena tvaṃ ārogyaṃ jāneyyāsi, nibbānampi passeyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1504_4: Aparampi vuttaṃ – “idampi kho ṭhānaṃ duddasaṃ, yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”tiādi.
atk-s0503a:1504_5: Anatanti rūpādiārammaṇesu, kāmādīsu ca bhavesu namanato tanninnabhāvena pavattito
atk-s0503a:1504_6: sattānañca tattha namanato taṇhā natā nāma, natthi ettha natāti anataṃ, nibbānanti
atk-s0503a:1504_7: attho. “Ananta”ntipi paṭhanti, niccasabhāvattā antavirahitaṃ, acavanadhammaṃ nirodhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1504_8: amatanti attho. Keci pana “ananta”nti padassa “appamāṇa”nti atthaṃ vadanti. Ettha
atk-s0503a:1504_9: ca “duddasa”nti iminā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇehi rāgādikilesehi cirakālabhāvitattā sattānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1504_10: apaccayabhāvanā na sukarāti nibbānassa kicchena adhigamanīyataṃ dasseti. Na hi saccaṃ
atk-s0503a:1504_11: sudassananti imināpi tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti. Tattha saccanti nibbānaṃ. Tañhi
atk-s0503a:1504_12: kenaci pariyāyena asantasabhāvābhāvato ekanteneva santattā aviparītaṭṭhena saccaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1504_13: Na hi taṃ sudassanaṃ na sukhena passitabbaṃ, sucirampi kālaṃ puññañāṇasambhāre samānentehipi
atk-s0503a:1504_14: kasireneva samadhigantabbato. Tathā hi vuttaṃ bhagavatā – “kicchena me adhigata”nti.
atk-s0503a:1505_0: Paṭividdhā taṇhā jānato passato natthi kiñcananti tañca nirodhasaccaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena
atk-s0503a:1505_1: abhisamentena visayato kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca ārammaṇappaṭivedhena asammohappaṭivedhena
atk-s0503a:1505_3: maggasaccañca asammohato paṭividdhaṃ hoti, evaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena asammohato
atk-s0503a:1505_4: ca paṭividdhā taṇhā hoti. Evañca cattāri saccāni yathābhūtaṃ ariyamaggapaññāya jānato
atk-s0503a:1505_5: passato bhavādīsu natabhūtā taṇhā natthi, tadabhāve sabbassapi kilesavaṭṭassa abhāvo,
atk-s0503a:1505_6: tatova kammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ asambhavoyevāti evaṃ bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anavasesavaṭṭadukkhavūpasamahetubhūtaṃ
atk-s0503a:1508_0: 73. Tatiye atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvāti tadā kira bhagavatā anekapariyāyena
atk-s0503a:1508_1: saṃsārassa ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā sandassanādivasena nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammadesanāya
atk-s0503a:1508_2: katāya tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – “ayaṃ saṃsāro bhagavatā avijjādīhi kāraṇehi sahetuko
atk-s0503a:1508_3: pakāsito, nibbānassa pana tadupasamassa na kiñci kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tayidaṃ ahetukaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1508_4: kathaṃ saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena upalabbhatī”ti. Atha bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etaṃ
atk-s0503a:1508_5: yathāvuttaṃ parivitakkasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vimatividhamanatthañceva
atk-s0503a:1508_6: idha samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ “nibbānaṃ nibbānanti vācāvatthumattameva, natthi hi paramatthato
atk-s0503a:1508_7: nibbānaṃ nāma anupalabbhamānasabhāvattā”ti lokāyatikādayo viya vippaṭipannānaṃ bahiddhā
atk-s0503a:1508_8: ca puthudiṭṭhigatikānaṃ micchāvādabhañjanatthañca imaṃ amatamahānibbānassa paramatthato
atk-s0503a:1509_0: Tattha ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatanti sabbānipi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni. Atha
atk-s0503a:1509_1: vā vedanādayo viya hetupaccayasamavāyasaṅkhātāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā na jātaṃ na nibbattanti
atk-s0503a:1509_2: ajātaṃ, kāraṇena vinā, sayameva vā na bhūtaṃ na pātubhūtaṃ na uppannanti abhūtaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1509_3: evaṃ ajātattā abhūtattā ca yena kenaci kāraṇena na katanti akataṃ, jātabhūtakatasabhāvo
atk-s0503a:1509_4: ca nāmarūpānaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hoti, na asaṅkhatasabhāvassa nibbānassāti dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1509_5: asaṅkhatanti vuttaṃ. Paṭilomato vā samecca sambhūya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ,
atk-s0503a:1509_6: tathā na saṅkhataṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇarahitanti asaṅkhatanti. Evaṃ anekehi kāraṇehi
atk-s0503a:1509_7: nibbattitabhāve paṭisiddhe “siyā nu kho ekeneva kāraṇena kata”nti āsaṅkāya “na yena
atk-s0503a:1509_8: kenaci kata”nti dassanatthaṃ “akata”nti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ apaccayampi samānaṃ “sayameva
atk-s0503a:1509_9: nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti āsaṅkāya tannivattanatthaṃ “abhūta”nti vuttaṃ. “Ayañcetassa
atk-s0503a:1509_10: asaṅkhatākatābhūtabhāvo sabbena sabbaṃ ajātidhammattā”ti dassetuṃ “ajāta”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1509_11: Evametesaṃ catunnampi padānaṃ sātthakabhāvaṃ viditvā “tayidaṃ nibbānaṃ atthi, bhikkhave”ti
atk-s0503a:1509_12: paramatthato nibbānassa atthibhāvo pakāsitoti veditabbo. Ettha udānentena bhagavatā,
atk-s0503a:1510_0: Iti satthā “atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti vatvā tattha hetuṃ
atk-s0503a:1510_1: dassento “no cetaṃ, bhikkhave”tiādimāha. Tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – bhikkhave, yadi
atk-s0503a:1510_2: ajātādisabhāvā asaṅkhatā dhātu na abhavissa na siyā, idha loke jātādisabhāvassa rūpādikkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0503a:1510_3: saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ anavasesavūpasamo na paññāyeyya na upalabbheyya na sambhaveyya.
atk-s0503a:1510_4: Nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ariyamaggadhammā anavasesakilese
atk-s0503a:1510_5: samucchindanti. Tenettha sabbassapi vaṭṭadukkhassa appavatti apagamo nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0503a:1511_0: Evaṃ byatirekavasena nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni anvayavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1511_1: “yasmā ca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ vuttatthameva. Ettha ca yasmā “apaccayā dhammā, asaṅkhatā
atk-s0503a:1511_2: dhammā, atthi, bhikkhave, tadāyatanaṃ, yattha neva pathavī, idampi kho ṭhānaṃ duddasaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1511_3: yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo, asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave,
atk-s0503a:1511_4: dhammaṃ desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca paṭipada”ntiādīhi anekehi suttapadehi, “atthi,
atk-s0503a:1511_5: bhikkhave, ajāta”nti imināpi ca suttena nibbānadhātuyā paramatthato sambhavo sabbalokaṃ
atk-s0503a:1511_6: anukampamānena sammāsambuddhena desito, tasmā yadipi tattha apaccakkhakārīnampi viññūnaṃ
atk-s0503a:1511_7: kaṅkhā vā vimati vā natthiyeva. Ye pana paraneyyabuddhino puggalā, tesaṃ vimativinodanatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1511_8: ayamettha adhippāyaniddhāraṇamukhena yuttivicāraṇā – yathā pariññeyyatāya sauttarānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1511_9: kāmānaṃ rūpādīnañca paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ tabbidhurasabhāvaṃ nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati, evaṃ
atk-s0503a:1511_11: nissaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ. Yañcetaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, sā asaṅkhatā dhātu. Kiñca bhiyyo saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1511_12: vipassanāñāṇaṃ api anulomañāṇaṃ kilese samucchedavasena pajahituṃ na sakkoti. Tathā
atk-s0503a:1511_13: sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu ñāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati,
atk-s0503a:1511_14: na samucchedavasena. Iti saṅkhatadhammārammaṇassa sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa
atk-s0503a:1511_15: kilesānaṃ samucchedappahāne asamatthabhāvato tesaṃ samucchedappahānakarassa ariyamaggañāṇassa
atk-s0503a:1511_16: tadubhayaviparītasabhāvena ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ, sā asaṅkhatā dhātu. Tathā “atthi,
atk-s0503a:1511_17: bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti idaṃ nibbānapadassa paramatthato atthibhāvajotakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1511_18: vacanaṃ aviparītatthaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitattā. Yañhi bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ aviparītatthaṃ
atk-s0503a:1511_19: paramatthaṃ yathā taṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā, sabbe dhammā
atk-s0503a:1511_20: anattā”ti, tathā nibbānasaddo katthaci visaye yathābhūtaparamatthavisayo upacāramattavuttisabbhāvato
atk-s0503a:1511_21: seyyathāpi sīhasaddo. Atha vā attheva paramatthato asaṅkhatā dhātu, itaratabbiparītavinimuttasabhāvattā
atk-s0503a:1511_22: seyyathāpi pathavīdhātu vedanāti. Evamādīhi nayehi yuttitopi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā
atk-s0503a:1514_0: 74. Catutthe atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvāti tadā kira bhagavatā anekapariyāyena
atk-s0503a:1514_1: sandassanādivasena nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammadesanāya katāya tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi
atk-s0503a:1514_2: – “ayaṃ tāva bhagavatā amatamahānibbānadhātuyā anekākāravokāraṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassentena
atk-s0503a:1514_3: anaññasādhāraṇo ānubhāvo pakāsito, adhigamūpāyo panassā na bhāsito, kathaṃ nu kho
atk-s0503a:1514_4: paṭipajjantehi amhehi ayaṃ adhigantabbā”ti. Atha bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etaṃ yathāvuttaparivitakkasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0503a:1514_5: atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. Imaṃ udānanti taṇhāvasena katthaci anissitassa passaddhakāyacittassa
atk-s0503a:1515_0: Tattha nissitassa calitanti rūpādisaṅkhāre taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nissitassa calitaṃ “etaṃ
atk-s0503a:1515_1: mama, eso me attā”ti taṇhādiṭṭhivipphanditaṃ hoti. Appahīnataṇhādiṭṭhikassa hi puggalassa
atk-s0503a:1515_2: sukhādīsu uppannesu tāni abhibhuyya viharituṃ asakkontassa “mama vedanā, ahaṃ vediyāmī”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1515_3: taṇhādiṭṭhigāhavasena kusalappavattito cittasantānassa calanaṃ kampanaṃ, avakkhalitaṃ
atk-s0503a:1515_4: vā hotīti attho. Anissitassa calitaṃ natthīti yo pana visuddhipaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjanto
atk-s0503a:1515_5: samathavipassanāhi taṇhādiṭṭhiyo vikkhambhetvā aniccādivasena saṅkhāre sammasanto
atk-s0503a:1515_6: viharati, tassa taṃ anissitassa yathāvuttaṃ calitaṃ avakkhalitaṃ, vipphanditaṃ vā
atk-s0503a:1516_0: Calite asatīti yathāvutte calite asati yathā taṇhādiṭṭhigāhā nappavattanti, tathā
atk-s0503a:1516_1: vīthipaṭipannāya vipassanāya taṃ ussukkantassa. Passaddhīti vipassanācittasahajātānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1516_2: kāyacittānaṃ sārambhakarakilesavūpasaminī duvidhāpi passaddhi hoti. Passaddhiyā sati
atk-s0503a:1516_3: nati na hotīti pubbenāparaṃ visesayuttāya passaddhiyā sati anavajjasukhādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1516_4: samādhiṃ vaḍḍhetvā taṃ paññāya samavāyakaraṇena samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ yojetvā
atk-s0503a:1516_5: maggaparamparāya kilese khepentassa kāmabhavādīsu namanato “natī”ti laddhanāmā taṇhā
atk-s0503a:1516_6: arahattamaggakkhaṇe anavasesato na hoti, anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditattā na uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1517_0: Natiyā asatīti arahattamaggena taṇhāya suppahīnattā bhavādiatthāya ālayanikanti pariyuṭṭhāne
atk-s0503a:1517_1: asati. Āgatigati na hotīti paṭisandhivasena idha āgati āgamanaṃ cutivasena gati ito
atk-s0503a:1517_2: paralokagamanaṃ peccabhāvo na hoti na pavattati. Āgatigatiyā asatīti vuttanayena
atk-s0503a:1517_3: āgatiyā ca gatiyā ca asati. Cutūpapāto na hotīti aparāparaṃ cavanupapajjanaṃ na hoti
atk-s0503a:1517_4: na pavattati. Asati hi kilesavaṭṭe kammavaṭṭaṃ pacchinnameva, pacchinne ca tasmiṃ
atk-s0503a:1517_5: kuto vipākavaṭṭassa sambhavo. Tenāha – “cutūpapāte asati nevidha na hura”ntiādi.
atk-s0503a:1517_6: Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā bāhiyasutte vitthārato vuttameva. Tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1518: Iti bhagavā idhāpi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anavasesato vaṭṭadukkhavūpasamahetubhūtaṃ amatamahānibbānassa ānubhāvaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā pakāseti.
atk-s0503a:1521_0: 75. Pañcame mallesūti evaṃnāmake janapade. Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghenāti guṇamahattasaṅkhyāmahattehi
atk-s0503a:1521_1: mahatā. So hi bhikkhusaṅgho sīlādiguṇavisesayogenapi mahā tattha sabbapacchimakassa
atk-s0503a:1521_3: paṭṭhāya hi āgatāgatā bhikkhū na pakkamiṃsu. Cundassāti evaṃnāmakassa. Kammāraputtassāti
atk-s0503a:1521_4: suvaṇṇakāraputtassa. So kira aḍḍho mahākuṭumbiko bhagavato paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpanno
atk-s0503a:1521_5: hutvā attano ambavane satthuvasanānucchavikaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ, bhikkhusaṅghassa ca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaupaṭṭhānasālākuṭimaṇḍapacaṅkamanādike
atk-s0503a:1521_6: ca sampādetvā pākāraparikkhittaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakayuttaṃ vihāraṃ katvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0503a:1521_7: saṅghassa niyyādesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “tatra sudaṃ bhagavā pāvāyaṃ viharati
atk-s0503a:1522_1: mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Keci pana “sūkaramaddavanti na sūkaramaṃsaṃ, sūkarehi madditavaṃsakaḷīro”ti
atk-s0503a:1522_2: vadanti. Aññe “sūkarehi madditappadese jātaṃ ahichattaka”nti. Apare pana “sūkaramaddavaṃ
atk-s0503a:1522_3: nāma ekaṃ rasāyana”nti bhaṇiṃsu. Tañhi cundo kammāraputto “ajja bhagavā parinibbāyissatī”ti
atk-s0503a:1522_4: sutvā “appeva nāma naṃ paribhuñjitvā cirataraṃ tiṭṭheyyā”ti satthu cirajīvitukamyatāya adāsīti vadanti.
atk-s0503a:1523_0: Tena maṃ parivisāti tena mamaṃ bhojehi. Kasmā bhagavā evamāha? Parānuddayatāya. Tañca
atk-s0503a:1523_1: kāraṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttameva. Tena abhihaṭabhikkhāya paresaṃ aparibhogārahato ca tathā
atk-s0503a:1523_2: vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti dassitaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃ kira sūkaramaddave dvisahassadīpaparivāresu
atk-s0503a:1523_3: catūsu mahādīpesu devatā ojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. Tasmā taṃ añño koci sammā jīrāpetuṃ na
atk-s0503a:1523_4: sakkoti, tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā parūpavādamocanatthaṃ “nāhaṃ taṃ, cunda, passāmī”tiādinā
atk-s0503a:1523_5: sīhanādaṃ nadi. Ye hi pare upavadeyyuṃ “attanā paribhuttāvasesaṃ neva bhikkhūnaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1523_6: na aññesaṃ manussānaṃ adāsi, āvāṭe nikhaṇāpetvā vināsesī”ti, “tesaṃ vacanokāso mā
atk-s0503a:1524_0: Tattha sadevaketiādīsu saha devehīti sadevako, saha mārenāti samārako, saha brahmunāti
atk-s0503a:1524_1: sabrahmako, saha samaṇabrāhmaṇehīti sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī, pajātattā pajā, saha devamanussehīti
atk-s0503a:1524_2: sadevamanussā. Tasmiṃ sadevake loke…pe… sadevamanussāya. Tattha sadevakavacanena
atk-s0503a:1524_6: sammutidevaavasesamanussaggahaṇaṃ. Evamettha tīhi padehi okāsalokavasena, dvīhi pajāvasena
atk-s0503a:1524_7: sattaloko gahitoti veditabbo. Aparo nayo – sadevakavacanena arūpāvacaraloko gahito,
atk-s0503a:1524_8: samārakavacanena chakāmāvacaradevaloko, sabrahmakavacanena rūpī brahmaloko, sassamaṇabrāhmaṇavacanena
atk-s0503a:1524_9: catuparisavasena sammutidevehi saha manussaloko, avasesasattaloko vā gahitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0503a:1525_0: Bhuttāvissāti bhuttavato. Kharoti pharuso. Ābādhoti visabhāgarogo. Pabāḷhāti balavatiyo.
atk-s0503a:1525_1: Māraṇantikāti maraṇantā maraṇasamīpapāpanasamatthā. Sato sampajāno adhivāsesīti satiṃ
atk-s0503a:1525_2: upaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā adhivāsesi. Avihaññamānoti vedanānuvattanavasena
atk-s0503a:1525_3: asallakkhitadhammo viya aparāparaṃ parivattanaṃ akaronto apīḷiyamāno adukkhiyamāno
atk-s0503a:1525_4: viya adhivāsesi. Bhagavato hi veḷuvagāmakeyeva tā vedanā uppannā, samāpattibalena
atk-s0503a:1525_5: pana vikkhambhitā yāva parinibbānadivasā na uppajjiṃsu divase divase samāpattīhi
atk-s0503a:1525_6: paṭipaṇāmanato. Taṃ divasaṃ pana parinibbāyitukāmo “koṭisahassahatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārentānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1525_7: vajirasaṅghātasamānakāyānaṃ aparimitakālaṃ upacitapuññasambhārānampi bhave sati evarūpā
atk-s0503a:1525_8: vedanā pavattanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana aññesa”nti sattānaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ samāpattiṃ
atk-s0503a:1525_9: na samāpajji, tena vedanā kharā vattiṃsu. Āyāmāti ehi yāma.
atk-s0503a:1526_0: Cundassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvātiādikā aparabhāge dhammasaṅgāhakehi ṭhapitā gāthā. Tattha
atk-s0503a:1526_1: bhuttassa ca sūkaramaddavenāti bhuttassa udapādi, na pana bhuttapaccayā. Yadi hi
atk-s0503a:1526_2: abhuttassa uppajjissā, atikharo abhavissā, siniddhabhojanaṃ pana bhuttattā tanukā
atk-s0503a:1526_3: vedanā ahosi, teneva padasā gantuṃ asakkhi. Etena yvāyaṃ “yassa taṃ paribhuttaṃ sammā
atk-s0503a:1526_4: pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyya aññatra tathāgatassā”ti sīhanādo nadito, tassa sātthakatā dassitā.
atk-s0503a:1526_5: Buddhānañhi aṭṭhāne gajjitaṃ nāma natthi. Yasmā taṃ paribhuttaṃ bhagavato na kiñci
atk-s0503a:1526_6: vikāraṃ uppādesi, kammena pana laddhokāsena uppādiyamānaṃ vikāraṃ appamattatāya upasamento
atk-s0503a:1526_7: sarīre balaṃ uppādesi, yena yathā vakkhamānaṃ tividhaṃ payojanaṃ sampādesi, tasmā
atk-s0503a:1526_8: sammadeva taṃ pariṇāmaṃ gataṃ, māraṇantikattā pana vedanānaṃ aviññātaṃ apākaṭaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0503a:1526_9: Viriccamānoti abhiṇhaṃ pavattalohitavirecanova samāno. Avocāti attanā icchitaṭṭhāne
atk-s0503a:1527_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā evaṃ roge uppanne kusināraṃ agamāsi, kiṃ aññattha na sakkā parinibbāyitunti?
atk-s0503a:1527_1: Parinibbāyituṃ nāma na katthaci na sakkā, evaṃ pana cintesi – mayi kusināraṃ gate
atk-s0503a:1527_2: mahāsudassanasuttadesanāya aṭṭhuppatti bhavissati, tāya yā devaloke anubhavitabbasadisā
atk-s0503a:1527_3: sampatti manussaloke mayā anubhūtā, taṃ dvīhi bhāṇavārehi paṭimaṇḍetvā desessāmi,
atk-s0503a:1527_4: taṃ sutvā bahū janā kusalaṃ kattabbaṃ maññissanti. Subhaddopi kattha maṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0503a:1527_5: pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanapariyosāne saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado
atk-s0503a:1527_6: kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā mayi dharanteyeva arahattaṃ patvā pacchimasāvako nāma bhavissati.
atk-s0503a:1527_7: Aññattha mayi parinibbute dhātunimittaṃ mahākalaho bhavissati, lohitaṃ nadī viya
atk-s0503a:1527_8: sandissati. Kusinārāyaṃ pana parinibbute doṇabrāhmaṇo taṃ vivādaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo
atk-s0503a:1527_9: vibhajitvā dassatīti imāni tīṇi kāraṇāni passanto bhagavā mahatā ussāhena kusināraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0503a:1528_0: Iṅghāti codanatthe nipāto. Kilantosmīti parissanto asmi. Tena yathāvuttavedanānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1528_1: balavabhāvaṃ eva dasseti. Bhagavā hi attano ānubhāvena tadā padasā agamāsi, aññesaṃ
atk-s0503a:1528_2: pana yathā paduddhārampi kātuṃ na sakkā, tathā vedanā tikhiṇā kharā kaṭukā vattiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1529_0: Idānīti adhunā. Luḷitanti madditaṃ viya ākulaṃ. Āvilanti ālulaṃ. Acchodakāti tanupasannasalilā.
atk-s0503a:1529_1: Sātodakāti madhuratoyā. Sītodakāti sītalajalā. Setodakāti nikkaddamā. Udakañhi sabhāvato
atk-s0503a:1529_2: setavaṇṇaṃ, bhūmivasena kaddamāvilatāya ca aññādisaṃ hoti, kakudhāpi nadī vimalavālikā
atk-s0503a:1529_3: samokiṇṇā setavaṇṇā sandati. Tena vuttaṃ “setodakā”ti. Supatitthāti sundaratitthā.
atk-s0503a:1529_4: Ramaṇīyāti manoharabhūmibhāgatāya ramitabbā yathāvuttaudakasampattiyā ca manoramā.
atk-s0503a:1533_0: Evaṃ vuttesu dasasu hatthikulesu kāḷāvakasaṅkhātānaṃ yaṃ dasannaṃ pakatihatthīnaṃ
atk-s0503a:1533_1: balaṃ, taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyyassāti evaṃ dasaguṇitāya gaṇanāya pakatihatthīnaṃ koṭisahassabalappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0503a:1533_2: sarīrabalaṃ. Taṃ sabbampi tasmiṃ divase pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya caṅgavāre pakkhittaudakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1533_3: viya parikkhayaṃ gataṃ. Pāvāya tigāvute kusinārā. Etasmiṃ antare pañcavīsatiyā ṭhānesu
atk-s0503a:1533_4: nisīditvā mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ katvā āgacchanto sūriyatthaṅgamanavelāya bhagavā kusināraṃ
atk-s0503a:1533_5: pāpuṇīti evaṃ “rogo nāma sabbaṃ ārogyaṃ maddanto āgacchatī”ti imamatthaṃ dassento
atk-s0503a:1533_6: sadevakassa lokassa saṃvegakaraṃ vācaṃ bhāsanto “kilantosmi, cundaka, nipajjissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0503a:1534_0: Sīhaseyyanti ettha kāmabhogīseyyā petaseyyā tathāgataseyyā sīhaseyyāti catasso seyyā.
atk-s0503a:1534_1: Tattha “yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, kāmabhogī vāmena passena seyyaṃ kappentī”ti ayaṃ kāmabhogīseyyā.
atk-s0503a:1534_2: “Yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, petā uttānā sentī”ti ayaṃ petaseyyā. Catutthajjhānaṃ tathāgataseyyā.
atk-s0503a:1534_3: “Sīho, bhikkhave, migarājā dakkhiṇena passena seyyaṃ kappetī”ti ayaṃ sīhaseyyā. Ayañhi
atk-s0503a:1534_4: tejussadairiyāpathattā uttamaseyyā nāma. Tena vuttaṃ – “dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1534_5: kappesī”ti. Pāde pādanti dakkhiṇapāde vāmapādaṃ. Accādhāyāti atiādhāya, gopphakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1534_6: atikkamma ṭhapetvā. Gopphakena hi gopphake, jāṇunā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ
atk-s0503a:1534_7: vedanā uppajjanti, seyyā phāsukā na hoti. Yathā pana na saṅghaṭṭeti, evaṃ atikkamma
atk-s0503a:1534_8: ṭhapite vedanā nuppajjanti, seyyā phāsukā hoti. Tasmā evaṃ nipajji.
atk-s0503a:1535_0: Gantvāna buddhoti imā gāthā aparabhāge dhammasaṅgāhakehi ṭhapitā. Tattha nadikanti
atk-s0503a:1535_1: nadiṃ. Appaṭimodha loketi appaṭimo idha imasmiṃ sadevake loke. Nhatvā ca pivitvā
atk-s0503a:1535_2: cudatārīti gattānaṃ sītikaraṇavasena nhatvā ca pānīyaṃ pivitvā ca nadito uttari.
atk-s0503a:1535_3: Tadā kira bhagavati nhāyante antonadiyaṃ macchakacchapā, udakaṃ, ubhosu tīresu vanasaṇḍo,
atk-s0503a:1535_4: sabbo ca so bhūmibhāgoti sabbaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇameva ahosi. Purakkhatoti guṇavisiṭṭhasattuttamagarubhāvato
atk-s0503a:1535_5: sadevakena lokena pūjāsammānavasena purakkhato. Bhikkhugaṇassa majjheti bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0503a:1535_6: majjhe. Tadā bhikkhū bhagavato vedanānaṃ adhimattabhāvaṃ viditvā āsannā hutvā samantato
atk-s0503a:1535_8: anusāsanato satthā. Pavattā bhagavā idha dhammeti bhāgyavantatādīhi bhagavā idha
atk-s0503a:1535_9: sīlādisāsanadhamme pavattā, dhamme vā caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassāni pavattā pavattetā.
atk-s0503a:1535_10: Ambavananti tassā eva nadiyā tīre ambavanaṃ. Āmantayi cundakanti tasmiṃ kira khaṇe
atk-s0503a:1535_11: āyasmā ānando udakasāṭikaṃ pīḷento ohīyi, cundakatthero samīpe ahosi. Tasmā taṃ bhagavā
atk-s0503a:1535_12: āmantayi. Pamukhe nisīdīti vattasīsena satthu purato nisīdi “kiṃ nu kho satthā āṇāpetī”ti.
atk-s0503a:1535_13: Ettāvatā dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko anuppatto. Evaṃ anuppattaṃ atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0503a:1536_0: Upadaheyyāti uppādeyya, vippaṭisārassa uppādako koci puriso siyā api bhaveyya. Alābhāti
atk-s0503a:1536_1: ye aññesaṃ dānaṃ dadantānaṃ dānānisaṃsasaṅkhātā lābhā honti, te alābhā. Dulladdhanti
atk-s0503a:1536_2: puññavisesena laddhampi manussattaṃ dulladdhaṃ. Yassa teti yassa tava. Uttaṇḍulaṃ
atk-s0503a:1536_3: vā atikilinnaṃ vā ko taṃ jānāti, kīdisampi pacchimaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā tathāgato
atk-s0503a:1536_4: parinibbuto, addhā tena yaṃ vā taṃ vā dinnaṃ bhavissatīti. Lābhāti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikā
atk-s0503a:1536_5: dānānisaṃsasaṅkhātā lābhā. Suladdhanti tuyhaṃ manussattaṃ suladdhaṃ. Sammukhāti sammukhato,
atk-s0503a:1536_6: na anussavena na paramparāyāti attho. Metanti me etaṃ mayā etaṃ. Dvemeti dve ime.
atk-s0503a:1537_0: Nanu ca yaṃ sujātāya dinnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā tathāgato abhisambuddho, taṃ kilesānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1537_1: appahīnakāle dānaṃ, idaṃ pana cundassa dānaṃ khīṇāsavakāle, kasmā etāni samaphalānīti?
atk-s0503a:1537_2: Parinibbānasamatāya samāpattisamatāya anussaraṇasamatāya ca. Bhagavā hi sujātāya
atk-s0503a:1537_3: dinnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto, cundena dinnaṃ
atk-s0503a:1537_4: bhuñjitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutoti evaṃ parinibbānasamatāyapi samaphalāni.
atk-s0503a:1537_5: Abhisambujjhanadivase ca aggamaggassa hetubhūtā catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo
atk-s0503a:1537_6: samāpajji, parinibbānadivasepi sabbā tā samāpajji. Evaṃ samāpattisamatāyapi samaphalāni.
atk-s0503a:1538: “Yassa cetaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā anuttaraṃ appamāṇaṃ cetosamādhiṃ upasampajja viharati, appamāṇo tassa puññābhisando kusalābhisando”tiādi. –
atk-s0503a:1539_0: Sujātā ca aparabhāge assosi “na kira sā rukkhadevatā, bodhisatto kiresa, taṃ kira
atk-s0503a:1539_1: piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, sattasattāhaṃ kirassa
atk-s0503a:1539_2: tena yāpanā ahosī”ti. Tassā idaṃ sutvā “lābhā vata me”ti anussarantiyā balavapītisomanassaṃ
atk-s0503a:1539_3: udapādi. Cundassapi aparabhāge “avasānapiṇḍapāto kira mayā dinno, dhammasīsaṃ kira
atk-s0503a:1539_4: mayā gahitaṃ, mayhaṃ kira piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā satthā attanā cirakālābhipatthitāya
atk-s0503a:1539_5: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto”ti sutvā “lābhā vata me”ti anussarato balavapītisomanassaṃ
atk-s0503a:1539_6: udapādi. Evaṃ anussaraṇasamatāyapi samaphalāni dvepi piṇḍapātadānānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0503a:1540: Āyusaṃvattanikanti dīghāyukasaṃvattanikaṃ. Upacitanti pasutaṃ uppāditaṃ. Yasasaṃvattanikanti parivārasaṃvattanikaṃ. Ādhipateyyasaṃvattanikanti seṭṭhabhāvasaṃvattanikaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1541_0: Etamatthaṃ viditvāti etaṃ dānassa mahapphalatañceva sīlādiguṇehi attano ca anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ
atk-s0503a:1541_1: anupādāparinibbānañcāti tividhampi atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā tadatthadīpanaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1542_0: Tattha dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dānaṃ dentassa cittasampattiyā ca dakkhiṇeyyasampattiyā
atk-s0503a:1542_1: ca dānamayaṃ puññaṃ upacīyati, mahapphalatarañca mahānisaṃsatarañca hotīti attho.
atk-s0503a:1542_2: Atha vā dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti deyyadhammaṃ pariccajanto pariccāgacetanāya bahulīkatāya
atk-s0503a:1542_3: anukkamena sabbattha anāpattibahulo suvisuddhasīlaṃ rakkhitvā samathavipassanañca
atk-s0503a:1542_4: bhāvetuṃ sakkotīti tassa dānādivasena tividhampi puññaṃ abhivaḍḍhatīti evamettha
atk-s0503a:1542_5: attho veditabbo. Saṃyamatoti sīlasaṃyamena saṃyamantassa, saṃvare ṭhitassāti attho.
atk-s0503a:1542_6: Veraṃ na cīyatīti pañcavidhaveraṃ na pavaḍḍhati, adosapadhānattā vā adhisīlassa kāyavācācittehi
atk-s0503a:1542_7: sayaṃmanto suvisuddhasīlo khantibahulatāya kenaci veraṃ na karoti, kuto tassa upacayo.
atk-s0503a:1542_8: Tasmā tassa saṃyamato saṃyamantassa, saṃyamahetu vā veraṃ na cīyati. Kusalo ca jahāti
atk-s0503a:1542_9: pāpakanti kusalo pana ñāṇasampanno suvisuddhasīle patiṭṭhito aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu
atk-s0503a:1542_10: attano anurūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā upacārappanābhedaṃ jhānaṃ sampādento pāpakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1542_11: lāmakaṃ kāmacchandādiakusalaṃ vikkhambhanavasena jahāti pariccajati. So tameva jhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1542_12: pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāresu khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1542_13: ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggena anavasesaṃ pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ akusalaṃ samucchedavasena jahāti.
atk-s0503a:1542_14: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti so evaṃ pāpakaṃ pajahitvā rāgādīnaṃ khayā anavasesakilesanibbānena,
atk-s0503a:1542_15: tato paraṃ khandhanibbānena ca nibbuto hotīti evaṃ bhagavā cundassa ca dakkhiṇasampattiṃ,
atk-s0503a:1542_16: attano ca dakkhiṇeyyasampattiṃ nissāya pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0503a:1545_0: 76. Chaṭṭhe magadhesūti magadharaṭṭhe. Mahatāti idhāpi guṇamahattenapi aparicchinnasaṅkhyattā
atk-s0503a:1545_1: gaṇanamahattenapi mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena. Pāṭaligāmoti evaṃnāmako magadharaṭṭhe eko
atk-s0503a:1545_2: gāmo. Tassa kira gāmassa māpanadivase gāmaggahaṇaṭṭhāne dve tayo pāṭalaṅkurā pathavito
atk-s0503a:1545_3: ubbhijjitvā nikkhamiṃsu. Tena taṃ “pāṭaligāmo”tveva vohariṃsu. Tadavasarīti taṃ pāṭaligāmaṃ
atk-s0503a:1545_4: avasari anupāpuṇi. Kadā pana bhagavā pāṭaligāmaṃ anupāpuṇi? Heṭṭhā vuttanayena sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0503a:1545_5: dhammasenāpatino cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā tato nikkhamitvā rājagahe vasanto tattha āyasmato
atk-s0503a:1545_6: mahāmoggallānassa ca cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā tato nikkhamitvā ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ vasitvā aturitacārikāvasena
atk-s0503a:1545_7: janapadacārikaṃ caranto tattha tattha ekarattivāsena vasitvā lokaṃ anuggaṇhanto anukkamena
atk-s0503a:1546_0: Pāṭaligāmiyāti pāṭaligāmavāsino upāsakā. Te kira bhagavato paṭhamadassanena keci
atk-s0503a:1546_1: saraṇesu, keci sīlesu, keci saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitā. Tena vuttaṃ “upāsakā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1546_2: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti pāṭaligāme kira ajātasattuno licchavirājūnañca manussā
atk-s0503a:1546_3: kālena kālaṃ gantvā gehasāmike gehato nīharitvā māsampi aḍḍhamāsampi vasanti. Tena
atk-s0503a:1546_4: pāṭaligāmavāsino manussā niccupaddutā “etesañceva āgatakāle vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0503a:1546_5: ekapasse issarānaṃ bhaṇḍappaṭisāmanaṭṭhānaṃ, ekapasse vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, ekapasse āgantukānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1546_6: addhikamanussānaṃ, ekapasse daliddānaṃ kapaṇamanussānaṃ, ekapasse gilānānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1546_7: bhavissatīti sabbesaṃ aññamaññaṃ aghaṭṭetvā vasanappahonakaṃ nagaramajjhe mahāsālaṃ
atk-s0503a:1546_8: kāresuṃ, tassā nāmaṃ āvasathāgāranti. Taṃ divasañca niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Te tattha
atk-s0503a:1546_10: taṃ dvārakoṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya oloketvā “idaṃ āvasathāgāraṃ ativiya manoramaṃ sassirikaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1546_11: kena nu kho paṭhamaṃ paribhuttaṃ amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya assā”ti cintesuṃ,
atk-s0503a:1546_12: tasmiṃyeva ca khaṇe “bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ anuppatto”ti assosuṃ. Tena te uppannapītisomanassā
atk-s0503a:1546_13: “amhehi bhagavā gantvāpi ānetabbo siyā, so pana sayameva amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sampatto,
atk-s0503a:1546_14: ajja mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ idha vasāpetvā paṭhamaṃ paribhuñjāpessāma tathā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1546_15: bhikkhusaṅghe āgate tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ āgatameva bhavissati, satthāraṃ maṅgalaṃ
atk-s0503a:1546_16: vadāpessāma, dhammaṃ kathāpessāma. Iti tīhi ratanehi paribhutte pacchā amhākañca
atk-s0503a:1546_17: paresañca paribhogo bhavissati, evaṃ no dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0503a:1546_18: sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā etadatthameva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu. Tasmā evamāhaṃsu – “adhivāsetu
atk-s0503a:1547_0: Yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti kiñcāpi taṃ taṃ divasameva pariniṭṭhitattā
atk-s0503a:1547_1: devavimānaṃ viya susajjitaṃ supaṭijaggitaṃ, buddhārahaṃ pana katvā na paññattaṃ,
atk-s0503a:1547_2: “buddhā nāma araññajjhāsayā araññārāmā, antogāme vaseyyuṃ vā no vā, tasmā bhagavato
atk-s0503a:1547_3: ruciṃ jānitvāva paññāpessāmā”ti cintetvā te bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu, idāni bhagavato
atk-s0503a:1547_4: ruciṃ jānitvā tathā paññāpetukāmā yena āvasathāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu. Sabbasanthariṃ
atk-s0503a:1547_5: āvasathāgāraṃ santharitvāti yathā sabbameva santhataṃ hoti, evaṃ taṃ santharitvā
atk-s0503a:1547_6: sabbapaṭhamaṃ tāva “gomayaṃ nāma sabbamaṅgalesu vattatī”ti sudhāparikammakatampi
atk-s0503a:1547_7: bhūmiṃ allagomayena opuñjāpetvā parisukkhabhāvaṃ ñatvā yathā akkantaṭṭhāne padaṃ
atk-s0503a:1547_8: na paññāyati, evaṃ catujjātiyagandhehi limpetvā upari nānāvaṇṇakaṭasārake santharitvā
atk-s0503a:1547_9: tesaṃ upari mahāpiṭṭhikakojavādiṃ katvā hatthattharaṇādīhi nānāvaṇṇehi attharaṇehi
atk-s0503a:1547_10: santharitabbayuttakaṃ sabbokāsaṃ santharāpesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “sabbasanthariṃ āvasathāgāraṃ santharitvā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1548_0: Āsanānañhi majjhaṭṭhāne tāva maṅgalathambhaṃ nissāya mahārahaṃ buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā
atk-s0503a:1548_1: tattha yaṃ yaṃ mudukañca manoramañca paccattharaṇaṃ, taṃ taṃ paccattharitvā ubhatolohitakaṃ
atk-s0503a:1548_2: manuññadassanaṃ upadhānaṃ upadahitvā upari suvaṇṇarajatatārakāvicittaṃ vitānaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0503a:1548_3: gandhadāmapupphadāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā samantā dvādasahatthe ṭhāne pupphajālaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0503a:1548_4: tiṃsahatthamattaṭṭhānaṃ paṭasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā pacchimabhittiṃ nissāya bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0503a:1548_6: sālāya pācīnapassaṃ attano nisajjāyoggaṃ kāresuṃ. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “āsanāni paññāpetvā”ti.
atk-s0503a:1549_0: Udakamaṇikanti mahākucchikaṃ udakacāṭiṃ. Evaṃ bhagavā bhikkhusaṅgho ca yathāruciyā
atk-s0503a:1549_1: hatthapāde dhovissanti, mukhaṃ vikkhālessantīti tesu tesu ṭhānesu maṇivaṇṇassa udakassa
atk-s0503a:1549_2: pūretvā vāsatthāya nānāpupphāni ceva udakavāsacuṇṇāni ca pakkhipitvā kadalipaṇṇehi
atk-s0503a:1550_1: hatthe ṭhapitasuvaṇṇarajatādimayakapallikāsu telappadīpaṃ jālayitvā. Yena bhagavā
atk-s0503a:1550_2: tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti ettha pana te pāṭaligāmiyā upāsakā na kevalaṃ āvasathāgārameva,
atk-s0503a:1550_3: atha kho sakalasmimpi gāme vīthiyo sajjāpetvā dhaje ussāpetvā gehadvāresu puṇṇaghaṭe
atk-s0503a:1550_4: kadaliyo ca ṭhapāpetvā sakalagāmaṃ dīpamālāhi vippakiṇṇatārakaṃ viya katvā “khīrapake
atk-s0503a:1550_5: dārake khīraṃ pāyetha, daharakumāre lahuṃ lahuṃ bhojetvā sayāpetha, uccāsaddaṃ mā
atk-s0503a:1550_6: karittha, ajja ekarattiṃ satthā antogāme vasissati, buddhā nāma appasaddakāmā hontī”ti
atk-s0503a:1550_7: bheriṃ carāpetvā sayaṃ daṇḍadīpikā ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0503a:1551_0: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena āvasathāgāraṃ
atk-s0503a:1551_1: tenupasaṅkamīti “yassa dāni, bhante, bhagavā kālaṃ maññatī”ti evaṃ kira tehi kāle
atk-s0503a:1551_2: ārocite bhagavā lākhārasena tintarattakoviḷārapupphavaṇṇaṃ rattadupaṭṭaṃ kattariyā
atk-s0503a:1551_3: padumaṃ kantento viya, saṃvidhāya timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādento nivāsetvā suvaṇṇapāmaṅgena
atk-s0503a:1551_4: padumakalāpaṃ parikkhipanto viya, vijjulatāsassirikaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā rattakambalena
atk-s0503a:1551_5: gajakumbhaṃ pariyonandhanto viya, ratanasatubbedhe suvaṇṇagghike pavāḷajālaṃ khipamāno
atk-s0503a:1551_6: viya, mahati suvaṇṇacetiye rattakambalakañcukaṃ paṭimuñcanto viya, gacchantaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ
atk-s0503a:1551_7: rattavalāhakena paṭicchādento viya, kañcanagirimatthake supakkalākhārasaṃ parisiñcanto
atk-s0503a:1551_10: nikkhantakesarasīho viya, samantato udayapabbatakūṭato puṇṇacando viya, bālasūriyo
atk-s0503a:1552_0: Athassa kāyato meghamukhato vijjukalāpā viya rasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasadhārāparisekapiñjarapattapupphaphalasākhāviṭape
atk-s0503a:1552_1: viya samantato rukkhe kariṃsu. Tāvadeva attano attano pattacīvaramādāya mahābhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0503a:1552_2: bhagavantaṃ parivāresi. Te ca naṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū evarūpā ahesuṃ appicchā
atk-s0503a:1552_3: santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā āraddhavīriyā vattāro vacanakkhamā codakā pāpagarahino
atk-s0503a:1552_5: Tehi parivuto bhagavā rattakambalaparikkhitto viya suvaṇṇakkhandho, nakkhattaparivārito
atk-s0503a:1552_6: viya puṇṇacando, rattapadumavanasaṇḍamajjhagatā viya suvaṇṇanāvā, pavāḷavedikaparikkhitto
atk-s0503a:1552_7: viya suvaṇṇapāsādo virocittha. Mahākassapappamukhā pana mahātherā meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ
atk-s0503a:1552_8: pārupitvā maṇivammavammitā viya mahānāgā parivārayiṃsu vantarāgā bhinnakilesā vijaṭitajaṭā
atk-s0503a:1552_9: chinnabandhanā kule vā gaṇe vā alaggā.
atk-s0503a:1553_0: Iti bhagavā sayaṃ vītarāgo vītarāgehi, vītadoso vītadosehi, vītamoho vītamohehi,
atk-s0503a:1553_1: nittaṇho nittaṇhehi, nikkileso nikkilesehi, sayaṃ buddho anubuddhehi parivārito pattaparivāritaṃ
atk-s0503a:1553_2: viya kesaraṃ, kesaraparivāritā viya kaṇṇikā, aṭṭhanāgasahassaparivārito viya chaddanto
atk-s0503a:1553_3: nāgarājā, navutihaṃsasahassaparivārito viya dhataraṭṭho haṃsarājā, senaṅgaparivārito
atk-s0503a:1553_4: viya cakkavattirājā, marugaṇaparivārito viya sakko devarājā, brahmagaṇaparivārito
atk-s0503a:1553_5: viya hāritamahābrahmā, tārāgaṇaparivārito viya puṇṇacando, anupamena buddhavesena
atk-s0503a:1554_0: Athassa puratthimakāyato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1554_1: aggahesuṃ, tathā pacchimakāyato dakkhiṇapassato vāmapassato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo
atk-s0503a:1554_2: uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ, uparikesantato paṭṭhāya sabbakesāvaṭṭehi
atk-s0503a:1554_3: moragīvarājavaṇṇā asitā ghanabuddharasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā gaganatale asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1554_4: aggahesuṃ, heṭṭhāpādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇā rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā ghanapathaviyaṃ asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1554_5: aggahesuṃ, dantato akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhānato, nakhānaṃ maṃsavimuttaṭṭhānato odātā ghanabuddharasmiyo
atk-s0503a:1554_6: uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ, rattapītavaṇṇānaṃ sambhinnaṭṭhānato mañjeṭṭhavaṇṇā
atk-s0503a:1554_7: rasmiyo uṭṭhahitvā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ aggahesuṃ, sabbatthakameva pabhassarā rasmiyo
atk-s0503a:1554_8: uṭṭhahiṃsu. Evaṃ samantā asītihatthaṭṭhānaṃ chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vipphandamānā
atk-s0503a:1554_9: vidhāvamānā kañcanadaṇḍadīpikādīhi niccharitvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandamānā mahāpadīpajālā
atk-s0503a:1554_10: viya, cātuddīpikamahāmeghato nikkhantavijjulatā viya ca disodisaṃ pakkhandiṃsu. Yāhi
atk-s0503a:1554_11: sabbe disābhāgā suvaṇṇacampakapupphehi vikiriyamānā viya, suvaṇṇaghaṭato suvaṇṇarasadhārāhi
atk-s0503a:1555_2: vikasitaṃ viya padumavanaṃ, sabbapāliphullo viya yojanasatiko pāricchattako, paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0503a:1555_4: dvattiṃsamahābrahmānaṃ siriyā siriṃ abhibhavamānaṃ viya virocittha, yathā taṃ dasahi
atk-s0503a:1555_5: pāramīhi dasahi upapāramīhi dasahi paramatthapāramīhīti sammadeva paripūritāhi samatiṃsapāramitāhi
atk-s0503a:1555_6: alaṅkataṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dinnena dānena rakkhitena
atk-s0503a:1555_7: sīlena katena kalyāṇakammena ekasmiṃ attabhāve samosaritvā vipākaṃ dātuṃ okāsaṃ alabhamānena
atk-s0503a:1555_8: sambādhappattaṃ viya nibbattitaṃ nāvāsahassabhaṇḍaṃ ekaṃ nāvaṃ āropanakālo viya,
atk-s0503a:1555_9: sakaṭasahassabhaṇḍaṃ ekaṃ sakaṭaṃ āropanakālo viya, pañcavīsatiyā gaṅgānaṃ sambhinnamukhadvāre
atk-s0503a:1556_0: Imāya buddhasiriyā obhāsamānassapi bhagavato purato anekāni daṇḍadīpikāsahassāni
atk-s0503a:1556_3: viya vippakiriṃsu. Pañcaṅgikatūriyanigghosā ca buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇāsaṃyuttā thutighosā
atk-s0503a:1556_4: ca sabbā disā pūrayamānā mukhasambhāsā viya ahesuṃ. Devasupaṇṇanāgayakkhagandhabbamanussānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1556_5: akkhīni amatapānaṃ viya labhiṃsu. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā padasahassehi gamanavaṇṇanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1564: Unnatañca samaṃ hoti, pathavī ca acetanā.
atk-s0503a:1568: Aghaṭṭayanto niyyāti, ubho jāṇū ca gopphake.
atk-s0503a:1570: Na cāpi saṇikaṃ yāti, gacchamāno samāhito.
atk-s0503a:1571: “Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyaṃ, disañca vidisaṃ tathā;
atk-s0503a:1576: Tosayanto bahū satte, gāmaṃ seṭṭho upāgamī”ti. –
atk-s0503a:1577_0: Vaṇṇakālo nāma kiresa. Evaṃvidhesu kālesu bhagavato sarīravaṇṇe vā guṇavaṇṇe vā dhammakathikassa
atk-s0503a:1577_1: thāmoyeva pamāṇaṃ, cuṇṇiyapadehi gāthābandhehi yattakaṃ sakkoti, tattakaṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1577_2: “Dukkathita”nti vā “atitthena pakkhando”ti vā na vattabbo. Aparimāṇavaṇṇā hi buddhā
atk-s0503a:1577_3: bhagavanto, tesaṃ buddhāpi anavasesato vaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ asamatthā. Sakalampi hi kappaṃ
atk-s0503a:1577_4: vaṇṇentā pariyosāpetuṃ na sakkonti, pageva itarā pajāti. Iminā sirivilāsena alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0503a:1577_5: pāṭaligāmaṃ pāvisi, pavisitvā bhagavā pasannacittena janena pupphagandhadhūmavāsacuṇṇādīhi
atk-s0503a:1577_6: pūjiyamāno āvasathāgāraṃ pāvisi. Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0503a:1578_0: Pāde pakkhāletvāti yadipi bhagavato pāde rajojallaṃ na upalimpati, tesaṃ pana upāsakānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1578_1: kusalābhivuddhiṃ ākaṅkhanto paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanatthañca bhagavā pāde pakkhāleti.
atk-s0503a:1578_2: Apica upādinnakasarīraṃ nāma sītaṃ kātabbampi hotīti etadatthampi bhagavā nhānapādadhovanādīni
atk-s0503a:1578_3: karotiyeva. Bhagavantaṃyeva purakkhatvāti bhagavantaṃ purato katvā. Tattha bhagavā
atk-s0503a:1578_4: bhikkhūnañceva upāsakānañca majjhe nisinno gandhodakena nhāpetvā dukūlacumbaṭakena
atk-s0503a:1578_5: vodakaṃ katvā jātihiṅgulakena majjitvā rattakambalena paliveṭhetvā pīṭhe ṭhapitā
atk-s0503a:1592_0: Pāṭaligāmiye upāsake āmantesīti yasmā tesu upāsakesu bahū janā sīlesu patiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0503a:1592_1: tasmā paṭhamaṃ tāva sīlavipattiyā ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā pacchā sīlasampadāya ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0503a:1593_0: Tattha dussīloti nissīlo. Sīlavipannoti vipannasīlo bhinnasaṃvaro. Ettha ca “dussīlo”ti
atk-s0503a:1593_1: padena puggalassa sīlābhāvo vutto. So panassa sīlābhāvo duvidho asamādānena vā samādinnassa
atk-s0503a:1593_2: bhedena vāti. Tesu purimo na tathā sāvajjo, yathā dutiyo sāvajjataro. Yathādhippetādīnavanimittaṃ
atk-s0503a:1593_3: sīlābhāvaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya dassetuṃ, “sīlavipanno”ti vuttaṃ. Tena “dussīlo”ti
atk-s0503a:1593_4: padassa atthaṃ dasseti. Pamādādhikaraṇanti pamādakāraṇā. Idañca suttaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0503a:1593_5: vasena āgataṃ, pabbajitānampi pana labbhateva. Gahaṭṭho hi yena sippaṭṭhānena jīvikaṃ
atk-s0503a:1593_6: kappeti yadi kasiyā yadi vāṇijjāya yadi gorakkhena, pāṇātipātādivasena pamatto taṃ
atk-s0503a:1593_7: taṃ yathākālaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkoti, athassa kammaṃ vinassati. Māghātakāle pana
atk-s0503a:1593_8: pāṇātipātādīni karonto daṇḍavasena mahatiṃ bhogajāniṃ nigacchati. Pabbajito dussīlo
atk-s0503a:1593_9: pamādakāraṇā sīlato buddhavacanato jhānato sattaariyadhanato ca jāniṃ nigacchati.
atk-s0503a:1594_0: Pāpako kittisaddoti gahaṭṭhassa “asuko amukakule jāto dussīlo pāpadhammo pariccattaidhalokaparaloko
atk-s0503a:1594_1: salākabhattamattampi na detī”ti parisamajjhe pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati. Pabbajitassa
atk-s0503a:1594_2: “asuko nāma thero satthu sāsane pabbajitvā nāsakkhi sīlāni rakkhituṃ, na buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0503a:1594_3: gahetuṃ, vejjakammādīhi jīvati, chahi agāravehi samannāgato”ti evaṃ pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
atk-s0503a:1595_0: Avisāradoti gahaṭṭho tāva avassaṃ bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhāne “koci mama kammaṃ jānissati,
atk-s0503a:1595_1: atha maṃ nindissati, rājakulassa vā dassessatī”ti sabhayo upasaṅkamati, maṅkubhūto
atk-s0503a:1595_2: pattakkhandho adhomukho nisīdati, visārado hutvā kathetuṃ na sakkoti. Pabbajitopi
atk-s0503a:1595_3: bahubhikkhusaṅghe sannipatite “avassaṃ koci mama kammaṃ jānissati, atha me uposathampi
atk-s0503a:1595_4: pavāraṇampi ṭhapetvā sāmaññato cāvetvā nikkaḍḍhissatī”ti sabhayo upasaṅkamati, visārado
atk-s0503a:1595_5: hutvā kathetuṃ na sakkoti. Ekacco pana dussīlopi samāno susīlo viya carati, sopi
atk-s0503a:1596_0: Sammūḷho kālaṃ karotīti dussīlassa hi maraṇamañce nipannassa dussīlakammāni samādāya
atk-s0503a:1596_1: pavattitaṭṭhānāni āpāthaṃ āgacchanti. So ummīletvā idhalokaṃ, nimīletvā paralokaṃ
atk-s0503a:1596_2: passati. Tassa cattāro apāyā kammānurūpaṃ upaṭṭhahanti, sattisatena pahariyamāno
atk-s0503a:1596_3: viya aggijālābhighātena jhāyamāno viya ca hoti. So “vāretha, vārethā”ti viravantova
atk-s0503a:1597_0: Kāyassa bhedāti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā. Paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇā.
atk-s0503a:1597_1: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā. Paraṃ maraṇāti cutito uddhaṃ.
atk-s0503a:1597_2: Apāyantiādi sabbaṃ nirayavevacanaṃ. Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasaṅkhātā
atk-s0503a:1597_3: ayā apetattā, sukhānaṃ vā ayassa, āgamanassa vā abhāvā apāyo. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti
atk-s0503a:1597_4: duggati, dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gatīti duggati. Vivasā nipatanti
atk-s0503a:1597_5: ettha dukkatakārinoti vinipāto, vinassantā vā ettha nipatanti sambhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgāti
atk-s0503a:1597_6: vinipāto. Natthi ettha assādasaññito ayoti nirayo.
atk-s0503a:1598_0: Atha vā apāyaggahaṇena tiracchānayoniṃ dīpeti. Tiracchānayoni hi apāyo sugatito apetattā,
atk-s0503a:1598_1: na duggati mahesakkhānaṃ nāgarājādīnaṃ sambhavato. Duggatiggahaṇena pettivisayaṃ
atk-s0503a:1598_2: dīpeti. So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā, dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā,
atk-s0503a:1598_3: na tu vinipāto asurasadisaṃ avinipatitattā petamahiddhikānampi vijjamānattā. Vinipātaggahaṇena
atk-s0503a:1598_4: asurakāyaṃ dīpeti. So hi yathāvuttenaṭṭhena “apāyo” ceva “duggati” ca sabbasampattisamussayehi
atk-s0503a:1598_5: vinipatitattā “vinipāto”ti ca vuccati. Nirayaggahaṇena avīciādikaṃ anekappakāraṃ
atk-s0503a:1599_0: Ānisaṃsakathā vuttavipariyāyena veditabbā. Ayaṃ pana viseso – sīlavāti samādānavasena
atk-s0503a:1599_1: sīlavā. Sīlasampannoti parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇañca katvā sīlassa samādānena sīlasampanno.
atk-s0503a:1599_2: Bhogakkhandhanti bhogarāsiṃ. Sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokanti ettha sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi
atk-s0503a:1599_3: saṅgayhati, saggaggahaṇena devagati eva. Tattha sundarā gati sugati, rūpādīhi visayehi
atk-s0503a:1599_4: suṭṭhu aggoti saggo, so sabbopi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti.
atk-s0503a:1600_0: Pāṭaligāmiye upāsake bahudeva rattiṃ dhammiyā kathāyāti aññāyapi pāḷimuttāya dhammakathāya
atk-s0503a:1600_1: ceva āvasathānumodanakathāya ca. Tadā hi bhagavā yasmā ajātasattunā tattha pāṭaliputtanagaraṃ
atk-s0503a:1600_2: māpentena aññesu gāmanigamajanapadarājadhānīsu ye sīlācārasampannā kuṭumbikā, te
